NK044(phi)001:1: // a d+hi sh+thi ta ni d+hi ko sha s+ya mu
NK044(phi)001:2: ni bi d+hi pa d+ma goo ra pa r+shina d+h+aa
NK044(phi)001:3: r+m+ma bi ha ra ti sma //
NK044(phi)001:5: // thub chog byin rlab gter mdzod kyi rgyab chos pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK044(phi)001:7: yang sngon bskal pa tshad med 'das pa'i pha rol
NK044(phi)001:8: na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can
NK044(phi)001:9: gyi bstan pa'i mjug chos ltar bcos par gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10: tshe na / rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces
NK044(phi)001:11: bya ba chos bzhin rgyal srid skyong ba de'i yul
NK044(phi)001:12: du tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin zhes bya ba'i sman
NK044(phi)001:13: pa khams la mkhas pa tshe'i rig byed la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:14: pa de'i bu khye'u chu 'bebs zhes bya bar bcom
NK044(phi)001:15: ldan 'das nyid skye ba bzhes so //
NK044(phi)001:16: khye'u de nyid gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:17: yi ge dang grangs dang lag rtsis sogs bstan bcos
NK044(phi)001:18: thams cad la mkhas par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:19: de'i tshe sems can mang po nad sna tshogs kyis btab pas sdug bsngal bar rigs nas /
NK044(phi)001:20: bdag gi pha sman gyi rig byed la mkhas pa
NK044(phi)001:21: 'di rgas 'khogs gtugs pas grong khyer sogs su 'gro
NK044(phi)001:22: mi nus pas / bdag gis nad pa de dag
NK044(phi)001:23: gso ba'i phyir pha las bslabs te sman bya'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:24: mi nus pas / du / rang gi pha la gus pas btud nas /
NK044(phi)001:25: khams la mkhas pa dris shing tshe'i rig byed yan
NK044(phi)001:26: lag brgyad po thams cad khong du chud par byas
NK044(phi)001:27: te rgyal po dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na gnas
NK044(phi)001:28: pa'i grong thams cad du song nas nad kyis btab
NK044(phi)001:29: pa'i sems can thams cad la bdag nyid sman par
NK044(phi)001:30: khas 'ches te / nad sna tshogs las thar bar
NK044(phi)001:31: byas pas de dag snga ma kho na bzhin stobs
NK044(phi)001:32: dang brtson 'grus su ldan par gyur nas thams cad
NK044(phi)001:33: dga' zhing rtse la bsod nams dag kyang byed cing
NK044(phi)001:34: khas 'ches te / / thams cad kyis chu 'bebs
NK044(phi)001:35: la sman pa'i rgyal po zhes basngagasa shing bkur sti
NK044(phi)001:37: des rdzing zhig na nya khri zhig chu dang bral
NK044(phi)001:38: bar mthong nas snying rje skyes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:39: shing gi lha mo zhig gis srog chags 'di dag
NK044(phi)001:40: la chu byin dang khyod rang gi ming dang mthun
NK044(phi)001:41: par bya ba byas par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:42: chu 'bebs des phyogs su chu btsal kyang ma rnyed nas /
NK044(phi)001:43: shing chen po zhig gi yal ga bcad pas bsil
NK044(phi)001:44: grib byas te bzhag nas chu btsal kyang chu 'babs
NK044(phi)001:45: pa'i klung gi rgyun de sdig can zhig gis nya
NK044(phi)001:46: khri po de dag chu dang bral ba'i phyir g.yang
NK044(phi)001:47: sa chen po gzhan du klung bsgyur bar mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:48: klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis kyang sngar srol
NK044(phi)001:49: du dbab mi nus na bdag gis lta ci snyam
NK044(phi)001:51: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la phyag byas te /
NK044(phi)001:52: bdag gis yul 'di yi nad pa rnams kyi nad zhi bar byas mod /
NK044(phi)001:53: dgon pa'i gnas zhig na nya khri zhig gnas pa chab dang bral zhing nyi mas gdungs lags na /
NK044(phi)001:54: der chu skyel ba'i ched du lhas glang po che
NK044(phi)001:55: nyi shu zhig stsal du gsol zhes zhus pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:56: glang po che nyi shu stsal to //
NK044(phi)001:57: de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang nyid dang rang gi bu chu'i gos dang /
NK044(phi)001:58: chu'i snying po gnyis dang lhan cig glang po che nyi shu khrid nas /
NK044(phi)001:59: glang po che'i rdzi bo la ba lang gi rkyal ba brgya blangs te /
NK044(phi)001:60: chu 'bab ces bya ba'i klung chen po'i chu blangs
NK044(phi)001:61: pas bkang ste glang po la bkal zhing myur bar
NK044(phi)001:62: dgon pa'i rdzing der phyin nas chus bkang ba dang
NK044(phi)001:63: / chu 'bebs gang du 'gro ba der nya khri po rgyug cing lta bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:64: des nya 'di dag bkres pas bza' btung slong ngo
NK044(phi)001:65: snyam du rang gi bu chu'i gos la glang po
NK044(phi)001:66: che mgyogs pa'i mchog zhig la zhon nas bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:67: khyim gyi mi rnams la khyim der zas sbyar ba
NK044(phi)001:68: ci mchis pa myur du skur zhes byas pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:70: chu 'bebs kyis brul nas rdzing der gtor bas nya khri bo tshim par byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:71: bdag gis sngar dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa zhig las /
NK044(phi)001:72: su 'chi ba'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen
NK044(phi)001:73: gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de bde 'gro
NK044(phi)001:74: mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o zhes thos kyis
NK044(phi)001:75: / bdag gis nya de dag la rten cing 'brel ba'i chos zab mo yang bshad la /
NK044(phi)001:76: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan bstan par bya'o snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:77: de'i tshe 'dzam gling gi sems can rnams kha cig
NK044(phi)001:78: theg chen la dad cing kha cig smod par byed
NK044(phi)001:79: do // der chu 'bebs des rdzing der pus mo nub tsam du 'bog ste /
NK044(phi)001:80: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:81: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la
NK044(phi)001:82: phyag 'tshal lo zhes de skad ched du brjod do
NK044(phi)001:83: // de nas 'di yod pas 'di 'byung zhing 'di skyes pas 'di skye ste /
NK044(phi)001:84: 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:85: 'di lta ste ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed
NK044(phi)001:86: 'gag sogs de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen
NK044(phi)001:87: po 'gags par 'gyur ba'i bar du brjod nas rang
NK044(phi)001:88: gi khyim du slar song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:89: de nas dus gzhan zhig na khye'u chu 'bebs dus
NK044(phi)001:90: ston chen po zos nas chang gis ra ro ste
NK044(phi)001:92: de'i dus na ltas chen po byung bar gyur cing mtshan mo de 'das pa /
NK044(phi)001:93: de'i dus su nya khri po 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:94: skyes ma thag tu bdag cag rgyu gang gis 'dir
NK044(phi)001:95: skyes zhes bsams pa na 'dzam gling du nyar gyur
NK044(phi)001:96: pa'i tshe / tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis chu dang zas kyis tshim par byas /
NK044(phi)001:98: sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang
NK044(phi)001:99: bsgrags pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des 'dir skyes so snyam
NK044(phi)001:100: du / tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la mchod
NK044(phi)001:101: pa'i phyir lha'i bu khri bo de dag lha'i gnas
NK044(phi)001:102: nas tshong dpon gyi khyim du lhags te /
NK044(phi)001:103: de mal na nyal ba der mu tig gi se mo de khri ni mgo thad kar bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:104: khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:106: khri ni g.yon phyogs su bzhag ste /
NK044(phi)001:107: me tog man+d+aa ra ba'i char pus mo nub tsam du phab /
NK044(phi)001:108: lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol bas 'dzam gling gi mi thams cad kyang sad cing /
NK044(phi)001:110: de nas lha'i bu khri po de dag nam mkha' la dong nas /
NK044(phi)001:111: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi gnas gzhan du yang me tog gi char 'bebs shing /
NK044(phi)001:112: dgon pa'i rdzing der yang me tog man+d+aa ra ba'i
NK044(phi)001:113: char phab cing mi snang bar gyur te lha'i gnas
NK044(phi)001:114: su song nas 'dod pa lnga'i dga' ba'i dpal dang
NK044(phi)001:115: skal ba bzang po myong bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:116: 'dzam bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:117: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis ltas chen po
NK044(phi)001:118: de gang las byung zhes skar mkhan dang blon po
NK044(phi)001:120: lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol //
NK044(phi)001:121: tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu
NK044(phi)001:122: tig gi se mo do bzhi khri dang man d+aa
NK044(phi)001:123: ra ba'i char yang babs so zhes byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:124: rgyal po des blon po rnams la khyed deng la
NK044(phi)001:125: chu 'bebs te snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig ces
NK044(phi)001:126: byas pa ltar de 'ongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:127: bu chu 'bebs mdang sum gyi ltas de ci'i ltas yin /
NK044(phi)001:130: nya khri po de dag tshe dus byas par nges so //
NK044(phi)001:131: rgyal pos smras pa ji ltar shes /
NK044(phi)001:133: chu'i gos rdzing der bltar 'dod du stsol cig /
NK044(phi)001:134: rgyal pos de ltar mngags pas /
NK044(phi)001:135: nya khri po shi nas rdzing der me tog man
NK044(phi)001:136: d+aa ra ba'i char babs pa mthong bas slar log
NK044(phi)001:137: ste de ltar gyur pa smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:138: chu 'bebs kyis rgyal po la de'i lo rgyus zhib
NK044(phi)001:139: par gsol bas rgyal po dga' zhing yi rangs so
NK044(phi)001:140: // de'i tshe tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ni rgyal po zas gtsang dang /
NK044(phi)001:141: rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces pa sh+aakya lag na be con dang /
NK044(phi)001:142: chu 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes pa sh+aakya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma dang /
NK044(phi)001:143: khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya ba sgra gcan zin dang /
NK044(phi)001:144: khye'u chu'i snying po zhes bya ba kun dga' bo dang /
NK044(phi)001:145: nya khri po ni da ltar 'bar ba'i khyad par
NK044(phi)001:146: gyi gzi brjid rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu
NK044(phi)001:147: khri bo bla med byang chub tu lung bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:148: 'di dag yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:149: yang sngon sangs rgyas 'jigs pa med pa'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:150: zhes bya ba'i bstan pa la bram ze'i bu shes
NK044(phi)001:151: rab rno ba gtan khrims lnga srung ba chos 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:152: pa zhig tu bcom ldan 'das nyid gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:153: / 'jigs pa'i phyogs zhig tu lam grogs lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:154: dang 'grogs te song ba las phyogs der mgron po
NK044(phi)001:155: rnams 'dzoms pa'i mi rgod lnga brgya yang gnas so
NK044(phi)001:156: / // mi rgod de'i nang gi mi gcig bram
NK044(phi)001:157: ze de dang sngon mdza' zhing bshes pas des do
NK044(phi)001:158: nub nam gyi cha stod la dgra 'ong gis khyod
NK044(phi)001:159: nyid ma smras par thar pa'i thabs soms shig ces
NK044(phi)001:160: / // smras pa de / bram ze des gtam
NK044(phi)001:161: de grogs po rnams la byas na mi 'di bsad
NK044(phi)001:162: par 'gyur la de rnams ngan song du 'gro bar
NK044(phi)001:164: smras na ni mi rgod rnams kyis 'di rnams bsad
NK044(phi)001:165: na de dag ngan song du 'gro bas ci bya
NK044(phi)001:166: med par shin tu nyam thag pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:167: yang bsams te bdag nyid ngan song du song yang
NK044(phi)001:168: sla snyam du ral gri phyungs nas sbren pa'i mi
NK044(phi)001:169: de bsad pas grogs po rnams bde bar byas so
NK044(phi)001:170: // grogs po rnams kyis bram ze'i bu la khyod
NK044(phi)001:171: ni mi'i nang na dge zhing mchog tu gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:172: // yin na / ci'i phyir 'di ltar sdig pa byed ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:173: bram ze des bdag ni deng sdig pa chen po byas la /
NK044(phi)001:174: de yang sems can rnams la phan pa dang grogs po rnams bde bar bya ba'i phyir yin cing /
NK044(phi)001:175: bdag gis bsad pa 'di khyed rnams kyi dgra yin te /
NK044(phi)001:176: bdag dmyal bar lhung yang sla'o zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:177: grogs po lnga brgya pos bdag cag gi srog thob
NK044(phi)001:178: pa'i phyir khyod kyis ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:179: khyad du bsad pa'i drin lci ba dran par bya
NK044(phi)001:180: zhes smras pa de la sems skyed par bskul bas
NK044(phi)001:181: thams cad kyis bla med byang chub tu sems bskyed
NK044(phi)001:182: do // mi rgod lnga brgyas kyang bram ze la sngar ltar smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:183: bdag gis khyed cag 'di na 'dug par snga nas shes kyang su la ma smras /
NK044(phi)001:185: grogs po rnams la yang ma smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:186: khyed kyi lus dang srog bde bar gyur pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:187: mi rgod rnams de thos nas dad cing byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:188: bram ze'i bu de rgyu des bskal pa dgu bcu
NK044(phi)001:189: snyed kyi 'khor ba las 'das nas rim gyis byang
NK044(phi)001:190: chub chen po thob pa yin no zhes gsungs so
NK044(phi)001:191: // yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs pa'i skabs shig na /
NK044(phi)001:192: dge slong zhig 'brum bu'i nad kyis lus la rnag
NK044(phi)001:193: khrag zag pas thams cad kyis mi 'dod par gtsug
NK044(phi)001:194: lag khang gi phyir rol gnas khang zhig pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:196: de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis sus kyang
NK044(phi)001:197: mi shes par bdag nyid gcig pu nad pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:198: drung du gshegs te sangs rgyas kyi mthus brgya byin
NK044(phi)001:199: lha'i dbang pos bsod nams las grub pa'i bum pa
NK044(phi)001:200: dam pa'i nang chu gtsang mas gang ba thogs te
NK044(phi)001:201: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du lhags so //
NK044(phi)001:202: bcom ldan 'das kyi bsod nams brgya las grub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:203: phyag brkyangs pa'i phyag sor lnga las 'od zer gyi
NK044(phi)001:204: snang ba chen po bkyes nas lha dang 'khor mang
NK044(phi)001:205: po rnams snang bar byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:206: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dge slong nad pa'i drung
NK044(phi)001:207: du dbu'i gtsug nas 'od zer bkye bas nad pa
NK044(phi)001:208: de snang bar byas shing 'od des reg ma thag
NK044(phi)001:209: tu nad pa'i sdug bsngal byang bar gyur /
NK044(phi)001:210: rnag khrag dang bcas pa'i lus can dge slong des skyabs su gsol te /
NK044(phi)001:211: phyag 'tshal ma nus pa la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:212: phyag g.yas pas brgya byin las bum pa blangs shing
NK044(phi)001:213: dge slong nad pa de'i gtsug tu blugs /
NK044(phi)001:214: g.yon pa'i phyag gis rma thams cad bkrus pas nad
NK044(phi)001:215: kun sos nas dge slong de dga' zhing bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:217: thugs rje chen po'i yab bla na med pa sman
NK044(phi)001:218: pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas
NK044(phi)001:219: / bdag lus kyi nad deng sos na sems kyi
NK044(phi)001:220: nad gso ba'i slad du chos bstan du gsol zhes
NK044(phi)001:221: / zhus pa la / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan cing /
NK044(phi)001:222: de'ang ngas khyod kyi drin shin tu lci bar dgongs
NK044(phi)001:223: nas lan bsab bo zhes gsungs shing spro bar byas
NK044(phi)001:224: pas dge slong de dga' nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras
NK044(phi)001:225: bu thob bo // lha'i 'khor rnams kyis bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:226: 'das nyid kyis phyag dar te 'di la khrus mdzad
NK044(phi)001:227: nas drin lci ba yod do zhes gsungs pa ji
NK044(phi)001:228: lta bu lags zhes zhus pa la /
NK044(phi)001:230: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa tshad med pa'i pha rol na /
NK044(phi)001:231: rgyal po sdig can chos min byed pa zhig gis blon po lnga brgya la bgros nas /
NK044(phi)001:232: gang su zhig khrims dang 'gal ba la khyed chad
NK044(phi)001:233: pa gcod par dbang bskur gyis nor ci thob pa
NK044(phi)001:234: bdag cag thun mong bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:235: de'i tshe lnga brgya pos rtag tu gzhu zhing brdegs
NK044(phi)001:236: pas nor mang du thob pa rnams de bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:237: btang / nor med pa rnams la srog la bab kyi bar du gnod par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:238: de'i tshe dge bsnyen gcig khrims las cung zad 'gal
NK044(phi)001:239: ba de lnga brgya pa'i drung du khrid de gzhu
NK044(phi)001:241: blon po de dag gis dge bsnyen 'di ni shin
NK044(phi)001:242: tu dge ba yin no zhes thos pas gnod ma
NK044(phi)001:243: byas par btang ba de'i nang gi gcig dge slong
NK044(phi)001:244: 'di yin te / dge bsnyen de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:245: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa
NK044(phi)001:246: grangs med pa'i sngon rol gyi drin yang ba yang
NK044(phi)001:247: lci bas glan pa yin te /
NK044(phi)001:248: mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du yang rtag tu mi brjed do zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:249: yang sngon bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i pha rol
NK044(phi)001:250: na bcom ldan 'das nyid ded dpon slong ldan zhes
NK044(phi)001:252: de sten grogs shed mnyam dang skyes pa rnams dang lhan cig tu yi ge dang /
NK044(phi)001:256: sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi sogs la mkhas par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:257: der sten grogs gcig gis gzhon nu gzhan du 'gro ba'i skyon dang /
NK044(phi)001:258: skye bo gzhan gyis rgol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:261: bza' btung dkon pa'i skyon dang /
NK044(phi)001:262: mi mdza' ba'i dgon par gcan gzan khro bo dang /
NK044(phi)001:264: rgya mtshor song ba'i gru bo che 'jil ba'i skyon dang /
NK044(phi)001:266: gnod pa thams cad yongs su grol ba mi shes sam /
NK044(phi)001:267: gzhon nu khyod gzhan pha ma'i rdzas kyis longs su spyod dam /
NK044(phi)001:268: bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa de lta bu mi shes te chos ma yin pas bslus so //
NK044(phi)001:269: gzhan dag gis gong du bshad pa lta bu'i tshegs
NK044(phi)001:270: chen pos bsgrubs pa'i rdzas yang ba 'di dag mi
NK044(phi)001:271: dgongs sam zhes bskul ba'i tshig de thos nas de
NK044(phi)001:272: la sems shing sten grogs la de ltar bskul ba
NK044(phi)001:273: lags so // da ltar gyi nor bsags pa ni de ltar sdug bsngal ba yin te /
NK044(phi)001:274: de bas bdag nyid kyis nor rdzas yang dag par bsdu bar bya'o zhes smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:276: yab yum bdag tshong la mchi zhing ded dpon gyi bya ba nus par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:277: bu gzhan du 'gro ba la skyon dpag med yod bsam 'gro zhig /
NK044(phi)001:278: bdun brgyud tshun chad kyi phug nor mang po yod pas 'khrul pa med par 'dug gi /
NK044(phi)001:279: de dag la longs spyod la gzhan du 'gro ba'i blo dor cig ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:280: yab de ltar ma lags te bdun brgyud kyi zong gis bsgrubs pa rnams ma spyad par yod na /
NK044(phi)001:281: de dag gis bzhag pa bdag gis spyad par mi spro bas bdag 'dong bar gnang zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:282: pha mas nan gyis ma bkag par rgya mtshor zhugs
NK044(phi)001:283: pa rin po che'i gling du rlung gis phyin nas
NK044(phi)001:284: nor bu rin thang med pas gru bkang zhing phyir
NK044(phi)001:285: log ste rgya mtsho las brgal nas rgya mtshor khrus
NK044(phi)001:286: byas pa'i tshe nor bu rin po che lag pa
NK044(phi)001:287: la btags pa rgya mtsho chen por lhung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:288: des de ma thag tu chu phyags thogs te snying
NK044(phi)001:289: stobs chen pos nor bu rin po che'i phyir rgya
NK044(phi)001:290: mtsho bskam par bya'o snyam du bsams ma thag tu
NK044(phi)001:291: lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang pos
NK044(phi)001:292: grogs byed cing / rlung dang me yang grogs byas pas chu phyags par byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:294: rgya mtsho'i 'di ni mtha' yas mi zad de //
NK044(phi)001:295: cung zad 'gyur gyi rgya mtsho de ltar min //
NK044(phi)001:296: grogs po mkha' la lam gyi tshad 'dod ltar //
NK044(phi)001:297: rgya mtsho bskam pa dag tu ji ltar nus //
NK044(phi)001:298: des lha de dag la slar smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:299: lha dag rgya mtsho mtha' yas ma yin te //
NK044(phi)001:300: rgya mtsho dpag tshad mtha' yang dpag tu rnyed //
NK044(phi)001:301: bdag gi brtson 'grus mtha' yas dpag med de //
NK044(phi)001:302: rgya mtsho chen po bdag gis bskam par nus //
NK044(phi)001:303: rgya mtsho'i lha dag bdag gi stobs la ltos //
NK044(phi)001:304: mkha' la lha yis rab tu gang la ltos //
NK044(phi)001:305: dpag med lha dag bdag gi grogs yin te //
NK044(phi)001:306: 'bar dang sreg dang de bzhin rlung du byed //
NK044(phi)001:307: bdag gis nam mkhar chu gtor ba la ltos //
NK044(phi)001:308: nam mkha' der ni 'gro ba med la ltos //
NK044(phi)001:309: lha tshogs dag ni bdag gi grogs 'gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:310: bar snang chu ni sreg cing skem par byed //
NK044(phi)001:311: bar snang rlung ni bdag gi grogs yin te //
NK044(phi)001:312: rgya mtsho bskam pa dag la zhum pa med //
NK044(phi)001:313: rgya mtshos bdag gi nor bu ma btang na //
NK044(phi)001:314: bdag la yon gnas stobs dang ldan pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:315: bdag gi yon gnas sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang //
NK044(phi)001:316: de bzhin spros med nges par 'byung ba'i chos //
NK044(phi)001:317: 'dren pa'i sras te dge 'dun rin chen yod //
NK044(phi)001:318: de dag bdag gir 'gyur te mtsho lha'i min //
NK044(phi)001:320: rgya mtsho'i lhas skyes bu khyod kyi tshig ni nges pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:321: de bzhin khyod ni brtson stobs ldan pa lags //
NK044(phi)001:322: nor bu dang ni ldan par 'gyur te sbyin //
NK044(phi)001:323: de khyod dkon mchog gsum la 'bul bar gyis //
NK044(phi)001:324: zhes smras nas byin par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:325: yang sngon yul b+aa r+aa na s+air sh+aa ri'i bu
NK044(phi)001:326: khyim bdag so tshis la mkhas pa zhig tu gyur
NK044(phi)001:327: pas nor ci yod gser du bsgyur te bum pa
NK044(phi)001:328: bdun byas pas 'og tu sbas nas khyim bdag de
NK044(phi)001:330: gser gyi bum pa la chags pas sbrul gdug pa chen po zhig tu skyes te gser bsrungs so //
NK044(phi)001:331: phyis yun ring po zhig na grong de yang zhig ste stong /
NK044(phi)001:332: sbrul de yang yang nas yang du sbrul du der
NK044(phi)001:333: skyes nas gser gyi bum pa la khri zhing nyal
NK044(phi)001:334: lo // der lo khri phrag du ma lon pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:335: sbrul gyi skye ba tha ma de yang 'di snyam ste /
NK044(phi)001:336: bdag ni gser 'di la chags pas 'di 'dra ba
NK044(phi)001:337: mi sdug par gyur pas da bsod nams kyi zhing
NK044(phi)001:338: la phul lo snyam du lam dang nye bar song
NK044(phi)001:339: nas mi dag la 'bod do bsam mo //
NK044(phi)001:340: der mi gcig lam na 'ongs pa la sbrul gyis bos pas /
NK044(phi)001:341: sgra thos kyang mi snang bas lam du song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:342: yang sbrul gyis bos te khyod kho bo'i drung du shog cig /
NK044(phi)001:343: mi des khyod shin tu gdug pa can yin pas kho bo bsad du 'ong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:344: sbrul gyis smras pa kho bos gnod pa bya na
NK044(phi)001:345: khyod nga'i drung du ma 'ongs kyang gnod nus so
NK044(phi)001:346: zhes smras pas mi de skrag nas sbrul gyi drung
NK044(phi)001:347: du song ngo // sbrul de na re /
NK044(phi)001:348: kho bo la 'di na gser gyi bum pa zhig yod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:349: khyod la bsod nams zhig bya bar bcol na nus sam /
NK044(phi)001:350: ci ste ma byas na khyod la gnod par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:351: mi des nus so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:352: sbrul des gser bum gcig bstan te 'dis dge 'dun la mchod ston gsol cig /
NK044(phi)001:353: de'i nyin par kho bo'ang 'ong gis bsus shig ces
NK044(phi)001:354: smras pa ltar mi des dge 'dun la ji ltar
NK044(phi)001:356: gze ba zhig thogs te mchod ston gyi nyin par sbrul gyi sar song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:357: sbrul de yang dga' nas gzeb kyi nang du bcug /
NK044(phi)001:358: de mi des khur nas song bas lam du mi gcig dang 'phrad de /
NK044(phi)001:359: des gang nas 'ongs zhes lan gsum dris kyang sbrul thogs pa des cang ma smras /
NK044(phi)001:360: lan gsum dris kyang mi 'di lan mi ster snyam
NK044(phi)001:361: du sbrul de khros nas gdug pa phyung ba la
NK044(phi)001:362: yang bsams te / mi 'di bdag gi bsod nams
NK044(phi)001:363: byed cing phan par byas pas na byas pa bzo
NK044(phi)001:364: ba'i phyir gdug pa dbyung mi rigs te nyes pa
NK044(phi)001:365: byas pa yang bzod par bya'o snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:366: dben par re zhig sa la zhog ces smras shing
NK044(phi)001:367: sbrul des sems smad de bdag gi nyes pa 'gyod
NK044(phi)001:368: cing bshags so zhes byas nas yang khur te /
NK044(phi)001:369: dge 'dun gyi gnas su phyin pa na /
NK044(phi)001:370: dge 'dun rnams gdugs tshod la bab pas mi des
NK044(phi)001:371: me tog brim zhing sprul de dad pa'i sems kyis
NK044(phi)001:372: de la lta'o // dge 'dun rnams zas kyi bya
NK044(phi)001:373: ba byas nas sbrul de la chos bshad pas dga'
NK044(phi)001:374: zhing gser gyi bum pa drug kyang phul /
NK044(phi)001:375: de tshe dus byas nas bsod nams des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lhar skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:376: de'i tshe sbrul gdug pa thogs pa'i mi de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:377: yang sngon gyi dus su gangs ri dpal dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:378: pa'i khrod na sman dang ldan pa'i nags tshal phun
NK044(phi)001:379: sum tshogs pa zhig tu spre'u'i rgyal po zhig tu
NK044(phi)001:380: gyur pa de shing nya gro d+ha chen po sprin
NK044(phi)001:381: stug po lta bu 'bras bu mchog tu mnga' zhing
NK044(phi)001:382: dri zhim pa gcig gi drung du gnas shing /
NK044(phi)001:383: shing de'i yal ga gcig drung nas 'bab pa'i chu
NK044(phi)001:384: la gzhol ba yod pas spre'u mang po dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:385: te shing de'i 'bras bu la za ba'i tshe spre'u'i
NK044(phi)001:386: rgyal po des phyi rjes la lta bas spre'u'i tshogs
NK044(phi)001:387: la shing 'di'i yal ga 'di'i 'bras bu rnams ma
NK044(phi)001:388: zad par du yal ga gzhan gyi 'bras bu ma
NK044(phi)001:389: btog cig ces bsgo ba la de dag kyang de
NK044(phi)001:391: re zhig na yal ga de'i 'bras bu ma smin
NK044(phi)001:392: pa ha cang mi che ba gcig grogs ma rnams
NK044(phi)001:393: kyis shing gi lo ma bsdus pas g.yog pa spre'u
NK044(phi)001:394: rnams kyis ma mthong nas de mthar gyis skyes pa
NK044(phi)001:395: kha dog dang dri ro phun sum tshogs par gyur
NK044(phi)001:396: pa smin pa'i dbang gis rtsa ba gog nas 'bab
NK044(phi)001:397: chur lhung ba de ri ma gyis rgyal po zhig
NK044(phi)001:398: btsun mo'i 'khor dang bcas te chu la rtse ba'i
NK044(phi)001:399: mtha' rgya mos bskor ba'i ngos gcig la chags pa'i
NK044(phi)001:400: dris / btsun mo'i 'khor gyi khrus rtsis bgos pa'i
NK044(phi)001:401: dri thams cad zil gyis mnan pas de la snom
NK044(phi)001:402: zhing kun tu lta bas shing 'bras de mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:403: thams cad der 'dus shing 'di ci yin ces dpyad
NK044(phi)001:404: cing rgyal pos de'i ro myangs bas shin tu zhim
NK044(phi)001:406: 'di 'dra ba za ba de rgyal srid ma bsgrubs kyang rgyal po yin no snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:407: chu 'di'i phu ha cang mi ring ba zhig na shing bzang po yod par 'dug ste /
NK044(phi)001:408: shing 'bras 'di ma snad cing yun ring po ma
NK044(phi)001:409: lon pa'i kha dog dang dri ro gada'o snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:410: dmag gi dpung dang bcas te /
NK044(phi)001:411: chu de'i 'gram brgyud de nags thib po der zhugs pas /
NK044(phi)001:412: shing gi rgyal po de mthong nas der song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:413: spre'u brgya phrag du ma shing de'i 'bras bu la
NK044(phi)001:414: za ba mthong nas khros te 'di rnams kha thogs
NK044(phi)001:415: shig ces smras pas mi rnams kyis mtshon dang rdo
NK044(phi)001:416: sogs kyis gzas te sgra drag po byung bas spre'u
NK044(phi)001:417: rnams 'jigs shing sdug bar mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:418: byang chub sems dpas de rnams la snying rje bas /
NK044(phi)001:419: shing chen po de'i rtse mo nas ri zhig gi
NK044(phi)001:420: khar bya 'phur ba bzhin du mchongs nas der skyes
NK044(phi)001:421: pa'i sba thag shin tu ring po lam gyi khyon
NK044(phi)001:422: las kyang ring ba tsam rtsa ba brtan pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:423: rang gi rkang pa la bcings nas slar yang shing
NK044(phi)001:424: de'i rtser mchongs pas rkang pa gnyis bcings pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:425: sleb tsam du 'bad pas phyin nas shing de'i yal
NK044(phi)001:426: ga lag pas zin nas sba thag brkyangs pa'i steng
NK044(phi)001:428: spre'u rnams skrag shing de'i lus bardzisa pas lus snad
NK044(phi)001:429: kyang sems brtan pa ma bral bar gnas pas spre'u
NK044(phi)001:430: thams cad 'jigs pa las bsgral to //
NK044(phi)001:431: de mthong bas rgyal po 'khor bcas ngo mtshar zhing
NK044(phi)001:432: 'di ni dpa' zhing blo phun sum tshogs pa rang
NK044(phi)001:433: don la mi lta bar gzhan la snying brtse ba
NK044(phi)001:435: rgyal pos mi de dag la bsgo ba /
NK044(phi)001:436: spre'u'i bdag po 'di spre'u rnams bros pas lus bardzisa
NK044(phi)001:437: shing yun ring zam pa byas te dub pas rang
NK044(phi)001:440: sba thag dang nya gro d+ha'i yal ga dus gcig
NK044(phi)001:441: mda' gnyis kyis chod ces bsgos pa de bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:442: byas te rgyal pos brgyang pa bzed pa la phab
NK044(phi)001:443: nas / lus la rma byung bas brgyal bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:444: ba de mal stan 'jam po la bzhag ste sman
NK044(phi)001:445: gyis de'i rma bkrus nas cung zad lon pa'i rjes
NK044(phi)001:446: su rgyal pos de la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:447: bdag gi srog bor nas snying rjes gzhan zam pa las bsgral ba 'di rnams khyod kyi cir 'ong /
NK044(phi)001:448: spre'u de rnams khyod kyi ci yin /
NK044(phi)001:449: byang chub sems dpa' spre'u'i rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:450: bdag gi ngag mnyan gus pa 'di dag gis //
NK044(phi)001:451: bdag la rgyal po'i khur ni bskur bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:452: de bas 'di dag bu dang 'dra bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:453: khur de bskur ba'i phyir ni 'di ltar bgyis //
NK044(phi)001:454: yun ring dus nas 'di ltar 'brel bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:455: rigs gcig skyes pas 'di ltar mdza' gyur zhing //
NK044(phi)001:456: lhan cig gnas pas gnyen dang 'dra bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:457: de la rgyal po ya mtshan te yang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:458: blon po la sogs rgyal po'i ched //
NK044(phi)001:459: de dag ched du rgyal po min //
NK044(phi)001:460: de bas bdag gi bran gyi phyir //
NK044(phi)001:461: ci'i phyir khyod kyis bdag lus bor //
NK044(phi)001:462: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:463: rgyal po de ltar bgyid pa bden mod kyi //
NK044(phi)001:464: rgyal po'i gzhung lugs de lta bu //
NK044(phi)001:465: gzhung lugs ngan par bdag gis mthong //
NK044(phi)001:466: ma 'dris pa yi sdug bsngal kyang //
NK044(phi)001:467: yal bar 'dor ba mi bzod na //
NK044(phi)001:468: sems ni gus pa'i skye bo rnams //
NK044(phi)001:469: gnyen dang mdza' gyur smos ci dgos //
NK044(phi)001:470: zhes sogs rang gis 'khor rnams la brtse bas sba
NK044(phi)001:471: thag drangs pa'i tshul brjod pas rgyal po shin tu
NK044(phi)001:473: de ltar bdag gi bde ba btang nas gzhan dang
NK044(phi)001:474: du blangs pas khyod kyis yon tan ci zhig thob
NK044(phi)001:476: bdag gi lus bcad par gyur kyang rigs mthun rnams
NK044(phi)001:477: kyis bkur sti byas pa'i lan glon pas bdag la
NK044(phi)001:479: bdag gums kyang dga' ba thob la /
NK044(phi)001:480: grags pa dri ma med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:482: shi yang 'jigs pa med par 'gyur ba'i yon tan 'di dag thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:483: bdag po snying rje med pa la brten pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:484: ni de dang 'gal ba'i nyes pa rnams thob la
NK044(phi)001:485: / dmyal ba'i me 'bar bar mchi ba las gzhan med do //
NK044(phi)001:486: de nas rgyal po khyod la bdag gis bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:487: 'di bzhin du khyod kyang chos dang ldan pas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:488: srid skyongs la 'khor gyi skye bo dang mgon med
NK044(phi)001:489: pa'i tshogs la pha bzhin du thams cad phan bder
NK044(phi)001:490: mdzad nas chos srid dang grags pa bsod nams 'phel
NK044(phi)001:491: nas 'di dang pha rol tu bde bar 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:492: // zhes gdams pas rgyal po de yang dad par gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:493: spre'u'i rgyal po de yang lus bor nas mtho ris su song bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:494: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na b+aa r+aa na s+air
NK044(phi)001:495: rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba 'byor pa rgyas
NK044(phi)001:496: shing chos bzhin rgyal srid byed pa de'i yul na
NK044(phi)001:497: ded dpon dbyig ces bya ba rnam thos kyi bu'i
NK044(phi)001:498: nor dang 'gran pa zhig gi bu gzugs bzang zhing
NK044(phi)001:499: mdzes pa dbyig dga' zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:501: yi ge dang brtag pa thams cad la mkhas pa'i blo gsal bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:502: de snying rje dang ldan pas sbyin pa la dga' bar gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:503: pha'i longs spyod dag las ci 'dod pa phongs pa rnams la gtong bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:504: dus gzhan na de'i pha gums nas khye'u dbyig dga'
NK044(phi)001:505: de rgyal pos ded dpon chen por dbang bskur nas
NK044(phi)001:506: nor gyi nyo tshong byed cing /
NK044(phi)001:507: sbyin pa chen po stsal to //
NK044(phi)001:508: dus zhig na nges bsams pa /
NK044(phi)001:509: bdag gi pha'i nor 'di dag ni bdag gi pha'i
NK044(phi)001:510: yin na 'di byin pa la ngo mtshar ci yod
NK044(phi)001:511: de bdag rang gi zho shas nor bsgrubs nas sbyin
NK044(phi)001:512: par bya'o snyam du bdag dang lhan cig rgya mtshor
NK044(phi)001:513: 'gro 'dod na sho gam dang lag can dang gru
NK044(phi)001:514: btsas dang bsel rngan med par su 'gro 'dod na
NK044(phi)001:515: zong sta gon gyis zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:516: tshong pa lnga brgya nas 'gro bar smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:517: rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin te /
NK044(phi)001:518: der zas skom gyi 'tsho ba sbyor ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:519: rtsod pa byung na nan tur byas te zhi bar byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:520: gang du nor rdzas kyi zhal ta byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:522: phyogs lta zhing rgyu skar la lta ba brod pa zhes pa zhes bya ba rnams kyang khrid de /
NK044(phi)001:523: brod pa la rgya mtsho'i nang na nor bu sna
NK044(phi)001:524: tshogs yod pa'i basngagasa pa brjod du bcug pas 'byor
NK044(phi)001:525: ba 'dod pas mi mang po grur zhugs nas mi
NK044(phi)001:526: theg pa tsam du gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:527: ded dpon des rgya mtsho'i basngagasa pa ma yin pa brjod du bcug ste /
NK044(phi)001:528: rgya mtsho'i nang na nya mid dang /
NK044(phi)001:532: chu nang gi ril thug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:535: bgegs sna tshogs yod pas su dag srog phongs pa
NK044(phi)001:536: dang pha ma sogs la mi lta ba de dag
NK044(phi)001:537: 'gro bar gyis shig ces smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:538: dpa' bo nyung la sdar ma mang bas phal che ba phyir 'thon to //
NK044(phi)001:539: de ltar lan gsum bsgrags te nyag thag gsum bar
NK044(phi)001:540: du bkol nas gru de rlung chen po drang pos
NK044(phi)001:541: bskyod pas rin po che'i gling du phyin nas brod
NK044(phi)001:542: pas smras pa / rin po che'i gling 'di na
NK044(phi)001:543: nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ba'i mching bu
NK044(phi)001:544: dag kyang yod pas brtags te blang bar gyis shig
NK044(phi)001:545: pas smras pa / / srin mo khrung khrung gzhon
NK044(phi)001:546: nu ma zhes bya bas skyes pa khrid cing ma
NK044(phi)001:548: myos par byed pa'i shing thog sus zos pa zhag
NK044(phi)001:549: bdun du brgyal te 'dug pa yod pas de rnams
NK044(phi)001:551: rin po che'i gling 'dir mi ma yin pa dag gis zhag bdun du 'dug pa bzod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:552: de las 'das nas don gang bsgrub pa de ma
NK044(phi)001:553: zin par gru 'khyer bar byed pa'i rlung gtong bar
NK044(phi)001:554: byed do zhes bsgo ba ltar de dag bag dang
NK044(phi)001:555: ldan par bsgrims te rin po che bzang pos gru
NK044(phi)001:556: yongs su bkang zhing slar 'dzam bu'i gling du bde
NK044(phi)001:557: bar phyin nas sbyin pa chen po byas so //
NK044(phi)001:558: de lta bur lan drug gi bar du bsgrubs te
NK044(phi)001:559: b+aa r+aa na s+ai'i grong khyer der sbyin pa chen
NK044(phi)001:560: po byas so // de'i tshe yul gzhan na ded
NK044(phi)001:561: dpon lnga zhig rgya mtshor song ba gru ma rungs
NK044(phi)001:562: par gyur nas don ma grub pa de dag gis
NK044(phi)001:563: po byas so // bsams pa / ded dpon chen
NK044(phi)001:564: po dbyig dga' de bsod nams kyis dbang che bar
NK044(phi)001:565: grags pas de'i mthus bdag cag nor 'grub par 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:566: po byas so // bsams pa / ro snyam ste / dbyig dga' la gsol ba btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:568: kye rgya mtsho chen po ni chos nyid kyis gru
NK044(phi)001:569: bdun pa ma rungs par 'gyur bas slan chad rgya
NK044(phi)001:570: mtshor gru'i don lan bdun grub pa su yang med
NK044(phi)001:571: mod kyi 'on kyang khyod cag kho na la snying
NK044(phi)001:572: brtse bas bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:573: ded dpon lnga po khrid de rgya mtshor zhugs pa
NK044(phi)001:574: rin po che'i gling du phyin nas rin chen mang
NK044(phi)001:575: du blangs te slar gru la zhugs shing phyir log
NK044(phi)001:576: pa de'i tshe rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:577: bsams pa / bdag cag rgya mtsho'i nang nas pha
NK044(phi)001:578: rol tu bde blag son pa'i nges pa med snyam
NK044(phi)001:579: bsams pa / du / rin po che rin thang che ba rnams kyis sgye'u bkang ste /
NK044(phi)001:580: rang gi sked pa la bcings nas tshong pa de dag la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:581: gal te brgya la gru ma rungs par gyur na /
NK044(phi)001:582: khyed cag nga'i lus la 'jus shig ces byas so //
NK044(phi)001:583: der phyi zhig na chu nang gi ris de dag
NK044(phi)001:584: gi gru bshigs par gyur pa'i tshe ded dpon lnga
NK044(phi)001:586: der dbyig dgas bdag gson por 'dug bzhin 'di rnams rgya mtsho las bsgral mi nus kyi /
NK044(phi)001:587: rgya mtsho ni klu gtsang sbra can gnas pas shi
NK044(phi)001:588: ba'i ro dang lhan cig zhag tu gnas pa mi
NK044(phi)001:589: srid pas bdag shi na 'di dag rgya mtsho las
NK044(phi)001:592: khyed rnams brtan zhing spro ba cher skyed dang ngas
NK044(phi)001:593: khyed cag nye zho med par rgya mtsho las thar
NK044(phi)001:594: bar bya'o // brgal nas kyang nga'i lus la bcings
NK044(phi)001:595: pa'i rin chen 'di rnams khyed kyis bgo bsha' gyis
NK044(phi)001:596: la khyer cig dang khyed kyi gnyis ka'i phyogs kyi
NK044(phi)001:597: bdun brgyud 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:598: bla med rdzogs byang gi phyir smon lam btab nas mtshon rnon pos rang gi mgul pa bcad do //
NK044(phi)001:599: der klu gtsang sbra la dga' ba rnams kyis rgya
NK044(phi)001:600: mtsho'i 'gram du phul nas thang la bor ba dang
NK044(phi)001:601: / de dag gis de'i ro las rin po che
NK044(phi)001:602: bkrol te bgo bsha' byas nas de'i rus bu la
NK044(phi)001:604: der ded dpon lnga po ni phyis bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:605: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na dge slong lnga sde yin
NK044(phi)001:606: te de rnams thog mar 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las
NK044(phi)001:607: bsgral nas byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che'i
NK044(phi)001:608: bgo skal byin te g.yu drung gi mthar thug pa'i
NK044(phi)001:609: grub pa dang / bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa la bkod do //
NK044(phi)001:611: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di ded dpon dpa' chen
NK044(phi)001:612: zhes bya ba rnam thos kyi bu'i nor dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:613: pa zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe na tshong pa lnga
NK044(phi)001:614: brgya dang lhan cig dgon pa'i lam du zhugs pa
NK044(phi)001:615: dang / srin po spu ral can zhes bya bas bram ze'i cha lugs su byas te /
NK044(phi)001:616: lam 'di srin po spu ral can gyis bsdigs nas
NK044(phi)001:617: bkag pas kho bo'ang tshegs chen po 'ongs kyis khyed
NK044(phi)001:618: cag kyang gzhan du dengs shig /
NK044(phi)001:620: bram ze khyod snying las chung ngur gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:621: des kho bo la byar ci yod 'agro'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:622: srin po 'khrugs nas bzhin bsgyur te /
NK044(phi)001:623: lag pa gnyis brkyangs shing ral pa sa la blags te mig dmar bgrad nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:624: ded dpon ji kho bo la rgol la phyis songs shig /
NK044(phi)001:625: de nas ded dpon dpa' chen gyis 'jigs su rung
NK044(phi)001:626: ba'i gzugs de mthong nas gzhu rna drung du bkang
NK044(phi)001:627: ste mda' 'phangs pa dang de thams cad ral pa
NK044(phi)001:629: de bzhin du gzhu 'phangs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:630: shing dang bong ba sogs gang 'phangs pa thams cad ral pa la thogs so //
NK044(phi)001:631: der tsham tshom med par mthus brgal ba dang lus thams cad ral pa la thogs pa de la /
NK044(phi)001:632: srin pos tshigs bcad smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:633: khyod kyi lag gnyis rkang gnyis dang //
NK044(phi)001:634: lnga pa mgo yang thogs gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:635: lus kyang nga yi lus la thogs //
NK044(phi)001:636: phyi na ma thogs ci zhig yod //
NK044(phi)001:638: nga yi lag gnyis rkang gnyis dang //
NK044(phi)001:639: lnga pa mgo yang thogs gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:640: lus kyang khyod kyi lus la thogs //
NK044(phi)001:641: phyi na ma thogs sems yod do //
NK044(phi)001:642: gsang ba ji srid kho bo yi //
NK044(phi)001:643: sems dang brtson 'grus ma nyams pa //
NK044(phi)001:644: de srid khyod dang 'gyed bya ste //
NK044(phi)001:645: brtan byos pa la mi gnod do //
NK044(phi)001:648: dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK044(phi)001:650: sdug bsngal kun las 'grol bar nus //
NK044(phi)001:651: zhes sogs tshigs bcad smras te tshong pa rnams bde
NK044(phi)001:652: blag tu btang zhing srin po de dri ma dang
NK044(phi)001:653: bral nas brtul zhugs lnga po la gzhag pa de
NK044(phi)001:654: lta bu'i chos bstan par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:655: de dus kyi srin po spu ral can ni gnod sbyin 'brog gnas yin te /
NK044(phi)001:656: der yang bcom ldan 'das kyis btul nas skyabs su
NK044(phi)001:657: 'gro ba dang bslab pa'i gzhi la bzhag par byas
NK044(phi)001:659: yang sngon yul b+aa r+aa na s+air rgyal po tshangs
NK044(phi)001:660: byin gyi yul du ded dpon dga' ba'i sde zhes
NK044(phi)001:661: pa'i bu shin tu dga' zhes par bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:663: de'i pha 'das pa'i rjes su slong ba mang po'i
NK044(phi)001:664: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir rgya mtshor rin
NK044(phi)001:665: po che sna tshogs len du song ba bde bar
NK044(phi)001:666: phyir 'khor ba'i rdzas kyis don mthun rnams chom rkun
NK044(phi)001:667: las bskyabs par byas shing de ltar lan drug gi
NK044(phi)001:668: bar du rgya mtsho las 'khor zhing slong mo ba
NK044(phi)001:669: thams cad dang / don mthun rnams bskyabs pa'i phyir chom rkun pa la nong byin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:670: chom rkun pa dag gis da dung don mthun bcom
NK044(phi)001:671: pa la brkam pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du
NK044(phi)001:672: / kye ma chom rkun pa 'di dag nyes pa
NK044(phi)001:673: 'di las bzlog par mi nus so snyam du mya
NK044(phi)001:674: ngan byed cing mtshan mo 'das pa na /
NK044(phi)001:675: de la rmi lam du rmad du byung ba'i gzugs
NK044(phi)001:676: dang ldan pa'i lha mo zhig gis lung bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:677: / kye blo bzang mya ngan ma byed cig /
NK044(phi)001:678: blo ldan brtson 'grus can dag gis mi 'grub pa gang yang med pas /
NK044(phi)001:679: 'di ltar khyod b+aa dar ste rgya shug gi gling
NK044(phi)001:680: zhes bya ba lha rnams kyis bsten pa'i gnas su
NK044(phi)001:681: song na / de na yod pa'i rin po che
NK044(phi)001:682: gcig gi mthus kyang 'jig rten gsum nor gyis 'gengs
NK044(phi)001:683: song na / nus te / de ni mi yis
NK044(phi)001:684: las 'das pa bsod nams chen po'i gnas yin la
NK044(phi)001:685: song na / nus te / / der bsod nams
NK044(phi)001:686: dang ldan pa dang snying stobs can min pas bgrod
NK044(phi)001:687: song na / nus te / / mi nus mod / khyod der 'gro ba'i brtson pa gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:688: de la ji ltar 'gro ba'i lam ni gling de
NK044(phi)001:689: 'di nas nub kyi phyogs na yod cing ri bo
NK044(phi)001:690: ma la ya la yod pa'i sman 'jog byed bdud
NK044(phi)001:691: rtsi zhes pa brtson pas blangs nas zos na bkres
NK044(phi)001:692: skom dang ngal ba med par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:693: 'di nas gling chen po bdun brgya 'das pa'i rjes su /
NK044(phi)001:695: chu klung bdun 'das pa'i rjes su rjes 'gro dang
NK044(phi)001:696: ldog 'gro zhes pa'i rgya mtsho la gzings bcas te
NK044(phi)001:697: rjes su mthun pa'i rlung gis song nas de dag
NK044(phi)001:698: gi pha rol tu son par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:699: yang rgya mtsho de dag gi ming dang mtshungs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:700: ri bo la rlung gis mig rab rib dang rmongs
NK044(phi)001:701: par byed pa yod pa la sman chen po don
NK044(phi)001:702: yod ces bya bas mig rnal du gnas par byed
NK044(phi)001:703: do // de nas kun 'khor zhes pa'i chu gter
NK044(phi)001:704: las rlung be ram b+ha zhes pa 'byung zhing 'byung
NK044(phi)001:705: ba'i kun 'khor bdun las sgrol bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:706: de nas kun 'khor zhes pa'i ri la 'byung bo
NK044(phi)001:707: dung gi lte ba zhes pa 'jigs su rung ba
NK044(phi)001:708: yod cing / de la sman dung gi lte ba zhes pa sbrul nag pos dkris pa yod de /
NK044(phi)001:709: sman de mgo la bzhag na yongs su skyob par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:710: de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i mtsho la srin po mig dmar zhes bya ba yod de /
NK044(phi)001:711: de la ma kir zhes pa'i sman 'dzin cing sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde bklags shing 'gro bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:712: de nas chu sngon zhes pa'i ri la mtshan mor
NK044(phi)001:713: rgyu ba mgrin pa sngo zhing mig rab tu 'bar
NK044(phi)001:714: ba'i srin po lnga brgya gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:715: de na sman don yod ces pa mthong reg sogs
NK044(phi)001:716: sbrul gyi dug thams cad srung nus pa yod do
NK044(phi)001:717: // gso sbyong gi brtul zhugs dang /
NK044(phi)001:718: byams pa dang snying rjes sbrul nag po rnams bskrad nas sman de thob par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:719: de yi mig sman dang zur phud byas na srin
NK044(phi)001:720: po shing rta ri zhes pa bgrod dka' ba bug
NK044(phi)001:721: pa phra mo can de las bsod nams ldan pa
NK044(phi)001:723: de nas ri bo ra ba b+ha zhes pa'i ri
NK044(phi)001:724: dang de'i rjes su 'jigs rung zangs kyi nags zhes
NK044(phi)001:725: pa s+aa la chen po'i nags kyi nang na /
NK044(phi)001:726: sbrul sbram chen zangs mig ces pa bzod dka' ba /
NK044(phi)001:727: dri drag po'i rlung phog pas 'chi bar byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:728: zla ba drug tu nyal ba'i kha chus dpag tshad gcig khyab pa /
NK044(phi)001:729: ltogs pas gdungs nas zla ba drug tu gnyid dang bral bas chub par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:730: de yang 'od ma'i rtsa ba rdos bsdam pa'i phug rab tu phyes te /
NK044(phi)001:731: dri dang ldan zhing nyin dang mtshan du 'od 'bar
NK044(phi)001:732: ba'i mig sman blangs nas sngar med ces pa sangs
NK044(phi)001:733: rgyas kyi rig pa bklags pas sbrul chen dang /
NK044(phi)001:734: gzhan gyis kyang mi gnod par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:735: de nas ri chen po bdun 'od ma'i tsher mas
NK044(phi)001:736: gtams pa la zangs kyi glegs ma'i rdog zhabs gyon
NK044(phi)001:738: de rjes shal ma li'i nags dang /
NK044(phi)001:739: 'gyur byed kyi chu klung bdun dag brgal nas /
NK044(phi)001:740: rtse gsum zhes pa'i ri rab tu mtho ba /
NK044(phi)001:741: rtse gsum pa'i tsher ma rdo rje'i 'begs byed la
NK044(phi)001:742: zangs kyi glegs bu sbyar ba'i rkang pas bgrod par
NK044(phi)001:743: bya'o // de nas chu klung rtse gsum zhes bya ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:744: de nas lcags kyi rtse yi ri zhes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:745: de'i chu klung gi ngos dang /
NK044(phi)001:746: lcags phur gyi ri bo dang /
NK044(phi)001:748: de nas bco brgyad 'khyogs zhes pa'i ri bo bgrod dka' ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:749: de dang ming 'dra ba'i klung dang /
NK044(phi)001:750: de rjes phra mo skyes pa'i ri dang /
NK044(phi)001:751: de nas du ba'i mig ces pa'i ri phyogs ngos
NK044(phi)001:752: kun tu du bas tshig par gyur pa'i sbrul ma
NK044(phi)001:753: rungs pa mthong ba'i dug can gyis khyab pa /
NK044(phi)001:754: de'i rtse na rdzing bu'i mtha' rdo bas bskor ba'i
NK044(phi)001:755: phug chen po gang na nor bu 'od kyi khung
NK044(phi)001:756: bu dang / sman chen po 'tsho byed ces pa
NK044(phi)001:757: de'i bye ma mgo rkang lag lto ba rnams la
NK044(phi)001:758: byug cing gsang sngags kyi stobs dang bcas te song
NK044(phi)001:759: na sbrul ma rungs pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:760: bu dang / // de nas sbrul gdug pa'i ri
NK044(phi)001:761: bo bdun sems can ma rungs pas gang ba dang
NK044(phi)001:762: bu dang / // / de 'dra ba'i chu klung bdun kyang brgal nas /
NK044(phi)001:763: ri dkar po rtse mo mkha' la sleb pa la 'dzegs na /
NK044(phi)001:764: de'i ngos zhig na ri hi ti ki zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:765: ba'i grong khyer dpag bsam gyi shing gis mdzes pa
NK044(phi)001:766: lha'i gnas dang mtshungs pa de na /
NK044(phi)001:767: ded dpon snying stobs chen po ma g+ha zhes pa
NK044(phi)001:768: sems can kun la phan par byed pa brgya byin
NK044(phi)001:769: bzhin du grags pa de yis ba da ra'i gling
NK044(phi)001:770: du 'gro ba'i lam gyi gdams ngag kun ston par
NK044(phi)001:771: 'gyur ro zhes smras nas lung ston pa'i lha mo
NK044(phi)001:772: de mi snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:773: de spro ba skyes nas lhas ji skad bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:774: ltar dka' ba chen pos lam de thams cad bgrod
NK044(phi)001:775: de lo bcu gnyis kyis ri hi ti ka'i grong
NK044(phi)001:777: der ded dpon ma g+ha nad kyis mnar ba'i skabs
NK044(phi)001:778: su khel nas nang du mtshung par sgo na gnas
NK044(phi)001:779: shing / des sman pa'i tshul gyis nang du 'jug pa thob ste phan tshun gtam byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:780: de tshe'i rig byed la mkhas pas des ded dpon
NK044(phi)001:781: de'i tshe zla ba drug yin par shes nas sems
NK044(phi)001:782: ma dga' yang sman dang rim gro legs par byas
NK044(phi)001:783: pas dus thung dus shin tu mdza' bar gyur cing
NK044(phi)001:784: nad rim gyis zhi bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:785: des rang gi tshul gyi gtam smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:786: ma g+has basngagasa shing de'i grogs byed pa la spro bar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:787: ba da ri'i gling bdag gis mthong ma myong yang
NK044(phi)001:788: rgya mtsho'i phyogs kyi mtshan ma las brtags nas dong
NK044(phi)001:789: ngo zhes gru gzings byas te /
NK044(phi)001:790: ma g+ha dang lhan cig grur zhugs nas mthun pa'i
NK044(phi)001:791: rlung gis dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro bar byed do
NK044(phi)001:792: // der chu'i kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa mthong nas ma g+ha la dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:793: rgya mtsho 'dir lcags kyi ri bo lnga dang /
NK044(phi)001:794: gzhan yang zangs dang dngul la sogs pa'i bye brag gis rgya mtsho'i mdog bsgyur ba'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:795: der ma g+ha nad kyis btab ste dus las 'das
NK044(phi)001:796: kyang ded dpon shin tu dga' snying stobs brtan pos
NK044(phi)001:797: rgya mtsho'i ngogs su phyin nas /
NK044(phi)001:798: grogs po'i lus la legs par bya ba bsgrubs te /
NK044(phi)001:799: yang gzings la zhon nas chu bo'i gter las brgal te /
NK044(phi)001:800: rin po che'i ri bo'i ngogs su nags tshal stug por zhugs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:801: gnam du slebs pa'i ri 'phang ma thob phyogs gang
NK044(phi)001:802: nas kyang bgrod dka' ba mthong bas thabs bral te
NK044(phi)001:803: / ri de'i 'dabs su yal 'dabs kyi mal stan
NK044(phi)001:804: la nyal zhing bdag 'ongs nas 'di snyed du 'das
NK044(phi)001:805: kyang da dung ba dar yi gling ming yang ma
NK044(phi)001:806: / thos la / grogs mchog de yang gum mo //
NK044(phi)001:807: 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don du bsam pa 'di grub
NK044(phi)001:808: bam ma grub par shi yang 'gyod pa med do
NK044(phi)001:810: ri de la gnas pa mchod sbyin sngon po zhes pa 'ongs nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:811: 'di nas shar du dpag tshad tsam du phyin pa na /
NK044(phi)001:812: ri rtse mo gsum pa la /
NK044(phi)001:813: sa las byas pa'i them skas la 'dzegs nas song zhes smras pa bzhin song bas /
NK044(phi)001:814: ri de'i rtser shel gyi ri bo 'jam zhing mtho
NK044(phi)001:815: la bya rnams kyang mi thar ba zhig mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:816: re zhig ci bya med par der bsdad pa na
NK044(phi)001:817: / brag gi phug na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin zla 'od ces bya bas lus mngon du bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:818: 'di nas shar du rgyang grags tsam song dang tsan dan nags kyi nang nas /
NK044(phi)001:819: rab gsal byed ces pa'i phug na yod pa'i sman chen po btus te thob na /
NK044(phi)001:820: de'i 'od kyis snang bar byas pa'i skabs las shel
NK044(phi)001:821: gyi ri la 'dzegs pa na 'dod pa thob bo
NK044(phi)001:822: zhes bstan pa bzhin byas te /
NK044(phi)001:824: gser gyi khang pa can gyi grong khyer gyi sgo
NK044(phi)001:825: gser gyi sgo glegs chen pos bcad par mthong ngo
NK044(phi)001:826: // der nags kyi mthar slebs pa dang mtshan mor
NK044(phi)001:827: byung ste zla ba shar zhing der gnyid du song
NK044(phi)001:828: // ngo // de la mngon du phyogs pa'i lha mthu bo ches rmi lam du lung bstan pa /
NK044(phi)001:829: kye snying stobs can gzhan don du dka' ba byed
NK044(phi)001:830: pa khyod dka' ba'i lhag ma chung du 'dir yid
NK044(phi)001:832: gser gyi grong khyer 'di dang gzhan gsum pha rol
NK044(phi)001:833: na yod pa de dag gong nas gong du rnam
NK044(phi)001:834: par bkra ba yod la mdo 'don cing de dag
NK044(phi)001:836: rim pa bzhin grong khyer de dag gi mi'am ci mo bzhi dang /
NK044(phi)001:839: so gnyis rnams phyir phyungs nas 'ong gis khyod dbang
NK044(phi)001:840: po thul bas de dag la sring mo'i 'du shes
NK044(phi)001:841: zhog la / de dag gi bag med bsdoms la
NK044(phi)001:842: song dang myur du 'dod pa thob cing der rta'i
NK044(phi)001:843: rgyal po byung nas phyir rang yul du bde bar
NK044(phi)001:844: phyin par byed do zhes lha mos lung bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:845: ltar dga' ba'i yid kyis nam langs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:846: ji skad bshad pa ltar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:847: grong khyer dang po'i sgo la lag pas lan gsum brdungs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:848: mi'am ci mo bzhi 'ong ste snyan par brjod cing
NK044(phi)001:849: mi'am ci'i grong khyer 'di skyes bu dge ba khyod
NK044(phi)001:850: kyi dbang ngo zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:851: lan du snyan par smras shing /
NK044(phi)001:852: bdag ni yo byad blang gis bud med rnams ni
NK044(phi)001:853: gzhan dbang ba yin pas bdag gis mi blangs te
NK044(phi)001:854: / khyed rnams ni ma dang sring mo yin la /
NK044(phi)001:855: bdag ni brnab sems sogs mi dge bcu'i lam las
NK044(phi)001:856: phyir phyogs pa yin pas chos kyi gtam brjod pas
NK044(phi)001:857: dga' zhing / rgyal mtshan gyi rtser bzhag nas gsol
NK044(phi)001:858: ba btab na dpag tshad stong du slong ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:859: la ci 'dod pa'i char 'bebs pa'i nor bu rin
NK044(phi)001:860: po che byin pa blangs te /
NK044(phi)001:861: slar yang dngul gyi grong khyer gnyis par phyin pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:862: snga ma'i nyis 'gyur gyi mi'am ci mos mchod cing
NK044(phi)001:863: nor bu snga ma las nyis 'gyur gyi mthu dang
NK044(phi)001:864: ldan pa'i nor bu byin pa blangs so //
NK044(phi)001:865: de nas grong khyer gsum pa beed+aur+ya'i rang bzhin can
NK044(phi)001:866: nas mi'am ci mo bcu drug gis mchod cing snga
NK044(phi)001:867: ma grong gnyis pa'i nor bu las nyis 'gyur gyi
NK044(phi)001:868: mthu che ba'i nor bu byin to //
NK044(phi)001:869: de nas grong khyer bzhi pa rin chen bzhi'i rang
NK044(phi)001:870: bzhin can gyi sgo nas mi'am ci mo so gnyis
NK044(phi)001:871: kyis grong gsum pa nas thob pa'i nor bu las
NK044(phi)001:872: yon tan nyis 'gyur gyi che ba'i nor bu byin
NK044(phi)001:873: nas / phan tshun gtam gyi zhor la chos dang ldan pa'i smra bas mgu bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:874: der bu mo de dag gis dga' ba'i zur mig gis lta bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:875: rin po che'i 'byung gnas zla ba ba dar zhes
NK044(phi)001:876: pa nged cag gi ming po mi'am ci'i rgyal rigs
NK044(phi)001:877: kyi bzhugs gnas ni 'di yin la /
NK044(phi)001:878: nor bu 'dis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du ci
NK044(phi)001:879: 'dod pa char du 'bebs pas bsnams par mdzod ces
NK044(phi)001:880: smras so // des nor bu rnams blangs te der
NK044(phi)001:881: de'i bsod nams kyis rta sprin gyi shugs can zhes
NK044(phi)001:882: pa ma rmos pa'i 'bras bu spun pa med pa
NK044(phi)001:884: de la zhon nas ngang gi grong khyer du bde bar phyin cing /
NK044(phi)001:885: de'i tshe rgyal po tshangs pas byin dus las 'das
NK044(phi)001:886: te mtho ris su song ba la shin tu dga'
NK044(phi)001:887: rgyal por dbang bskur bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:888: de'i tshes bco lnga la gso sbyong la gnas pas
NK044(phi)001:889: rin po che rgyal mtshan gyi rtse la btags nas
NK044(phi)001:890: / 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu ci 'dod pa char
NK044(phi)001:891: du babs pas tshims par byas shing lo brgyar rgyal
NK044(phi)001:892: / srid byas nas / rang gi sras rgyal srid
NK044(phi)001:893: la bzhag ste tshangs pa'i gnas su gshegs par gyur
NK044(phi)001:894: / srid byas nas / to // phyis bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:895: 'das sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na'ang chom rkun pas 'jigs
NK044(phi)001:896: pa'i don mthun rnams bskyab pa'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:897: gter las don mthun rnams dang mnyam pa'i nor rdzas
NK044(phi)001:898: byin nas don mthun bskyabs pa de ltar lan drug
NK044(phi)001:899: gi bar du mdzad pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:900: dge slong rnams kyis de'i tshul brjod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:901: 'di ni da lta 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de
NK044(phi)001:902: sngon gyi tshe na'ang don mthun rnams bskyabs pa'i rabs
NK044(phi)001:904: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rig byed
NK044(phi)001:905: thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa bram ze
NK044(phi)001:906: brtse ba can zhes par gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:907: bdag nyid chen po des sems can rnams kyi nad zhi ba'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:910: 'bigs byed sogs su sman 'tshol du rgyu zhing /
NK044(phi)001:911: nags rnams su song nas sman blangs te slar 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:912: shing skye bo rnams kyi nad zhi bar byed do
NK044(phi)001:913: // des dus zhig na ri ma la yar rang
NK044(phi)001:914: sangs rgyas rid cing na ba zhig mthong bas sman
NK044(phi)001:915: gyi khur bzhag ste phyag 'tshal nas gtam byas shing
NK044(phi)001:916: rang sangs rgyas des kyang lus na ba las brtsams
NK044(phi)001:917: // te / las nyon gyis 'phangs nas srid par
NK044(phi)001:918: sdug bsngal ba'i sems kyi nyon mongs pa gzhom pa'i
NK044(phi)001:919: brtson 'grus brtsam par gyis shig ces legs par bshad
NK044(phi)001:920: pa thos pas shin tu mgu nas brtson 'grus kyi
NK044(phi)001:921: stobs lhag par 'phel bar gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:922: 'phags pa bdag gis nyid kyi nad 'di sos kyi bar du bsnyen bkur bya zhes smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:923: ma la ya'i khyim bdag rnams las blangs pa'i bsod
NK044(phi)001:924: snyoms bzang po nyin bzhin bskyal te dga' ba med
NK044(phi)001:925: par brtson 'grus brtsams nas ngal ba yid la ma
NK044(phi)001:926: byas so // de lhag par dad pa'i phyir rang
NK044(phi)001:927: sangs rgyas des nam mkha'i dkyil du 'bar ba dang
NK044(phi)001:928: snang ba la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon
NK044(phi)001:930: des thal mo sbyar te tshig gi bstod pa sna
NK044(phi)001:931: tshogs byas shing bdag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar smon
NK044(phi)001:932: lam btab pa la rang sangs rgyas de dga' bzhin
NK044(phi)001:933: de nyid du mi snang bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:934: bram ze brtse ba can gyis kyang de la gus pa chen po bzhag cing /
NK044(phi)001:935: sman rnams blangs pas nad pa thams cad gso bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:936: yang sngon gyi tshe grong khyer gser can zhes par
NK044(phi)001:937: rgyal po gser zhes bya ba'i sras su bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:938: 'das 'di nyid 'khrungs pa'i tshe gser gyi go cha
NK044(phi)001:939: zhes bya'o // de'i sring mo gser 'od ces bya
NK044(phi)001:940: ba de blon po'i bu 'dod pa'i snying po zhes
NK044(phi)001:941: pa dang rtse dga' spyod pas bu mo spyod tshul
NK044(phi)001:942: nyams par rigs nas rgyal pos bu mo dang blon
NK044(phi)001:943: po'i bu de gnyis gsod par btang ba de dag
NK044(phi)001:944: gis gser gyi go cha mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:945: sring mo ni mig mchi mas gang bzhin ci yang smra ma nus so //
NK044(phi)001:947: nyes pa byas pa dag gis chad pa 'bebs pas bdag ni gsod kyang sla'i /
NK044(phi)001:948: bud med ni nam yang sus kyang gsod par mi
NK044(phi)001:949: 'dod pas khyed kyis sring mo 'di skyobs shig ces
NK044(phi)001:950: byas pa la / gser gyi go chas snying rje
NK044(phi)001:951: nas de dag gi shing rta bzung ste ma btang
NK044(phi)001:952: byas pa la / ba la / de'i grogs dag
NK044(phi)001:953: gis sa skyong rnams kyi bka' sus kyang 'gom mi
NK044(phi)001:954: rung bas rang gi srog la 'ongs bas 'di thongs
NK044(phi)001:955: byas pa la / ba la / zhes byas kyang / byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:956: re zhig rgud pa gzhan dag rang gi nus pa
NK044(phi)001:957: ci yod pas bskyab 'os na gnyen gyi skye bo
NK044(phi)001:958: lta ci smos zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:959: shing rta'i kha lo pa la myur du dengs zhes
NK044(phi)001:960: rang nyid kyis gzhu brdungs shing ded pa dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:961: cig grong de nas bros te nags su song ba'i
NK044(phi)001:962: rjes su yang rgyal po des sras kyis de gnyis
NK044(phi)001:963: khrid nas bros pa thos te khros pas dmag gi
NK044(phi)001:964: dpung de'i steng du btang ba la /
NK044(phi)001:965: grogs rnams kyis mi rigs pa 'di gnyis slar thongs zhes smras kyang /
NK044(phi)001:966: gser gyi go chas shing rta slar bsgyur te mda' gzhu gzung nas /
NK044(phi)001:967: dmag gi tshogs la khyed cag don med par ma byed cig /
NK044(phi)001:968: bdag gi srog dor kyang skyabs su 'ong ba 'di mi gtong ngo zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:969: dmag rnams kyis de'i pha rol gnon pa'i stobs shes shing /
NK044(phi)001:970: nyis na sras 'di med par byas na rgyal pos
NK044(phi)001:971: kyang 'gyod srid do snyam du slar log par gyur
NK044(phi)001:972: to // de grong stong pa zhig tu slebs nas
NK044(phi)001:973: der gzhon nu mdzes ma me tog thu ba zhig
NK044(phi)001:975: des bdag ni rgyal po'i bu mo yin te grong
NK044(phi)001:976: 'dir gnod sbyin drug cu tsam gyis mi phyugs thams
NK044(phi)001:977: cad med par byas nas skal ba dman pa bdag
NK044(phi)001:978: gcig pu de rnams kyi bsnyen bkur gyi phyir bzhag
NK044(phi)001:979: pa yin pas khyed cag gis gnod sbyin de 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:980: pa la bag dang ldan par dgos so zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:981: so // rgyal bus kyang rang gi spyod tshul de la smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:982: bu mo de rgyal bu la shin tu chags nas
NK044(phi)001:983: bdag chun mar blangs bar 'dod ces smras pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:984: des kyang blang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:985: de nas gnod sbyin rnams 'ongs pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:986: rgyal bus go cha bgos shing mda' gzhu blangs nas
NK044(phi)001:987: snying rje'i sems dang ma bral bar gnod sbyin rnams
NK044(phi)001:989: de'i bsod nams kyi mthus gnod sbyin rnams kyi stobs
NK044(phi)001:990: shin tu chen pos 'phangs pa'i mda' rnams kyang de
NK044(phi)001:991: la gnod par ma gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:992: des 'phangs pa'i mda' rnams kyis gnod sbyin rnams kyi lus phug cing khrag byung ste /
NK044(phi)001:993: yun ring por 'thab par byas kyang de'i mda' ma zad do //
NK044(phi)001:994: der gnod sbyin phal cher bsad pa'i lhag ma dag gis /
NK044(phi)001:995: rgyal bu la gus pa phul te gzhu phob dang
NK044(phi)001:996: bdag cag gis gter rnams bstan par bagyi'o zhes zhus
NK044(phi)001:997: nas gter mang po phul lo //
NK044(phi)001:998: der de'i grags pa rgyas shing yul der 'byor pa dang ldan par gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:999: phyogs kyi skye bo gzhan kyang yul der 'ongs par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1000: rgyal bu'i grags pa rgya cher 'phel ba thos nas
NK044(phi)001:1001: rgyal po gser gyis de la gus pa'i phyir pho
NK044(phi)001:1002: nya btang ste / des kyang khyod kyis stobs chen
NK044(phi)001:1003: pos gnod sbyin kyang btul zhing rgyal srid byas pa
NK044(phi)001:1004: e ma zhes basngagasa pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1006: 'jig rten gyi gnod sbyin btul ba ngo mtshar mi che ste /
NK044(phi)001:1007: bdag gis ni rgyal dka' ba'i nyon mongs pa'i gnod
NK044(phi)001:1008: sbyin btul nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer
NK044(phi)001:1009: du rgyal ba chos kyi rgyal po'i rgyal srid 'dod
NK044(phi)001:1011: pho nya pa de sogs kyis kyang mngon par basngagasa par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1012: de nas grong khyer de'i rgyal por blon po'i bu bcug cing /
NK044(phi)001:1013: rang nyid yab kyis slar bos pa ltar rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:1014: byas shing gling bzhi la dbang ba'i chos kyi rgyal
NK044(phi)001:1016: yang sngon bde gshegs dge mdzad byon pa'i dus su
NK044(phi)001:1017: bcom ldan 'das nyid ded dpon chen po khyim bdag
NK044(phi)001:1018: chos kyi ngang tshul zhes bya bar gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:1019: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten rin po che las byas pa brtsams pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:1020: bstan pa la sdang ba'i bram ze rnams kyis bzlog pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1021: stong thub ces pa'i dpa' bo rgyal pos mngags te
NK044(phi)001:1022: des bram ze rnams la bsdigs nas khyim bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:1023: mchod rten legs par bsgrubs te sangs rgyas su smon
NK044(phi)001:1024: lam btab cing / stong thub kyis de'i nyan thos
NK044(phi)001:1025: su smon lam btab pa de ni dge slong chos
NK044(phi)001:1026: lam btab cing / srid yin la / yang bram
NK044(phi)001:1027: ze blo gros bzang po'i dus su chos srid ni
NK044(phi)001:1028: bram ze blo gros su gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:1029: sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig gi dus su 'phags rgyal
NK044(phi)001:1030: du tsan dan byin ces pa'i tshong pa'i bu rtas
NK044(phi)001:1031: byin zhes pa de'i pha rgya mtshor song rjes rtas
NK044(phi)001:1032: byin de ma ma'i ngag gis bslus nas ma dang
NK044(phi)001:1033: 'khrig pa spyad pa'i thabs byas pas ma dang khyo
NK044(phi)001:1035: de nas pha 'ongs pa yang bu des bsad do //
NK044(phi)001:1036: slar yul gzhan du song ste khyo shug gi tshul du gnas pa de la /
NK044(phi)001:1037: rang yul gyi dge slong dgra bcom pa zhig gis khyod kyi ma dge'am zhes dris pas /
NK044(phi)001:1038: des shes su dogs nas de yang bsad do //
NK044(phi)001:1039: nam zhig ma de tshong pa'i bu mdzes pa dang 'dod pa bsten par mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:1040: rtas byin gyis ma nyid ral gris bsad de mtshams
NK044(phi)001:1041: med gsum byas pas skye bo rnams lhas bskul nas
NK044(phi)001:1043: des 'gyod cing dge slong gi tshogs mang po la
NK044(phi)001:1044: rab tu byung bar zhus pa ma gnang bas khros
NK044(phi)001:1045: te mtshan mo me btang nas dge slong rnams bsregs
NK044(phi)001:1046: so // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' zhig gis
NK044(phi)001:1047: khyod bslab pa'i gnas 'dzin par mi 'os kyi sangs
NK044(phi)001:1048: rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa 'di rtag tu
NK044(phi)001:1049: rjod ces bslab pa byas te /
NK044(phi)001:1050: sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pas dus kyi mthar khyod grol bar 'gyur zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1051: de nas rtas byin shi nas dmyal bar yun ches ring por bsregs so //
NK044(phi)001:1052: de nas mthar ring po zhig na rgya mtsho'i chu
NK044(phi)001:1053: srin nya mid chen po ri rab lhun po lta
NK044(phi)001:1054: bu'i lus che bar gyur pa de'i kha nang du
NK044(phi)001:1055: tshong pa rgya mtshor song ba thams cad zhugs su
NK044(phi)001:1056: nye ba'i tshe thabs dang bral ba la /
NK044(phi)001:1057: tshong dpon rna ba 'dzin gyis sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshol zhes smras pa bzhin byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:1058: sgra de bcom ldan 'das rgyal byed tshal na bzhugs
NK044(phi)001:1059: pa'i lha'i rna bas gsan nas dgongs par mdzad cing
NK044(phi)001:1060: sangs rgyas kyi sgra thos pas nya mid chen po
NK044(phi)001:1062: tshong pa rnams bde bar thar zhing sangs rgyas la
NK044(phi)001:1063: dad pas rab tu byung nas dgra bcom par gyur
NK044(phi)001:1064: to // nya mid chen po de tshe 'phos nas
NK044(phi)001:1065: de'i ro klu rnams kyis rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu
NK044(phi)001:1066: to // 'phangs la / de nyid mnyan yod du
NK044(phi)001:1067: bram ze su man tu zhes pa'i bur gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:1068: zas ci tsam zos kyang 'grang dka' bar gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:1069: phyis rab tu byung ba de bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK044(phi)001:1070: khrid nas sngar gyi nya mid kyi rus pa mthong
NK044(phi)001:1071: bas skyo zhing chos bstan pas dgra bcom pa thob
NK044(phi)001:1072: pa chos srid ces bya ba'o //
NK044(phi)001:1073: yang sngon gyi grong khyer gser zhes bya bar rgyal
NK044(phi)001:1074: po sprin gyi tog gi sras su bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:1075: nyid 'khrungs pa'i tshe na gzugs bzang ba dang yon
NK044(phi)001:1076: tan gyi khyad par rmad du byung ba'i rig pa
NK044(phi)001:1077: 'dzin pa'i dbang po sprin gyi bzhon pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:1078: bar mtshan grags par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1079: yab rgyal po des sras la rgyal srid gtad de
NK044(phi)001:1080: rang nyid btsun mo dang lhan cig ma la ya'i
NK044(phi)001:1082: de'i tshe sprin gyi bzhon pas yab bla ma dang
NK044(phi)001:1083: bral bas rgyal srid 'byor pa chen po 'dis ci
NK044(phi)001:1084: bya snyam du / rgyal srid bor nas yab kyi
NK044(phi)001:1085: bsti gnas su song zhing der gnas par byas so
NK044(phi)001:1086: bya snyam du / // nam zhig rgyal bu de
NK044(phi)001:1087: ri bo dpal gyi dum bus brgyan par dpyid kyi
NK044(phi)001:1088: dus nyams dga' ba dang ldan pa'i tshe ltad mor
NK044(phi)001:1089: bya snyam du / // song ba na / der
NK044(phi)001:1090: gser gyi khang bzang gi nang du lha mo goo
NK044(phi)001:1091: ri ma'i gzugs rin po che las grub pa la
NK044(phi)001:1092: mchod pa byed cing rgyud mongs dang bcas te glu
NK044(phi)001:1093: len pa'i bu mo shin tu yid 'ong ba zhig
NK044(phi)001:1094: bya snyam du / // song ba na / mthong
NK044(phi)001:1095: nas / yud tsan sprin gyi bzhon pa'ang de la
NK044(phi)001:1097: bu mo des kyang sprin gyi bzhon pa mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:1098: skye ba lnga mar goms pa'i las dang rgyal bu'i
NK044(phi)001:1099: gzugs kyi ya mtshan la dga' bas yang yang phan
NK044(phi)001:1100: tshun lta zhing 'khod par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1101: der sprin bzhon gyis de la dga' ba'i snying po
NK044(phi)001:1102: can gyi tshig phebs par smra bas rigs dang yul
NK044(phi)001:1103: gang yin sogs dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1104: bu mo de ngo tshas cang mi smra ba la de'i grogs mo ma ta li ka zhes pas /
NK044(phi)001:1105: rig 'dzin rgyal po'i sras khyod kyi grags pa 'di'i
NK044(phi)001:1106: ming po nor gyi bshes gnyen zhes bya bas thos
NK044(phi)001:1107: pas bu mo 'dis rna ba'i rgyan du byas te
NK044(phi)001:1108: khyod thob par re yang da lta dul ba'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:1109: gyis mi smra'o // 'di ni grub pa'i rigs can
NK044(phi)001:1110: sna tshogs nor gyi sde zhes pa'i bu mo ma
NK044(phi)001:1111: la ya can zhes bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:1112: lha dang lha min sogs kyis mngon par 'dod pa'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:1113: de'i tshe rgyal pos nyug rum rgan po mngags te
NK044(phi)001:1114: bu mo de la rgyal po sprin gyi tog dang
NK044(phi)001:1115: bgros nas khyod kyi yab rgyal po ming po dang
NK044(phi)001:1116: bcas pas khyod bag ma la gtong ba'i grab byed
NK044(phi)001:1117: pas myur du shog ces 'bod du 'ong bas de'i
NK044(phi)001:1118: sems sprin gyi bzhon pa la chags bzhin du song
NK044(phi)001:1119: ngo // der sprin gyi bzhon pas kyang mdzes ma
NK044(phi)001:1120: de bdag la chags bzhin du song zhes de'i gzugs
NK044(phi)001:1121: kyi rnam 'gyur yang yang yid la bkod bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:1122: ngo // gdung ba la / grogs po dag gis de'i tshul dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1123: des bu mo ma la ya can gsar du mthong
NK044(phi)001:1124: ba las skyes pa'i chags pas brtan pa phrog pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1126: dri za'i gzhon nu yid bcugs dag gis bu mo
NK044(phi)001:1127: de ni khyod kyi lag pa'i nang du mchis te
NK044(phi)001:1128: / khyed kyi yab kyis de bslangs nas khyod la
NK044(phi)001:1129: bag mar gtong ba'i grab byed pa des na sang
NK044(phi)001:1130: nyid khyod kyi 'dod pa de thob bo zhes dbugs
NK044(phi)001:1131: phyung bas dga' bzhin mtshan mo 'char du nye bar
NK044(phi)001:1132: rang gi gnas su song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1133: der bu mo ma la ya can ni mtshan mo
NK044(phi)001:1134: zla ba'i 'od dang bcas pa'i ku mud rgyas shing
NK044(phi)001:1135: bsil bas reg pa'i khang bzang du gnas kyang yid
NK044(phi)001:1136: la sprin gyi bzhon pa dran pas gnyid yal te
NK044(phi)001:1137: / mtshan mo de yang lo brgya ltar ring por snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1138: mtshan de 'das nas nyi ma'i 'od snang ba'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:1139: na bu mo de yang bag mar dga' ston byed
NK044(phi)001:1140: par chas te rgyan gyis brgyan cing /
NK044(phi)001:1141: der 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa thob pa'i sprin
NK044(phi)001:1142: la bzhon pa rig 'dzin brgya phrag du ma'i 'khor
NK044(phi)001:1143: dang bcas te bkra shis pa'i sa gzhi der phyin
NK044(phi)001:1144: pa la / bu mo de rnga yab dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas te /
NK044(phi)001:1145: cho ga bzhin du bag ma'i dga' ston byas nas
NK044(phi)001:1146: phan tshun lag bzung gi dga' ba myong bar byas
NK044(phi)001:1147: so // der glu gar dang mchod sbyin sogs dga' ston chen po'i rnam pa byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:1148: de ltar nyi ma drug tu dga' ston byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:1149: bdun pa'i tshe rig 'dzin sprin gyis bzhon pa nyid ri ngogs su rgyu ba la /
NK044(phi)001:1150: bu dang bcas pa'i klu mo zhig gis smre sngags 'don pa mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:1153: klu dung skyong gi rigs bdag gi bu gzhon nu dung gi gtsug phud ces pa 'di /
NK044(phi)001:1154: klu rnams kyis nam mkha' lding la klu thams cad
NK044(phi)001:1155: mi za ba'i slad du re re bzhin res kyis
NK044(phi)001:1156: gtong bar chad byas pa'i res 'di la bab bo
NK044(phi)001:1157: // 'dir mkha' lding gi klu zos pa'i rus pa ri bo ltar spungs pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:1158: klu gang dag za res la bab pa des gos dmar po gyon nas gtong bas /
NK044(phi)001:1159: da bdag gi bu 'di zos nas rigs rgyud 'chad ces bu la 'khyud de ngu'o //
NK044(phi)001:1160: de la sprin gyi bzhon pas snying rje mi bzod pa skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:1161: kye ma bu 'di mkha' lding gis zos na 'di'i ma yang ci ltar 'tsho /
NK044(phi)001:1162: bu gzhon nu 'di rang gi srog gis bsrung bar bya'o snyam du de la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1163: ma khyod bu dang bcas pa rang gnas su songs shig /
NK044(phi)001:1164: 'di'i tshab tu bdag mchi bas gos dmar po'i mtshan
NK044(phi)001:1165: ma 'di nga la byin cig ces smras pa la
NK044(phi)001:1168: khyod ni bdag gi bu bas kyang lhag pa'i brtse
NK044(phi)001:1169: ldan yon tan chen po'i bdag nyid sems can thams
NK044(phi)001:1170: cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa lags te /
NK044(phi)001:1171: bdag gi bu khyod dge legs su gyur cig /
NK044(phi)001:1172: bdag cag la sngon las kyis byung ba'i sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:1173: khyod la 'bab par byed mi rigs so zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:1174: kyang de snying stobs brtan pas bzlog ma nus so
NK044(phi)001:1175: // der bu dung gtsug gis kyang smras pa mkha' lding gi zas su bdag bab kyi /
NK044(phi)001:1176: rgyu med pa'i mnyes gshin khyod gnas min du ci ste sbyar 'os /
NK044(phi)001:1177: khyod kyi lus yon tan gyi rgyan dang ldan pa
NK044(phi)001:1178: srid pa gsum gyi 'tsho ba las kyang ba srung
NK044(phi)001:1180: r+ts+wa dang mtshungs pa bdag gi don du ji ltar gtong /
NK044(phi)001:1181: bdag lus r+ts+wa dang 'dra ba 'di'i ched du khyod
NK044(phi)001:1182: gtong ba'i dka' ba 'dis bdag gi yid dang 'gal
NK044(phi)001:1184: ma khyod myur du phyir log cig /
NK044(phi)001:1185: bdag ni chu gter gyi ngos su goo kar+nara phyag
NK044(phi)001:1186: 'tshal nas myur du mkha' lding gi drung du 'agro'o
NK044(phi)001:1187: zhes byas te / mkha' lding gnas pa'i ri'i phyogs su skyo ba med par song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1188: der sprin bzhon kyang de'i srog bsrung ba'i slad du
NK044(phi)001:1189: song nas gos dmar bslangs kyang klu'i bus ma byin
NK044(phi)001:1190: no // der thabs ci bya snyam pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1191: nyug rum pa dag gi lag na gos zung dmar
NK044(phi)001:1192: po thogs pa 'ongs pas phyag 'tshal te gos so
NK044(phi)001:1193: de phul nas / dga' ston zhag bdun pa'i khras
NK044(phi)001:1194: kyis slad du cho ga bstar bas rgyal bu byon
NK044(phi)001:1196: des khyod sngon la song dang nga myur du phyi nas 'ong zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:1197: bdag gis thabs 'bad med du rnyed do snyam du
NK044(phi)001:1198: dga' bzhin lag 'gro'i khrag gis dmar ba'i rdo'i steng
NK044(phi)001:1199: du bsdad de gos dmar po bgos shing mkha' lding
NK044(phi)001:1201: nam mkha' las shin tu 'jigs pa'i khyung chen po ring nas 'ongs pa mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1202: der des sder mo rdo rje'i lcags kyu lta bu
NK044(phi)001:1203: drag pos btab ste rmas kyang snying rje'i bsam pas
NK044(phi)001:1204: snying stobs g.yo ba med par gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:1205: de la mkha' lding ya mtshan pas 'di 'dra'i lag
NK044(phi)001:1206: 'gro 'di su zhes bsam bzhin mchu yis de'i spyi
NK044(phi)001:1208: khrag gi rgyan gyis lus gos par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1209: skabs der rgyal po sprin gyi tog chung ma dang
NK044(phi)001:1210: bcas pa tsan dan gyi tshal du gnas pa dag
NK044(phi)001:1211: gis snying la dogs pa dang bcas te bu dran
NK044(phi)001:1212: cing / de ni ri la ltar song ba da dung tshur ma 'ongs zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:1213: nam mkha' lding 'jigs su rung bas lag 'gro za
NK044(phi)001:1214: ba'i sgra 'jigs su rung ba'ang mthong ngo zhes gleng
NK044(phi)001:1215: pa'i tshe / gtsug gi nor bu khrag gis gos
NK044(phi)001:1216: pa nam mkha' las de'i mdun du lhung bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:1217: cing sha dang skra sogs kyis gos pa de mthong
NK044(phi)001:1218: nas 'di ni snying rje can sprin gyi bzhon pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1219: nor bu yin pa lta snyam nas brgyal bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:1220: pa'i tshe / to // der mal ya can yang de mthong bas lhan cig sa la 'gyel to //
NK044(phi)001:1221: rig 'dzin gyi bdag po yab rgyal po de btsun
NK044(phi)001:1222: mo dang mna' ma dbugs dbyung zhing klu rnams zos
NK044(phi)001:1223: pa'i gcug gi nor bu 'di ltar lhung bas sprin
NK044(phi)001:1224: gyi bzhon pa de mkha' lding gis zos pa'i gtsug
NK044(phi)001:1225: gi nor bu 'di ltar lhung ba yin min da
NK044(phi)001:1227: rgyal po de dang chung ma dang mna' ma rjes
NK044(phi)001:1228: su 'brang ba dang bcas pa klu mkha' lding gis
NK044(phi)001:1229: za ba'i rdo ba yod pa'i gnas su song ngo
NK044(phi)001:1230: // der klu dung gtsug gos dmar can rgya mtsho'i
NK044(phi)001:1231: ngogs su goo kar+nara phyag 'tshal nas myur du 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:1232: // pa dang / des sprin gyi bzhon pa mkha'
NK044(phi)001:1233: lding gis rmas pa mthong bas smre sngags 'don cing
NK044(phi)001:1234: sa la 'gyel nas yang 'di ci zhig bdag sdig
NK044(phi)001:1235: pa can ngan pa'i ched du 'gro ba'i mchod sdong
NK044(phi)001:1236: khyod brlag ces gdung ba chen pos smre sngags byed
NK044(phi)001:1237: // pa dang / do // dung gtsug des sprin
NK044(phi)001:1238: gyi tog la sogs pa la'ang de ltar bshad nas
NK044(phi)001:1240: mkha' lding ma brtags pa'i bab col can khyod za
NK044(phi)001:1241: bar 'os pa'i klu'i rtags la cung zad kyang mi
NK044(phi)001:1242: rtog par rig 'dzin 'di ci sde bcom /
NK044(phi)001:1243: ma brtags par sdig pa 'di lta bu spyod pa mtshar byas zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:1244: de skad thos shing sprin gyi bzhon pa nyams pa
NK044(phi)001:1245: de mthong nas rgyal po chung ma dang bcas pa
NK044(phi)001:1247: de nas ma la ya can gyis rang gi bdag
NK044(phi)001:1248: po de ltar gyur pa la 'khyud cing yud tsam
NK044(phi)001:1250: slar gdung ba'i tshig smra ba thams cad thos nas
NK044(phi)001:1251: mkha' lding de chags pa dang bral zhing skyengs pa
NK044(phi)001:1252: dang bcas te mya ngan byed par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1253: der bu mi 'tsho bar bsams nas pha ma dag gis sprin bzhon la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1254: nged cag gi srog 'phrog par byed pa'i ngang tshul
NK044(phi)001:1255: can gzhan la snying rje'i sems kyis las rtsub po
NK044(phi)001:1256: dag gis 'gro ba'i rgud pa sel ba'i rang lus
NK044(phi)001:1257: rin po che ma bsrungs pa khyod kyis legs byas
NK044(phi)001:1258: ci zhig byas zhes dris so //
NK044(phi)001:1259: des pha ma la btud de smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1260: yab gcig khyod kyi bka' med mod mi brtan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1261: lus 'di gzhan don du btang bas brtan pa'i go
NK044(phi)001:1263: khyod la sems dad pas phyag bagyi'o zhes smras pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1264: tshe mkha' lding des 'gyod pa chen pos rang gi
NK044(phi)001:1266: sprin bzhon gyis phyin chad klu mi za ba'i dam bca' byed du bcug go //
NK044(phi)001:1267: der rgyal bu de rmas pa tshabs chen pos dbugs brtsegs shing yud tsam mi smra bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1268: de tshe 'phos par nges nas rgyal po dang dung
NK044(phi)001:1269: gtsug la sogs pas bsreg khang dag bsgrub par byas
NK044(phi)001:1270: pa de'i me la mngon du phyogs te /
NK044(phi)001:1271: der sreg khang du 'jug par 'dod pa ma la ya can des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1272: lha mo go r+ai khyod kyis bdag la rig 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:1273: kun gyi kha lo bsgyur ba sprin gyi bzhon pa
NK044(phi)001:1274: bdag por thob ba'i mchog byin na /
NK044(phi)001:1275: da bdag zhag bdun gyis yug sa mor gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:1276: ci slad khyod kyi tshig dag pa bden pa yin par gyur /
NK044(phi)001:1277: bdag ni skye ba gzhan du yang 'di nyid bdag
NK044(phi)001:1278: por thob par gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas
NK044(phi)001:1279: man+d+aa ra ba'i me tog snyim pa gang me de
NK044(phi)001:1280: la gtor ro // de nas der lha mo ri
NK044(phi)001:1281: skyes ma bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams pa rang nyid
NK044(phi)001:1282: mngon du byon nas bu mo khyod kyi bdag po
NK044(phi)001:1283: 'tsho bar 'gyur te bdag bden nam mi bden ltos
NK044(phi)001:1284: la gtor ro // zhes gsungs te / zhal gyi
NK044(phi)001:1285: 'od kyis phyogs rnams gsal bar byas shing bdud rtsi'i
NK044(phi)001:1286: char rgyun spros pas sprin gyi bzhon pa snga ma
NK044(phi)001:1287: ltar lus rnal du sos par gyur nas ri sras
NK044(phi)001:1289: de sos nas sngar bsad pa'i klu rnams gso bar nam mkha' lding la zhus pas /
NK044(phi)001:1290: des bdud rtsi'i chad phab pa sngar bsad pa'i klu
NK044(phi)001:1291: rnams kyi rus pa la bran par thams cad sngar
NK044(phi)001:1292: gyi lus ji lta ba bzhin tu sos te gdengs
NK044(phi)001:1293: ka nor bu'i 'od dang ldan pas rang gnas su
NK044(phi)001:1295: mkha' lding des kyang sprin gyi bzhon pa mchod de rang gnas su song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1296: klu'i bu dung gi gtsug phud ni sprin gyi bzhon
NK044(phi)001:1297: pa la lta bas ngoms pa med bzhin du 'dug
NK044(phi)001:1298: go // de nas lha'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa'i spyi bor me tog gi char 'beb cing /
