NK044(phi)001:1299: sprin gyi bzhon pa pha ma dang bcas pa'i zhabs
NK044(phi)001:1300: la phyag 'tshal te pha ma de dag gis kyang
NK044(phi)001:1301: dga' ba'i dga' ston chen po bsgrubs shing /
NK044(phi)001:1302: skad cig de nyid bsod nams kyi mthu chen pos
NK044(phi)001:1303: sprin gyi bzhon pa 'khor los sgyur ba chen po
NK044(phi)001:1304: rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:1305: // lha dang rig pa 'dzin pa'i tshogs kyis rgyal
NK044(phi)001:1306: por dbang bskur nas shin tu yun ring por chos
NK044(phi)001:1307: kyi rgyal srid bskyangs te bde ba'i dpal rjes su
NK044(phi)001:1309: de ltar byang chub sems dpas sems can gyi don
NK044(phi)001:1310: du snying stobs chen pos gzhan gyi sdug bsngal khung
NK044(phi)001:1311: du 'khyer bar bzod pa'i brtson 'grus rlabs po ches
NK044(phi)001:1312: gzhan la phan pa rmad du byung ba mdzad pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1313: rnam thar la gus pa bskyed par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:1314: yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten sgron ma
NK044(phi)001:1315: zhes bya ba theg pa chen po 'ba' zhig ston
NK044(phi)001:1316: pa de'i zhing der bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub
NK044(phi)001:1317: sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs zhes pa tshogs kyi gtso
NK044(phi)001:1318: bor byed par gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:1319: bdud shugs 'chang zhes bya bas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
NK044(phi)001:1320: su sprul nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:1321: pa'i gtam brjod pa la bardzusa te /
NK044(phi)001:1322: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i basngagasa pa brjod cing byang
NK044(phi)001:1323: chub sems dpa' de dag la gzugs mang po dang
NK044(phi)001:1326: me tog dang rol mo dang /
NK044(phi)001:1327: gar dang glu dbyangs kyi yo byad 'bul bar byed pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1328: byang chub sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs des rdzu 'phrul
NK044(phi)001:1329: gyis bdud de'i mgul du khyi ro zhig btags nas
NK044(phi)001:1330: / bdud de'i gzugs kyis bdud kyi gnas su song
NK044(phi)001:1331: ste lha'i bu mo khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu
NK044(phi)001:1332: la byang chub chen po 'dzin du bcug cing yang
NK044(phi)001:1333: dag pa'i gtam byas pas bla med byang chub las
NK044(phi)001:1334: phyir mi ldog par bkod nas bdun kyi gnas de
NK044(phi)001:1335: nyid du 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtse bar sprul
NK044(phi)001:1336: / to // bdud shugs 'chang khyi ro btags pa de rang gnas su 'ongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1337: lha'i bu mo de dag lha'i bu dang rtse bar mthong nas mi daga'o //
NK044(phi)001:1338: lha'i bu mo khri phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu pos
NK044(phi)001:1339: 'dud shugs 'chang mi dga' bar rigs nas snying rje
NK044(phi)001:1340: bskyed de / 'di ni srog chags rnams kyi phyir
NK044(phi)001:1341: sdig pa'i ros blong blong por gyur cing yang dag
NK044(phi)001:1342: pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes pa la ltos
NK044(phi)001:1343: bskyed de / / e ma slob dpon dpa' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:1344: stobs bdud shugs 'chang 'di bdag cag gi gnas la
NK044(phi)001:1345: dbang phyug gi dbang gis bgegs bgyid par 'gyur na
NK044(phi)001:1346: bskyed de / / / bdag cag la 'tshe bar mi 'gyur bar mdzad du gsol /
NK044(phi)001:1347: de nas byang chub sems dpa' shugs 'chang gis rdzu
NK044(phi)001:1348: 'phrul gyis bdud kyi gnas de'i gong du de bas
NK044(phi)001:1349: rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid ches che ba'i bdud kyi
NK044(phi)001:1351: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan zhig kyang sprul te /
NK044(phi)001:1352: der bdud de dbang phyug la dbang byed de /
NK044(phi)001:1353: des gnas de dang bdud de thal bar brlag par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1354: de mthong bas bdud shugs 'chang gis bdag kyang yun
NK044(phi)001:1355: mi ring par 'chi bar 'gyur la bdud kyi gnas
NK044(phi)001:1356: 'di'i yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang bdag tha
NK044(phi)001:1357: dad par 'gyur ro snyam du gnas de dag gis
NK044(phi)001:1358: skyo zhing mi dga' la 'jigs skrag ste byang chub
NK044(phi)001:1359: sems dpa' dpa' ba'i stobs la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1360: skyabs mdzod cig bdag gis nongs pa bshags so zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1361: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1362: kye grogs po rgyal ba'i sras la bgegs ma byed
NK044(phi)001:1363: par nga rgyal spongs shig ces sogs tshigs su bcad
NK044(phi)001:1364: pa dag gis chos bstan pas bdud de dga' zhing
NK044(phi)001:1365: sangs rgyas la skyabs su song nas sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:1366: spyod pa'ang sgrub par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1367: yang sngon bskal pa chen po dpag med 'das pa'i snga rol na /
NK044(phi)001:1368: snang ba 'chang ba zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1369: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di tshe lo
NK044(phi)001:1370: drug khri brgyad stong thub pa'i dus su de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:1371: gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:1372: byon te / snyigs ma lngar gyur pa na 'khor bzhi la theg pa gsum gyi chos ston to //
NK044(phi)001:1373: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid gling bzhi la
NK044(phi)001:1374: dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ud pa
NK044(phi)001:1375: la'i gdong zhes bya bar gyur pa de btsun mo'i
NK044(phi)001:1376: tshogs dang g.yog dang dpung gi tshogs su bcas pa
NK044(phi)001:1377: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpal gyi
NK044(phi)001:1378: drung du song ste mchod cing bstod nas chos nyan
NK044(phi)001:1379: no // rgyal po de'i btsun mo dam pa lha
NK044(phi)001:1380: mdzes zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa de la
NK044(phi)001:1381: bud med rnams skyes par 'gyur ba'i tshul ci zhes
NK044(phi)001:1382: no // zhus pa la / rin po che'i tog
NK044(phi)001:1383: ces bya ba'i gzungs phan yon chen po dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:1385: de thos pa'i bud med thams cad skyes pa'i dbang po dang ldan par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1386: de'i tshe rgyal po ud pa la'i gdong gis bu
NK044(phi)001:1387: thu bo 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por dbang bskur
NK044(phi)001:1388: te / bdag nyid dang bu stong du gcig gis ma tshang ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:1389: btsun mo lha mdzes sogs skyes bur gyur pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /
NK044(phi)001:1390: gzhan yang srog chags dgu khri nyis stong dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:1391: pa khyim nas byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:1392: thad du rab tu byung nas tshul bzhin yid la
NK044(phi)001:1394: der srog chags bye ba mang pos ci 'khor los
NK044(phi)001:1395: sgyur ba'i rgyal po rab tu byung snyam nas phan
NK044(phi)001:1397: dge sbyong 'di ni bdud kyi las la brtson pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:1398: g.yo can sgyu ma bdud kyi las dang ldan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1399: chos bstan nas la la pho mtshan med par byas
NK044(phi)001:1400: / la la mo mtshan med par byas /
NK044(phi)001:1401: la la skra dang kha spu bregs /
NK044(phi)001:1402: la la ni gos tshon can bskon pa sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:1403: de bzhin du lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum du skye ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:1404: la lar 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba med par yang chos ston te /
NK044(phi)001:1405: bud med sgyur ba'i sgyu dang ldan pa'i dge sbyong
NK044(phi)001:1406: gi gzugs kyis bslu ba'i 'di'i rtags tsam yang mi
NK044(phi)001:1407: mthong la / de'i tshigs kyang mi thos par 'deng par bya'o zhes smras shing /
NK044(phi)001:1408: de na shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:1409: zhig yod pas des kyang kho bo'i chung ma dang
NK044(phi)001:1410: g.yog mo dang bu mo rnams kyang dge sbyong ma
NK044(phi)001:1411: rungs pa 'dis skyes pa'i dbang por bsgyur zhing skra
NK044(phi)001:1412: bregs te gos tshon can bskon nas bdag gcig pur
NK044(phi)001:1413: mya ngan gyis non pas bdag cag 'deng la dge
NK044(phi)001:1414: sbyong de'i sgra tsam yang mi thos pa'i ri brag
NK044(phi)001:1415: nyams dga' bar 'dong ngo zhes smras pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:1416: srog chags khrag khrig brgya stong mang po yang lhan
NK044(phi)001:1417: cig dong nas mtha' 'khob kyi ri khrod nyams dga'
NK044(phi)001:1418: bar drang srong gi cha byad kyis 'khor de gang
NK044(phi)001:1419: thar pa dang las kyi rnam smin med pa chad
NK044(phi)001:1420: par smra ba'i dge sbyong bdud kyi las la brtson
NK044(phi)001:1422: de blta ba dang de'i chos nyan pa ni sems g.yengs pa yin te /
NK044(phi)001:1423: de dag mgo bregs la rab tu byung nas slong
NK044(phi)001:1424: mo'i zas za zhing yid 'byung bar byed cing dben
NK044(phi)001:1426: 'dod pa'i dga' ba spong ba'i zol gyis chad par
NK044(phi)001:1427: smra ba'i dge sbyong sems can rnams kyi dgrar gyur
NK044(phi)001:1428: pa de'i byed pa ni sngon ma thos ma mthong
NK044(phi)001:1429: ba yin par kho bos shes so //
NK044(phi)001:1430: zhes srog chags mang po la de lta bu'i sdig pa can gyi lta ba 'dzin du bcug go //
NK044(phi)001:1431: de dge sbyong chen po ud pa la'i gdong gis thos nas /
NK044(phi)001:1432: bdag gis sems can 'di dag sdig pa'i lta bar
NK044(phi)001:1433: song ba las yongs su thar zhing yang dag pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1434: lta ba lam bkod na bdag dge sbyong du gyur
NK044(phi)001:1436: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bdag sangs rgyas nas nyam
NK044(phi)001:1437: thag pa'i sems can rnams ji ltar dgrol bar nus
NK044(phi)001:1438: snyam du rtul ba brtan zhing snying rje'i shugs kyis
NK044(phi)001:1439: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zhi spos snang dpa' la
NK044(phi)001:1440: zhus nas srog chags brgya stong du mas bskor te
NK044(phi)001:1441: / mtha' 'khob kyi grong rnams dang ri brag pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1442: gnas der rgyu zhing sems can rnams sdig lta las
NK044(phi)001:1443: bzlog nas theg pa gsum du bkod cing bud med
NK044(phi)001:1444: rnams rin po che'i tog gi gzungs bstan pas skyes
NK044(phi)001:1445: / par byas so // de thams cad sangs rgyas de la phul te rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1446: shor ba gzhon nu des bdag gi 'khor rnams ud pa la'i gdong gis khrid kyis /
NK044(phi)001:1447: bdag gis 'di sangs rgyas pa'i zhing der bdung byas te /
NK044(phi)001:1448: mngal na 'dug pa tshun chad nas byang chub kyi
NK044(phi)001:1449: snying po la 'dug gi bar du bgegs byas te
NK044(phi)001:1451: byang chub thob nas kyang de'i bstan pa gzhil bar bya'o zhes smon lam btab pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1452: dge sbyong ud pa la'i gdong gis /
NK044(phi)001:1453: des de ltar smon lam rtul te btab pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1454: mthu chen pos 'bad de dad par byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:1455: sdig lta btang zhing nyes pa 'chags su bcug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1456: byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas pas shor ba
NK044(phi)001:1457: bzhon nu'i tshul dul zhing dad pa skyes te snying
NK044(phi)001:1458: rje chen po dang ldan pa khyod gang gi tshe
NK044(phi)001:1459: sangs rgyas pa na bdag bla med byang chub tu
NK044(phi)001:1460: lung ston par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo
NK044(phi)001:1461: zhes 'dus pa rin po che'i tog gi gzungs las
NK044(phi)001:1462: gsungs so // de dus kyi btsun mo lha mdzes ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa yin cing /
NK044(phi)001:1463: shor ba gzhon nu'i tshul zhes pa bdud sdig can 'di yin la /
NK044(phi)001:1464: phyis byang chub tu lung ston par smon lam btab pa bzhin lung bstan par gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:1465: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid 'dzam gling 'dir rgyal po drang srong zhes bya bar gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:1466: theg chen gyi mdo sde la dad cing ser sna
NK044(phi)001:1467: dang phrag dog med par chos ston pa dang dbul
NK044(phi)001:1468: phongs dang mgon med la dpung mnyen byed do //
NK044(phi)001:1469: de'i tshe 'jig rten na sangs rgyas dang nyan rang
NK044(phi)001:1470: mi bzhugs pas rgyal po des lo bcu gnyis kyi
NK044(phi)001:1471: bar du bram ze rnams kyi g.yog byas te yo
NK044(phi)001:1474: kye ston pa khyed bla med byang chub tu sems skyed cig /
NK044(phi)001:1475: des smras pa rgyal po byang chub kyi mtshan nyid ni med pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:1476: theg chen gyi mdo sde yang de dang 'dra zhes smod pas /
NK044(phi)001:1477: rgyal po de theg chen la mos pas /
NK044(phi)001:1478: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la skur ba'i bram ze de bsad par gyur na yang /
NK044(phi)001:1479: de'i rkyen gyis de tshun chad dmyal bar ma skyes
NK044(phi)001:1480: te theg chen gyi mdo sde srung ba'i mthu stobs
NK044(phi)001:1481: ni de ltar tshad med do //
NK044(phi)001:1483: yang sngon gyi tshe sangs rgyas dbyangs byin gyi bstan
NK044(phi)001:1484: pa la rgyal po dpal dbyangs zhes bya bas sangs
NK044(phi)001:1485: rgyas de'i mchod rten mang po byas nas mchod par
NK044(phi)001:1486: byed cing / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid byang
NK044(phi)001:1487: chub sems dpa' bde bas byin pa zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:1488: byed cing / gyur pas / lag pa g.yas pa
NK044(phi)001:1489: ras kyis dkris te 'bru mar gyi nang du bcug
NK044(phi)001:1490: nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir me
NK044(phi)001:1491: sbar bas mar me gzhan bye ba khrag khrig brgya
NK044(phi)001:1492: stong du ma'i 'od zil gyis mnan nas gang+g+aa'i bye
NK044(phi)001:1493: ma snyed kyi phyogs thams cad du snang ba chen
NK044(phi)001:1494: pos khyab cing sa yang g.yos par gyur la sangs
NK044(phi)001:1495: rgyas kyi zhing rnams su mchod pa'i char kyang babs
NK044(phi)001:1496: byed cing / gyur pas / so // byang chub
NK044(phi)001:1497: sems dpa' de yang bzhin gyi mdog 'gyur ba med
NK044(phi)001:1498: pas mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i ting nge
NK044(phi)001:1499: 'dzin dbyangs snyan pas 'khor de dag la rgya cher
NK044(phi)001:1501: der lha rnams kyis mchod pa 'bul zhing /
NK044(phi)001:1502: rgyal po dpal dbyangs kyis de mthong nas btsun mo'i
NK044(phi)001:1503: 'khor brgyad cu dang lhan cig khru stong phrag brgya
NK044(phi)001:1504: pa'i khang pa'i steng nas mchongs te /
NK044(phi)001:1505: byang chub sems dpa' lta ba'i phyir song ba de
NK044(phi)001:1506: lus la gnod pa med par gyur cing byang chub
NK044(phi)001:1507: sems dpa'i lag pa 'bar bar mthong nas skad chen
NK044(phi)001:1508: pos ngu zhing tshigs bcad smras so //
NK044(phi)001:1509: de la byang chub sems dpa' bde bas byin gyis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:1510: gang la lag pa med na yang //
NK044(phi)001:1511: de ni yan lag ma tshang min //
NK044(phi)001:1512: su la tshul khrims med pa dag /
NK044(phi)001:1513: de ni yan lag ma tshang yin //
NK044(phi)001:1514: rul ba yi ni lus 'di yis //
NK044(phi)001:1515: bsam gyis mi khyab sbyin pa'i gnas //
NK044(phi)001:1516: 'jig rten kun gyis mchod pa'i rten //
NK044(phi)001:1517: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag gis mchod //
NK044(phi)001:1518: ces sogs tshigs su bcad pa smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:1519: bden pa'i tshig brjod pas sa g.yo ba sogs dang lag pa sngon bzhin du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1520: dge slong bde bas byin pa de bud med gang
NK044(phi)001:1521: gis mthong ma thag tu bud med kyi dngos po
NK044(phi)001:1522: las log nas phyir mi ldog par lung bstan thob
NK044(phi)001:1523: bo // lha sogs sems can tshad med pa byang chub mchog la zhugs par yang gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1524: yang sngon byung ba bskal pa ches tshad med grangs med pa'i pha rol na /
NK044(phi)001:1525: 'jig rten gyi khams char 'byung ba zhes par de
NK044(phi)001:1526: bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes
NK044(phi)001:1527: bya ba byon pas nyan thos dang byang sems rnams
NK044(phi)001:1529: de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal ba bye ba khrag
NK044(phi)001:1530: khrig brgya stong gang+g+aa'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed du
NK044(phi)001:1531: gyur to // de 'das nas bskal pa bye ba
NK044(phi)001:1532: khrag khrig brgya stong phrag 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul
NK044(phi)001:1533: phra rab kyi rdul snyed du dam pa'i chos gnas
NK044(phi)001:1534: gyur to // shing / bskal pa bye ba khrag
NK044(phi)001:1535: khrig brgya stong phrag gling bzhi'i rdul phra rab kyi
NK044(phi)001:1536: rdul snyed du dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan gnas
NK044(phi)001:1537: gyur to // shing / par gyur to // de'i
NK044(phi)001:1538: chos gzugs brnyan de yang med par gyur nas 'jig
NK044(phi)001:1539: rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan 'jigs
NK044(phi)001:1540: bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes pa mtshan mthun pa
NK044(phi)001:1541: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi shu byung
NK044(phi)001:1542: gyur to // shing / par gyur to // ngo
NK044(phi)001:1543: // de la 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po kun
NK044(phi)001:1544: gyi thog mar byung ba de'i dam pa'i chos nub
NK044(phi)001:1545: gyur to // shing / par gyur to // ngo
NK044(phi)001:1546: // nas / dam pa'i chos kyi gzugs brnyan yang
NK044(phi)001:1548: de'i bstan pa la nga rgyal can gyi dge slong gis non par gyur pa de ni /
NK044(phi)001:1549: byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya ba'i dge slong zhig byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1550: ci'i phyir rtag tu brnyas pa zhes bya na /
NK044(phi)001:1552: dge slong sogs 'khor bzhi su mthong yang de'i drung du song ste /
NK044(phi)001:1553: kho bo ni tshe dang ldan pa khyed la brnyas par mi byed de khyed ni ma brnyas pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:1555: khyed thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cig dang /
NK044(phi)001:1556: khyed yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:1557: de ltar sems can su mthong yang de skad sgrogs
NK044(phi)001:1558: pa ma gtogs lung yang mi nod kha ton kyang
NK044(phi)001:1559: mi byed do // de ltar dge slong sogs su la de skad bsgrags pa /
NK044(phi)001:1560: de dag las phal cher de la khro zhing ma dad pa bskyed nas gshe zhing spyos te /
NK044(phi)001:1561: ci'i phyir dge slong 'di ma dris par brnyas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1562: sems med do zhes bdag cag la bdag nyid brnyas
NK044(phi)001:1563: par byed cing 'di ltar ma bsams mi 'dod par
NK044(phi)001:1564: bla med rdzogs byang du lung ston ces smra bar
NK044(phi)001:1565: byed do // byang chub sems dpa' chen po de
NK044(phi)001:1566: la de ltar gshe zhing spyos pas lo mang po
NK044(phi)001:1567: 'das na yang su la khro zhing gnod sems mi
NK044(phi)001:1568: byed do // skyed cing / des smras pa la bong ba dang dbyug pa 'phen kyang /
NK044(phi)001:1569: des de dag la thag ring po nas kho bo
NK044(phi)001:1570: khyed la brnyas par mi byed do zhes yang dag
NK044(phi)001:1571: par sgrog go // des nga rgyal can gyi 'khor
NK044(phi)001:1572: de dag gis rtag tu des de ltar bskrags pas
NK044(phi)001:1573: de la ming brnyas pa zhes btags so //
NK044(phi)001:1574: rtag tu brnyas pa de 'chi ba'i dus byed pa
NK044(phi)001:1575: nye bar gnas pa'i tshe dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar
NK044(phi)001:1576: po'i chos kyi rnam grangs thos par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:1577: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs bsgrags dbyangs kyi rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:1578: des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di tshigs su bcad pa
NK044(phi)001:1579: dkrigs phrag bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag nyi
NK044(phi)001:1580: shu bshad pa de yang sus kyang ma smras par
NK044(phi)001:1581: bar snang gi sgra las thos te bzung bas /
NK044(phi)001:1582: mig nas yid kyi bar rnam par dag pa de lta bu thob nas /
NK044(phi)001:1583: phyir yang lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong nyi
NK044(phi)001:1584: shur bdag gi srog gi 'du byed byin gyis brlabs
NK044(phi)001:1585: te / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrags pas /
NK044(phi)001:1586: dge slong sogs 'khor bzhi po nga rgyal can sngon
NK044(phi)001:1587: rtag tu brnyas par btags pa de rnams kyis de'i
NK044(phi)001:1590: spobs pa dang shes rab kyi mthu rgya chen po
NK044(phi)001:1591: mthong nas thams cad de la chos nyan cig 'khod
NK044(phi)001:1592: do // gzhan yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig
NK044(phi)001:1593: brgya stong mang po thams cad kyang bla med rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:1594: byang la yang dag par btsud do //
NK044(phi)001:1595: byang chub sems dpa' de de nas shi 'phos nas
NK044(phi)001:1596: de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:1597: zhes bya ba mtshan mthun pa bye ba brgya phrag
NK044(phi)001:1598: nyi shu mnyes par byas te thams cad du yang
NK044(phi)001:1599: pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzungs nas
NK044(phi)001:1600: bstan no // de sngon gyi dge rtsa des de
NK044(phi)001:1601: bzhin gshegs par sgra'i rgyal po mtshan mthun pa bya
NK044(phi)001:1602: ba brgya phrag nyi shu mthar gyis mnyes par byas
NK044(phi)001:1603: bstan no // te / de thams cad du yang
NK044(phi)001:1604: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po bzung ste 'khor bzhi
NK044(phi)001:1605: la yang dag par bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:1606: yang sangs rgyas sprin sgra rgyal po mtshan mthun pa
NK044(phi)001:1607: byee ba brgya phrag nyi shu mnyes par byas te
NK044(phi)001:1608: de thams cad las kyang chos 'di bzung nas gzhan
NK044(phi)001:1609: la yang dag par bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:1610: de thams cad kyi tshe na mig sogs yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:1611: byang chub sems dpa' des de bzhin gshegs pa bye
NK044(phi)001:1612: ba khrag khrig brgya stong de rnyed la bsti stang
NK044(phi)001:1613: byas mchod pa dang dbul ba byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:1614: gzhan yang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
NK044(phi)001:1615: mang po la mchod cing bsnyen bkur byas nas de
NK044(phi)001:1616: thams cad du dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po 'di
NK044(phi)001:1617: nyid bzung ste bstan pas dge ba'i rtsa ba des
NK044(phi)001:1618: sangs rgyas pa ni bcom ldan 'das nyid de /
NK044(phi)001:1619: sngon gyi tshe rtag tu mrnyas pa zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa' der gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:1620: de'i tshe dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po nyid ma bzung na myur du 'tshang mi rgya la /
NK044(phi)001:1621: de bzung bas myur du sangs rgyas so //
NK044(phi)001:1622: rtag tu brnyas pa zhes su gyur pa'i tshe na
NK044(phi)001:1623: 'khor mang pos brnyas shing gnod sems bskyed pa de
NK044(phi)001:1624: dag bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag nyi shur dkon
NK044(phi)001:1625: mchog gsum gyi sgra ma thos la /
NK044(phi)001:1626: bskal pa stong phrag bcur mnar med par sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:1627: myong bar gyur nas las kyi sgrib pa de las
NK044(phi)001:1628: thar ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' de nyid
NK044(phi)001:1629: kyis bla med rdzogs byang du smin par byas te
NK044(phi)001:1630: thar ba dang / / 'khor 'di'i nang na bzang skyong sogs byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang /
NK044(phi)001:1631: gzhan dge slong ma lnga brgya dang /
NK044(phi)001:1632: dge bsnyen ma lnga brgya ste thams cad bla med
NK044(phi)001:1633: rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par byas
NK044(phi)001:1634: so // de ltar chos 'di 'dzin pa don che bas /
NK044(phi)001:1635: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su yang
NK044(phi)001:1636: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs
NK044(phi)001:1637: 'di bzung zhing ldan par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:1638: des rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:1639: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na bskal pa me tog
NK044(phi)001:1640: 'byung gnas la shin tu rnam par blta ba'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:1641: rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus
NK044(phi)001:1642: 'bar ba zhes bya ba byon te /
NK044(phi)001:1643: de'i tshe na 'jig rten gyi khams de shin tu
NK044(phi)001:1644: rnam par dag cing bkod pa rmad du byung bas
NK044(phi)001:1645: brgyan la bud med zer cing thams cad pad+mo las
NK044(phi)001:1647: de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor rnams la brtson 'grus
NK044(phi)001:1648: dang ldan pa'i gtam nyid bstan par mdzad pa na
NK044(phi)001:1649: / bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra ba zhes bya bar gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:1650: brtson 'grus ji ltar brtsom pa'i tshul zhus pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1654: sgrub pa'i rnam grangs bzhi las brtsams te /
NK044(phi)001:1655: brtson 'grus kyi gtam rgya cher bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:1656: byang chub sems dpa' go cha sra bas brtson 'grus
NK044(phi)001:1657: brtsams te lo bye ba 'das pa na rjes su
NK044(phi)001:1658: mthun pa'i bzod pa rab tu thob ste brtson bzhin
NK044(phi)001:1659: du tshe dus byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:1660: spyan sngar skyes pas chos thos shing brtson par byas
NK044(phi)001:1661: nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas te /
NK044(phi)001:1662: sangs rgyas brgyad khri bzhi stong mnyes par byed cing
NK044(phi)001:1663: gang dag bskal pa me tog gi 'byung gnas de
NK044(phi)001:1664: la byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams las brtson 'grus brtsoms
NK044(phi)001:1665: te / dge ba'i chos yongs su btsal ba brgyud mar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1666: brtson 'grus de lta bus byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po phyir bsnyil te /
NK044(phi)001:1667: mthar bla med byang chub tu sangs rgyas so zhes blo gros rgya mtsho'i mdo las gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:1668: yang sngon gyi tshe mar me mdzad kyi yang ches
NK044(phi)001:1669: snga rol na de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:1670: zhes bya ba byon pa'i tshe 'jig rten de na
NK044(phi)001:1671: lha dang mi rnams pad+mo las bardzusa te skye zhing
NK044(phi)001:1672: bud med dang 'khrig pa'i ming yang med /
NK044(phi)001:1673: nyan rang yang med la thams cad byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:1674: dpa' chos la mos pa dbang po rno ba sha
NK044(phi)001:1675: stag ste / zas gos sogs bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung ba dga' ldan gyi lha dang 'dra'o //
NK044(phi)001:1676: 'chi 'pho ba'i tshe na yang ta la bdun srid
NK044(phi)001:1677: du 'phags nas skye 'chi med pa'i chos bstan te
NK044(phi)001:1678: / sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i zhing du bsam bzhin skye bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:1679: sangs rgyas de dang 'khor rnams gos ngur smrig mi
NK044(phi)001:1680: gyon gyi thams cad lha'i gos gtsang ma gyon to
NK044(phi)001:1681: // de na bslab pa bca' ba yang med de
NK044(phi)001:1682: thams cad skye med la bzod pa'i stobs can no
NK044(phi)001:1683: // // der de bzhin gshegs pas chos bshad pa
NK044(phi)001:1684: thams cad kyis shes shing bzod pa dang gzungs sogs
NK044(phi)001:1686: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po de ma gtogs par rgyal po gzhan med do //
NK044(phi)001:1687: der de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong lung bstan pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:1688: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid 'khor der byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:1689: dpa' dri med rnam dag 'od ces bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:1690: pas / lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di
NK044(phi)001:1691: dag bdag las dran pa dang blo gros nan tan
NK044(phi)001:1692: sogs kyis lhag pa ni med na bdag ci'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:1693: lung ma bstan snyam pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1694: de bzhin gshegs pa des bsam pa mkhyen nas rigs
NK044(phi)001:1695: kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas mar
NK044(phi)001:1696: me mdzad kyis lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs
NK044(phi)001:1697: pas byang sems de dga' zhing nam mkha' la 'phags
NK044(phi)001:1698: nas / sangs rgyas mar me mdzad de bskal pa
NK044(phi)001:1699: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig na 'byung du
NK044(phi)001:1700: nas / zin kyang / bdag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par ni nges te /
NK044(phi)001:1701: sangs rgyas rnams yang dag par gsungs pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:1703: de'i 'og tu de bzhin gshegs pa rab gsal zhes bya ba la sogs pa mnyes par byas te /
NK044(phi)001:1704: sangs rgyas thams cad las kyang rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal pos zhus pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs /
NK044(phi)001:1708: shes rab kyi rnam 'phrul bzhi po de thos nas
NK044(phi)001:1709: mngon sum du byas te mar me mdzad las lung
NK044(phi)001:1710: bstan pa thob bo zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:1711: yang sngon bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol na /
NK044(phi)001:1712: bskal pa rnam par sbyong ba la /
NK044(phi)001:1713: 'jig rten gyi khams cher bkod par de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:1714: pa sman gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i
NK044(phi)001:1715: tshad bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur bzhugs pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:1716: dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin chen
NK044(phi)001:1718: gling bzhi la dbang ba bu stong yod par gyur
NK044(phi)001:1719: pa des bar gyi bskal ba lnga'i bar du bcom
NK044(phi)001:1720: ldan 'das de nyid 'khor dang bcas pa bde ba'i
NK044(phi)001:1721: yo byad thams cad kyis ri mor byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:1722: bu stong po de dag gis kyang bskal pa lnga'i bar du rim gror byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1723: bu stong po de'i nang nas bcom ldan 'das 'di
NK044(phi)001:1724: nyid rgyal bu zla gdugs zhes bya bar gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:1725: de dben par song nas mchod pa de dag las
NK044(phi)001:1726: ches lhag pa yod dam snyam du rtog pa dang
NK044(phi)001:1727: / sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis bar snang las lha dag gis /
NK044(phi)001:1728: chos kyi mchod pa ni mchod pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog go zhes zer ba thos nas /
NK044(phi)001:1729: chos kyi mchod pa de gang yin zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1730: lha dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po la zhus shig ces smras pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:1731: sangs rgyas de la zhus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1733: rigs kyi bu chos kyi mchod pa ni gang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdo sde zab mo //
NK044(phi)001:1734: 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa /
NK044(phi)001:1737: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod /
NK044(phi)001:1738: gzungs dang phar phyin sogs la 'jug pa /
NK044(phi)001:1739: phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ston pa /
NK044(phi)001:1740: sangs rgyas thams cad kyis basngagasa pa de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:1741: yang dag par 'dzin pa dang 'chang ba dang rtog
NK044(phi)001:1742: pa dang kun sdud pa ni chos kyi mchod pa'o
NK044(phi)001:1743: zhes sogs gsungs pas rgyal bu zla gdugs de chos
NK044(phi)001:1744: kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa thob nas gos
NK044(phi)001:1745: dang rgyan ci thogs pas bcom ldan 'das de mchod
NK044(phi)001:1746: cing / bdag dam pa'i chos gzung bar spro bas de ltar byin gyis brlabs par zhus nas /
NK044(phi)001:1747: rab tu byung ste brtson 'grus brtsams pas ring por ma thogs par mngon par shes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1748: gzungs dang spobs pa thob bo //
NK044(phi)001:1749: des de bzhin gshegs pa de 'das nas kyang sangs
NK044(phi)001:1750: rgyas de'i chos 'khor bskor ba ji lta bur chos
NK044(phi)001:1751: bstan pa bskal pa bcu'i bar du byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:1752: sems can bye ba phrag mang po smin par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1753: yang sngon gyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa don yod gshegs zhes bya ba byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:1754: de'i gsung rab la bcom ldan 'das nyid dge slong
NK044(phi)001:1755: grags pa'i 'od ces bya ba theg pa chen po
NK044(phi)001:1756: la rab tu gnas pa zhig tu gyur pa des
NK044(phi)001:1757: / bdag bla med rdzogs byang ma thob kyi bar du /
NK044(phi)001:1758: pags pa dang rgyus pa dang rus pa yang skam /
NK044(phi)001:1759: khog pa dang sha dang khrag yongs su bskams kyang brtson 'grus 'di nyid mi gtong ngo snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:1760: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i spyan sngar ras bcos bu
NK044(phi)001:1761: yug gcig gis lus dkris nas til mar gyis byugs
NK044(phi)001:1762: te spyan sngar mar me bus so //
NK044(phi)001:1763: me 'bar bas lus bsregs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:1764: rnam 'dren rang byung thugs dag mtha' yas mchog /
NK044(phi)001:1765: skyon dang rgyags dang nyes pa spangs pa lags //
NK044(phi)001:1766: 'gro ba lam ngan zhugs la thugs rje bskyed //
NK044(phi)001:1767: kun tu gzigs pa gnas mchog bstan du gsol //
NK044(phi)001:1768: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1769: yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer brgya pa
NK044(phi)001:1770: zhes bya ba 'od zer las sprul pa'i sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:1771: rnams kyis chos bstan pas sems can dpag tu med
NK044(phi)001:1772: pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
NK044(phi)001:1773: mdzad pa de'i rim gro ba dge slong mig nyams
NK044(phi)001:1774: pa med pa zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das 'di
NK044(phi)001:1775: nyid gyur nas / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas
NK044(phi)001:1776: 'dul ba'i sems can de dag gi bsams pa la
NK044(phi)001:1777: mkhas pa des de bzhin gshegs pa des chos ston
NK044(phi)001:1778: pa de'i tshe bdag nyid kyang chos ston la /
NK044(phi)001:1779: thos nas rim gro yang byed de /
NK044(phi)001:1780: rim gro byas pa tsam gyis sems can dpag tu
NK044(phi)001:1781: med pa bla med rdzogs byang las phyir mi ldog
NK044(phi)001:1782: par gyur to // yang sngon bskal pa dpag tu
NK044(phi)001:1783: med pa'i pha rol na de bzhin gshegs pa grags
NK044(phi)001:1784: pa ma smad pa zhes bya ba'i gsung rab la
NK044(phi)001:1785: bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa
NK044(phi)001:1786: bla ma zhes bya ba yi dam blangs pa las
NK044(phi)001:1787: mi g.yo ba dang ldan pa zhig byung ste /
NK044(phi)001:1788: de'i yi dam gyi tshul ni 'di lta ste /
NK044(phi)001:1789: ji srid bdag 'tshang rgya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK044(phi)001:1790: der sems can dag bla med rdzogs byang gi snod
NK044(phi)001:1791: du ma gyur na de srid du bdag bla med
NK044(phi)001:1792: byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o //
NK044(phi)001:1793: de bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
NK044(phi)001:1794: skyes pa'i sems can thams cad mngon shes myur zhing
NK044(phi)001:1795: bde ba'i lam gyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da'
NK044(phi)001:1796: ba dang / zhing der sems can skyes pa de
NK044(phi)001:1797: thams cad mi dge ba'i chos spangs shing dge chos
NK044(phi)001:1798: ba dang / ldan pa dang / sems can thams
NK044(phi)001:1799: cad bla med rdzogs byang las phyir mi ldog pa
NK044(phi)001:1800: ba dang / ldan pa dang / dang / zhing
NK044(phi)001:1801: der ngan song gsum dang lha min gyi ris med
NK044(phi)001:1802: ba dang / ldan pa dang / dang / pa
NK044(phi)001:1803: dang / sdug bsngal gyi sgra tsam yang med pa
NK044(phi)001:1804: ba dang / ldan pa dang / dang / pa
NK044(phi)001:1805: dang / dang / zhing der skyes pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:1806: byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyis gnas pa ma
NK044(phi)001:1807: gtogs srid pa tha ma par 'gyur ba de lta
NK044(phi)001:1808: bu'i yi dam brtan par byas pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:1809: zhing de 'di la sogs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang
NK044(phi)001:1810: yang ldan par sbyangs pas sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na
NK044(phi)001:1811: de lta bu'i zhing yongs su dag par sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:1812: kyi rnam grol bstan pa'ang shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:1813: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po blo gros dag pa
NK044(phi)001:1814: zhes bya bar gyur pa de yang sangs rgyas dpag
NK044(phi)001:1815: tu med pa la rim gro byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:1816: bdag gis mtshan ma'i rim gros sangs rgyas mnyes par mi bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:1817: 'jig rten pa'i zang zing gi rim gro mi bya
NK044(phi)001:1818: bar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'dod pas de
NK044(phi)001:1819: bzhin gshegs pa'i rim gro thugs dang 'thad pa byas
NK044(phi)001:1820: nas sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:1821: nas mngon shes myur ba'i lam gyis sems can de
NK044(phi)001:1822: dag 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du bsam zhing /
NK044(phi)001:1823: bdag sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sangs
NK044(phi)001:1824: rgyas shin tu mang zhing dkon par ma gyur cig
NK044(phi)001:1825: snyam du de ltar dge rtsa bskyed pas bskal pa
NK044(phi)001:1826: bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas dgu brgya dang dgu
NK044(phi)001:1827: bcu byung ngo // de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:1828: tshad dpag tu med pa la lus ngag yid gsum
NK044(phi)001:1829: dag pa'i rim gro byas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK044(phi)001:1830: tshad med pa bskyed de sangs rgyas de'i gsung rab
NK044(phi)001:1831: la bsam pa drag pos rab tu gnas par byas
NK044(phi)001:1832: pa sogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba des sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:1833: kyi zhing rgya che ste gzhal bar mi nus pa
NK044(phi)001:1834: nyid du gyur to zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:1835: yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas zhes bya ba byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:1836: zhing der bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:1837: dpa' gzi brjid drag pa zhes bya ba byang chub
NK044(phi)001:1838: sems dpa' 'bum phrag brgyad kyi gtso bor gyur to
NK044(phi)001:1839: // de thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan te /
NK044(phi)001:1840: sems can rnams kyi bya ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:1842: sems can rnams kyi drung du 'gro ba'i dus la
NK044(phi)001:1843: mkhas pas gzhan la chos ston pa'i byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:1844: dpa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan no
NK044(phi)001:1845: // byang chub sems dpa' de de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:1846: 'od mtha' yas de la bltas nas sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:1847: zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing song
NK044(phi)001:1848: // ba'i tshe / des gang du rkang pa bzhag
NK044(phi)001:1849: pa'i zhing des sems can rnams kyis sangs rgyas byung
NK044(phi)001:1850: ba yang dag par shes shing bdud dpa' bkong bar
NK044(phi)001:1851: gyur cing lha'i gnas rab tu dga' bar byed la
NK044(phi)001:1852: // ba'i tshe / / zhing de dag gser gyi
NK044(phi)001:1853: kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyis khyab par byed do
NK044(phi)001:1854: // ba'i tshe / / // sems can de dag
NK044(phi)001:1855: gis snang ba 'di phyogs gang nas 'ong zhes ya
NK044(phi)001:1857: des bar snang las zhing 'di dag thams cad ni
NK044(phi)001:1858: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas khyab ste /
NK044(phi)001:1859: gang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod pas thal
NK044(phi)001:1860: mo sbyor la de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'dod
NK044(phi)001:1862: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra 'byin par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:1863: sems can de dag gis sgra de thos nas thal mo sbyar te /
NK044(phi)001:1864: khyod kyis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa dang sprod cing ces sgra phyung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1865: de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa des sprul pa brgya stong dag mngon par sprul te /
NK044(phi)001:1866: sems can re res sprul pa re rer shes kyi gzhan ni mi mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1867: de nyi ma gcig la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
NK044(phi)001:1868: snang bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing khri phrag dpag tu
NK044(phi)001:1869: med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa bdag
NK044(phi)001:1871: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas pa
NK044(phi)001:1872: des byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid drag po'i mthu
NK044(phi)001:1873: dang stobs dang brtson 'grus bskyed par mdzad cing bka'
NK044(phi)001:1874: stsal pa / rigs kyi bu song la nga'i 'od kyi rjes snyegs shig /
NK044(phi)001:1875: gang du 'od gnas bar mthong ba de tsam du
NK044(phi)001:1876: nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du shes par gyis shig
NK044(phi)001:1877: ces de bzhin gshegs pa des 'od gser gyi mdog
NK044(phi)001:1878: can btang ngo // de rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis 'od de dag gi rjes su song ste /
NK044(phi)001:1879: bskal ba grangs med la 'das kyang 'od de'i mtha' ma mthong nas sgyid lug cing ngal ba la /
NK044(phi)001:1880: bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi sku byung nas des bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:1881: rigs kyi bu nga la ba'i rgyu yid la ma
NK044(phi)001:1882: byed cig sgyid lug par ma byed par re zhig
NK044(phi)001:1884: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa gang gis /
NK044(phi)001:1885: de'i lus kyi ngal ba bsal zhing sems kyi brtson 'grus bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:1886: de nas yang bskal pa grangs med par song ba
NK044(phi)001:1887: dang rin po che'i shing ljon pa zhig mthong zhing
NK044(phi)001:1888: de'i pha rol na yang 'od mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:1889: de'i tshe bla gos phyogs gcig tu gzar te pus
NK044(phi)001:1890: mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas de
NK044(phi)001:1891: bzhin gshegs pa 'od mtha' yas la gsol pa /
NK044(phi)001:1892: thugs la dri ma bral zhing sbyor ba spangs //
NK044(phi)001:1893: khyed kyis 'jig rten khams kun thugs su chud //
NK044(phi)001:1895: 'di la yul gyi mtha' 'di rjes su 'jug /
NK044(phi)001:1896: de'i tshe bar snang las rin chen sna bdun gyi
NK044(phi)001:1897: khang brtsegs las sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byung ba
NK044(phi)001:1898: des de la bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:1899: gang dag nga yi rkang pa'i drung 'dug dang //
NK044(phi)001:1900: gang dag yul 'di yi ni mthar 'dug pa //
NK044(phi)001:1901: thams cad nga yi sgra dag thos 'gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:1902: 'di yi sgrub pa thams cad shes par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:1903: stobs bcu sangs rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa //
NK044(phi)001:1904: brtag pa 'di dag srog chags kun la bden //
NK044(phi)001:1905: yul gyi rang bzhin yul gyi dngos dang bzo //
NK044(phi)001:1906: de bzhin yul gyi tshig dag kun shes so //
NK044(phi)001:1907: rgyal ba nga yi zhing 'dir sems can dag /
NK044(phi)001:1908: tshig 'di thos nas dang bar mi 'gyur med //
NK044(phi)001:1909: thams cad bla na med pa'i sa la gnas //
NK044(phi)001:1910: de dag rgyal ba'i chos las ldog mi 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:1911: gang dag nyan thos lhan cig thun mong ba'i //
NK044(phi)001:1912: de dag ma yin 'di ni rnam 'dren chos //
NK044(phi)001:1913: rgyal sras gang la rab tu sems dang ba //
NK044(phi)001:1914: bdud kyi skyon bcom byang chub reg par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:1915: zhes gsungs pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:1916: zhing de thams cad du grags shing go bar byas
NK044(phi)001:1917: so // yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa zhes bya ba /
NK044(phi)001:1918: 'jig rten gyi khams dge ba'i mig ces bya bar byung ba na /
NK044(phi)001:1919: zhing der bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:1920: mtha' yas shugs 'chang zhes bya ba byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:1921: dpa' 'bum phrag bdun gyi gtso bo byed pa phar
NK044(phi)001:1922: phyin drug dang thabs la mkhas pa zhig tu gyur
NK044(phi)001:1923: pa des byang chub sems dpa' de dag zil gyis
NK044(phi)001:1924: mnan cing / nyan rang gi rigs can smin par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:1925: de bzhin gshegs pa de la yang rim gro byed do //
NK044(phi)001:1926: mthong ba'i chos la'ang bde bar gnas pa dag gis gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:1927: des 'jig rten gyi khams khri phrag brgyad cu nas
NK044(phi)001:1928: sangs rgyas de'i zhing gi bar gyi sems can rnams
NK044(phi)001:1929: la sprul pa gtong ste sems can rnams yongs su
NK044(phi)001:1930: smin par byed cing sbyong bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:1931: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa des byang chub sems dpa' de la bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:1932: rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams khri phrag dpag tu med pa 'dir ni /
NK044(phi)001:1933: ngan song gsum dang lha min dang /
NK044(phi)001:1934: ji ltar mi khom pa med par 'gyur ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:1935: sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad par skad cig gcig
NK044(phi)001:1936: dang ldan par 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su smin
NK044(phi)001:1937: par nus sam zhes gsungs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:1938: byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang gis gsol ba /
NK044(phi)001:1939: bcom ldan 'das skad cig gcig gis bgyi bar rngo thogs lags so //
NK044(phi)001:1942: da ltar gyi skye dgu tshe ring ba bskal pa la khri phrag dpag tu med de /
NK044(phi)001:1943: gang byang chub sems dpa' le lo yod pa kun cha gcig gis sman par ji ltar byed /
NK044(phi)001:1944: rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:1945: khri phrag dpag med kyis yang nas yang du sangs
NK044(phi)001:1946: rgyas kyi zhi nga du spyad par nga'i spyan gyis
NK044(phi)001:1947: gzigs te / de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK044(phi)001:1948: gzhan yang sangs rgyas mang pos yongs su ma btul
NK044(phi)001:1949: gzigs te / ba med do // zhing 'di sangs
NK044(phi)001:1950: rgyas mang pos yongs su smin par mdzad pa de
NK044(phi)001:1951: lta bu'i zhing gzhan gang yang med do //
NK044(phi)001:1952: rigs kyi bu de lta bas na khyod de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:1953: gshegs pa'i bkas zhing 'di yongs su smin pa dang
NK044(phi)001:1954: spyad par bya bar nges pa skyed cing /
NK044(phi)001:1955: rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas khri phrag dpag med
NK044(phi)001:1956: la dge rtsa skyed cing shes rab rno ba snying
NK044(phi)001:1957: rje mtshungs pa med pa dang ldan pas khyod kyi
NK044(phi)001:1958: tshe gcig po 'dis sems can thams cad yongs su
NK044(phi)001:1959: smin par nus sam zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1960: byang chub sems dpa' des gsol pa /
NK044(phi)001:1961: gal te bdag la de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal na /
NK044(phi)001:1962: sems can rnams la snying brtse bas /
NK044(phi)001:1963: bskal pa grangs ma mchis par me mur gyi 'ob tu mchi bar spro'o zhes gsol pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:1964: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das so //
NK044(phi)001:1965: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtha' yas shugs 'chang
NK044(phi)001:1966: des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gdung rgya cher byas
NK044(phi)001:1968: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' rjes su dran pas sems
NK044(phi)001:1969: can rnams la snying brtse ba nye bar bzung ste
NK044(phi)001:1970: / sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag
NK044(phi)001:1971: tu med pa sprul nas des sangs rgyas kyi zhing
NK044(phi)001:1972: de byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:1973: kyis me tog bzhin du bkang nas de'i tshe'i 'du
NK044(phi)001:1975: gzhan yang rgyal bu sdong dum zhes bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:1976: pa'i tshe na gzugs mi sdug kyang dpa' zhing rtul
NK044(phi)001:1977: ba brtan po'i stobs kyis pha rol las rgyal zhing
NK044(phi)001:1978: dgra zla rgyal phran drug cham la phab pa'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:1979: dang / rjes su brgya byin gyis nor bu byin pa'i mthus /
NK044(phi)001:1980: lus kyang lha lta bur mdzes shing /
NK044(phi)001:1981: longs spyod che ba dang sbyin pa'i bsod nams rgya
NK044(phi)001:1982: cher byas pa'i tshul mdo sde mdzangs blun du shes
NK044(phi)001:1983: par bya'o // yang bdud shugs 'chang zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:1984: gyur pas sangs rgyas lnga brgya dag gi gsung rab
NK044(phi)001:1985: la bdud kyi las byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:1986: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud dad pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:1987: de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub kyi snying po
NK044(phi)001:1988: la bzhugs pa na bdud bya bar 'dod pa la
NK044(phi)001:1989: / bdud de'i sngon gyi dge rtsa gzigs nas de
NK044(phi)001:1990: bzhin gshegs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis bdud des sngon
NK044(phi)001:1991: gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bdud kyi las
NK044(phi)001:1992: byas pas sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ba
NK044(phi)001:1993: rjes su dran par mdzad pas bdud de 'jigs shing
NK044(phi)001:1994: skyo ba'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la
NK044(phi)001:1996: sdig pa'i las mthol zhing bshags te sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:1997: chos zab mo la mos pas bla med rdzogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:1998: byang chub tu sems bskyed par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:1999: yang sngon tshong dpon mdza' bo'i bu mor skyes pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:2000: rgya mtshor zhugs nas pha rol tu phyin pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2001: ma la byams pa'i las kyi tshul du ma nyams su myongs pa'i mthar /
NK044(phi)001:2002: ma la ma gus pa'i las kyi rnam par smin
NK044(phi)001:2003: pas lcags kyi 'khor lo mgo la 'khor ba'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:2004: sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed de /
NK044(phi)001:2005: de dag gi phyir 'khor lo de rang kho na'i
NK044(phi)001:2006: mgo la 'dzin par 'dod pa'i sems bskyed ma thag
NK044(phi)001:2007: tu gnas de las tshe 'phos te dga' ldan gyi
NK044(phi)001:2009: yang sngon drang srong rnga bong zhes bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:2010: pa na des dben par lo drug khri'i bar du
NK044(phi)001:2011: rkang pa ya gcig gis dka' thub la gnas par
NK044(phi)001:2012: byas shing / tshangs pa dang brgya byin gyis phyag
NK044(phi)001:2013: byas pa de la 'dod gzugs kyi lha rnams kyis
NK044(phi)001:2014: mchod nas dris pa la drang srong des mkha' la
NK044(phi)001:2015: rgyu skar rnams ji ltar byung ba'i bskal pa'i sngon
NK044(phi)001:2017: rgyu skar rnams kyi bkod pa sogs thams cad byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2018: yud tsam dang nyin mtshan dang zla ba la sogs
NK044(phi)001:2019: pa'i dus kyi cha rnam par bzhag pa yang byas
NK044(phi)001:2020: te / de la lha la sogs pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:2021: mgu nas de lta bu'i sems can su yang 'jig
NK044(phi)001:2022: rten na med do zhes basngagasa so //
NK044(phi)001:2023: yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i stabs su
NK044(phi)001:2024: 'gro ba las bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid byang chub
NK044(phi)001:2025: sems dpa' rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:2026: pas chos kyi rnam grangs dang gzungs kyi tshig thos
NK044(phi)001:2027: pa kun bzung nas grong khyer thams cad du nad
NK044(phi)001:2028: sna tshogs kyis gzir ba'i sems can rnams thar bar
NK044(phi)001:2029: byas pa dang / yang sngon byang chub sems dpar
NK044(phi)001:2030: gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa skar rgyal zad
NK044(phi)001:2031: par me'i ting 'dzin la bzhugs pa la rkang pa
NK044(phi)001:2032: ya gcig gis 'greng ste zhag bdun gyi bar du
NK044(phi)001:2033: bskor ba byas shing tshigs su bcad pa gcig pas
NK044(phi)001:2034: bstod pa byas pa sogs skyes pa'i rabs sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:2035: pa dag ni mdo las shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:2036: gzhan yang mdo rnams las gsungs pa /
NK044(phi)001:2037: byang chub sems dpa' chen po la dmyal ba'i las med mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2038: sems can gyi phyir dmyal bar smon lam 'debs te /
NK044(phi)001:2039: sngon tshe lo brgya thub pa'i dus na sems can
NK044(phi)001:2040: gang+g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed dmyal bar sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:2041: bar mthong nas bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:2042: dpa'i dus na / yi dam chen po bskyed de dmyal ba'i lus blangs nas /
NK044(phi)001:2043: lo tshad med pa snyed du sdig pa can rnams la mdo sde bcu gnyis rgyas par bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:2044: mi dge ba'i rnam smin bcom pas sems can dmyal
NK044(phi)001:2045: ba yang stong par byas te log sred can nams
NK044(phi)001:2046: ma gtogs pa btul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2047: yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la sems can tshad
NK044(phi)001:2048: med pa byol song du skyes pa'i don du sha
NK044(phi)001:2060: rta la sogs pa'i lus glangs te sems can de dag la phan btags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2061: yang bskal pa bzang po 'di la yi dwags tshad
NK044(phi)001:2062: med pa'i nang du yi dwags kyi lus su byas
NK044(phi)001:2064: shan pa'i khyim du skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:2065: bya dang phag sogs gsod cing nya rgya bcing ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2066: rigs ngan gyi khyim du skyes nas chom rkun dag kyang byas te /
NK044(phi)001:2067: byang chub sems dpa' la de lta bu'i las ngan med kyang /
NK044(phi)001:2068: sems can rnam par dgrol ba'i phyir smon lam chen
NK044(phi)001:2069: po'i stobs kyis de lta bu'i lus len te sems
NK044(phi)001:2070: can la phan bde byed do //
NK044(phi)001:2071: yang yul mtha' 'khob tu skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:2072: dug gsum gyi sgo nas chos min spyod cing /
NK044(phi)001:2073: dkon mchog gsum dang las 'bras la yid mi ches pa /
NK044(phi)001:2074: pha ma dang gnyen bshes rgan rabs la bkur sti
NK044(phi)001:2075: mi byed pa'i tshul can du skye ba blangs te
NK044(phi)001:2076: sems can la phan par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:2079: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gi lus dang /
NK044(phi)001:2085: mu stegs gcer bu'i lus kyis las 'bras sogs med par smra ba sogs su skye ba bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:2086: sems can rnams rnam par grol ba'i phyir smon lam
NK044(phi)001:2087: chen po'i go cha bstan pa'i stobs kyis ngan par
NK044(phi)001:2088: lta ba'i chos la zhugs pa'i tshul gyis sems can
NK044(phi)001:2089: la phan bde byas pa mdo myang 'das sogs las
NK044(phi)001:2090: gsungs so // gang pos zhus pa las /
NK044(phi)001:2091: nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa
NK044(phi)001:2092: na rang gi lus sems can rnams la yongs su
NK044(phi)001:2093: btang ste de rnams kyi bran dang g.yog byas te
NK044(phi)001:2094: / las rnam pa sna tshogs byed du bcug ste /
NK044(phi)001:2095: kha cig gis ni gshang gci 'dor ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2096: de bzhin du lud pho ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2100: shing dang sol ba me dang chu len pa sogs
NK044(phi)001:2101: 'di lta bu'i las sna tshogs byed du bcug pa
NK044(phi)001:2102: la / de rjes su mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa mi dran no //
NK044(phi)001:2103: spos dang me tog bza' btung 'bras bu sogs len
NK044(phi)001:2104: du btang na yang de'i rjes su ma song ba
NK044(phi)001:2105: mi dran no // legs par byed du bcug pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2106: legs pa min pa byed du bcug pa'i rjes su mi 'gro bar sems bskyed pa mi dran no //
NK044(phi)001:2107: rgyal rigs dang bram ze dmangs sogs la 'di'i rjes su 'brang /
NK044(phi)001:2108: 'di'i rjes su mi 'brang snyam pa'i sems bskyed pa med kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2109: gang gis sngar bos pa de'i rjes su song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:2110: chos bzhin gyi bya ba gang byed du bcug pa la nus bzhin ma byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2111: bya ba'i dngos po de dag nges par mthar ma phyin pa yod par rjes su mi dran no //
NK044(phi)001:2113: 'jig rten 'dzin gyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:2114: rigs kyi bu dag ngas sngon brtson 'grus chen po'i shugs dang /
NK044(phi)001:2115: thabs la mkhas pa chen po'i mthus sems can gyi
NK044(phi)001:2116: don byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:2117: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi tshogs bsags so //
NK044(phi)001:2118: rigs kyi bu dag ngas mngon du dran pa sngon
NK044(phi)001:2119: 'das pa'i dus na sems can la phan pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2120: bde ba'i phyir nyi ma gcig la yang lus stong
NK044(phi)001:2121: yongs su btang ste sbyin pa byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2122: rigs kyi bu dag nga sngon skye ba brgya stong
NK044(phi)001:2123: gi bar du sems can bkres skom pa dag mthong
NK044(phi)001:2124: nas / bdag gi lus kyi sha bcad de btsos
NK044(phi)001:2125: nas sbyin par byas kyang de'i tshe na 'khrugs pa'am
NK044(phi)001:2127: sems can de dag la khyab par snying rje chen
NK044(phi)001:2128: po kun nas skyes so zhes gsungs pa ltar byang
NK044(phi)001:2130: bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i go cha chen po bgos shing /
NK044(phi)001:2131: sbyor ba phar phyin drug gi nyams len tshad med pa la zhugs nas /
NK044(phi)001:2132: sems can gyi don rlabs po che byas pa'i brtson
NK044(phi)001:2133: 'grus dpag par dka' ba nyid du shes par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:2135: bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur
NK044(phi)001:2136: pa'i dus na gtong dka' ba'i dngos po btang ba
NK044(phi)001:2137: sogs kyis dam pa'i chos yongs su btsal ba'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:2138: yang / sngon sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma byon pa'i dus zhig na /
NK044(phi)001:2139: bcom ldan 'das nyid mu stegs can gyi bram ze zhig tu gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2140: gtsug lag thams cad shes shing dul ba /
NK044(phi)001:2141: nyon mongs pa med cing dag pa'i sems dang spyod lam can du gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:2142: phyogs thams cad du theg pa chen po'i mdo sde btsal kyang ming tsam yang ma rnyed la /
NK044(phi)001:2143: de dus gcig na gangs kyi ri 'bab chu dang
NK044(phi)001:2144: shing bzang po ldan par rtsa ba dang 'bras bu
NK044(phi)001:2145: za zhing ting nge 'dzin yid la byed do //
NK044(phi)001:2146: de lo tshad med pa'i bar du gnas kyang sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2147: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i ming yang ma thos so //
NK044(phi)001:2148: de de ltar dka' thub spyod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2149: brgya byin dang lha'i bu rnams 'dus te /
NK044(phi)001:2150: phan tshun tshigs su bcad de 'di na 'di lta bu'i dka' thub can gnas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2151: 'di mu stegs can yin na thabs 'dis brgya byin
NK044(phi)001:2152: lha'i thabs 'dod pa yin nam zhes sogs su bsgros
NK044(phi)001:2153: pa na / der lha'i sras po drang srong gcig ces bya bas /
NK044(phi)001:2155: sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:2156: lus dang srid kyi longs spyod thams cad la mi
NK044(phi)001:2157: chags par dka' thub spyod do //
NK044(phi)001:2158: 'di ltar 'di ni bla med byang chub tu 'tshang
NK044(phi)001:2159: rgya ba 'ba' zhig 'tshal lo zhes smras pa la
NK044(phi)001:2161: khyod smras pa bzhin de sangs rgyas kyi ljon shing
NK044(phi)001:2162: nyid du 'gyur na 'jig rten thams cad kyi skyabs
NK044(phi)001:2163: su 'gyur te grib mas nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba
NK044(phi)001:2164: thams cad 'jil zhing bdag sogs rnams kyi nyon mongs
NK044(phi)001:2165: pa'i gdung ba yang zhi bar byed mod /
NK044(phi)001:2166: de ni shin tu yid ches dka' ste /
NK044(phi)001:2167: sems can tshad med pa dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed kyang /
NK044(phi)001:2168: dper na chu'i zla ba chu 'gul na 'gul ba
NK044(phi)001:2169: ltar rkyen cung zad tsam gyis phyir ldog pa ste
NK044(phi)001:2170: / ri mo bris pa'i gzugs bya dka' la gzhig
NK044(phi)001:2171: sla ba ltar sems de bskyed dka' la ldog sla
NK044(phi)001:2172: / ba dang / mi zhig go mtshon dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:2173: te g.yul du chas pa dgra dang phrad nas phyir
NK044(phi)001:2174: ldog pa ltar 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa mthong nas phyir
NK044(phi)001:2176: des na skyes bu dka' bas spyod pa yongs su dag par mthong mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2177: 'on kyang bla med byang chub kyi phyir bsam pa
NK044(phi)001:2178: brtan mi brtan yid mi ches pas de'i gan du
NK044(phi)001:2179: song nas / skyes bu des bla med rdzogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2180: byang chub phrag pa la bskur nus sam mi nus
NK044(phi)001:2181: song nas / brtag par bya'o // ji ltar shing rta'i 'phang lo gnyis dang /
NK044(phi)001:2182: bya la 'dab ma gnyis yod na don grub pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:2183: dka' thub spyod pa de yang tshul khrims dang ldan pa mthong mod /
NK044(phi)001:2184: shin tu zhib mo'i ye shes yod med brtag dgos la /
NK044(phi)001:2185: de 'dra'i ye shes yod na bla med rdzogs byang gi khur lci ba phrag par khyer nus so //
NK044(phi)001:2186: nya mo la phrug gu mang yang phrug gur 'gyur ba nyung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2187: shing a mra la me tog shin tu mang yang 'bras bur 'gyur ba nyung ba ltar /
NK044(phi)001:2188: bla med byang chub tu sems bskyed pa mang yang /
NK044(phi)001:2189: mthar 'bras bur gyur pa nyung ba'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:2190: bdag cag 'grogs te skyes bu de rtog tu 'deng ngo //
NK044(phi)001:2191: ji ltar gser bsreg brdungs brdar ba bzhin brtag par bya'o zhes smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:2192: brgya byin rang nyid srin po shin tu 'jigs su
NK044(phi)001:2193: rung ba zhig tu byas te gangs kyi ri las
NK044(phi)001:2194: bab nas de'i phyogs nye bar phyin cing skad gsang
NK044(phi)001:2195: mtho bas sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2197: kye ma'o 'du byed rtag pa min //
NK044(phi)001:2198: skye zhing 'gog pa'i chos can yin //
NK044(phi)001:2200: de'i drung du phyin nas 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis mig phyogs bzhi kun tu bgrad cing lta'o //
NK044(phi)001:2201: dka' thub spyod pa des tshigs bcad phyed 'di thos pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2202: shin tu 'jigs pa'i g.yang sar mtshan mo grogs stor ba rnyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2203: nad yun ring po sman gyis sos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2204: rgya mtshor lhung ba gzings dang 'phrad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2205: shin tu skoms pa chu bsil dang 'phrad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2206: dgras bdas pa las shor ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2207: yun ring por brtson du bzung ba thar pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2208: zhing la than chen byung ba la char babs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2209: mgron po lam ring po nas phyir 'khor ba tsam
NK044(phi)001:2210: du dga' ba chen po skyes te 'dug pa las
NK044(phi)001:2211: langs shing lag pas skra bteg nas phyogs bzhir bltas
NK044(phi)001:2212: te tshigs su bcad pa smra ba 'di su yin
NK044(phi)001:2213: zhes bltas na / gzhan su yang mi snang gi srin po 'ba' zhig mthong nas 'di skad du /
NK044(phi)001:2214: 'di ltar rnam grol gyi sgo 'byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2215: sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2216: 'khor ba'i gnyid kyis log pa 'di las sad par byed pa 'di su yin zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2217: 'khor bar mu ges gdungs pa la bla med byang chub kyi ro ston pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2218: sems can tshad med pa 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor bying ba la gru chen pos 'dren pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2219: sems can mang po nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba la sman du gyur pa 'di su yin /
NK044(phi)001:2220: tshigs bcad phyed 'di thos pas zla ba phyed pos
NK044(phi)001:2221: pad+mo bag gyis kha 'byed pa ltar bdag gi sems
NK044(phi)001:2223: de'i tshe gzhan su yang ma mthong la srin po
NK044(phi)001:2224: 'ba' zhig mthong bas 'di dag gis smras pa'am snyam
NK044(phi)001:2225: zhing / yang 'di rnams ni gzugs 'jigs shing shin tu mi sdug na /
NK044(phi)001:2226: gang gis tshigs bcad 'di thos pa de gzugs mi sdug pa 'jigs rung dang bral rigs te /
NK044(phi)001:2227: me'i nang nas pad+mo skye ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2228: nyi ma'i 'od la chu grang mo 'byung mi srid
NK044(phi)001:2229: pa ltar 'di dag 'di lta bu smra srid dam
NK044(phi)001:2230: yang snyam zhing / yang bsams pa bdag ni shin
NK044(phi)001:2231: tu shes pa med pa ste gal te srin po
NK044(phi)001:2232: 'di 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang 'phrad de tshigs su
NK044(phi)001:2233: bcad pa phyed po thos kyang srid pas /
NK044(phi)001:2234: tshigs su bcad pa phyed po 'di'i don srin po 'di la dri bar bya'o snyam ste /
NK044(phi)001:2235: legs so skyes bu chen po khyod 'das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gsung 'di su las thos /
NK044(phi)001:2236: 'di'i don ni dus gsum sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam yin te /
NK044(phi)001:2237: 'jig rten gyi sems can lta bas glegs pa'i mu stegs can gyis /
NK044(phi)001:2238: 'jig rten las 'das pa stobs bcu pas gsungs pa'i don 'di mi thos so zhes dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2240: bram ze de skad du ma 'dri zhig /
NK044(phi)001:2241: kho bo zhag mang du 'das te zas ma rnyed
NK044(phi)001:2242: pas sngar smras pa yang bkres skom gyi gdungs te
NK044(phi)001:2243: myos bzhin smras par zad kyis dran bzhin du ma
NK044(phi)001:2244: yin no // bdag nam mkhar 'phur te sgra mi
NK044(phi)001:2245: snyan dang lha'i gnas kyi bar du phyin kyang bdag
NK044(phi)001:2246: gis zas ma rnyed nas de skad smras pa yin
NK044(phi)001:2247: yin no // no // bram ze des srin po
NK044(phi)001:2248: la skyes bu chen po khyod kyis tshigs su bcad
NK044(phi)001:2249: pa 'di rdzogs par smras na bdag tshe gcig tu
NK044(phi)001:2250: khyod kyi slob mar dam baca'o //
NK044(phi)001:2251: 'di'i tshig dang don gyi cha rdzogs par mdzod cig /
NK044(phi)001:2253: khyod shes pa lhag che ste /
NK044(phi)001:2254: khyod rang gi don cher 'dzin gyi /
NK044(phi)001:2255: kho bo'i bsam pa mi sems pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:2256: kho bo bkres pas gdungs nas smra mi 'dod do //
NK044(phi)001:2257: bram ze des khyod zas ci zhig za zhes dris pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2260: smras na mi mang po skrag par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:2262: yul stong pa 'dir mi yang med cing nga ni khyod la mi 'jigs na ci'i phyir mi smra /
NK044(phi)001:2264: kho bo ni zas su mi'i sha rjen pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2265: khrag dron mo 'thung ste kho bo bsod nams chung
NK044(phi)001:2266: bas zas 'di lta bu btsal kyang ma rnyed do
NK044(phi)001:2267: // 'jig rten na mi shin tu mang mod kyi
NK044(phi)001:2268: thams cad bsod nams dang ldan pa sha stag la
NK044(phi)001:2269: lhas kyang bsrungs pas bdag de dag gsod cing za
NK044(phi)001:2272: khyod tshigs bcad 'di don dang bcas par rdzogs par
NK044(phi)001:2273: smros dang nga'i lus 'di khyod la gtang bar bya
NK044(phi)001:2274: ste / stag spyang la sogs pas lus mang po
NK044(phi)001:2275: zos kyang spu nyag tsam gyi bsod nams mi skyed
NK044(phi)001:2276: kyi bla med rdzogs byang gi phyir du snying po
NK044(phi)001:2277: med pa'i lus 'di las snying po dang bcas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2280: khyod yi ge 'bru brgyad po'i phyir lus yongs su gtong ngo zhes smra bar sus yid ches /
NK044(phi)001:2282: mi zhig kham phor dang rin po che'i snod barjesa
NK044(phi)001:2283: pa bzhin du snying po med pa'i lus 'dis rdo
NK044(phi)001:2284: rje lta bu'i lus thob pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2285: ci'i phyir lus mi gtong ste /
NK044(phi)001:2286: kho bo'i dpang du tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang rgyal chen sogs yod do //
NK044(phi)001:2287: gzhan byang chub sems dpa' dang phyogs bcu'i zhing gi
NK044(phi)001:2288: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dpang du byas
NK044(phi)001:2289: te yi ge 'bru brgyad po'i phyir lus 'di gtong
NK044(phi)001:2291: de ltar khyod lus gtong phod na legs par nyon cig tshigs bcad 'di yang bstan par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:2292: de thos pas bram ze dga' ste lus la gyon pa'i gos phud nas stan du bting ste /
NK044(phi)001:2293: der bzhugs su gsol nas thal mo sbyar te tshigs
NK044(phi)001:2294: bcad phyed po ston par gsol ba btab pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2296: de dag nye bar zhi ba bde /
NK044(phi)001:2298: da khyod tshigs bcad yongs rdzogs thos kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2299: ci khyod sems can la phan bde spyod pa yang
NK044(phi)001:2300: dag pa yin na da khyod lus sbyin pa'i dus
NK044(phi)001:2301: la bab bo zhes zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:2302: der bram ze des don 'di shin tu yid la byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:2303: brag dang rtsig ngos shing dang lam kha kun tu tshigs bcad 'di bris nas /
NK044(phi)001:2304: lus kyi sha mi snad par bya ba'i phyir gos bsdams nas shing khar 'dzegs so //
NK044(phi)001:2306: legs so skyes bu dam pa khyod da ltar ci zhig byed snyam zhes dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2307: des tshigs bcad thos pa'i drin bsab snyam du sems so //
NK044(phi)001:2309: tshigs bcad de thos na phan pa'i don ci zhig yod /
NK044(phi)001:2310: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2311: tshigs bcad 'di ni 'das dang ma 'ongs da lta'i
NK044(phi)001:2312: sangs rgyas rnams kyis stong pa nyid 'byed pa'i chos
NK044(phi)001:2313: yin te / ngas chos 'di'i phyir lus gtong gi /
NK044(phi)001:2314: rnyed grags dang 'khor sgyur dang lha dang tshangs pa sogs bde ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //
NK044(phi)001:2315: sems can thams cad la phan bde'i phyir gtong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:2316: bdag gi lus 'di gtong ba mthong nas sems can
NK044(phi)001:2317: ser sna can rnams sbyin pa la gnas pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2318: / gang sbyin pa la zhen pa nga rgyal gyis
NK044(phi)001:2319: zin pa dag kyang 'di ltar gtong ba 'di mthong
NK044(phi)001:2320: bar shog ces smon lam btab ste /
NK044(phi)001:2321: mchil ma dang sa rdo ltar lus btang ste shing kha nas mchongs so //
NK044(phi)001:2322: de'i steng gi bar snang las sgra skad sna tshogs srid rtse'i mthar thug par grags so //
NK044(phi)001:2323: srin po de brgya byin rang gi lus su bsgyur nas /
NK044(phi)001:2324: byang chub sems dpa' sa la ma lhung bar bde bar bzhag ste /
NK044(phi)001:2325: brgya byin dang lha'i sras po dang tshangs pa chen
NK044(phi)001:2326: po'i rgyal por bcas pas byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs
NK044(phi)001:2327: la phyag byas te legs so legs so byang chub
NK044(phi)001:2328: sems dpa' yang dag pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:2329: sems can tshad med pa la phan bde'i don du 'gyur ba /
NK044(phi)001:2330: ma rig pa'i mun pa chen por chos chen po'i sgron ma snang bar byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:2331: bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos chen po bsrung
NK044(phi)001:2332: zhing bskyabs pa'i phyir khyod kyi sems 'khrugs pa'i gnod
NK044(phi)001:2335: khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus su 'tshang rgya ba na /
NK044(phi)001:2336: bdag cag kyang bsgral bar smon no zhes smras te mi snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2337: de ltar tshigs su bcad pa phyed kyi phyir lus
NK044(phi)001:2338: btang ba'i rgyu dang rkyen des bskal pa bcu gnyis
NK044(phi)001:2339: kyi tshogs rdzogs nas byams pa bas sngon du bla
NK044(phi)001:2340: med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas so //
NK044(phi)001:2341: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid bram
NK044(phi)001:2342: ze'i khye'u chos 'dod ces bya ba tshul khrims sogs
NK044(phi)001:2343: dge ba'i chos dang ldan par gyur te snyan grags
NK044(phi)001:2345: bram ze zhig de la phrag dog skyes te khyod
NK044(phi)001:2346: me'i dong du mchong nus na bdag gis legs par
NK044(phi)001:2347: bshad pa bsgrag par bya'o zhes smras pa la de
NK044(phi)001:2348: bzhin du khas blangs pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:2349: bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams kyis me dong du
NK044(phi)001:2350: mi 'dor bar bzlog kyang slob dpon gyi dgongs pa
NK044(phi)001:2351: bskang phyir ldog tu ma btub nas me dong sta
NK044(phi)001:2352: gon byas te bram ze la chos bsgrag par gsol
NK044(phi)001:2355: sbyin pa la ni rtag tu dga' bar gyis //
NK044(phi)001:2356: rtag tu tshul khrims yongs su rdzogs par spyod //
NK044(phi)001:2357: brtson 'grus mchog gi gnas ni brtsam par gyis //
NK044(phi)001:2358: shes rab kyis ni chos mchog dam pa thob //
NK044(phi)001:2359: ces smras pa legs par bzung ste skye bo phal po che bsogs shing /
NK044(phi)001:2360: de rnams la tshigs bcad 'di smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:2361: bdag bla med byang chub kyi phyir gtong ba 'di
NK044(phi)001:2362: byas pa la 'bras bu med par ma gyur cig
NK044(phi)001:2363: / ces bden pa brjod nas me dong du mchongs pas me shi ste /
NK044(phi)001:2364: pad+ma'i rdzing bur gyur pa'i steng du 'dug nas tshangs spyod yon tan bzhi ldan gyi chos bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:2365: bram ze de ni lus thams cad la me 'bar
NK044(phi)001:2366: te sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ba la
NK044(phi)001:2369: bdag gis khyod bskyab par bya'o zhes byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:2370: bdag sems can rnams kyi phyir byang chub la spyod pa'i bden pa des /
NK044(phi)001:2371: bram ze 'di'i lus tshig pa zhi nas sems can dmyal ba las thar bar shog ces smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:2372: bram ze de dmyal ba las thar bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2373: de dus kyi bram ze ni khyim bdag dpal sbas yin no zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:2374: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po tshangs pas
NK044(phi)001:2375: byin zhes bya ba bdag gi ba thams cad yongs
NK044(phi)001:2376: su gtong bar gyur pa'i tshe na btsun mo dam
NK044(phi)001:2377: pa dang bu thu bo gzhon nu dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:2378: bkad sar song nas 'khod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2379: sha za gzugs mchog tu mi sdug pa zhig gis bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te /
NK044(phi)001:2380: bdag gis sngon de bzhin gshegs pa las chos legs
NK044(phi)001:2381: par bshad pa thos pa de khyod don du gnyer
NK044(phi)001:2382: na zungs shig / rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2383: 'byung po chen po legs par gsungs pa 'dod kyis /
NK044(phi)001:2384: khyod gang 'dod pa de ngas sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:2386: bdag khyod kyi sdug pa gsum po bdag nyid dang
NK044(phi)001:2387: bu dang chung ma dag bdag la byin na legs
NK044(phi)001:2388: par gsungs pa phyis bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:2392: bza' bar bya ste chos kyang bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:2393: de nas rgyal pos g.yas kyi bu dang /
NK044(phi)001:2394: g.yon logs na 'dug pa'i chung ma la bltas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2396: rgyal po chen po myur du thong la legs par
NK044(phi)001:2397: gsungs pa gang zhig 'khor ba las sgrol bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:2399: de nas rgyal po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rig nas /
NK044(phi)001:2400: sha za des tshigs bcad smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2401: bdag gi phyir dang gzhan gyi phyir dag tu //
NK044(phi)001:2402: bde ba 'dod na sdig pa mi bya ste //
NK044(phi)001:2403: byis pa bde 'dod gang zhig sdig byed na //
NK044(phi)001:2404: de yi 'bras bu so sor myong bar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:2406: de nas rgyal pos legs par gsungs pa'i tshigs bcad 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste /
NK044(phi)001:2407: 'di'i don du bdag gi bu gang+g+aa'i bye snyed btang
NK044(phi)001:2408: nas kyang tshigs bcad 'di 'dod par bya'o snyam du
NK044(phi)001:2410: lag pa g.yas pas bu bzung ste sbyin par brtsam pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2411: sha za de'i gzugs mi snang bar brgya byin nyid
NK044(phi)001:2412: du bstan nas sbyin la dpa' ba legs so zhes
NK044(phi)001:2413: basngagasa te kho bo ni brgya byin te mchog gang
NK044(phi)001:2414: 'dod slongs shig ces smras pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2415: rgyal pos skye rga na 'chi mya ngan sogs med pa'i mchog stsol cig ces byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2416: brgya byin gyis de ni bdag la dbang med de /
NK044(phi)001:2417: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'di la mnga' brnyes so //
NK044(phi)001:2419: de la rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2420: dbang phyug la yang dbang med pa dag byis pa mthong ngo cog /
NK044(phi)001:2421: brgya byin yi chad 'di ltar glang chen 'dam song nyams pa bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:2423: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po kha dog
NK044(phi)001:2424: dam pa zhes bgyi ba 'jig rten 'dir dbang bsgyur
NK044(phi)001:2425: ba'i mthu dang gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par
NK044(phi)001:2426: gyur pa des bdag gis rin po che dang longs
NK044(phi)001:2427: spyod kyis 'gro ba rnams la phan btags kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2428: dam pa'i chos kyis phan 'dogs par ma byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:2429: dam pa'i chos btsal te sems can rnams dgrol bar bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:2430: 'di ltar bkar btags te 'dzam gling 'di na su
NK044(phi)001:2431: la dam pa'i chos yod de bdag la ston par
NK044(phi)001:2432: gyur na / de'i yid la ci 'dod pa sbyin
NK044(phi)001:2433: no zhes bsgrags kyang ston nus pa su yang ma
NK044(phi)001:2434: gyur na / byung ngo // de nas rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:2435: de mya ngan gyis yid gdungs pa ngal bsos bus
NK044(phi)001:2436: thos nas sad pa'i slad du /
NK044(phi)001:2437: bdag nyid gnod sbyin 'jigs pa zhig tu sprul nas /
NK044(phi)001:2438: pho brang gi sgor su chos thos 'dod pa nga las nyon cig /
NK044(phi)001:2440: de thos pas rgyal po mgu zhing /
NK044(phi)001:2441: gnod sbyin de la phyag byas nas stan mthon po
NK044(phi)001:2442: la bzhag blon po dang 'khor mang po bsdus te
NK044(phi)001:2443: 'khod pa dang / gnod sbyin des rgyal po la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2444: chos thos pa ni shin tu dka' bas /
NK044(phi)001:2445: chos nyan par 'dod na 'di tsam gyis mi chog ste /
NK044(phi)001:2446: btsun mo dang sras kho bo la zar bcug na chos sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:2447: de nas rgyal po des btsun mo'i nang na gang phangs pa dang sras gnod sbyin la phul lo //
NK044(phi)001:2448: gnod sbyin des 'khor mang po'i nang du thams cad kyis mthong bzhin zos so //
NK044(phi)001:2449: blon po rnams kyis cho nges btab kyang rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:2450: de chos 'tshol ba'i phyir shin tu brtan pa bzlog
NK044(phi)001:2451: ma nus so // gnod sbyin des de dag zos nas /
NK044(phi)001:2452: tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2453: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste //
NK044(phi)001:2454: ji tsam skye ba sdug bsngal bcas //
NK044(phi)001:2455: lnga phung mtshan ma med pas stong //
NK044(phi)001:2456: bdag dang bdag gi ba yang med //
NK044(phi)001:2458: rgyal po dga' mgu rangs te /
NK044(phi)001:2459: ba spu'i nyag ma tsam gyi 'gyod sems ma skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:2460: de nas yi ger bris nas 'dzam bu'i gling kun
NK044(phi)001:2461: tu bsgrags te thams cad la slob du bcug go
NK044(phi)001:2462: // de nas ngal bsos bu bdag nyid kyi lus
NK044(phi)001:2463: su bsgyur nas shin tu legs so zhes basngagasa shing
NK044(phi)001:2464: sras dang btsun mo sngon bzhin du slar gtad do
NK044(phi)001:2465: // // yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzam
NK044(phi)001:2466: bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po kan shi ni ba li
NK044(phi)001:2467: zhes bya ba rgyas phran mang po la dbang bgyid
NK044(phi)001:2468: pa snying rje shin tu che bar gyur pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:2469: // // snyam du / bdag ni 'gro ba mang po'i gtso bor gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:2470: skye bo mang po 'di dag kyang bdag la mos shing dga' bas /
NK044(phi)001:2471: bdag gis dam pa'i chos kyis phan gtags par bya'o bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:2472: blon po la bkar btags te /
NK044(phi)001:2473: sus dam pa'i chos bdag la ston na ci 'dod pa sbyin no zhes bsgo ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2474: bram ze le'u du ci bya ba zhig gis bdag la chos yod do zhes smras pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2475: rgyal pos de la bkur stir byas te chos nyan 'dod pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2478: rgyal po khyod kyi lus la mar me stong btsugs
NK044(phi)001:2479: te mchod pa byed nus na bstan no zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:2480: so // de la lhag par mgu nas /
NK044(phi)001:2481: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du pho nya bkye ste /
NK044(phi)001:2482: rgyal po kan shi ni ba le da ste zhag
NK044(phi)001:2483: bdun na chos kyi phyir du lus kyi sha phug
NK044(phi)001:2484: ste mar me stong 'dzugs so zhes bsgrags pa thams
NK044(phi)001:2485: cad so so nas mya ngan gyis gdungs pas der
NK044(phi)001:2487: bdag cag thams cad ni long ba dmigs bu'am bu
NK044(phi)001:2488: chung ma la bsten pa dang 'dra bar khyod la
NK044(phi)001:2489: brten par / gal te sku la mar me stong
NK044(phi)001:2490: btsugs na nges par srog dang 'bral ba'i phyir na
NK044(phi)001:2491: bram ze gcig gi slad du 'jig rten 'di'i sems
NK044(phi)001:2492: can rnams yongs su btang ba mi rigs zhes btsun
NK044(phi)001:2493: mo dang sras rgyal tshab lnga brgya dang /
NK044(phi)001:2494: blon po khri dag gis gsol ba btab kyang rgyal
NK044(phi)001:2495: po yi dam brtan pas bzlog tu ma btub par
NK044(phi)001:2496: / nam bdag mngon par sangs rgyas pa na khyed
NK044(phi)001:2497: rnams bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras nas rgyal pos rang
NK044(phi)001:2498: gi lus phug tu bcug ste mar me'i snying po
NK044(phi)001:2499: snum gyis bskus pa stong byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:2501: sngar bdag la chos bstan nas /
NK044(phi)001:2502: de'i 'og tu mar me tshugs shig /
NK044(phi)001:2503: gal te tshe'i dus byas na chos thos par mi 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2504: bram zes tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2505: rtag pa thams cad zad par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:2506: mtho ba de yang mthar lhung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:2509: zhes pa 'di smras ma thag tu rgyal po de
NK044(phi)001:2510: dga' mgu rangs te 'gyod pa'i sems med bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:2511: / bdag chos 'tshol ba 'di sangs rgyas su sgrub pa'i phyir yin te /
NK044(phi)001:2512: phyis mngon par sangs rgyas pa na ye shes kyi
NK044(phi)001:2513: 'od kyis gti mug gis mdongs pa rnams shin tu
NK044(phi)001:2514: snang bar gyur cig ces yi dam bcas ma thag
NK044(phi)001:2515: tu / 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos so //
NK044(phi)001:2516: lha dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams nam mkha' la
NK044(phi)001:2517: lhags nas byang chub sems dpa' de lta zhing ngu
NK044(phi)001:2518: la me tog gi char kyang phab bo //
NK044(phi)001:2519: der lha'i dpang bo brgya byin gyis kyang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis basngagasa nas /
NK044(phi)001:2520: 'di skad du rgyal po chen po khyod shin tu sdug bsngal ba 'di la 'gyod pa med dam /
NK044(phi)001:2521: rgyal pos smras pa 'gyod pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:2523: 'di ltar lus 'dar zhing nyams mi bde bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:2524: 'gyod pa med ces smras pa 'di cis yid ches
NK044(phi)001:2526: gal te thog ma nas tha ma'i bar du bdag
NK044(phi)001:2527: 'gyod pa med na lus kyi rma 'di snga ma
NK044(phi)001:2529: ces smras ma thag tu sngar bzhin rma med par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2530: yang sngon 'dzam gling 'dir bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal
NK044(phi)001:2531: po chen po bying ling gar li zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:2532: gyur pas / gang dam pa'i chos ston pa la ci 'dod sbyin par dril bsgrags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2533: bram ze le'u du chu zhes bya bas khyod kyi
NK044(phi)001:2534: lus la lcags gzer stong gis btab na chos sbyin
NK044(phi)001:2536: de bzhin du khas blangs te /
NK044(phi)001:2537: yul kun du dril bsgrags pas thams cad kyis bkag kyang bzlog tu ma btub par /
NK044(phi)001:2538: dang por chos ston par bskul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2540: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ste //
NK044(phi)001:2541: skye ba thams cad sdug bsngal bcas //
NK044(phi)001:2542: chos kun stong pas bdag po med //
NK044(phi)001:2543: bdag gi ba yang yod ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:2544: zhes smras pa la mgu zhing lus la lcags gzer stong btab pas /
NK044(phi)001:2545: rgyal phran dang blon po dang 'khor mang po ngu zhing sa la 'gyel /
NK044(phi)001:2546: nam mkha'i lha rnams kyis me tog gi char phab cing mchi ma 'byin /
NK044(phi)001:2547: de nas brgya byin der 'ongs te khyod 'di ltar dka' ba byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:2548: brgya byin dang 'khor sgyur sogs 'dod dam /
NK044(phi)001:2550: bdag gis khams gsum gyi bde ba 'dod pa ma yin gyis /
NK044(phi)001:2551: bsod nams ci snyed yod pa 'di sangs rgyas 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:2554: rgyal po'i lus 'dar zhing mi bzod pa lags na /
NK044(phi)001:2555: 'di skad zer zhing 'gyod pa med ces smras pa la su zhig yid ches /
NK044(phi)001:2557: gal te 'gyod pa'i sems med na lus snga ma
NK044(phi)001:2558: bzhin du rma med par gyur cig ces smras pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2559: mod la lus snga ma ltar gyur te lha dang
NK044(phi)001:2560: mi rnams daga'o // yang sngon gyi tshe 'dzam gling
NK044(phi)001:2561: 'dir rgyal po tshangs pa'i lha zhes pa'i bu rgyal
NK044(phi)001:2562: tshab nga ma gam zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:2564: des dam pa'i chos phyogs kun tu btsal kyang ma rnyed pas yi mug pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2565: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis de'i bsam pa shes nas bram ze zhig tu sprul te /
NK044(phi)001:2566: rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor sdod cing chos yod do //
NK044(phi)001:2568: des chos ston pa la ci bzhed pa gtong bar khas blangs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2569: me'i dong zabs su khru bcu pa'i nang me mur
NK044(phi)001:2570: gyis bkang la de'i nang du mchongs te mchod pa
NK044(phi)001:2571: bya na chos bstan to zhes smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2572: de bzhin du khas blangs te me dong chen po byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2573: de'i tshe rgyal po dang btsun mo dang blon po
NK044(phi)001:2574: dang pho brang gi slas rnams yid mi bde nas
NK044(phi)001:2575: / rgyal bu dang bram ze la de ltar mi
NK044(phi)001:2576: byed par gsol ba btab ste bdag gi lus bzhed
NK044(phi)001:2577: na yang 'bul lo zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2579: bdag gis nan gyis mi byar mi rung ba ni med kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2580: rgyal bus ci bsam pa der zad de /
NK044(phi)001:2581: gal te de ltar nus na ni chos bstan la /
NK044(phi)001:2582: mi nus na mi bstan to zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2583: de'i tshe rgyal bus de ltar chos kyi ched du
NK044(phi)001:2584: da ste zhag bdun na me dong du mchong bar
