NK044(phi)001:2585: byed pas khyed cag sus mthong 'dod pa myur du
NK044(phi)001:2586: shog ces yul kun tu pho nya btang bas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:2587: phran dang 'bangs mang po lhags te /
NK044(phi)001:2588: rgyal bu la de ltar mi bgyid par gsol kyang rgyal bus smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2589: bdag ni yun ring por 'khor ba na /
NK044(phi)001:2590: lus grangs med cig 'phos par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:2591: lha dang mi'i nang du skyes pa na yang 'dod pas chog mi shes pas mnar ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2592: ngan song rnams su mi bzod pa'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs myong ste lus srog chud gsan kyang /
NK044(phi)001:2593: dam pa'i chos kyi phyir dge ba'i sems cung zad kyang bskyed ma myong bas /
NK044(phi)001:2594: da ni lus btsog pa dman pa 'di chos kyi
NK044(phi)001:2595: phyir mchod pa byed kyi bdag bla med rdzogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2596: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bar du gcod pa
NK044(phi)001:2597: ma byed cig / bdag sangs rgyas su sgrub pa'i phyir lus 'di gtong ste /
NK044(phi)001:2598: nam sangs rgyas nas khyed rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa bya'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2599: de yi dam brtan par shes nas 'khor rnams cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:2600: de nas rgyal bu me dong gi khar 'greng nas bram ze la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2601: ston pa chen po bdag la sngar dam pa'i chos ston cig /
NK044(phi)001:2602: gal te tshe'i dus byas na chos mi thos so //
NK044(phi)001:2604: bram ze des tshigs bcad 'di smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2605: byams pa'i sems ni goms par bya //
NK044(phi)001:2606: zhe sdang khro ba'i 'du shes spangs //
NK044(phi)001:2607: snying rje chen pos sems can skyobs //
NK044(phi)001:2608: kun la snying brtses mchi ma gzags //
NK044(phi)001:2609: dga' ba chen po goms par bya //
NK044(phi)001:2610: gzhan la'ang bdag dang mthun pa'i chos //
NK044(phi)001:2611: byang chub sems kyis bskyab pa ni //
NK044(phi)001:2612: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod par ldan //
NK044(phi)001:2613: zhes pa 'di smras ma thag tu me dong du mchongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2614: brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i rgyal pos lag pa ya re nas zin te /
NK044(phi)001:2615: 'di skad ces 'dzam gling gi 'gro ba thams cad
NK044(phi)001:2616: rgyal po khyod kyi bka' drin gyis mi bde ba'i
NK044(phi)001:2617: bag med la / da me dong du mchongs na
NK044(phi)001:2618: 'bangs thams cad kyi pha ma tshe 'phos pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2619: 'dra bas ci'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad yongs su
NK044(phi)001:2620: btang ste me dong du mchong zhes smras pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2621: bag med la / / rgyal bu des lha'i rgyal po dang 'khor mang po la bltas te /
NK044(phi)001:2622: khyod kyis bdag bla med byang chub tu sems bskyed
NK044(phi)001:2623: pa'i bar du gcod pa'i las ma byed cig ces
NK044(phi)001:2624: smras pa dang thams cad mi smra bar gyur la
NK044(phi)001:2625: / de ma thag tu me dong du mchongs so //
NK044(phi)001:2626: de'i tshe gnam sa rab tu g.yos shing bar snang
NK044(phi)001:2627: gi lha rnams ngus pa'i mchi ma char bzhin babs
NK044(phi)001:2628: so // me dong de yang me tog gi rdzing
NK044(phi)001:2629: bur gyur te rgyal bu de pad+ma'i steng du 'dug
NK044(phi)001:2630: pa la lha rnams kyis me tog gi char pus
NK044(phi)001:2631: mo nub tsam du phab bo //
NK044(phi)001:2632: gzhan yang sngon gyi dus na yul w+aa ra na s+ai 'dir drang srong lnga brgya zhig gnas te /
NK044(phi)001:2633: der bcom ldan 'das nyid de dag gi ston pa
NK044(phi)001:2634: ud pa la zhes bya bar gyur pas bram ze
NK044(phi)001:2635: zhig las chos thob pa'i slad du /
NK044(phi)001:2636: bram ze des bsgos pa bzhin du rang gi pags pa bshus nas shog shog tu byas /
NK044(phi)001:2637: rus pa ni smyu gur byas te tshigs su bcad pa 'di mnyan pa /
NK044(phi)001:2638: lus kyi spyod pa rab bsdam zhing //
NK044(phi)001:2639: srog gcod rku dang g.yem mi bya //
NK044(phi)001:2640: ngan par lta ba kun spangs na //
NK044(phi)001:2641: byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:2642: zhes pa 'di yi ger bris nas 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu bsgrags te /
NK044(phi)001:2643: mi mang po thams cad la nan tan byed du bcug par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2644: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po gzugs bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:2645: rgyal srid chos bzhin bskyangs zhing gtong ba chen pos thams cad tshims par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2646: de la btsun mo mdzes ldan ma zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:2647: gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug pa zhig yod pa
NK044(phi)001:2648: de la / bu gcig pa mdzes ldan zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:2649: ba sdug cing yid du 'ong ba gcig yod do
NK044(phi)001:2650: de la / // rgyal po de chos 'dod pas
NK044(phi)001:2651: yul thams cad du chos btsal kyang ma rnyed de
NK044(phi)001:2652: de la / // / sangs rgyas 'jig rten du
NK044(phi)001:2653: byung na chos 'byung gis da lta mi rnyed do
NK044(phi)001:2654: de la / // / zhes smras so // der
NK044(phi)001:2655: rgyal pos gser 'bum yod pa'i snod rgyal mtshan gyi
NK044(phi)001:2657: chos smra ba gang yin pa de la sbyin zhing
NK044(phi)001:2658: bkur sti chen po bya'o zhes dril bsgrags kyang su
NK044(phi)001:2659: yang ma byung nas rgyal po chos kyi phyir gdung
NK044(phi)001:2660: zhing yi chad pa de la /
NK044(phi)001:2661: lha'i dbang pos bgam pa'i phyir gnod sbyin mi sdug
NK044(phi)001:2662: pa'i gzugs su sprul nas chos bstan no byas pa
NK044(phi)001:2663: la dga' nas chos mnyan par 'dod kyang gnod sbyin
NK044(phi)001:2664: des bdag bkres pas 'phral du bsad pa'i mi yi
NK044(phi)001:2665: sha khrag zas dgos so zhes smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2666: rgyal po des bdag lan gcig chos dang 'phrad na
NK044(phi)001:2667: de yang rin thang gdab tu med pas nyo dgos
NK044(phi)001:2669: gzhon nu mdzes ldan gyis bdag gnod sbyin la sbyin du gsol zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2670: rgyal pos bu sdug cing mi mthun pa med pa
NK044(phi)001:2671: de byin pas gnod sbyin des rdzu 'phrul gyis khye'u'i
NK044(phi)001:2672: yan lag dang nying lag rnams so sor bcad de
NK044(phi)001:2674: rgyal po chos 'dod pa'i phyir mi dga' bar ma gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2675: gnod sbyin gyis rgyal pos da dung ma 'grangs so zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:2676: rgyal pos snying du sdug pa'i chung ma yang byin pas sngar ltar zos so //
NK044(phi)001:2677: kye rgyal po da dung nga ma 'grangs so //
NK044(phi)001:2678: rgyal pos smras pa ngas bu dang chung ma byin na da ci 'dod /
NK044(phi)001:2680: rang gi lus byin dang 'grang bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:2682: gal te nga'i lus byin nas ji ltar chos mnyan par bya /
NK044(phi)001:2683: sngar chos ston dang de thos pa'i 'og tu lus gtang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:2684: de nas gnod sbyin des dam bsgrags nas chos bstan pa /
NK044(phi)001:2685: sdug pa dag las mya ngan skye //
NK044(phi)001:2686: sdug pa dag las 'jigs pa skye //
NK044(phi)001:2687: 'jigs pa dag las rnam grol rnams //
NK044(phi)001:2688: mya ngan med na ga la 'jigs //
NK044(phi)001:2689: tshigs su bcad pa 'di thos pas yid rab tu
NK044(phi)001:2690: dga' nas nga'i lus ci 'dod par gyis zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:2691: pa la rgyal po de bsam pa bla med las
NK044(phi)001:2692: mi g.yo bar rigs nas brgya byin mchog tu dga'
NK044(phi)001:2693: zhing rang gi lus bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:2694: lag pa g.yas pas bu dang /
NK044(phi)001:2695: g.yon pas chung ma bzung nas slar gtad de bstod cing basngagasa so //
NK044(phi)001:2696: rgyal pos kyang brgya byin la bdag gi chos kyi
NK044(phi)001:2697: bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa legs so
NK044(phi)001:2698: zhes smras so // yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:2699: tshangs byin zhes pa chos bzhin byed pa'i btsun mo
NK044(phi)001:2700: dang dam pa'i mngal du bu chags pa na ma
NK044(phi)001:2701: des legs par gsungs pa nyan 'dod skyes pa rgyal
NK044(phi)001:2702: po la smras shing mtshan mkhan rnams kyis mngal na
NK044(phi)001:2703: gnas pa de'i mthur smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2704: rgyal pos gser srang 'bum bskur te phyogs thams cad
NK044(phi)001:2705: du legs par gsungs pa btsal kyang ma rnyed do
NK044(phi)001:2706: // de nas dus su khye'u lta na sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:2707: zhig btsas pa la ming legs gsungs tshol zhes btags
NK044(phi)001:2708: // so // de cher skyes pa na legs gsungs
NK044(phi)001:2709: btsal kyang ma rnyed la nam zhig yab 'das nas
NK044(phi)001:2710: rgyal srid la bzhag pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2711: des blon po rnams la legs gsungs tshol zhes bsgos
NK044(phi)001:2712: pa bzhin gser srang 'bum bskur te 'dzam bu'i gling
NK044(phi)001:2713: thams cad du btsal kyang ma rnyed nas /
NK044(phi)001:2714: rgyal po de re bas yongs su gdung ba lha'i
NK044(phi)001:2715: dbang pos shes nas bgam pa'i phyir gnod sbyin mi
NK044(phi)001:2716: sdug pa'i gzugs su bsgyur ba /
NK044(phi)001:2717: rgyal po de'i mdun du 'dug ste smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2718: legs par spyad pa'i chos spyad bya //
NK044(phi)001:2719: nyes spyad de ni spyad mi bya //
NK044(phi)001:2721: pha rol tu yang bde bar gnas /
NK044(phi)001:2722: de thos pas rgyal po rab tu dga' ste smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2723: gsang ba pa tshigs bcad de yang smros shig mnyan par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:2725: bdag gis smras pa bzhin byed na slad nas smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:2726: rgyal pos smras pa ci zhig bya /
NK044(phi)001:2728: nyin zhag bdun du seng lding gi shing dag me dong du bus nas /
NK044(phi)001:2729: der bdag nyid mchongs na de'i 'og tu bdag gis tshigs bcad de yang smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:2730: de thos pas rgyal po dga' nas de bzhin bya'o zhes byes shing /
NK044(phi)001:2731: yul thams cad du dril bsgrags te /
NK044(phi)001:2732: zhag bdun song tshe rgyal po legs gsungs nyan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2733: phyir me dong du bdag nyid 'dor na gang ya
NK044(phi)001:2734: mtshan lta bar 'dod pa de dag shog cig ces
NK044(phi)001:2735: byas pas srog chags brgya stong du ma dang nam
NK044(phi)001:2736: mkha'i ngos la lha mang po yang 'dus shing byang
NK044(phi)001:2737: chub sems dpa'i lhag bsam shes nas ya mtshan lta
NK044(phi)001:2739: de nas gnod sbyin nam mkhar 'phags te byang chub
NK044(phi)001:2740: sems dpa' la rgyal po chen po ji ltar dam
NK044(phi)001:2741: bcas pa bzhin mdzod cig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2742: de nas rgyal po des gzhon nu thu bo rgyal srid la bzhag ste /
NK044(phi)001:2743: blon po dang yul mi rnams la bzod par gsol zhing skye bo'i tshogs kyang dbugs phyung nas /
NK044(phi)001:2744: me dong gi drung du song ste /
NK044(phi)001:2745: me dong rab tu 'jigs pa 'dir chos kyi phyir
NK044(phi)001:2746: 'dzem med du mchongs na bdag gi bsod nams mthu
NK044(phi)001:2747: yis 'dir pad+ma'i mtsho ltar bsil ba'i bden tshig gi
NK044(phi)001:2748: tshigs bcad brjod de mchongs pas me dong de pad+mas
NK044(phi)001:2749: gang ba'i mtsho bsil bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2750: lha'i dbang pos rgyal po de'i ya mtshan gyis lha
NK044(phi)001:2751: dang mi rnams dad par byed pa'i brtson 'grus de
NK044(phi)001:2752: mthong nas gnod sbyin gyi gzugs mi snang bar rang
NK044(phi)001:2754: legs par spyad pa'i chos spyad bya /
NK044(phi)001:2755: zhes sogs sngar gyi tshigs bcad de slar yang smras
NK044(phi)001:2756: pa rgyal pos bzung nas gser gyi glegs bu la
NK044(phi)001:2757: bris te 'dzam bu'i gling kun tu bskur zhing spel
NK044(phi)001:2758: bar byas so // de ltar rgyal po legs gsungs tshol ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:2759: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid gzhon nu chos yongs su tshol ba zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:2760: legs par smras pa ji snyed thos pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:2761: bris shing blangs la brjod de thams cad bzung ngo
NK044(phi)001:2762: // de nas yang grong dang grong khyer thams cad du chos yongs su chol ba na /
NK044(phi)001:2763: mi gcig ri'i bya skyibs na 'dug pas kho bos
NK044(phi)001:2764: khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2765: gtam bya'o // des rab tu dga' ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:2767: rin thang med par chos mi ston no //
NK044(phi)001:2769: gos rin thang bye ba phrag nyi shu ri ba lus la gyon pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2770: nor bu rin thang bye ba phrag bzhi bcu ri
NK044(phi)001:2771: ba lus la btags pa de byin kyang da dung
NK044(phi)001:2772: ri'i bya skyibs 'di nas lus bor na bstan no
NK044(phi)001:2773: zhes smras pa la de bzhin du dam bcas te
NK044(phi)001:2774: / mtshan dang ldan pa'i tshigs bcad gcig bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2775: lus ri'i rtse nas bor te ma smad ma rmas
NK044(phi)001:2776: pa'i bden pa'i byin rlabs byas pas rgyal po bzhis
NK044(phi)001:2777: bzung nas bde bar phyin pa mthong ste de'i ngo
NK044(phi)001:2778: mtshar la basngagasa pa brjod do //
NK044(phi)001:2779: yang sngon gyi tshe na b+aa r+aa na s+air rgyal
NK044(phi)001:2780: po tshangs byin gyi yul du bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK044(phi)001:2781: khyim bdag zas gtsang ma zhes bya ba rnam thos
NK044(phi)001:2782: kyi bu'i nor dang 'gran nus par gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:2783: / des rgya mtshor song nas nor bsgrubs pas skye bo rnams kyi re ba rdzogs par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2784: nam zhig na rin po che'i gling gzhan nas 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:2785: pa'i mu tig gi do shal mchog tu mdzes pa
NK044(phi)001:2786: zhig bzung nas rgyal po la skyes su phul bas
NK044(phi)001:2787: rgyal po mnyes par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2788: de'i tshe na rgyal po de'i bu mo dbyangs can
NK044(phi)001:2789: ma zhes pas legs par bshad pa'i tshig glur blangs
NK044(phi)001:2790: pa thos pas khyim bdag de dga' bas ba spu
NK044(phi)001:2791: langs bzhin rang gi khyim du song ste zas sogs
NK044(phi)001:2792: ci la'ang mi chags par legs bshad 'ba' zhig yid
NK044(phi)001:2793: la byed cing / bdag gis lo bcu gnyis su rin po che'i tshogs rgya chen po thob kyang /
NK044(phi)001:2794: legs par bshad pa'i rin po che ci yang ma thob pas /
NK044(phi)001:2795: tshogs chen pos thob pa'i rdo ba 'di dag gis ci bya snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:2796: legs bshad ni rin po che yang dag pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:2797: snyam nas rgyal po'i bu mo la legs bshad sbyin par zhu ba'i mi zhig mngags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2799: legs bshad ni rin gyis thob par 'gyur bas /
NK044(phi)001:2800: ji srid khyod kyi lo bcu gnyis su bsgrubs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2801: rin po che'i tshogs rnams gtong na legs bshad sbyin
NK044(phi)001:2803: khyim bdag de shin tu gus pas lo bcu gnyis
NK044(phi)001:2804: su bsgrubs pa'i rin po che thams cad blangs nas
NK044(phi)001:2805: rang nyid rgyal po'i khyim du song ste legs bshad
NK044(phi)001:2807: khyim bdag de la rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2808: legs bshad kyis sa steng gang la /
NK044(phi)001:2809: nor ni tshigs chen pos bsgrub dgos pas khyod kyis 'di ltar ci'i phyir byas /
NK044(phi)001:2810: zas dang bral na legs bshad zar rung ngam /
NK044(phi)001:2812: chags sdang skyed pa'i rin chen gyis ci zhig bya /
NK044(phi)001:2813: gang thos pas nyes pa sel zhing yon tan 'grub
NK044(phi)001:2814: pa'i legs bshad kyi rin du sa chen po rin
NK044(phi)001:2815: po ches bkang yang chung zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:2816: legs bshad de dag gser gyi glegs bu la bris nas phyogs su bkram par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:2817: de'i tshe legs bshad smra ba'i rgyal po'i bu mo ni sh+aa ri'i bu nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:2818: yang sngon rgyal po'i pho brang bzhi ldan zhes par
NK044(phi)001:2819: bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po shi bi zhes byar
NK044(phi)001:2820: gyur ba'i tshe chos bzhin du rgyal srid byed pa
NK044(phi)001:2821: ci 'dod pa'i sbyin pa stsal zhing nad pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:2822: dang mgon med pa rnams la rim gro byed pa
NK044(phi)001:2823: sems can rnams dge bcur bkod pas lha'i gnas 'phel
NK044(phi)001:2824: bar gyur la / brgya byin gyis de sad pa'i phyir srin po'i gzugs su sprul te /
NK044(phi)001:2825: rgyal po'i khang bzang gi steng du 'dug nas /
NK044(phi)001:2826: kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
NK044(phi)001:2827: skye zhing 'jig pa'i chos can yin /
NK044(phi)001:2829: rgyal po des mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo phye zhing byang chub kyi lam bstan no snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:2830: de la thal mo sbyar te grogs po tshigs bcad de smros shig ces byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2832: bdag bkres pas mi'i sha khrag dron mo ster na smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:2833: rgyal po des gzhan la gnod pa byed mi rigs
NK044(phi)001:2834: kyis legs par smras pa'i phyir rang gi lus sbyin
NK044(phi)001:2837: kye ma 'du byed rnams mi rtag /
NK044(phi)001:2838: skye zhing 'jigs pa'i chos can yin //
NK044(phi)001:2840: de dag nye bar zhi ba bde //
NK044(phi)001:2842: rgyal po des zhib tu bsams zhing 'di ni mya
NK044(phi)001:2843: ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo dang lam ste lam 'dis
NK044(phi)001:2844: sangs rgyas thams cad nges par 'byung ngo snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:2845: mtshon blangs te legs par smras pa'i yon bzhes shig
NK044(phi)001:2846: ces rang gi brang sogs sha thams cad byin kyang
NK044(phi)001:2847: de ma 'grangs pa'i tshe lus thams cad sbyin no
NK044(phi)001:2848: snyam du / bla med byang chub kyi phyir smon
NK044(phi)001:2849: lam btab nas bdag gi lus 'di sbyin no zhes
NK044(phi)001:2850: smras pa'i tshe sa rnam pa drug tu g.yos shing
NK044(phi)001:2851: snyam du / / lhas me tog gi char phab bo //
NK044(phi)001:2852: de nas brgya byin gyis bdag gis 'di'i lus snga ma kho na bzhin bsgyur mi nus kyi /
NK044(phi)001:2853: 'di nyid kyi spro ba tshod zin par skyed dgos so snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:2854: khyod 'di ltar sha rnams gcod pa la mi dga' ba ma skyes sam /
NK044(phi)001:2855: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:2856: bdag cung zad mi dga' ba med de /
NK044(phi)001:2857: dmyal ba sogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams la snying rje'i dbang du 'gyur te zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2861: bden pa bskul bas yid ches so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:2863: 'o na khyod kyis bden pa bskul bas lus snga ma kho na bzhin du gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:2865: 'di ltar sha rnams btang bas sems cung zad kyang
NK044(phi)001:2866: mi dga' ba med cing sdug bsngal ba'i sems can
NK044(phi)001:2867: rnams la snying rje'i dbang du gyur na /
NK044(phi)001:2868: bden pa des bdag gi lus snga ma kho na
NK044(phi)001:2869: bzhin du gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu sngar
NK044(phi)001:2871: brgya byin yi rangs nas brgya byin rang gi gzugs su bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:2872: bdag gis khyod la gnod pa'i bsam pas ma yin gyis /
NK044(phi)001:2873: khyod spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir dga' bar byas par zad de /
NK044(phi)001:2874: khyod brtson 'grus 'di lta bus gdon mi za bar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi /
NK044(phi)001:2875: de'i tshe bdag dran par mdzod cig ces byas nas mi snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:2876: yang shi bi pa gnyis pa ni gleng gzhi sngar 'dra ba las /
NK044(phi)001:2878: khyod nga'i slob mar byas pas ci la phan /
NK044(phi)001:2879: nga khyod la gnod pa zhig zer gyi de khyod kyis byed phod na ni tshigs bcad smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:2880: byang chub sems dpas gnod pa ci zer kyang byed
NK044(phi)001:2881: par khas blangs nas tshigs sngar bzhin brjod pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:2882: khab sor bzhi pa stong shing leb la btsugs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2883: bar du bdag nyid nyal te 'tshir ba'i dka' ba
NK044(phi)001:2884: spyod bzhin bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab
NK044(phi)001:2885: bo // der sa g.yo ba sogs dang bden pa'i
NK044(phi)001:2886: stobs kyis lus sngar bzhin gyur pa snga mar smros
NK044(phi)001:2887: pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:2888: yang sngon bskal pa tshad med mtha' yas pa 'das pa'i dus na /
NK044(phi)001:2889: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:2890: bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo 'di ston pa
NK044(phi)001:2891: na / bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:2892: dpar gyur pas thos te dga' nas mchod pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:2893: bya snyam na yang dbul bas yo byad ci yang
NK044(phi)001:2894: mi bdog ste lus gtsong bar byas kyang bsod nams
NK044(phi)001:2896: phyir khyim du song ba na mi zhig dang 'phrad
NK044(phi)001:2897: de de la lus 'di btsong na mi nyo'am zhes
NK044(phi)001:2898: smras pa dang / des bdag la las shig yod de sus kyang byed mi nus pas /
NK044(phi)001:2899: gal te khyod de ltar nus na bdag gis nyo bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:2900: de ci ltar dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2901: bdag la nad ma rungs pa zhig yod de sman
NK044(phi)001:2902: pa mkhas pas nyin re zhing mi'i sha srang gsum
NK044(phi)001:2903: zos na phan zhes zer bas de ltar nus na
NK044(phi)001:2904: kho bos gser gyi dong tshe lnga sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:2905: de skad thos pas dga' ste /
NK044(phi)001:2906: khyod kyis nga la dong tse byin la zhag bdun
NK044(phi)001:2907: bshol cig dang nga'i bya ba byas nas khyod ci
NK044(phi)001:2909: zhag bdun ni mi rung gis /
NK044(phi)001:2911: des dong tse blangs te sangs rgyas gang na bar
NK044(phi)001:2912: song zhing phyag byas te ci bdog pa ma lus
NK044(phi)001:2913: par phul / sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di nyan to //
NK044(phi)001:2914: de'i tshe dbang po rtul bas mdo sde 'di thos kyang /
NK044(phi)001:2915: tshig bzhi pa gcig 'ba' zhig zin par gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:2916: de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan 'da' ba ni //
NK044(phi)001:2917: 'khor ba thams cad yongs su bcad pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:2918: gang gis rtse gcig sems kyis rab mnyan na //
NK044(phi)001:2919: tshad med bde ba rtag tu thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:2920: zhes pa bzung nas phyir nad pa'i khyim du song
NK044(phi)001:2921: ste nyin re bzhin sha srang gsum re bcad kyang
NK044(phi)001:2922: tshigs bcad 'di yid la byas pa'i rgyus na bar
NK044(phi)001:2923: ma gyur to // nyin gcig kyang bar ma chad
NK044(phi)001:2924: par zla ba gcig gi bar du de ltar byin
NK044(phi)001:2926: de'i lus kyang sngon bzhin gyur pas dga' ste bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:2927: tshigs bcad gcig gi mthus kyang de ltar nus na
NK044(phi)001:2928: yongs su rdzogs par lta ci smos te mdo sde
NK044(phi)001:2929: 'di la de lta bu'i phan pa yod par mthong
NK044(phi)001:2930: nas sems lhag par bskyed de ma 'ongs pa'i dus
NK044(phi)001:2931: na sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob cing mtshan yang
NK044(phi)001:2932: sh+aakya thub pa zhes bya bar gyur cig ces smon
NK044(phi)001:2933: lam btab nas / lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po la yang bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:2934: yang sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa ches
NK044(phi)001:2935: grangs med pa'i snga rol na bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK044(phi)001:2936: drang srong chen po mchog ces bya ba /
NK044(phi)001:2937: nags dang ri la gnas pa mngon shes lnga dang
NK044(phi)001:2938: ldan pa rtag tu byams pa dang snying rje la
NK044(phi)001:2939: gnas pa zhig tu gyur pa des 'di snyam du
NK044(phi)001:2940: / bdag byams pa la gnas pa 'dis ni sems can rnams la dga' ba skyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:2941: bskal pa mtha' yas pa nas bsags pa'i dug gsum
NK044(phi)001:2942: sogs nyon mongs rnams zhi bar byed mi nus la
NK044(phi)001:2943: / 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed mi nus so snyam zhing /
NK044(phi)001:2944: yang 'phags pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba gang las skye snyam du rtog pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2946: so so rang gi tshul bzhin yid la byed pa 'di gnyis rgyu yin no snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:2947: des legs par gsungs pa'i chos yongs su tshol ba'i
NK044(phi)001:2948: phyir grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:2949: du song nas btsal kyang chos ma rnyed pa la
NK044(phi)001:2950: / der bdud ris kyi lha zhig gis de'i thad du song ste /
NK044(phi)001:2951: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i mtshan gyi tshigs bcad gcig bzung ba yod pas /
NK044(phi)001:2952: gal te khyod rang gi lus las pags pa bshus
NK044(phi)001:2953: te nyi ma la bskams pa shog bur byas nas
NK044(phi)001:2954: / rang gi khrag dang sbyar ba'i snag tsha byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:2955: rang gi rus pas smyu gu byas te tshigs bcad de 'bri na sbyin no zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:2957: bdag 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe 'dod pa dang nor la sogs pa'i phyir du /
NK044(phi)001:2958: rgyal po dang dgra dang gshed ma rnams kyis lus
NK044(phi)001:2959: dum bur bcad pa thob kyang des sems can su'i
NK044(phi)001:2961: da res snying po med pa'i lus kyis chos rnyed
NK044(phi)001:2962: par 'gyur ba ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par
NK044(phi)001:2963: rnyed do snyam du dga' zhing yi rangs te /
NK044(phi)001:2964: lha de la slob dpon gyi 'du shes bskyed nas
NK044(phi)001:2965: mtshon rnon pos rang gi lus las pags pa bshus
NK044(phi)001:2966: pa nyi ma la bskams pas shog bur byas /
NK044(phi)001:2967: lus kyi khrag byung ba snag tshar sbyar /
NK044(phi)001:2968: rus pa phyungs te smyu gur byas nas lha de la thal mo sbyar te /
NK044(phi)001:2969: tshigs bcad de ston par gsol ba btab pa na /
NK044(phi)001:2970: bdud ris kyi lha des drang srong chen po mchog
NK044(phi)001:2971: de'i gus pa don gnyer de lta bu mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:2972: gnong gnong ltar byas te de nyid du mi snang
NK044(phi)001:2973: bar gyur to // drang srong mchog des de mi snang bar gyur par rigs nas bsams pa /
NK044(phi)001:2974: bdag gis tshigs bcad de ma thos su zin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:2975: chos la gus pas shog snag smyu gu 'di ltar
NK044(phi)001:2976: byas pa'i dge rtsa 'di chud mi za zhing mi
NK044(phi)001:2978: 'on kyang bdag gi lhag bsam g.yo med pas sems
NK044(phi)001:2979: can thams cad la snying rje'i sems kyis lus srog
NK044(phi)001:2980: la mi lta bar 'di ltar pags pa shog bur
NK044(phi)001:2981: byas pa sogs chos la gus pa'i bden pa dang
NK044(phi)001:2982: bden pa'i tshig des 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang
NK044(phi)001:2983: gzhan dag na chos gsung zhing ston pa'i bdag nyid
NK044(phi)001:2984: chen po su bzhugs pa de dag gis bdag la
NK044(phi)001:2985: zhal bstan nas bdag gis chos thos par mdzad du
NK044(phi)001:2986: gsol zhes smras ma thag tu /
NK044(phi)001:2987: skad cig de nyid la 'og gi phyogs su sangs
NK044(phi)001:2988: rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sum
NK044(phi)001:2990: 'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:2991: bar de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par grags
NK044(phi)001:2992: pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'tsho zhing chos ston
NK044(phi)001:2993: pa des drang srong chen po de'i lhag pa'i bsam
NK044(phi)001:2994: pa thugs su chud cing des 'dzam gling gi sems
NK044(phi)001:2995: can yang smin par gzigs nas /
NK044(phi)001:2996: byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang thabs gcig drang
NK044(phi)001:2997: srong de'i mdun du gshegs shing snang ba chen pos
NK044(phi)001:2998: khyab pa dang / me tog gi char chen po babs so //
NK044(phi)001:2999: nags de'i shing gi yal ga lo 'bras me tog
NK044(phi)001:3000: thams cad las chos ston pa'i sgra rang byung ngo
NK044(phi)001:3001: // de'i tshe lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'dus par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3002: sangs rgyas de'i 'od kyis reg ma thag tu drang
NK044(phi)001:3003: srong de'i lus snga ma kho na bzhin du gyur
NK044(phi)001:3004: te rma yang med par kha dog dang ldan par
NK044(phi)001:3005: gyur to // drang srong des sangs rgyas kyi zhabs
NK044(phi)001:3006: la phyag 'tshal nas bskor ba byas shing thal mo
NK044(phi)001:3007: sbyar bas bcom ldan 'das ni bdag gi ston pa
NK044(phi)001:3008: gyur to // lags so // bdag ni sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o //
NK044(phi)001:3009: ci nas bdag gis chos thos nas sems can rnams
NK044(phi)001:3010: kyi log par lta ba'i mun pa bsal zhing yang
NK044(phi)001:3011: dag pa'i lta ba thob pa'i chos bstan du gsol
NK044(phi)001:3013: de bzhin gshegs pa des 'khor de dag la bsod
NK044(phi)001:3014: nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin las brtsams
NK044(phi)001:3016: gzhan yang rdo rje'i tshig brgyad dang /
NK044(phi)001:3017: chos kyi sgo'i tshig brgyad dang sa bon gyi tshig
NK044(phi)001:3018: brgyad kyang bstan pas drang srong mchog de spobs pa
NK044(phi)001:3020: mi brjed pa'i dran pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3021: lhas yongs su bzung bas bdud phyir rgol ba yang choms nas /
NK044(phi)001:3022: grong dang grong khyer la sogs pa thams cad du
NK044(phi)001:3023: lo stong du chos bstan de sems can tshad med
NK044(phi)001:3025: sangs rgyas dri ma med par grags pa'i rgyal po'i zhing du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:3026: rgyas par ni bsod nams thams cad bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdor shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:3027: yang sngon de bzhin gshegs pa nyid 'khor los sgyur
NK044(phi)001:3028: ba'i rgyal por gyur pas bya rgod kyi phung po'i
NK044(phi)001:3029: ri 'di nyid du yang sangs rgyas grangs med dpag
NK044(phi)001:3030: tu med pa rnams la bskal pa bye ba khrag
NK044(phi)001:3031: khrig brgya stong du mar me tog dang spos dang
NK044(phi)001:3032: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sogs dang rol mo sna
NK044(phi)001:3033: tshogs dang rin po che'i gtsug lag khang rnam par
NK044(phi)001:3034: bkra ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i
NK044(phi)001:3035: bkod pa thams cad kyis bkur sti byas te chos
NK044(phi)001:3036: thams cad kyi rang bzhin mnyam pa nyid rnam par
NK044(phi)001:3037: spros pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di rgyas par thos shing
NK044(phi)001:3038: bzung bris bklags shing bsgoms te gzhan dag la yang
NK044(phi)001:3040: sangs rgyas de dag gi tha ma s+aa la'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:3041: po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe lo 'bum
NK044(phi)001:3042: phrag bdun cu rtsa drug tu bzhugs pa de la
NK044(phi)001:3043: / lo bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad du lha'i
NK044(phi)001:3044: tsan dan rin po che'i gtsug lag khang bye ba
NK044(phi)001:3045: sogs kyis mchod cing rim gror byas nas rab tu
NK044(phi)001:3046: byung ste lo bye ba stong phrag bcu bzhi ting
NK044(phi)001:3047: nge 'dzin 'di bzung zhing bris te bklags shing bsgoms
NK044(phi)001:3048: / la / gzhan la rgya cher bstan par mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:3049: gzhan yang ting 'dzin 'di'i phyir mgo dang rkang lag
NK044(phi)001:3050: dang chung ma dang bu dang rin po che dang
NK044(phi)001:3051: bza' bca' la sogs pa sngon chad ma btang pa
NK044(phi)001:3053: sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stong dang /
NK044(phi)001:3054: de las lhag pa gang+g+aa'i bye ma snyed bya rgod
NK044(phi)001:3055: phung po 'dir bzhugs nas ting 'dzin 'di ston pa
NK044(phi)001:3056: de thams cad mtshan mthun par sh+aakya thub pa zhes
NK044(phi)001:3057: bya la / de'i mchog zung dang rim gro ba
NK044(phi)001:3058: sogs kyi mtshan kyang da lta'i sh+aa ri'i bu sogs
NK044(phi)001:3059: su mthun pa sha stag la /
NK044(phi)001:3060: de thams cad snyigs ma'i dus su byung ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:3061: las ting nge 'dzin thos shing nan tan byas so
NK044(phi)001:3062: zhes dang / gzhan yang mtha' yas dbyangs dang rnam
NK044(phi)001:3063: par grags pa'i dbyangs sogs sangs rgyas mang po las
NK044(phi)001:3064: ting nge 'dzin 'di bzung ba'i tshul zla ba sgron
NK044(phi)001:3065: me'i mdo las gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:3066: gzhan yang ri bong du gyur pa'i tshe drang srong
NK044(phi)001:3067: zhig las chos 'dod pa'i ched du me nang du
NK044(phi)001:3068: mchongs pa dang / rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe rngon
NK044(phi)001:3069: pa zhig la chos kyi tshigs bcad phyed kyi ched
NK044(phi)001:3070: du lus kyi rgyan thams cad byin cing lus g.yang
NK044(phi)001:3072: rgyal po'i bu mo ye shes ldan du gyur pas
NK044(phi)001:3073: chos smra ba'i nad gso ba'i phyir rang gi sha
NK044(phi)001:3074: las zhal zas sbyar ba la sogs pas mtshon nas
NK044(phi)001:3075: / de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gyi tshe dam pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3076: chos kyi slad du lus dang srog dang rgyal srid
NK044(phi)001:3077: sogs ma btang ba gang yang med la /
NK044(phi)001:3078: tshigs bcad phyed gcig gi ched du lus la mar
NK044(phi)001:3079: me stong btsugs te sbar ba'i mar me'i 'od las
NK044(phi)001:3080: tshigs bcad de'i phyed kyang rdzogs par thos pa sogs
NK044(phi)001:3081: shin tu dka' ba tshad med par mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:3082: de ltar sngon bskal pa tshad med par sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:3083: chen po khyad du bsad pa sogs kyis dam pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3084: chos yongs su tshol bar mdzad pa 'di ni dngos
NK044(phi)001:3085: su chos phyir dka' spyad bzod pa'i bzod pa yang
NK044(phi)001:3086: yin / dge ba chos sdud kyi tshul khrims kyang yin /
NK044(phi)001:3087: go cha dang sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rlabs po che'ang yin /
NK044(phi)001:3088: chos kyi phyir gtong ba'ang yin /
NK044(phi)001:3089: thos pa'i shes rab bskyed pa'ang yin la /
NK044(phi)001:3090: brgyud nas sems can rnams la chos kyi sbyin pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3091: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan gyi rgyur yang
NK044(phi)001:3092: 'gyur bas pha rol tu phyin pa drug ldan du
NK044(phi)001:3093: 'gyur ba de bzhin phar phyin gzhan rnams kyi skabs
NK044(phi)001:3094: su yang dngos dang brgyud nas phar phyin drug tshang
NK044(phi)001:3095: zhing byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad sems
NK044(phi)001:3096: kyi sgo nas phar phyin drug ldan yin par shes
NK044(phi)001:3097: par bya'o // chos tshol gyi skabs so //
NK044(phi)001:3098: sngon 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po tshangs byin zhes
NK044(phi)001:3099: bya ba chos kyi rgyal po zhig gi mdun na
NK044(phi)001:3100: 'don de'i sras su bcom ldan 'das 'di 'khrungs pa
NK044(phi)001:3101: na rkang lag d+r+wa bas 'brel ba'i phyir de'i ming
NK044(phi)001:3102: rkang lag d+r+wa ba can zhes bya bar btags so
NK044(phi)001:3103: // phyis su yang de la gcung rkang lag d+r+wa ba med pa zhig btsas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3104: rkang lag d+r+wa ba med pa zhes btags so //
NK044(phi)001:3105: gcen d+r+wa ba can des bdag kyang mdun na 'don
NK044(phi)001:3106: du gyur na mi rung zhes pha'i gan du song
NK044(phi)001:3107: ste rab tu 'byung bar zhus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3108: phas gang gi phyir mchod sbyin sogs byed pa'i mdun
NK044(phi)001:3109: na 'don de khyod kyi lag tu 'ong na ci'i
NK044(phi)001:3112: nags na gnas pa sla'i mkhas pas rgyal srid kyi
NK044(phi)001:3113: phyir srid par gsad bcad sogs kyi las byar mi
NK044(phi)001:3114: rung ba'i tshigs bcad smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3115: phas kyang nan gyis 'bad par shes nas gnang bas /
NK044(phi)001:3116: drang srong rnams kyi nang du song ste rab tu
NK044(phi)001:3117: byung nas bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu mnyam par
NK044(phi)001:3118: bzhag pas mngon shes lnga bskyed par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3119: gcung rkang lag d+r+wa ba med pa de yang gsang tshig tshol du yul gzhan du song ba /
NK044(phi)001:3120: lho yi ri brag na bram ze zhig 'dug pa
NK044(phi)001:3121: des rang la bu mo zhig yod pa de 'di
NK044(phi)001:3122: ni rigs dang nor gyi phyir mi sbyin gyi /
NK044(phi)001:3123: gang gis rig byed bzhi bslabs pa la sbyin no snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:3124: rkang lag d+r+wa ba med pa yul phan tshun 'khor
NK044(phi)001:3125: nas bram ze de'i drung du rig byed bklags pas
NK044(phi)001:3126: dus thung dus rig byed bzhir mkhas pa la bu
NK044(phi)001:3128: bram ze'i khye'u de dang bu mo de khang steng
NK044(phi)001:3129: na nyal ba las bsil yab shod du lhung ba
NK044(phi)001:3130: bu mo des lag pa glang po'i che'i sna ltar
NK044(phi)001:3131: brkyangs te blangs pa mthong nas skrag go //
NK044(phi)001:3132: yang mar mi shi la thug pa de glang po
NK044(phi)001:3133: che'i sna lta bu'i lag pa brkyangs nas gsos so
NK044(phi)001:3134: // de yang skrag nas dga' mgur spyod pa mi byed pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3135: bu mo des bdag dang lhan cig pa g.yangs su ci ste gcugs par mi byed ces dris pa /
NK044(phi)001:3136: khye'u des 'chi bdag dang lhan cig gcugs par byed pa 'ga' mthong ngam /
NK044(phi)001:3139: kho mos khyim thab la 'khu ba'i sems mi skyed do //
NK044(phi)001:3140: khye'usa smras pa 'di la kho bo 'du shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:3141: bu mo de skyengs nas gnyid log pa la sngod cing 'dug pas /
NK044(phi)001:3142: khye'u des gnyid log pa'i tshul du byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3143: bu mo da gzugs can ma rnams kyi nang du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3144: khye'u de yang de'i rjes su dal bus song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:3145: gzugs can de dag skra bshigs te 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong nas skrag ste phyir log go //
NK044(phi)001:3146: de cang mi smra bar mkhan po'i drung du song nas de ltar mchi'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3147: bu de lta na bu mo yang khrid cig /
NK044(phi)001:3148: mkhan po bdag des 'jigs te de nyid gzugs can ma lags so //
NK044(phi)001:3149: des ci'i phyir zhes dris pa la cang mi smra bar song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3150: bram ze des bu mo la khyod khyim thab kyang rjes su mi srung ngam /
NK044(phi)001:3153: bu de na re khyod gzugs can ma yin zhes zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:3154: yab bdag gzugs can ma ma lags te /
NK044(phi)001:3155: des bdag la sho bes skur pa btab nas song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3157: de la khro bas kun nas dkris pas rkang lag
NK044(phi)001:3158: dang mig bsgyur te de'i lam khar song nas mdun
NK044(phi)001:3159: du 'dug ste / bu zan ma'i bu khyod la
NK044(phi)001:3160: kho mos su la yang ma zer cig byas na
NK044(phi)001:3161: khyod kyis kho mo'i pha la smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:3162: da ni khyod la mtshams chen po gcad par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:3163: zhes des de la gnod pa bya bar brtsams pa
NK044(phi)001:3164: dang / de skrag pas sgra chen pos 'phags pa
NK044(phi)001:3165: rkang lag d+r+wa ba can la phyag 'tshal lo zhes
NK044(phi)001:3167: rkang lag d+r+wa ba can la mngon par dga' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:3168: lha zhig gis 'phags pa khyod kyi gcung po gnod
NK044(phi)001:3169: pa dang nyam nga bar gyur gyis de la dgongs
NK044(phi)001:3171: de rdzu 'phrul gyis de'i gan du song ste smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3172: bu mo 'di la gnod pa ma byed cig 'dis khyod la ci nyes /
NK044(phi)001:3174: 'di bdag gi pha la 'di gzugs can ma yin
NK044(phi)001:3175: no zhes bgyis pas bdag gis 'di za bas khyod
NK044(phi)001:3176: bzhud cig / drang srong gis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3177: srin mo 'di ni bkren pa yin pas 'khrugs pas chog gis thongs shig /
NK044(phi)001:3179: 'phags pa dam tshig gis gtang bar bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:3181: drang srong gis srin mo thongs shig dang rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:3182: de rab tu byung nas gdams ngag byin pas brtson
NK044(phi)001:3183: pas mngon par shes pa lnga grub par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:3184: // de dus kyi gcung de ni lag brgyud 'brog gnas yin la /
NK044(phi)001:3185: de dus kyi gzugs can ma ni bu mo sngo bsang can 'di yin te /
NK044(phi)001:3186: da ltar sangs rgyas pa'i dus na yang lag brgyud
NK044(phi)001:3187: 'brog gnas 'di gnod sbyin gyi zas su byin pa
NK044(phi)001:3189: sngo bsang can gyi 'ching ba las thar bar byas
NK044(phi)001:3190: te phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bzhag go
NK044(phi)001:3191: zhes gsungs so // yang sngon gyi dus na w+aa
NK044(phi)001:3192: r+aa na s+air rgyal po tshangs byin zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:3193: mnga' dbang che zhing yul bde la 'byor pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:3194: btsun mo tshangs ldan ma zhes bya ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:3195: rdzing tshangs ldan zhes bya ba yod do //
NK044(phi)001:3196: rgyal po de la bu med pas bu 'dod pa'i phyir lha rnams la gsol ba 'debs so //
NK044(phi)001:3197: de ltar gsol ba btab pa'i rgyus min kyang /
NK044(phi)001:3198: las kyi tshogs pa rnyed bu skye ste /
NK044(phi)001:3199: der bla med rdzogs byang la smon lam btab cing
NK044(phi)001:3200: dam bca' brtan pa'i sems can zhig dmyal ba nas
NK044(phi)001:3201: tshe 'phos te btsun mo tshangs ldan ma'i mngal du
NK044(phi)001:3202: zhugs so // bud med mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can ni chos lnga shes te /
NK044(phi)001:3203: skyes pa chags pa dang chags pa med pa shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:3204: dus shes shing zla mtshan shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:3205: mngal du zhugs pa shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:3206: gang las mngal na gnas pa de zhugs pa shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:3207: khye'u'am bu mo gang yin shes pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:3208: de'i phyir btsun mo des rgyal po la bdag la khye'u zhugs so zhes smras pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:3209: de yang dga' zhing smon lam legs par btab ste /
NK044(phi)001:3210: mngal na gnas pa legs par smin pa'i ched du
NK044(phi)001:3211: btsun mo de yid du 'ong ba'i 'byor ba chen
NK044(phi)001:3212: pos bsnyen bkur byas nas bde zhing gnod pa med
NK044(phi)001:3213: par byas so // de nas nam zhig na des
NK044(phi)001:3214: rgyal pos sbyin pa chen po btang zhing bsod nams
NK044(phi)001:3215: dag byas na ci ma rung snyam pa'i rtog pa
NK044(phi)001:3216: skyes pa smras pa dang de bzhin du byas te
NK044(phi)001:3218: yang nam zhig bdag rgyal po dang lhan cig gru'i
NK044(phi)001:3219: lding khang du zhugs te tshangs ldan gyi rdzing bur
NK044(phi)001:3220: rtse la dga' ba dang dga' mgur spyad na ci
NK044(phi)001:3222: de bzhin du byas pa las gru'i nang de nyid
NK044(phi)001:3223: du khye'u gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa gser
NK044(phi)001:3224: gyi mdog la sogs pa'i mtshan dang ldan pa skye
NK044(phi)001:3225: ba dran pa zhig btsas so //
NK044(phi)001:3226: de btsas pa na nye du dag 'dus te nyi
NK044(phi)001:3227: ma bdun gsum btsas ston byas nas khye'u'i ming cir
NK044(phi)001:3229: chu'i nang du skyes pas chu skyes zhes btags so //
NK044(phi)001:3230: khye'u de ma ma brgyad kyis skyed bsrings par gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:3231: khye'u des bdag gang nas shi 'phos pa brtags nas /
NK044(phi)001:3232: sngon rgyal tshab lo drug cur byas pas dmyal bar skyes pa nas 'dir skye bar shes so //
NK044(phi)001:3233: gal te da lta yang rgyal srid byas na slar
NK044(phi)001:3234: yang dmyal bar 'jug pas bdag gis thabs zhig bya'o
NK044(phi)001:3235: snyam du de 'phye bor bardzusa te 'dug go //
NK044(phi)001:3236: gzhon nu chu skyes btsas pa'i nyi ma de la blon po lnga brgya'i bu yang btsas so //
NK044(phi)001:3237: dus gzhan zhig na na zla'i khye'u de dag rgyug nus par gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:3238: rgyal po tshangs byin 'di snyam du gal te gzhon nu chu skyes 'phye bor ma gyur na /
NK044(phi)001:3239: da tsam mchong pa dang rgyug nus pa zhig na
NK044(phi)001:3240: 'di 'phye bor gyur kyang rgyal srid la bzhag snyam
NK044(phi)001:3241: mo // der gzhon nu des rgyal po 'di don
NK044(phi)001:3242: med pa la gtsigs cher 'dzin bsam la bdag lkugs
NK044(phi)001:3243: pa nyid du bya'o snyam nas de ltar byas so
NK044(phi)001:3244: mo // // na zla rnams smra shes pa na
NK044(phi)001:3245: gzhon nu 'di lkug par ma gyur na da tsam
NK044(phi)001:3246: smra shes par 'gyur ba zhig snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:3247: de'i tshe de'i ming snga ma nub nas lkugs 'phye zhes bya bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3248: de nas dus zhig na rgyal po des sems khong du chud cing 'dug pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3249: blon po rnams kyis dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3250: bdag rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thob kyang bu pho
NK044(phi)001:3251: dang bu mo yang med pas nga shi na gdung
NK044(phi)001:3252: rgyud 'chad la bu gcig yod pa de yang lkugs
NK044(phi)001:3253: 'phyer gyur pas ji ltar sems khong du mi chud
NK044(phi)001:3254: / blon po rnams kyis sman pa rnams bsdus te /
NK044(phi)001:3256: gzhon nu 'di dbang po gsal zhing nad cung zad kyang med par mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:3257: 'on kyang skrag pa zhig mdzod cig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:3258: de nas rgyal po des gshed ma bkug nas gsang ste bsgo ba /
NK044(phi)001:3259: ngas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'di skye bo'i tshogs chen
NK044(phi)001:3260: po'i mngon sum du spong gis khyed cag gis bsad
NK044(phi)001:3262: de rnams kyis lha bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes gshed ma'i
NK044(phi)001:3263: mi rnams kyis gzhon nu shing rtar bcug ste w+aa
NK044(phi)001:3264: r+aa na s+air dbus thog thag khrid pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3265: gzhon nus yul de 'byor zhing rgyas pa mthong nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3266: ci w+aa r+aa na s+ai 'di stong pa yin nam /
NK044(phi)001:3268: gshed ma'i mi rnams kyis gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal
NK044(phi)001:3269: po la phul nas lha gzhon nus 'di skad tshig
NK044(phi)001:3270: smras so // de nas rgyal pos gzhon nu pang du blangs nas su zhig gsad /
NK044(phi)001:3273: su la ci zhig sbyin zhes smras pa na gzhon nu cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:3274: yang rgyal po'i gzhon nu spangs zhes gshed ma rnams
NK044(phi)001:3275: la gtad de khrid pa dang gzhon nus mi ro
NK044(phi)001:3276: zhig mthong nas / 'di ci shi ba nyid shi'am /
NK044(phi)001:3278: gshed ma rnams kyis slar rgyal po la phul te de skad smras pa na /
NK044(phi)001:3279: rgyal pos sngar bzhin tshig bzhi dris kyang cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:3280: yang gshed ma rnams la bskur ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:3281: gzhon nus 'bras kyi phung po chen po zhig mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:3282: 'bras kyi phung po chen po 'di dang po nyid nas ma zos dang /
NK044(phi)001:3284: gshed ma rnams kyis gzhon nu slar yang rgyal po la phul nas de skad smras so //
NK044(phi)001:3285: rgyal pos sngar bzhin dris kyang cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:3286: yang gshed ma rnams la gtad de gzhon nu tshal gyi nang du dong rkos te chugs shig /
NK044(phi)001:3287: de dag gis khrid de sa brko bar brtsams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3289: kha lo bas rgyal pos 'dir dong brkos te gzhon nu chug ces bka' stsal to //
NK044(phi)001:3290: de nas gzhon nu des gshed ma 'di dag gdug
NK044(phi)001:3291: cing srog gcod pas 'tsho ba yin no snyam du
NK044(phi)001:3292: skrag ste gshed ma rnams la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3293: lhas gal te bdag la mchog cig gnang na /
NK044(phi)001:3294: bdag rkang gi grong khyer du 'jug cing tshig kyang smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:3295: gshed ma rnams kyis tshig de rgyal po la zhus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3297: gzhon nu rgyal srid 'dod na yang sbyin par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:3298: zhes dga' nas grong khyer gyi lam thams cad brgyan
NK044(phi)001:3299: par byas so // de nas gzhon nu lkugs 'phye
NK044(phi)001:3300: rkang pas grong khyer du 'jug pa la ya mtshan
NK044(phi)001:3301: skyes pas srog chags brgya stong phrag du ma dag
NK044(phi)001:3302: par byas so // kyang 'dus so // gzhon nu
NK044(phi)001:3303: de rkang pas grong khyer du zhugs shing rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:3305: mi dbang bdag ni lkugs 'phye dang //
NK044(phi)001:3306: blun pa blo mi ldan ma lags //
NK044(phi)001:3307: rnam par gsal bar bgyid pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:3308: tshig gis gsal bar bgyid pa lags //
NK044(phi)001:3310: bdag ni dbang po yang tshang lags te /
NK044(phi)001:3311: sngon gyi tshe rabs dran pas sngon mi yi nang
NK044(phi)001:3312: du lo drug cur rgyal tshab bgyis pas lo drug
NK044(phi)001:3313: khri'i bar du dmyal ba'i nang du sdug bsngal mi
NK044(phi)001:3314: bzad pa myong ba dran nas /
NK044(phi)001:3315: slar dmyal bar mchi mi rung bas rgyal srid la mngon par mi dga' ste /
NK044(phi)001:3316: yab gcig gnang bar mdzod dang bdag rab tu byung bar bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:3318: dka' thub dang mchod sbyin byed pa de dag rgyal
NK044(phi)001:3319: srid kyi phyir yin na khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid
NK044(phi)001:3320: lag mthil du 'ong ba spangs te rab tu 'byung
NK044(phi)001:3324: bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu'i ro lta bu'i //
NK044(phi)001:3325: tshangs par spyod pa spyad par bgyi //
NK044(phi)001:3327: bu bde ba gang ci nyams su myong ba de
NK044(phi)001:3328: thams cad rgyal srid kyis yin na ci'i phyir de
NK044(phi)001:3330: gang las sdug bsngal rab 'byung ba'i //
NK044(phi)001:3331: bde de bade'o snyam mi bgyid //
NK044(phi)001:3332: gang las bde ba rab skye ba'i //
NK044(phi)001:3333: sdug bsngal sdug bsngal snyam mi bgyid //
NK044(phi)001:3334: yab gcig bdag la gnang bar mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:3335: dka' thub nags su mchi bar bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:3337: bu re zhig khang bzang gi gzhi spos dang me
NK044(phi)001:3338: tog gis 'khrigs pa bza' btung dang gos rgyan rol
NK044(phi)001:3339: mo'i bde ba la gnas par bya yi dgon pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3340: shing drung du r+ts+wa'i stan la /
NK044(phi)001:3341: gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig nyal zhing /
NK044(phi)001:3342: shing shun gyi gos dang rtsa ba dang 'bras bu'i zas dang /
NK044(phi)001:3343: chu'i btung ba la brten dgos na khyod ci'i phyir rgyal srid spangs te nags su 'gro /
NK044(phi)001:3345: nags na shing shun g.yang gzhi gyon zhing 'bras bu za //
NK044(phi)001:3346: gcan gzan gdug pa rnams dang lhan cig 'dug pa bla'i //
NK044(phi)001:3347: mkhas pa 'jig rten pha rol dag gis 'jigs pa yis //
NK044(phi)001:3348: rgyal srid phyir ni gsod dang rdeg dang 'ching mi rung //
NK044(phi)001:3349: yab gcig bdag la gnang bar mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:3350: dka' thub nags su mchi bar bgyi //
NK044(phi)001:3352: bu re zhig nga'i the tshom gsum po 'di dag chod cig dang /
NK044(phi)001:3353: de'i 'og tu khyod rab tu 'byung ba mi dga' bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:3354: gang khyod kyis w+aa r+aa na s+air 'byor zhing rgyas pa mthong nas 'di ci stong pa yin nam /
NK044(phi)001:3355: 'on te gnas pa zhig yod ces smras pa de khyod kyis ci zhig la bsams te smras /
NK044(phi)001:3357: lha de'i slad du gson cig /
NK044(phi)001:3358: bdag nongs pa med bzhin 'gum par bka' stsal pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3359: 'gas kyang gzhon nu 'di ci'i phyir gsad ces chos kyi tshig ma smras pa de la bsams te /
NK044(phi)001:3360: bdag gis de ltar smras lags so //
NK044(phi)001:3363: gang khyod kyis mi ro mthong nas ci 'di shi ba nyid shi'am /
NK044(phi)001:3364: 'on te gson po shi zhes smras pa de ci la bsams nas smras /
NK044(phi)001:3365: lha de ni gang zhig nyes pa'i las bgyis nas
NK044(phi)001:3366: gum pa de shi ba nyid shi ba lags la
NK044(phi)001:3367: / gang zhig legs pa'i las bgyis pa de gum pa ni gson pa gum pa lags pas /
NK044(phi)001:3368: de la bsams nas de skad smras so //
NK044(phi)001:3370: gang khyod kyis 'bras phung chen po mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:3371: 'bras phung chen po 'di dang po nyid nas ma zos dang /
NK044(phi)001:3372: drung zug par 'gyur ba zhig smras pa de ci la bsams te smras /
NK044(phi)001:3373: lha de ni zhing pa 'di rnams kyis zhing sa
NK044(phi)001:3374: 'di rnams kyi 'bras bu smin pa na blangs te
NK044(phi)001:3375: za zhing bu lon btsal nas med par byed de
NK044(phi)001:3376: / de ltar na de dag gis drung ngam rtsa ba de sngar nas zos pa lags so //
NK044(phi)001:3377: de bzhin du dge bcu'i las kyis mir skye ba
NK044(phi)001:3378: thob pa'i tshe dge bcu'i las lam mi sog na
NK044(phi)001:3379: sngon gyi dge ba de rgyun chad par 'gyur zhing
NK044(phi)001:3380: dge rtsa de rgyun chad na bde 'gro las nyams
NK044(phi)001:3381: shing ngan 'gror gnas par 'gyur ba de la bsams
NK044(phi)001:3382: nas bdag gis de skad smras lags so //
NK044(phi)001:3383: de nas rgyal pos tshig de thos nas mchi ma 'byin bzhin bu la 'khyud de smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3384: brtul zhugs nges longs rang gi chos spyod cing /
NK044(phi)001:3385: bdag kyang khyod kyi slob mar khas blang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3386: de nas rgyal po tshangs byin gyis blon po rnams la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3387: shes ldan dag gal te gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'di rab tu ma byung na cir 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:3389: khyed cag gi bu rnams cir 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3391: de rab tu byung na khyed cag gi bu rnams ci'i phyir rab tu mi 'byung /
NK044(phi)001:3392: lha bka' ci stsal du zad do //
NK044(phi)001:3393: de'i tshe w+aa r+aa na s+ai dang ha cang yang mi ring pa'i bsti gnas zhig na /
NK044(phi)001:3394: drang srong byams pa'i bdag nyid snying rje can sems
NK044(phi)001:3395: can thams cad la byams pa zhig gnas pa der
NK044(phi)001:3396: gzhon nu lkugs 'phye 'khor lnga brgya dang bcas par
NK044(phi)001:3397: 'byor pa chen po dang bcas shing drang srong de
NK044(phi)001:3398: las rab tu byung nas des gdams ngag byin pa
NK044(phi)001:3399: la 'bad pa dang brtson 'grus drag pos mngon par
NK044(phi)001:3400: shes pa lnga mngon sum du byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3401: de nas dus gzhan zhig na drang srong de tshe'i
NK044(phi)001:3402: dus byas pa la gzhon nu lkugs 'phyes dri sna
NK044(phi)001:3403: tshogs kyi shing gis bur bsregs nas mchod pa byas
NK044(phi)001:3404: so // 'khor gyi khye'u lnga brgya po de la
NK044(phi)001:3405: gdams ngag byin nas de rnams kyis 'bad pas mngon
NK044(phi)001:3406: shes lnga mngon du byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3407: de'i tshe gzhon nu lkugs 'phye rgyal srid spangs nas
NK044(phi)001:3408: nags su bsam gtan gyi yon tan mngon du byed
NK044(phi)001:3409: pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:3411: yang bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid sngon gyi tshe phyi
NK044(phi)001:3412: rol ba'i ston pa mig mdzes zhes bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:3413: pa'i tshe na yang 'dod pa rnams la chags pa
NK044(phi)001:3416: 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma la chos bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:3417: mi zad pa shin tu dri ma med par ston
NK044(phi)001:3418: to // des chos bstan pa thams cad phal cher
NK044(phi)001:3419: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dang skal pa mnyam par skyes
NK044(phi)001:3420: to // la / kha cig ni lha dang mi'i dam pa rnams su'o //
NK044(phi)001:3421: de nas ston pa mig mdzes des bsam gtan gnyis pa thob par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3422: ston pa mig mdzes ji lta ba bzhin du bram ze'i bu 'jom byed dang /
NK044(phi)001:3423: glang po skyong yang de dang 'dra'o //
NK044(phi)001:3424: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid phyi rol
NK044(phi)001:3425: pa'i ston pa lkugs 'phye zhes rdzu 'phrul dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:3426: pa 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral ba zhig
NK044(phi)001:3427: tu gyur pas bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la slob
NK044(phi)001:3428: par byed do // de nas dus gzhan zhig na
NK044(phi)001:3429: ston pa des ci'i phyir khye'u 'di rnams mngon shes
NK044(phi)001:3430: lnga ma thob snyam du bsams na /
NK044(phi)001:3431: g.yang gzhi dang shing shun ril ba dbyu gu blugs gzar gyi snod lhag po 'chang zhing /
NK044(phi)001:3432: tshod rngad dang ud pa la'i rtsa ba sbyor ba
NK044(phi)001:3433: la brtson pas gnas pa bya ba mang bas lan
NK044(phi)001:3434: no snyam nas / 'di la nan tur gyi thabs
NK044(phi)001:3435: zhig ma byas na de dang 'bral bar daka'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:3436: du byang chub sems dpa' de gdul ba la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:3437: pas bram ze'i khye'u dag kho bo nang du yang
NK044(phi)001:3439: kho bo la rtsa ba dang 'bras bu stob pa'i bram ze'i khye'u gcig dang /
NK044(phi)001:3440: gso spyong bco lnga pa de nyid ma gtogs par khyed su yang ma 'ongs zhig /
NK044(phi)001:3441: khye'u rnams kyis de ltar nang khrims su bcas so //
NK044(phi)001:3442: de'i tshe ston pa lkugs 'phyes rgyang ring po nas ri dwags zhig mthong ba dang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3443: ri dwags 'ongs pa legs so tshur shog cig /
NK044(phi)001:3444: ri dwags khyod dang kho bo mtshungs te lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog na /
NK044(phi)001:3445: 'di na kha cig de ltar min te /
NK044(phi)001:3446: ha cang tshod rngad dang ud pa la'i rtsa ba
NK044(phi)001:3447: sbyor bas brtson par gnas so zhes smras pa la
NK044(phi)001:3448: / bram ze'i khye'u de rnams gdon mi za bar
NK044(phi)001:3449: mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs par gyur te ri
NK044(phi)001:3450: dwags dang lhan cig smra'o snyam du ston pa'i drung
NK044(phi)001:3451: du phyin zhing phyag 'tshal nas 'khod kyang ston pa
NK044(phi)001:3452: / cang mi smra'o // de nas de rnams mi
NK044(phi)001:3453: dang mi smra yang ri dwags dang smra bas na
NK044(phi)001:3454: mkhan po ni brtul zhugs rdzogs so snyam du de
NK044(phi)001:3456: de nas ri dwags kyi brtul zhugs can zhig ston
NK044(phi)001:3457: pa lkugs 'phye ga na bar song ba dang des
NK044(phi)001:3458: rgyang ring po nas mthong ste /
NK044(phi)001:3459: ri dwags kyi brtul zhugs can khyod 'ongs pa legs so tshur shog /
NK044(phi)001:3460: khyod dang kho bo ni mtshungs te /
NK044(phi)001:3462: ril ba dang dbyu gu dang /
NK044(phi)001:3463: blugs gzar gyi snod re re thogs /
NK044(phi)001:3464: khyod dang bdag lto 'grangs tsam gyis chog /
NK044(phi)001:3465: 'di na kha cig de ltar ma yin te /
NK044(phi)001:3466: g.yang gzhi mang du 'chang zhing tshod rngad sogs kyi sbyor ba la brtson par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3467: de nas bram ze'i khye'u de rnams kyis mkhan po
NK044(phi)001:3468: ni 'di ltar 'dod chen la smod cing 'dod chung
NK044(phi)001:3470: don gyis mkhan pos bdag cag la nan tur byas
NK044(phi)001:3471: kyis ma la bdag cag gis ril ba nas blugs
NK044(phi)001:3472: gzar gyi bar gcig las lhag ma rnams chu bo
NK044(phi)001:3473: rtag 'bab kyi nang du bor la mkhan po gang
NK044(phi)001:3474: na bar 'dong ngo zhes de ltar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:3475: rgyud gtsang la spyod pa gzhung bzhin byas te ston
NK044(phi)001:3476: pa'i drung du song nas phyag 'tshal te 'dug go
NK044(phi)001:3477: // ston pa des de rnams kyi bsam pa dang
NK044(phi)001:3478: rang bzhin shes nas mngon par shes pa lnga mngon
NK044(phi)001:3479: du byed pa'i chos bshad par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3480: yang sngon gyi tshe mi rnams kyi tshe lo brgyad
NK044(phi)001:3481: khri thub pa na de dag gi lus la gnod
NK044(phi)001:3482: pa ni / tsha grang dang bkres skom dang 'dod pa dang za ba dang rga ba'o //
NK044(phi)001:3483: de'i tshe rgyal po byed ldan zhes bya ba'i skyed
NK044(phi)001:3484: tshal gyi shing nya grod+ha'i rgyal po rab tu gnas
NK044(phi)001:3485: pa'i drung na bram ze shing s+aa la chen po
NK044(phi)001:3486: lta bu rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces bya bar bcom
NK044(phi)001:3487: ldan 'das 'di byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na
NK044(phi)001:3488: / bram ze des khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bram ze'i gsang tshig slob bo //
NK044(phi)001:3489: bram ze rtsibs kyi mu khyud dben par song nas sems la 'di lta bu rtog pa skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:3490: mi rnams ni tshe thung zhing phyi mar 'gro dgos
NK044(phi)001:3491: te skyes nas mi 'chi ba med pas dge ba
NK044(phi)001:3492: dang tshangs par spyad dgos na /
NK044(phi)001:3493: 'on kyang da ltar mi rnams don dang dge ba
NK044(phi)001:3494: spyad pa la sems las chung ngur gnas par byed
NK044(phi)001:3495: kyi / bdag ni rab tu dbyung bar bya'o snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:3496: tshul de bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras nas khyed ci byed /
NK044(phi)001:3498: bdag cag gis cung zad ci shes pa mkhan po
NK044(phi)001:3499: la brten pa lags na bdag kyang khyed ltar rab
NK044(phi)001:3500: tu byung ngo // de nas mkhan po des dus
NK044(phi)001:3501: la bab pa shes par gyis zhes de thams cad
NK044(phi)001:3503: de nas rtsibs kyi mu khyud sgrib pa lnga spangs
NK044(phi)001:3504: nas tshad med bzhi'i sems kyis khyab par byas te
NK044(phi)001:3505: gnas so // de'i tshe ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud ces ming du grags so //
NK044(phi)001:3506: des bram ze'i khye'u rnams la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3507: bram ze'i khye'u dag mi rnams ni tshe thung ba /
NK044(phi)001:3510: de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no //
NK044(phi)001:3511: dper na rtsa rtse la chags pa'i zil pa ni
NK044(phi)001:3512: nyi ma shar ba'i tshe myur du 'gag pa de
NK044(phi)001:3513: bzhin du mi rnams kyi tshe yang ring por mi
NK044(phi)001:3514: thogs la / de yang sdug bsngal dang ldan no //
NK044(phi)001:3515: de bzhin du chu la ri mo bris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3516: chu la dbyug pas khram bris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3517: khor yug chur bor ba 'jig pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3518: rdo rje chur bor bnub pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3519: dbyug pa gnam du 'phang ba myur du lhung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:3520: thags su btags pa ci tsam gyis rting la thug
NK044(phi)001:3521: pa dang de bzhin du srog kyang ring por mi
NK044(phi)001:3522: thogs shing 'chi ba la thug par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:3523: ji ltar gsod sar khrid pa'i phyugs ni gom re bor ba bzhin gsad sar nye ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:3524: sha'i kham tshad chu mang po'i nang du bskol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:3525: ri las 'bab pa'i chu drag cing gting zab pas
NK044(phi)001:3526: rtsi shing ded pa dang 'dra bar tshe yang de
NK044(phi)001:3528: bram ze'i khye'u bdag ni byams pa'i sems nas btang snyoms kyi bar gyis gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:3529: khyed kyis kyang byams sogs la gnas par gyis zhes bskul te /
NK044(phi)001:3530: ston pa rtsibs kyi mu khyud lo brgyad khri de
NK044(phi)001:3531: tsam du tshe ring por gnas pa yang de ltar
NK044(phi)001:3532: mi rnams tshe thung ba de lta bu'i chos ston
NK044(phi)001:3533: te rang gzhan thams cad bag yod pas dge chos
NK044(phi)001:3534: la brtson par byed cing bsam gtan dang tshangs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3536: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid bram ze'i
NK044(phi)001:3537: rigs chen po smad du med pa zhig tu skyes
NK044(phi)001:3538: pa'i tshe / de la nu bo drug yod pa
NK044(phi)001:3539: yang de dang yon tan cha mthun pa yin la
NK044(phi)001:3540: pa'i tshe / / sring mo gcig dang bdun yod do //
NK044(phi)001:3541: bram ze des rig byed dang /
NK044(phi)001:3542: nye ba'i rig byed yan lag dang bcas pa lob nas mkhas pa'i grags pa thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:3543: pha ma gnyis la lha bzhin bkur sti dang /
NK044(phi)001:3544: nu bo rnams la'ang slob dpon dang pha bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:3545: rig pa slob cing tshul dang mthun pas khyim na
NK044(phi)001:3546: gnas pa las / yun ring zhig na de dag
NK044(phi)001:3547: gi pha ma gnyis dus byas pa'i mya ngan bsangs
NK044(phi)001:3548: gnas pa las / nas / nu bo rnams la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3549: yun ring lhan cig 'khod 'dod kyang 'chi bas so
NK044(phi)001:3550: sor 'bral ba'i mya ngan chen po 'ong ba 'di
NK044(phi)001:3552: bdag ni rab tu 'byung 'dod pas khyed cag khyim du chos bzhin gnas par gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:3553: de thos pas nu bo rnams mig mchi mas gang bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:3554: bdag cag pha ma'i mya ngan gyi steng du khyod kyis kyang 'dor na /
NK044(phi)001:3555: khyod gang du bzhud pa der bdag cag kyang 'dong
NK044(phi)001:3556: ngo zhes nu bo drug sring mo dang bcas pa
NK044(phi)001:3557: yang de'i slad bzhin khyim gyi longs spyod chen po
NK044(phi)001:3558: dang mdza' bo dang nang mi rnams bor te dka'
NK044(phi)001:3559: thub kyi nags su rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3560: bran pho dang bran mo snying nye ba dag kyang de dag gi phyi bzhin rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3561: dgon pa'i nags tshal chen po der me tog gis
NK044(phi)001:3562: gang ba'i mtsho chen po zhig gi 'gram du shing
NK044(phi)001:3563: lo'i spyil bu so sor mi nye bar byas te
NK044(phi)001:3564: / bsam gtan la sbyor bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:3565: zhag lnga ldan byang chub sems dpa'i drung du chos nyan par 'du zhing /
NK044(phi)001:3566: bsam gtan gyi man ngag la 'jug pa'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:3567: 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs dang dben pa dang chog shes pa'i basngagasa pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3568: le lo sogs kyi skyon dang /
NK044(phi)001:3569: dad pa sogs kyi yon tan gyi chos ston par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:3570: de dag gi bran mo de yang gus shing snying nye bas /
NK044(phi)001:3571: mtsho de'i nang nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba bton pa /
NK044(phi)001:3572: pad+ma'i lo ma chen po la cha mnyam par bgos nas /
NK044(phi)001:3573: tog brdungs pa'i sgras dus bstan te slar 'agro'o //
NK044(phi)001:3574: drang srong de dag bzlas brjod dang sbyin sreg gi cho ga byas zin nas /
NK044(phi)001:3575: rgan rim gyis re re nas song ste pad+ma'i rtsa
NK044(phi)001:3576: ba de go rim bzhin du blangs nas so so'i
NK044(phi)001:3577: spyil bor cho ga bzhin du zos te bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:3578: la brtson pa la blos gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:3579: de dag chos nyan pa'i dus ma gtog par gcig la gcig bltar mi 'dong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3580: de dag de ltar tshul khrims dang spyod tshul de
NK044(phi)001:3581: lta bus rab tu dben pa'i dga' ba dang bsam
NK044(phi)001:3582: gtan la gzhol bas grags pa cher gyur pa lha'i
NK044(phi)001:3583: dbang po brgya byin gyis thos nas de brtag pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3584: phyir song ba na de dag gi tshul de lta
NK044(phi)001:3585: bu mthong nas / pad+ma'i rtsa ba glang po che'i
NK044(phi)001:3586: phru gu'i mche ba ltar dkar ba'i byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:3587: dpa'i skal ba de bran mo slar song ba'i rjes
NK044(phi)001:3588: su mi snang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3589: byang chub sems dpa' der song ba na dang po'i gnas de na pad+ma'i rtsa ba med la /
NK044(phi)001:3590: pad+ma'i lo ma rgyan 'khrugs shing 'dug pa mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:3591: bdag gi pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i skal pa gcig gis khyer
NK044(phi)001:3592: ro snyam du / khong khro zhing sems 'khrugs pa
NK044(phi)001:3593: med par slar log ste shing lo'i spyil bur bsam
NK044(phi)001:3595: drang srong gzhan rnams la snying mi dga' bar 'gyur du 'ong snyam nas ma smras so //
NK044(phi)001:3596: nu bo gzhan gyis 'dis rang gi skal ba blangs zin no snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:3597: rang rang gi skal ba blangs te spyil bor za zhing bsam gtan byed do //
NK044(phi)001:3598: de bzhin du zhag gnyis pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3601: lnga pa'i bar du yang de'i skal ba mi snang
NK044(phi)001:3602: bar byas kyang sems rab tu 'khrugs pa med par
NK044(phi)001:3603: rab tu zhi'o // phyi dro'i dus su drang srong
NK044(phi)001:3604: de dag de'i drung du chos nyan par go rim
NK044(phi)001:3606: de'i lus rid cing 'gram pa dang mig ni kong /
NK044(phi)001:3607: bzhin mdangs ngan zhing skad gdangs chung la lus nyam dmas kyang /
NK044(phi)001:3608: brtan pa rab tu zhi ba'i yon tan rgyas par
NK044(phi)001:3609: mthong nas 'di ci nongs zhes dris pa la ji
NK044(phi)001:3611: de nas dka' thub can de dag gis 'di lta
NK044(phi)001:3612: bu'i chos ma yin pa mi srid do snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:3613: / mi dga' zhing mtshar byas so zhes smras de mgo smad cing ngo tsha bas 'khod do //
NK044(phi)001:3614: shes pa 'jug pa'i yul brgya byin gyis mthus bsgribs pas ci las gyur pa yang ma shes so //
NK044(phi)001:3615: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i nu bo 'og mas
NK044(phi)001:3616: rang gi yid la gcags pa med pa bdag nyid
NK044(phi)001:3617: gtsang bar bstan pa'i phyir mna' khyad par can bor
NK044(phi)001:3618: ba / bram ze khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba //
NK044(phi)001:3619: 'byor ba'i mtshan mas brgyan pa'i khyim dag dang //
NK044(phi)001:3620: chung ma yid du 'ong ba rnyed pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:3621: bu dang tsha bo rnams dang ldan par shog /
NK044(phi)001:3623: bram ze khyod kyi rtsa ba sus khyer ba //
NK044(phi)001:3624: phreng ba do shal tsan dan gos bzang dang //
NK044(phi)001:3625: bu yis reg pa'i rgyan rnams thogs pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:3626: 'byor pa mi zad pa la spyod par shog /
NK044(phi)001:3628: khyod kyi rtsa ba gang gis khyer ba de //
NK044(phi)001:3629: zhing rmos pa las nor dang 'bru rnyed cing //
NK044(phi)001:3630: bu dang smra bas rab tu dga' bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3631: tshe la'ang mi lta khyim na dga' bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3633: khyod kyi rtsa ba brkams pas gang khyer ba //
NK044(phi)001:3634: rgyal po bran bzhin dul bar spyod pa yis //
NK044(phi)001:3635: gtsug tor brgyud pas rab tu phyag byas shing //
NK044(phi)001:3636: rgyal po'i tshul gyis ma lus sa skyong gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3638: khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba //
NK044(phi)001:3639: de ni rgyal po'i mdun na 'don gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:3640: sngags la sogs pas bde legs byed gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:3641: de bzhin rgyal pos bkur sti bya bar shog /
NK044(phi)001:3643: rtsa ba 'dod cing yon tan mi 'dod pa //
NK044(phi)001:3644: rig byed legs par lobs nas ston par byed //
NK044(phi)001:3645: dka' thub can du re ba chen po yis //
NK044(phi)001:3646: yul mi kun gyis de la mchod par shog /
NK044(phi)001:3648: khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba la chags gang //
NK044(phi)001:3649: yul gru dam pa 'byor ba bzhi brgya tsam //
NK044(phi)001:3650: rgyal po dag las thob nas spyod gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:3651: 'dod chags ma bral bar ni shi bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3653: rtsa ba'i phyir ni bdag don chud gson pa //
NK044(phi)001:3654: grogs po'i nang na de ni grogs dpon gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3655: rgyal po'i chad pa dag gis mi gcod par //
NK044(phi)001:3656: bud med glu gar dag gis dga' bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3658: khyod lta bu yi rtsa ba gang khyer ba //
NK044(phi)001:3659: de ni rgyal po'i btsun mor gyur nas su //
NK044(phi)001:3660: gzugs dang dpal gyi gzi byin 'bar 'gyur zhing //
NK044(phi)001:3661: btsun mo dam pa stong gi mchog tu gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3663: gang gis rtsa ba mthong la chos ma mthong //
NK044(phi)001:3664: de ni gcig tu dge ba rnams dang bral //
NK044(phi)001:3665: bkur sti byas nas myos par gyur nas su //
NK044(phi)001:3666: kha zas zhim po dag la dga' bar gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3667: de nas nags tshal de na 'khor ba gnod sbyin
NK044(phi)001:3668: dang glang po che dang spre'u gcig der chos nyan
NK044(phi)001:3669: du lhags pas gtams de thos nas rab tu ngo
NK044(phi)001:3670: tsha zhing mi dga' bar gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:3671: gnod sbyin gyis bdag gtsang mar bstan pa'i phyir de dag gi mdun du mna' bor ba /
NK044(phi)001:3672: khyod kyi rtsa ba'i phyir ni gang 'khrul ba //
NK044(phi)001:3673: gtsug lag khang chen dag ni brgyan par gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3674: bkru bshal stor khung dag gi zhig ral 'chos //
NK044(phi)001:3675: nyi ma'i 'od kyis snang ba byed par gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3677: thub mchog khyed kyi rtsa ba gang brkus pa //
NK044(phi)001:3678: de ni zhags pa dam po drug brgyas bcings //
NK044(phi)001:3679: lcags kyu rnon pos dkrugs pa'i rma nad bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:3680: nags tshal nyams dga' bor nas grong 'dab song //
NK044(phi)001:3682: khyod kyi rtsa ba bskams pas gang brkus pa //
NK044(phi)001:3683: de ni me tog phreng can zha to thogs //
NK044(phi)001:3684: dbyug pas brdeg cing sbrul gyi khar gtong zhing //
NK044(phi)001:3685: se ral khar bcings khyim na gnas par shog /
NK044(phi)001:3686: byang chub sems dpa' de thams cad la 'jam zhing
NK044(phi)001:3687: dul ba dang bzod pa ston pa'i tshig 'di skad
NK044(phi)001:3688: ces / gang zhig ma brlag par ni brlag ci'am //
NK044(phi)001:3689: gang zhig 'di 'drar khyed la dogs gyur pa //
NK044(phi)001:3690: 'dod pa yid 'ong ci ba der spyad nas su //
NK044(phi)001:3691: khyim na gnas bzhin 'chi ba'i dus byed 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3692: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis //
NK044(phi)001:3693: de dag dben pa dang bya ba nyung ba'i yon
NK044(phi)001:3694: tan rtogs nas khyim gyi gnas dang 'dod pa la
NK044(phi)001:3695: nye bar spyod pa'i bya ba rnams la snying thag
NK044(phi)001:3696: pa nas mi dga' ba'i smad pa lhur byed pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3697: zhi gnas khyad par can du gyur par smras pa
NK044(phi)001:3698: de la gus pa dang ya mtshan skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:3699: rang gi gzugs dpal dang 'od 'bar ba bstan nas mi bzod bzhin du smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3701: gang dag thob phyir yid la rtsol byed cing //
NK044(phi)001:3702: bde ba 'dod phyir yid la gnyid kyang med //
NK044(phi)001:3703: dka' thub 'bad pas yang dag thob 'dod pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:3704: 'dod pa de dag ci'i phyir dmod par byed //
NK044(phi)001:3705: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3706: grogs po 'dod pa ni nyes dmigs mtha' yas te /
NK044(phi)001:3707: gang la brtags nas thub pa rnams 'dod pa la
NK044(phi)001:3708: mi spyod pa'i tshul de mdo tsam zhig nyon cig
NK044(phi)001:3709: / 'dod phyir 'jig rten bcings shing bsad par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3710: mya ngan gdung zhing 'jigs mang sdug bsngal myong //
NK044(phi)001:3711: rgyal po rnams kyang 'dod phyir brlag par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3712: phyi mar chos nyams sems can dmyal bar lhung //
NK044(phi)001:3713: gang gis mdza' rnams myur du 'khon 'byung 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3714: gang gis g.yo sgyu dri ma can lam 'gro /
NK044(phi)001:3715: grags pa nyams shing phyi mar sdug bsngal myong //
NK044(phi)001:3716: de dag 'thob 'gyur rgyu ni 'dod pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:3717: de bas rab dang 'bring dang tha ma rnams //
NK044(phi)001:3718: 'di dang pha rol tu yang 'dod pa gsod //
NK044(phi)001:3719: bdag la phan 'dod sbrul gdug khros pa bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:3720: thub pa rnams ni de la mi bsten no //
NK044(phi)001:3721: de nas lha'i dbang pos tshig de bden no snyam nas mngon par bstod de /
NK044(phi)001:3722: drang srong de dag gi mthus de yid dga' bar
NK044(phi)001:3723: gyur cing de dag la bdag gi nyes pa khas
NK044(phi)001:3724: blangs te / gang dag brtags na yon tan rnams //
NK044(phi)001:3725: re ba bzhin du rtogs par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3726: brtag pa'i phyir ni bdag gis 'dir //
NK044(phi)001:3727: pad+ma'i rtsa ba sbas pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:3729: khyed cag rnams kyi spyod pa bstan //
NK044(phi)001:3730: thub pa bden par smra ba yis //
NK044(phi)001:3731: 'gro ba mgon dang bcas par mthong //
NK044(phi)001:3732: zhes smras nas pad+ma'i rtsa ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo //
NK044(phi)001:3733: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de'i spyod pa rlabs
NK044(phi)001:3734: po che de la sus kyang gzi brjid zil gyis
NK044(phi)001:3735: mi non pa'i tshig drag pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3736: nged cag khyod kyi gnyen dang grogs ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:3737: gar mkhan nged min khyed cag 'phyas gdags min //
NK044(phi)001:3738: lha dbang ci'i phyir khyad du bsad nas su //
NK044(phi)001:3739: drang srong rnams la rtsed mo'i lam bzhin bya //
NK044(phi)001:3741: lha'i dbang po rab tu gus pas rna cha dang
NK044(phi)001:3742: cod pan 'gul ba'i 'od kyis gdong gsal bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:3743: bzhin phyag 'tshal nas bzod par gsol ba /
NK044(phi)001:3744: bdag gis 'di ltar mi brtan pa //
NK044(phi)001:3745: bgyis pa dgos pa sngar smras las //
NK044(phi)001:3746: pha dang slob dpon 'dra ba ru //
NK044(phi)001:3747: 'di la khyod kyis bzod par mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:3748: shes pa'i mig ni zum par gyur pa rnams //
NK044(phi)001:3749: rang bzhin gyis ni bgam pa'ang 'khrul par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3750: bdag la phan pas de nyid bzod par mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:3751: de bas bdag la thugs la mi 'chang gsol //
NK044(phi)001:3752: zhes byas nas de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3753: de'i tshe nu bo drug po ni rim pa ltar sh+aa ri'i bu dang /
NK044(phi)001:3759: sring mo ni ut+pala'i mdog go //
NK044(phi)001:3760: bran mo ni kub+dza ut+ta ra dang /
NK044(phi)001:3761: bran pho ni khyim bdag mdzes pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:3762: gnod sbyin ni ri bo bde ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:3763: glang po che ni sa ri lo ka dang //
NK044(phi)001:3764: spre'u ni sbrang rtsi 'bul ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:3765: brgya byin ni nag so 'char kha'o //
NK044(phi)001:3767: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid bram ze'i rigs gcig
NK044(phi)001:3768: tu skyes pa des rig byed yan lag dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:3769: pa bslabs shing mkhas pa'i grags pa dang nor gyis
NK044(phi)001:3770: phyug cing gtong ba la dga' bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3771: des khyim gyi gnas ni nyes pa du ma'i 'byung
NK044(phi)001:3772: gnas su rig ste khyim gyi 'byor pa rtsa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:3773: spangs nas rab tu byung zhing dka' thub kyi 'dul
NK044(phi)001:3774: ba la brtson par gyur pa'i tshe na yang de'i
NK044(phi)001:3775: yon tan gyi dpal la dga' ba'i skye bo mang
NK044(phi)001:3776: po phyi bzhin 'du zhing 'ongs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:3777: de 'du 'ji la mi dga' bas ku ru zhes
NK044(phi)001:3778: pa'i gling lho phyogs kyi rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug
NK044(phi)001:3779: pa'i dben pa la gnas nas dka' thub dang brtul
NK044(phi)001:3781: de dka' thub kyi tshal na gnas kyang sngon sbyin
NK044(phi)001:3782: pa la goms ches pas blo bur dus su 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:3783: pa rnams la rtsa ba dang 'bras bu dang chu
NK044(phi)001:3784: gtsang ma bstabs nas 'ongs pa legs so zhes pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3785: sgras mgu bar byed cing dka' thub can thams cad
NK044(phi)001:3786: la mchod par byed cing drang skrong a gas+t+ya zhes
NK044(phi)001:3787: bya ba'i ming can du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3788: brgya byin gyis de brtag pa'i phyir dgon pa der
NK044(phi)001:3789: rtsa ba dang 'bras bu bzar rung ba thams cad
NK044(phi)001:3790: mthar gyis mi snang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3791: byang chub sems dpa' yang chog shes dang zas la zhen pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3792: lus la ma chags shing bsam gtan la zhugs pas /
NK044(phi)001:3793: de dag mi snang ba'i rgyu yid la mi byed do //
NK044(phi)001:3794: des shing lo gzhon nu rnams btsos te zos nas yid bde bar gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:3795: yang brgya byin gyis phyogs de'i ljon pa dang ldum
NK044(phi)001:3796: bu thams cad la lo ma med par byas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3797: tshe des lo ma rnying pa lhags shing cung zad
NK044(phi)001:3798: yod pa bsdus te chur btsos shing zos so //
NK044(phi)001:3799: de'i tshe na brgya byin bram ze'i gzugs su byas
NK044(phi)001:3800: nas byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'ong ba dga'
NK044(phi)001:3801: bar byas shing dka' bas rnyed de btsos pa de
NK044(phi)001:3802: dag thams cad byin nas bdag dga' bzhin bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:3803: gyis nyin mtshan 'da' bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3804: bram ze de de ltar nyi ma gsum du der 'ongs pa la dga' zhing mchod pa byas so //
NK044(phi)001:3805: de la brgya byin ngo mtshar nas 'di ni dka'
NK044(phi)001:3806: thub che bas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po'i
NK044(phi)001:3807: dpal 'dod na yang bsams pa tsam gyis 'grub par
NK044(phi)001:3808: rig nas dogs pa dang 'jigs pa skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:3809: bdag gi lus lha'i cha lugs su byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:3810: 'di ltar dka' thub byed pa'i dgos pa dang bsam pa ci yod ces dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3811: byang chub sems dpas bdag gis skye rga na 'chi'i
NK044(phi)001:3812: sems can rnams bskyab pa'i phyir de ltar gnas so
NK044(phi)001:3813: // brgya byin gyis 'di ni bdag gi dpal 'dod
NK044(phi)001:3814: pa min no snyam du rigs nas dga' ba bskyed
NK044(phi)001:3815: de byang chub sems dpa' la bdag gis khyod la
NK044(phi)001:3816: mchog sbyin par bya na khyod ci 'dod pa slongs
NK044(phi)001:3817: // shig / byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3818: chung ma yid du 'ong ba dang bu dang nor
NK044(phi)001:3819: sogs rgya chen yod kyang chog mi shes pa'i brkam
NK044(phi)001:3820: chags de bdag gi snying la med par byos shig
NK044(phi)001:3821: / des brgya byin mgu nas bstod cing mchog sbyin par 'dod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3822: byang chub sems dpas chos ston par 'dod nas mchog slong ba'i tshul gyis /
NK044(phi)001:3823: dge dang bde ba'i phyogs nyams par byed pa'i zhe sdang med pa'i mchog bslangs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3824: brgya byin mgu nas bstod cing mchog sbyin par 'dod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3826: byis pa'i skye bo mi mthong mi thos mi 'grogs
NK044(phi)001:3827: shing de dang 'grogs pa'i sdug bsngal mi myong ba'i
NK044(phi)001:3830: byis pa'i skye bo snying rje'i gnas yin cing /
NK044(phi)001:3831: snying rje can khyod ci'i phyir de dag mthong bar mi 'dod /
NK044(phi)001:3832: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3833: ji ltar byas kyang byis pa la phan btags par dka' ste /
NK044(phi)001:3834: 'di dag tshul min la zhen nas /
NK044(phi)001:3835: gzhan yang de la sbyor zhing /
NK044(phi)001:3836: dul ba dang drang srong gi tshul dang mi mthun
NK044(phi)001:3837: pas phan par bstan kyang 'khrugs par 'gyur ba dang
NK044(phi)001:3838: / nga rgyal dang gti mug che zhing gzu lum
NK044(phi)001:3839: can brtson 'grus chung ba yin pas snying rjer gyur
NK044(phi)001:3840: kyang de dag phan gdags pa'i snod du ma rung
NK044(phi)001:3841: bar shes nas mthong ba tsam du'ang mi 'dod do
NK044(phi)001:3842: / // brgya byin gyis legs par bshad pa de
NK044(phi)001:3843: dag la basngagasa shing me tog gis snyim pa bkang
NK044(phi)001:3844: bas btud de mchog sbyin par smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3846: brtan pa rnams mthong zhing thos pa de dag dang
NK044(phi)001:3847: 'grogs pa dang smra zhing spobs pa'i bde ba dang
NK044(phi)001:3848: ldan pa'i mchog bslangs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3850: khyod ni brtan pa la dga' na de'i rgyu ci zhig /
NK044(phi)001:3851: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3852: brtan pa rnams ni yon tan gyi lam du 'gro zhing gzhan kyang lam de la 'dzud /
NK044(phi)001:3853: tshig rtsub mo med cing phan par byed pa yin /
NK044(phi)001:3854: g.yo sgyu med pas 'dul bas brgyan pas phan bdag bstan pa'i snod du rung ba de'i phyir na'o //
NK044(phi)001:3855: de la brgya byin gyis bstod cing legs par bshad
NK044(phi)001:3856: pas phan btags pa'i lam du mchog slongs shig ces
NK044(phi)001:3857: byas pa la / byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3858: khyod kyis kha zas zad pa'i nyes pa spangs //
NK044(phi)001:3859: yid kyang sbyin la dga' dang mthun gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:3860: slong mi rnams ni tshul khrims rnam dag brgyan //
NK044(phi)001:3861: 'di dag bdag la yod gyur mchog bslang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3863: 'dir yang khyod ni legs par smras pa rin po che'i 'byung gnas su gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3864: gzhan khyod kyis bslangs pa de thams cad de bzhin du 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:3865: legs smras 'di la yang yon du khyod la mchog sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:3866: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3867: lha rnams kun gyi mchog tu gyur pa khyod //
NK044(phi)001:3868: bdag la phan 'dogs rgyur gyur mchog sbyin na //
NK044(phi)001:3869: gsal bar bdag drung slan chad mi 'byon pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:3870: mchog 'di lha min 'joms pa khyod la bslangs //
NK044(phi)001:3872: brgya byin ngo mtshar zhing ngo gnong bzhin smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3873: re zhig bzlas brjod dang brtul zhugs dka' thub byed
NK044(phi)001:3874: pa'i skye bo rnams kho bo'i rjes su mthun par
NK044(phi)001:3875: 'dod na / kho bo khyod la mchog sbyin par 'dod nas 'ongs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3876: khyod de ltar mthong bar mi 'dod pa ci yi phyir yin /
NK044(phi)001:3877: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3878: 'di ni mi bsrun pa'i tshul dang /
NK044(phi)001:3880: khyod dang 'phrad mi 'dod pa yang ma yin te /
NK044(phi)001:3881: lha'i gzugs mchog khyod lta bu mthong bas 'du 'dzi
NK044(phi)001:3882: la gnas na khyod ni zhi zhing dwangs yang bdag
NK044(phi)001:3883: gi dka' thub nyams par 'gyur du dogs pa lags
NK044(phi)001:3885: brgya byin de la phyag 'tshal te bskor ba byas nas mi snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3886: de nas nam langs pa dang /
