NK044(phi)001:3887: lha'i bza' btung brgya byin gyis sbyar ba rnams dang /
NK044(phi)001:3888: rang sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma brgya byin gyis spyan drangs pa rnams dang /
NK044(phi)001:3889: lha'i bu gzhon nu bshos 'dren par chas pa du
NK044(phi)001:3890: ma dag lhags pa byang chub sems dpas mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:3891: de dag gi drang srong chen po de dag la
NK044(phi)001:3893: de ltar dka' thub kyi tshal na gnas kyang gtong phod la dga' ba ni rgyan du 'gyur zhing /
NK044(phi)001:3894: de ltar zas la ma chags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3895: lha'i dbang po yang mthong bar mi 'dod na gzhan pa'i 'du ba lta ci smros te /
NK044(phi)001:3896: de lta bur 'du 'dzis dben pa la dga' bas bsam gtan grub pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:3897: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:3898: chen po mtho zhing 'byor pa gcig gi sras su
NK044(phi)001:3899: skyes pa'i tshe / rgyal po de'i sras snga ma
NK044(phi)001:3900: rnams btsas so cog shi ba mi ma yin pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3901: gnod par bsams nas bu de bsrung ba'i phyir lcags
NK044(phi)001:3902: kyi khang pa nor bu rin po ches brgyan par
NK044(phi)001:3903: bzhag ste rig byed las byung ba'i srung ba dang
NK044(phi)001:3904: bkra shis pa'i dpyad byas pas sos te lcags khyim
NK044(phi)001:3906: de btsas pa'i tshe na yang phyogs de'i skye bo
NK044(phi)001:3907: rnams bde ba dang ldan zhing gzugs yid du 'ong
NK044(phi)001:3908: ba dang / snying rje dang blo gsal ba sogs
NK044(phi)001:3909: kyi yon tan gyis skye bo thams cad yid shin
NK044(phi)001:3910: tu mgu bar byed cing bsod nams kyi stobs las
NK044(phi)001:3911: lha'i 'byor pa dang mtshungs pa'i dga' ston chen po
NK044(phi)001:3912: la rtsen zhing gnas pa de /
NK044(phi)001:3913: me tog ku mu ta'i dga' ston gyi dus su /
NK044(phi)001:3914: shing rta bzang po nor bu dang dar sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:3915: kyi rgyan dang ba dan gyi bkod pas mdzes pa
NK044(phi)001:3916: rta mchog gis drangs pa'i shing rta la zhugs nas
NK044(phi)001:3917: / gos dang rgyan gyis mdzes pa'i g.yog 'khor mang
NK044(phi)001:3918: po dang bcas nas rol mo rnams brdungs bzhin song
NK044(phi)001:3919: / ngo // mi rnams rgyal bu de la lta
NK044(phi)001:3920: zhing ngo mtshar nas shis pa brjod cing dga' bar
NK044(phi)001:3921: / ngo // byed do // de sngon goms pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3922: shugs kyis dga' ston gyi rnam pa mang po mthong
NK044(phi)001:3924: kye ma'o 'jig rten nyon mongs dag /
NK044(phi)001:3925: gnas pa mi brtan mi dga' 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3926: ku mu ta yi dpal 'di yang //
NK044(phi)001:3927: brtan par bya ba nyid du 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3928: 'gro ba 'di lta bur ni gang 'khod pa //
NK044(phi)001:3929: skye bo 'jigs pa med pa re mtshar kye //
NK044(phi)001:3930: lam rnams thams cad 'chi bdag nyid kyis bkag /
NK044(phi)001:3931: dogs pa med par rab tu dga' bzhin spyod //
NK044(phi)001:3932: na dang rga dang 'chi bas gnod byed dgra //
NK044(phi)001:3933: mthu chen dpag tu mi nus yod bzhin la //
NK044(phi)001:3934: 'jig rten pha rol nyam ngar nges 'gro na //
NK044(phi)001:3935: sems shes su zhig 'di la dga' bar sems //
NK044(phi)001:3936: sprin chen glog 'gyu gser phreng 'dra ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:3937: rgya mtsho chen po rnams kyi sgra yang phyang //
NK044(phi)001:3938: char chen 'beb pa'i rtsom pa chen po byas //
NK044(phi)001:3939: kun tu 'dus kyang de nas dengs par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:3940: zhes pa la sogs pa'i tshul du snod bcud mi
NK044(phi)001:3941: rtag pa'i ngang tshul la gzhigs pas ltad mo de
NK044(phi)001:3942: dag la dga' ba med par gyur cing slar log
NK044(phi)001:3943: ste rang gnas su phyin nas /
NK044(phi)001:3944: yab rgyal po la dka' thub kyi nags su mchi bar gsol ba btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3945: rgyal po de bu la byams pas shin tu mi
NK044(phi)001:3946: dga' zhing du bzhin bu gcig bdag cag ci'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:3947: 'dor rigs te khyod nga la dogs pa'am 'khrul par
NK044(phi)001:3948: gyur pa dang gnod pa gzhan ci zhig yod na
NK044(phi)001:3949: smros dang bdag gis de bzlog par bya'o zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:3950: pa la / byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3951: bdag la byams pa khyod la 'khrul pa ga la yod do //
NK044(phi)001:3952: gnod pa gzhan kyang med mod /
NK044(phi)001:3953: bdag ni 'chi bas 'jigs nas de ltar bsams te /
NK044(phi)001:3954: 'chi ba 'di la thabs cis kyang bzlog pa'i rngo
NK044(phi)001:3955: mi thogs pa'i slad du'o zhes sogs 'chi ba'i nyes
NK044(phi)001:3956: pa rnam pa sna tshogs zhib tu byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:3958: 'o na de ltar 'chi bdag gi 'jigs pa bcos
NK044(phi)001:3959: su mi rung na chos yongs su bzung ste nags
NK044(phi)001:3960: tshal du song yang ci phan /
NK044(phi)001:3961: khyod kyi nags su 'chi bdag mi 'ong ngam ci /
NK044(phi)001:3962: drang srong chos la gnas pa rnams kyang nags su mi 'achi'am /
NK044(phi)001:3964: khyim bor nas nags su song yang mi phan no //
NK044(phi)001:3965: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:3966: nags dang khyim na gnas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:3967: log pa dang chos la spyod pa thams cad 'chi bar 'dra yang /
NK044(phi)001:3968: nags su chos spyod du rung la /
NK044(phi)001:3969: chos spyod pa rnams shi na yang mya ngan gyi gdung ba mi 'byung ba /
NK044(phi)001:3970: shi nas kyang gnas bzang por 'agro'o //
NK044(phi)001:3971: khyim na nyes pa du ma'i skyon chags pas chos bsgrub par yang dka' la /
NK044(phi)001:3972: chos min byas na 'chi ba'i tshe mya ngan chen po skye shing /
NK044(phi)001:3973: shi nas yang ngan 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i gtam rgyas par byas pas rgyal pos kyang gnang ste /
NK044(phi)001:3974: rgyal srid kyi 'byor pa yid du 'ong ba'i dpal
NK044(phi)001:3975: chen po de dag r+ts+wa dang 'dra bar bor nas
NK044(phi)001:3976: dka' thub kyi nags su gnas pas bsam gtan bzhi
NK044(phi)001:3977: dang tshad med pa bzhi bsgrubs te 'jig rten pa
NK044(phi)001:3978: rnams kyang de la bkod nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:3979: tshe tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:3980: de ltar na bsam gtan gyi sems ni /
NK044(phi)001:3981: 'dod pa'i yon tan la ma chags pa'i lam gyis 'grub pa yin pas /
NK044(phi)001:3982: ma chags shing gcig pu dben par gnas pa'i bsam gtan la rjes su gzhol bar mos par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:3983: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das 'di
NK044(phi)001:3984: nyid bram ze'i rigs chen po rgyal pos bkur ba
NK044(phi)001:3985: / 'byor pa che zhing 'jig rten pa rnams lha bzhin du dga' ba zhig tu gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:3986: cho ga rnams byas shing mang du thos pa'i mkhas pa'i grags pa dang ldan par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:3987: de sngon goms pa'i stobs kyis khyim la mi dga'
NK044(phi)001:3988: bar nags su rab tu byung bar 'dod pas skra
NK044(phi)001:3989: bregs shing gos ngur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung
NK044(phi)001:3990: ba'i tshe / chung ma yang rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:3991: chung ma de yang de'i phyi bzhin 'brang 'dod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:3992: des khyod dka' thub kyi nags su 'dug mi nus pas /
NK044(phi)001:3993: bud med rab tu byung ba gzhan gang na yod
NK044(phi)001:3994: par lhan cig gnas na legs zhes lan gsum smras
NK044(phi)001:3995: kyang / de de la snying nye bas phyi bzhin 'brangs te /
NK044(phi)001:3996: rim gyis dgon pa'i gnas nags tshal nyams dga' bar phyin nas 'khod de bsam gtan byed cing /
NK044(phi)001:3997: phyi dro'i dus zhig na byang chub sems dpa' tshom bu byed cing 'dug la /
NK044(phi)001:3998: bud med de yang ha cang mi ring ba zhig
NK044(phi)001:3999: na lus kyi gzi mad ngas lha mo ltar 'dug
NK044(phi)001:4000: cing / yid la bya ba'i man ngag bstan pa bzhin du bsam gtan byed cing 'dug go //
NK044(phi)001:4001: de nas yul de'i rgyal po de dpyid kyi dus su nags der rgyu ba las /
NK044(phi)001:4002: byang chub sems dpa'i gan du 'ongs nas dga' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:4003: gtam byas te nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu bsdad pa
NK044(phi)001:4004: / des bud med de mthong nas snying chags par gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:4005: 'di 'di'i chung ma yin 'dug kyang 'phrog par brtsam ste /
NK044(phi)001:4006: ci 'di dka' thub kyi yon tan gyi mthu dang ldan nam mi ldan brtags la /
NK044(phi)001:4007: ldan pa zhig na brnyas thabs mi rung ngo snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:4008: gal te sems can chags pa'i dbang du gyur pa zhig na dka' thub kyi mthu med nges la /
NK044(phi)001:4009: gal te chags bral zhig yin na 'di la mi
NK044(phi)001:4010: lta bar rigs so snyam du byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:4011: la smras pa / kye rab tu byung ba khyod 'jig rten 'dir mi g.yon can dang /
NK044(phi)001:4012: thub tshod can rab tu mang na /
NK044(phi)001:4013: nags dben pa 'dir chung ma 'di gzhan gyis gtses na ci byar yod /
NK044(phi)001:4014: ci ste khro ba bskyed na ni chos dang 'gal bas 'di grong du ci'i phyir mi bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:4015: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4016: rgyal pos gsungs pa mang na gal te de ltar gyur na bdag gis ci bgyi ba gson cig /
NK044(phi)001:4017: rgyags pas snyems pas gal te ma brtags par //
NK044(phi)001:4018: bdag la gnod pa byed pa 'dir byung na //
NK044(phi)001:4019: sa rdul stug po char pas mnan pa bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:4020: bdag nyid gson bzhin de ni yong mi gtong //
NK044(phi)001:4022: rgyal po des 'di ni chung ma la shin tu
NK044(phi)001:4023: chags pa zhig ste dka' thub kyi mthu med do
NK044(phi)001:4025: bud med de rgyal po'i pho brang du 'khrid par brtsam pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4026: bud med rab tu byung bar rab tu ngu zhing
NK044(phi)001:4027: jo jo la phyogs par smre sngags 'don bzhin shing
NK044(phi)001:4028: rtar bzhag ste khrid pa byang chub sems dpas mthong
NK044(phi)001:4029: na yang so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyis khro ba
NK044(phi)001:4030: bcom nas sems mi 'khrugs par phyag dar khrod pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4032: de la rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4033: khyod sngar bdag gson bzhin de mi gtong ngo zhes smras na /
NK044(phi)001:4034: nga 'phrog pa'i tshe mthu med par zhum zhing 'dug pas ci bya /
NK044(phi)001:4036: de ltar min na bdag gi tshod mi shes pa'i khas 'ches don med do //
NK044(phi)001:4037: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4038: rgyal po bdag gis dam bcas pa'i don med par ma byas te /
NK044(phi)001:4040: gang zhig bdag la gnod par bgyis pa de //
NK044(phi)001:4041: g.yo bzhin du yang bdag gis yong mi btang //
NK044(phi)001:4042: bdag gis mngon sum du yang zhi bar bgyis //
NK044(phi)001:4043: de bas bdag gis yi dam bcas bzhin gyur //
NK044(phi)001:4044: der rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa' la dka' thub kyi yon tan yod par shes shing /
NK044(phi)001:4045: 'dis sngar smras pa'i don kyang bdag gis ma shes pa 'dra'o snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:4046: byang chub sems dpa' la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4047: rnam par g.yo bzhin khyod kyis ma btang pa //
NK044(phi)001:4048: khyod la gnod byed de ni su zhig yin //
NK044(phi)001:4049: char pa babs pas rdul phran bkab pa bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:4050: khyod kyis gang zhig rab tu zhi bar byas //
NK044(phi)001:4051: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4052: skyes na dge ba mi mngon la //
NK044(phi)001:4053: ma skyes pa na dge ba mngon //
NK044(phi)001:4054: bdag la gnod pa'i khro ba de //
NK044(phi)001:4055: bdag gis shor bar ma gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4056: zhes sogs khro ba'i nyes dmigs rnams smras pa rgyal
NK044(phi)001:4057: po'i snying la bab par gyur nas nyes pa bshags
NK044(phi)001:4058: shing bud med rab tu byung ba de la yang
NK044(phi)001:4059: bzod par gsol te slar btang zhing bdag nyid kyang
NK044(phi)001:4060: byang chub sems dpa'i g.yog tu khas blang bar byas
NK044(phi)001:4061: so // de ltar khro ba dang 'khon du 'dzin pa thul na dgra thul bar 'gyur gyi /
NK044(phi)001:4063: khro ba dang chags pa'i zug rngu med pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:4064: bsam gtan dri ma med pa'i sems kyis gnas pa
NK044(phi)001:4065: la reg par 'gyur ba yin par shes par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:4066: // yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid kun tu rgyu
NK044(phi)001:4067: byang chub ces bya bar gyur pa de khyim na
NK044(phi)001:4068: gnas pa'i tshe 'jig rten pas basngagasa pa'i bslab pa
NK044(phi)001:4069: rnams kyi gnas dang sgyu rtsal sna tshogs mkhas par
NK044(phi)001:4070: // byas shing / phyis rab tu byung ba'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:4071: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson pas chos kyi gtsug
NK044(phi)001:4072: lag rnams la lhag par bslabs pas slob dpon gyi
NK044(phi)001:4074: gang du song ba der mkhas pa rnams dang rgyal po dang bram ze khyim bdag rnams dang /
NK044(phi)001:4076: rab tu byung ba thams cad kyis bkur bar gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:4077: bdag nyid chen po des kyang gzhan la phan btags pa'i yul kun tu rgyu zhing dong ba las /
NK044(phi)001:4078: rgyal po zhig gi yul 'dab tu phyin pa /
NK044(phi)001:4079: rgyal po des byang chub sems dpa' de'i yon tan
NK044(phi)001:4080: gyi grags pa rgyang ring po nas thos pas rang
NK044(phi)001:4081: gi skyed tshal gyi phyogs gcig tu de'i gnas byas
NK044(phi)001:4083: byang chub sems dpas kyang de dag la chos ston to //
NK044(phi)001:4084: de'i yon tan dang grags pa la phrag dog pa
NK044(phi)001:4085: dag gis thabs kyis rgyal po de byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:4086: dpa' la mi dga' bar bya ba'i slad du /
NK044(phi)001:4087: kun tu rgyu byang chub 'di ni g.yo can 'jam po'i tshul gyis nyams drod 'dzin pa lags te /
NK044(phi)001:4088: nyi 'og gi rgyal po 'ba' zhig gis bya ma rtar btang bar nges so //
NK044(phi)001:4089: 'dis chos kyi bdag nyid can ngo tsha shes shing
NK044(phi)001:4090: 'jam des can du bgyis nas thabs kyis bag 'beb
NK044(phi)001:4091: cing slu bar byed do zhes smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4092: rgyal po yang cung zad yid ma ches nas de
NK044(phi)001:4093: la byams pa dang bkur sti chung bar gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:4094: de mthong nas rgyal po thugs ma dgyes pa shes
NK044(phi)001:4095: nas / kun tu rgyu'i yo byad dbyu gu gsum
NK044(phi)001:4096: dang ril ba spyi blugs sogs khyer te 'gro bar
NK044(phi)001:4097: nas / chas pa la / rgyal pos re zhig
NK044(phi)001:4098: dul ba'i tshul bstan te bdag bor te khyed 'gro
NK044(phi)001:4099: bar chas pa bdag gis nongs pa ci mthong /
NK044(phi)001:4100: byang chub sems dpas smras pa bdag ni don med par 'chi ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:4101: bkur sti chung bas khros pa min gyi /
NK044(phi)001:4102: rgyal po khyod chos kyi snod du ma gyur pa g.yo dang bcas pas bdag 'di nas cha'o //
NK044(phi)001:4103: der rgyal pos khyi gnang chen zhig khrid de 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:4104: pa de khros pas mche ba gtsigs pa de bstan
NK044(phi)001:4105: nas byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4106: rgyal po chen po khyi 'di sngon bdag la 'dris par byed kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4107: da lta mche ba gtsigs te khros pas dud 'gro
NK044(phi)001:4108: 'di dag gis kyang khyod kyi dgongs pa bstan pas
NK044(phi)001:4109: bdag la ma gus pa'i tshig khyod las 'dis thos
NK044(phi)001:4111: 'di yang khyod kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i 'khor nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:4113: rgyal po ngo tsha zhing mgo smad de 'di blo
NK044(phi)001:4114: rno bas shes su 'ong gis nga g.yo bya'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:4115: du / bdag gis khyed la gleng ba tshogs pa'i nang du bgyis pa bden gyi /
NK044(phi)001:4116: dgos pa'i dbang gis bdag gis yal bar bor ba la /
NK044(phi)001:4117: bzod pa mdzad de ma bzhud cig /
NK044(phi)001:4118: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4119: da ni 'gro ba'i dus lags te /
NK044(phi)001:4120: bkur sti chung ba'i dus su bdag rang nyid ma song na /
NK044(phi)001:4122: bdag mi dga' bzhin du 'gro ba'ang ma lags te /
NK044(phi)001:4123: slan chad phan btags pa'i byams pa'ang mi 'dor la /
NK044(phi)001:4124: byas pa la drin mi gzo ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:4125: mdza' ba mi brtan pa ni mi'i nang na tha chad yin pas /
NK044(phi)001:4126: des na mdza' ba'i mjug 'di bsrung ba'i slad du bdag re zhig mchi'o //
NK044(phi)001:4128: gal te khyod mi 'gror mi btub na /
NK044(phi)001:4129: nga la slar blta ba'i slad du 'dir byon cing
NK044(phi)001:4130: spyan ras kyis btsa' bar rigs kyis 'khon du 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:4132: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4133: rgyal po chen po 'jig rten gnas pa 'di ni
NK044(phi)001:4134: bar chad mang bas nges par mchi zhes khas blang
NK044(phi)001:4135: mi rung yang / gal te mchi ba'i skal pa
NK044(phi)001:4136: dang ldan na khyod kyi zhal blta'o zhes bkur sti
NK044(phi)001:4138: des khyim pa la brten pa des sems mi bde
NK044(phi)001:4139: bar shes nas dgon pa'i gnas zhig tu bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:4140: la brtson pas ring por ma lon par bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:4141: bzhi dang mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur
NK044(phi)001:4142: nas / rgyal po de la snying brtse bas de ji ltar 'dug brtags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4143: de'i blon po rnams kyis rgyu brtag mi bzod pas rgyu med par smra ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:4144: pad+ma'i sdong po la lo ma me tog sogs dang mdog dbyibs reg bya la sogs kyi rgyu dang /
NK044(phi)001:4145: bya'i 'dab ma ri mo sna tshogs kyi rgyu ci
NK044(phi)001:4146: yod snyam du 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis byung
NK044(phi)001:4147: ba dang / yang kha cig gis dbang phyug gis byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4148: kha cig tshe 'di'i bde ba kho na sgrub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4149: phyogs la bsten pa sogs blon po so so'i zhe
NK044(phi)001:4150: 'dod kyi lta ba tha dad pa dag gis rgyal
NK044(phi)001:4151: po de lam ngan par drangs pa las /
NK044(phi)001:4152: rgyal po de gzhan gyi dring la 'jog pas lta
NK044(phi)001:4153: ba ngan pa'i g.yang sar lhung du nye bar rigs
NK044(phi)001:4154: nas / de la snying brtse ba'i phyir de zlog pa'i thabs bsams te /
NK044(phi)001:4155: rang gi dka' thub kyi gnas su spre'u chen po
NK044(phi)001:4156: zhig sprul pa de'i pags pa rdzu 'phrul gyis bshus
NK044(phi)001:4157: nas / cha byad gzhan mi snang bar spre'u'i pags
NK044(phi)001:4158: pa de gyon nas rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor
NK044(phi)001:4159: nas / phyin pa dang / chab sgo der mtshon
NK044(phi)001:4160: cha thogs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs sdod la de nas
NK044(phi)001:4161: nang du nang mi dang bram ze dang blon po
NK044(phi)001:4162: rnams go rim bzhin sdod cing rgyal po ni nang
NK044(phi)001:4163: du seng ge'i khri la 'dug go //
NK044(phi)001:4164: rgyal po des bsus nas bkur sti dang snyan par smra bas gdan bting ba la bzhag go //
NK044(phi)001:4166: 'phags pa spre'u'i pags pa 'di sus phul /
NK044(phi)001:4167: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4168: 'di rang gis rnyed kyis sus kyang ma phul te /
NK044(phi)001:4169: sa la ku sha bting ba la 'dug pa las
NK044(phi)001:4170: chos kyi cho ga bgyid du rngo ma thogs nas
NK044(phi)001:4171: spre'u chen po 'di nags de na mchis pa mthong
NK044(phi)001:4172: nas / bdag gis chos spyod pa'i yo byad du
NK044(phi)001:4173: 'di'i pags pa blangs na 'dug gam nyal kyang chos
NK044(phi)001:4174: 'grub bo snyam du spre'u de med par byas nas
NK044(phi)001:4175: pags pa bcangs par bgyis so zhes smras pa la
NK044(phi)001:4176: nas / / rgyal po dul zhing des pa'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:4177: bzung ste cang ma smras par ngo tsha bas mgo
NK044(phi)001:4179: blon po de dag sngon yang byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:4180: la mi bzod pa'i steng du skabs rnyed pas 'dzum
NK044(phi)001:4181: phyungs nas rgyal po la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4183: khyod kyi chos la dga' ba 'di'i blo la ltos /
NK044(phi)001:4184: dka' thub kyi nags na 'dug bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:4185: 'di gcig pus spre'u chen po 'di lta bu sod pa ngo mtshar che'o //
NK044(phi)001:4186: dka' thub grub par gyur cig /
NK044(phi)001:4187: byang chub sems dpa' ma khros par smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4188: khyed cag rang gi lta ba bzang po la mi lta bar bdag smad par mi rigs te /
NK044(phi)001:4189: rang gi lta ba dang 'gal ba'i tshig gis gzhan la gnod pa byas na /
NK044(phi)001:4190: rang nyid mi mkhas par rigs par 'gyur ro zhes smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:4191: blon po rgyu med par 'dod pa la bkar te
NK044(phi)001:4192: smras pa 'gro ba ngo bo nyid kyis byung ba
NK044(phi)001:4193: las rgyu med na bdag la ci zhig smad de
NK044(phi)001:4194: / spre'u ngo bo nyid kyis shi ba la bdag la sdig par cis 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:4195: bdag la sdig par 'gyur na ni rgyu las byung bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:4196: de bas rgyu med du smra ba 'di 'dor bar rigs te /
NK044(phi)001:4197: de skad smra ba khyod la mi rigs par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:4198: pad+ma'i sdong bu sogs rgyu med par 'byung na rtag tu rgyu med par cis mi 'byung /
NK044(phi)001:4199: des na chu dang sa bon la sogs yod na
NK044(phi)001:4200: skye la med na mi skye bas de la rgyu
NK044(phi)001:4202: gzhan yang rgyu med pa la sgrub pa'i gtan tshigs kyi rgyu med do zer na /
NK044(phi)001:4203: rang gis khas 'ches bas rang nyid sun phyung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:4204: gal te gtan tshigs med par rgyu med pa 'grub
NK044(phi)001:4205: na khas blangs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba
NK044(phi)001:4206: de mi srid pas rgyu med du khas 'che ba
NK044(phi)001:4207: tsam zhig gis ci yang mi phan no //
NK044(phi)001:4208: gal te kha cig rgyu de'i rgyu rkyen ma mthong ba tsam zhig gis /
NK044(phi)001:4209: thams cad rgyu med par smra ba mi rigs te /
NK044(phi)001:4210: kha cig rgyu dang bcas par mngon sum mthong bzhin de la 'gal bar ji ltar smra /
NK044(phi)001:4211: gal te yul dus gang na yang rgyu yod par ma mthong ngo zhe na /
NK044(phi)001:4212: rgyu de ni med ces nges pa'am rgyu mtshan ji ltar smra bar 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:4213: tshig tsam las rigs pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:4214: gal te ma mthong ba de nyid do zhe na
NK044(phi)001:4215: nyi ma nub te nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yod kyang
NK044(phi)001:4216: rgyu rkyen gzhan gyis mi mthong bar gyur pa'ang med
NK044(phi)001:4217: par 'dod dam / gzhan yang khyed cag bde ba 'dod cing sdug bsngal mi 'dod pa /
NK044(phi)001:4218: bde ba'i don du rgyal po la bsten bzhin rgyu med ces rtag tu ji ltar smra /
NK044(phi)001:4219: nges par rgyu med yin na bdag gis spre'u bsad
NK044(phi)001:4220: pa la yang smad du ci zhig yod ces rgyu
NK044(phi)001:4221: med smra ba rnams kyi spobs pa med par byas
NK044(phi)001:4222: nas / dbang phyug rgyur smra ba la bos te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4223: tshe dang ldan pa khyed cag gis bdag smad par mi rigs te /
NK044(phi)001:4224: thams cad dbang phyug gis byas par khyod 'dod na /
NK044(phi)001:4225: spre'u yang dbang phyug gis bsad pas bdag la mi
NK044(phi)001:4226: dgar byar ci yod de gzhan gyis nyes pa bdag
NK044(phi)001:4228: gal te spre'u de dbang phyug gis snying rje nas ma bsad zer na /
NK044(phi)001:4229: 'gro ba'i rgyu dbang phyug yin par ji ltar sgrogs /
NK044(phi)001:4230: kye bzang po dag thams cad dbang phyug gis byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:4231: de sus kyang ma byas pa'i rang byung yin na /
NK044(phi)001:4232: khyod kyis de la phyag 'tshal ba dang mchod sbyin
NK044(phi)001:4233: byed pa thams cad kyang de rang gis byas pas
NK044(phi)001:4235: sdig pa chen po thams cad kyang dbang phyug des
NK044(phi)001:4236: byed na de la gus pas yon tan ci zhig
NK044(phi)001:4237: yod / khyod kyis byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4238: sdig pa rnams dbang phyug gis mi byed na /
NK044(phi)001:4239: des thams cad byed par khas blang bar mi rigs so //
NK044(phi)001:4240: gzhan yang dbang phyug de nyid rang gi chos snga ma las byung ngam /
NK044(phi)001:4241: rang las gzhan pa dag gis byas pa gang yin /
NK044(phi)001:4242: gal te rang gi chos snga ma las byung na
NK044(phi)001:4243: chos de dag gi snga rol na dbang phyug med
NK044(phi)001:4244: pas thams cad des byas pa mi rigs so //
NK044(phi)001:4245: gal te gzhan gyis byas na bran ltar rang dbang med pa gzhan gyis byas par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:4246: de ltar na dbang phyug de ni ci'i phyir rgyu
NK044(phi)001:4247: yis ma byas pa nyid du smra zhing de la
NK044(phi)001:4248: gus par byed / rigs dang mi rigs pa'i dpyad
NK044(phi)001:4249: pa dor nas thams cad dbang phyug gis byas so
NK044(phi)001:4250: gus par byed / zer na / bdag pos spre'u
NK044(phi)001:4251: bsad pa'i skyon bdag la skur pa 'debs mi rigs
NK044(phi)001:4252: gus par byed / zer na / so // zhes de dag gi spobs pa bcom nas /
NK044(phi)001:4253: sngon gyi las 'ba' zhig rgyur smra ba rnams la bos nas sngon du bzhag te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4254: khyed cag gis kyang bdag la smad mi rigs te thams cad sngon gyi las kyis byas na /
NK044(phi)001:4255: bdag la spre'u bsad pa'i nyes pa ga la yod de /
NK044(phi)001:4256: sngon gyi las kyis nags mes tshig pa bzhin du bdag smad du med do //
NK044(phi)001:4257: gal te bdag la spre'u bsad pa'i sdig pa yod na /
NK044(phi)001:4258: bdag gis bsad kyis sngon gyi las kho na ma yin no //
NK044(phi)001:4259: gal te las dang las kyi rgyu thug med du 'dod na /
NK044(phi)001:4260: de thams cad zad par mi nus pas su yang grol ba mi srid la /
NK044(phi)001:4261: gal te bde ba sgrub pa'i rgyu dge ba rnams sdug bsngal gyi rgyu byed la /
NK044(phi)001:4262: sdug bsngal sgrub pa'i rgyu mi dge ba rnams bde ba'i rgyur gyur pa /
NK044(phi)001:4263: de ltar na da lta'i rtsom pa la rag ma
NK044(phi)001:4264: las pa'i sngon gyi las kyis de ltar byas so
NK044(phi)001:4266: bde sdug gi rgyu da ltar bsgrubs pa rnams ni
NK044(phi)001:4267: nam yang de ltar 'chol ba mi srid pas sngon
NK044(phi)001:4268: gyi las kho na thams cad kyi rgyu ma yin
NK044(phi)001:4269: no // yin na gsar du byas pa'i las kyang med par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:4270: las gsar pa ma grub na sngon la yang ji ltar 'grub /
NK044(phi)001:4271: sngon las kyis thams cad byas na spre'u bsad pa bdag gis byas pa ji ltar btags /
NK044(phi)001:4272: zhes de dag mi smra bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:4273: de nas chad par smra ba de la 'dzum dmul te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4274: khyed cag bdag la ci zhig smad /
NK044(phi)001:4275: gal te 'jig rten pha rol chad par lta ba
NK044(phi)001:4276: khyed ltar na sus kyang dge sdig la 'bad pas
NK044(phi)001:4277: ci bya ste / mkhas pa rnams kyang rang gar ci bde bar spyod rigs la /
NK044(phi)001:4278: de lta na spre'u bsad kyang de'i nyes pa su la smin /
NK044(phi)001:4279: da lta 'jig rten pas 'phya ba'i phyir dge ba sgrub cing sdig pa spong ngo snyam na /
NK044(phi)001:4280: rang gis khas blangs pa'i tshig dang mi mthun par
NK044(phi)001:4281: spyod pa de yang 'gro bas 'phya ba'i gnas su
NK044(phi)001:4282: gyur pa ma mthong bar zad do //
NK044(phi)001:4283: gang zhig 'jig rten pa'i tshul la gnas nas rang
NK044(phi)001:4284: gi gzhung lugs smras pa'i don yal bar bor na
NK044(phi)001:4285: / gzhung de smras pa don med pas 'khrul zhing
NK044(phi)001:4286: don med pa 'di 'dra ba byis pa'i nang na'ang
NK044(phi)001:4289: kha dog sogs sna tshogs pa can gyi yon tan
NK044(phi)001:4290: ldan pa'i shing rnams kyang las kyis byas pa ma
NK044(phi)001:4291: yin mod kyi 'on kyang rang dus su 'byung la
NK044(phi)001:4292: / gal te bsregs pa dang bcad pa sogs kyis chud zos pa na /
NK044(phi)001:4293: chud zos pa'i dngos po de dag slar yang mi
NK044(phi)001:4294: skye ba de bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad de
NK044(phi)001:4295: dang 'dra bar pha rol tu mi 'byung zhes pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4296: rgyu'am gtan tshigs ni ci 'dra zhig yin te /
NK044(phi)001:4297: rgyu rkyen tshogs na skye zhing ma tshogs na mi
NK044(phi)001:4298: skye ba'i don bye brag ma 'byed par mthong ba'i
NK044(phi)001:4299: nyi tshe ba'i smra ba tsam du zad do //
NK044(phi)001:4300: de ltar gyur kyang chad lta la dga' na spre'u'am mi bsad kyang smad du ci zhig yod /
NK044(phi)001:4301: ces smras pa de dag cang mi smra bar byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:4302: rgyal rigs kyi gzhung lugs la mkhas pa de la bos te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4303: khyed cag bdag la ci'i phyir smod /
NK044(phi)001:4304: gal te srid gzug pa'i gtsug lag las byung ba'i cho ga rigs shing 'bad par sems na /
NK044(phi)001:4305: srid phyir dge'am mi dge'am rung //
NK044(phi)001:4306: ci yang rung ba byas nas su //
NK044(phi)001:4307: de nas bdag nyid thar nas ni //
NK044(phi)001:4308: nor gyis chos ni bsgrub par bya //
NK044(phi)001:4309: zhes 'dod pa de'i phyir khyod la smra ste /
NK044(phi)001:4310: dgos pa byung ba'i mdza' dang gnyen la yang dge
NK044(phi)001:4311: ba'i tshul la mi lta na spre'u 'di pags pa
NK044(phi)001:4312: dgos pa'i phyir ngas bsad pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4313: gtsug lag gi gzhung lugs kyis ci zhig smad du yod /
NK044(phi)001:4314: 'on te snying rje med pas bsad pa'am /
NK044(phi)001:4315: 'di 'dra'i las kyi 'bras bu sdug bsngal yin no snyam na /
NK044(phi)001:4316: gtsug lag gi chos gtso bor mi bya bar /
NK044(phi)001:4317: khyod lam gzhan gyi rjes su 'brang bas ci bya /
NK044(phi)001:4318: gang 'di lta bu smra ba de rigs pa'i gzhung lugs yin na /
NK044(phi)001:4319: mi rigs 'khrul pa can de ci 'dra zhig /
NK044(phi)001:4321: spyi brtol can dag gis gtsug lag gi lam du btags nas chos min dar bar byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4322: khyed cag de la dga' bas gtsug lag las bstan
NK044(phi)001:4323: pa'o snyam du bden par zhen par byed pa ltar
NK044(phi)001:4324: na spre'u bsad kyang smad par mi rigs so //
NK044(phi)001:4325: de ltar 'khor de'i nang na spobs pa che bar
NK044(phi)001:4326: goms shing gzhan las rgyal po'i blon po rnams kyang
NK044(phi)001:4327: mngon sum zil gyis mnan pas rgyal po 'khor bcas
NK044(phi)001:4328: sems dad cing mgu bar shes nas rgyal po la
NK044(phi)001:4329: smras pa bdag gis srog dang bcas pa'i spre'u bkum
NK044(phi)001:4332: gtam 'di lta bu gleng ba'i slad du sprul pa byas pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:4333: de bas na bdag la gzhan du dogs pa mi
NK044(phi)001:4334: mdzad du gsol zhes smras nas sprul pa mngon par
NK044(phi)001:4335: 'du byed pa de btang bas rgyal po 'khor dang
NK044(phi)001:4336: bcas pa sems rab tu dad par gyur pa la
NK044(phi)001:4337: / rgyu las grub pa mthong bzhin la //
NK044(phi)001:4338: rang dbang 'jig rten pha rol shes //
NK044(phi)001:4339: dge ba khas len snying rje can //
NK044(phi)001:4340: srog chags gsod pa su zhig byed //
NK044(phi)001:4341: rgyal po chen po gsan du gsol //
NK044(phi)001:4342: rgyu med smra dang rang dbang lta ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:4343: yod par mi lta rgyal rigs gzhung lugs can //
NK044(phi)001:4344: grags pa cung zad phyir ni gzhung byed pa //
NK044(phi)001:4345: rigs par smra des ci ltar khas blang bya //
NK044(phi)001:4346: mi yi bdag po lta ba bzang ngam ngan //
NK044(phi)001:4347: ris mthun pas ni bsgrubs pa'i rgyu dag gis //
NK044(phi)001:4348: de dang de dag khyod kyis brtags na ni //
NK044(phi)001:4349: tshig dang spyod pa rnams kyis gsal bar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:4350: de bas lta ba bzang po brten par rigs //
NK044(phi)001:4351: lta ba ngan pas phung bar 'gyur ba yi //
NK044(phi)001:4352: skye bo ngan pa ring du spangs nas ni //
NK044(phi)001:4353: dam pa rnams la bsten na 'di shes 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:4354: zhes sogs dam pa bsten zhing sdig grogs spang ba
NK044(phi)001:4355: dang 'bangs la byams pas tshul bzhin bskyangs pa'i bka'
NK044(phi)001:4356: mchid rnams kyang legs par bgyis te /
NK044(phi)001:4357: rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pa lta ba ngan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4358: lam dang bral zhing yang dag pa'i lta ba la
NK044(phi)001:4359: btsud nas de nyid du nam mkha' la lding ba
NK044(phi)001:4360: dang / skye bo'i tshogs kyis gus pas phyag 'tshal
NK044(phi)001:4361: zhing mchod pa byas nas dgon pa'i gnas nyid du
NK044(phi)001:4362: dang / slar song ngo // yang ston pa bcom
NK044(phi)001:4363: ldan 'das nyid khyim bdag dben pa 'dod pa zhes
NK044(phi)001:4364: bya bar shing s+aa la chen po lta bur gyur
NK044(phi)001:4365: pa'i tshe phyug cing nor mang la legs gsungs tshol
NK044(phi)001:4366: ba la brtson pas yongs su ma btang ba gang
NK044(phi)001:4368: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag med ces bya
NK044(phi)001:4369: ba sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa
NK044(phi)001:4370: lam thams cad ston pa 'jig rten du byung ngo
NK044(phi)001:4371: zhes pa'i sgra bar snang las thos pa la slar
NK044(phi)001:4372: yang de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs lam ci
NK044(phi)001:4373: tsam sogs dris pa la lan bstan pa bzhin des
NK044(phi)001:4374: blon po dang grong gi gtso bo rnams bsdus te
NK044(phi)001:4375: shar phyogs su dpag tshad bye ba phrag bcu dang
NK044(phi)001:4376: stong na grong khyer lhun po'i rgyal mtshan du de
NK044(phi)001:4377: bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du song ba'i lam thams
NK044(phi)001:4378: cad du skye bo thams cad de'i phyi bzhin 'brangs
NK044(phi)001:4379: te de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du song ngo
NK044(phi)001:4380: // der lha rnams kyis sangs rgyas de la rim
NK044(phi)001:4381: gro byed pa dang sangs rgyas kyi sku mdzes shing
NK044(phi)001:4382: 'bar ba rgyang ring po nas mthong ste shing rta
NK044(phi)001:4383: las bab cing sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i skyed tshal der
NK044(phi)001:4384: phyin pa na sangs rgyas kyi mthus rlung bsil ba
NK044(phi)001:4385: dang spos chu'i char babs so //
NK044(phi)001:4386: khyim bdag de'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas bdud
NK044(phi)001:4387: rtsi'i 'od bsil bas reg pas lam gyis dub ba
NK044(phi)001:4389: de bzhin gshegs pa de ta la gcig tsam gyi
NK044(phi)001:4390: bar snang la 'chag par mdzad pa mthong nas khyim
NK044(phi)001:4391: bdag dben pa 'dod pas gsol pa /
NK044(phi)001:4392: ji ltar thos pa de bzhin mthong //
NK044(phi)001:4393: de bas kyang ni lhag par bzang //
NK044(phi)001:4394: 'jig rten dag na khyod dang ni //
NK044(phi)001:4395: ye shes yon tan 'dra ma mchis //
NK044(phi)001:4397: khyim bdag khyod kyis tshig smras pa //
NK044(phi)001:4398: dben par 'gyur ba yin te legs //
NK044(phi)001:4399: ji ltar 'dir ni yun ring du //
NK044(phi)001:4400: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu bsten //
NK044(phi)001:4402: nga las lhag 'gyur ga la yod //
NK044(phi)001:4403: khyim bdag cung zad yid la ni //
NK044(phi)001:4404: zhu ba gang dag 'dod pa zhus //
NK044(phi)001:4405: nges pa khyod kyi 'dod pa gang //
NK044(phi)001:4406: nga yis khyod kyis sems rangs bya //
NK044(phi)001:4407: nga la cung zad gang 'dri ba //
NK044(phi)001:4408: de ring the tshom med par bya //
NK044(phi)001:4410: ji ltar bsam gtan langs nas mchis //
NK044(phi)001:4411: bsam gtan bsam gtan yon tan dga' //
NK044(phi)001:4413: zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs //
NK044(phi)001:4414: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis ni //
NK044(phi)001:4415: shes pa de ni rtogs par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:4416: ldan pa dang ni shes pa'i rgyu //
NK044(phi)001:4417: zhus pa de dag bdag la gsungs //
NK044(phi)001:4418: de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer dpag med des lung
NK044(phi)001:4419: bstan pa tshigs bcad gcig gis yongs su mgu bar
NK044(phi)001:4420: mdzad de / mtshan med byas pa'i bsam gtan ni //
NK044(phi)001:4421: ldang ba la yang shin tu nges //
NK044(phi)001:4422: shes pa gang gis bsam gtan de //
NK044(phi)001:4423: so sor thob nas rab tu shes //
NK044(phi)001:4424: zhes gsungs pas khyim bdag de skye ba med pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4425: chos la rab tu bzhag nas som nyi dang the
NK044(phi)001:4426: tshom med par gnas shing 'khor de snang bar byas
NK044(phi)001:4427: nas gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' gsung dag /
NK044(phi)001:4430: gang+g+aa'i bye snyed sems can dag /
NK044(phi)001:4431: nga yis legs bshad thos nas su //
NK044(phi)001:4432: yang dag pa ni ji bzhin shes //
NK044(phi)001:4433: skye ba med la rab tu bkod //
NK044(phi)001:4435: de ltar 'gro ba thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhu ba zhus so //
NK044(phi)001:4436: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po
NK044(phi)001:4437: sems can thams cad la phan par 'dod pas bsam
NK044(phi)001:4439: bsam gtan gyi ldang ba la mkhas par bya /
NK044(phi)001:4440: ldang ba shes pa kun 'byung ba shes pa'i dge
NK044(phi)001:4441: ba'i rtsa ba gang yang dag par 'du bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:4442: pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag shin tu bzhag
NK044(phi)001:4443: par bya / shin tu gzung bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:4445: yang sngon gyi dus su ka shi ka'i rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:4446: blon po khra can zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:4448: de bstan gcos thams cad la mkhas shing brtan pa
NK044(phi)001:4449: dang dul ba sogs kyi yon tan khyad par du
NK044(phi)001:4450: 'phags pas skye bo'i tshogs la blang dor gyi gnas
NK044(phi)001:4451: bstan pas slob dpon lta bur gyur kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4452: des ka shi'i rgyal po de'i thugs dang mi mthun pa'i skyon bsal ba la zhugs te /
NK044(phi)001:4453: gnas dben par rgyal po la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4454: lha lags lus 'phags kyi rgyal po la sogs pa
NK044(phi)001:4455: rgyal po gzhan la yang skyon chags pa gang gis
NK044(phi)001:4457: gang 'thungs bas khro dang ngu dang bab col smra
NK044(phi)001:4458: zhing nad sna tshogs kyi rgyur gyur pa sogs chang
NK044(phi)001:4460: gang la chags pas rgyal pham gyi dogs pas sems 'khrugs shing don nyams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4461: gnyid dang gshang gci bkag pas nad du gyur pa sogs tshe lo rtse ba'i nyes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4462: sbrul dang sha sbrang dang tsha grang bkres skom ngal ba sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:4463: lam du rta las lhung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:4464: dgra sogs kyi 'jigs pa dang 'phrad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4465: 'bras bu shin tu mi bzad pa'i bya ba tha chad ri dwags bshor ba'i nyes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4466: rang dbang gi stobs nyams shing nyes pa'i mun pa
NK044(phi)001:4467: chen po 'dod chags kye mes rang nyid sreg par
NK044(phi)001:4468: byed pa bud med rnams la shin tu chags pa
NK044(phi)001:4469: ni mi yi gdung ba yin pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4470: lto 'gro ltar gdug pa skyed pa'i tshig rtsub mo
NK044(phi)001:4471: la sogs pa'i skyon 'di dag gis sa skyong rnams
NK044(phi)001:4473: dbang po yul las bsdams te tshul la gnas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4474: brtan pa can la ni dpal kun 'phel bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:4476: rgyal po yul rnams kyis dbang po phrogs pas ji bzhin bya mi nus kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4477: de la ngo bsrung ba'i slad du khyod lta bu
NK044(phi)001:4478: bla ma rnams kyi phan pa'i gdams ngag ni 'da'
NK044(phi)001:4479: bar bya ba ma yin no zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:4480: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi khyim du song nas slar btsun mo'i 'khor du zhugs par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4481: der mtshan mo'i dus su rgyal po de glu gar dang chang gis bag med pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4482: blon po kha cig khra can gyi blon pos che
NK044(phi)001:4483: ba'i dpal la phrag pa dog pas rgyal po la
NK044(phi)001:4484: smras pa / khra can 'di ni lus 'phags kyi
NK044(phi)001:4485: rgyal po dang bsdebs te lha'i rgyal srid 'jig pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4486: slad du 'bad par byed ces thos te /
NK044(phi)001:4487: lhas bag byos shig ces smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:4488: rmongs pa'i rang bzhin can gyi rgyal po des ma
NK044(phi)001:4489: dpyad par byang chub sems dpa' la mnyes gshin med
NK044(phi)001:4490: par gyur to // byang chub sems dpas kyang gtam de bden par byed pa rnams la /
NK044(phi)001:4491: skye bo rang bzhin gyis gdug pa sbrul lta bu
NK044(phi)001:4492: rnams kyis skyon med par bdag la rgyal po khror
NK044(phi)001:4494: 'di lta bu'i skye bo ma rungs pa'i khrod du gnas pas ci bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:4495: nyes pa'i tshogs kyis stong pa rang dbang du dge
NK044(phi)001:4496: ba'i 'jug pa dang mthun pa'i nags su 'gro bar
NK044(phi)001:4498: khyim gyi 'byor pa dang gnyen 'dun r+ts+wa ltar btang
NK044(phi)001:4499: ste dgon pa'i nags su dka' thub spyad pas bsam
NK044(phi)001:4500: gtan bzhi dang mngon shes lnga thob par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:4501: // nam zhig ka shi'i rgyal po shing rta la
NK044(phi)001:4502: zhon nas mtshon dang ldan pa'i dpung gi tshogs dang
NK044(phi)001:4503: bcas te ri dwags gshor du byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:4504: gnas pa'i nags der zhugs so //
NK044(phi)001:4505: de 'ongs pa shes nas byang chub sems dpas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:4506: po sdig pa la dga' ba 'di bdag gis lam
NK044(phi)001:4507: ngan pa las drangs te legs pa'i lam la bzhag
NK044(phi)001:4509: skad cig de nyid la rdzu 'phrul gyis dpung gi
NK044(phi)001:4510: tshogs bzhi dang ldan pa rnams go cha sra zhing
NK044(phi)001:4511: mtshon cha'i tshogs dang ldan pa /
NK044(phi)001:4512: rnga dang dung dang skye bo'i sgras ri g.yo ba
NK044(phi)001:4513: snyam byed pa'i lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i dmag gi
NK044(phi)001:4514: tshogs 'jigs su rung ba bstan par gyur pa /
NK044(phi)001:4515: ka shi'i rgyal pos mthong nas shin tu skrag ste
NK044(phi)001:4516: nga ni su la skyabs su 'gro bar bya snyam
NK044(phi)001:4517: pa dang / bdag nyid chen po khra can de
NK044(phi)001:4518: nags 'dir bzhugs pa des dka' thub kyi stobs kyis
NK044(phi)001:4519: bdag srung bar byed par 'gyur ro snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:4520: shing rta 'dren pa la khra can gang na bzhugs
NK044(phi)001:4521: par shing rta drongs zhes byas pa ltar der song
NK044(phi)001:4522: ba la byang chub sems dpas pheb par smras nas
NK044(phi)001:4523: rgyal po de nyid de'i skyil por stan la 'dug
NK044(phi)001:4524: par gyur to // der dmag gi tshogs de yang mi snang ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:4525: rgyal pos dgra'i dpung de gang du song zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4526: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4527: rgyal po khyod rnam par 'dul ba'i phyir bdag gis
NK044(phi)001:4528: rdzu 'phrul gyi che ba'i bdag nyid bstan pa yin
NK044(phi)001:4529: gyis / 'dir lus 'phags kyi rgyal po'i dmag tshogs med do //
NK044(phi)001:4530: rgyal po chen po gzhan yang dgra'i 'jigs pa gcig pur ma zad kyi /
NK044(phi)001:4531: rgyal srid ni skyon mang ba bde ba chung la
NK044(phi)001:4532: mthar 'jigs pa che ba dmyal ba sogs ngan 'gror
NK044(phi)001:4533: lhung bar byed pa yin pas de spangs la khyod
NK044(phi)001:4534: zhi ba'i nags kyi gnas su rab tu byung zhig
NK044(phi)001:4536: 'dod pa las phyir phyogs pa'i yon tan gyi chos
NK044(phi)001:4537: bstan pas rgyal po de de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs
NK044(phi)001:4539: chos bstan pa la mgu bas de nyid du rgyan
NK044(phi)001:4540: rnams kha lo ba la slar bskur nas rang nyid
NK044(phi)001:4541: byang chub sems dpa'i drung der rab tu byung bar
NK044(phi)001:4542: gyur te / byang chub sems dpa'i man ngag gis
NK044(phi)001:4543: dbang po rnams bsdams zhing dka' thub la spyod pas
NK044(phi)001:4544: rim gyis bsam gtan gyi sems thob cing mchog tu
NK044(phi)001:4545: zhi ba'i bde ba la gnas par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4546: kha lo pa sogs grong khyer du phyin pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:4547: skye bo rnams 'khrugs pa'i yid kyis rgyal po gang
NK044(phi)001:4548: na yod ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4549: khra can gyi drung na rab tu byung ngo zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:4550: de la btsun mo sogs rgyal po'i 'khor gyi skye bo thams cad smre sngags 'don par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:4551: der blon po rnams kyis mya ngan bzlog nas sras che ba rgyal por dbang bskur bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:4552: de ltar bsam gtan dang ldan na rdzu 'phrul thob la /
NK044(phi)001:4553: des gdul bya 'dun par byas nas chos bstan pas
NK044(phi)001:4554: sems can gyi don byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
NK044(phi)001:4555: yon tan gyi gnas la gus par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:4556: yang sngon gyi tshe nags tshal zhig tu bstan bcos
NK044(phi)001:4557: thams cad la mkhas shing slob ma'i tshogs la rjes
NK044(phi)001:4558: su ston par byed pa'i dka' thub pa zhig tu
NK044(phi)001:4559: bcom ldan 'das nyid gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:4560: shing lo'i ra bar bsam gtan byed cing gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:4561: der dus zhig na char med pas rtsa shing rnams
NK044(phi)001:4562: bskams shing dka' thub pa rnams rid par gyur nas
NK044(phi)001:4564: byang chub sems dpas grong yul gyi nyes pa brjod nas /
NK044(phi)001:4565: re zhig bdag la zas ci yod pa gsol la /
NK044(phi)001:4566: slad nas kyang 'dir zas blangs te nags 'di ma gtong zhig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:4567: der zas rnams zad pa'i tshe dka' thub pa rnams der tshogs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:4568: des sa'i lhung bzed thogs te rdzu 'phrul gyi song
NK044(phi)001:4569: nas yud tsam la byang gi sgra mi snyan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4570: gnas nas bdud rtsi ltar zhim pa'i bsod snyoms blangs
NK044(phi)001:4571: te byin pas de thams cad dga' zhing nyams dang
NK044(phi)001:4573: de ltar nyin re bzhin zas byin cing /
NK044(phi)001:4574: de nas des bdag gi 'dod pa'i rnam rtog gis
NK044(phi)001:4575: yid ma bslad pa'i bden pa'i tshig gis lha'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:4576: pos char phob ces smras pa'i mod la char gyi
NK044(phi)001:4578: lo 'bras rtsi shing thams cad rgyas par gyur pas thams cad mgu bar byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:4579: de dag la chos kyi gtam byas pas lam ngan
NK044(phi)001:4580: pa las bzlog ste yang dag pa'i lam la bzhag
NK044(phi)001:4581: par byas so // de rnams kyis bdag nyid chen
NK044(phi)001:4582: po de la khyod kyis ni bdag cag rnams la
NK044(phi)001:4583: sngar zang zing gi sbyin pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4584: slad nas chos kyi sbyin pas nges par legs pa
NK044(phi)001:4585: la btsud do zhes basngagasa par byas shing bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:4587: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po tshangs byin gyi yul
NK044(phi)001:4588: du b+aa r+aa na s+ai'i nags su bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:4589: nyid dka' thub pa lnga brgya'i gtso bo drang srong
NK044(phi)001:4590: zhig tu skyes pa'i tshe na de'i byams pa'i mthus
NK044(phi)001:4591: nags der 'khod pa thams cad phan tshun mdza' zhing
NK044(phi)001:4592: gnod pa med par gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:4593: der dka' thub pa gcig rlung gi nad kyis rid
NK044(phi)001:4594: par gyur cing de'i bsam pa rgyal srid kyi phyir
NK044(phi)001:4595: yin pa des lha'i mig gis mthong zhing /
NK044(phi)001:4596: de la nad ci lta bu zhes dris shing yang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4597: dka' thub kyi nags 'di'i rtsa ba sogs kyis rlung
NK044(phi)001:4598: zhi mi nus pas phyugs kyi sha'i khu ba dgos
NK044(phi)001:4599: so zhes / rang nyid kyis phyugs zhig sprul bar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:4600: 'di sod la sha khu 'thungs shig ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4602: mkhan po 'di ni chos dang 'gal te dka' thub
NK044(phi)001:4603: pas sems can 'tsho ba mi rigs so zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:4604: pa la / byang chub sems dpa' na re /
NK044(phi)001:4605: phyugs gcig po rang gi srog gi don du snying rjes gsod pa'i sha yang mi bza' na /
NK044(phi)001:4606: khyod rgyal por gyur na phyugs gsod cing ri dwags
NK044(phi)001:4607: nyes pa med pa rnams kyang mtshon gyis gzhom par
NK044(phi)001:4608: byed na chos dang mi 'gal lam /
NK044(phi)001:4609: de'i tshe khyod kyi snying rje gang du song /
NK044(phi)001:4610: des na skyon dang sdug bsngal du ma'i rtsa ba
NK044(phi)001:4611: rgyal srid la yid dga' bar ma byed cig ces
NK044(phi)001:4612: sems dri mar gyur pa bdag slar yang ngan song
NK044(phi)001:4613: sogs su sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshul gsungs pas /
NK044(phi)001:4614: des mkhan pos bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen zhes basngagasa
NK044(phi)001:4615: shing bsam pa de las bzlog ste slar smras pa
NK044(phi)001:4616: / bdag ni dka' thub pa'i bud med kyi yul
NK044(phi)001:4617: la sems 'phro ba 'di la ji ltar bgyi zhes
NK044(phi)001:4618: / zhus pa la / des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:4619: bud med kyi mig dang yan lag gdong sogs mdzes
NK044(phi)001:4620: par snang ba rnams kyang rgas nas yid du mi
NK044(phi)001:4621: 'ong ba'i chos can rnam par 'jig pa dang mi
NK044(phi)001:4622: gtsang ba'i rang bzhin yin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4623: de ltar mi shes pa rnams chags pa las sdug
NK044(phi)001:4624: bsngal shin tu mang po thob pa'i tshul gyis chos
NK044(phi)001:4625: bstan pas dka' thub pa des dgon pa gzhan du
NK044(phi)001:4626: song ste / bla ma'i gdams ngag gis bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:4627: bzhi dang mngon shes lnga thob par byas nas slar
NK044(phi)001:4628: song ste / 'ongs te / bdag nyid chen po
NK044(phi)001:4629: de la bstod cing drin shes pa'i tshig gis basngagasa
NK044(phi)001:4630: song ste / 'ongs te / par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:4631: yang sngon rgyal po tshangs byin gyi mdun na 'don
NK044(phi)001:4632: la 'phrog byed kyis byin pa'i bu 'phrog byed bu
NK044(phi)001:4633: dang 'phrog byed rtse zhes pa spun gnyis nags su
NK044(phi)001:4634: song ste mngon shes lnga thob nas rdzu 'phrul gyis
NK044(phi)001:4635: mkha' la 'gro ba de gnyis rgyal po sogs skye
NK044(phi)001:4636: bo kun gyis mchod par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:4637: dus gcig rgyal po gzhan du song ba'i tshe rgyal
NK044(phi)001:4638: po'i bu mos de gnyis la bsnyen bkur byed pa
NK044(phi)001:4639: na 'phrog byed rtse la chags pa'i bya bas bslus
NK044(phi)001:4640: te 'khrig pa spyad pas rdzu 'phrul las nyams pa
NK044(phi)001:4641: la / phu bo 'phrog byed bu nags na gnas
NK044(phi)001:4642: pas shes nas rang gi gnas su khrid de slar
NK044(phi)001:4643: yang bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon shes lnga dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:4644: la / par byas so // de la 'phrog byed bu ni bcom ldan 'das nyid dang /
NK044(phi)001:4645: 'phrog byed rtse ni nag pa glang chen te /
NK044(phi)001:4646: de yang rab tu byung ba rang gi chung mas thabs kyis bslus nas slar khyim du bab pa /
NK044(phi)001:4647: bcom ldan 'das kyis slar khrid de rab tu phyung nas dgra bcom pa thob par mdzad pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:4648: yang sngon gyi dus bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i pha rol gyi yang pha rol na /
NK044(phi)001:4649: bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po thams cad skyob ces bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:4650: de la btsun mo drug khri brgyad stong yod pa
NK044(phi)001:4651: thams cad lha'i bu mo 'dra zhing ma ltar byams
NK044(phi)001:4652: la gus shing yid gcugs pa /
NK044(phi)001:4653: yon tan dang ldan pa de dag gi nang na
NK044(phi)001:4654: 'dug bzhin bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar du rdzogs par
NK044(phi)001:4655: byas shing bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par zhugs
NK044(phi)001:4657: sems can 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la lhags par
NK044(phi)001:4658: chags nas sdig pa'i las byed pas ngan song gsum
NK044(phi)001:4659: du skye zhing / lha dang mir gyur pa na yang tshe thung ba sogs su 'gyur ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:4660: gzhan yang sems can rnams tshe ring ba dang thung ba /
NK044(phi)001:4661: rigs mtho ba dang dma' ba gzi brjid che ba dang chung ba /
NK044(phi)001:4662: longs spyod che ba dang chung ba /
NK044(phi)001:4663: shes rab che ba dang chung ba /
NK044(phi)001:4664: rgyun gyi rjes su 'bad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4665: rgyun las bzlog pa la 'bad pa dag kyang mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:4667: lam 'di ni yul dang mi mthun te /
NK044(phi)001:4668: gang mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i lam de la bdag
NK044(phi)001:4669: gis skye bo 'di dag gzhug par bya'o snyam du
NK044(phi)001:4671: grong dang grong khyer dang yul thams cad du rgyu
NK044(phi)001:4672: zhing de'i mngon shes lnga thob pa'i stobs kyis mi
NK044(phi)001:4673: dge bcu spang ba dang dge bcu'i lam la rab
NK044(phi)001:4674: tu bkod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
NK044(phi)001:4675: bla med byang chub kyi phyir bsngo ba dang phyir
NK044(phi)001:4676: mi sngog pa la btsud par byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:4677: rgyal po de lus zhig nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:4678: du tshangs par skyes nas yang tshangs pa chen por
NK044(phi)001:4679: skye zhing de nas shi 'phos nas bskal pa 'jig
NK044(phi)001:4680: pa'i tshe 'od gsal gyi lha rnams dang skal pa
NK044(phi)001:4682: de na gnas pa'i tshe na yang sems can khrag
NK044(phi)001:4683: khrig dpag tu med pa dag phyir mi ldog pa
NK044(phi)001:4684: la btsud do // de rnams kyang der skyes pa med pas gang chos med pa la gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:4685: thabs brgya stong 'di byas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten las shi 'phos te /
NK044(phi)001:4686: 'od gsal gyi lha'i nang nas yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du gnas shing /
NK044(phi)001:4687: gal te brgya la mi rnams kyi nang du 'ong
NK044(phi)001:4688: zhing gang gi tshe sangs rgyas ma byung na yang
NK044(phi)001:4689: mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur /
NK044(phi)001:4690: sangs rgyas byung ba bzhugs na bcom ldan 'das de dag gi rim gro bar gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:4691: de dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas /
NK044(phi)001:4692: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams snyoms par 'jug pa la bzhugs te gal te bde ba'am /
NK044(phi)001:4693: gal te dben pas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs so zhes shes so //
NK044(phi)001:4695: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba'i gnas zhes
NK044(phi)001:4696: bya ba sku tshe'i tshad lo bye ba khrag khrig
NK044(phi)001:4697: phrag bdun cur gyur pa de'i dus su bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:4698: 'das nyid byang chub sems dpa' zhi gnas la gus
NK044(phi)001:4699: pa zhes bya bar gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:4700: zhi gnas gang rnam par mthong ba thob cing snying
NK044(phi)001:4701: rje chen pos non pa'i sems kyis bsam gtan shes
NK044(phi)001:4703: thabs la mkhas pas zhi gnas kyang mi mthong la rnam par mthong ba yang bsten te /
NK044(phi)001:4704: des rdzu 'phrul mngon du byas nas sprul pa stong mngon par sprul to //
NK044(phi)001:4705: skye bo yul la g.yengs pa dag sbyin pas bsdus
NK044(phi)001:4706: nas tshul khrims la bkod cing sangs rgyas kyi chos
NK044(phi)001:4707: dag bstan pas / sems can khrag khrig dpag tu
NK044(phi)001:4708: med pa chos zab mo 'di'i bzod pa la rab
NK044(phi)001:4709: dag bstan pas / tu btsud do // snying rje
NK044(phi)001:4710: dang bsam gtan dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK044(phi)001:4711: la yang yun ring du goms pas phar phyin drug
NK044(phi)001:4712: la rab tu btsud pas de dag yun mi ring
NK044(phi)001:4713: bar yongs su dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du
NK044(phi)001:4714: sangs rgyas nas sems can dpag tu med pa mya
NK044(phi)001:4715: ngan las 'das par bsgral bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:4716: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:4717: des na nga bsam gtan goms pas pha rol tu
NK044(phi)001:4718: phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so zhes gsungs so
NK044(phi)001:4719: // yang rgyal po 'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par dga' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:4720: rgyal srid spangs nas nags tshal du gnas pas bsam
NK044(phi)001:4721: gtan byed cing de'i sngon bsam gtan la zhugs pa
NK044(phi)001:4722: rnams la so sor dgyes pa byas pas bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:4723: shes pa kun 'byung ba thob par shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:4724: bsam gtan dang ldan pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi zas kyis so sor dgyes par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:4725: yang sngon bskal pa tshad med pa'i pha rol na
NK044(phi)001:4726: drang srong thogs med dpal zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4727: tshe / bsam gtan gang dang gang skyes pa 'gog
NK044(phi)001:4728: pa'i chos can du mthong nas srid pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:4729: la zhum pa med pa'i 'du shes byung zhing de
NK044(phi)001:4730: mi gnas pa'i sems kyi rgyun 'gog pa la gzhol
NK044(phi)001:4731: bas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa na bskal pa dgu
NK044(phi)001:4732: bcu rtsa drug tu mngal gyi gnas su ma zhugs
NK044(phi)001:4733: tshe / te / rtag par bardzusa te skye bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4734: yang sngon bskal pa tshad med pa'i snga rol na /
NK044(phi)001:4735: ston pa spyan bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:4736: khams gsum po 'di ni rang sa'i skyon gyis gnon par mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:4737: kye ma sems can 'di dag gang dang gang la gnas par byas pa des gnod de /
NK044(phi)001:4738: mgon med cing 'dren pa med pas /
NK044(phi)001:4739: bdag gis 'du byed thams cad la gnas par mi bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:4740: gnas pa med na g.yo bar mi 'gyur ro snyam
NK044(phi)001:4741: du de chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i bsam
NK044(phi)001:4742: gtan las ni snying rje chen po 'thob bo zhes
NK044(phi)001:4743: shes pa khong du chud nas sems can rnams la
NK044(phi)001:4744: bstan pas sems can khrag khrig dpag tu med pa
NK044(phi)001:4745: thogs pa med pa'i ye shes la btsud cing mi
NK044(phi)001:4746: gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das so //
NK044(phi)001:4747: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus dpag tu med pa'i pha rol na /
NK044(phi)001:4748: de bzhin gshegs pa dbugs 'byin stsol ba zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:4749: bas sems can rnams la chos bstan pas rga ba
NK044(phi)001:4750: dang na ba las rab tu grol nas 'jigs pa
NK044(phi)001:4752: de yang chags pa rnams la mi chags /
NK044(phi)001:4753: sdang ba rnams la mi sdang /
NK044(phi)001:4754: rmongs par 'gyur ba rnams la mi rmongs /
NK044(phi)001:4756: zad par gyi skye mched dang /
NK044(phi)001:4757: mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug rnams la mi chags te /
NK044(phi)001:4758: de ltar sems rnam par grol zhing shin tu rnam
NK044(phi)001:4759: par grol ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa shes
NK044(phi)001:4760: pa zhes de ltar rnam thar brgyad kyi chos ston
NK044(phi)001:4761: to // de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:4762: dgra thams cad rab tu 'joms pa zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:4763: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams kyi
NK044(phi)001:4764: dbang phyug tu gyur pa de /
NK044(phi)001:4765: skye bo mang po'i tshogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:4766: khams kyi rgyal phran stong phrag drug cu dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:4767: cig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du phyin nas
NK044(phi)001:4768: rgyal po de la sangs rgyas des rnam par thar
NK044(phi)001:4769: pa brgyad kyi chos bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:4770: rgyal po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:4771: rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang
NK044(phi)001:4772: ste phul nas khams kyi rgyal phran rnams dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:4773: cig tu khyim spangs shing rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:4774: der khams kyi rgyal phran stong phrag drug cu po
NK044(phi)001:4775: de dag gis ni rnam par thar pa brgyad mngon
NK044(phi)001:4777: rgyal po de ni ma gtogs te /
NK044(phi)001:4778: des rnam par thar ba brgyad thos pas srid pa thams cad la mi gnas kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4779: srid par skye zhing 'chi 'pho ba'i sems can la
NK044(phi)001:4780: snying rje chen po'i dbang gis bskal pa grangs med
NK044(phi)001:4781: pa phrag bco brgyad du 'khor ba la gnas zhing
NK044(phi)001:4782: 'khor ba'i sems can rnams kyi don la bsam zhing
NK044(phi)001:4784: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:4785: mo'u 'gal gyi bu snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:4786: la mi gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur
NK044(phi)001:4787: du bla med byang chub tu 'tshang rgya'o zhes gsungs
NK044(phi)001:4788: so // yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:4789: kun tu go byed ces bya bar gyur nas bag
NK044(phi)001:4790: yod pas rgyal srid byed do //
NK044(phi)001:4791: de la btsun mo khri phrag brgyad byung ba thams
NK044(phi)001:4792: cad gzugs bzang zhing mdzes pa lta na sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:4793: / kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa /
NK044(phi)001:4794: sngar ldang zhing phyis nyal ba /
NK044(phi)001:4795: de dag gi gzugs ni lha mo dang 'dra /
NK044(phi)001:4796: yon tan ni 'dod chags dang bral ba 'dra'o //
NK044(phi)001:4797: rgyal po kun tu go byed bud med khri phrag
NK044(phi)001:4798: brgyad po de dag gi dbus su ting nge 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:4800: ji ltar sems mnyam par bzhag pas bsam gtan gyi bye brag dang /
NK044(phi)001:4801: nyon mongs pa dang yon tan gyi bye brag rnams ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
NK044(phi)001:4802: bud med kyi tshogs de dag gi shes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4804: yon tan gyi bye brag thams cad shes par gyur nas /
NK044(phi)001:4805: bud med gang dag shes pa nyam chung zhing nyon mongs pa stobs dang ldan pa de la /
NK044(phi)001:4806: nyon mongs pa rnams 'dul ba'i phyir shes pa skyed pa'i chos ston to //
NK044(phi)001:4807: bud med gang dag nyon mongs pa'i stobs chung la shes pa'i stobs che ba de dag la /
NK044(phi)001:4808: nyon mongs pa chung ngu ji tsam yod pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to //
NK044(phi)001:4809: bud med 'dod chags spyod pa la mi gtsang ba dang mi rtag pa bstan /
NK044(phi)001:4810: zhe sdang spyod pa la byams pa dang mi rtag pa bstan /
NK044(phi)001:4811: gti mug spyod pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang mi rtag pa bstan /
NK044(phi)001:4812: rnam par rtog pa spyod pa la dbugs 'byung rngub dran pa dang mi rtag pa bstan /
NK044(phi)001:4813: mtshan ma spyod pa dag la mtshan ma med pa dang mi rtag pa bstan /
NK044(phi)001:4814: bdag tu mngon par zhen pa la stong pa nyid dang mi rtag pa bstan /
NK044(phi)001:4815: srid pa la srid pa dag la smon pa med pa dang mi rtag pa bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:4816: de ltar nyon mongs gang dang gang spyod par gyur
NK044(phi)001:4817: pa de dag gi gnyen pos gcod par byas pas
NK044(phi)001:4818: // bud med gang dag 'dod chags la spyod pa
NK044(phi)001:4819: de dag bsam gtan bsgrubs te tshangs pa'i lam bsgoms
NK044(phi)001:4820: nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:4821: bud med zhe sdang la spyod pa dag tshad med bsgrubs te tshangs pa'i lam bsgoms pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4822: mtshan ma la spyod pa rnams mtshan ma med pa dang tshangs pa'i lam bsgoms pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4823: srid pa'i 'dod chags la lhag par chags pa dag
NK044(phi)001:4824: smon pa med pa bsgrubs te tshangs gnas bsgoms so
NK044(phi)001:4825: // de ltar bud med khri phrag brgyad po de
NK044(phi)001:4826: thams cad 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang bral nas
NK044(phi)001:4827: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:4828: yang rgyal po nyon mongs pa smod pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:4829: de'i mthus de la bud med khri phrag dgu bcu'i
NK044(phi)001:4830: btsun mo'i tshogs yod pa de thams cad gzugs bzang
NK044(phi)001:4832: bud med de dag gis mig gis mthong ba'i bud
NK044(phi)001:4833: med de dang de dag nyon mongs ba'i 'bras bu
NK044(phi)001:4834: dang las kyi 'bras bu yang dag shes par gyur
NK044(phi)001:4835: pas / nyon mongs pa thams cad du mi skye
NK044(phi)001:4836: zhing smad pa dag kyang nye bar shes par 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:4837: ba de lta bur gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4838: de ltar rgyal po des bud med khri phrag dgu
NK044(phi)001:4839: bcu po de la bdag gi las dang nyon mongs
NK044(phi)001:4840: pa khong du chud par byas pa des de rnams
NK044(phi)001:4841: 'dod pa'i khams kyi 'dod pa rnams la 'dod chags
NK044(phi)001:4842: dang bral ba rjes su thob nas lus zhig pa'i
NK044(phi)001:4843: 'og tu tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur
NK044(phi)001:4844: to // gzhan yang rgyal po legs mthong chen por skye ba bzhes pa'i dus su yang /
NK044(phi)001:4845: tshe ring ba dang 'byor pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4846: bde ba dang phun sum tshogs pa rlabs po che thob kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4847: de la ma chags par gnas gzhan du bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:4848: la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshul sogs 'dul ba las
NK044(phi)001:4850: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid dka' thub kyi nags na drang srong zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:4851: mi rgod lnga brgyas ri khrod pa'i grong zhig bcom ste zas nor mang po blangs so //
NK044(phi)001:4852: mi zhig der dong ba yang de dag gis gnod sbyin mchod pa'i phyir bzung ste /
NK044(phi)001:4853: mchod sbyin bya bar brtsams pa na /
NK044(phi)001:4854: de skrag nas drang srong de la sems kyis gsol
NK044(phi)001:4855: ba btab pa na lha zhig gis drang srong de
NK044(phi)001:4856: la sbran to // drang srong de der song nas
NK044(phi)001:4857: mi 'di thong la chos nyon ces byas shing chos
NK044(phi)001:4858: bstan pas mi rgod lnga brgya drang srong de nyid
NK044(phi)001:4859: kyi thad du rab tu byung ste /
NK044(phi)001:4860: bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon shes lnga bskyed par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4861: phyis bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na yang
NK044(phi)001:4862: mi 'phye bo tshom bu ba zhig rkun po lnga
NK044(phi)001:4863: brgyas mchod sbyin byed pa'i phyir gsad par nye ba
NK044(phi)001:4864: na / mi 'phye po des sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:4865: 'das la gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK044(phi)001:4866: lha'i cha lugs su mdzad de byon pas mi rgod
NK044(phi)001:4867: de dag dga' nas bdag cag la lha'i sku bstan
NK044(phi)001:4868: no snyam ste thal mo sbyar nas 'khod pa la
NK044(phi)001:4869: na / / lha des mi'i mchod sbyin mi dgos kyi chos nyon zhes gsungs nas /
NK044(phi)001:4870: de dag gi khams dang dbang po bsam pa dang
NK044(phi)001:4871: mthun par chos bstan pas mi 'phye bo des phyir
NK044(phi)001:4873: der mi rgod lnga brgyas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
NK044(phi)001:4874: bu mngon du byas pa la slar sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:4875: sku nyid du bstan pa la lhag par mos pas
NK044(phi)001:4876: de thams cad rab tu byung zhing dgra bcom pa
NK044(phi)001:4878: 'phye bo des kyang bdag lus 'di lta bur ma
NK044(phi)001:4879: gyur na bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la rab
NK044(phi)001:4880: tu byung ste / chu bo rnams las brgal ba'i
NK044(phi)001:4881: phyir brtson pas 'bad par byed pa zhig na zhes
NK044(phi)001:4883: de'i lus rnam pa thams cad du rdzogs par gyur
NK044(phi)001:4884: pas lhag par mos shing rab tu byung nas dgra
NK044(phi)001:4885: bcom pa thob par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4886: yang sngon gyi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rgyal rigs phyug po zhig tu skyes nas /
NK044(phi)001:4887: gzugs bzang zhing rigs pa'i gnas thams cad shes la mi thams cad dga' zhing 'dun par gyur kyang /
NK044(phi)001:4888: khyim gyi nyes pa mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:4889: de'i pha ma gnyis dus las 'das pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:4890: khyim gyi rdzas dbyig brgya stong du ma dag /
NK044(phi)001:4891: dge sbyong dang bram ze phongs pa rnams la byin te rab tu byung zhing /
NK044(phi)001:4892: nags zhig tu gnas nas bsam gtan la goms par
NK044(phi)001:4893: byas pas chos dang ldan pa'i snyan pas grags par
NK044(phi)001:4894: gyur to // de pha'i mdza' bos shes nas khyod
NK044(phi)001:4895: na tshod gzhon bzhin khyim gyi dpal spangs te dgon
NK044(phi)001:4896: par dbul po'i spyod lam la ji ltar dga' /
NK044(phi)001:4897: de bas pha'i khyim du 'dong zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:4898: byang chub sems dpas btson ra dang 'dra ba'i khyim gyi nyes dmigs dang /
NK044(phi)001:4899: nags kyi yon tan brjod pas mdza' bo de yid ches par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:4900: yang sngon grong khyer tsam pa zhes pa rgyal po gangs chen mtsho'i lha zhes pa'i sras /
NK044(phi)001:4901: khye'u rgya mtsho'i lha zhes par bcom ldan 'das nyid gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:4902: sgyu rtsal dang gnas lnga la mkhas par gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:4903: des yab la gsol nas nags su song ste bsam
NK044(phi)001:4904: gtan dang mngon shes bskyed par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:4905: de la blon po lnga brgya'i bu sgyu rtsal sogs
NK044(phi)001:4906: la mkhas pa dag gis bdag cag dang byad gzugs
NK044(phi)001:4907: dang shes rab kyis mnyam pa med snyam du smras
NK044(phi)001:4908: pa la / 'phong gi slob dpon des /
NK044(phi)001:4909: rgyal po'i bu nags kyi nang du gnas pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:4910: byad gzugs dang stobs dang shes pa'i brgya stong gi
NK044(phi)001:4911: char mi phod do zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:4912: de dag de lta 'dod par gyur pas de'i drung
NK044(phi)001:4913: du 'phong gi slob dpon dang bcas par song bas
NK044(phi)001:4914: byad gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa mthong nas yon
NK044(phi)001:4915: tan gzhan kyang de ltar yod nges so snyam te
NK044(phi)001:4916: / de'i thad du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon shes lnga bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:4917: phyis sangs rgyas pa'i tshe 'phong gi slob dpon ni
NK044(phi)001:4918: da ltar 'phong gi slob dpon lhar bcas zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:4919: ba dang / des 'phong bslabs pa'i yangs pa can
NK044(phi)001:4920: gyi gzhon nu lnga brgya ni sngon gyi blon po'i
NK044(phi)001:4922: de rnams la lhar bcas kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK044(phi)001:4923: 'phong gi basngagasa pa brjod cing khrid de 'ongs pa
NK044(phi)001:4924: la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phong gi rdzu 'phrul mdzad
NK044(phi)001:4925: pas dad de thams cad rab tu byung zhing dgra
NK044(phi)001:4927: yang sngon tshong pa lnga brgya nags khung chen po
NK044(phi)001:4928: zhig tu phyin pa der gnod sbyin drag po zhig
NK044(phi)001:4929: gis rlung drag pos btab ste ci bya gtol med
NK044(phi)001:4931: bcom ldan 'das nyid drang srong mngon shes lnga ldan
NK044(phi)001:4932: mthu che bar gyur pas tshong pa de dag drung
NK044(phi)001:4933: rdzas dang bcas pa nags de las blangs te /
NK044(phi)001:4934: rang gi gnas su bkod pas /
NK044(phi)001:4935: de dag dga' zhing drang srong de'i thad du rab
NK044(phi)001:4936: tu byung nas bsam gtan bzhi dang mngon shes lnga
NK044(phi)001:4938: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das sngon drang srong du
NK044(phi)001:4939: gyur pas sems can mang po 'chi ba la sogs
NK044(phi)001:4940: pa'i 'jigs pa las bskyabs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4941: bsam gtan dang mngon shes la bkod pa tshad med pa yod de 'dir ni mdo tsam brjod pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:4942: yang sngon gyi tshe ri bong zhig tu gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:4943: na char pa ma bab pa'i mu ge'i rkyen gyis
NK044(phi)001:4944: dgon par gnas pa'i drang srong zhig dgon pa nas
NK044(phi)001:4946: de dang snga nas 'dris pa'i ri bong des dgon
NK044(phi)001:4947: pa'i basngagasa pa dang khyim gyi nyes pa brjod cing
NK044(phi)001:4948: / bdag gi lus me nang du mchongs te deng dgon par bzhugs zhes smras pa na /
NK044(phi)001:4949: drang srong des ri bong blangs te khyod de tsam
NK044(phi)001:4950: dben par sdod par dga' na ji srid du 'dug
NK044(phi)001:4951: par dam bcas nas bsdad pas char babs te shing
NK044(phi)001:4953: drang srong nas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri bong
NK044(phi)001:4954: de'i drin las mngon shes lnga thob par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:4955: // yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid yul mi thi lar /
NK044(phi)001:4956: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha chen po zhes
NK044(phi)001:4957: bya bar gyur pa des rgyal srid chos bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:4958: bskyangs nas nam zhig skra dkar po skyes pa dang
NK044(phi)001:4959: drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pas rab tu byung
NK044(phi)001:4960: zhing / rang gi rigs brgyud phyi ma rnams la tshul de'i srol gtod de /
NK044(phi)001:4961: de ltar rjes su 'jug par gdams pas /
NK044(phi)001:4962: yul mi thi la de kho nar 'khor los sgyur
NK044(phi)001:4963: ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rim par byung ba thams
NK044(phi)001:4964: cad drang srong gi tshangs par spyod pa de lta
NK044(phi)001:4965: bu byas te / de thams cad kyi tha ma
NK044(phi)001:4966: de ni rgyal po mu khyud ces bya ba brgya
NK044(phi)001:4967: byin gyi stan phyed la bzhag kyang der ma bsdad
NK044(phi)001:4968: par yul mi thi lar phyir 'ongs nas dge ba'i
NK044(phi)001:4969: lam spel te drang srong gi tshangs par spyad pa
NK044(phi)001:4971: yang sngon bram ze rab 'bar zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:4972: de bsam gtan la zhugs pa'i ral pa'i nang du
NK044(phi)001:4973: 'dab chags kyi tshangs bcas kyang bsam gtan las ma
NK044(phi)001:4974: langs par de bzhin du gnas par gyur pa de
NK044(phi)001:4975: la sogs pa bskal pa tshad med bsam gyis mi
NK044(phi)001:4976: khyab par bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam
NK044(phi)001:4977: par 'phrul pa tshad med pa yongs su spyad par
NK044(phi)001:4978: shes par bya'o // bsam gtan gyi skabs so //
NK044(phi)001:4979: sngon gyis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir dbang byed pa'i rgyal
NK044(phi)001:4980: po chen po kun dga' bo zhes bya ba zhig
NK044(phi)001:4981: la bu lnga brgya yod do //
NK044(phi)001:4982: phyis de'i btsun mo chen po la bu zhig btsas pa /
NK044(phi)001:4983: gser gyi mdog can skra mthon mthing /
NK044(phi)001:4984: lag pa'i mthil na 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pas mtshan pa /
NK044(phi)001:4985: rkang g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo dang /
NK044(phi)001:4986: rkang g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo yod pa /
NK044(phi)001:4987: bsod nams dang ldan pa zhig btsas te /
NK044(phi)001:4988: ming me long gdong du btags so //
NK044(phi)001:4989: de nas yang rgyal po de nad kyis btab ste /
NK044(phi)001:4990: tshe'i dus byed du nye ba na /
NK044(phi)001:4991: blon po rnams kyis sras 'di rnams kyi nang nas rgyal tshab tu gang bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:4992: rgyal po'i dbang gang la bskur zhes dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4993: rgyal po des mtshan rnam pa bcu po 'di dang su ldan pa de rgyal por dbang skur zhig /
NK044(phi)001:4994: mtshan ma bcu gang zhe na /
NK044(phi)001:4995: lus gser gyi mdog can la skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4996: lag gnyis kyi mthil du 'khor lo rtsibs stong gis mtshan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4997: rkang g.yas kyi mthil na glang po che'i ri mo dang /
NK044(phi)001:4998: rkang g.yon gyi mthil na rta'i ri mo yod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:4999: rgyal po'i gos bskon na lus dang 'tshams zhing mi che mi chung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5000: rgyal po'i stan la 'dug na gzi brjid dang mthu che ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5001: rgyal phran rnams kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkur cher
NK044(phi)001:5002: byed cing btsun mo dang slas rnams kyang de la
NK044(phi)001:5003: dga' zhing phyag byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5004: lha rnams kyi rten gyi drung du khrid na /
NK044(phi)001:5005: lha rnams kyis phyir phyag byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5006: yon tan dang bsod nams kyi mthus rin po che
NK044(phi)001:5007: sna bdun gyi char 'bebs shing thams cad kyi yid
NK044(phi)001:5009: btsun mo chen mo las btsas pa dang bcu'o //
NK044(phi)001:5010: gzhan yang phyi'i gter la sogs pa brtag pa drug
NK044(phi)001:5011: po 'di shes pa de rgyal por dbang skur cig
NK044(phi)001:5013: de nas rgyal bu dang blon po rnams 'dus te /
NK044(phi)001:5014: rgyal bu che ba nas mthar gyis lnga brgya'i bar du yon tan bcu gang la yod brtags na /
NK044(phi)001:5015: rgyal bu gzhan thams cad la yon tan de dag gi gcig kyang ma mthong la /
NK044(phi)001:5016: sras tha chung la ni yon tan bcu po de tshang bar yod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5017: gzhan yang rgyal bu gzhan ni gtum pa dang gzu lum dang rtsub pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:5018: rgyal bu me long gdong ni des pa dang shin tu dul ba yin la /
NK044(phi)001:5019: dri ba zab mo dag kyang rang gi shes rab kyis dpyod pas shes te /
NK044(phi)001:5020: rgyal pos phyi'i gter la sogs pa gter drug dang
NK044(phi)001:5021: ldan pa de rgyal por 'os zhes bshad pa de
NK044(phi)001:5022: / rgyal bu gzhan gyis ma shes la me long
NK044(phi)001:5023: gdong gis phyi'i gter zhes pa ni them pa'i phyi
NK044(phi)001:5024: / na yod pa'o // nang gi gter ni them pa'i nang na yod pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:5025: phyi nang gi gter zhes bya ba ni them pa'i 'og na yod pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:5026: shing gi rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:5027: rgyal po de bzhugs pa'i shing gi grib ma nyi
NK044(phi)001:5028: ma'i gung gang du khyab pa de na yod pa'i
NK044(phi)001:5029: gter ro // ri'i rtse mo'i gter zhes bya ba /
NK044(phi)001:5030: rgyal po rol pa'i rdzing de na khrus kyi rdo leb yod pa'i 'og na yod pa'i gter ro //
NK044(phi)001:5031: chu 'gram gyi gter zhes bya ba ni khyim gyi
NK044(phi)001:5032: chu gang du 'bab pa'i stor khung gi mtha' na
NK044(phi)001:5033: yod pa'i gter ro zhes bshad pa blon po rnams
NK044(phi)001:5034: kyis so sor brtags pa de bzhin du byung bas
NK044(phi)001:5035: de rgyal por dbang bskur te tshes bco lnga'i nyin
NK044(phi)001:5036: par nyi ma dang por shar ba na /
NK044(phi)001:5037: gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dpag tshad gcig dang
NK044(phi)001:5038: phyed kyi tshe tshad dang ldan pa shar phyogs nas
NK044(phi)001:5039: 'ongs te / de la bdag yon tan dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:5040: pa'i rgyal por 'gyur na 'khor lo 'di bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:5041: drung du nye bar shog cig ces smras pa dang
NK044(phi)001:5042: 'ongs te / / nam mkha'i phyogs nas nye bar 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:5043: glang po rin po che ni ri spos kyi ngad
NK044(phi)001:5044: can las 'ongs te mjug ma la nor bus brgyan
NK044(phi)001:5045: pa / de la rgyal po zhon na nyi ma phyed kyis gling bzhi las 'khor zhing /
NK044(phi)001:5046: gal te rkang pas 'gro na rkang pa'i rjes gang la reg pa gser gyi phye mar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:5047: rta rin po che ni mdog mthon mthing rnga rngog dmar ba rin po che sna bdun 'bab pa /
NK044(phi)001:5048: rgyal po de la zhon na zan gcig bza' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:5049: ring tsam gyis gling bzhi nas 'khor te mi ngal
NK044(phi)001:5050: mi ngub bo // nor bu rin po che ni
NK044(phi)001:5051: 'od zer nyin mtshan du gsal te rgyang grags brgya
NK044(phi)001:5052: nyi shu tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byed la
NK044(phi)001:5053: mi ngub bo // / rin po che sna bdun
NK044(phi)001:5054: char bzhin du 'beb cing thams cad la sbyin par
NK044(phi)001:5055: mi ngub bo // / byed do // bud med rin po che ni bzang ba mdzes pa /
NK044(phi)001:5056: rgyal po'i yid tshim par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:5057: khyim bdag rin po che ni rgyal po la rin
NK044(phi)001:5058: po che sna bdun po ci dgos pa yid bzhin
NK044(phi)001:5059: du sbyar te zad mi shes par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:5060: blon po rin po che ni rgyal pos dpung rnam pa bzhi bgos na /
NK044(phi)001:5061: bltas pa tsam gyis dpung gi tshogs 'dus te rtsal dang mthur ldan no //
NK044(phi)001:5062: de ltar rin po che sna bdun dang ldan nas
NK044(phi)001:5063: rgyal po me long gdong des 'di snyam du 'di
NK044(phi)001:5064: lta bu sngon gyi bsod nams las skyes kyi rgyal
NK044(phi)001:5065: po'i gdung rgyud mi chad par bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:5066: spos chus khrus bgyis te gos gsar pa gtsang ma bgos shing lag na spos phor thogs pas /
NK044(phi)001:5067: shang la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhir pus mo btsugs te /
NK044(phi)001:5068: phyogs de na skyes bu 'phags pa bzhugs pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:5069: bdag gis gsol ba bzhin du gshegs su gsol zhes
NK044(phi)001:5070: smras pa dang / shar lho nub byang bzhi nas
NK044(phi)001:5071: rang sangs rgyas nyi khri re ste brgyad khrir tshang
NK044(phi)001:5072: ba snyed rgyal po'i pho brang du gshegs te /
NK044(phi)001:5073: rgyal blon rnams kyis yo byad rnam bzhi sbyar bas bsnyen bkur dang mchod pa byed do //
NK044(phi)001:5074: rgyal phran rnams la'ang rang sangs rgyas rnams la mchod
NK044(phi)001:5075: du bcug pas de rnams tshe'i dus byas pa dang
NK044(phi)001:5076: mtho ris kyi lhar skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:5077: rgyal po me long gdong des shes rab kyis gzhan la phan btags te /
NK044(phi)001:5078: yul de ni bram ze dbyug pa can zhes pa
NK044(phi)001:5079: dbul phongs zhig gis khyim bdag zhig las glang zhig
NK044(phi)001:5080: brnyan te nyin par spyad nas glang de khrid cing
NK044(phi)001:5081: khyim bdag de'i khyim du song ba dang khyim bdag
NK044(phi)001:5082: zan za ba dang dbyug pa can gyis glang de
NK044(phi)001:5083: khyim nang btang ba sgo gzhan nas song ste stor
NK044(phi)001:5084: ro // khyim bdag de zan zos nas langs te /
NK044(phi)001:5085: glang ma mthong nas dbyug pa can la glang ga
NK044(phi)001:5086: re byas pa dang khyod kyi khyim du btang ngo
NK044(phi)001:5087: // khyim bdag gis khyod nga'i glang por gyis slar byin cig /
NK044(phi)001:5089: de gnyis kyis rgyal po me long gdong shes rab
NK044(phi)001:5090: can gyi drung du song nas zhal lce gcod par
NK044(phi)001:5092: mi gzhan zhig gi rta rgod ma zhig bros pa
NK044(phi)001:5093: la dbyug pa can la rgod ma de ma gtong
NK044(phi)001:5095: rdo 'phangs pas rta'i rkang pa bcag go //
NK044(phi)001:5096: des khyod kyis nga'i rta'i rkang pa bcag pas tshur shog rgyal po'i drung du 'dong zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5097: de dag song ba las dbyug pa can bros par brtsam ste /
NK044(phi)001:5098: rtsigs pa zhig gi steng du mchongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5099: thag 'thag pa'i thag pa zhig gi steng du lhung nas de tshe 'phos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5100: de'i chung mas dbyug pa can bzung nas rgyal po'i drung du khrid do //
NK044(phi)001:5101: lam du chu gting zab zhig gi nang nas shing
NK044(phi)001:5102: mkhan zhig ste'u kha nas bzung ste 'ongs pa la
NK044(phi)001:5103: dbyug pa can gyis chu'i gting ci tsam zhes dris
NK044(phi)001:5104: pa dang chu'i gting zab po zhes smras pas ste'u
NK044(phi)001:5105: chur lhung ste ma rnyed do //
NK044(phi)001:5106: khyod kyis nga'i ste'u chur bsgyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:5107: des ma bsgyur zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:5108: rgyal po'i drung du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5109: de nas dbyug pa can lus ngal te chang 'tshong gi khyim du song ste chang bslangs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5110: chang 'tshong ma de la bu pho btsas pa gos
NK044(phi)001:5111: kyis g.yogs te bsnyal ba'i steng du bsdad pas de
NK044(phi)001:5113: des bu bsad do zhes rgyal po'i drung du dong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5114: de nas dong ba las gnas gzhan zhig na shing
NK044(phi)001:5115: sha ko ta ka de la bya rog cig bdug
NK044(phi)001:5116: pa des dbyug pa can mthong nas gar 'gro dris
NK044(phi)001:5117: pa dang / nga ni mi 'gro na 'di dag gis khrid do //
NK044(phi)001:5118: gar khrid rgyal po'i drung du'o //
NK044(phi)001:5119: 'o na kho bo'i 'phrin zhig kyang rgyal po la byos shig /
NK044(phi)001:5120: gnas 'di zhes bgyi ba na shing sha ko ta
NK044(phi)001:5121: ka de la bya rog cig 'dug pa des bdag
NK044(phi)001:5122: shing gzhan gyi steng du 'dug tshe skad mi snyan
NK044(phi)001:5123: la / shing 'di'i khar 'ongs nas skad snyan zhing ngo mtshar na /
NK044(phi)001:5124: de ci'i phyir zhes smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:5125: yang shing skam la khwa zhig 'dug pa des dbyug
NK044(phi)001:5126: pa can mthong nas snga ma bzhin du dris pa'i
NK044(phi)001:5127: mthar de na re kho bo'i 'phrin 'di rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:5128: la zhus shig / shing lo ma sngo zhing snum
NK044(phi)001:5129: pa gzhan dag mchis bzhin du de la bdag dga'
NK044(phi)001:5131: shing skam 'di la bdag mchis na bde ba de ci las gyur ces dris shig /
NK044(phi)001:5132: yang ri dwags zhig gis phrin bskur ba phyogs 'di
NK044(phi)001:5133: las gnas gzhan gsing ma dang rtsa sngon po dag
NK044(phi)001:5134: mchis bzhin du bdag de dag la ma dad pa
NK044(phi)001:5135: la rgyu ci zhig yod ces 'phrin bskur ba dang
NK044(phi)001:5136: / sreg pa zhig gis bdag phyogs gcig tu ni sreg pa'i skad 'byin la /
