NK044(phi)001:5137: phyogs gzhan du ni skad gzhan 'byin pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod ces 'phrin bskur ro //
NK044(phi)001:5138: yang sbrul zhig dang ne'u le gnyis phan tshun mi
NK044(phi)001:5139: mthun pa 'thab pa de dag gis bdag cag nyin
NK044(phi)001:5140: par gcig gis gcig mthong nas 'thab mo 'gyed cing
NK044(phi)001:5141: mi dga' bar 'gyur ba 'di la rgyu ci yod
NK044(phi)001:5143: yang snga ma bzhin du sbrul zhig gis dbyug pa can mthong nas rgyal po la 'phrin bskur ba /
NK044(phi)001:5144: bdag nam khung bu nas phyir 'byung ba'i tshe bde
NK044(phi)001:5145: la slar 'jug tshe sdug bsngal na de ci'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:5146: zhes dris shig / yang de dag dong pa lam
NK044(phi)001:5147: du bag gsar gzhon nu ma zhig gis mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:5148: snga ma bzhin du dbyug pa can la 'phrin zhu
NK044(phi)001:5149: zhes dris shig / ba bskur ba / nam kho
NK044(phi)001:5150: mo pha ma'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe gyos po'i
NK044(phi)001:5151: khyim 'dod la gyos po'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:5152: pha ma'i khyim 'dod na de ci'i phyir zhes zhus
NK044(phi)001:5153: zhes dris shig / ba bskur ba / shig /
NK044(phi)001:5154: de nas de dag rgyal po'i drung du phyin pas
NK044(phi)001:5155: rkang par phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu bsdad nas
NK044(phi)001:5156: zhes dris shig / ba bskur ba / shig /
NK044(phi)001:5157: / rgyal pos de dag la khyed cag ci la
NK044(phi)001:5159: de dag gis dbyug pa can dang khyim bdag rtsod pa de thams cad smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5160: rgyal pos dbyug pa can la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5164: glang bdag gis mthong bar phyin to //
NK044(phi)001:5165: kha'i tshig gis ni ma gtad do //
NK044(phi)001:5167: dbyug pa can des glang byin te ma smras pas na lce chod cig /
NK044(phi)001:5168: khyim bdag kyang glang 'ong bar mthong la ma btags pas na mig phyungs shig /
NK044(phi)001:5170: dbyug pa can gyis gcig tu bdag gi glang phrog
NK044(phi)001:5171: gnyis su bdag gi mig phyungs pa bas dbyug pa
NK044(phi)001:5172: can rgyal bar gyur kyang sla'o //
NK044(phi)001:5173: mi gcig gis lha dbyug pa can gyis bdag gi rta rgod ma bkum mo //
NK044(phi)001:5174: rgyal po dbyug pa can la ji ltar bsad ces dris pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5175: bdag lam du zhugs pa las mi 'dis rta ma
NK044(phi)001:5176: gtong zhig zer bas bdag gis rdo ba zhig blangs
NK044(phi)001:5179: rta bdag gis rta ma gtong zhig smras pas lce chod cig /
NK044(phi)001:5180: dbyug pa can gyis rdo ba min pa gzhan gyis
NK044(phi)001:5181: mi bkag par rdo ba 'phangs pas lag pa chod
NK044(phi)001:5182: cig / rta bdag gis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5183: gcig tu bdag gi rta bsad /
NK044(phi)001:5184: gnyis su bdag gi lce bcad pa bas /
NK044(phi)001:5185: dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang sla'o //
NK044(phi)001:5186: shing mkhan gyis 'dis bdag la chu'i gting ci tsam zab dris pas ste'u chur shor ro //
NK044(phi)001:5188: rdzas ji khyer kyang phrag par thogs rigs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5189: kha na khyer bzhin ste'u chu'i dbus su 'bor ba'i
NK044(phi)001:5190: kha grags pas shing mkhan gyi mdun so gnyis phyungs
NK044(phi)001:5191: shig / dbyug pa can chu'i gting zab par mthong bzhin de dris pas lce chod cig /
NK044(phi)001:5193: gcig tu bdag gi ste'u stor /
NK044(phi)001:5194: gnyis su so bcag pa bas dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang sla'o //
NK044(phi)001:5196: dbyug pa can gyis bdag gi bu bsad do //
NK044(phi)001:5198: bdag ngal bas chang slong du song nas stan la
NK044(phi)001:5199: ma bltas par 'dug pas 'og na bu yod par
NK044(phi)001:5202: chang 'tshong ma khyod bu sgor bsnyal la gos kyis mi mngon par g.yogs pas nyes so //
NK044(phi)001:5203: dbyug pa can khyod stan la ma brtags par 'dug pas nyes kyi /
NK044(phi)001:5204: dbyug pa can khyod 'di'i khyo byos bu yod par gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:5205: chang 'tshong mas gcig tu bdag gi bu bsad /
NK044(phi)001:5206: gnyis su na bdag gi khyo byed pa bas dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang sla'o //
NK044(phi)001:5207: tha ga pa'i chung mas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5209: dbyug pa can gyis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5210: bdag la dgra mang bas 'jigs te rtsigs pa las brgal nas bros bsam pa las /
NK044(phi)001:5211: phag na mi yod pa ma mthong ste gum mo //
NK044(phi)001:5213: song la 'di nyid kyi khyo byos shig /
NK044(phi)001:5214: des smras pa gcig tu bdag gi khyo bsad /
NK044(phi)001:5215: gnyis su 'dis khyo byed pa bas /
NK044(phi)001:5216: dbyug pa can rgyal bar gyur kyang sla'o //
NK044(phi)001:5217: de dag so so zhal lce de ltar bcad de dbyug pa can nyes pa kun las thar ro //
NK044(phi)001:5218: rgyal po de'i drung na bud med gnyis shig bu gcig la rtsod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5219: rgyal po blo mkhas pas brtags nas bud med gnyis la 'di skad basgo'o //
NK044(phi)001:5220: khyod gnyis kyis bu'i lag pa re re nas bzung
NK044(phi)001:5221: ste drongs la gang gis thob pa de'i bur khyer
NK044(phi)001:5222: cig / bu'i ma ma des bu la snying rje
NK044(phi)001:5223: med pas snad kyis mi dogs te mthu ci yod
NK044(phi)001:5224: cig / pas drangs so // ma gang yin des
NK044(phi)001:5225: dal gyis 'dren pas de'i bu yin par byas te
NK044(phi)001:5226: cig / pas drangs so // bu khyer ro //
NK044(phi)001:5227: de nas yang mi gnyis shig ras yug la rtsod
NK044(phi)001:5228: de rgyal po'i drung du lhags pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5229: zhal lce gong bzhin du bcad do //
NK044(phi)001:5230: de nas dbyug pa can gyis rgyal po la 'di
NK044(phi)001:5231: dag gis bdag khrid cing mchi ba na sbrul gyi
NK044(phi)001:5232: 'phrin 'di ltar bskur zhes zhus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5233: rgyal pos sbrul de la 'di skad gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:5234: khyod mi khro zhing bkres pas khung nas phyir 'byung ba'i tshe bade'o //
NK044(phi)001:5235: phyir byung nas kha zas mang du zos pa las
NK044(phi)001:5236: bya rnams kyis gtses pas khyod khros nas sbom par
NK044(phi)001:5237: gyur pas slar 'jug pa'i tshe khung bur thogs nas
NK044(phi)001:5238: sdug bsngal lo zhes gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:5239: khyod da ste zas kyi tshod shes la mi khro
NK044(phi)001:5240: na ji ltar phyir 'byung ba dang 'dra bar bde
NK044(phi)001:5242: de nas chung ma'i 'phrin smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5243: khyod pha ma'i khyim na mdza' bo zhig 'dug ste /
NK044(phi)001:5244: gyos pho'i khyim na 'dug pa'i tshe de la chags nas pha ma'i khyim du 'gro 'dod la /
NK044(phi)001:5245: pha ma'i khyim du 'dug tshe mdza' bos skyo ste
NK044(phi)001:5246: khyo la chags pas gyos pho'i khyim du 'gro 'dod
NK044(phi)001:5247: pa yin pas / gnas gcig spongs la gcig legs
NK044(phi)001:5248: par zungs shig dang de lta bu'i gnod pa med
NK044(phi)001:5250: de nas bya rog gi 'phrin smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5251: shing de'i drung na gser yod pas khyod kyi skad snyan la /
NK044(phi)001:5252: shing gzhan gyi drung na med pas skad de ltar mi snyan no zhes gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:5253: de bzhin du khwa'i 'phrin lan du khyod phyogs de
NK044(phi)001:5254: na ri 'or gcig yod pa'i grong 'dab tu gyur
NK044(phi)001:5255: pa na shing skam po de'i drung na gter yod
NK044(phi)001:5256: kyi de 'ga' zhig la byin te song ba dang
NK044(phi)001:5259: ri dwags khyod de na shing yod pa de'i kha nas sbrang rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag ste /
NK044(phi)001:5260: des r+ts+wa dang gsing ma mngar por gyur pa la
NK044(phi)001:5261: khyod za za na yang sbrang ma de song zin
NK044(phi)001:5262: gyis ro la chags par ma byad cig /
NK044(phi)001:5263: tshul min pas sdug bsngal bar gyur ta re zhes smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:5265: gang du sreg pa de sreg pa'i skad 'byin pa'i phyogs de na gter med kyi /
NK044(phi)001:5266: skad gzhan 'byin pa de na gter yod pas khyod
NK044(phi)001:5267: kyis gter 'ga' zhig la ston la tshul min pas
NK044(phi)001:5268: sdug bsngal na mi rung gis gzhan du songs shig
NK044(phi)001:5269: ces dang / sbrul dang ne'u'i phrin de'i lan du /
NK044(phi)001:5270: de gnyis la khyed cag mir gyur pa spun gnyis su skyes pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5271: gcig gis nor bago'o zhes smras pa la cig shos ser sna'i dbang du gyur te ma bgos pas /
NK044(phi)001:5272: de la gcig ni lhag par chags par byas pas sbrul du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:5273: cig shos kyis kyang nor la then te lhag par chags pa byas pas ne'u ler skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:5274: de bas na nor de dag dge sbyong ngam bram ze dag la byin dang bde bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:5275: rgyal pos dbyug pa can la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5276: khyod la nyes pa mang du byung yang ngas btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5277: khyod ni dbul zhing phongs kyi shing gi 'og na gser gyi gter yod pa brkos la khyer cig /
NK044(phi)001:5278: dbyug pa can gyis rgyal pos bsgos pa bzhin du so so'i 'phrin lan kyang smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:5279: thams cad kyis de bzhin du mnyan /
NK044(phi)001:5280: sbrul dang ne'u le dang khwas gter bstan nas dbyug
NK044(phi)001:5281: pa can la byin pas shing drung nas gser yang
NK044(phi)001:5283: de phyin chad so tshis tshugs nas cis kyang mi
NK044(phi)001:5284: brel te tshe gcig tu phyug cing bde zhing skyid
NK044(phi)001:5285: par gyur to // de ltar bstan pa la blon
NK044(phi)001:5286: po rnams kyi kye ma lha 'di'i spobs pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:5288: rgyal po des grong khyer gyi sgo bzhi rnams su
NK044(phi)001:5289: sbyin gtong gi khang pa brtsigs te sbyin pa rgya
NK044(phi)001:5290: cher btang / lo bcu gnyis su mu ges nyen
NK044(phi)001:5291: pa'i srog chags brgya stong du mar kha zas kyang
NK044(phi)001:5292: cher btang / sbyar ro // de ltar bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:5293: 'das 'di nyid sngon rgyal po me long gdong du
NK044(phi)001:5294: gyur pa na blo gros dang sbyin pas sems can
NK044(phi)001:5295: rnams la phan rgya chen po mang po gtang bar
NK044(phi)001:5296: cher btang / sbyar ro // mdzad do // yang
NK044(phi)001:5297: sngon gyi tshe lus 'phags zhes bya ba'i grong na
NK044(phi)001:5298: rgyal po skyed pa zhes bya ba rgyal srid byed
NK044(phi)001:5299: cing yul rnams 'byor pa rgyas shing bade'o //
NK044(phi)001:5300: rgyal po de'i btsun mo gzugs bzang ma la bu
NK044(phi)001:5301: chags nas de'i tshe bza' btung mod par gyur pas
NK044(phi)001:5302: / phyis khye'u skyes pa la ming bza' btung du btags /
NK044(phi)001:5303: de nyid yi ge dang bzo gnas mthar phyin cing
NK044(phi)001:5304: dpa' zhing tsham tshom med pa gtum pa zhig tu
NK044(phi)001:5305: gyur pas / de'i ma btsun mo de nyid bus
NK044(phi)001:5306: mgu zhing snyems nas rgyal po'i bka' mi nyan zhing
NK044(phi)001:5307: zlog thabs byed pa la rgyal po mi dga' zhing
NK044(phi)001:5308: gyur pas / / der blon po rnams kyis btsun mo gzhan blang ngo zhes gsol to //
NK044(phi)001:5309: nyi 'og gi rgyal po'i bu mo bslangs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5310: nyi 'og gi rgyal po des gal te nga'i tsha
NK044(phi)001:5311: bo byung na de rgyal tshab tu bzhag na sbyin
NK044(phi)001:5313: blon po rnams kyis khas blangs so //
NK044(phi)001:5314: bu mo des kyang rgyal po dga' bar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:5315: bdag la bu byung na rgyal tshab tu bgyid par zhus pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5316: rgyal po skyed byed 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:5317: bdag gi bu sdug pa gcig pu bza' btung gzugs
NK044(phi)001:5318: bzang zhing dpal la rigs dang mthun par skyes pa
NK044(phi)001:5319: yod bzhin gzhan la rgyal thabs ji ltar sbyin snyam
NK044(phi)001:5320: du the tshom skyes pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5321: blon po rnams kyis nyi 'og gi rgyal po la sngar yang bdag cag gis khas blangs mod /
NK044(phi)001:5322: de yang 'di la bu mchi'am mi mchi ma med
NK044(phi)001:5323: pas dam pa de stsal na legs zhes smras pa
NK044(phi)001:5324: ltar rgyal pos kyang chad byas so //
NK044(phi)001:5325: de nas dus gzhan nyi 'og gi rgyal po'i bu
NK044(phi)001:5326: mo de sems can dang ldan par gyur te khye'u
NK044(phi)001:5327: gzugs bzang ba zhig btsas pa la ming rgyal srid
NK044(phi)001:5328: la mngon par dga' ba zhes btags so //
NK044(phi)001:5329: de nas nyi 'og gi rgyal pos kyang pho nya
NK044(phi)001:5330: btang ste bdag gi tsha bo rgyal tshab tu ma
NK044(phi)001:5331: bcug na dpung gi tshogs bshams nas khyod kyi yul
NK044(phi)001:5332: du 'ong ngo zhes springs pa la dogs pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:5333: blon po rnams kyis bu chung ba la rgyal tshab
NK044(phi)001:5335: gzhon nu bza' btung 'gum par bgyi zhes rgyal po la gsol pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5337: chos dang mi ldan pa'i tshig de skad ma smra zhig /
NK044(phi)001:5338: 'di ltar bus pha gsod pa thos kyi /
NK044(phi)001:5339: phas bu bsad pa ma yin pas nga ni de ltar gtam mi byed do //
NK044(phi)001:5341: ci ste mi 'gum na yan lag med par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:5343: yan lag med par byas na bsad par zad mod /
NK044(phi)001:5344: blon po rnams kyis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5348: nyes pa med pa ji ltar bskrad par bya /
NK044(phi)001:5350: ring por mi thogs par gzhon nu la nongs pa
NK044(phi)001:5351: 'byung bar 'ong gis re zhig rgyal srid la mngon
NK044(phi)001:5352: par dga' ba la thob stsol cig dang /
NK044(phi)001:5353: de nas gzhon nu bza' btung rang gis shes par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:5354: de nas rgyal pos nyi ma shis pa la nyi
NK044(phi)001:5355: 'og gi rgyal po'i tsha bo la rgyal tshab kyi
NK044(phi)001:5356: thob byin no // gzhon nu bza' btung gis de
NK044(phi)001:5357: thos nas lhas bdag spangs pas 'dir bsdad kyang bsad
NK044(phi)001:5358: par 'ong ngo snyam ste rang gi ma la lo
NK044(phi)001:5359: rgyus bshad nas bdag rgyal po lnga len gyi yul
NK044(phi)001:5360: du mchis na mkhyen par mdzod cig ces byas so
NK044(phi)001:5361: thob byin no // // ma de yang sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:5362: dang bral bas bu'i mgul nas 'khyud de khyod de
NK044(phi)001:5363: snga bde zhing skyid pa'i 'byor pa chen po la
NK044(phi)001:5364: thob byin no // // spyad nas / slar sa
NK044(phi)001:5365: stong dang nags sogs su ji ltar 'khyams zhes smre
NK044(phi)001:5366: sngags kyi tshigs bcad sna tshogs smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5368: gtan du bde ba yang ni su zhig yod //
NK044(phi)001:5369: gtan du sdug bsngal ba yang su zhig yod //
NK044(phi)001:5370: mi bde ma thob pa yang su zhig yod //
NK044(phi)001:5371: 'thob par mi 'gyur ba yang su zhig yod //
NK044(phi)001:5372: ces sogs ma de la rnam pa mang po khong
NK044(phi)001:5373: du chud par byas te yul lnga len du song
NK044(phi)001:5374: ngo // der rgyal po'i bya ba byed pa'i lnga
NK044(phi)001:5375: len pa'i bkrabs pa gcig der 'ongs pas mthong ste
NK044(phi)001:5376: ngo // / 'di ltar gzugs bzang zhing sdug pa /
NK044(phi)001:5377: mkhrang ba ro stod che ba sogs kyi mtshan legs
NK044(phi)001:5378: pa'i skyes bu 'di su zhig snyam du dris pa
NK044(phi)001:5379: dang / des thams cad rgyas par bsnyad do //
NK044(phi)001:5380: des de skyes su khyer nas lnga len gyi rgyal
NK044(phi)001:5381: po la phul te ji ltar gyur pa smras so
NK044(phi)001:5382: // lnga len gyi rgyal pos de'i mgul nas 'khyud
NK044(phi)001:5383: de dga' ba'i gtam sna tshogs byas nas de la
NK044(phi)001:5384: rang gi bu mo dang yul dag kyang byin no
NK044(phi)001:5385: // // de bu mo de dang rtse ba las
NK044(phi)001:5386: bu gzugs bzang ba ro stod seng ge 'dra ba
NK044(phi)001:5387: // // zhig btsas nas / de'i ming phas rang
NK044(phi)001:5388: gi rming las dras te bza' btung mang po zhes
NK044(phi)001:5390: de cher skyes nas yi ge slob pa na de'i pha bza' btung dus las 'das so //
NK044(phi)001:5391: der rgyal po'i bu mo shin tu mya ngan byed pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5392: lnga len gyi rgyal pos bsams la /
NK044(phi)001:5393: bud med 'di dag bsam pa phal cher skyes pa'i
NK044(phi)001:5394: 'dod pa can yin pas gcig la sbyin snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:5395: / bu mo de gzhon nu bza' btung mang po dang bcas pa mdun na 'don la byin no //
NK044(phi)001:5396: de mdun na 'dod dang rtse dga' chen po myong bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:5397: re zhig na mdun na 'don de'i khyim drung na
NK044(phi)001:5398: bya gag zhig skad 'byin pa bram ze ltas mkhan
NK044(phi)001:5400: mi gang gis de'i sha zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5401: tshig de mdun na 'don gyis thos nas bram ze la yang dris shing /
NK044(phi)001:5402: bya gag de bsad nas chung ma la bya gag 'di 'phral du tshos shig dang /
NK044(phi)001:5403: nga rgyal po'i pho brang nas slar 'ong ngo zhes smras nas rgyal po'i pho brang du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5404: ji tsam na khye'u bza' btung mang po slob grwa
NK044(phi)001:5405: nas bkres te khyim du 'ongs nas ma yang mi
NK044(phi)001:5406: snang la / ci zhig bza' snyam du bltas pas
NK044(phi)001:5407: rdzi'u zhig gi nang na bya gag zhig mgo gyen
NK044(phi)001:5408: du phyung zhing 'tshod pa mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:5409: de'i mgo bcad de zos so //
NK044(phi)001:5410: de'i rjes su ma yang 'ongs nas 'di'i mgo sus zos zhes dris pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5411: bdag gis zos so zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:5412: de la zan byin nas slob grwar btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5413: mdun na 'don 'ong nas bya gag bza' bar brtsams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5414: mgo bo mi snang bas de ci yin zhes dris ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5415: chung mas khye'usa zos so zhes byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5416: des lhag ma zos nas bsams pa /
NK044(phi)001:5417: ci bya gag ril gyis zos pa'am /
NK044(phi)001:5418: yan lag ma tshang ba zos pas rgyal por 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:5419: snyam du sngar gyi bram ze ltas mkhan bos nas
NK044(phi)001:5420: dris pa dang / gang gis de'i mgo bo zos pa de rgyal por 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:5421: yang na bya gag de'i mgo bo zos pa de
NK044(phi)001:5422: bsad de de'i mgo zos na yang rgyal por 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:5424: de nas mdun na 'don gyis gzhon nu 'di bsad
NK044(phi)001:5425: nas mgo bza' na 'di'i mas shes par ma byas
NK044(phi)001:5426: par mi btub pas ma'i nyams drod gleng ngo snyam
NK044(phi)001:5427: du snyan pa'i tshig du mas bzhams te /
NK044(phi)001:5428: bzang mo ci khyo phos rgyal po byas na legs sam /
NK044(phi)001:5429: 'on te pus rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5430: bud med des zur gyis go ste /
NK044(phi)001:5431: gal te bus rgyal po byas na legs zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:5432: na 'di bdag las gyed par 'gyur gyis mthun pa'i
NK044(phi)001:5434: khyos rgyal po byas na legs so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5435: des bya gag gi mgo bo'i phyir bdag gi bu gsad par 'phrig nas /
NK044(phi)001:5436: bu la khyod kyis bya gag gi mgo bo zos
NK044(phi)001:5437: pa ni ma legs pa zhig byas kyis yul 'di
NK044(phi)001:5438: nas myur du song la khyod rang gi mes po
NK044(phi)001:5439: rgyal po skyed par der songs shig ces bsgo ba
NK044(phi)001:5440: bzhin de lus 'phags su song ste ngal zhing bkres
NK044(phi)001:5441: pas skyed tshal gyi shing zhig gi drung du gos
NK044(phi)001:5443: de'i tshe rgyal srid la mngon par dga' ba nad
NK044(phi)001:5444: kyis thebs nas shi ste rgyal po rabs chad kyang
NK044(phi)001:5445: yul chos kyis rgyal po gzhan dbang ma bskur ba
NK044(phi)001:5446: de srid du rgyal po'i ro phyir mi 'byin to
NK044(phi)001:5447: // der yul de'i blon po sogs kyis bsod nams
NK044(phi)001:5448: che ba zhig rgyal srid la bzhag go zhes tshol
NK044(phi)001:5449: // ba na / shing zhig gi drung na gzhon
NK044(phi)001:5450: nu gzugs bzang ba mthongs ka seng ge 'dra ba
NK044(phi)001:5451: nyi ma yol yang shing gi grib mas lus mi
NK044(phi)001:5452: gtong ba zhig nyal nas 'dug pa mthong bas de
NK044(phi)001:5453: rgyal por 'os par mthong nas bu longs longs zhes
NK044(phi)001:5454: // ba na / bslangs pa dang / des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5458: des smras pa rgyal po nyal bde ltar bslang ngam /
NK044(phi)001:5462: glu dang sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra bsgrags pas
NK044(phi)001:5463: bslang mod de rnams kyis de thos pa dang 'di
NK044(phi)001:5464: nges par rigs mthon po las skyes pa zhig go
NK044(phi)001:5465: snyam du khyod su zhig khyod su'i bu yin zhes
NK044(phi)001:5466: dris pa dang / gzhon nu des seng ge bzhin du bsgyings nas rang gi rigs smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5467: lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed pa zhes bya ba'i bu ni bza' btung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5468: bza' btung gi bu ni bza' btung mang po zhes bya ste nga yin no //
NK044(phi)001:5469: de nas blon po'i tshogs kyis 'dzum byung nas bdag
NK044(phi)001:5470: cag gis ni bdag cag nyid kyi gzhon nu rnyed
NK044(phi)001:5471: do zhes smras te skye bo'i tshogs chen pos bskor
NK044(phi)001:5472: zhing glu gar dang rol mo'i sgra dang shis pa
NK044(phi)001:5473: brjod pas mdun dar te grong khyer du drongs nas
NK044(phi)001:5475: gang gi phyir 'dis rgyal po'i gdung rgyud chad pa
NK044(phi)001:5476: bsabs pa de'i phyir ming skyed pa kho nar btags
NK044(phi)001:5477: nas sngar gyi ming med par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:5478: de rgyal srid byed pa na byis pa'o snyam du
NK044(phi)001:5479: blon po rnams kyis khyad du bsad de dbang cung
NK044(phi)001:5481: de nas rgyal po de yul thams cad du bltar song ste /
NK044(phi)001:5482: grong dang grong khyer sogs ri 'khor gyi bar thams
NK044(phi)001:5483: cad 'di su'i yin zhes dris pa na thams cad
NK044(phi)001:5484: blon po drug gi yin no zhes smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5485: rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag ni bza' ba
NK044(phi)001:5486: dang bgo ba tsam la dbang byed kyi gzhan ci
NK044(phi)001:5487: la yang ma yin no bsams nas sems khong du
NK044(phi)001:5488: chud cing 'di la ci bya zhes bsam pa na
NK044(phi)001:5489: / lha zhig gis rgyal po la mi dga' bar ma byed cig /
NK044(phi)001:5490: 'di ltar khyod kyi yul na ri 'khor gang po'i
NK044(phi)001:5491: mtshan zhes bya ba de na sna la gtogs pa
NK044(phi)001:5492: gang po zhes bya ba de la bu sman chen
NK044(phi)001:5493: po zhes bya ba zhig yod par 'gyur gyis de
NK044(phi)001:5494: khyod kyi blon por chug cig dang /
NK044(phi)001:5495: des yul bdag gir byas nas khyod la 'bul bas
NK044(phi)001:5496: khyod la phan pa dang bde ba dang 'dong pa
NK044(phi)001:5497: dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes basgo'o //
NK044(phi)001:5498: de nas rgyal pos gang po de 'tshol du bcug
NK044(phi)001:5499: cing de'i chung ma la bu yod med rtogs su
NK044(phi)001:5500: chug ces mngags pa btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5501: de dag gis de rtsad chod cing de'i chung ma
NK044(phi)001:5502: sbrum par yang thos pa bzhin phyir rgyal po la
NK044(phi)001:5503: gsol bas / gang po la yi ge springs te
NK044(phi)001:5504: bkug la 'dza' ba'i tshig gis ri 'khor de byin
NK044(phi)001:5505: nas chung ma'i lto na 'dug pa'i bu de skyongs
NK044(phi)001:5506: la yan lag ma nyams pa de ltar gyis zhes
NK044(phi)001:5507: gsol bas / bsgos so // der zla ba dgu
NK044(phi)001:5508: tshang nas khye'u mdzes shing lta na sdug pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:5509: btsas te btsas ston byas nas khye'u 'di'i ming ci
NK044(phi)001:5512: bdag 'di ltar yun ring por nad bu can du
NK044(phi)001:5513: gyur pa sman pa rnams kyis zhi bar bya ma
NK044(phi)001:5514: nus pa la / khye'u 'di ltor zhugs pa nas
NK044(phi)001:5515: nad zhi bar gyur pas 'di'i ming sman chen po
NK044(phi)001:5517: des tshigs bcad kyang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5518: sman rnams kun gyi nang na ni //
NK044(phi)001:5519: bdag gi bu mi sman chen po //
NK044(phi)001:5520: 'di ni sman las lhag pa'i sman //
NK044(phi)001:5521: de ltas 'di'i ming sman yin no //
NK044(phi)001:5522: de nas sman chen po pha'i phrag pa la zhon
NK044(phi)001:5523: te srang gi dbus nas rdzing bur khrus byed du
NK044(phi)001:5524: khyer ba las / sa'i steng na nya'i dum bu
NK044(phi)001:5525: zhig 'dug pa pha des rin po cher bsams nas
NK044(phi)001:5526: rkang pa'i mthe bos blang bar brtsams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5528: pha gcig gang po rin chen lhung snyam ste //
NK044(phi)001:5529: las btang mig mi 'dzum par nya dum la //
NK044(phi)001:5530: rtog cing de nas rin chen yin par sems //
NK044(phi)001:5531: pha gcig gang po rtogs shig rin chen min //
NK044(phi)001:5532: nya dum dmar po rkang gis 'dril bar zad //
NK044(phi)001:5533: rnam thos bu de bag med spyod ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:5534: de nas rdzing du song ste sman chen po dang
NK044(phi)001:5535: gos rdzing 'gram du bzhag nas khrus bya ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:5536: chur zhugs pa dang pad+ma'i steng na chu skyar zhig
NK044(phi)001:5537: 'dug pa de bzung ngo snyam du song ba dang
NK044(phi)001:5540: pad+ma'i steng nas chu skyar mo 'phur ba la tshigs bcad smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5541: de nas dus gzhan zhig na gzhon nu phrag par khyer te gang+g+aara khrus byed du song ba na /
NK044(phi)001:5542: 'khar ba'i gzhong pa zhig chus khyer ba'i steng na
NK044(phi)001:5543: ngang mo zhig 'dug pa mthong nas gzhon nus de
NK044(phi)001:5544: la tshigs bcad kyang spras so //
NK044(phi)001:5545: yang dus gzhan na gang+g+aara bum pa zhig khyer ba'i
NK044(phi)001:5546: steng na chu sreg zhig 'dug pa mthong nas gzhon
NK044(phi)001:5547: nus de la yang tshigs bcad smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5548: yang dus gzhan na gang+g+aara khrus byed du song ba
NK044(phi)001:5549: der lug thug zhig chus khyer ba'i steng na bya
NK044(phi)001:5550: gar zhig 'dug pa la yang gzhon nus tshigs bcad
NK044(phi)001:5551: smras so // de nas sman chen po de byis
NK044(phi)001:5552: pa rnams dang lhan cig rtse ba las re zhig
NK044(phi)001:5553: na byis pa rnams 'dus nas sman chen po rgyal
NK044(phi)001:5554: smras so // por bcug go // des kyang kha
NK044(phi)001:5555: cig blon por bcug nas de rnams lhan cig rtse
NK044(phi)001:5557: ji tsam na bram ze rgan po zhig chung ma
NK044(phi)001:5558: dar la bab pa zhig dang lhan cig lam du
NK044(phi)001:5559: zhugs nas yul gzhan du 'gro ba las /
NK044(phi)001:5560: bram ze de gshang gci byed du song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5561: g.yon can pho zhig gis 'phrigs nas bud med de'i drung du song ste smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5562: bzang mo khyod kyi pha dgar song /
NK044(phi)001:5566: de mes po yin pa lta zhig bud med des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5569: 'di khyod kyi yang mes po yin pa lta zhig /
NK044(phi)001:5572: mes po dang yang mes kyang min gyi nga'i khyo yin no //
NK044(phi)001:5573: de nas g.yon can cung zad bgad de smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5574: blun mo khyod grogs mo'am ngo tsha shes pa gzhan
NK044(phi)001:5575: gyi drung du 'di lta bu nga'i khyo yin no
NK044(phi)001:5576: zhes smra ba ngo mi tsha'am /
NK044(phi)001:5577: sa skal ba dang ldan pa 'di'i steng na skyes
NK044(phi)001:5578: bu sku'i gzugs 'dra bas rab tu gang ba ma
NK044(phi)001:5579: mthong ngam / khyod 'di ltar gzugs mdzes pa chud zos so //
NK044(phi)001:5580: ngas khyod kyi khyo bya yi tshur shog /
NK044(phi)001:5582: gal te khyod kyi phyir bram ze rgan po dang nga 'thab mo sbyar bas /
NK044(phi)001:5583: der khyod kyis skye bo rnams la nga'i khyo 'di yin zhes nga la khyor byos shig /
NK044(phi)001:5584: byas pas de dang g.yon can 'grogs te song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5585: bram ze de gshang gci dang bkru bshal byas nas
NK044(phi)001:5586: slar 'ongs pa dang de ma mthong nas sgang bu
NK044(phi)001:5587: mthon po zhig gi steng nas bltas pas skyes pa
NK044(phi)001:5588: gzhan dang 'grogs te song ba mthong bas phyi bzhin
NK044(phi)001:5589: du brgyugs te lag pa ya gcig nas bzung ngo
NK044(phi)001:5590: // g.yon can gyis kyang bud med de'i lag pa ya gcig bzung ste /
NK044(phi)001:5591: phan tshun 'di nga'i yin zhes brtsad kyang g.yon can stobs che bas de drangs te phrogs so //
NK044(phi)001:5592: der 'brog der bram ze bcom pas bram zer ma byas kyis ra mda' log ces byas so //
NK044(phi)001:5593: de'i tshe sman chen po byis pa rnams dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:5594: cig dgon pa na rtse zhing 'dug pas bram zer
NK044(phi)001:5595: ma byas zhes pa'i sgra de thos nas /
NK044(phi)001:5596: byis pa dag gis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5597: kye sman chen po khyed cag na re nga rgyal po'o zer na /
NK044(phi)001:5598: bram ze pha gis bram zer ma byas so zhes 'bod na ci'i phyir mi skyob /
NK044(phi)001:5599: des byis pa rnams song la khrid de shog ces bkye ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5600: de dag gis de kun khrid de 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:5601: 'di ci zhig ces dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5602: bram ze na re bdag grogs med cing nyam chung
NK044(phi)001:5603: bas chung ma g.yon can stobs che ba 'dis phrogs
NK044(phi)001:5606: 'di ni bdag gi chung ma lags so //
NK044(phi)001:5607: bud med la dris kyang bdag gi khyo 'di lags so zhes g.yon can bstan par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:5608: de nas sman chen pos bram ze ma 'os par
NK044(phi)001:5609: yi chad par shes nas 'di dag bgam par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:5610: snyam du / kye nad rje khyod da bzod bud med 'di dang 'grogs te gang nas 'ongs /
NK044(phi)001:5612: gyos po'i khyim nas mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:5616: sha dang snum 'khur dang chang dag zos so //
NK044(phi)001:5618: gal te de lta na skyugs shig dang bden nam rdzun lta'o //
NK044(phi)001:5619: des mdzub mo khar bcug ste skyugs pas kha zas de lta bu cang ma byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5620: bram ze la'ang gong ltar du dris pa na /
NK044(phi)001:5621: gyos po'i khyim nas 'ongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5622: der zan dang la phug nas kyi khu ba zos
NK044(phi)001:5623: so byas pa de skyugs su bcug pas de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:5624: gyur pa dang / sman chen pos skyes pa g.yon
NK044(phi)001:5625: can 'dis gzhon nu ma bslus te bram ze'i chung
NK044(phi)001:5626: ma phrogs so snyam du g.yon can de dbyug pa
NK044(phi)001:5627: dang khu tshur gyis brdegs nas mi nub pa tsam
NK044(phi)001:5629: mgrin pa man chad bcug nas /
NK044(phi)001:5630: rma bya'i mkhris pas dpral bar yi ge bris te /
NK044(phi)001:5631: gang su yang rung bud med la 'di bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:5632: rku na sman chen pos chad pa 'di lta bu
NK044(phi)001:5634: de bzhin du byis pa brku ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5635: glang dang lwa ba dang skud pa rku ba la
NK044(phi)001:5636: sogs pa lnga brgya tsam bzung nas dbyug pa dang
NK044(phi)001:5637: khu tshur gyis brdegs te mgrin pa man chad sa'i
NK044(phi)001:5639: dpral bar rma bya'i mkhris pas de rnams kyi /
NK044(phi)001:5640: ming dang rkun po byed na thams cad sman chen pos chad pas gcad do zhes bris so //
NK044(phi)001:5641: de nas blon po drug gis yul sa zos par mngon du mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:5642: rgyal pos 'di snyam du sman chen po de da
NK044(phi)001:5643: lta ci 'dra bar 'dug pa ltad mo lta'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:5644: nas / blon po rnams la ri dwags bshor du
NK044(phi)001:5645: 'agro'o zhes byas te 'khor mang po dang bcas pa
NK044(phi)001:5646: phyogs der phyin pa na g.yon can lnga brgya dong
NK044(phi)001:5647: du bcug pas rgyal po de mthong nas rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:5648: zhes bos pa'i sgra de rgyal pos thos kyang der
NK044(phi)001:5649: mi mi snang snyam nas brtags pas g.yon can gcig
NK044(phi)001:5650: mthong la de'i dpral bar rma bya'i mkhris pas bris
NK044(phi)001:5651: nas / pa bklags so // sman chen po sogs
NK044(phi)001:5652: byis pa de rnams rgyal po mthong nas bros so
NK044(phi)001:5653: nas / pa bklags so // // rgyal pos des
NK044(phi)001:5654: byas pa de rnams mthong nas byis pa yin mod
NK044(phi)001:5655: kyi byed pa 'di dag nyes pa med cing legs
NK044(phi)001:5656: so snyam du dga' bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:5657: btson de rnams phyungs te bakye'o //
NK044(phi)001:5658: gang pos rgyal po der phyin pa thos nas bum
NK044(phi)001:5659: pa chus bkang ba dang gdugs dang ba dan rgyal
NK044(phi)001:5660: mtshan la sogs pas bsu zhing /
NK044(phi)001:5661: rgyal pos kyang gang po la khyod kyi bu lta'i khrid shog ces bsgo ba na /
NK044(phi)001:5662: gang pos byis pa chung che bas lha'i spyan sngar mi dgug go //
NK044(phi)001:5663: rgyal pos yang khrid la shog ces smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5666: gzugs bzang zhing dpa' bo zhig na /
NK044(phi)001:5667: da dung byis pa shed ma rdzogs snyam du pha
NK044(phi)001:5668: la gtad nas rnam pa du mar bsgo zhing slar
NK044(phi)001:5669: chas so // dus phyi zhig na sman chen po de blo ci bdog bgam snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:5670: rgyal pos grong dpon gang po la pho nya btang
NK044(phi)001:5671: nas bye ma las byas pa'i thag pa khru brgya
NK044(phi)001:5672: pa zhig 'dir skur cig ces springs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5673: gang po sems rab tu mi dga' zhing skrag ste /
NK044(phi)001:5674: bdag skyes nas mthong thos ma myong ba'i klan ka zhig 'tshol lo snyam du 'dug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5675: sman chen pos ci'i phyir mi dga' zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5676: phas de ltar smras te rgyal pos thabs zhig gis
NK044(phi)001:5677: chad pas gcod par 'dod do zhes byas pa la
NK044(phi)001:5679: mi de bdag dang sprod cig dang rgyal po la bdag gis lan gsol bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:5680: phas pho nya de sprad pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5681: sman chen pos rgyal po la bdag gi phrin 'di gsol cig /
NK044(phi)001:5682: bdag cag yur sgom pa blo chung la mi mkhas pas ma shes te /
NK044(phi)001:5683: lhas de shes na des khru gang ba zhig skur
NK044(phi)001:5684: dang de la bltas nas khru brgya bas stong yang
NK044(phi)001:5685: bkal te bskur bar bya'o zhes springs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5686: rgyal pos de thos nas 'di la lhas bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:5687: ste 'dis bdag gi rgyal srid rgyas par byed par
NK044(phi)001:5689: yang dus phyi zhig na de bgam par 'dod nas pho nya btang ste /
NK044(phi)001:5690: gang po la 'bras chan gtun gyis kyang ma brdungs la /
NK044(phi)001:5691: dum bur chag pa med par byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:5693: phyi rol du yang ma yin par mes kyang ma yin /
NK044(phi)001:5694: me med par yang ma yin par tshos la /
NK044(phi)001:5695: lam du khyer te mi 'ong lam ma yin par yang khyer te mi 'ong bar yang khyer /
NK044(phi)001:5698: skyes pa dang bud med pa la yang mi bskur bar /
NK044(phi)001:5699: bzhon pa zhon pas kyang ma yin /
NK044(phi)001:5700: rkang pas 'gro ba'ang min pa skur la shog ces springs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5701: tshig de thos nas gang po mi dga' ba la /
NK044(phi)001:5702: sman chen pos pha la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5703: pha mi dga' bar ma byed dang bdag gis de nus so zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:5705: skyes pa bud med mang po bsogs te 'bras spar
NK044(phi)001:5706: re byin pa 'di sen mos shus la ma chag
NK044(phi)001:5707: par 'bru re re nas sol cig smras pa ltar
NK044(phi)001:5708: byas te rdzi'ura blugs shing sgo'i them pa'i steng du
NK044(phi)001:5709: btsos nas / mes btsos pa min la /
NK044(phi)001:5710: me med par yang btsos pa min pa'i ched du /
NK044(phi)001:5712: steng du nyi mas btsos nas /
NK044(phi)001:5713: skyes bu la bsgo ba rkang pa ya gcig lam
NK044(phi)001:5714: du song la ya gcig lam min par songs shig
NK044(phi)001:5715: / nyi ma dang grib mar min pa'i ched du
NK044(phi)001:5716: dbyug pa'i rtse mor rdzi'u chings la gos srab mos
NK044(phi)001:5718: rkang pa gcig lhwam gyon gcig lhwam ma gyon par byos la songs shig /
NK044(phi)001:5719: skyes pa bud med min pa'i ma ning la bskur bas /
NK044(phi)001:5720: rgyal pos de ltar dris nas sman chen po ni
NK044(phi)001:5721: rtog pa dang ldan lan ldon pa dang tshul dang
NK044(phi)001:5722: cho ga la sogs par ldan no zhes smras so
NK044(phi)001:5723: // yang dus gcig gi tshe 'di ltar skyed tshal
NK044(phi)001:5724: ldum ra bza' shing rdzing bu dang bcas pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:5725: skur cig ces bgo ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5726: sman chen pos rgyal po la slar 'di skad ces gsol cig /
NK044(phi)001:5727: ri brag pa'i skyed tshal 'di dag ni mi legs na /
NK044(phi)001:5728: ji ltar bgyis na mchi bar 'gyur ba rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:5729: pho brang gi skyed tshal zhig rgyal pos bskur bar
NK044(phi)001:5730: gsol / phas skyed tshal de ji ltar mchi ba
NK044(phi)001:5731: bltas te bslabs nas de'i rjes bazhinabatanga bar 'tshal zhes
NK044(phi)001:5732: gsol / springs pa dang / rgyal pos de ltar
NK044(phi)001:5733: gzhon nu de ni shes rab dang ldan pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:5736: ri brag der shing skyed la lo gcig lon pa
NK044(phi)001:5737: de la me 'bras dang ldan pa gcig skur cig
NK044(phi)001:5739: gzhon nus eran+da'i shing zhig bskyed nas bskur te /
NK044(phi)001:5740: de'i lo ma 'bras bu dang me tog byung ba
NK044(phi)001:5741: rgyal pos mthong nas ya mtshan te 'di gang po'i
NK044(phi)001:5742: thabs sam sman chen po'i yin zhes dris pa dang
NK044(phi)001:5743: / sman chen po'i yin no zhes smras pa la
NK044(phi)001:5744: legs so zhes smras nas cang mi zer bar 'dug
NK044(phi)001:5745: / go // de nas dus gzhan zhig na ri
NK044(phi)001:5746: brag gi grong der glang lnga brgya bdas nas gang
NK044(phi)001:5747: po la 'di rnams la r+ts+wa byin te zhos la
NK044(phi)001:5748: 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang spris ma dang
NK044(phi)001:5749: chur ba rnams byos la skur cig ces byas pa
NK044(phi)001:5750: la gang po yi cha da pa dang sman chen
NK044(phi)001:5751: pos mthong nas pha khyod mi dga' bar ma mdzad
NK044(phi)001:5752: / go // cig / bdag gis rgyal po la
NK044(phi)001:5753: lan bsam zhing ci nas rgyal po mnyes pa dang
NK044(phi)001:5754: khyod la nyes pa med par bya'o zhes smras te
NK044(phi)001:5755: / go // cig / / pha spad gnyis shig
NK044(phi)001:5756: la 'di ltar bslabs te khyed gnyis grong chen po
NK044(phi)001:5757: rgyal po las thag mi ring ba zhig tu song
NK044(phi)001:5758: la pha des shing gi gzhong pa zhig lto bar
NK044(phi)001:5759: chongs la gos kyis dkris te sa la 'gre zhing
NK044(phi)001:5761: de nas khye'u khyod kyis phyogs kun tu spos dang
NK044(phi)001:5762: me tog sogs kyis phyogs bcur gtor la gang 'jig
NK044(phi)001:5763: rten skyong bas bdag gi pha 'di bde zhing legs
NK044(phi)001:5764: pa bkra shis par bu btsa' bar gyur cig ces
NK044(phi)001:5765: rjod cig / ces pa la sogs pa bslab par byas pa bzhin du byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:5766: de rgyal po des thos nas de rtogs shig ces mi gcig btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5767: des song ste brtags nas skyes bu zhig 'dug pa che ba sa la 'gre zhing ngu ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5768: de'i bus kyang lha rnams 'bod cing gsol ba 'debs pa mthong ste /
NK044(phi)001:5769: de ci byed dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5770: khye'u des bdag gi pha las bu byung ba'i phyir ro zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5771: de dag gis de rnams rgyal po la gsol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5772: rgyal po bgad de ngas gang na yang 'di ltar
NK044(phi)001:5773: skyes pa la bu byung ba ma mthong ma thos
NK044(phi)001:5775: khye'u des lha khyod de bzhin du gsungs pa de ltar lags sam /
NK044(phi)001:5776: rgyal pos smras pa de bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:5777: de nas khye'u des de ltar na ci'i phyir p+aur+n+na
NK044(phi)001:5778: kats+tsha'i ri brag gi grong rdal du glang lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:5779: bdas te 'di rnams las 'o ma sogs phyung la
NK044(phi)001:5780: skur cig ces gsungs na glang sbrum ste bu phyung
NK044(phi)001:5781: ba gang na gzigs gang na gsan ces smras pa
NK044(phi)001:5782: dang / de nas rgyal po bgad de cig gang po'am sman chen pos bstan /
NK044(phi)001:5783: pho nyas sman chen pos so zer ba la rgyal blon thams cad ngo mtshar du bzung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:5784: yang phyis zhig na pho nya gcig la dre'u zhig bskur nas /
NK044(phi)001:5785: dre'u 'di ma bcing bar srungs shig /
NK044(phi)001:5786: bla gab yod par ma gzhug par 'tshos shig ces springs so //
NK044(phi)001:5787: gang pos bgyid du mi btub pa 'di 'dra bka' stsal bas bder mi ster ro snyam pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5788: sman chen pos dre'u de nyin par gzas su ci bder 'tshos /
NK044(phi)001:5789: mtshan mor bla gab med par mi nyi shus bskor
NK044(phi)001:5790: nas mi lnga res mel tse thun re re byas
NK044(phi)001:5791: nas / rkang lag bzhi la mi re res bzung /
NK044(phi)001:5792: mi gcig steng du zhon te 'dug go //
NK044(phi)001:5793: rgyal pos mngags gzhug pa zhig ji ltar byed lta
NK044(phi)001:5794: bar btang bas ji ltar byas pa rnams rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:5796: rgyal pos de ltar bsrungs na 'bros mi nus kyi
NK044(phi)001:5797: mi de rnams las gcig kha drang ngo zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:5798: pa dang / rgyal po na re nub mo steng
NK044(phi)001:5799: du zhon pa de kha drangs na gzhan gnyid kyis
NK044(phi)001:5800: log pa dang des khrid de 'ong ngo zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:5801: pa dang / te / steng na zhon pa'i mi
NK044(phi)001:5802: de kha drangs nas des dre'u khyer te bros so
NK044(phi)001:5803: pa dang / te / // nam langs pa dag gang po la dre'u bros zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5804: des deng bdag gi 'tsho ba ma rungs par gyur
NK044(phi)001:5805: ces skrag gnas smre sngags 'don pa sman chen pos
NK044(phi)001:5806: mthong nas 'di thams cad thabs kyis bsgrubs na 'di
NK044(phi)001:5807: la yang thabs mi snang zhes mi smra'o zhes snyam
NK044(phi)001:5808: nas thabs sems shing pha la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5809: khyod kyis don de sgrub nus na thabs shig yod do zes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5810: phas thabs ci zhig yod ces dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5811: ci nas bdag nyid la tho btsam pa bzod na gdon don 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5813: ci nas bdag 'tsho ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:5814: de nas sman chen pos pha'i mgo bo la skra
NK044(phi)001:5815: khrom gnyer bdun du bregs te le kru dang snag
NK044(phi)001:5817: dkar po la sogs pas mgo la ri mor byas
NK044(phi)001:5818: nas bong bu bskyon te rim gyis grong khyer du
NK044(phi)001:5819: dong zhing smanachena po 'ong ngo zhes sgra kun tu
NK044(phi)001:5820: bsgrags so // de ltar rgyal po dang blon po
NK044(phi)001:5821: dag gis thos pas sman chen po de ni mkhas
NK044(phi)001:5822: shing mdzangs pa gtam snyam par grags na ci'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:5823: mi rigs pa de lta bu byas snyam du blta
NK044(phi)001:5825: blon po dag gis lha nyid nas sman chen po
NK044(phi)001:5826: mkhas gsal mdzangs pa zhes basngagasa na des mi rigs
NK044(phi)001:5827: pa 'di lta bu bgyid pa gda' 'am zhes gsol
NK044(phi)001:5828: pa dang / rgyal pos sman chen po nyid la
NK044(phi)001:5829: ci 'di ltar pha la tho btsam par byas zhing
NK044(phi)001:5830: pa dang / dris pa dang / des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5831: lha 'di ni tho btsam pa ma lags kyis mchod par bgyis te /
NK044(phi)001:5832: bdag kyang pha bas shin tu mang du shes nas
NK044(phi)001:5833: bdag ga sa 'di la rnam par mchod par byas
NK044(phi)001:5837: des bdag bzang la pha dan no zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5839: pha bas bu bzang zhes smra ba ni gang du mthong thos med kyi /
NK044(phi)001:5840: phas bu grags par byed mas gso zhing skyed pa
NK044(phi)001:5841: dang srung ba'i phyir de bas nged kyis ni ci
NK044(phi)001:5842: nas pha bzang ba yin no snyam du bsams so
NK044(phi)001:5843: // sman chen pos de ltar lags sam ma lags shin tu rtogs shig ces smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5844: rgyal blon rnams kyis de bzhin yin gyi gzhan min no zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5845: sman chen pos rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te /
NK044(phi)001:5846: lha de ltar bden pa lags na /
NK044(phi)001:5847: lhas bdag cag la dre'u 'tshor stsal ba de bros pas /
NK044(phi)001:5848: dre'u de'i pha bong bu 'di lags na skyen par bzhes par gsol zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5849: rgyal blon thams cad kyis tshig gi thabs de lta
NK044(phi)001:5850: bu sbyar ba thos nas ya mtshan du bzung ste
NK044(phi)001:5852: rigs pa dang mi rigs par bya ba 'di lta
NK044(phi)001:5853: bu mkhas so snyam du rgyal po mgu nas rnam
NK044(phi)001:5854: pa mang po'i rgyan gyis bklubs te blon po'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:5855: byin cing pha la ri brag gi grong de byin
NK044(phi)001:5856: no // de nas sman chen po blon po'i dbang thob nas /
NK044(phi)001:5857: bya ba ci bya ba dang rgyal po'i don ji ltar bya zhes sems pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5858: grong khyer thams cad du yang sman chen po blon
NK044(phi)001:5859: por bcug ste mkhas shing mdzangs so zhes sgra grags
NK044(phi)001:5860: so // de'i tshe dus zhig na bram ze zhig
NK044(phi)001:5861: gis bu mo zhig bag mar blangs pas nor mang
NK044(phi)001:5862: zhig zad cing de dang lhan cig yongs su spyad
NK044(phi)001:5864: bram ze de kha ton mang du lob cing smrang
NK044(phi)001:5865: gi pha rol tu phyin pas nor bsgrub pa'i slad
NK044(phi)001:5866: du ljongs gzhan du rgyu zhing song bas gser gyi
NK044(phi)001:5867: dong rtse lnga brgya rnyed nas slar 'ongs ba na
NK044(phi)001:5868: / des rtog pa la sngar nor khyer te khyim du mi'ajuga ste /
NK044(phi)001:5869: ci'i phyir na bud med kyi sems kyi spyod pa ni sus kyang mi rigs la /
NK044(phi)001:5870: bdag gi bram ze mo de yang gzugs bzang bas
NK044(phi)001:5871: na bdag med pa'i phyi nas skyes pa gzhan la
NK044(phi)001:5872: chags shing 'dus kyang srid do snyam ste /
NK044(phi)001:5873: de nam sros pa dang dur khrod du song nas
NK044(phi)001:5874: shing nya gro d+ha'i drung du khung brkos pa der
NK044(phi)001:5876: nam sros nas khyim du zhugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5877: cung ma de yang skyes pa gzhan rna bo che
NK044(phi)001:5878: zhes bya ba de la chags te de dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:5879: cig zas zhim po zos nas bzung zhim pos byugs
NK044(phi)001:5880: shing mal gyi steng na de gnyis dga' ba myong
NK044(phi)001:5882: bram ze des sgo phyes zhes bos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5883: bud med des khyod su zhig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5884: des bdag gi ming smros pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5885: mo nyid kyis dga' ba'i sgra phyungs nas rna bo
NK044(phi)001:5886: che nyal ba las bslangs nas mal gyi 'og tu
NK044(phi)001:5887: sbas te sgo phyes shing g.yo byed pas khyo la
NK044(phi)001:5888: 'jus nas ngu ba'i tshul gyis bsus te zas gsod
NK044(phi)001:5889: pa byin no // bram ze des 'di ltar mtshan
NK044(phi)001:5890: mor kha zas bsod pa sbyar bas skyes pa gzhan
NK044(phi)001:5892: de yang rang bzhin drang po zhig yin pas kye bzang mo /
NK044(phi)001:5893: dus ston dang dus tshes la ma bab par bza' ba 'di lta bu ci las 'ongs /
NK044(phi)001:5895: bdag la lhas khyod kyi khyo 'ong ngo zhes bstan pas na sta gon byas so //
NK044(phi)001:5897: e ma da ni bsom nams can du zad de
NK044(phi)001:5898: bdag gi chung ma'i rmi lam du yang lhas bstan
NK044(phi)001:5899: pa lta zhes zas zos te khrus byas nas mal
NK044(phi)001:5900: du nyal zhig phan tshun mdza' bas lam du dge'am
NK044(phi)001:5901: nyon mongs zhes gtam dris so //
NK044(phi)001:5902: de nas chung mas jo bos cung zad rnyed dam /
NK044(phi)001:5905: de nas chung mas brda thabs kyi tshig /
NK044(phi)001:5909: bram ze des ma 'phrig par gser gyi dong rtse lnga brgya rnyed do //
NK044(phi)001:5910: bud med des bdag la ma bstan na gar bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:5912: nor thub par gyis dang yod do //
NK044(phi)001:5916: bdag khyod kyi lus phyed yin na ci'i phyir gsang /
NK044(phi)001:5917: bram ze drangs bas na grong khyer gyi phyi rol du bzhag go //
NK044(phi)001:5918: bud med na re nyon cig rna bo che phyogs gang du bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:5919: bram ze des dur khrod kyi shing nya gro d+ha'i drung dus brkos te bzhag go zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5920: de nas bram ze mo des jo bo lam nas
NK044(phi)001:5921: dub pas da khyod ci bder mnol cig ces smras
NK044(phi)001:5922: te / de gnyid log par rigs nas rna bo
NK044(phi)001:5923: che la gang khyod kyis thos pa de myur du
NK044(phi)001:5924: brus shig ces byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5925: rna bo che des dal bus 'jab cing khyim nas
NK044(phi)001:5926: phyir phyungs te dur khrod du song la shing de'i
NK044(phi)001:5927: drung du sbas pa de blangs nas bdag gi khyim
NK044(phi)001:5928: du song ngo // phyi de nyin par bram ze
NK044(phi)001:5929: des dur khrod du song bas nor de med nas
NK044(phi)001:5930: brang brdung zhing khyim du 'ongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5931: chung ma dang gnyen rnams kyis ci nyes zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:5932: des de ltar rgyas par bsnyad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5933: de na 'ga' zhig gis sman chen po mkhas shing rtog dpyod can de'i drung du song dang /
NK044(phi)001:5934: des gal te thob par byed kyang srid kyi skyabs
NK044(phi)001:5935: gzhan mi snang ngo zhes bstan pa ltar mchi ma
NK044(phi)001:5936: gzag cing sman chen po'i drung du song ste shis
NK044(phi)001:5937: par brjod pa sngon du btang nas bdag gis nor
NK044(phi)001:5938: ji ltar stor tshul smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5939: sman chen po de yud tsam cang mi smra bar 'dug nas /
NK044(phi)001:5940: bram ze khyod kyis phyogs gang du bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:5943: gzhan la smras pa med dam zhes dris pa la des ji lta bur gyur pa smras so //
NK044(phi)001:5944: sman chen pos bram ze mo de skyes pa gzhan
NK044(phi)001:5945: la chags pa'i sgyur zhig yin par nges so snyam
NK044(phi)001:5946: du / bram ze de dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5947: khyod mi dga' bar ma byed dang /
NK044(phi)001:5948: de ma rnyed na bdag gi nor las sbyin no zhes dang yang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:5949: khyod kyi khyim na khyi yod dam bram ze des mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:5950: de sog la bdag khyim du slar dge bar mchi
NK044(phi)001:5951: na bram ze brgyad la zan sbyin par dbang phyug
NK044(phi)001:5952: gi mdun du khas blangs so zhes gyis la /
NK044(phi)001:5953: bram ze brgyad kyi bzhi ni khyod rang gis bos shig /
NK044(phi)001:5954: bzhi ni bram ze mo la 'bod du chug cig ces smras pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:5955: bram ze des de ltar byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5956: sman chen pos rang gi drung nas mi zhig mngags te /
NK044(phi)001:5957: nam bram ze rnams 'ongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5959: zas ni bram ze mo la ster du chug la /
NK044(phi)001:5960: de'i tshe mi 'di la ci yang byed du ma
NK044(phi)001:5961: gzhug par de dag gi mdun du zhog cig ces
NK044(phi)001:5963: mi rtog chen pa de la bsgo ba /
NK044(phi)001:5964: khyod kyis bram ze rnams nang du 'jug pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:5965: mi gang la khyi zug pa dang gang la 'jug
NK044(phi)001:5966: ma 'dril bar gyur pa ltos la khyi'i tshul 'di
NK044(phi)001:5968: nang du bram ze mos zas 'grim pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:5969: gang la mig btsug cing lta ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:5970: dgod cing tshig 'byin la lhag par 'grim pa rnams shes par gyis shig ces bsgos nas btang bas /
NK044(phi)001:5971: bram ze gzhan 'ongs tshe khyi zug la /
NK044(phi)001:5972: rna bo che 'ongs pa na khyi de rna ba
NK044(phi)001:5973: phab mjug ma dril nas phyi bzhin 'brangs la nang
NK044(phi)001:5974: du zhugs nas kyang khyis 'dris pa'i sgra 'byin pa
NK044(phi)001:5975: dang / rgyal po'i mi des rkun ma rna bo che 'di yin no snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:5976: bram ze mos zas 'grim pa'i tshe rna bo che la smin ma'i brda' byed cing cung zad dgon /
NK044(phi)001:5978: de dang lhan cig gtam zer /
NK044(phi)001:5979: lhag par yang der 'grim par mthong bas mtshan ma
NK044(phi)001:5980: de rnams mi des bzung nas jo bo tshul 'di
NK044(phi)001:5981: 'dra'o zhes sman chen po la bzlas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:5982: sman chen pos de thos ma thag tu rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:5983: mi btang ste rna bo che bkug nas smras pa
NK044(phi)001:5984: / gzhan gyi nor 'phrogs par bya ba de lta
NK044(phi)001:5985: bu bram ze chos yin nam khyod kyis khyer bde
NK044(phi)001:5986: / slar byin cig / de na re /
NK044(phi)001:5987: sdig pa zhi bar gyur cig bdag gis yong ma 'tshal te zhes zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:5988: de nas sman chen pos mi rnams la ngan pa
NK044(phi)001:5989: 'di btson rar chug la ci nas rus pa byung
NK044(phi)001:5990: ba de lta bur nan la 'khor cig bsgo bas
NK044(phi)001:5991: bsdigs nas 'jigs skrag ste lhas bdag skyobs shig /
NK044(phi)001:5992: bdag gis de slar 'bul lo zhes smras shing /
NK044(phi)001:5993: rang gi khyim nas gser gyi dang rtse gna' ma
NK044(phi)001:5994: lnga brgya ji ltar bcings pa bzhin khyer te sman
NK044(phi)001:5996: sman chen pos bram ze la byin pa dang bram
NK044(phi)001:5997: ze de dga' nas bkur stis drin lan glan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:5998: bsam pas phyed sman chen po la phul sman chen
NK044(phi)001:5999: pos blangs nas slar bram ze la byin no //
NK044(phi)001:6000: sman chen po'i snyan pa kun tu khyab cing yul
NK044(phi)001:6001: mi thams cad kyis bdag cag bsod nams dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:6002: pas 'di 'dra ba'i blon po yod do snyam du
NK044(phi)001:6004: de nas mi gzhan zhig don gyi phyir yul gzhan du song song ba las /
NK044(phi)001:6005: rdzing 'gram zhig tu phye'u rkyal pa kha phye zhing
NK044(phi)001:6006: zan zos nas rkyal pa kha ma bcings bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:6007: phyi rol du song ba dang sbrul reg na gdug
NK044(phi)001:6008: pa'i dug can zhig rkyal ba de'i nang du zhugs
NK044(phi)001:6009: so // mi de slar 'ongs nas ma brtags par
NK044(phi)001:6010: rkyal pa kha bcings te phrag par thogs nas grong
NK044(phi)001:6011: khyer chen por phyin pa na /
NK044(phi)001:6012: ltas mkhan zhig gis de la 'tsho ba dang bral du nye'o zhes lung bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:6013: mi des slar log ste de la bltas so //
NK044(phi)001:6014: de nas 'ongs pa dang de ltar thos bzhin ltas
NK044(phi)001:6015: mkhan de la ma dris snyam du 'gyod pa skyes
NK044(phi)001:6016: shing / don de'i phyir sman chen po la ma
NK044(phi)001:6017: dris kyi bar du khyim du mi 'agro'o zhes bsams
NK044(phi)001:6018: shing / shing smras te / sman chen po'i drung
NK044(phi)001:6019: du phyin nas ltas mkhan gyis smras pa sogs ji
NK044(phi)001:6021: sman chen pos gang nas 'ong dris pas des ji ltar gyur pa smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6022: sman chen pos 'di'i rkyal pa'i nang na sbrul gdug pa yod par nges so snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:6023: skye bo mang po'i mngon sum du rkyal pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:6024: kha khrol la rgyang ma nas shing gis kha phyes
NK044(phi)001:6025: shig dang gdod shes par 'gyur ro zhes smras pa
NK044(phi)001:6026: ltar byas pas / sbrul gdug pa des mgo ni bteg /
NK044(phi)001:6027: dbugs rgod cing lce bskyod bzhin phyir phyung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6028: sman chen pos khyod kyi dogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6029: de nas sman chen po yul blta ba'i phyir yan
NK044(phi)001:6030: lag bzhi'i dpungs stobs dang ldan pas grong dang tshong
NK044(phi)001:6031: 'dus grong 'dab sogs su song ste yul 'di su'i
NK044(phi)001:6033: 'di blon po che ge mo zhig gi yin no
NK044(phi)001:6034: zhes smra ba sha stag la sman chen pos brtags
NK044(phi)001:6035: nas yul thams cad blon po drug gi bsnams te
NK044(phi)001:6036: / rgyal po skyed pa ni bza' btung tsam la dbang ngo snyam du bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:6037: rgyal po la grong dang yul 'di su la dbang zhes de ltar gsol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6039: bdag la snying brtse ba'i lhas rmi lam du /
NK044(phi)001:6040: p+aur+n+n+aa kats+tsha'i ri brags gyi grong na gang po zhes
NK044(phi)001:6041: bya ba'i bu sman chen po khyod kyi blon por
NK044(phi)001:6042: chug shig dang des khyod kyi yul rnams rgyas par
NK044(phi)001:6044: de'i tshe khyod thams cad la dbang ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas /
NK044(phi)001:6045: khyod ni ma'i rum na 'dug tshun chad bdag gis dgos pa 'di'i phyir yo byad kyis bskyed nas /
NK044(phi)001:6046: da yang blon po'i mchog tu bcug nas /
NK044(phi)001:6047: da ni lha'i tshig dang khyod rang gi blos lcogs
NK044(phi)001:6048: pa ston pas ci nas bdag dbang phyug rgyal por
NK044(phi)001:6050: sman chen pos rgyal po la phyag byas te thugs brtan par mdzod dang /
NK044(phi)001:6051: ci nas bdag gis lha mnyes par 'gyur ba de ltar bagyi'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6052: de nas sman chen pos grong yul gyi gtso bo
NK044(phi)001:6053: de rnams la dbyen bcug ste so sor phye nas
NK044(phi)001:6054: ci nas khyed dga' bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag
NK044(phi)001:6055: gis bya'o // blon po de dag ni 'dod che
NK044(phi)001:6056: bas dpya nar ma dang bla skyes dag kyang mi
NK044(phi)001:6057: rigs par 'bebs ste de'i phyir rigs par byas /
NK044(phi)001:6058: 'di ltar bdag gi tshig mnyan na bdag gis khong
NK044(phi)001:6059: du chud par bstan te dpya yang rigs par dbab
NK044(phi)001:6060: / gzhan yang bde bar 'god cing bde ba'i yo byad rnams kyis bskyang bar bya yi /
NK044(phi)001:6061: ci nas khyed cag mi mthun par byos shig /
NK044(phi)001:6062: khyed mi mthun par byas pa la ci ste rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6063: po'am blon po rnams lhags na yang bdag ma 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:6064: kyi bar du de dag gi dbang du ma 'gro
NK044(phi)001:6066: blon po'i mchog sman chen po'i 'ongs na de'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:6067: du gtong gis gzhan gang gis kyang ma yin no
NK044(phi)001:6068: zhes smros shig ces bslabs pa ltar yul de dag
NK044(phi)001:6069: mi mthun par byed cing bka' rnams bcag pa na
NK044(phi)001:6070: / blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6071: blon po drug po yan lag bzhi'i dpung gi stobs
NK044(phi)001:6072: mang po can dang lhan cig bkye yang grong dang
NK044(phi)001:6073: ri brag gi grong gcig la yang dbang byed par
NK044(phi)001:6074: ma nus so // de nas rgyal po nyid ma
NK044(phi)001:6075: byon na 'di dag dbang du mgyir mi nus so
NK044(phi)001:6076: zhes pho nya btang nas rgyal po nyid 'ongs kyang
NK044(phi)001:6077: grong gcig kyang dbang byar ma nus te 'thabs pas
NK044(phi)001:6078: mi mang zhig shi ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6079: rgyal blon rnams mi dga' bar gyur to /
NK044(phi)001:6080: de nas ri bragasakyi mi rnams kyis sman chen po
NK044(phi)001:6081: 'dir 'ongs na de'i ngag nyan te bdag cag rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6082: po skyed pa dang mi mthun pa bgyid pa ma
NK044(phi)001:6083: yin gyi blon po drug bdag cag la gnod pa
NK044(phi)001:6084: bgyid pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6085: rgyal pos nged kyis yul rnams phebs par ma nus
NK044(phi)001:6086: kyis khyod tshur shog cig ces pho nya btang ba'i
NK044(phi)001:6088: de mthong nas yul mi kun gyi phyag 'tshal zhing
NK044(phi)001:6089: des kyang mi rnams la ma 'jigs shig ces byas
NK044(phi)001:6090: nas dpya yang chos bzhin dbab /
NK044(phi)001:6091: dman pa dag dbul ba skyabs med pa rnams kyang dbugs dbyung bar byas /
NK044(phi)001:6092: yul dang grong khyer pa rnams la pha ma dang
NK044(phi)001:6093: phu nu dag rang gi skye bo bzhin bkur sti
NK044(phi)001:6094: dang bya dgas kun snyoms par byas nas pang nas
NK044(phi)001:6095: 'khyud do // yul na gnas pa'i rgan gzhon dag
NK044(phi)001:6096: bud med thams cad kyis sman chen po la bdag
NK044(phi)001:6097: gi bu dang ming po bzhin du lta bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:6098: 'khyud do // / des kyang thams cad sems dga'
NK044(phi)001:6099: bar byas shing mthar gyis yul thams cad gcig tu
NK044(phi)001:6100: bsdus te rgyal po skyed pa dang lhan cig rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6102: de lta bu'i las byas pas rgyal po gzhan dag la yang snyan pa'i sgra grags par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:6103: de nas rgyal po dga' bas bdag nyid kyi bu
NK044(phi)001:6104: mo sman chen po'i chung mar byin te de dang
NK044(phi)001:6105: lhan cig rtse dga' spyad do //
NK044(phi)001:6106: de'i tshe yul gzhan na rgyal po longs spyod nyams
NK044(phi)001:6107: pa zhig rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du 'ongs pa
NK044(phi)001:6108: de rgyal pos ma 'dod nas sman chen po'i drung
NK044(phi)001:6109: du 'ongs so // des snying rje'i dbang gis bzung ste longs spyod kyang byin no //
NK044(phi)001:6110: de nas dus phyi zhig bram ze zhig 'ongs te
NK044(phi)001:6111: nas bre gang bslangs pa des kyang sbyin par khas
NK044(phi)001:6112: blangs te bag ba'i gnyer ka ba la gtad kyang
NK044(phi)001:6113: sang sbyin gnang sbyin las ma byin par lus so
NK044(phi)001:6114: // de nas dus zhig na rgyal po skyed pa
NK044(phi)001:6115: blon po dang grong dang ljongs ba dag gis bskor
NK044(phi)001:6116: te mi mang pos phyag 'tshal ba'i gnas na 'dug
NK044(phi)001:6118: kye blon po rnams gsang ba ni su la sma bar bya /
NK044(phi)001:6119: gang la yid brtan par bya zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6120: blon po rnams kyis bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:6121: gcig gis mdza' bo la smra bar rigs zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:6122: de bzhin du kha cig gis chung ma la /
NK044(phi)001:6124: kha cig gis sring mo dang pha la /
NK044(phi)001:6125: kha cig gis phu nu la'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6126: rgyal pos sman chen po la gzhan gyis ji ltar
NK044(phi)001:6127: bsams pa smras na khyod kyis ci'i phyir mi smra
NK044(phi)001:6131: gsang ba de ni su la yang bgyi bar mi rigs chung ma la lta ci smros te /
NK044(phi)001:6132: de ni bdag gis lha'i spyan sngar mngon par bagyi'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6133: de nas dus phyi zhig na rgyal po'i rma bya
NK044(phi)001:6134: stor ba sman chen pos btsal te phyogs gzhan zhig
NK044(phi)001:6135: tu sbas nas / de dang 'dra ba gzhan zhig bzung ste /
NK044(phi)001:6136: rang gi chung ma la khyod kyis rgyal po'i pho
NK044(phi)001:6137: brang nas rma bya stor ba thos sam zhes dris
NK044(phi)001:6138: pa dang des kyang thos so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6139: sman chen pos chung ma la khyod kyis su la
NK044(phi)001:6140: yang ma zer bar rma bya 'di tshos shig dang
NK044(phi)001:6141: baza'o zhes basga'o // des ri brags kyi grong mi
NK044(phi)001:6142: 'dis rgyal po'i rma bya za ba la ltos shig
NK044(phi)001:6143: baza'o zhes basga'o // / bdag gi phas ni 'di
NK044(phi)001:6144: la shin tu yid brtan par byed na 'dis ni
NK044(phi)001:6145: rgyal po la gnod pa'i las byed do snyam mo
NK044(phi)001:6146: baza'o zhes basga'o // / // yang re zhig na
NK044(phi)001:6147: rgyal po'i btsun mo dang 'dra ba'i bud med smad
NK044(phi)001:6148: 'tshong ma zhig rgyan thams cad kyis bklubs te bdag
NK044(phi)001:6149: gi bud med kyi nang du bcug nas chung ma
NK044(phi)001:6150: la 'di ni rgyal po'i btsun mo 'di zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:6151: baza'o zhes basga'o // / // ba yin te /
NK044(phi)001:6152: bdag 'di la shin tu yid brtan gyis khyod bdag
NK044(phi)001:6153: la sdug na su la yang ma zer cig ces
NK044(phi)001:6154: baza'o zhes basga'o // / // ba yin te /
NK044(phi)001:6155: bsgo ba dang / rgyal po'i bu mo des 'di
NK044(phi)001:6156: ni sman chen po dang lhan cig 'dug go snyam
NK044(phi)001:6157: du khros 'khrugs nas pha la 'phya zhing bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:6158: pha 'di lta bur don la rtog pa ci yang
NK044(phi)001:6159: baza'o zhes basga'o // / // ba yin te /
NK044(phi)001:6160: bsgo ba dang / med de / ri brags kyi
NK044(phi)001:6161: grong mi rigs ngan blon po'i mchog tu bcug nas
NK044(phi)001:6162: ngan pa 'di la rgyal po'i don thams cad gtad
NK044(phi)001:6164: ngas ci nas sngon gyi gnas rnying par bzhag pa de ltar bya'o bsams te /
NK044(phi)001:6165: pha la yab kyis ngan pa 'di ma brtags par
NK044(phi)001:6166: blon por bcug pa 'dis btsun mo 'di dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:6167: cig spyod / rma bya yang zos yul gzhan nas
NK044(phi)001:6168: 'ongs pa'i mi rnams bsnyen cing yo byad sbyor bar
NK044(phi)001:6169: cig spyod / bgyid na / yab kyis sman chen
NK044(phi)001:6170: po ni thams cad las sdug par 'dzin na 'di'i
NK044(phi)001:6171: tshul ji lta bu yin pa mkhyen par gyis shig
NK044(phi)001:6173: de nas rgyal pos don de dag brtag pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:6174: gshed ma'i mi rnams la sod cig ces bkri ba
NK044(phi)001:6175: dang / gnas rigs ngan pa'i mi de dag gis
NK044(phi)001:6176: shing ka ra w+ai ri'i me tog gi phreng ba
NK044(phi)001:6177: dang / mgul du btags / bod skad lta bu'i rnga brdungs /
NK044(phi)001:6178: tshig rtsub pos spyos bsdigs tshar bcad de mtshon thogs
NK044(phi)001:6179: pa gshin rje'i mi lta bu rnams kyis dur khrod
NK044(phi)001:6181: de gsad par su yang mi 'dod do //
NK044(phi)001:6182: grong khyer gyi mi thams cad mchi ma zag cing
NK044(phi)001:6183: bdag gi bu bsad pa ltar sdug bsngal gyi sgra
NK044(phi)001:6184: 'byin zhing lha la gsol ba 'debs so //
NK044(phi)001:6185: ji tsam na sman chen pos rgyal rigs dbul po
NK044(phi)001:6186: bsnyen cing longs spyod bgos te byin pa des rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6187: po'i mi rnams la bdag cag gis 'di bsad kyis
NK044(phi)001:6188: khyed cag slar log cig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6189: ci tsam nas grong khyer de nas byung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6190: bram ze mong rtul zhes bya bas gos mtha' 'jus
NK044(phi)001:6191: te khyod kyis nas bre gang sbyin par byas pa
NK044(phi)001:6192: de byin la sogs shig zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:6193: sman chen pos gnas der tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6194: rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med /
NK044(phi)001:6195: gdol pa la ni bshes pa med /
NK044(phi)001:6196: bud med rnams la gsang mi brjod /
NK044(phi)001:6197: rma bya'i sha ni bza' mi bya /
NK044(phi)001:6198: bram ze mo ra rtul po yi ni /
NK044(phi)001:6199: nas bre gang yang 'chags mi bya /
NK044(phi)001:6200: de skad smra zhing song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6201: gshed ma rnams kyis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6202: sman chen po khyod shes pa phun sum tshogs pa yin na de ci bla bar byed dam /
NK044(phi)001:6204: kho bo ni mi bla ste /
NK044(phi)001:6205: 'on kyang de ci bla de skad smras pa'i don khyed kyis mgo bar zad do //
NK044(phi)001:6206: zhes smras pas de rnams song ste /
NK044(phi)001:6207: rgyal po la sman chen po bla na bla ba de zlos su gsol zhes gsol bas /
NK044(phi)001:6208: rgyal pos sman chen po la khyod gsod pas skrag nas kha bla'am zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6211: 'on kyang bdag sdug bsngal gyis nyam thag nas dgos pa smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6214: rgyal po grogs su 'gyur ba med ces bdag gis smras pa ni /
NK044(phi)001:6215: sngon lha la grong ngam grong khyer sogs gang yang mi mnga' zhing /
NK044(phi)001:6216: bza' btung dang slas la dbang ba tsam zhig yin pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6217: deng sa la dbang ba'i rgyal po'i rgyal srid dang
NK044(phi)001:6218: dpung dang mdzod dang dmag la mnga' mdzad pa de
NK044(phi)001:6220: khyod kyis bdag la sngon gyi byas pa bzo ba
NK044(phi)001:6221: nyid ma dgongs par lhas dgum du btang ba de
NK044(phi)001:6222: la bsams nas bdag gi de skad du smras so
NK044(phi)001:6223: // gdol pa la ni bshes pa med ces pa /
NK044(phi)001:6224: gdol pa mal dang gos dang bral ba 'di rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6225: po skyed pas bdag la 'tsho ba'i yo byad byin
NK044(phi)001:6226: na des 'tsho bar bya'o snyam du lha'i drung du
NK044(phi)001:6227: mchis pa las / lhas yongs su ma bzung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6228: bdag gis ni bkren cing yul nas 'khyams pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:6229: snyam nas bgo bsha' bgyis pas 'di ltar deng sang
NK044(phi)001:6230: bde bar gyur pa lags na 'dis bdag dgum pa'i
NK044(phi)001:6231: slad du dga' ste chas na de'i phyir bdag gis
NK044(phi)001:6233: bud med rnams la gsang mi brjod ces bgyi ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:6234: rgyal po nyid sngar dus gcig na 'khor gyi nang
NK044(phi)001:6235: du bzhugs nas 'di skad du su la gsang ba
NK044(phi)001:6236: smra zhing yid gcugs par bya zhes gsung pa na
NK044(phi)001:6237: / blon po rnams kyis pha ma dang sring mo dang ne'u ldangs rnams la'o zhes smras par /
NK044(phi)001:6238: rgyal po nyid kyis chung ma ni lus kyi phyed
NK044(phi)001:6239: yin pas de la brjod par bya'o zhes gsungs so
NK044(phi)001:6240: // de nas bdag gis don 'di lha'i spyan sngar
NK044(phi)001:6241: dbab par bagyi'o snyam nas rgyal po'i rma bya sbas
NK044(phi)001:6242: nas rma bya gzhan zhig zos so //
NK044(phi)001:6243: slas las kyang slas che ge mo las rgyan blangs
NK044(phi)001:6244: nas smad 'tshong che ge mo zhig la btags te
NK044(phi)001:6245: khyim du bzhag pas lha smad 'tshong ma de yang
NK044(phi)001:6246: gzigs su gsol / de nas rgyal pos smad 'tshong
NK044(phi)001:6247: ma la bltas na slas de dang de gnyis kha
NK044(phi)001:6248: dog dang rtags sogs khyad par ci yang med par
NK044(phi)001:6249: gzigs su gsol / mthong ngo // rgyal po'i rma bya yang dngos su mthong ste /
NK044(phi)001:6250: sman chen po la nyes pa med par khong du chud do //
NK044(phi)001:6251: bram ze mong rtul po yi ni /
NK044(phi)001:6252: nas bre gang yang 'chags mi bya /
NK044(phi)001:6254: bdag rgyal pos dgum du btang bas gshed ma ba
NK044(phi)001:6255: rnams kyis khrid pa na bram ze des nas bre
NK044(phi)001:6256: gang gi don du gos kyi mthar 'jus nas bzung
NK044(phi)001:6257: bas de skad du smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6258: de nas don de thams cad mngon sum mthong bar byas pas dga' ste /
NK044(phi)001:6259: dkrol nas bkur sti chen por byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6260: de nas sman chen pos rgyal po la phyag byas
NK044(phi)001:6261: te gsol pa lha khyod kyis bud med rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:6262: gsang gzigs sam / khyod kyi sras mo ni bdag la dgos pa yod ma mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:6263: 'on kyang rigs gzugs dang tshul shes rab bdag dang
NK044(phi)001:6264: 'dra ba de kho na'i mchis brang zhig blang bar
NK044(phi)001:6265: bgyi'i zhes rgyal po la gnang ba gsol nas /
NK044(phi)001:6266: bdag nyid bram ze'i cha byad du byas te /
NK044(phi)001:6267: lag g.yas bya ma bum thogs /
NK044(phi)001:6268: lus mchod phyir thogs kyis mdzes par byas /
NK044(phi)001:6269: ri dwags kyi bgas pa gos su bgos /
NK044(phi)001:6270: gdong la byug ris gsum byas nas ri 'khor gyi
NK044(phi)001:6271: nags tshang tshing can du bu mo btsal ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:6272: chas so // de la ma gyi bar du grong
NK044(phi)001:6273: zhig du mun sros pa der yud tsam nas bram
NK044(phi)001:6274: ze zhig 'ongs nas gang du 'gro ba sogs dris
NK044(phi)001:6276: nags tshang tshing can du 'gro zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6277: des khyim du brang gdab pa'i ngo shes 'ga' yod dam zer ba la med ces smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:6278: bram ze des khyim du khrid de tshul mthun pas phu dud byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6279: des de'i chung ma skyes pa gzhan la chags pa
NK044(phi)001:6280: can 'khrigs nas phyi de nyin par lam dris nas
NK044(phi)001:6281: chas so // khyim de'i bram ze des bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:6282: khyim 'dir phan tshun 'gro ba'i tshe rang gi khyim
NK044(phi)001:6283: bzhin du song zhes zer ba la de bzhin bagyi'o
NK044(phi)001:6285: ji zhig na lam bar zhig tu nas kyi zhing
NK044(phi)001:6286: yod pa de na bu mo gzugs bzang zhing lta
NK044(phi)001:6287: na sdug pa rigs btsun pa shin tu zhi bar
NK044(phi)001:6288: ldan pa zhig mthong nas de la yid zhen cing
NK044(phi)001:6289: / bzang mo khyod su yin ming ci yin sogs dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6291: grong thams cad kyi zhing sgrub par byed pa'o zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6292: sman chen pos bu mo 'di gzugs bzang mod blo ji 'dra bgam par bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:6293: grong zhig tu zhugs te lag pa bsgrengs nas lag
NK044(phi)001:6294: pa phangs par byas shing rkang pas gro phur ba
NK044(phi)001:6295: dang / sa gas smras pa mkhan po ji ltar
NK044(phi)001:6296: lag pa phangs pa de bzhin rkang pa phangs par
NK044(phi)001:6297: dang / gyis shig / des de mdzangs pa zhig go snyam du bgad nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6298: khyod kyi rna cha gdub kor gdu bu zhig ste /
NK044(phi)001:6301: mkhan po rna ba gnyis dgab pa'i slad du'o //
NK044(phi)001:6303: bu mo khyod byad bzang zhing mdzes so //
NK044(phi)001:6305: grong gi bdag po rnams kyi bka' drin gyis so //
NK044(phi)001:6309: lam gcig gnyis su bgyid du mchis te tsher ma'i
NK044(phi)001:6310: yal ga ba sdus nas lam bcad par bgyid do
NK044(phi)001:6312: zhing thog nas sa bon gyi phyir mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:6313: bu mo nga'i chung mar bya'am /
NK044(phi)001:6315: gal te grong gi bdag po btub na'o //
NK044(phi)001:6317: nags tshang tshing can du lam gang nas 'gro na
NK044(phi)001:6318: bde zhing mi 'khyogs pa de ston cig dang de'i
NK044(phi)001:6319: don tshigs su bcad pas kyang dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6320: des de la lam 'khyogs pa zhig bstan te mo
NK044(phi)001:6321: rang lam gzhan nas mdun du brgyug cing rdzing bu
NK044(phi)001:6322: zhig tu gos rnams phud nas mig ya gcig btsum
NK044(phi)001:6323: ste ngo shes sam mi shes zhes glo gcig gis
NK044(phi)001:6324: snyes te 'dug bzhin yang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6325: gang gis za bgyid de nas bzhud //
NK044(phi)001:6326: gang gis za bar mi bgyid pa //
NK044(phi)001:6327: de ni dor bar bgyis nas su //
NK044(phi)001:6328: zan gyi nags su bzhud par mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:6329: de nas sman chen pos des ji skad bstan pa'i lam nas song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6330: ji tsam na rgyang ring po nas de ngo shes nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6331: ras bal thags su btags pa mi bdog pas //
NK044(phi)001:6332: ma bkal thags su ma btags gyon byed pa //
NK044(phi)001:6333: mdzes ldan g.yon pa'i mig can gang nas ni //
NK044(phi)001:6334: me tog grong du 'gro ba bdag la ston //
NK044(phi)001:6335: de nas bu mo cung zhing bgad nas smras pa //
NK044(phi)001:6336: 'dir ni g.yon po'i lam bor la //
NK044(phi)001:6337: gang na yos ni yod par dang //
NK044(phi)001:6338: ba la sha yi me tog rgyas //
NK044(phi)001:6339: de nas bram ze bzhud du gsol //
NK044(phi)001:6340: de song song ste phyin nas dris shing sa ga'i
NK044(phi)001:6341: khyim du song ba de'i pha ma mi snang ngo
NK044(phi)001:6342: // de nas grong gi bdag po rnams la sa
NK044(phi)001:6343: ga 'di khyed rnams kyis gnang na bdag gi chung
NK044(phi)001:6344: // ma bya'o // tshig de thos ma thag tu
NK044(phi)001:6345: grong gi bdag po rnams tshig mthun par bram ze
NK044(phi)001:6346: ngan pa khyod ded kyi sa ga lha'i bu mo
NK044(phi)001:6347: 'dra ba slong ba ngo mi tsha'am /
NK044(phi)001:6349: khyod khyi mi srun pa la zar 'jug go ga
NK044(phi)001:6350: re zhes smras te de bskrad nas slar song ba
NK044(phi)001:6352: rgyang ring po nas byon pa legs so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6353: sa ga la sman chen pos de rnams kyis de'u brdeg go zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6356: des smras tshul zhib par bshad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6358: khyod yud tsam mi bsam par bu mo bsad pa khyod kyi de ltar byed dam /
NK044(phi)001:6362: re zhig sngar nye bar song la rjes su mthun
NK044(phi)001:6363: par bgyi zhing mgron du 'bod la zas skom bda'
NK044(phi)001:6364: ba'i ston mos mgu bar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:6365: de nas bgyi ba de bgyid rigs so //
NK044(phi)001:6366: sman chen po song ste des ji skad bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:6367: ltar byas nas kha zas bsod pas bstabs nas sa
NK044(phi)001:6369: de rnams kyis der khyod kyi bsam pa bzhin rdzogs par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:6371: de nas yud tsam na sa ga'i pha ma 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:6372: pa dang sman chen po dang grong gi bdag po
NK044(phi)001:6373: rnams kyis sa ga sbyin par gsol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6374: pha mas don de bsam dgos so zhes zer ba la /
NK044(phi)001:6375: grong gi bdag po rnams na re /
NK044(phi)001:6377: bram ze gzhon nu gzugs bzang zhing bstan gcos dang
NK044(phi)001:6378: rig byed kyi pha rol tu son pa yin pas
NK044(phi)001:6379: byin cig / de nas sman chen pos bram ze rnams bos nas bu mo blang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6380: nyi ma gzhan la gyos po dang sgyur mo bos
NK044(phi)001:6381: nas bkur sti byas te gos bskon nas gnyod bcug
NK044(phi)001:6382: ste / rang nyid rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du slar chas so //
NK044(phi)001:6383: de 'gro khar bram ze zhig gis bcu bzhi pa'i
NK044(phi)001:6384: ston mo'i yon nas bre gang byin pa gos kyi
NK044(phi)001:6385: mthar phul te / sngar gyi grogs po bram ze de'i khyim du song nas sgo brdungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6388: nga khyod kyi khyim thab kyi grogs po'o //
NK044(phi)001:6390: 'di na de yang med la gzhan 'ga' yang med
NK044(phi)001:6391: pa khyim bdag de med par skyes pa gzhan khyim
NK044(phi)001:6392: du 'jug mi rung gis gzhan zhig tu brang thob
NK044(phi)001:6393: cig / sman chen pos bdag khyim du 'jug mi
NK044(phi)001:6394: ste ba la dpyad na skyes pa gzhan bcug par
NK044(phi)001:6395: shes nas 'dis 'jug tu ma ster ba ni rung
NK044(phi)001:6396: ngo zhes smras shing bsam pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6397: yud tsam na khyim bdag bram ze de 'ongs nas sgor bos pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6398: chung mas de'i sgra thos nas mi de spyad du bcug go //
NK044(phi)001:6399: de nas bram ze dang sman chen po gnyis ka khyim du zhugs nas bde bar 'khod do //
NK044(phi)001:6400: ji tsam na bram ze mo de la sman chen pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6405: sa la bzhag na byi bas zos kyi snod gzhan mal 'og dang khyim kun tu mi snang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6406: de nas sman chen pos yud tsam na phyogs zhig
NK044(phi)001:6407: na spyad zhig mthong nas byi bo de 'di na
NK044(phi)001:6408: yod do snyam tu bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:6409: spyad 'dir nas blugs so zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6411: 'dir bdag gi nor gces pa yod pas nas ji ltar blugs /
NK044(phi)001:6413: skyon can de snod gang rung zhig tu byo dang der na sdug go //
NK044(phi)001:6415: nas rnams byi bas za bas snod 'dir blugs par bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:6416: bram ze mo des shes nas 'jigs te /
NK044(phi)001:6417: spyad 'di gsher bas nas ma rungs par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:6418: de nas sman chen pos bram ze mo khyod sems
NK044(phi)001:6419: khral mi dgos dang kho bos gsher bar mi 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:6420: bar bya zhes langs nas ri dwags kyi pags pa
NK044(phi)001:6421: snga log phyi log byas mchod phyir thogs nyis ltab
NK044(phi)001:6423: spyad skam mo zhes ba lang gi lci ba dang shing dag bskya bar brtsams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6424: bram ze mo sdug pa dang 'bral ba'i gdung bas
NK044(phi)001:6425: 'di nga med par byed du 'ong ngo snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:6426: byi bo de'i khyim du 'di ltar gyur gyis myur
NK044(phi)001:6427: du shog ces bang chen btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6428: de nas de'i pha myur du 'ong ste sman chen po la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6433: gser gyi dong rtse lnga brgya yin gyi gzhan min
NK044(phi)001:6434: no zhes zer zhing spyad de'i nye skor du me
NK044(phi)001:6435: sgron spor bar byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6436: phas bsams pa don 'di bsnyad du mi rung ngo
NK044(phi)001:6437: bsams nas gser gyi dong rtse lnga brgya byin cing
NK044(phi)001:6438: khyim sgo phye ste mi stobs che bas btegs nas
NK044(phi)001:6439: rang gi khyim du khyer ro //
NK044(phi)001:6440: phyi de nyin par sman chen pos gser gyi dong
NK044(phi)001:6441: rtse brgya phrag gcig ni khyim bdag de la byin
NK044(phi)001:6442: nas khyod kyi chung ma ni 'di lta bu ste
NK044(phi)001:6443: bag yod par gyis zhes smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6444: gser gyi dong rtse lhag bzhi brgya ni bram ze
NK044(phi)001:6445: de la nags tshang tshing can du song la bdag
NK044(phi)001:6446: gis bslangs pa'i sa ga la byin nas de'i pha
NK044(phi)001:6447: ma la kho bo bram ze ma yin te /
NK044(phi)001:6448: rtags cha lugs 'di lta bus bu mo 'tshol ba'i phyir 'ongs pa yin la /
NK044(phi)001:6449: kho bo lus 'phags kyi rgyal po skyed pa'i blon
NK044(phi)001:6450: po'i mchog sman chen po zhes bya ba yin pas
NK044(phi)001:6451: de'i phyir bu mo yongs su skyongs shig ces smros
NK044(phi)001:6452: la dong rtse 'di rnams byin cig ces phrin yig
NK044(phi)001:6454: rang nyid rgyal po'i drung du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6455: bram ze des nags tshang tshing can du song ste /
NK044(phi)001:6456: gser gyi dong rtse sum brgya dang phrin yig byin pa /
NK044(phi)001:6458: bzhi po yi ni cha dag las /
NK044(phi)001:6459: gal te cha gcig ma ster na /
NK044(phi)001:6460: shing gi su mi 'dong blangs nas /
NK044(phi)001:6461: der 'di chug la cha do shig /
NK044(phi)001:6462: ces pa mthong bas gser gyi dong rtse brgya ma
NK044(phi)001:6463: ster bar shes nas rings par mal gyi 'og tu
NK044(phi)001:6464: mi'i rkang pa la brgyabs pa'i cha byad shing gi
NK044(phi)001:6465: sum 'dong zhes pa de 'tshol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6469: pho brang 'khor gyi rgyal po'i mi 'ong nas gnod pa byed pa zungs shig ces byung ste /
NK044(phi)001:6470: de'i ched du sum 'dong tshol lo //
NK044(phi)001:6471: sa gas sum 'dong de blangs nas bram ze la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6472: der de lta bu su zhig khrid kyang kho mos
NK044(phi)001:6473: ma shes na re shig 'dir rkang pa chud dam
NK044(phi)001:6474: mi chung sad kyis thang cig chug cig /
NK044(phi)001:6475: bram ze des kyang bsam pa gnag pa'i phyir rkang pa bcug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6476: des rings par shing spyad de'i gzer btab bo //
NK044(phi)001:6480: dong tshe bzhi brgya bskur na khyod kyis brgya brkus pas so //
NK044(phi)001:6481: der bram ze ya mtshan skyes te bsams pa /
NK044(phi)001:6482: sman chen po dang 'di ni 'dre dngos gcig ste /
NK044(phi)001:6483: 'dre chen po gnyis gnas gcig tu 'dus par gyur to snyam nas des lhag ma byin no //
NK044(phi)001:6484: de'i rjes su pha ma 'ongs pa dang sman chen
NK044(phi)001:6485: po'i gsang bstan te de ni blon po sman chen
NK044(phi)001:6486: po yin pa'i tshul smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:6487: pha ma dang bu mo de'i gnyen 'dun thams cad dga' zhing /
NK044(phi)001:6488: bdag cag bsod nams dang ldan te sman chen po
NK044(phi)001:6489: dang gnyen du gyur pas bdag cag gi rigs gsal
NK044(phi)001:6490: bar byas so zhes dga' bas /
NK044(phi)001:6491: bu mo sa ga la khrus dang bsku mnye zas
NK044(phi)001:6492: skom dang gos rgyan gyis shin tu byi dor byas
NK044(phi)001:6493: pas / ring por ma lon par de gzugs shin
NK044(phi)001:6494: tu bzang zhing khyad par du mdzes par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:6495: pas / // sman chen po grong khyer du song
NK044(phi)001:6496: ba dang rgyal po 'khor bcas dga' ste rgyal pos
NK044(phi)001:6498: bdag gis mchis brag rnyed de gzugs mdzes shing blo
NK044(phi)001:6499: phun sum tshogs pa zhig ste de ni bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:6500: sbu la 'bab pa lags mod de blang bar bagyi'am
NK044(phi)001:6502: nga ma gtogs pa su zhig khyod kyi thog tu 'bab ste khyod ni blon po'i mchog go //
NK044(phi)001:6503: des na de mgu bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'byor pas blang bar bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:6504: lha de ltar 'tshal zhes smras nas sman chen po'i
NK044(phi)001:6505: blon po'i tshogs dang bram ze dang khyim bdag dang
NK044(phi)001:6506: dpung bzhi pa'i tshogs mang pos bskor nas ri 'khor
NK044(phi)001:6507: nags tshang tshing can du gyos po'i khyim du song
NK044(phi)001:6508: ste bag ma blangs nas rang gi grong du de
NK044(phi)001:6509: dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga' mgur spyod par byed
NK044(phi)001:6510: do // de'i tshe byang phyogs nas tshong pa lnga
NK044(phi)001:6511: brgya zhig zong du rta mang po khyer nas lus
NK044(phi)001:6512: 'phags pa'i ljongs su rgyal po'i skyed pa'i drung du
