NK044(phi)001:6513: do // lhags so // gnas der smad 'tshong ma
NK044(phi)001:6514: gzugs dang sgyu rtsal dang bsam pa la mkhas pa
NK044(phi)001:6515: lnga brgya yod pas tshong pa gang nas 'ong ba
NK044(phi)001:6516: thams cad kyis rdzas med par byed pa yin pas
NK044(phi)001:6517: do // lhags so // / der yang byang phyogs
NK044(phi)001:6518: kyi tshong pa de rnams re re la rim gro
NK044(phi)001:6519: bya bar khas blangs nas de rnams dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:6520: rtse dga' la gnas par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:6521: tshong pa de rnams kyi ded dpon bag yod pa
NK044(phi)001:6522: zhig gnas pa de smad 'tshong ma'i gtso mo des
NK044(phi)001:6523: 'dod pas kun spyod sna tshogs bstan kyang de bgyid
NK044(phi)001:6525: des tshong pa de rnams la bdag dang ded dpon
NK044(phi)001:6526: mthun pa'i thabs mdzod ces gsol ba btab pas tshong
NK044(phi)001:6527: pa rnams dang smad 'tshong ma rnams nyin bzhin rgyun
NK044(phi)001:6528: du phe'u byas na yang tshong dpon de bag med
NK044(phi)001:6529: kyi dbang du ma song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6530: de nas smad 'tshong ma de rang nyid ded dpon
NK044(phi)001:6531: dang lhan cig bgad pa dang ga zha byas pa
NK044(phi)001:6533: nga la 'khrul bar bya mi nus na ci'i phyir nyon mongs /
NK044(phi)001:6535: gal te 'khrul par bgyis na shes ldan gyis ci stsal /
NK044(phi)001:6536: des smras pa rta'i mchog lnga sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:6538: 'o na 'khrul bar bgyir ma btub na slad kyis
NK044(phi)001:6539: k+aar sha pa na ma mchis bzhin du rjes su
NK044(phi)001:6541: de gnyis de ltar skugs btsugs nas 'bad de nye bar brtson pa las kyang ma nus so //
NK044(phi)001:6542: ji tsam na tshong pa de rnams kyis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6543: ded dpon grong khyer gtso mo smad 'tshong ma bzhag
NK044(phi)001:6544: pa las sus ma zug na 'jig rten gyi tshul
NK044(phi)001:6545: gyis shig / ded dpon des de rnams la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6546: grogs po dag mtshan mo rmi lam de la yongs su spyad do //
NK044(phi)001:6547: de ltar tshong pa rnams kyis smad 'tshong gtso mo la smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6548: des rgyal po'i mi rnams bshes su gyur pa la
NK044(phi)001:6549: 'dzin du bcug nas khyod bdag la 'dod pa spyad
NK044(phi)001:6550: kyis rta'i mchog lnga byin cig /
NK044(phi)001:6551: ded dpon gyis ngan pa mo brdzun du smra ba
NK044(phi)001:6552: zer zhing de gnyis rgyal po'i pho brang du song
NK044(phi)001:6553: ste nyi ma nub kyi bar du shag bkye ba
NK044(phi)001:6554: na / rgyal pham ma 'byed pas zhal lce gcod
NK044(phi)001:6555: ma shes par rgyal blon thams cad skyo ba skyes
NK044(phi)001:6556: te bkres pas nyen nas phyis dpyad do zhes rang
NK044(phi)001:6557: rang gi khyim du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6558: sman chen po la sa gas rje'i sras de rigs ci'i slad du thogs /
NK044(phi)001:6559: des zhal lce gcad par ma nus pa'i gtam de lta bu smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6561: khyod rtog pa dang sel ba phun sum tshogs pa
NK044(phi)001:6562: de lta bus zhal lce de gcod par ma nus
NK044(phi)001:6563: na skyes pa'i tshul yin pa lta /
NK044(phi)001:6565: de lta bu khyod kyis gcad nus sam /
NK044(phi)001:6567: bdag gi blo'i nus pa la gzigs dang de rngo thogs te /
NK044(phi)001:6568: gshegs la rdzing bu'i 'gram du rta'i mchog lnga bzhag
NK044(phi)001:6569: nas gnas der rgyal blon rnams kyang 'dus te de
NK044(phi)001:6571: gal te smad 'tshong mas gnyis ka dngos su 'dod
NK044(phi)001:6572: pa spyad do zer na rta'i mchog lnga khyer ces
NK044(phi)001:6573: gsungs shig / 'o na te rmi lam na 'dod pa spyad do zer na /
NK044(phi)001:6574: rta'i gzugs brnyan chu na yod pa ston la 'di khyer ces gsungs shig /
NK044(phi)001:6575: gal te blang mi rung ba 'di dag gis ci dgos zer na /
NK044(phi)001:6576: 'di bzhin du rmi lam gyi 'dod pa spyad pa yang de 'dra'o zhes gsungs shig /
NK044(phi)001:6577: de thos pas sman chen po ya mtshan skyes nas /
NK044(phi)001:6578: des ji ltar smras pa ltar zhal lce bcad pas rgyal blon sogs thams cad ya mtshan skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:6579: rgyal pos sman chen po la khar sang bdag cag
NK044(phi)001:6580: rnams dang skye bo gzhan dag nyon mongs par mi
NK044(phi)001:6581: 'byung bar khyod kyi thabs de su las byung /
NK044(phi)001:6583: 'di ni sa ga'i thabs lags so //
NK044(phi)001:6584: rgyal blon yul mi bcas pas zhing mkhan gyi bu
NK044(phi)001:6585: mo sa ga ni shin tu mkhas shing blo dang
NK044(phi)001:6586: ldan no zhes bsgrags te yul thams cad du grags
NK044(phi)001:6587: par gyur to // yang byang phyogs kyi tshong pa
NK044(phi)001:6588: zhig gis rgod ma gnyis rgyal po la skyes su
NK044(phi)001:6589: phul te lha 'di dag ma smad lags na ma
NK044(phi)001:6590: dang bu gang yin pa ni gzhan gyis ma 'a
NK044(phi)001:6591: tshal to zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6592: de ma shes nas sman chen pos sa ga la dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6593: gang gi spu gshor ba de ni ma'o //
NK044(phi)001:6594: spu 'jam pa ni bu'o zhes smras pas rgyal po ngo mtshar du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:6595: de bzhin du sbrul khas sdig pa zhig gis sbrul
NK044(phi)001:6596: gnyis rgyal po la bstan te pho mo gang yin
NK044(phi)001:6598: tshul de sa ga la sman chen pos smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6599: sa ga bgad de gang don 'di lta bu yang mi rtogs na /
NK044(phi)001:6600: rgyal po dang blon po rtog pa dang sel ba phun sum tshogs pas brgyan pa lta zhig /
NK044(phi)001:6603: de ni sla ste 'od ma'am snyug ma'i rtse mo
NK044(phi)001:6604: ras bal lam bal gyis dkris te sbrul gyi rgyab
NK044(phi)001:6605: tu reg na / gang reg par mi bzod pa pho dang bzod pa mo'o zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:6606: lho phyogs na tshong pa dag gis tsan dan gyi
NK044(phi)001:6607: sdong po khyer ba de'i mgo mjug ma shes pa
NK044(phi)001:6608: la / sa gas rdzing bu'i nang du bor na rtsa ba ni 'og tu 'bying ngo zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:6609: yang rgyal po des nor bu rtags pa la su mkhas shes pa'i ched du /
NK044(phi)001:6610: khang brtsegs kyi rtser rgyal mtshan la nor bu btags
NK044(phi)001:6611: te de'i 'og na yod pa'i rdzing bu zhig yod
NK044(phi)001:6612: pa der nor bu'i gzugs brnyan dang 'od snang bar
NK044(phi)001:6613: byas nas / nor bu rin po che gang gis
NK044(phi)001:6614: shes pa de la sbyin pa dam pa bstabs so
NK044(phi)001:6615: byas nas / zhes smras pas / blon po gzhan
NK044(phi)001:6616: rdzing der zhugs nas 'ong bzung ba las blang ma
NK044(phi)001:6617: byas nas / zhes smras pas / nus so // sa gas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6618: steng du khang brtsegs la rgyal mtshan gyi rtser nor
NK044(phi)001:6619: bu btags pa de'i mthus gzugs brnyan rdzing du gda'
NK044(phi)001:6620: mod kyi / gang du zhugs la rgyal mtshan gyi
NK044(phi)001:6621: rtse mo las nor bu blang bar bya'o zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:6622: pa thams cad de bzhin du gyur pas de mkhas
NK044(phi)001:6623: so zhes kun gyis bstod do //
NK044(phi)001:6624: de nas sa gzugs shin tu bzang po dang ldan par blon po drug gis mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:6625: nor dang gser dngul sogs kyis brid de lhan cig phrad par bya'o snyam pa las ma zug go //
NK044(phi)001:6626: de ltar rgyun du 'bad pa dang smra ba na /
NK044(phi)001:6627: sa gas sman chen po la khyod kyi yul chos
NK044(phi)001:6628: kyis bud med gang gzhon zhing gzugs bzang ba de
NK044(phi)001:6629: gzhan gyi skyes pas bslu ba de ci lta bu
NK044(phi)001:6630: zhig / sman chen pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6631: 'di ni thams cad kyi chos te skyes pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:6632: ni bud med thams cad la don du gnyer mod
NK044(phi)001:6633: kyi / bud med nyid kyis shes par byas te /
NK044(phi)001:6634: gal te bud med mdzangs na de byed du mi btub bo //
NK044(phi)001:6636: rje'i sras gal te de lta bu la co 'dri
NK044(phi)001:6637: ba dang gnong ba zhig bgyis na nyen du mi
NK044(phi)001:6638: 'gyur grang sman chen pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6640: de nas sa gas khyed kyis na'o zhes rgyu mdzod cig dang de nas tho brtsam par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:6641: sman chen pos na ba'i khul byas te /
NK044(phi)001:6642: pho nya btang nas 'di na zhing mi bde bas
NK044(phi)001:6643: rim gro byed do zhes so so springs nas shing
NK044(phi)001:6644: la sman chen po'i gzugs bgyis tha mal du gos
NK044(phi)001:6646: sa gas blon po drug po la sman chen po 'di ni na bas nyam chung ste /
NK044(phi)001:6647: dus 'di dang 'dis gzhan gyis ma shes par byon
NK044(phi)001:6648: ces byas nas sgrom chen po drug byas te bzhag
NK044(phi)001:6649: go // der dus dus na de dag 'ongs pa
NK044(phi)001:6650: dang skra phyis nas bcings te sgrom re rer bcug
NK044(phi)001:6651: go // go // phyi de nyin par sman chen
NK044(phi)001:6652: po shi'o zhes sgra bsgrags pas btsun mo'i 'khor dang
NK044(phi)001:6653: skye bo'i tshogs phal cher ngus so //
NK044(phi)001:6654: sa gas sgrom drug po de rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du khyer te /
NK044(phi)001:6655: lha sman chen po ni dus las 'das la de'i
NK044(phi)001:6656: nor dbyig dang gser dang rin po che la sogs
NK044(phi)001:6657: pa de dag de nyid kyis rgyas btab pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:6658: dag lags so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6659: rgyal pos de de ring shi nas deng nyid la 'di phul lo zhes mya ngan byed do //
NK044(phi)001:6660: de'i skabs su sman chen po nyid me tog gis
NK044(phi)001:6661: brgyan zhing gnas gzhan zhig nas rgyal po'i drung du
NK044(phi)001:6662: phyin de phyag 'tshal nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6663: lhas bdag gdugs 'ga' yang byams pas ma bzung ste /
NK044(phi)001:6664: deng nyid du sdum pa rgyal pos bzhes lags sam /
NK044(phi)001:6665: ngas ma blangs kyang khyod nyid kyi khyim nas khyer te 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:6667: rgyal po chen po sman chen ni //
NK044(phi)001:6669: de yi rin chen 'di rnams lags //
NK044(phi)001:6670: de dag mi dbang bzhes su gsol //
NK044(phi)001:6671: rgyal chen bdag ni yugs sa te //
NK044(phi)001:6672: khyim thab dang ni bral bas na //
NK044(phi)001:6673: bdag la brnyas pa bgyis nas lags //
NK044(phi)001:6674: bdag las nor ni 'phrogs su mchi //
NK044(phi)001:6675: de nas sman chen pos blon po'i mchog rnams kyi blo yi dpyod pa'i legs pa yang bstan no //
NK044(phi)001:6676: rgyal po skyed pas kyang sgrom der bltas na skra
NK044(phi)001:6677: dang kha spu bregs nas rkang lag bskums pa'i blon
NK044(phi)001:6678: po drug mthong nas bgad de smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6679: sman chen po thabs 'di su'i yin /
NK044(phi)001:6680: des sa ga'i 'o zhes thams cad rgyas par smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6681: rgyal pos bsams pa kye ma bud med kyi blo
NK044(phi)001:6682: gros des blon po'i mchog 'di dag la 'di ltar
NK044(phi)001:6683: co dris so snyam du mgu nas de bkur ba
NK044(phi)001:6684: cher byas so // yul thams cad du yang zhing
NK044(phi)001:6685: mkhan gyi bu mo sa ga'i blo mtshar ro zhes
NK044(phi)001:6686: cher byas so // grags so // de nas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6687: pos sman chen po bsod nams dang ldan pas 'di
NK044(phi)001:6688: lta bu'i mkhas shing mdzangs pa'i chung ma blo dang
NK044(phi)001:6689: ldan pa rnyed do snyam zhing sman chen po la
NK044(phi)001:6690: cher byas so // grags so // smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6691: gal te khyod dga' ba lta na nga la yang
NK044(phi)001:6692: 'di lta bu'i chung ma blo dang ldan pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:6694: khyim dang phyi rol gyi rgyal po don bde bar gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:6698: lnga len gyi rgyal po'i bu mo sman ldan zhes
NK044(phi)001:6699: bya ba gzugs bzang zhing blo dang dran pa dang
NK044(phi)001:6700: ldan pa sa ga ji 'dra ba yod ces thos
NK044(phi)001:6701: pas de longs shig sman chen pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6702: 'di la thabs zhig bgyi dgos kyi rgyal po de
NK044(phi)001:6703: yang lha'i mtshams las gzhan pa dgra zlar grags pa'o
NK044(phi)001:6704: // de nas rgyal pos pho nya btang ste bu
NK044(phi)001:6705: mo bslangs pa dang lnga len gyi rgyal pos blon
NK044(phi)001:6706: po rnams dang bgros te re zhig sbyin par chad
NK044(phi)001:6707: byas shing dus tshes 'di la shog ces smras nas
NK044(phi)001:6708: // / bza' btung sna tshogs dug dang bsres pa sta gon byas so /
NK044(phi)001:6709: sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa la lha re zhig brtag dgos so //
NK044(phi)001:6710: rgyal pos su rtog tu btang /
NK044(phi)001:6711: sman chen pos bdag la ne tso spyod gsal zhes
NK044(phi)001:6712: pa shin tu blo gsal ba zhig yod pa de
NK044(phi)001:6713: gtong zhes byas te de mngags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6714: des su la bcar te gtam bya snyam du song
NK044(phi)001:6715: ba dang su yang ma mthong na rgyal po'i pho
NK044(phi)001:6716: brang du zhugs pas gdung gi bar na ri skeg
NK044(phi)001:6717: mo zhig 'dug pa'i drung du song ste /
NK044(phi)001:6718: phan tshun dga' bar byas nas bdag ni byang phyogs
NK044(phi)001:6719: rgyal po shi bi ba'i skyed tshal srung ba yin
NK044(phi)001:6720: te / bdag la chung ma yid du 'ong ba'i
NK044(phi)001:6721: re skeg mo zhig yod pa khras khyer ba'i mya
NK044(phi)001:6722: ngan gyi kho bo kun tu 'khyams te 'dir 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:6723: te / so // khyod bdag gi chung ma mi rung ngam /
NK044(phi)001:6725: ne tso'i chung ma ne tsho yin gyi re skeg mo yin par ma thos so //
NK044(phi)001:6726: de nas de gnyis bag pheb par smra zhing rtse
NK044(phi)001:6727: dga' ba byas nas kha zas sna tshogs byed pa
NK044(phi)001:6728: 'di dag las bdag gis cung thob bam zhes dris
NK044(phi)001:6729: pa dang / kha zas 'di dag dug gis bsres pa'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:6730: ne tso na re lnga len gyi bu mo rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6731: po skyed pa la byin zhes thos na bden nam
NK044(phi)001:6733: des sems dag pas ma byin te g.yo thabs kyis gsad par brtson par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:6734: de thos nas ne tso dang ri sked phan tshun
NK044(phi)001:6735: 'jam por smra ba byas te ne tsos don de
NK044(phi)001:6736: thams cad sman chen po la bshad pas re zhig
NK044(phi)001:6738: lnga len gyi rgyal pos mi 'ong bar shes nas dpung bzhi bshams te /
NK044(phi)001:6739: rgyal po skyed pa'i pho brang bskor bar byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6740: sman chen pos bsams pa 'di dang lhan cig 'thab
NK044(phi)001:6741: mo 'gyed par yang mi nus pas dbyin gyi thabs
NK044(phi)001:6743: lnga len gyi rgyal po blon po lnga brgya la
NK044(phi)001:6744: rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i skyes bskur te dbyen byas
NK044(phi)001:6745: so // dbyen byas tshar ba dang lnga len gyi
NK044(phi)001:6746: rgyal po la rgyal po skyed pas pho nya btang
NK044(phi)001:6747: so // ste / kho bo khyod la rgol mi
NK044(phi)001:6748: nus pa min kyang khyod dang kho bo gnyen te
NK044(phi)001:6749: khyod gyos po yin pas mi rgol to //
NK044(phi)001:6750: 'on kyang khyod nga'i lag tu 'atsho'am gshin pa ni shin tu rigs par gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:6751: nged kyis nus par gyur kyang khyod la mi brgal te /
NK044(phi)001:6752: gal te the tshom za na skyes 'di dang 'di
NK044(phi)001:6753: dag ni blon po che ge mo 'di dang 'di
NK044(phi)001:6754: dag la bskur ba brtag par byos shig ces springs
NK044(phi)001:6755: pa las / blon po rnams skyes dang bcas par
NK044(phi)001:6756: bzung nas lnga len gyi rgyal po de'i nub mo
NK044(phi)001:6757: rang gi yul du log ste blon po lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:6758: po bsad cing de dag gi bu rnams blon por
NK044(phi)001:6759: bcug pa bden no zhes pa'i gtam thos pas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6760: po skyed pa dga' bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:6761: sman chen pos kyang de thos nas dga' ste bdag
NK044(phi)001:6762: gis bu mo de thob bam mi thob brtag snyam
NK044(phi)001:6763: du dpung gi tshogs dang bcas nas lnga lan gyi
NK044(phi)001:6764: rgyal po'i yul du song ba /
NK044(phi)001:6765: rgyal po des grong khyer gyi nang du shog ces smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6767: ci ste nges par nang du 'ong dgos nablona po
NK044(phi)001:6768: che ge mo zhig gi khyim du mchi bar 'tshal
NK044(phi)001:6769: lo zhes smras pas lnga len gyi rgyal po bag
NK044(phi)001:6770: tsha ste / ci'i phyir 'di skad smra /
NK044(phi)001:6771: re zhig bdag dang blon po rnams dbye na byed do snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:6772: de ltar dga' na der sdod ces springs so //
NK044(phi)001:6773: de'i blon po rnams bgros nas bdag cag gi pha
NK044(phi)001:6774: chud gzan pa de thams cad sman chen po'i blo
NK044(phi)001:6775: gros yin pas bdag cag gis sngon gyi 'khon rjes
NK044(phi)001:6776: su dran ste rgyal po la de bzhin gal gyis
NK044(phi)001:6777: gcus la 'di phyir mi btang bar bya'o snyam du
NK044(phi)001:6779: 'di thams cad sman chen po de'i yin te rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6780: po skyed pa ni pha rol la gnod mi nus
NK044(phi)001:6781: pa yin pas 'di 'di na 'dug pa'i tshe bdag
NK044(phi)001:6782: cag gis rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du mchis nas
NK044(phi)001:6784: rgyal pos kyang de legs so zhes dpung gi tshogs
NK044(phi)001:6785: bzhi dang bcas te rgyal po skyed pa'i pho brang
NK044(phi)001:6786: du song ngo // rgyal po skyed pas dmag sta gon byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6787: sman chen pos lnga len gyi rgyal po lam gang
NK044(phi)001:6788: nas rgyal po skyed pa'i yul du song bar shes
NK044(phi)001:6789: nas / der cung zad 'dug ste phyogs gang na
NK044(phi)001:6790: rgyal po'i mdzod dang bu mo sman ldan yod par
NK044(phi)001:6791: shes nas 'khor nang ma rnams khrid de der zhugs
NK044(phi)001:6792: shing rgyal po'i mdzod las dbyig dang nor rnams dang
NK044(phi)001:6793: bu mo blangs te slar dpung gi tshogs dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:6794: pa lam gzhan nas rang yul du 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:6795: rgyal po 'khor bcas dga' nas ri mor bya ba mang po byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6796: lnga len gyi blon po mchog gis sman chen pos
NK044(phi)001:6797: bu mo dang mdzod khyer ba sgran pas lnga len
NK044(phi)001:6798: gyi rgyal po 'khor bcas phyir rang gi yul du
NK044(phi)001:6799: song ngo // rgyal po skyed pa lnga len gyi
NK044(phi)001:6800: bu mo sman ldan dang lhan cig rtse zhing dga'
NK044(phi)001:6801: song ngo // bar byed do // der lnga len
NK044(phi)001:6802: gyi rgyal pos bu mo sman ldan la 'di lta
NK044(phi)001:6803: bu'i thabs sus byas sogs rtogs la yi ge skur
NK044(phi)001:6805: des brtags nas sman chen po'i ne tso spyod gsal
NK044(phi)001:6806: zhes pa mi skad smra ba des byas so zhes
NK044(phi)001:6807: springs pa dang / ne tso spyod gsal 'dir thong
NK044(phi)001:6808: zhes springs pa ltar des 'bad pas rnyis bzung ste
NK044(phi)001:6810: de la rgyal po de khro bas rnam pa du mar spyos te /
NK044(phi)001:6812: de nas ne tso spyod gsal gyis rgyal po'i rkang pa la gtugs te gsol ba /
NK044(phi)001:6813: lha bdag gi pha dang mes po ji ltar 'gum pa de ltar dgum par ci gnang /
NK044(phi)001:6814: des kyang de bzhin du gsad par gnang ste pha
NK044(phi)001:6815: mes ji ltar bsad ces dris pa ltar ras bal
NK044(phi)001:6816: gyis mjug ma dkris shing mar gyis bskus nas bsregs
NK044(phi)001:6818: de 'phur nas rgyal po'i pho brang 'bar bar byas te tshul zhugs so //
NK044(phi)001:6819: de slar rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du song ba
NK044(phi)001:6820: dang sman chen pos kyang dris pa na ji ltar
NK044(phi)001:6821: gyur pa smras pas mgu bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:6822: lnga len gyi rgyal pos yi ge bskur te /
NK044(phi)001:6823: des 'di lta bur gnod pa byas pas nges par
NK044(phi)001:6824: slar thongs shig ces bu mo la springs pa dang
NK044(phi)001:6825: / des bzung ste yang bskur ro //
NK044(phi)001:6826: lnga len gyi rgyal po khros nas ne tso de'i
NK044(phi)001:6827: spu ris phyi barbyasa la sha'i ril bu nyid lta
NK044(phi)001:6828: bur bzhag ste 'gro na da songs shig ces phyir
NK044(phi)001:6829: rol du bor ba dang de khras khyer ro //
NK044(phi)001:6830: des khra la gsol ba btab pa kho bo zos na nyin gcig gi zas su zad la /
NK044(phi)001:6831: kho bo btang na nyin gcig bzhin du ci lta
NK044(phi)001:6832: bu'i dgos pa dang bza' ba mang po dag sbyar
NK044(phi)001:6834: de yid ches shing mna' bor nas btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6835: ne tsos khra la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6836: phyogs che ge mo na rgyal po'i gtsug lag khang yod pa der zhog /
NK044(phi)001:6837: des de bzhin byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6838: de gtsug lag khang du song ste bu ga zhig tu zhugs nas bsdad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6839: phyi de nyin bram ze rnams lha mchod pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:6840: lhags te lha rnams kyi dri ma phyi zhing me
NK044(phi)001:6841: tog dang bdug pa gtor ma sogs 'bul bar brtson
NK044(phi)001:6842: pa na / ne tso spyod gsal gyi lus mi mngon par smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6844: lnga len gyi rgyal po sdig pa can la nga'i tshig 'di brjod cig /
NK044(phi)001:6845: ces pa 'di dang 'di lta bu byas pa de ni ngas gnod pa byas pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:6846: gal te nga'i tshig bzhin ma byas na phyir yang gnod pa bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:6847: ji ltar na re zhig nyin re bzhin sha rjen
NK044(phi)001:6848: dmar po dang til dang 'bras thug po che bre
NK044(phi)001:6849: chung gang gi lha bshos byos dang /
NK044(phi)001:6850: de nas phyis bsam par bya'o zhes smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6851: bram ze rnams kyis lnga len gyi rgyal po la go bar byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:6852: rgyal pos kyang nyin gcig bzhin du der rgyal blon dang mdun na 'don rnams 'ongs nas /
NK044(phi)001:6853: gtor ma bya ba la zhugs te lha la gnang
NK044(phi)001:6854: ngam mi gnang gsol ba btab pa dang de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:6856: de ltar dus ring tsam lon nas ne tso de'i gshog pa skyes te 'phur nus pa na /
NK044(phi)001:6857: yang 'gro ba'i blo skyes te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6858: 'di ltar nga la gang khyod kyi dpung dang lha
NK044(phi)001:6859: mo dang gzhon nu dang blon po rnams lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:6860: tu mgo gtun bzhin bregs la nga'i drung du shog
NK044(phi)001:6861: cig dang / de nas bzod cing gnang bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:6862: de rgyal po la khong du chud par byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6863: de ltar rgyal po 'khor bcas kyi mgo'i skra bregs
NK044(phi)001:6864: nas gtun bzhin du lha khang du song ste bzod
NK044(phi)001:6866: ne tso des nam mkha' la 'phur nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6867: byed pa la ni slar byas te //
NK044(phi)001:6868: phyi bas sla ni phyi la ltos //
NK044(phi)001:6869: 'dir ni gcig pu phyi ba yis //
NK044(phi)001:6870: btsun mo kun kyang legs par phyi //
NK044(phi)001:6871: zhes smras te 'phur nas sman chen po'i drung du phyin pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6872: spyod gsal ring zhig tu ma mthong na gang nas phyin ces dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6873: des ji ltar thabs byas pa rnams rgya cher brjod
NK044(phi)001:6874: pas sman chen po mgu nas rgyal po skyed pa
NK044(phi)001:6876: rgyal po yang mchog tu dga' nas /
NK044(phi)001:6877: e ma'o 'di ltar khyed ni mkhas pa sha stag
NK044(phi)001:6878: dang 'phrad pa bsod nams dang ldan no zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:6879: so // de nas dus phyi zhig na blon po rnams la /
NK044(phi)001:6880: gang rab tu mkhas pa nyams sad par bya'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:6881: du de dag bos te khyi re re byin nas
NK044(phi)001:6882: 'di dag dus 'di tsam na mi skad du smra
NK044(phi)001:6883: bar gyis zhes smras te de dag gis so so'i
NK044(phi)001:6884: khyim du khrid de song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6885: der slob dpon gzhan rnams khyi de dag gso bar
NK044(phi)001:6886: shes kyi mi skad smra bar byed pa mi shes
NK044(phi)001:6887: so // sman chen pos khyim du khyi de khrid
NK044(phi)001:6888: nas khri las mi ring ba zhig tu phur pa
NK044(phi)001:6890: nam sman chen po'i kha zas drangs nas bza' bcas
NK044(phi)001:6891: sna tshogs za bar mthong yang khyi des len ma
NK044(phi)001:6892: nus so // de nas ngan pa cung zad re
NK044(phi)001:6893: byin nas shi ma sos tsam du nyam chung la
NK044(phi)001:6895: rgyal pos khyi de rnams mi skad lobs sam ma
NK044(phi)001:6896: lobs blta yis khrid de shog ces bsgo ba dang
NK044(phi)001:6897: / gzhan dag gi khyi rnams ni tsho la skad bslabs ma nus so //
NK044(phi)001:6898: sman chen po'i khyi de skems shing rid par mthong nas 'di ci'i phyir rid ces dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:6899: sman chen pos lha bdag gis ci zos ci 'tshal
NK044(phi)001:6900: ba de bzhin khyi 'di la stsal to zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:6901: pa dang / khyi des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:6902: lha 'di ni rdzun te bdag ltogs te de'u bskum mo //
NK044(phi)001:6903: de nas sman chen pos bdag gis 'di ltar 'di
NK044(phi)001:6904: mi skad smra bar bgyis so zhes gsol bas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:6906: de nas yang dus zhig na nyams sad par 'dod
NK044(phi)001:6907: nas blon po lnga brgya po thams cad la lug
NK044(phi)001:6908: re re gtad de lug 'di rnams la khyed kyis
NK044(phi)001:6909: bza' btung zhim po byin la tshil med la mthu
NK044(phi)001:6910: dang ldan par byos zhes basgo'o //
NK044(phi)001:6911: blon po lnga brgya po thabs mi mkhas pas de dag gsos te tshon por byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6912: sman chen pos bza' ba zhim po mdun du bzhag
NK044(phi)001:6913: nas shing la spyang gu'i gzugs gcig byas te lug
NK044(phi)001:6914: gi mdun du bzhag pas de mthong bas skrag ste
NK044(phi)001:6915: tshil ni ma skyes zhing mthu dang ldan par gyur
NK044(phi)001:6916: to // de thams cad la bltas na gzhan kun mdog dang ldan zhing tshil che la /
NK044(phi)001:6917: sman chen po kho na'i lug tshil med kyang mthu
NK044(phi)001:6918: dang ldan par mthong nas dga' ste 'di 'dzangs so
NK044(phi)001:6919: zhes basngagasa so // de nas dus zhig na gang
NK044(phi)001:6920: mkhas pa bag ma snyam du blon po'i bu lnga
NK044(phi)001:6921: brgya po skyed tshal du 'dus nas za zhing 'khod
NK044(phi)001:6922: zhes basngagasa so // pa las / su gang gis
NK044(phi)001:6923: ngo mtshar ba'i gtam dang so so'i khyim na ya
NK044(phi)001:6924: mtshan pa ci yod ces gleng ba'i skabs su so
NK044(phi)001:6925: sos ci thos pa dang khyim na yod pa ci
NK044(phi)001:6927: der sman chen po'i bu la dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6928: bdag gi khyim na rdo zhig ka rten du yod
NK044(phi)001:6929: pa de chu'i steng du bzhag na phan tshun 'phyo
NK044(phi)001:6930: zhing nyug la mnye ba sogs kyi las byed pa
NK044(phi)001:6931: yod de de lta bu gzhan su la yang med
NK044(phi)001:6933: gzhan dag gis de 'dra thos mthong ma myong bas mi srid zer zhing /
NK044(phi)001:6934: gser gyi dong tse lnga brgya'i rgyal byed par chad do /
NK044(phi)001:6935: gzhon nu des rang gi pha sman chen po la de ltar rgyal byas so zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6936: des smras pa bu ma bstan cig ces de dag
NK044(phi)001:6937: lhags kyang ma bstan par gser gyi dong tse lnga
NK044(phi)001:6939: de nas sman chen pos spre'u rnams bzung ste rol mo bslabs nas /
NK044(phi)001:6941: da ni song la de rnams kyi nang du sngar
NK044(phi)001:6942: gtam gleng la su'i khyim na ngo mtshar ba ci
NK044(phi)001:6943: yod smros zhes byos la bdag gi khyim na spre'u
NK044(phi)001:6944: rol mo byed pa glu gar la mkhas pa yod
NK044(phi)001:6945: do zhes brjod cig ces byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:6946: gzhan dag gis de ma thos so //
NK044(phi)001:6948: bdag gis bstan na ci sbyin gser gyi dong tse stong sbyin to //
NK044(phi)001:6949: bstan tu med na tshur gser gyii dong tse stong dgos so zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:6950: des spre'u khrid de rgyal po'i pho brang du song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6951: rgyal po'i mdun du spre'u rnams kyis rnga brdung zhing
NK044(phi)001:6952: glu gar byas pas gzhan rnams kyis gser gyi dong
NK044(phi)001:6953: tse stong byin / rgyal pos ngo mtshar du bzung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:6954: de nas rgyal blon yul mi thams cad kyis sman
NK044(phi)001:6955: chen po mkhas shing zla med ces sems shing bkur
NK044(phi)001:6956: sti byas so // de nas yul ba de ha'i
NK044(phi)001:6957: bram ze zhig rigs mnyam pa'i chung ma blangs pa
NK044(phi)001:6958: la bu mo gzugs lta na sdug pa zhig byung
NK044(phi)001:6959: sti byas so // ba na / bram ze de
NK044(phi)001:6960: 'di snyam du smreng dang rig gnas bco brgyad kyi
NK044(phi)001:6961: pha rol tu phyin pa blo dang ldan pa gang
NK044(phi)001:6962: zhig bdag gi drung nas bslab cing bdag dang 'dra
NK044(phi)001:6963: ba zhig byung na de la bu mo 'di sbyin
NK044(phi)001:6964: no snyam du dam bcas so //
NK044(phi)001:6965: bu mo de la u dum b+aa ri ka zhes par btags so //
NK044(phi)001:6966: bram ze gzhan gyi bu mdog dang gzugs mi sdug
NK044(phi)001:6967: pa mtshan ngan pa bco brgyad tshang ba ming gzugs
NK044(phi)001:6968: ngan du btags pa des phas slob tu ma bcug
NK044(phi)001:6969: kyang rang nyid bram ze de'i drung du song nas
NK044(phi)001:6970: bslabs par ring po ma lon par bram ze des
NK044(phi)001:6971: ci shes pa lobs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:6972: bram ze slob dpon des 'di gzugs ngan na yang
NK044(phi)001:6973: bdag gi drung nas thams cad lobs pas sngar dam
NK044(phi)001:6974: bcas pa bzhin mi bya mi rung bas 'di la
NK044(phi)001:6975: sbyin no snyam du bu mo de rgyan thams cad
NK044(phi)001:6976: kyis bklubs nas bram ze'i khye'u gzugs ngan la byin
NK044(phi)001:6977: pa des kyang blangs mod de dang lhan cig dga'
NK044(phi)001:6978: mgur spyod par ma spobs so //
NK044(phi)001:6979: des rang gi khyim du song nas dga' mgur bya'o snyam du khrid de song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:6980: u dum w+aa ri kas kyang bdag ni gzugs dang
NK044(phi)001:6981: ldan la khyo mi sdug pa 'di lta bu ldan
NK044(phi)001:6983: des de khrid de song bas lam bar du rgyags
NK044(phi)001:6984: chad nas rdzing 'gram zhig tu gnyis ka bkres pas
NK044(phi)001:6985: nyen pa na / grogs gzhan zhig gis phye chu'i
NK044(phi)001:6986: nang du shing bus dkrugs te 'thungs pa la mos
NK044(phi)001:6987: bslangs pa na gzugs ngan gyis phye spar gang thob
NK044(phi)001:6988: pa chur blugs te rang nyid kyis 'thungs so //
NK044(phi)001:6989: u dum b+aa ri kas jo jo bdag kyang bkres
NK044(phi)001:6990: pas gdungs na kho mos kyang de la cung 'thung
NK044(phi)001:6993: bud med kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chu grog 'thung bar
NK044(phi)001:6994: sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis ma gnang ngo zer
NK044(phi)001:6996: de nas yang char ma babs pas dgon pa'i bru
NK044(phi)001:6997: bas gzir zhing dor ba las gnyis kas khyi sha
NK044(phi)001:6998: zhig rnyed pa gzugs ngan gyis bsregs te zos pa
NK044(phi)001:6999: bu mo des bslangs kyang sngar bzhin smras te ma
NK044(phi)001:7000: ster ro // bu mo des bdag lta bu byug ngan ma bru bas gzir to //
NK044(phi)001:7001: pha ma gnyis kyis bdag gis nyes pa ci mthong
NK044(phi)001:7002: nas 'di 'dra ba la byin ces pha ma la
NK044(phi)001:7003: mang po smra bzhin de gnyis 'grogs te dong ba
NK044(phi)001:7004: / shing u dum b+aa ra smin pa zhig mthong
NK044(phi)001:7005: nas gzugs ngan de la 'dzegs te za zhing 'dug
NK044(phi)001:7006: / pa dang / bu mo des khyod gcig pus
NK044(phi)001:7007: ma za bar ngan bu la yang bor zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:7008: / pa dang / pa dang / des smin pa
NK044(phi)001:7009: bdag gis zos nas ma smin pa mar bor ro
NK044(phi)001:7010: / pa dang / pa dang / // des bdag
NK044(phi)001:7011: la ma smin pa ma dor bar smin pa stsol
NK044(phi)001:7013: des smras pa ngan pa mo khyod smin pa 'dod
NK044(phi)001:7014: pa rang nyid 'dir 'dzegs te zo zhig ces byas
NK044(phi)001:7015: pas / de bru bas gzir nas nan gyis shing de la 'dzegs nas za zhing 'dug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7017: bdag lta bu bsod nams med de chung ma 'di
NK044(phi)001:7018: 'dra ba bdag nyid kyis sos pa lta ci smros
NK044(phi)001:7019: / 'di ni bdag la bltar kyang mi btub bo
NK044(phi)001:7020: snyam nas shing las bab cing shing gi drung tsher
NK044(phi)001:7021: mas bskor nas bor te song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7022: de'i tshe rgyal po skyed pa ri dwags gshor du
NK044(phi)001:7023: song bas phyogs de na khyo dang bral ba'i bu
NK044(phi)001:7024: mo de snying rje rje skad du ngu zhing 'dug
NK044(phi)001:7025: pa'i sgra thos nas btsal na /
NK044(phi)001:7026: bu mo de nags kyi lha mo lta bu mdzes
NK044(phi)001:7027: par mthong nas khyod lha mo'am gnod sbyin dang dri
NK044(phi)001:7028: za yin nam / des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7029: bdag ni lha mo sogs min te mi yin cing
NK044(phi)001:7030: khyim thab dang bral ba lags so zhes smras pas
NK044(phi)001:7031: rgyal pos de shing las phab na de dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:7032: cig nyal lo // de nas de shing rta la
NK044(phi)001:7033: bskyon nas khrid de lhan cig dga' mgur spyad pa
NK044(phi)001:7034: cig nyal lo // byas so // bram ze de
NK044(phi)001:7035: lam du 'gyod nas bdag gis dgon par chung ma
NK044(phi)001:7036: bor te 'ongs pa ma legs kyis slar song la
NK044(phi)001:7037: khrid de 'ong snyam du phyir phyin pa na de
NK044(phi)001:7038: mi snang la gzhan zhig gis rgyal po skyed pas
NK044(phi)001:7039: khrid de btsun mor byas so zhes smras pa thos
NK044(phi)001:7040: nas yid shin tu gdungs te rgyal po'i sgor phyin
NK044(phi)001:7041: kyang nang du ma chud do //
NK044(phi)001:7042: des bltas pas rgyal po'i 'khor na las byed pa'i
NK044(phi)001:7043: mi rnams mthong nas las 'di dag dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:7044: rdo ba khyer te 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas rdo
NK044(phi)001:7045: ba khyer zhing pho brang du zhugs nas bltas pas
NK044(phi)001:7046: / bdag gi chung ma rgyal po dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:7047: ud shud brgya zhing 'dug par mthong nas chung ma
NK044(phi)001:7048: 'di dang lhan cig gtam gyi thabs ci lta bu
NK044(phi)001:7049: zhig bya snyam du bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:7050: gzhi ni gser las byas pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:7051: brgyad du 'jog cing dga' bar byed //
NK044(phi)001:7052: bzang mo bdag la mi daga'am //
NK044(phi)001:7053: shing mkhan rdo ba blang bar byas //
NK044(phi)001:7056: gnas der bdag gis smras pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:7057: bud med sha bzar mi rung zhes //
NK044(phi)001:7058: de skad smras pa'i tshig kyang dran //
NK044(phi)001:7060: ces sogs sngar ji ltar gyur pa'i tshigs bcad sna tshogs lan dang lan du btab la /
NK044(phi)001:7062: ri rtse nas ni bdag 'dor te //
NK044(phi)001:7063: dug kyang za'o bram ze mo //
NK044(phi)001:7064: khyod kyi mya ngan phyir bdag mchi //
NK044(phi)001:7065: shing mkhan gyis ni rdo ba longs //
NK044(phi)001:7068: ri yi rtse nas bdag bor cig /
NK044(phi)001:7069: bram ze dug kyang za la rag /
NK044(phi)001:7071: u shud kyis ni khyim du byas //
NK044(phi)001:7072: de gnyis phan tshun de skad gtam 'dzer ba la rgyal po dgyes pa skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:7073: lha mo khyod ci zer ba nga'i khong du ma chud de /
NK044(phi)001:7074: de ci yin pa smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:7075: des kyang ji ltar gyur pa kun zhib tu smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:7076: 'di ni bdag gi khyo lags te /
NK044(phi)001:7077: pha mas 'di la byin zhing 'di bram ze mkhas
NK044(phi)001:7078: pa shes pa'i yan lag kun shes pa'o zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:7079: pa la / rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7081: de'i sems ji ltar mgu bar bya /
NK044(phi)001:7082: khyod ci de dang 'grogs te 'gro bar bya'am /
NK044(phi)001:7084: ji ltar de bdag 'dod par mi 'gyur ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:7085: de'i sngags ma rungs pas mi tshugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7086: de'i sngags stobs su mi 'gyur ba de ltar bdag 'dod do //
NK044(phi)001:7087: rgyal pos sman chen po la de ltar gyur pa smras pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7088: de la bdag gis thabs bgyis te rgyal po dang
NK044(phi)001:7089: de 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar bya'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:7090: smras zhing / bram ze de bos nas khyod ci tshol /
NK044(phi)001:7091: rgyal po'i pho brang du ci la 'ongs zhes dris pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7092: des bdag gi chung ma rgyal po'i skyed pas khrid pas de tshol du 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:7094: ci khyod rang gi chung ma ngo shes sam /
NK044(phi)001:7095: des shes so zer ba la /
NK044(phi)001:7096: sman chen pos btsun mo lnga brgya khyod kyi mdun du bzhag la /
NK044(phi)001:7097: der khyod rang gi ma yin pa gzhan bzung na
NK044(phi)001:7098: khyod kyi lus mtshon gyi dum bur bya'o zhes bsgo
NK044(phi)001:7099: ba la des kyang de bzhin bya'o zhes byas so
NK044(phi)001:7100: / de nas rgyal po'i btsun mo thams cad rgyan gyis mchog tu brgyan te /
NK044(phi)001:7101: rgyal po'i bshos gsol ba'i lam snang ba'i sar btsun
NK044(phi)001:7102: mo thams cad phreng du dngar nas u dum b+aa
NK044(phi)001:7103: ri ka kun gyi sngon du byas te /
NK044(phi)001:7104: lha'i bu mo rnams dang 'dra bar rgyal po'i drung du lhags pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7105: sman chen pos bram ze la khyod rang gi chung
NK044(phi)001:7106: ma ngo shes na 'di nas zungs shig ces bsgos
NK044(phi)001:7107: pa dang / bram ze u du ma b+aa ri ka dang /
NK044(phi)001:7108: btsun mo gzhan rnams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par
NK044(phi)001:7109: mthong bas sbrul sngags kyis btab pa bzhin du dpa'
NK044(phi)001:7110: gong nas / nyi ma la bltar mi bzod pa ltar bram ze 'dug 'dug cing bsam bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:7111: de dag gi phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i bran mo chu
NK044(phi)001:7112: chun ma zhig btsun mo gzhan zhig gi phyi bzhin
NK044(phi)001:7113: 'gro ba mthong nas 'di bdag gi chung ma'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:7114: zer ba dang / sman chen pos de yin na khyer cig ces smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7115: des bran mo khrid nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7116: mchog la mchog gi yid kyang chags //
NK044(phi)001:7118: dman pa la ni dman pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:7119: sgur mo la ni bdag yid chags //
NK044(phi)001:7120: bzang mo bdag ni 'dre 'dra khyod kyang 'dre 'dra ste /
NK044(phi)001:7121: lha dag tshal na dga' bzhin 'dre mo tshur shog cig /
NK044(phi)001:7122: bdag kyang dga' bar bya'o zhes smras te khrid nas song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7123: de nas dus phyi zhig na nyes pa zhig gi
NK044(phi)001:7124: phyir rgyal po skyed pas sman chen po spangs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:7125: tshul gyis de re zhig rgyal po'i pho brang du
NK044(phi)001:7127: rgyal po de btsun mo dang lhan cig skyed mos
NK044(phi)001:7128: tshal du nyi ma'i ring la rtse dga' spyod par
NK044(phi)001:7129: byas te / btsun mo de'i mu tig gi do
NK044(phi)001:7130: shal brgya stong ri pa shing a sho ga'i yal
NK044(phi)001:7131: ga la gzar te bzhag nas rgyal po dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:7132: cig rtse rtse ba las mu tig gi do shal
NK044(phi)001:7133: byas te / de brjed de / de nas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:7134: po dang btsun mo lhan cig rgyal po'i khab tu
NK044(phi)001:7135: byas te / de brjed de / dong ba dang
NK044(phi)001:7136: / nam phyed na btsun mo des mu tig gi
NK044(phi)001:7137: do shal lus par dran no //
NK044(phi)001:7138: do shal de spra mo zhig gis khyer te shing khar bzhag go //
NK044(phi)001:7139: de nas rgyal pos mi dag la skyed tshal du
NK044(phi)001:7140: mu tig gi do shal lus pa de myur du
NK044(phi)001:7141: khyer shog ces ma ngags pa las do shal ni
NK044(phi)001:7142: ma rnyed la / der sprang po zhig zas zos
NK044(phi)001:7143: pa'i lhag ma tshol du skyed tshal der song nas
NK044(phi)001:7144: phyir 'gro ba de rgyal po'i mi dag gis bzung
NK044(phi)001:7145: nas gzhan ni su yang mi snang na khyod kyis
NK044(phi)001:7146: mu tig gi do shal phul cig ces smras pa
NK044(phi)001:7147: ma rnyed la / dang / de na re bdag
NK044(phi)001:7148: gis ma rnyed de 'dir zos lhag tshol ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:7149: ma rnyed la / dang / 'ongs so // de dag gis de brdegs nas btson rar bcug go //
NK044(phi)001:7150: de bkres pas gzir te bsams pa bdag gis 'dir
NK044(phi)001:7151: thabs shig ma sbyar na ltogs te 'achi'o snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:7152: / des btson srung la bdag gis mu tig gi
NK044(phi)001:7153: se mo do blangs pa bden te tshong dpon gyi
NK044(phi)001:7154: bu 'di zhes bya ba la byin no zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:7155: / pas / rgyal po'i mi des de yang bkug
NK044(phi)001:7156: ste gnyis ka shig sgrog gcig tu bcug pa na
NK044(phi)001:7157: / pas / / tshong dpon gyi bu de'i khyim
NK044(phi)001:7158: nas kha zas sna tshogs 'ong zhing za ba la
NK044(phi)001:7161: khyod nga la kha zas kyi gsor 'jug pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:7162: rkur sbyar grang ste yong mi sbyin no zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:7163: nas za zhing ma sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:7164: der tshong dpon gyi bu de bshang bas mi bde
NK044(phi)001:7165: nas de la longs te 'dong zhes smras pa dang
NK044(phi)001:7166: / des bdag gi tshig kyang khyod kyis mi mnyan pas bdag kyang mi 'agro'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7167: des deng phan chad ji ltar bde bar 'gyur ba
NK044(phi)001:7168: de ltar bya'o zhes tshig 'jam po dang mnas yid
NK044(phi)001:7169: ches par byas te bshang bas mi bde ba bsangs
NK044(phi)001:7170: so // de phan chad tshong dpon gyi bu des
NK044(phi)001:7171: mi gnyis kyi zan khyer shog ces byas pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:7172: 'ongs pas sprang po de yang bde ste bdag sngon
NK044(phi)001:7173: chad grong khyer thams cad bskor kyang lto 'grangs pa
NK044(phi)001:7174: ma rnyed na da 'dir bza' btung zhim po chog
NK044(phi)001:7176: grogs 'di gcig pos mi chog gis smad 'tshong ma zhig kyang 'gug go snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:7177: smad 'tshong ma zhig la 'dir yang khyer ba la
NK044(phi)001:7178: gtogs kyis zungs shig ces byas pas de yang btson
NK044(phi)001:7179: der bcug go // de dang lhan cig bza' btung zhim po zos nas yang smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7180: ji nas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du 'di las ma thar yang bla'o //
NK044(phi)001:7181: phyis yang 'dod pa skyes te smad 'tshong ma 'di
NK044(phi)001:7182: gcig pus mi chog gis nam 'dod pa dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:7183: pa de na dga' ba rgyas par myong ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:7184: pi wam mkhan gcig kyang dgug go snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:7185: pi wam mkhan gcig la 'dis kyang mu tig gi
NK044(phi)001:7186: se mo do khyer ro zhes smras pas de yang
NK044(phi)001:7187: der bcug go // de nas de bzhi po btson
NK044(phi)001:7188: ra de na lhan cig pa de dga' spyod cing
NK044(phi)001:7190: de rnams kyis sprang po de la ci nas kyang bdag cag thar par gyis shig dang /
NK044(phi)001:7191: de lta na khyod la cis kyang mi brel bar bya'o zhes gsol ba btab pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7192: des kyang de bzhin bya'o zhes khas blangs te /
NK044(phi)001:7193: 'di lta bu gzhan gyis mi nus kyis sman chen
NK044(phi)001:7194: pos nus so snyam du de ltar gzhan rnams la
NK044(phi)001:7195: smras te / yang rgyal po'i mi rnams la sprang
NK044(phi)001:7196: po des sman chen po'i bu yang 'dir gtogs so
NK044(phi)001:7197: zhes smras pas de yang bkug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7198: sman chen pos bu btson du bcug pa thos pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7199: ci nas bu'i phyir nga rgyal po'i pho brang du
NK044(phi)001:7200: mi 'gro ba mi rung ngo snyam du rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:7202: rgyal po la bdag gi bus lha la glo ba
NK044(phi)001:7203: ring ba ci bgyis nas btson rar stsal zhes gsol
NK044(phi)001:7204: ba dang / rgyal pos mu tig gi do shal
NK044(phi)001:7205: stor ba'i sprang po bzung ba des de ltar smras
NK044(phi)001:7206: pa'i phyir ro zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7207: sman chen pos kyang de dag gi ji skad smras
NK044(phi)001:7208: pa'i thabs zhib tu thos nas rgyal po la gsol
NK044(phi)001:7209: pa / lha mu tig gi do shal ni 'di
NK044(phi)001:7210: dag gang gis kyang ma blangs te 'di dag gtang
NK044(phi)001:7211: bar byos zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7212: rgyal pos thams cad btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7213: de nas sman chen po skyed mos tshal du song
NK044(phi)001:7214: ste gang du 'dug pa sogs dris shing brtags pas
NK044(phi)001:7215: shing de'i rtser spra mo zhig 'dug pa mthong ba
NK044(phi)001:7216: na des bsams pa la spra mo 'dis khyer bas
NK044(phi)001:7217: 'di la thabs zhig bya'o bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:7218: rgyal po la btsun mo rnams dang lhan cig skyed
NK044(phi)001:7219: tshal der gshegs zhes smras pa ltar song ste 'khod
NK044(phi)001:7220: pa dang / 'dir btsun mo rnams rgyan btags na
NK044(phi)001:7221: spra mo de yang 'dogs so zhes smras pas btsun
NK044(phi)001:7222: mo rnams kyis rgyan btags pa'i tshe spra mo des
NK044(phi)001:7223: kyang mu tig gi se mo dod mgul du gyon
NK044(phi)001:7224: pa dang / no // de nas sman chen pos
NK044(phi)001:7225: btsun mo rnams gar byed du bcug pas spra mo
NK044(phi)001:7226: de yang gar byas kyang de'i mgul na mu tig
NK044(phi)001:7227: gi do shal ma lhung ste des mis ci byed
NK044(phi)001:7229: sman chen pos btsun mo rnams mgo btud de gar
NK044(phi)001:7230: byed du bcug pas spra mo des mgo btud de
NK044(phi)001:7231: gar byas pa mu tig gi se mo do der
NK044(phi)001:7232: lhung ngo // der rgyal po dga' zhing sman chen
NK044(phi)001:7233: po'i mgul la 'khyud de mgu bar byas nas longs
NK044(phi)001:7235: de nas blon po drug lhan cig 'dus nas 'di skad bgros te /
NK044(phi)001:7236: sngon gyi dus su bdag cag la rgyal pos mchod cing rjod par byed na /
NK044(phi)001:7237: ri brag gi kyi grong mi blo rtsing ba can
NK044(phi)001:7238: bkren pa'i rigs las byung ba sman chen po zhes
NK044(phi)001:7239: pa 'dis bdag cag thams cad gzi brjid med par
NK044(phi)001:7240: byas na de la ji ltar bya zhes bgros pa
NK044(phi)001:7241: na / der gcig gis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7242: bdag cag sngon gcig la gcig ma 'chams par so
NK044(phi)001:7243: sor phye ba bdag cag mthu med par byas kyis
NK044(phi)001:7244: / da ni skyed tshal du 'dod la mna' dang
NK044(phi)001:7245: yid ches par bya zhing gnyen du yang byas na
NK044(phi)001:7246: / / rgyal po dang sman chen pos bdag cag
NK044(phi)001:7247: spang du zin gyis slar brten par 'gyur ro zhes
NK044(phi)001:7248: smras pa ltar de dag skyed tshal du 'dong ba
NK044(phi)001:7249: sman chen pos mthong nas 'di dag nam yang lhan
NK044(phi)001:7250: cig 'dus te gar yang ma dong na /
NK044(phi)001:7251: sngon dang mi 'dra ba zhig byed do snyam nas
NK044(phi)001:7252: dogs pas ne tso ma ta ra la phyi bzhin
NK044(phi)001:7253: song la / 'di dag ci bsam ci zer rtogs shig ces mngags so //
NK044(phi)001:7254: de nas blon po drug 'dus te phan tshun gnyen
NK044(phi)001:7255: byas nas gcig la gcig ma tshang 'bru gas nga
NK044(phi)001:7256: brtol na gdod bdag cag yid ches par 'gyur zhes
NK044(phi)001:7257: smras pa de bzhin byas te /
NK044(phi)001:7258: bdag cag gis ni rgyal po'i rma bya zos so //
NK044(phi)001:7259: yang bdag gis rgyal po'i btsun mo dang lhan cig nyal bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7260: bdag gis kyang de lta bur bya snyam mo zhes
NK044(phi)001:7261: sogs gcig gis gcig la gsang ba'i gtam sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:7262: byas nas snod gcig tu zos so //
NK044(phi)001:7263: de thams cad ne tsos thos nas sman chen po la smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7264: sman chen pos rgyal po skyed pa'i drung du phyin
NK044(phi)001:7265: te lha'i blon po dag ni 'di lta bu'i tshal
NK044(phi)001:7266: khrims dang gtsang sbra dang ldan no zhes ji ltar
NK044(phi)001:7267: gyur pa thams cad gsol bas /
NK044(phi)001:7268: rgyal po skyed pas mngon par rtogs nas /
NK044(phi)001:7269: e ma'o bdag gi blon po 'di dag ni 'di
NK044(phi)001:7270: lta bur mi rigs pa can yin pas gang na
NK044(phi)001:7271: nga mi dbang ba'i phyogs su dengs shig ces bskrad
NK044(phi)001:7272: nas yul med par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7273: de ltar sman chen po ni bcom ldan 'das nyid yin la /
NK044(phi)001:7274: rgyal po skyed pa ni sh+aa ri'i bu'o //
NK044(phi)001:7275: de dus kyi blon po drug po ni da ltar
NK044(phi)001:7276: mu stegs kyi ston pa drug po 'di yin te
NK044(phi)001:7277: / de'i dus na yang nga blon por gyur pas yul med par byas la /
NK044(phi)001:7278: da yang bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas
NK044(phi)001:7279: rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul gyis pham par byas te
NK044(phi)001:7282: gzhan yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal bu sdong
NK044(phi)001:7283: dum du gyur pa'i tshe stobs dang spobs pa chen
NK044(phi)001:7284: pos dgra zla rgyal po drug pham par byas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:7285: sngon gyi rabs dag kyang mdzangs blun las gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:7286: bzhin no // yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po phyogs
NK044(phi)001:7287: bdag ces bya ba la bu gzhon nu rdul phran
NK044(phi)001:7289: rgyal po de'i bram ze gnag lhas skyes zhes pa
NK044(phi)001:7290: de'i bu bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes pa mkhas
NK044(phi)001:7291: pa dpyod pa'i shes rab can du ston pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:7292: nyid sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na mdun
NK044(phi)001:7293: na 'don de nyid du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7294: 'di ltar de'i pha bram ze gnag lhas skyes kyis
NK044(phi)001:7295: zhing las kyi mtha' gang yin rnams bram ze'i khye'u
NK044(phi)001:7296: me gso la dri zhing don du bya ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:7297: kyang ma dris par mi byed do //
NK044(phi)001:7298: bram ze'i khye'u de ni gzhon nu rdul phran dang
NK044(phi)001:7299: rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi grogs snying du
NK044(phi)001:7300: sdug pa dang ne'u zla yang yin no //
NK044(phi)001:7301: gang gi tshe rgyal po phyogs bdag de rtse bar
NK044(phi)001:7302: 'dod pa'am dga' mgur spyod 'dod pa'i tshe de'i dgos
NK044(phi)001:7303: pa dang las su bya ba thams cad bram ze
NK044(phi)001:7304: gnag lhas skyes la slar gtad de /
NK044(phi)001:7305: de'i 'og tu steng gi khang bzang gi gzhi la
NK044(phi)001:7306: skyes pa med par song ste rol mo rnams kyis
NK044(phi)001:7307: rtse zhing dga' mgur byed do //
NK044(phi)001:7308: de nas dus gzhan zhig na bram ze gnag lhas skyes shi ba na /
NK044(phi)001:7309: rgyal po de de la 'gyod cing bram ze de
NK044(phi)001:7310: shi bas bdag che thang du mas dma' bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:7311: to zhes zer zhing mya ngan byed pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7312: rgyal bu gzhon nu rdul phran gyis rgyal po ci'i
NK044(phi)001:7313: slad du bram ze gnag lhas skyes gum pas thugs
NK044(phi)001:7314: la bcag ste sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar mdzad
NK044(phi)001:7316: bdag rtsi bar 'dod pa sogs kyi tshe las su bya ba thams cad bram ze des byed do //
NK044(phi)001:7318: de la thugs ngan ma mdzad cig de ci'i slad
NK044(phi)001:7319: du na bram ze'i khye'u me gso 'di ni mkhas
NK044(phi)001:7320: shing gsal bar pha bram ze lhas skyes kyis kyang
NK044(phi)001:7321: las su bya ba thams cad 'di la dri zhing
NK044(phi)001:7322: ma dris par mi bgyid do //
NK044(phi)001:7323: des na de gnag lhas skyes kyi las thabs la dbang bskur du gsol /
NK044(phi)001:7324: rgyal pos kyang bram ze'i khye'u bkur nas pha bram
NK044(phi)001:7325: ze de'i las thabs la dbang bskur bas des kyang
NK044(phi)001:7326: bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes zhus te zhing blas kyi mtha'
NK044(phi)001:7327: dang don nges par rtogs pa thams cad byas pas
NK044(phi)001:7328: bram ze'i khye'u me gso zhes pa'i ming nub nas
NK044(phi)001:7329: de la yang bram ze gnag lhas skyes pa'i ming
NK044(phi)001:7331: de nas bram ze des rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs
NK044(phi)001:7332: drug po pho nyas bkug nas shes ldan dag rgyal
NK044(phi)001:7333: bu rdul phran gang na bar song ste /
NK044(phi)001:7334: rgyal ba dang tsho spel bar byos la 'di skad ces smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:7335: rdul phran khyod bde bdag cag bde zhing sdug bsngal na bdag cag kyang sdug bsngal la /
NK044(phi)001:7336: rgyal rigs drug po ni khyod kyi grogs snying sdug dang ne'u zla yin gyis /
NK044(phi)001:7337: khyod yab 'das nas yab kyi rgyal srid la bzhag
NK044(phi)001:7338: na ci nas bdag cag la longs spyod kyi bgo
NK044(phi)001:7339: bsha' mdzod cig ces smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:7340: de rnams kyis de bzhin du mnyan nas rdul phran la de ltar smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7341: des kyang de ltar mnyan no //
NK044(phi)001:7342: de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgyal po phyogs bdag
NK044(phi)001:7343: dus las 'das te blon po sogs kyis gzhon nu
NK044(phi)001:7344: rdul phran rgyal srid la bzhag pas rgyal po rdul
NK044(phi)001:7346: rgyal po rdul phran gyis bram ze gnag lhas skyes
NK044(phi)001:7347: bkug nas mkhan po nga'i yab la ji ltar rjes
NK044(phi)001:7348: su ston pa de ltar nga la yang phyin chad
NK044(phi)001:7349: rjes su bstan par soms shig /
NK044(phi)001:7350: des kyang bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes nyan to //
NK044(phi)001:7351: de nas bram ze des rgyal rigs kyi bu drug
NK044(phi)001:7352: po bkug nas de dag la rgyal bu rdul phran
NK044(phi)001:7353: la sngar bdag cag la longs spyod kyi bgo bsha'
NK044(phi)001:7354: mdzod cig ces gsol ba dgongs sam zhes smros shig
NK044(phi)001:7355: / gal te dran zer na lha da de'i dus la bab bo zhes smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:7356: gal te sa chen po nang yangs la phyi shig
NK044(phi)001:7357: rta'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa 'di cha bdun du 'ged
NK044(phi)001:7358: pa su zhig yod zer na /
NK044(phi)001:7359: lha gnag lhas skyes ma mchis pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so zhes smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:7360: ces btang ba ltar de dag gis de bzhin byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7362: de dag gis lha de'i dus la bab bo //
NK044(phi)001:7363: rgyal bus 'o na sa chen po nang yangs la
NK044(phi)001:7364: phyi shing rta'i dbyibs su 'dug pa cha bdun du
NK044(phi)001:7366: lha gnag lhas skyes ma lag pas gzhan ma mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:7367: de nas rgyal po rdul phran gyi bram ze gnag
NK044(phi)001:7368: lhas skyes bkug nas mkhan po khyod kyis sa chen
NK044(phi)001:7369: po 'di cha bdun du 'ged nus sam /
NK044(phi)001:7370: lha legs par rngo thogs so //
NK044(phi)001:7371: de nas bram ze des dkyil dang dkyil na yul
NK044(phi)001:7372: 'khor bu chung yod pa de dag rgyal po rdul
NK044(phi)001:7373: phran gyi skal bar bcad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7375: bram ze 'dis kho bo'i ris ji ltar bcad pa
NK044(phi)001:7376: dper na da lta mkhas pa gsal ba bye brag
NK044(phi)001:7377: gi phye bas bcad pa de lta bur gyur to
NK044(phi)001:7378: zhes yi rangs pa go bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7379: yul 'khor bu chung gzhan dag gzhan gang yin pa
NK044(phi)001:7380: rgyal po'i 'khor rgyal rigs drug gi ris su bcad
NK044(phi)001:7381: pa dang de drug kyang dga' ste /
NK044(phi)001:7382: bram ze 'dis ji ltar bgos pa ni /
NK044(phi)001:7383: mkhas pa gsal bas byas pa bzhin du kho bo
NK044(phi)001:7384: cag gis ring nas bsams pa'i yul de dag kho
NK044(phi)001:7385: bo cag gi ris su bcad do zhes yi rangs
NK044(phi)001:7386: pa yang go bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7387: de nas rgyal po'i zhabs ring ba rgyal bu drug
NK044(phi)001:7388: gis bram ze de la 'di skad ces mkhan po
NK044(phi)001:7389: rgyal po rdul phran la rjes su ston pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:7390: du deng phan chad bdag cag la yang rjes su
NK044(phi)001:7392: bram zes kyang de bzhin du bya'o zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7393: de nas bram ze gnag lhas skyes rgyal po rdul
NK044(phi)001:7394: phran dang 'khor rgyal rigs drug dang rgyal rigs shing
NK044(phi)001:7395: s+aa la chen po lta bu bdun dang /
NK044(phi)001:7396: bram ze shing s+aa la chen po lta bu bdun dang /
NK044(phi)001:7397: khyim bdag shing s+aa la chen po lta bu bdun dang /
NK044(phi)001:7398: de dag gi thabs rir bab pa'i chung ma bzhi bcu la rjes su ston to //
NK044(phi)001:7399: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la yang bram ze'i gsang tshig klog tu 'jug go //
NK044(phi)001:7401: glang po che la zhon pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7406: go re long byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7408: rgyal po'i bu dpa' ba tshan po che rnams dang /
NK044(phi)001:7409: sems srung ba dang skra mkhan dang /
NK044(phi)001:7410: khrus byed pa du ma la yang rjes su ston par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:7411: der bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes zhes su ming 'phos par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7412: de nas bram ze chen po de bram ze rnams kyis ni tshangs par bskur ro //
NK044(phi)001:7413: rgyal pos ni lhar bkur ro //
NK044(phi)001:7414: grong dang yul mi rnams kyis rgyal por bkur ro //
NK044(phi)001:7415: de yang bram ze rnams kyis bram ze chen po
NK044(phi)001:7416: gnag lhas skyes kyis tshangs pa'i lam shes shing mthong
NK044(phi)001:7417: nas mtha' dag rdzogs par byas te gnas so snyam
NK044(phi)001:7418: mo // de bzhin du rgyal po dang grong mi thams cad kyang de ltar bsam mo //
NK044(phi)001:7419: de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes des
NK044(phi)001:7420: 'di snyam du 'di thams cad kyis bdag bkur zhing
NK044(phi)001:7421: tshangs pa'i lam rdzogs par byas te gnas so zer
NK044(phi)001:7422: na / bdag gis ni tshangs pa'i lam yang mi shes mthong nas rdzogs par yang ma byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:7423: bdag gis yab bram ze las /
NK044(phi)001:7424: bram ze gang zhig dbyar zla ba bzhir dben par
NK044(phi)001:7425: snying rje'i bsam gtan gyi gnas na de'i drung du
NK044(phi)001:7426: tshangs pa 'ong bar 'gyur ro zhes thos kyis bdag
NK044(phi)001:7427: gis dbyar zla bzhir de ltar bya'o zes bsams te
NK044(phi)001:7428: / dang po rgyal po rdul phran la lha re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan gsan du gsol /
NK044(phi)001:7429: bdag re zhig dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan la gnas par 'tshal lo //
NK044(phi)001:7430: des kyang mkhan po dus la bab pa mkhyen par mdzod cig /
NK044(phi)001:7431: de nas rgyal rigs bdun dang /
NK044(phi)001:7434: chung ma bzhi bcu la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7435: shes ldan dag re zhig ma g.yeng bar bag yod par khyim na 'khod cig /
NK044(phi)001:7436: bdag ni dbyar zla bzhir dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan gyis gnas par 'dod do //
NK044(phi)001:7437: de dag gis kyang de bzhin no zhes gsol to //
NK044(phi)001:7438: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya la yang de bzhin smras
NK044(phi)001:7439: te ji skad thos shing kun chub par bya ba'i
NK044(phi)001:7440: rig pa zungs shig ltos shig /
NK044(phi)001:7441: gzhan 'dul sbyong mkhan sogs khrus byed pa'i bar dag la /
NK044(phi)001:7442: shes ldan dag re zhig rjes su ston pa gzhan tshol cig /
NK044(phi)001:7443: kho bo dbyar zla bzhir dben par snying rje'i bsam gtan byed do zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7444: de nas bram ze chen po des grong khyer shar
NK044(phi)001:7445: phyogs su khang bzang zhig brtsigs nas dben par dbyar
NK044(phi)001:7446: zla bzhir bsam gtan gyis gnas pa la de'i drung
NK044(phi)001:7448: de nas dbyar zla bzhir zhag gcig gis ma tshang
NK044(phi)001:7449: ba dang 'di snyam du bdag gis pha las de
NK044(phi)001:7450: ltar thos mod kyis bdag gi drung du ni tshangs
NK044(phi)001:7452: de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas de'i
NK044(phi)001:7453: sems shes nas skyes bu stobs ldan gyi lag pa
NK044(phi)001:7454: brkyang bskum byed pa tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:7455: nas de'i khang bzangs su 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:7456: de'i tshe khang bzang sa thams cad snang ba chen
NK044(phi)001:7457: pos khyab cing nam gyi cha smad la bab pa
NK044(phi)001:7458: dang snang ba de mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:7460: bdag gis ma mthong ma thos nas //
NK044(phi)001:7461: gzugs bzang kha dog ldan pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:7462: grogs po khyod ni su zhig yin //
NK044(phi)001:7464: gang la lhar bcas tshangs ris dang //
NK044(phi)001:7465: de bzhin ris ni gzhan dag gis //
NK044(phi)001:7466: gzhon nu rab shes de lta bur //
NK044(phi)001:7467: gnag lhas skyes kyis da shes byos //
NK044(phi)001:7468: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pas zhu ba dang lan bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:7469: gnag lhas skyes des re zhig bdag gis tshe 'di'i don gyi thob bya thob kyis /
NK044(phi)001:7470: tshe phyi ma'i don las brtsams te dri bar bya'o snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:7471: blo la bdog pa'i yid gnyis the tshom dag /
NK044(phi)001:7472: tshangs pa kun 'ged gzhon nu la 'dri ba /
NK044(phi)001:7473: gang du gnas shing gang la bslabs byas na /
NK044(phi)001:7474: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mi 'chi thob par 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:7476: mi yi nang na bya'o snyam spangs shing /
NK044(phi)001:7477: gcig pur gyur pa snying rjer mos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7478: dri nga med cing 'khrig las chags bral ba /
NK044(phi)001:7479: 'di la gnas shig 'di nyid la bslabs na /
NK044(phi)001:7480: mi yis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'chi med 'thob /
NK044(phi)001:7481: bram ze chen po des tshangs pas bshad pa'i tshigs
NK044(phi)001:7482: su bcad pa rkang pa dang po dang gnyis pa'i
NK044(phi)001:7483: don bdag gis kun shes kyis gsum pa dri nga
NK044(phi)001:7484: med cing sogs kyi don mi shes snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:7485: tshangs pa mi'i nang dri nga gang zhig lags /
NK044(phi)001:7487: 'jig rten kun ni dogs kyi 'bab chu ltar //
NK044(phi)001:7488: gang gis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can //
NK044(phi)001:7489: tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:7490: khro dang rdzun dang khon dang rnam 'tshe dang //
NK044(phi)001:7491: 'jungs dang mngon pa'i nga rgyal mi bzod dang //
NK044(phi)001:7492: chags dang zhe sdang de bzhin gti mug dang //
NK044(phi)001:7493: phrag dog ser sna dag dang 'tshig pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:7494: de dag bram ze mi'i nang dri nga yin //
NK044(phi)001:7495: 'jig rten kun na ngogs kyi 'bab chu ltar //
NK044(phi)001:7496: de yis bsgribs na ngan song sgrib pa can //
NK044(phi)001:7497: tshangs pa 'thob 'gyur lam ni mi shes so //
NK044(phi)001:7498: de nas bram ze chen po des bdag gis tshangs pas smras pa'i don shes pa ltar na /
NK044(phi)001:7499: khyim pa khyim na gnas pa dag gis ji srid
NK044(phi)001:7500: 'tsho'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa sal gyis dag
NK044(phi)001:7501: pa ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa yongs su
NK044(phi)001:7502: dag pa rnam par byang ba spyad pa 'di sla
NK044(phi)001:7504: bdag skra dang kha spu bregs te ngur smrig bgos
NK044(phi)001:7505: nas dad pa yang dag pa kho nas khyim med
NK044(phi)001:7506: par rab tu byung bar bu'o snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:7507: de'i bsam pa shes nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7508: tshangs par skye bar bya ba'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:7510: chos 'di dag pa g.yung drung yin //
NK044(phi)001:7511: zhes smras nas mi snang bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7512: de nas dbyar zla bzhi po de 'das nas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:7513: po rdul phran bram ze de'i drung du phyin te
NK044(phi)001:7514: zhabs la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug pa
NK044(phi)001:7516: bdag mi spro bas rgyal srid nyid kyis bskyang du gsol /
NK044(phi)001:7518: khyod 'dod pa mi tshim pa gang yin pa de bdag gis bskang /
NK044(phi)001:7519: khyod la 'tshe ba yod na gsad kyis bdag ma dor zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7521: rgyal po bdag 'dod mi chog min //
NK044(phi)001:7522: bdag la 'tshe ba'ang ma mchis te //
NK044(phi)001:7523: mi ma yin pa'i tshig thos nas //
NK044(phi)001:7524: khyim gyi gzhi la mi spro'o //
NK044(phi)001:7525: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgo nas phan tshun
NK044(phi)001:7526: gleng ste tshangs pa'i tshig gis rab tu byung bar
NK044(phi)001:7528: rgyal pos kyang khyod gang du 'gro ba der kho bo yang 'gro ste /
NK044(phi)001:7529: khyod ni kho bo'i ston pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7530: bdag khyed kyi nyan thos slob mar bya'o zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:7531: rgyal po'i de la chags pa'i 'dod pa spongs la
NK044(phi)001:7532: tshangs par skye ba'i slad du tshangs par spyod pa
NK044(phi)001:7533: spyad par gyis zhes kyang smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7534: de nas bram ze chen po des rgyal rigs drug
NK044(phi)001:7535: la kho bo rab tu gyur na khyed cag ci
NK044(phi)001:7537: mkhan po lo bdun gzhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:7538: bdag cag bu sogs rgyal srid la bzhag nas khyed kyi rjes su rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7540: lo bdun ni ha cang thogs ches te /
NK044(phi)001:7541: 'dod pa rnams ni chags par 'gyur ba /
NK044(phi)001:7542: longs spyod rnams ni myos par 'gyur ba /
NK044(phi)001:7543: srog 'chad pa ni shes par dka' ba yin pas
NK044(phi)001:7544: lo bdun 'das na yang rab tu 'byung ngam mi
NK044(phi)001:7545: 'byung gtol med pas re zhig kho bo ni rab
NK044(phi)001:7546: tu 'byung ngo // de dag gis lo drug nas gcig bar dang /
NK044(phi)001:7547: zla ba bdun nas zhag bdun gyi bar du gros btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7549: zhag bdun ni ring po min mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:7550: 'dod pa'i longs spyod ni myos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7551: srog 'chad pa shes dka' bas zhag bdun 'das na
NK044(phi)001:7552: yang rab tu 'byung ngam mi 'byung gtol med pas
NK044(phi)001:7553: re zhig bdag rab tu 'byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7554: de nas bram ze shing s+aa la lta bu bdun sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:7555: bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya dang /
NK044(phi)001:7556: 'dul sbyong mkhan la sogs pa thams cad la smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:7557: de thams cad kyis mkhan po rab tu byung ba'i
NK044(phi)001:7558: rjes su bdag cag kyang rab tu byung zhes zer
NK044(phi)001:7559: ro // de nas bram ze chen po gnag lhas
NK044(phi)001:7560: skyes skra dang kha spu bregs te gos ngur smrig
NK044(phi)001:7561: bgos nas rab tu byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7562: der rgyal bu rdul phran 'khor brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
NK044(phi)001:7563: rgyal rigs drug dang bram ze chen po bdun la sogs pa /
NK044(phi)001:7564: rta dang glang po 'dul sbyong mkhan sogs khrus byed
NK044(phi)001:7565: pa'i bar gyi mi thams cad kyang de'i rjes su
NK044(phi)001:7567: bram ze chen po gnag lhas skyes de rab tu byung nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa lnga po /
NK044(phi)001:7568: sems nyam chung ba byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:7569: shes rab nyam chung bar byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:7570: gnod pa byed pa'i phyogs dang mthun pa /
NK044(phi)001:7571: mya ngan las mi 'da' ba byed pa rnams spangs nas /
NK044(phi)001:7572: byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems 'khor dang 'gran zla med pa /
NK044(phi)001:7574: yangs pa rgya chen por gyur pa tshad med pa
NK044(phi)001:7575: shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig tu mos te khyab
NK044(phi)001:7576: cing rdzogs par byas nas gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:7577: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7581: thad kar rnam pa thams cad du 'jig rten 'di
NK044(phi)001:7582: thams cad byams pa'i sems kyis khyab par byas te
NK044(phi)001:7583: gnas so // de bzhin du snying rje dang /
NK044(phi)001:7584: dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyis khyab par byas te gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:7585: de'i tshe de'i ming ston pa gnag lhas skyes zhes bya bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7586: de nas ston pa gnag lhas skyes 'khor brgya stong
NK044(phi)001:7587: du ma dag dang bcas pa grong khyer nas grong
NK044(phi)001:7588: khyer du rgyu zhing dong ste thams cad kyis lta
NK044(phi)001:7590: de ltar yang de'i tshe mdun na 'don bdun byung ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:7592: tshangs sbyin zhes bya ba la sogs pa bdun no //
NK044(phi)001:7593: ka ling ka na che ba'i khyim //
NK044(phi)001:7594: rdo mang na ni skem byed de //
NK044(phi)001:7596: b+aa r+aa na s+air ka shi ste //
NK044(phi)001:7597: gnag lhas skyes kyis ris bcad de'o //
NK044(phi)001:7599: de ltar sems can mang po la 'dod pa'i chags pa spangs la /
NK044(phi)001:7600: tshangs pa'i lam yang dag par bstan cing bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:7601: grub par byas pa'i bram ze de ltar shes rab
NK044(phi)001:7602: dang spobs pa che ba des sems can gyi don
NK044(phi)001:7603: byas so // tshul 'di dang phyogs 'dra bar rgyal
NK044(phi)001:7604: po phyogs kyi bdag po'i bu khye'u rdul zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:7605: ba'i mdun na 'don bram ze mi skyong khyab 'jug
NK044(phi)001:7606: ces bya bar gyur pa'i rabs ni mdo sde las
NK044(phi)001:7607: brgya pa'i nang du yod do //
NK044(phi)001:7608: yang sngon byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po chen po
NK044(phi)001:7609: rgyal phran rnams kyis phyag byas pa'i mnga' bdag zhig
NK044(phi)001:7611: yul chos bzhin du bskyangs kyang sems can rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:7612: las kyi nyes pas char ma bab cing than pas
NK044(phi)001:7614: rgyal po des bdag cag gis skye dgu rnams chos
NK044(phi)001:7615: bzhin legs par ma bskyangs pas nyes pa'o snyam du
NK044(phi)001:7616: mdun na 'don bram ze rgan pa rnams la gnod
NK044(phi)001:7617: pa de las thar ba'i thabs dris pas /
NK044(phi)001:7618: de dag gis rig byed las byung ba bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:7619: srog chags du ma bsad pa'i mchod sbyin byas na
NK044(phi)001:7620: char 'bab par 'gyur zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7621: rgyal po snying rje'i bdag nyid can des srog chags
NK044(phi)001:7622: gsod pa'i cho ga de yin la ma bab kyang
NK044(phi)001:7623: 'khor dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir tshig rtsub mo
NK044(phi)001:7624: ma smras par skabs gzhan dag gis gtam de yal
NK044(phi)001:7625: bar bor ro // yang de dag gis rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:7626: bsam pa zab cing brtag dka' ba ma shes nas
NK044(phi)001:7627: mchod sbyin byed pa'i gros btab pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7628: rgyal po des 'di dag ni gzhan dring la 'jog
NK044(phi)001:7629: pa dpyod pa med pas mi legs par ston pa'o
NK044(phi)001:7630: snyam du / srog chags bsad pas lha mnyes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7631: phyugs de dag mtho ris su 'gro ba zhes brdzun
NK044(phi)001:7632: te shin tu mi rigs pas mnyan par bya ba
NK044(phi)001:7635: mchod sbyin byed pa la mos pa lta bur byas te /
NK044(phi)001:7637: khyed cag bdag la 'di ltar phan 'dogs par sems na /
NK044(phi)001:7638: de'i phyir bdag gis mi stong gi mchod byin byed
NK044(phi)001:7639: 'dod pas de ltar sa phyogs dang yo byad sta
NK044(phi)001:7640: gon gyis la tshes grangs dang rgyu skar gyi sbyor
NK044(phi)001:7641: ba rtogs shig / mdun na 'don gyis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7642: 'dod don grub pa'i slad du rgyal po re zhig khrus mdzod dang /
NK044(phi)001:7643: mchod sbyin gyi bkod pa bdag cag gis rtsom mo //
NK044(phi)001:7644: mi stong cig char bzung na khyod kyi 'bangs rnams
NK044(phi)001:7645: gdon mi za bar yid 'byung bar 'gyur bas bgas
NK044(phi)001:7646: kyis bya'o // bram ze rnams kyis de ltar bden no zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7648: khyed 'bangs 'khrugs par 'gyur du ma dogs shig dang /
NK044(phi)001:7649: bdag gis ci nas yid mi 'byung ba de ltar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:7650: de nas rgyal po des grong khyer gyi mi rnams bsdus nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7651: ngas mi stong gi mchod sbyin byed 'dod na /
NK044(phi)001:7652: nyes pa med par ma 'dod bzhin du su yang phyugs su byar ngas mi nus kyi /
NK044(phi)001:7653: de bas de ring phan chad khyed cag las gang
NK044(phi)001:7654: tshul dang bka' khrims la 'gal bar byed cing nga'i
NK044(phi)001:7655: bka' gcig pa de dag nga'i rtog chen po rnams
NK044(phi)001:7656: kyis kun tu song la brtag ste rang gi rigs
NK044(phi)001:7657: dang yul la gnod pa byed pa dag yod na
NK044(phi)001:7658: / phyugs kyi tshab tu de dag bzung ba byed kyis shes par gyis shig ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7659: gtso bo rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7660: rje bo khyod ni 'bangs la phan par gzhol ba
NK044(phi)001:7661: lags na khyed la brgal ba ga la srid de
NK044(phi)001:7662: / khyod kyi spyod pa la tshangs pa yang rjes su yi rang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7663: khyod ni tshad mar gyur pa lags pas lha'i dgyes
NK044(phi)001:7664: pa de la bdag cag kyang dgyes so zhes bka'
NK044(phi)001:7666: de'i tshe rgyal po des blon po thugs ches pa
NK044(phi)001:7667: rnams yo lang chen pos kun gyis mthong bar yul
NK044(phi)001:7668: thams cad du sdig pa byed pa'i mi rnams 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:7670: yul kun tu 'di skad ces nyin re bzhin du bsgo ste /
NK044(phi)001:7671: tshul ldan gtsang ma rnams la /
NK044(phi)001:7672: rgyal pos mi 'jigs pa sbyin gyis /
NK044(phi)001:7673: 'bangs la phan pa'i phyir tshul min byed pa'i mi
NK044(phi)001:7674: phyugs su bsgyur ba stong gis mchod sbyin mdzad par
NK044(phi)001:7675: bzhed pas der phan chad rgyal po'i bka' dang su
NK044(phi)001:7676: 'gal ba de dag mchod sdong la btags nas phyugs
NK044(phi)001:7677: kyi tshab tu mchod sbyin byed do zhes bsgrags pas
NK044(phi)001:7678: / mi thams cad shin tu skrag ste tshul min byed pa btang nas /
NK044(phi)001:7679: tshul khrims dang sdom pa yang dag par blangs /
NK044(phi)001:7680: gcig la gcig dgrar 'dzin cing rtsod pa sogs med par bla ma'i ngag nyan cing /
NK044(phi)001:7683: dga' zhing du ba la 'bad par gyur pas rdzogs ldan gyi dus bzhin du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7684: de'i tshe na rgyal po des blon po mgu zhing
NK044(phi)001:7685: dad par gyur pa de dag la bka' stsal pa
NK044(phi)001:7686: / ngas ni 'bangs rnams srung bar sems pas /
NK044(phi)001:7687: da ni de rnams sbyin gnas su gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7688: ngas mchod sbyin gyi phyir bsags pa'i nor rdzas 'di
NK044(phi)001:7689: rnams skye bo rnams ci 'dod par longs zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:7690: pa ltar / phyogs thams cad du sbyin gtong gi
NK044(phi)001:7691: khang pa brtsigs te skye bo thams cad la ci
NK044(phi)001:7692: 'dod par sbyin pa btang bas thams cad dbul ba
NK044(phi)001:7693: med par 'byor pa rgyas shing rgyal po'i grags pas
NK044(phi)001:7694: yul kun tu khyab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7695: skye bo thams cad kyang dge ba la gzhol ba'i mthus /
NK044(phi)001:7696: dus tshig rnams kyang mthun par bde la lhas dus su char 'bebs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7697: 'bru dang me tog sna tshogs rgyas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7698: sa thams cad du yang gzi byin rgyas shing sman rnams bcud dang ldan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7699: 'gro ba nad med pa la zo mdog bde zhing dga' ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:7700: pha rol gyi dmag sogs kyi 'jigs pa med par rdzogs ldan gyi dus bzhin du gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7701: mi thams cad mgu nas rgyal po la bstod pa byed cing /
NK044(phi)001:7702: de'i tshe blon po gcig gis rgyal po la gsol ba /
NK044(phi)001:7703: mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma yi //
NK044(phi)001:7704: dgos pa rtag tu gzigs pas na //
NK044(phi)001:7705: dbang phyug rnams kyi blo dag ni //
NK044(phi)001:7706: gong nas gong du dpyod par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:7707: zhes pa 'di legs par smras pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:7708: 'di ltar lha'i zhal snga nas phyugs 'gum pa'i skyon
NK044(phi)001:7709: ma mchis par chos kyi mchod sbyin gyis 'bangs rnams
NK044(phi)001:7710: la / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phan btags so //
NK044(phi)001:7711: gnod pa dang dbul ba thams cad zhi bar byas
NK044(phi)001:7712: pas 'bangs rnams ni khyod la brten pas skal ba
NK044(phi)001:7713: dang ldan pa lags so zhes sogs basngagasa so //
NK044(phi)001:7714: de ltar bsam pa dge zhing shes rab can rnams
NK044(phi)001:7715: ni sdig pa byed du gzhug pas bslur mi tshugs
NK044(phi)001:7716: shing / thabs la mkhas pas sdig pa'i phyogs su gzhol ba yang /
NK044(phi)001:7717: dge ba'i lam la 'dzud par byed cing rang gzhan
NK044(phi)001:7718: gnyis ka'i don rgya chen po byed pa'i ngo mtshar
NK044(phi)001:7720: yang sngon yul rdo 'jog na bram ze zla grags
NK044(phi)001:7721: zhes bya ba la bu nyi zla zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:7722: yod do // ji zhig na bram ze na ba
NK044(phi)001:7723: bu dang chung mas dor ba bran mo zhig gis
NK044(phi)001:7724: sman bslangs te sos par byas pas des de la
NK044(phi)001:7725: kar+sh+aa pa na lnga brgya byin nas bran las dbyung
NK044(phi)001:7727: bran mo des de dang lhan cig rtse ba nan tan 'dod pas /
NK044(phi)001:7728: bran mo de zla mtshan dang ldan pa'i dus su
NK044(phi)001:7729: dga' mgur byas pas de la bu chags par gyur
NK044(phi)001:7730: to // bram ze'i chung ma snga mas de la
NK044(phi)001:7731: phrag dog gis bran mo de brdeg cing zas ngan
NK044(phi)001:7732: to // du byas so // bran mo des sems
NK044(phi)001:7733: can skal ngan 'di mngal du chags nas bdag zas
NK044(phi)001:7734: gos ngan cing brdegs pas 'di 'bor ro snyam pas
NK044(phi)001:7735: chol zangs su bzhag ste dor bar brtsams pa dang
NK044(phi)001:7736: to // du byas so // / de bram ze zla grags kyis mthong nas dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7737: des ci ltar gyur pa smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7738: bram ze na re 'di skyed dang kho bos dus shes par bya'o zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:7739: bram ze mo la ngan pa'i tshe khyod dang bus
NK044(phi)001:7740: bor ba la bran mo 'dis nad las gsos pas
NK044(phi)001:7741: / 'di la mkho ba stobs na legs /
NK044(phi)001:7742: min na 'di khyim bdag mor bzhag nas khyod 'di'i bran mor basko'o zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:7744: slan chad tho mi 'tshams par khas blangs nas khye'u'i ming chol zangs pa zhes su btags so //
NK044(phi)001:7745: khye'u de la bram ze shin tu byams par gyur
NK044(phi)001:7746: pa ji zhig na bram ze dus las 'da' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:7747: tshe bu thu bo nyi zla ba kho bo 'das
NK044(phi)001:7748: nas nu bo chol zangs pa 'di la mkho ba
NK044(phi)001:7749: bstabs par gyis zhes smras nas shi 'phos so //
NK044(phi)001:7750: dus zhig na nyi zlas chol zangs pa dang lhan cig zan za ba la /
NK044(phi)001:7751: de'i mas 'di ni bran mo'i bu zhes brnyas pa
NK044(phi)001:7752: chol zangs pas rang gi ma la dris pa dang
NK044(phi)001:7753: / ma des 'jig rten ni rang gi las 'bras la spyod pas su zhig su'i bran yin /
NK044(phi)001:7754: bu yul gzhan du song la thos pa 'dzin par gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:7755: de yul gzhan du song nas ming zla ba zhi ba zhes bya bar bsgrags te /
NK044(phi)001:7756: mnyan yod na bram ze mdun na 'don zhig 'dug pa'i gan du dong ba la /
NK044(phi)001:7757: des khyod gang nas 'ongs sogs dris te /
NK044(phi)001:7758: bram ze zla grags dris pas /
NK044(phi)001:7759: khye'u de ngu zhig de nga'i pha ste gum mo zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7760: mdun na 'don des de ni nga'i chung grogs yin gyis bag pho ba ces smras te /
NK044(phi)001:7761: des de la rig byed bslabs pas rig byed bzhi
NK044(phi)001:7762: po shes nas mdun na 'don gyi bu mo rgyan
NK044(phi)001:7763: thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang nor mang po dag
NK044(phi)001:7764: kyang byin no // de grags pa dang ldan zhing
NK044(phi)001:7765: nor dang ldan par gyur pa rdo 'jog gi tshong
NK044(phi)001:7766: pa mnyan yod du slebs pas ltar dong ba la
NK044(phi)001:7767: des ngo shes nas cang ma smras par tshong pa
NK044(phi)001:7768: des slar 'ongs nas gtam de nyi zla la smras
NK044(phi)001:7769: kyang byin no // pas / de dga' nas ma la smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:7770: bran mo'i bu zhig bsnyen bkur gyi gnas su mi 'gyur zhes zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:7771: ji tsam na nyi zla longs spyod srab par gyur
NK044(phi)001:7772: pa na de'i mas nu bo'i gan du song na
NK044(phi)001:7773: longs spyod kyi bgo bsha' byed do zhes smras pa
NK044(phi)001:7775: sngar bran mo'i bu yin na da ci ltar nu bor 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:7776: bu gal te de lta na yang song la blang
NK044(phi)001:7777: ba ma zlog cig ces man nan gyis bskul bas
NK044(phi)001:7779: de zla ba zhi bas thos nas bsus shing zas byin te /
NK044(phi)001:7780: bdag gi ming zla ba zhi ba zhes 'bod kyi bdag la chol bzangs pa zhes ma 'bod cig /
NK044(phi)001:7781: des kyang de bzhin byas te /
NK044(phi)001:7783: bram ze mo la 'di ni kho bo'i phu bo
NK044(phi)001:7784: nyi zla zhes bya ba yin gyis mkho ba thams
NK044(phi)001:7785: cad bstabs shing tshig mi bcas par gus par bya
NK044(phi)001:7786: zhes smras pa la des kyang de bzhin du byas
NK044(phi)001:7787: so // nyi zla de ni 'grogs na bde ba yin la /
NK044(phi)001:7788: chol zangs pa ni gtum la drag pas nyes pa
NK044(phi)001:7789: cung zad kyi phyir chung ma la khu tshur dang
NK044(phi)001:7790: thal lcag rdeg par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:7791: bram ze mo des nyi zla la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7792: jo jo khyed gnyis nu ma gcig la gsol gsol ba'i mched lags na /
NK044(phi)001:7793: gang gi slad du khyod ni des shing 'grogs na bde ba lags la /
NK044(phi)001:7794: gcung po ni gtum zhing gzu lum dang drag shul can 'di la rgyu ci mchis /
NK044(phi)001:7795: sru 'dis khyim gyi rig pa bklags so //
NK044(phi)001:7796: jo jo khyim gyi rig pa de stsol cig /
NK044(phi)001:7798: rig su la'ang sbyin bya min //
NK044(phi)001:7799: rig dang bcas te 'chi bar bya //
NK044(phi)001:7800: rig pa rig dang gus pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:7801: nor gyis sbyin par bya ba yin //
NK044(phi)001:7803: nor ci tsam gyis stsol bar mdzad //
NK044(phi)001:7804: sru kar+sh+aa pa na la bargya'o //
NK044(phi)001:7805: des kar+sh+aa pa na lnga brgya thogs te rkang pa
NK044(phi)001:7806: la phyag byas nas jo jo khyim gyi rig pa
NK044(phi)001:7809: sru kho bo rdzongs shig dang nam 'gro ba'i tshe sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:7810: bram ze mo des khyim thabs kyi drung du song ste /
NK044(phi)001:7811: rje'i sras khyod kyi gcen 'di khyim gyi bya ba
NK044(phi)001:7812: sems pas mi dga' bar 'gyur gyis slar thongs shig
NK044(phi)001:7813: des smras pa / bzang mo gal te de lta
NK044(phi)001:7814: na khyod kyis 'di'i lam rgyags sta gon gyis shig
NK044(phi)001:7815: des smras pa / / kho bos rdo 'jog tu 'gro ba'i don mthu btsal bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:7816: der lam rgyags byas shing kar+sh+aa pa na lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:7817: thogs te nyi zla la khyod bardzongasa ba'i dus 'di
NK044(phi)001:7818: lags te bdag la khyim gyi rig pa stsol cig
NK044(phi)001:7820: sru gang gi zla ba zhi bas khyod la brdeg
NK044(phi)001:7821: par byed pa'i tshe rig pa 'di bklag par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:7822: // skye bo mang po gzhan dag dang //
NK044(phi)001:7823: gzhan gyi khyim du'ang shes gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:7824: gro bsrung rigs kyis shes 'gyur gyis //
NK044(phi)001:7825: kha rog 'dug cig chol zangs pa //
NK044(phi)001:7826: gal te smras pa 'di'i don ci zhes zer na /
NK044(phi)001:7827: de la gal te rdeg par byed na don yang bshad par bya'o zhes brjod cig /
NK044(phi)001:7828: srung gal te gsang sngags kyi tshig don dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:7829: pa 'di brjod pa tsam kho nas 'bras bu yod
NK044(phi)001:7830: pas phyis 'gyod par mi 'gyur ba legs par bzungs
NK044(phi)001:7831: shig / bram ze mo de legs par bzungs /
NK044(phi)001:7832: zla ba zhi bas kyang nyi zla la kar+sh+aa pa
NK044(phi)001:7833: na dag gis bgo bsha' byas te lam rgyags byin
NK044(phi)001:7835: bu mo des gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di bden nam rdzun sad par bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:7836: zla ba zhi bas nyi zla bskyal nas phyir log
NK044(phi)001:7837: pa'i tshe bza' btung dang khrus ci yang sta gon
NK044(phi)001:7838: ma byas pas des chu dang zas khyer shog zer
NK044(phi)001:7839: ba la sta gon ma byas so zhes smras pas
NK044(phi)001:7840: de khros te nga'i nu bo 'dir 'jug pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:7841: khyod btang snyoms su byas kyi /
NK044(phi)001:7842: khyod ma rdeg par byed du mi btub bo zhes brdeg par gzas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7844: rje'i sras re zhig gzhes la khyim gyi rig par gsan par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:7846: chung mas tshigs bcad sngar bzhin smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:7847: de'o don ci yin zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:7848: de la chung mas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7849: gal te brdeg par mdzad na don yang khyod la brjod par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:7850: de ri dwags gnad du phog pa ltar gyur nas /
