NK044(phi)001:7851: mi brdeg gis thongs la don yang ma smra zhig zer ro /
NK044(phi)001:7852: de'i dus kyi bram ze zla grags ni bcom ldan 'das yin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:7853: chol zangs pa ni 'dun pa 'di yin te /
NK044(phi)001:7854: des dus kyang nga nye dur brjod pas bdag nyid smra bar byed /
NK044(phi)001:7855: da ltar yang nga nye dur brjod cing bdag smra bar byed do zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:7856: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:7857: rigs su gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ke sha
NK044(phi)001:7858: pa'am sred med ces bya ba bstan bcos sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:7859: la mkhas shing snyan par smra ba sogs kyi yon
NK044(phi)001:7860: tan can du gyur pa des /
NK044(phi)001:7861: 'tsho ba rnam par dag pa gang lta bu la bdag gnas nas /
NK044(phi)001:7862: 'jig rten la phan bde bsgrub par bya snyam du sems pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7863: rgyal srid ni rgyags pa sogs nyes pa mang po'i gnas dang /
NK044(phi)001:7864: tshong yang rdzun gyi tshig sogs dang 'brel bas sdig pa dang 'dres la /
NK044(phi)001:7865: zhing las kyang ba lang sogs brdeg brdung gi sdug bsngal dang 'brel ba ste /
NK044(phi)001:7866: de bas sman pa nyid 'tsho ba dag cing gzhan la phan pa sgrub par nus so snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:7867: sman pa slangs te shin tu snyan par smra zhing
NK044(phi)001:7868: gzhan gyi don la mos pas sems can dag gi
NK044(phi)001:7869: nad sna tshogs gso bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7870: nam zhig bud med zhig gi bdag po nad kyis shi bar gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:7871: bud med des ngu zhing bdag po 'bod la khyod gar song zhes smre sngags 'don no //
NK044(phi)001:7872: de 'byung pos bzung bas smyo bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7873: yang des rang gi khyim du 'ongs te nga'i bdag po ni gson no zhes /
NK044(phi)001:7874: mi ngu bar de'i ro la 'khyud de /
NK044(phi)001:7875: de ring bdag la ci'i phyir mi smra /
NK044(phi)001:7876: khyod bud med gzhan 'dod na song dang bdag gis gegs mi bya'o zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:7877: yang khyod mig phyes shig ces mig sor mos 'byed pa sogs bla bcol sna tshogs smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:7878: khyim gyi skye bo gnyid du song ba'i mtshan mor
NK044(phi)001:7879: khyo pho'i ro de mos phrag par bkal nas ri
NK044(phi)001:7880: dang dur khrod kun tu 'khyams bzhin ro de la
NK044(phi)001:7881: bdag po dngos su bsams pas gtam sna tshogs smra
NK044(phi)001:7883: rim gyis ro de rul zhing keng rus 'ba' zhig
NK044(phi)001:7884: tu gyur pa na yang de mi 'dor bar gces
NK044(phi)001:7885: spras byed cing / nyi ma tsha ba'i tshe bdag
NK044(phi)001:7886: gi khyim thab ngal zhes khrus byas nas me tog
NK044(phi)001:7887: gi phreng ba bcing pa sogs ji ltar gson pa
NK044(phi)001:7888: la bya ba bzhin du phu dud dang snyan par
NK044(phi)001:7889: spras byed cing / smras pa dang / gus pa
NK044(phi)001:7890: dang snying nye ba'i tshig thams cad smra bzhin kun
NK044(phi)001:7892: mtshan mo'i dus su me tog /
NK044(phi)001:7893: mal cha la a ga ru'i dris bdugs nas /
NK044(phi)001:7895: mal 'dir bzhugs zhes keng rus de 'god cing de la 'khyud de nyal bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:7896: de'i kun spyod de lta bu skye bo dang slob
NK044(phi)001:7897: ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpas mthong
NK044(phi)001:7898: nas / kye ma yang dag pa ma yin pa'i
NK044(phi)001:7899: kun rtog 'dis 'di ltar rmongs pa 'di yang bdag
NK044(phi)001:7900: gis thabs kyis gso bar bya'o zhes smras pa la
NK044(phi)001:7902: blo dang ldan pa dag gis mi nus pa ci yod ces ngo mtshar du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:7903: der byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i yid kyis bud
NK044(phi)001:7904: med de gang na yod pa'i dur khrod 'jigs su
NK044(phi)001:7905: rung bar mtshan mor song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:7906: der 'jigs su rung ba'i sha za mo rnams kyis
NK044(phi)001:7907: sa der khyab par mthong nas slob ma dag la
NK044(phi)001:7908: srung ba'i sngags kyis gtsug phud bcings nas /
NK044(phi)001:7910: skye bo rnams gang la chags shing nan tan du
NK044(phi)001:7911: byed pa'i bud med kyi lus de ni dur khrod
NK044(phi)001:7912: du gsal por mthong ba'i ro dri nga ba 'di
NK044(phi)001:7913: rnams te / de lta bu la 'khyud cing chags
NK044(phi)001:7914: pa'i blo ni re 'khrul lo snyam du snying rjes
NK044(phi)001:7916: der slob ma la dris nas tho rangs la bab pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:7917: khyod nad pa rnams gso ba'i phyir grong khyer du songs shig /
NK044(phi)001:7918: bdag gis bud med de thabs kyis brtan por bya'o zhes smras te slob ma mngags so //
NK044(phi)001:7919: byang chub sems dpa' bud med bdag po'i bka' thub can de btsal bzhin pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:7920: der na chung ma de langs nas bdag po'i lus
NK044(phi)001:7921: de bzung zhing chu bo'i 'gram du song ba'i shul
NK044(phi)001:7922: gyi mal stan mthong nas de'i lam du shes nas
NK044(phi)001:7923: bltas pas de chu bor 'gro ba mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:7924: der byang chub sems dpa' bud med zhig gi keng rus phrag par bkal te /
NK044(phi)001:7926: bud med des keng rus de chu 'gram gyi shing sdong la bcings nas /
NK044(phi)001:7927: re zhig 'phags pa'i sras sdod cig /
NK044(phi)001:7928: ngas gdongs pa bkru ba'i chu khyer te khyod kyi gdong 'khrud par byed cing /
NK044(phi)001:7929: yid 'ong mig can gyi gdong brgyan par bya'o zhes smras shing chu la phyogs te song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:7930: des rang gi grib ma chu dwang par shar ba la bltas nas /
NK044(phi)001:7931: mdzes ma 'dis bdag gi khyo pho 'phrog par byed
NK044(phi)001:7932: do snyam du de la tshigs sna tshogs smra zhing
NK044(phi)001:7933: / mthar khro bas rdo rnams kyis brdegs kyang de ma song ba la /
NK044(phi)001:7934: khyod de ltar mi 'gro na bdag gis 'phags pa'i
NK044(phi)001:7935: sras bzung nas 'gro bar 'gyur te gang du slar
NK044(phi)001:7936: 'di mthong bar mi 'gyur ro zhes rang gi grib
NK044(phi)001:7937: ma la smras nas keng rus phrag par bzhag ste
NK044(phi)001:7938: song ngo // des ke sha pa mthong nas ci'i
NK044(phi)001:7939: phyir skyes pa 'dis bud med 'dzin cing gzhan la
NK044(phi)001:7940: 'bros pa byed pa 'di la dri bar bya'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:7941: song ngo // du / ke sha pa la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7942: khyod ni bdag khyo bo dang bcas par 'gro ba la dogs nas 'gro ba ci'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:7943: bdag ni sha za'i bud med min pas dogs pa dor la smros shig ces zer ba la /
NK044(phi)001:7944: byang chub sems dpa' na re /
NK044(phi)001:7945: sring mo khyod la 'jigs pa min te /
NK044(phi)001:7946: 'on kyang skyes pa gzhan mi 'dod pa'i chung ma
NK044(phi)001:7947: 'di bzung nas gang du mi rnams med par 'agro'o
NK044(phi)001:7948: // bdag gi bud med 'di ni mdzes pas lha
NK044(phi)001:7949: rnams kyang mngon par dga' ba 'di khyod kyi 'dza'
NK044(phi)001:7951: bdag gi mdza' mo ni skyes pa gzhan la mi
NK044(phi)001:7952: dga' zhing khyod kyi mdza' bo mthong nas ngo tsha
NK044(phi)001:7953: bas mig gnyis zum par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:7954: bdag gis 'di bzung nas ri'i phug tu yun ring gnas par byed do zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7956: 'phags pa de lta bu'i dogs pa mi dgos te /
NK044(phi)001:7957: khyod kyi chung ma tshul bzang ba skyes pa gzhan mi 'dod pa de ltar /
NK044(phi)001:7958: bdag gi mdza' bo yang de ltar tshul bzang ba yin la /
NK044(phi)001:7959: brtul zhugs mnyam pa dag grogs po yin pas legs so zhes zer te daga'o //
NK044(phi)001:7960: der byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7961: khyod bdag po'i brtul zhugs la gnas pa'i bud med yin na /
NK044(phi)001:7962: chu bo 'dir bdag cag lhan cig gnas par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:7963: zhes smras pa ltar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:7964: ke sha pas chu 'gram gyi shi rtsar keng rus de bzhag ste /
NK044(phi)001:7965: rgyan byed par brtsams pa la bud med des kyang
NK044(phi)001:7966: khyo bo'i keng rus brgyan par brtsams zhing de gnyid
NK044(phi)001:7968: byang chub sems dpas keng rus de nyid kyi ske thag pas sbrel ba /
NK044(phi)001:7969: dal bus khyer te chu bo la dor nas ha ha zhes sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:7970: mya ngan gyi sgra brjod pas bud med de sad pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7971: khyod kyi bdag pos bdag gi mdza' mo 'phrogs so kye ma kyi hud ces byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:7972: de gnyis pos keng rus gnyis ka chus khyer bar
NK044(phi)001:7973: mthong nas kyi hud ha ha zhes brjod de chu
NK044(phi)001:7974: 'gram du rgyug cing rgyug cing 'gro ba'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:7975: bud med des mig mchi mas gang bzhin smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7976: bdag gis ni khyod la dus kun brgyan cing gus shing byams pa rgyun ma chad par byas na /
NK044(phi)001:7977: de ring gzhan gyi khyim thab 'phrog pas mnyan gshin
NK044(phi)001:7978: 'bras bu med pa khyod kyis bdag bsam par ma
NK044(phi)001:7979: byas so // zhes sogs skad cig gis khro ba /
NK044(phi)001:7980: skad cig gis sdug bsngal dang ldan pa /
NK044(phi)001:7981: skad cig gis smre sngags 'don pa de la byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7982: de ltar khrel med pas mnyes gshin dang bral ba'i don du ngu ba ni don med do //
NK044(phi)001:7983: khyod kyi khyo pho bud med gzhan mi 'dod pa zhes ma smras sam /
NK044(phi)001:7984: khyod kyi khyo pho bdag nyid ngan pa des bdag
NK044(phi)001:7985: gi mdzes ma shin tu yid du 'ong ba te
NK044(phi)001:7986: phrogs pas bdag stong par gyur te brtan pa bral
NK044(phi)001:7987: lo // de slar myur du 'ong bar gyis zhes smre sngags 'don pa la /
NK044(phi)001:7988: bud med de gos kyis mgrin pa bcings shing 'phags
NK044(phi)001:7989: pa de slar 'ong bar bya mi nus kyi bdag
NK044(phi)001:7990: gi ming po'i bu mo yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs
NK044(phi)001:7991: can zhig yod kyi de khyod la sbyin no /
NK044(phi)001:7992: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:7993: bdag la ni mchog gi gdong can rang gi chung
NK044(phi)001:7994: ma de min pa lha'i bu mo gzhan gyis kyang
NK044(phi)001:7996: gal te de khrid mi 'ong na rdo ba chen
NK044(phi)001:7997: po 'dis khyod kyi mgo bo phye mar bya'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:7998: khro ba'i tshul gyis rdo ba chen po zhig blangs
NK044(phi)001:7999: te bud med de brdung bar gzas pa dang de
NK044(phi)001:8000: skrag nas rkang pa la gtugs shing /
NK044(phi)001:8001: bdag ni phongs shing gnyen med pa'i bud med de /
NK044(phi)001:8002: de bas nongs pa byas kyang bzod par mdzad de gsad par mi mdzad du gsol zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8003: de la byang chub sems dpas gal te khyod kyis
NK044(phi)001:8004: bdag gi tshig las mi 'da' na rdo 'dis mi
NK044(phi)001:8005: bsnun la khyod kyang bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:8006: ro // de de bzhin bya zhes khas blangs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8007: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8008: khyod kyi khyo pho shi ba'i rus pa phrag par
NK044(phi)001:8009: khyer nas khyo pho nyid du rnam par rmongs pa
NK044(phi)001:8010: de dor cig / skye bo thams cad 'chi ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:8011: ri dang rgya mtsho dpag bsam shing //
NK044(phi)001:8012: lha dang lha min mi rnams kyi //
NK044(phi)001:8013: dpal 'byor dag kyang mi rtag go //
NK044(phi)001:8014: de ltar 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas 'jig rten la skyo ba skyed cig /
NK044(phi)001:8015: gnyen la chags pa las mya ngan skye zhing ltung
NK044(phi)001:8016: bar 'gyur bas khyod da ni mya ngan bsang bar
NK044(phi)001:8017: gyis shig ces smras pas de dran pa rnyed nas
NK044(phi)001:8019: khyod kyi gdams ngag gis mar mes bdag gi kun
NK044(phi)001:8020: rtog ngan pa'i mun pa bsal bar gyur to zhes
NK044(phi)001:8021: sogs dga' bas basngagasa pa byas na /
NK044(phi)001:8022: bud med de rang bzhin du gnas pa byang chub
NK044(phi)001:8023: sems dpas gnyen 'dun rnams kyi nang du khrid par
NK044(phi)001:8024: byas so // de'i tshul la slob ma'i tshogs dang
NK044(phi)001:8025: skye bo rnams kyis kun nas basngagasa par byas so
NK044(phi)001:8026: byas so // // yang sngon gyi dus na b+aa
NK044(phi)001:8027: r+aa na s+air rgyal po tshangs pas byin gyii khab
NK044(phi)001:8028: tu bram ze rig byed la mkhas pa zhig nags
NK044(phi)001:8029: su sman tshol bar song ba des sman gyi khur
NK044(phi)001:8030: blangs te 'ongs nas bram dkyil na ngal gso ba'i
NK044(phi)001:8031: tshe mi'am ci mo zhig gis mthong nas phan tshun
NK044(phi)001:8032: chags par gyur te gnyis ka mi'am ci mo'i gnas
NK044(phi)001:8034: der phug gi sgo rdo chen pos bkag pa der
NK044(phi)001:8035: bzhag nas de dang 'dod pa bsten par byas pa
NK044(phi)001:8036: las / bcom ldan 'das nyid de'i sras su 'khrungs
NK044(phi)001:8037: pa de lo brgyad lon pa'i dus su pha'i drung
NK044(phi)001:8038: nas bstan bcos du ma rtogs par gyur cing skar
NK044(phi)001:8039: ma'i rtsis la'ang spobs pa dang ldan par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:8040: las / // de nas des ma dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:8041: phug nas phyir byung ste thub pa rnams las bstan
NK044(phi)001:8042: bcos lhag ma rnams rtogs par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8043: de'i goms pa'i dbang gi rkang rjes kyi mtshan ma
NK044(phi)001:8044: la bslas pa tsam gyis chom rkun shes pa'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:8046: des de la ming chom rkun shes pa zhes grags so //
NK044(phi)001:8047: der rang gi pha la khyod kyi skye ba'i yul gang yin zhes drid pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8048: des b+aa r+aa na s+ai 'i rgyal po'i khab yin no zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8050: pha khyod bdag dang lhan cig b+aa r+aa na s+air
NK044(phi)001:8051: song nas mkhas pa rnams dang lhan cig bstan bcos
NK044(phi)001:8054: bu gal te sgo gcod pa'i brag 'di bsal ba'i mthu khyod la yod na de ltar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:8055: bus 'bad pa chen pos brag de bsal nas de gnyis lhan cig b+aa r+aa na sir song ste /
NK044(phi)001:8056: rgyal po la shis pa brjod pa sngon du 'gro
NK044(phi)001:8057: bas bdag gi bus rkang rjes las chom rkun shes
NK044(phi)001:8059: rgyal pos bu de la bkur sti byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8060: rkang rjes shes pas chom rkun thams cad bstan cing
NK044(phi)001:8061: rgyal po la 'di dag bsad par mi bya zhes
NK044(phi)001:8062: smras pa ltar byas pas yul de rkun ma med
NK044(phi)001:8063: par gyur to // nam zhig rgyal po de rta
NK044(phi)001:8064: mchog la zhon nas 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas par
NK044(phi)001:8065: mdun na 'don dang gtam smra bzhin btsun mo'i tshogs
NK044(phi)001:8066: rnams gnas pa'i skyed mos tshal du song zhing slar
NK044(phi)001:8067: yang phyogs gzhan du song ba las dben pa'i phyogs
NK044(phi)001:8068: zhig tu gzugs can ma'i gtso mo bzang mo zhig
NK044(phi)001:8069: shin tu gnyid 'thug por log ste gos zhig cing
NK044(phi)001:8070: mu tig gi do shal can de mthong nas rgyal
NK044(phi)001:8071: pos mdun na 'don la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8072: rkang rjes shes pa'i yon tan gyi mthus 'di ltar
NK044(phi)001:8073: gnyid log pa'i mu tig gi do shal 'di yang
NK044(phi)001:8074: gzhan gyis ma phrogs so zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8075: mdun na 'don la phrag dog gi blo skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:8076: lhas rkang rjes shes pa'i skyon mi mkhyen par yon tan brjod par mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:8080: de rang nyid kyis mtshan mor gzhan gyi nor rku
NK044(phi)001:8081: ba yin pas de'i mtshan ma lha'i drung du gsal
NK044(phi)001:8082: bar byas pa tsam mo zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8083: rgyal po des rkang rjes shes pa'i che ba 'don
NK044(phi)001:8084: pa'i phyir bzang mo de'i mu tig gi do shal
NK044(phi)001:8085: bdag gis mdun na 'don la len du bcug nas
NK044(phi)001:8086: rgyal po'i grong khyer la lan gsum bskor ba byas
NK044(phi)001:8087: te / rang gi pho brang du seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu sa brkos nas sbas so //
NK044(phi)001:8088: bud med de sad nas mu tig gi do shal
NK044(phi)001:8089: stor ba'i mya ngan gyis rgyal po la zhus so
NK044(phi)001:8090: // der rgyal pos mdun na 'don mngon sum du
NK044(phi)001:8091: bzhag ste rkang rjes shes pa la bzang mo 'di'i
NK044(phi)001:8092: rin thang che ba'i mu tig gi do shal stor
NK044(phi)001:8093: na de sus khyer zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8094: rkang rjes shes pas phyir phyung nas grong khyer lan gsum bskor ba byas te /
NK044(phi)001:8095: pho brang du 'ongs nas seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu
NK044(phi)001:8096: blta zhing rgyal po'i bzhin la bltas nas yang yang
NK044(phi)001:8098: rgyal po des 'di bgad pa ci'i don smros shig /
NK044(phi)001:8099: rkang rjes shes pas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8101: mu tig gi do shal khyer ba'i chom rkun pa de tha mal pa zhig ma yin no //
NK044(phi)001:8104: rkang rjes shes pa na re /
NK044(phi)001:8105: lhas dpe gcig gsan par 'os te /
NK044(phi)001:8106: rdza mkhan sogs sa las bya ba byed pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:8107: sa rdib nas mnan pa'i tshe gang las rtsi shing
NK044(phi)001:8108: sogs skye zhing thams cad 'tsho ba'i sa des de
NK044(phi)001:8109: ring bdag gis lus bcag go zhes smras pa lta
NK044(phi)001:8110: bu'o zhes smras nas cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:8111: de la rgyal pos gsal por smros shig ces byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8112: 'o na gsal bar smra ba zhed na dpe gzhan yang gsan par mdzod cig /
NK044(phi)001:8113: bram ze rnams kyis me la sbyin sreg byed pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:8114: de'i lag pa me stag gis tshig pa na de 'di skad du /
NK044(phi)001:8115: gang zhig bdag gis nyin bzhin sreg blugs kyis /
NK044(phi)001:8116: mchod cing 'dud pa'i sems kyis phyag byas pa'i /
NK044(phi)001:8117: me des kye ma bdag la sreg byed na /
NK044(phi)001:8118: lus can rnams la skyabs ni su zhig 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:8120: zhes smras nas cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:8122: khyod kyi tshig 'di dag bdag gis mi shes pas
NK044(phi)001:8123: shin tu gsal por ji ltar gyur pa smros shig
NK044(phi)001:8125: rgyal po chen po gal te shin tu gsal por
NK044(phi)001:8126: smras na 'di lta ste zhes khrus bya ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:8127: chu la zhugs pas bram ze chus khyer ba dang
NK044(phi)001:8128: / shing gi sa bon zos pa'i 'dab chags rnams
NK044(phi)001:8129: shing las byung ba'i mes bsregs pa na skyabs med
NK044(phi)001:8130: pa'i dpes bstan kyang de rnams mi shes pas da
NK044(phi)001:8131: dung gsal por smros zhes byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8133: ji ltar zhing pa la la zhig gis zhing rmed
NK044(phi)001:8134: pa'i pha de'i drung du rang gi bu mo mdzes
NK044(phi)001:8135: mas bza' ba khyer te 'ongs pas ska rags grol
NK044(phi)001:8136: ba la pha de glo bur du chags pas 'dod
NK044(phi)001:8137: pa bsten par byas shing slar 'gyod de bu mo
NK044(phi)001:8138: khyod kyis 'dir bzlog par cis mi byed ces smras
NK044(phi)001:8139: pa la / bu mo na re /
NK044(phi)001:8140: khyod ni bdag gi skyabs yin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:8141: khyod las mi rigs pa 'di 'byung na gzhan sus bdag la gnod pa las slong ste /
NK044(phi)001:8142: mar me las mun pa 'byung na slar gang gis
NK044(phi)001:8143: gsal bar mi byed pa dang 'dra'o zhes smra ba
NK044(phi)001:8144: de lta bu'o zhes smras nas cang mi smra'o //
NK044(phi)001:8145: rgyal po na re 'di tsam khyod kyis smras kyang mi shes so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8147: de lta na bdag gis gsal po smra ste /
NK044(phi)001:8148: gnyid log pa'i na chung ma'i mu tig gi do
NK044(phi)001:8149: shal ni mdun na 'don 'dis mngon du khyer bar
NK044(phi)001:8150: byas so // rgyal po na re 'o na slar gang du bzhag des smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8151: seng+ge'i khri 'di sol dang zhes zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:8152: de bsal ba dang sa brkos pa na mu tig gi do shal de blangs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8153: rgyal po ngo mtshar skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:8154: blo gros can yon tan dang ldan pa de lta
NK044(phi)001:8155: bu la phrag dog gis brnyas pa'i yid can mdun
NK044(phi)001:8156: na 'don de phyir byung bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8157: bud med de yang mu tig gi do shal blangs te rang gi khyim du dga' bas song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8158: byang chub sems dpa' rkang rjes shes pas kyang rgyal
NK044(phi)001:8159: po la 'dod pa'i nyes dmigs sogs chos kyi gtam
NK044(phi)001:8160: byas pa la rgyal po dga' nas legs so zhes
NK044(phi)001:8161: byas shing yo byad chen pos bkur ste dag kyang
NK044(phi)001:8162: byas so // yang sngon gyi tshe drang srong rgyas
NK044(phi)001:8163: pa'i sras gar gyi cha byad rnams la mkhas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8164: sras mo dpe med ma zhes bya ba gzugs kyi
NK044(phi)001:8165: yon tan rmad du byung bas skye bo thams cad
NK044(phi)001:8166: yid 'phrog par nus pa nyid du bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:8167: nyid skye ba bzhes par gyur pa'i tshe lo gnyis
NK044(phi)001:8168: lon nas pha ma 'das par gyur kyang /
NK044(phi)001:8169: de'i pha'i grogs po rgyas pa thams cad kyi gtso
NK044(phi)001:8170: bo des dpe med ma'i skye bo'i tshogs la smras
NK044(phi)001:8171: pa / khyed rnams 'dod na bdag gi 'di gar
NK044(phi)001:8172: gyi cha byad rnams la mkhas par bya'o zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:8173: pa ltar des gar gyi tshul rnams bslabs pas mkhas
NK044(phi)001:8174: pa / par gyur cing / nyi ma re re
NK044(phi)001:8175: la gar gyi chas rnams grub par byas nas de
NK044(phi)001:8176: pa / par gyur cing / la byin no //
NK044(phi)001:8177: de'i tshe yul gyi rgyal po des gtso bo de
NK044(phi)001:8178: bos nas gar dang glu'i sbyor bar brtsam par byos
NK044(phi)001:8180: gtso bo des gar gyi chas rnams bzung nas dpe
NK044(phi)001:8181: med ma dang lhan cig rgyal po'i pho brang du
NK044(phi)001:8182: rgyal po la sogs pa'i skye bo'i tshogs mang po'i
NK044(phi)001:8183: mdun du zlos gar gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsams
NK044(phi)001:8184: so // der dpe med mas yid 'phrog pa'i gzugs
NK044(phi)001:8185: kyis sgeg pa la sogs pa'i nyams kyis gar byas
NK044(phi)001:8186: so // pa dang / skye bo thams cad kyi
NK044(phi)001:8187: yid phrogs nas de dang 'phrad 'dod par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:8188: so // pa dang / // de na dka' thub
NK044(phi)001:8189: pa'i sras zhig dka' thub spyod pas ngal zhing skyo
NK044(phi)001:8190: nas khyim gyi dga' ba la yid phyogs pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:8191: gis bdag khyim na gnas par bya'o snyam du 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:8192: pa des rdza rnga'i sgra thos pas der ltad mo
NK044(phi)001:8193: ltar 'ong ba na dpe med ma'i gar gyi rnam
NK044(phi)001:8195: glu snyan la thos pas yid phrogs te /
NK044(phi)001:8196: 'di lta bu nags na mthong ba min pas bdag
NK044(phi)001:8197: gis dka' thub kyi gnas dor bar rigs so snyam
NK044(phi)001:8198: mo // de'i tshe dpe med ma'i stod gos lhung
NK044(phi)001:8199: bas yid du 'ong ba'i nu 'bur gnyis mthong ste
NK044(phi)001:8200: gtso bo de 'dod pa skyes pa shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:8202: chos la yid ni nyams med ring gtad nas //
NK044(phi)001:8203: su zhig dmyal ba'i don du sdig pa byed //
NK044(phi)001:8204: mtshan mo mar me snang bar byed pa der //
NK044(phi)001:8205: lam nyams rnams ni nges par don mi 'gro //
NK044(phi)001:8206: zhes smras pa'i legs bshad des slob ma la slob
NK044(phi)001:8207: dpon gyis bsgos pa ltar de lam ngan pa las
NK044(phi)001:8208: bzlog pas gtso bo des legs so zhes byas nas
NK044(phi)001:8209: rang gi stod gos dpe med ma la byin no
NK044(phi)001:8210: // dka' thub pa'i sras der kyang legs bshad de
NK044(phi)001:8211: la legs so zhes byas nas dpe med pa'i mdun
NK044(phi)001:8212: du shing gi lo ma dang bcas pa'i khri snyan
NK044(phi)001:8213: s+aa la'i pags pa nag po bzhag par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:8214: // // der tshong pa gnyis kyis gos zla ba ltar dkar ba dag bzhag go //
NK044(phi)001:8215: de nas blon po dang rgyal po'i sras dag gis kyang zla ba lta bu'i gos re bzhag go //
NK044(phi)001:8216: der gar gyi ltad mo rdzogs pa'i tshe rgyal pos
NK044(phi)001:8217: thog mar gtso bo la khyod kyis dpe med ma
NK044(phi)001:8218: la gos kyis ci'i don du brgyan zhes dris pa
NK044(phi)001:8221: 'di'i gos lhung ba'i gzugs kyi yon tan la bdag chags pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:8222: 'dis legs par bshad pas bdag gi blo'i mun pa bsal ba de'i slad du'o //
NK044(phi)001:8223: yang rgyal pos drang srong gi sras la /
NK044(phi)001:8224: ci'i phyir khyod kyis dpe med ma la shing lo dang bcas pa'i pags pa bzhag /
NK044(phi)001:8226: bdag gis dka' thub btang nas khyim du gnas par
NK044(phi)001:8227: 'dod pa la 'dis legs bshad kyis dka' thub mi
NK044(phi)001:8228: gtong bar byas pa'i phyir na bdag gis bkur bar
NK044(phi)001:8229: byas so // de nas tshong pa gnyis la dris pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8230: de dag gis ded dpon zhig gis gzhan du 'gro
NK044(phi)001:8231: ba'i tshe mu tig gi do shal bdag la gtad
NK044(phi)001:8232: pa de / bdag gi dga' ston gyi dus mdza' mo zhig gi mgrin rgyan du byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8233: de mthong nas bdag gi khyim thab mos dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8234: des ded dpon zhig gis bdag gi bdag po'i lag tu bzhag pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:8235: der yang khyod kyi khyo pho dpang po nyid byas par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:8238: ded dpon 'ongs kyang gal te bdag gi khyo bos
NK044(phi)001:8239: ma smras na 'di bdag cag thun mong gi do
NK044(phi)001:8240: shal du 'gyur ro zhes khyim bdag mo gnyis kyis
NK044(phi)001:8241: blo gros ngan pa'i tshig de thos nas bdag cag
NK044(phi)001:8242: kyang 'dod pas zil gyis non pas de ltar bgyi
NK044(phi)001:8244: 'di'i legs bshad kyis dge ba 'phrog pa'i brnams sems
NK044(phi)001:8245: de dor bar byas pas skye ba bzang po thob
NK044(phi)001:8246: pa'i lam la zhugs pa de'i phyir legs so zhes
NK044(phi)001:8247: brjod cing glo bur gos dag dor bar byas so
NK044(phi)001:8248: // de nas rgyal pos blon po la khyod kyis
NK044(phi)001:8249: kyang gos de la ci'i phyir bsgyur zhes dris pa
NK044(phi)001:8250: // la / blon po des pus mo btsugs te
NK044(phi)001:8251: gal te lhas bdag la mi 'jigs pa sbyin na
NK044(phi)001:8252: brjod par bagyi'o zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8253: rgyal pos kyang mi 'jigs pa byin no //
NK044(phi)001:8254: blon po des dben par rgyal po la gsol ba /
NK044(phi)001:8255: gdug pa bdag dang lha'i btsun mo'i gtso mo dag bgros te /
NK044(phi)001:8256: sa skyong 'di gnyid log pa'i tshe dug gam ral
NK044(phi)001:8257: gri rnon pos bsad de bdag cag nyid rgyal srid
NK044(phi)001:8258: 'dzin par bya'o zhes chad byas pa de dpe med
NK044(phi)001:8259: pa'i legs bshad kyi snang bas bcom par byas pa
NK044(phi)001:8260: de'i phyir gos kyi bkur sti byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8261: de nas rgyal po des rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur
NK044(phi)001:8262: ba'i sras la khyod ci'i phyir dpe med ma la
NK044(phi)001:8264: yab kyis gsan par 'ong zer te /
NK044(phi)001:8265: blon po chen po sdig pa can dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:8266: rigs sun 'byin pa'i ma ma 'di gsad par bya
NK044(phi)001:8267: snyam pa'i kun rtog bdag la skyes pa de /
NK044(phi)001:8268: dpe med mas legs par bshad pa des bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:8269: chos min gyi bsam pa de bzlog par byas pas
NK044(phi)001:8270: slob dpon bzhin du gyur pa de la gos kyis
NK044(phi)001:8273: de thos pas rgyal po des de rnams la legs so zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:8274: dpe med ma bos nas nor chen po'i byin cing
NK044(phi)001:8275: gus par byas te bstod pa dag gis bstod nas
NK044(phi)001:8276: thams cad rang gi gnas su song bar gyur to
NK044(phi)001:8277: // de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:8278: shes rab kyi stobs kyis legs par bshad pa'i tshigs
NK044(phi)001:8279: bcad gcig gis kyang sems can du ma'i don chen
NK044(phi)001:8280: po byed pa la gus par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:8281: yang sngon 'byor pa chen pos mngon par dga' ba
NK044(phi)001:8282: 'jog po'i brag ces bya ba'i rgyal po'i khab tu
NK044(phi)001:8283: bcom ldan 'das nyid bstan bcos du ma'i pha rol
NK044(phi)001:8284: tu son cing dul ba dang bzod pa sogs kyi
NK044(phi)001:8285: yon tan chen pos 'jig rten thams cad kyi gnyen
NK044(phi)001:8286: dang 'dra ba'i ded dpon legs 'gro zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:8287: gyur pa des skye dgu rnams la legs pa'i lam
NK044(phi)001:8289: der b+aa r+aa na s+air lha'i bu mo dang 'dra ba'i res ma'i smad 'tshong ma'i ming mchan /
NK044(phi)001:8290: gtso mo bzang mo zhig gis ded dpon mang po dbang du byas par thos nas /
NK044(phi)001:8291: de'i gzugs kyi nga rgyal bsal ba'i phyir legs 'gro
NK044(phi)001:8292: de grogs mang po dang bcas par b+aa r+aa na
NK044(phi)001:8293: s+air song ngo // de skyon can rnams kyis res
NK044(phi)001:8294: ma'i gtso mo la khyod kyi mdzes pas pad+ma dag
NK044(phi)001:8295: la bung ba bzhin du thams cad 'gugs par byed
NK044(phi)001:8296: s+air song ngo // na / mkhas shing gsal ba
NK044(phi)001:8297: legs 'gro de 'ong ba la pho nya btang ste
NK044(phi)001:8298: snyan par smra bas de bkug nas rang dbang du
NK044(phi)001:8300: des pho nya tshig gsal bar smra ba mngags pa des gus par legs 'gro la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8301: res ma'i gtso mo thams cad kyi dpal 'phrog par
NK044(phi)001:8302: byed pa des khyod rang gi khyim bzhin du 'dir
NK044(phi)001:8303: gshegs la bdag cag rjes su bzung bar mdzod ces
NK044(phi)001:8306: skye bo thams cad kyang sems dbang du byed pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8307: sngags la gzugs dang ldan pa khyod 'dra ba med
NK044(phi)001:8308: pas bdag 'dir 'ongs pa la dgos pa gzhan med
NK044(phi)001:8309: de bdag der 'ong 'dod pa kho na yin no
NK044(phi)001:8310: zhes smras nas res ma'i gtso mo gos dkar po
NK044(phi)001:8311: dang ldan pa'i g.yog mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa'i khyim
NK044(phi)001:8312: du zhugs so // der res ma'i gtso mos legs
NK044(phi)001:8313: 'gro mthong nas langs te dga' zhing dgod la mig
NK044(phi)001:8314: zur gyis lta ba sogs sgeg cing chags pa'i rnam
NK044(phi)001:8315: 'gyur sna tshogs bstan nas mtshan mo phrad par 'dod
NK044(phi)001:8316: pa'i kun rtog gis 'dod pa'i gtam sna tshogs smra
NK044(phi)001:8317: du zhugs so // zhing / der legs 'gro des
NK044(phi)001:8318: mtshan mo de la res ma'i gtso mo dang lhan
NK044(phi)001:8320: tho rangs kyi dus su stong phrag brgya ri ba'i mu tig gi do shal byin no //
NK044(phi)001:8321: gnyis pa'i zhag la gser gyi rgyan chas de brgyan par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8322: gsum pa'i zhag la dngul gyi rgyan nyung ba tsam byin pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8323: res ma'i gtso mo de khro ba dang ldan par
NK044(phi)001:8324: song nas rgyal po tshongs pas byin la gtam zhus
NK044(phi)001:8325: shing / bdag gis ni 'di la dga' ba'i spyod
NK044(phi)001:8326: pa nyi ma re re las je lhag tu byas
NK044(phi)001:8327: shing / na / legs 'gro 'di ni mnyes gshin
NK044(phi)001:8328: je chung ngu 'gro ba ci'i phyir zhes zhus so
NK044(phi)001:8329: shing / na / // rgyal pos legs 'gro bos
NK044(phi)001:8330: nas res ma'i gtso mo dang lhan cig gtam byed
NK044(phi)001:8333: lha lags mnyes gshin pa med pa'i yid 'di smos pas ci zhig bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:8334: chu med pa la zam pa 'dzugs pa bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:8335: legs 'gro 'di la dga' bar byas kyang 'bras bu med par gyur to zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8336: rgyal po de la lan thob ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8338: 'di'i btsong bya 'di ni rang bzhin gyis skyon dang bcas pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:8339: 'di yi lus ni zhag gi skabs rnams su 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:8340: bar mthong nas rgyan kyang gzhan dang gzhan byin pa
NK044(phi)001:8341: yin no // me tog rnying pa rnams bung bas dor ba ltar /
NK044(phi)001:8342: skye bo rnams kyis ji srid yid du 'ong ba
NK044(phi)001:8343: de srid du 'dod par byas nas rnying pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:8344: 'dor zhing gsar pa bsten pa yin la /
NK044(phi)001:8345: dngos po rnams ni chos nyid kyis skad cig gis skye zhing 'gag ste /
NK044(phi)001:8346: lang tsho ni rga bas 'phrog cing /
NK044(phi)001:8347: tshe ni 'chi bas 'phrog pa sogs thams cad mi rtag go //
NK044(phi)001:8348: rga na 'chi bas sdug bsngal bas sems kyi brtan
NK044(phi)001:8349: pa 'phrog par byed pa mi shes pa dag ni
NK044(phi)001:8350: / bud med ces bya ba rus pa'i phreng ba
NK044(phi)001:8351: mi gtsang ba'i gzeb can la chags nas rmongs par
NK044(phi)001:8352: / 'gyur te / mkhas pa rnams kyis bud med
NK044(phi)001:8353: la chags pa skyon mang po gnas su shes nas
NK044(phi)001:8354: smad par byed do zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8355: rgyal pos legs so zhes bstod cing /
NK044(phi)001:8356: res ma'i gtso mo de yang gzugs dang lang tsho'i
NK044(phi)001:8357: nga rgyal dang bral te rab tu zhi ba la
NK044(phi)001:8358: rtse gcig zhugs par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:8359: skye bo'i tshogs thams cad kyang bag med pa rnam par bzlog nas tshul khrims bzung bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:8360: byang chub sems dpa' de slar yang ljon shing gi brag nyid du song bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:8361: yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid lha rnams
NK044(phi)001:8362: kyi rgyal po brgya byin nyid du gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:8363: / nags kyi gnas su dka' thub pa zhig gnas
NK044(phi)001:8364: pa de'i drung du ri dwags dang 'dab chags rnams
NK044(phi)001:8365: kyang slob ma ltar dga' bas gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:8366: der glang mo'i phrug gu shin tu sdug gu zhig
NK044(phi)001:8367: btsas pa de ma dang bral ba de la drang
NK044(phi)001:8368: srong des bu ltar byams par byed cing /
NK044(phi)001:8369: phru gu des kyang pad+ma'i rtsa ba dang 'od ma'i
NK044(phi)001:8370: 'dab ma sogs bzung ste thub pa de'i lag tu
NK044(phi)001:8372: de shing lo'i khang pa'i nye 'khor du gnas shing
NK044(phi)001:8373: drang srong de gang du 'gro bar khrid nas ri
NK044(phi)001:8374: dgas pags pa sogs de la bkal te 'ong bar
NK044(phi)001:8375: byed cing drang srong gi las su bya ba phal
NK044(phi)001:8377: nam zhig phru gu de rang gi ma'i rjes su 'brang nas nags su 'khyams so //
NK044(phi)001:8378: drang srong des me'i sbyin sreg sogs byas nas zas
NK044(phi)001:8379: bza' ba'i tshe glang phrug de btsal kyang ma mthong
NK044(phi)001:8380: bas / zas kyi bya ba bzhag ste /
NK044(phi)001:8381: de'i rkang rjes la bltas nas btsal ba na ma'i
NK044(phi)001:8382: nu ma nu bar mthong nas mya ngan byed pa
NK044(phi)001:8383: / glang mo'i phru gu des mthong nas bsu bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:8384: drang srong des mchi mas mig gang bzhin de'i mgo la lag pas byugs te /
NK044(phi)001:8385: khyod ma'i nu ma 'thung bas ci bya /
NK044(phi)001:8386: chu 'thung zhing bdag cag gi bsti gnas su 'dong zhes khrid nas /
NK044(phi)001:8387: de la shing lo'i spyil bu byas te /
NK044(phi)001:8388: nyin mtshan du de srung ba'i sems pas shin tu byams par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:8389: byang chub sems dpa' brgya byin gyis lha'i mig gis
NK044(phi)001:8390: glang po'i phru gu la shin tu byams pas yid
NK044(phi)001:8391: zhen pa drag po can de la bltas nas 'di
NK044(phi)001:8392: snyam du / thub pa 'dis gnyen 'dun mnyes gshin
NK044(phi)001:8393: pa rnams dor nas nags su gnas kyang lhag par
NK044(phi)001:8394: glang po'i phru gu la zhen pa so sor rtog
NK044(phi)001:8395: pa'i stobs ma thob pa 'di thabs zhig gis gdul
NK044(phi)001:8396: bar bya'o snyam du brgya byin der song ste /
NK044(phi)001:8397: thub pa'i dge ba'i phyogs la gegs byed pa'i phru
NK044(phi)001:8398: gu de shi bar cha ba'i nad kyis gzir bar
NK044(phi)001:8399: sprul to // thub pa des kyang ma dpyad par
NK044(phi)001:8400: 'di ci zhes de dang 'bral bar dogs pas smre
NK044(phi)001:8402: der lha'i bdag pos dka' thub pa'i gzugs su bstan nas de la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8403: drang srong chen po khyod rang gi skye bo mnyen gshin pa rnams btang nas nags su gnas na /
NK044(phi)001:8404: da 'di shi ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa'i smre
NK044(phi)001:8405: sngags 'don pa glang po che'i khrus dang 'dra ba
NK044(phi)001:8406: khyod 'di na ci zhig sgrub ste blo ldan rnams
NK044(phi)001:8408: skye bo thams cad 'chi ba la ngus pas phan pa sus kyang ma thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:8409: dngos po thams cad 'jig par shes nas sngon gyi drang srong rnams kyis nor dang /
NK044(phi)001:8410: skye bo'i tshogs thams cad la zhen pa spangs te nags su gnas pa yin na /
NK044(phi)001:8411: khyod ni nags su gnas bzhin rang nyid zhen pa'i zhags pas 'ching bar byed pa mi rigs so //
NK044(phi)001:8412: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pas mthar g.yo ba
NK044(phi)001:8413: kho nar nges pa'i phyir mnyen gshin la zhen pas
NK044(phi)001:8415: rtag tu 'grogs pa'i dbang ni mi 'byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8416: 'khor ba 'dir chags shing zhen pa las sdug bsngal thams cad 'byung la /
NK044(phi)001:8417: ma chags pa las rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro zhes pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8418: thub pa des legs par bshad pa de la legs so zhes bstod cing gus par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8419: der byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8420: sdug pa'i mtshan mas dbang po khrid pa'i rjes su
NK044(phi)001:8421: mi 'brang bar dran pa mnyams pas dbang po'i yul
NK044(phi)001:8422: la rgyab kyis phyogs par byas na dngos grub thob
NK044(phi)001:8423: par gyur te skye bo dam pa rnams kyis rjes
NK044(phi)001:8424: su bstan pa bzhin byas nas skye bo tha mal
NK044(phi)001:8425: bar mi bya'o zhes smras pa la drang srong des
NK044(phi)001:8427: der brgya byin gyi lus su bstan nas bdag ni lha'i dbang po ste /
NK044(phi)001:8428: phru gu 'di bdag gi mthus slar 'tsho bar bya'o zhes bslang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8429: thub pa des kyang rims pas dus kyi tshe glang
NK044(phi)001:8430: po'i phru gu de glang po'i tshogs su dor ba
NK044(phi)001:8431: tshogs kyi bdag por gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:8432: des ku ba chus bkang ba dang 'bras bu bcas pa'i yal ga rnams thub pa la byin no //
NK044(phi)001:8433: des kyang lag pas de'i mgo la reg cing phan pa'i bslab bya rnams kyang smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:8434: thub pa des rang gi spyil por bsam gtan la rtse gcig tu gnas par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8435: yang sngon gyi tshe na mtsho ma dros pa na
NK044(phi)001:8436: ngang pa'i sde dpon yul 'khor skyong gi gang ba
NK044(phi)001:8437: dang bzhin rgyas gnyis yod pa'i phu bo gang ba
NK044(phi)001:8438: ni gtum zhing barlanga pas ngang pa rnams la bsdigs
NK044(phi)001:8439: shing spu 'byin cing sder mos rma 'byin pa sogs
NK044(phi)001:8440: byas pas ngang pa'i rgyal po la ngang pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:8442: des bsams pa gang ba gtum pa 'di rgyal tshab
NK044(phi)001:8443: tu bcug na ngang pa'i khyu bshig par 'gyur gyis
NK044(phi)001:8444: de la thabs zhig bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:8445: bu de gnyis 'khor lnga brgya re dang bcas pa
NK044(phi)001:8446: la 'bab chu dang mtsho dang matshe'u rnams bltas te
NK044(phi)001:8447: nga'i drung du thog mar su byung ba de ngang
NK044(phi)001:8448: pa rnams kyi sde dpon du gzhug go zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:8449: so // de gnyis 'gran bzhin dong bas b+aa r+aa na s+air phyin pa na /
NK044(phi)001:8450: rgyal po tshangs byin gyi rdzing tshangs ldan zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:8451: ba mtsho bas 'phags shing zab pa me tog sna
NK044(phi)001:8452: tshogs dang me tog gi skyed shing du ma dag
NK044(phi)001:8453: gis mdzes shing bya sna tshogs skad sgrogs pa mthong
NK044(phi)001:8454: nas gang ba 'khor bcas der babs nas rtse bar
NK044(phi)001:8455: brtsams so // bzhin rgyas la yang rang gi khyus bob la rtsed mo mdzod ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8456: re zhig rgyal srid blangs la phyi nas song ste
NK044(phi)001:8457: rtse bar bya'o zhes smras shing myur bar song nas
NK044(phi)001:8458: ngang pa'i rgyal srid blangs so //
NK044(phi)001:8459: de nas ngang pa lnga brgya bskor zhing tshangs ldan
NK044(phi)001:8460: gyi rdzing bur bab pa de bag yod pas gnas
NK044(phi)001:8461: pa skye bos mthong nas ngang pa'i sde dpon 'di
NK044(phi)001:8462: lta bu'i gzugs mchog tu gyur pa rdzing bu 'di'i
NK044(phi)001:8463: rgyan du gyur pas bya thams cad zil gyis gnon
NK044(phi)001:8464: pa'o snyam du dga' zhing thams cad de la lta
NK044(phi)001:8465: bar byed do // de blon po rnams kyis rgyal po la gsol to //
NK044(phi)001:8466: rgyal pos bya rnams bkug ste ma snad par zungs shig ces basgo'o //
NK044(phi)001:8467: de rnams kyis rnyi 'jam pos bzung ba na /
NK044(phi)001:8468: ngang pa'i rgyal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8469: bdag ni dam por rnyis bzung bas //
NK044(phi)001:8470: mi yi dbang song byar med kyi //
NK044(phi)001:8471: ci nas ngang pa'i khyu dag ni //
NK044(phi)001:8472: myur du ma dros 'dor bar gyis //
NK044(phi)001:8473: zhes smras pas ngang pa gcig min pa thams cad bros so //
NK044(phi)001:8474: gcig bzung bas gcig ma zin kyang mya ngan gyis
NK044(phi)001:8475: non cing 'dug pa mthong nas ngo mtshar te ngang
NK044(phi)001:8476: pa'i sde dpon de kho na rgyal po'i drung du
NK044(phi)001:8477: khyer ba dang / cig shos ma bzung yang de la chags nas rang nyid song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8478: der rgyal po la ngang pa'i sde dpon phul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:8479: cig shos 'di khyer te ci la 'ongs /
NK044(phi)001:8480: lha 'di ni ma bzung yang rang nyid 'ongs pa lags so //
NK044(phi)001:8481: de la rgyal po ngo mtshar te dad pa skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:8482: rgyal po des ngang pa'i sde dbon seng ge'i khri la bzhag nas /
NK044(phi)001:8483: ngang pa des mi'i skad kyis rgyal po 'khor bcas dge bcu'i las la bkod pas /
NK044(phi)001:8484: rgyal po'i bkas pa'i yul na chu na rgyu ba'i
NK044(phi)001:8485: sems can rnams sus ma gsad ces dril bsgrags so
NK044(phi)001:8486: // de ltar ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin rgyas ni bcom ldan 'das nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:8487: tshul 'di dang phyogs 'dra ba ngang pa'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:8488: yul 'khor srung gi rabs kyang skyes rabs so bzhi
NK044(phi)001:8489: par gsungs so // yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:8490: 'das 'di nyid ri dwags gser gyi glo zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:8491: ba ri dwags rnams kyi dpon por gyur pa lus
NK044(phi)001:8492: kyi gzi brjid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:8493: zhing thams cad kyi mig dang yid du sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:8494: zhig tu gyur pa de gang gis mthong ba tsam
NK044(phi)001:8495: gyis der rtog cing sdod par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:8496: des de ltar rtog par shes nas rngon pa sogs kyi 'tsher dogs kyis gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:8497: bya rog zhig gis de la 'di ltar 'tsher zhing
NK044(phi)001:8498: skrag par cis gyur zhes dris pa la bdag gi
NK044(phi)001:8499: lus la thams cad 'dod pa bskyed pas rngon pa
NK044(phi)001:8501: bya rog gis smras pa bdag kyang 'ug pas 'jigs pas gcig la gcig bsrung par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:8502: bdag gis khyod nyin mo srungs la /
NK044(phi)001:8503: khyod kyis bdag mtshan mor srungs shig ces dam bcas so //
NK044(phi)001:8504: ji zhig na mi lag pa phyin log tu dam
NK044(phi)001:8505: por bcings pa zhig chu drag po'i dba' klong gis
NK044(phi)001:8506: khyer ba de'i kha nas smre sngags 'don cing su
NK044(phi)001:8507: zhig bdag 'jigs pa 'di las sgrol ba yod na
NK044(phi)001:8508: / de'i bran bya zhing go re long bya'o zhes 'bod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8509: stes dbang gis ri dwags kyi dpon po de ri
NK044(phi)001:8510: dwags kyi tshogs kyis bskor nas 'bab chu'i 'gram du
NK044(phi)001:8512: mi des 'o dod pos nas ri dwags gzhan ni bros /
NK044(phi)001:8513: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni log par lhung ba'i
NK044(phi)001:8514: lus su gyur kyang sems de ltar ma yin pas
NK044(phi)001:8515: ri dwags kyi dpon po de snying rjes brlan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8516: sems kyis mod la 'bab chu'i nang du 'jug par
NK044(phi)001:8517: brtsams pa na / bya rog gis kyang sngon dam
NK044(phi)001:8518: bcas pa'i yid kyis kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir de'i
NK044(phi)001:8519: phyi bzhin 'brangs pas des mi de dbyung ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:8520: 'bad pa byed par rigs nas 'di skad ces smras
NK044(phi)001:8521: brtsams pa na / pa la / ri dwags kyi dpon po thongs thongs gzu lum ma byed /
NK044(phi)001:8522: mi 'di dag ni byas pa mi gzo zhing byas pa mi sems pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:8523: byang sems bdag nyid chen po de ni mi zlog
NK044(phi)001:8524: pa yin pas de'i tshig ma nyan par 'bab chu
NK044(phi)001:8525: de'i nang du zhugs te bu gcig pu sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:8526: la ma bzhin du mi de rgyab tu zhon bcug
NK044(phi)001:8527: nas chu'i 'gram du phyungs te bcings pa rnams bkrol
NK044(phi)001:8528: zhing yud tsam zhig dbugs phyung nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8529: bu lam 'di nas ci dga' bar songs shig /
NK044(phi)001:8530: de nas mi des thal mo sbyar te ri dwags
NK044(phi)001:8531: kyi dpon po'i de'i rkang pa la gtugs nas smras
NK044(phi)001:8532: pa / khyod kyis bdag gi srog stsal bas na /
NK044(phi)001:8533: bdag khyod kyi 'bangs te go re long yang bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:8535: deng khyod bdag gi bran dang ni //
NK044(phi)001:8536: go re long yang ma byed par //
NK044(phi)001:8537: pags pa'i phyir ni gsad 'ong gis //
NK044(phi)001:8538: khyod kyis bdag bzhan ma bstan cig /
NK044(phi)001:8539: bu khyod kyi bya ba ni 'di yin te /
NK044(phi)001:8540: kho bo'i lus 'di 'jig rten thams cad shin tu
NK044(phi)001:8541: chags shing 'dod par bya ba yin pas khyod kyi
NK044(phi)001:8542: kho bo su la yang ma bstan na byas pa
NK044(phi)001:8543: la phan btags pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:8544: de mi des de bzhin du bagyi'o zhes khas blangs nas /
NK044(phi)001:8545: ri dwags kyi dpon po la lan gsum bskor ba byas te rkang pa la gtugs nas song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8546: dus gzhan zhig na yul b+aa r+aa na s+ai de'i
NK044(phi)001:8547: rgyal po dbang phyug chen po'i sde zhes pa 'byor
NK044(phi)001:8548: pa dang mnga' thang chen pos rgyal srid byed pa
NK044(phi)001:8549: de'i btsun mo zla 'od ma zhes bya ba rmi
NK044(phi)001:8550: lam rno zhing rmi lam du gang mthong ba thams
NK044(phi)001:8551: cad de bzhin du 'gyur gyi gzhan ma yin pa
NK044(phi)001:8552: zhig yod pa de rtsed mos mal chen por legs
NK044(phi)001:8553: par gnyid log pa'i mtshan mo'i thun tha ma la
NK044(phi)001:8554: ri dwags kyi dpon po gzugs mchog tu sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:8555: zhig seng ge'i khri la 'dug nas chos 'chad par
NK044(phi)001:8556: mngon sum lta bur mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8557: de yid bde ba skyes shing mal nas langs te rgyal po la smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8558: rgyal pos kyang de'i bden pa'i rmi lam mchog tu ngo mtshar te /
NK044(phi)001:8559: mi 'dod pa'i 'gro bar skyes pa des ko ji ltar chos 'chad snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:8560: btsun mo des dga' ba'i gtam gyis rgyal po dga' bar byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:8561: lha ri dwags de khugs par bya ba'i slad du nan tan mdzad du gsol /
NK044(phi)001:8562: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
NK044(phi)001:8563: nga'i yul na rngon pa ji snyed cig yod pa
NK044(phi)001:8564: 'dir khugs shig byas pa bzhin rngon pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:8565: rgyal po'i drung du lhags pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8567: shes ldan dag nga'i yul na ri dwags kyi dpon
NK044(phi)001:8568: po gzugs shin tu sdug pa zhig yod do zhes
NK044(phi)001:8569: ngas thos kyis khyed kyis de rnyi 'jam zhing lhod
NK044(phi)001:8570: pas zungs la ma snad pa rang la phul cig
NK044(phi)001:8572: lha bdag cag 'tsho ba 'di'i phyir dus 'di tsam gyi bar du lha'i yul du brgyugs pa las /
NK044(phi)001:8573: ri dwags kyi dpon po mchog 'di lta bu ni
NK044(phi)001:8574: sdon chad lan 'ga' yang ma thos na mthong ba
NK044(phi)001:8575: lta ci smros / lha gcig nas gcig tu smras te /
NK044(phi)001:8576: phyogs ga ge mo zhig na mchis so zhes gsan na bdag cag la bka' stsal bar rigs so //
NK044(phi)001:8577: de lta na bdag cag gis kyang lhas bka' stsal pa nges par 'grub par mchi'o //
NK044(phi)001:8578: rgyal pos blon po rnams la bsgo ba /
NK044(phi)001:8579: shes ldan dag b+aa r+aa na s+air dril sgrogs su chug la lhas bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:8580: nga'i yul na ri dwags kyi dpon po gzugs sdug
NK044(phi)001:8581: pa zhig yod kyis sus de'i gtam nga'i snyan du
NK044(phi)001:8582: gsol na / der ngas bkur sti chen po byas nas grong rdal mchod lnga sbyin no //
NK044(phi)001:8583: blon po rnams kyis kyang rgyal po las mnyan nas de ltar dril bsgrags so //
NK044(phi)001:8584: de nas ri dwags kyi dpon po de mthong ba'i mi des 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:8585: ci re zhig 'khor rjes su bskyang bar bya'am /
NK044(phi)001:8586: 'on te byas pa gzo bar bya snyam pa las /
NK044(phi)001:8587: 'dod pa bsten pas ni sdig pa'i las mi byed
NK044(phi)001:8588: pa ci yang med pas de 'dod pa'i rgyus bslangs
NK044(phi)001:8589: pas bdag gnas skabs 'di lta bu thob na sngar
NK044(phi)001:8590: gyi dgra la yang sha glan pa'i dus la bab
NK044(phi)001:8591: po snyam du / zhe sdang gi mes sems kyang gdung bar gyur nas /
NK044(phi)001:8592: byas pa gzo ba re zhig zhog /
NK044(phi)001:8593: thabs 'di las las ka thob na dgra la sha glan par bya'o snyam nas nam langs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8594: rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa'i mi rnams pho brang
NK044(phi)001:8595: gi sgor 'dug pa de'i nang du me tog shin
NK044(phi)001:8596: tu dri zhim pa sna tshogs khyer te sgo ba
NK044(phi)001:8597: dang blon po rnams gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de
NK044(phi)001:8598: rgyal po la thos par byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:8599: bkur sti sna tshogs byas nas rgyal po la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8600: lha phyogs ga ge mo zhig na zhugs shing sna
NK044(phi)001:8601: tshogs kyi nags bya dang ri dwags 'dris pas mdzes
NK044(phi)001:8602: par byas pa na ri dwags kyi dpon po gser
NK044(phi)001:8603: gyi glo zhes bgyi ba ri dwags kyi tshogs stong
NK044(phi)001:8604: phrag du mas bskor zhing mchis te /
NK044(phi)001:8605: bdag gis lha la ri dwags dam pa gzugs mchog tu sdug pa de bstan par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:8606: rgyal pos de thos nas dga' zhing blon po du
NK044(phi)001:8607: mas bskor bzhin ya mtshan skyes pa yul gzhan sna
NK044(phi)001:8609: yul de'i mi rnams kyis kyang mdun du bdar de /
NK044(phi)001:8610: mi des lam pa byas nas phyogs der phyin to //
NK044(phi)001:8611: ji tsam na bya rog byang chub sems dpa' dang
NK044(phi)001:8612: dam bcas pas des phyogs su lta ba'i phyir nags
NK044(phi)001:8613: tshang tshing de'i shing kha na bdug pas skye bo'i
NK044(phi)001:8614: tshogs chen po der 'ongs pa mthong nas myur du
NK044(phi)001:8615: ri dwags kyi dpon po byang chub sems dpa'i drung
NK044(phi)001:8617: ri dwags kyi rgyal po khyod la bdag gis sngar
NK044(phi)001:8618: mi rnams ni phan pa byas pa mi sems shing
NK044(phi)001:8619: byas pa mi gzo la byas pa mi tshor ba
NK044(phi)001:8620: yin no zhes smras pa yin te /
NK044(phi)001:8621: mi des skyes mang du khyer nas 'ong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8622: sgra de nyid ri dwags rnams kyis thos nas skrag ste kun tu bros so //
NK044(phi)001:8623: ri dwags kyi dpon po byang chub sems dpas bsams pa /
NK044(phi)001:8624: gal te bdag gis ri dwags 'di dag ma bsrungs
NK044(phi)001:8625: na de ring nyid du kha btags par 'gyur gyis
NK044(phi)001:8626: sems can yal bar 'dor ba las /
NK044(phi)001:8627: rang gi srog chud gzon pa sla'o snyam nas rgyal po bsur song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8628: de nas mi snying rje med cing 'jig rten na
NK044(phi)001:8629: pha rol la mi lta ba de ri dwags lta
NK044(phi)001:8630: bar rtun pa'i blos ri dwags kyi mchog de lag
NK044(phi)001:8631: pa gnyis kyis bstan te smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8632: lha ri dwags kyi dpon po ni 'di lags so //
NK044(phi)001:8633: las shin tu drag po yongs su rdzogs pa ni
NK044(phi)001:8634: rnam par smin pa'i dus la mi ltos pa yin
NK044(phi)001:8635: pas tshig de smras ma thag tu mi de'i lag
NK044(phi)001:8636: pa gnyis ka sa la lhung bar gyur to /
NK044(phi)001:8637: de nas rgyal po de skyo ba skyes nas mi de la dris pa /
NK044(phi)001:8638: ka'i nad rje 'di ci las gyur /
NK044(phi)001:8639: mi de sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen zhing nga ro mi gsal bas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8640: rgyal chen gang zhig bkum nas nor //
NK044(phi)001:8641: 'phrog de chom rkun ma lags kyis //
NK044(phi)001:8642: rgyal chen byas pa mi gzo ba //
NK044(phi)001:8643: gang lags de ni chom rkun lags //
NK044(phi)001:8646: des ji skad gyur pa thams cad rgyas bar rgyal po la smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8647: de nas rgyal pos byas pa chud gzon pa'i mi de la slar smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:8648: ci'i phyir tha chad par mi bying ma gyur /
NK044(phi)001:8649: ci'i phyir lce ni dum bu brgyar ma lhags /
NK044(phi)001:8650: ji ltar khyod kyi lus 'di gsang ba bas /
NK044(phi)001:8651: rdo rje'i char mdung mda' chen brdeg ma gyur /
NK044(phi)001:8652: de nas rgyal pos byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen
NK044(phi)001:8653: po de shes nas blon po rnams la smras pa
NK044(phi)001:8654: / shes ldan dag ri dwags kyi dpon po bdag
NK044(phi)001:8655: nyid chen po 'di ni bsnyen bkur bya bar 'os
NK044(phi)001:8656: kyis khyed cag ded la grong khyer gyi lam byi
NK044(phi)001:8658: de rnams kyis grong khyer de'i rdo dang gseg ma
NK044(phi)001:8659: sogs bsal zhing tsan dan gyi chus chag chag btab
NK044(phi)001:8660: / dri zhim po'i pog phor dang rgyal mtshan dag
NK044(phi)001:8661: dar gyi chun 'phyangs kyis brgyan te me tog gi
NK044(phi)001:8662: sil ma bkram pas lha'i skyed tshal ltar mdzes par
NK044(phi)001:8663: byed du bcug nas grong khyer der gnas pa'i skye
NK044(phi)001:8664: bo'i tshogs kyis me tog gi phreng ba thogs te
NK044(phi)001:8665: / bsur song ngo // de nas rgyal po'i 'byor
NK044(phi)001:8666: pa chen pos ri dwags kyi dpon po gzugs shin
NK044(phi)001:8667: tu ldug pa de seng ge'i khri la 'dug tu
NK044(phi)001:8668: / bsur song ngo // bcug nas / rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:8669: 'byor pa dang mthu chen pos btsun mo dang gzhon
NK044(phi)001:8670: nu dang blon po dang grong dang yul mi rnams
NK044(phi)001:8671: kyis yongs su bskor zhing des de rnams la chos
NK044(phi)001:8672: bstan pas rgyal po 'khor dang bcas pas bslab pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8674: sems can du ma dag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba dag thob /
NK044(phi)001:8675: rgyal pos nags de ri dwags rnams la byin nas
NK044(phi)001:8676: srog chags 'byung po thams cad la yang mi 'jigs
NK044(phi)001:8677: pa byin no // yang bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon chu sreg lnga brgya'i dpon por gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:8678: de na chu sreg rgan po zhig gis chu sreg
NK044(phi)001:8679: de rnams kyi sgo nga dang phru gu rnams thabs
NK044(phi)001:8680: kyis zos nas / dal bus 'chag cing rkang pa
NK044(phi)001:8681: gcig bteg nas dka' thub byed pa'i zol zog can
NK044(phi)001:8682: kyis zos nas / zhig yod do // der chu
NK044(phi)001:8683: sreg rnams mya ngan byed cing chu sreg gi dpon
NK044(phi)001:8684: po'i drung du 'dus nas thabs ci yod gsol ba
NK044(phi)001:8685: kyis zos nas / zhig yod do // btab bo
NK044(phi)001:8686: // chu sreg gi dpon po des chu sreg rgan
NK044(phi)001:8687: po'i tshul de 'phrigs nas lkog tu de la de
NK044(phi)001:8688: lta bu'i tshigs bcad brjod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8689: de skrag ste chu sreg gi dpon po la skyabs su song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:8691: nam chu sreg rnams 'khrugs par ma gyur pa de
NK044(phi)001:8692: srid bde bar gyis zhes brjod pas de skrag nas
NK044(phi)001:8693: phyogs gzhan du bros pas chu sreg rnams bde bar
NK044(phi)001:8694: gyur to // yang ne tso mi skad smra bar
NK044(phi)001:8695: gyur pas rgyal po tshangs byin chos la bkod pa
NK044(phi)001:8696: gyur to // dang / ngang pa'i rgyal po dang /
NK044(phi)001:8697: rma byar gyur pa'i tshe na yang chos bstan pas
NK044(phi)001:8698: gzhan la phan btags pa gong du smros pa lta
NK044(phi)001:8699: bu ste / byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dud
NK044(phi)001:8700: 'gror skyes kyang shes rab kyi mthu mnyam pa med
NK044(phi)001:8701: pas sems can smin par byed na mtho ris su
NK044(phi)001:8702: skyes pa na lta ci smros te /
NK044(phi)001:8703: shes rab kyi mthu la gus par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:8704: yang sngon gyi tshe drang srong snang ba zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:8705: bas shing nya gro d+ha'i rgyal po bzang po zhes
NK044(phi)001:8706: bya ba yal 'dab stug pos yog pa /
NK044(phi)001:8707: 'khor yug tu rgyang grags gcig yod pa der gnas bcas nas /
NK044(phi)001:8708: shing de'i 'dab ma'i grangs la mngon par shes pas
NK044(phi)001:8709: brtag cing bgrangs bas lo bcu gnyis dang zhag bdun
NK044(phi)001:8711: der bcom ldan 'das nyid drang srong sngo bsangs zhes
NK044(phi)001:8712: par gyur pa de lhags nas phan tshun mgu ba'i
NK044(phi)001:8713: gtam byas shing / drang srong snang bas 'di skad
NK044(phi)001:8714: du kye bram ze mi'i 'jig rten na shing gi
NK044(phi)001:8715: rgyal po 'di'i 'dab ma'i grangs du yod shes nus
NK044(phi)001:8718: yod de bdag gis kyang nus so //
NK044(phi)001:8719: snang bas bgrongs shig ces smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8720: sngo bsangs des shing de la mi lta bar skad
NK044(phi)001:8721: cig tsam la 'dab ma'i grangs rtog pa la zhugs
NK044(phi)001:8722: nas smras pa / mi 'khrugs drug cu pang stong phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8723: bcu drug dang ni khyad phyin phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8724: bcu gsum dang ni dkrigs pa phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8725: dgu bcu rtsa drug khra khrig phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8726: sum cu rtsa dgu khrag khrig phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8727: sum cu dag ni ther 'bum phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8728: brgyad stong dang yang bye ba phrag /
NK044(phi)001:8730: bram ze dam pa bdag gis 'tshal //
NK044(phi)001:8732: snang pas legs so khyod kyis bden par smras te /
NK044(phi)001:8733: bdag gis lo bcu gnyis dang nyi ma bdun du mngon shes kyis bgrang ba la /
NK044(phi)001:8734: khyod kyis shing la ma gzigs lo ma rnams mi
NK044(phi)001:8735: bgrang bar 'dab ma rnams rtogs pa'i mkhyen pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:8736: rang gi'am / lha yis bstan pa yin zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8738: 'di ni lhas smras pa min te bdag gi'o //
NK044(phi)001:8739: nam mkha' zad cing grum par 'gyur srid kyi kho bo rdzun du mi smra'o zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8740: de'i tshe drang srong snang ba ni sh+aa ri'i bu yin par gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:8741: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid gdol ba'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:8742: tre shang ku zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe na
NK044(phi)001:8743: bram ze rigs che zhing mtho ba pad+ma'i snying po
NK044(phi)001:8744: la bu mo gzugs bzang zhing blo dang ldan pa
NK044(phi)001:8745: zhig yod pa de rang gi bu stag rna'i ched
NK044(phi)001:8747: bram ze de rigs kyi nga rgyal dang bstan bcos kyi dregs pas brnyas te ma byin pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8748: rgyal po des yang dag pa'i rig pas rigs kyi nga rgyal bcom nas /
NK044(phi)001:8749: rig byed dang bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol
NK044(phi)001:8750: tu phyin pa'i gtam gyis bram ze de tshar bcad
NK044(phi)001:8751: pas / de shin tu gus pas bstod cing bu
NK044(phi)001:8752: mo sbyin par byas pa'i tshul rgyas par stag rna'i
NK044(phi)001:8753: mdo las gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:8754: yang bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon gyi skye ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:8755: su bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes 'tshol pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8756: slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod
NK044(phi)001:8757: pa rlabs po che mdzad de /
NK044(phi)001:8758: bram ze ut+pala'i mig ces bya bar gyur pas sangs
NK044(phi)001:8759: rgyas 'khor bcas la gtsug lag khang phul ba sogs
NK044(phi)001:8760: de bzhin gshegs pa ches tshad med grangs med bsam
NK044(phi)001:8761: gyis mi khyab pa la mchod pa rnam pa sna
NK044(phi)001:8762: tshogs tshad med pas mchod nas stobs bcu'i ye shes
NK044(phi)001:8763: thob par smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8764: sangs rgyas rnams kyi drung du ji lta ji snyed
NK044(phi)001:8765: kyi chos kyi tshul dris shing khong du chud par
NK044(phi)001:8766: byas nas gzhan la bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8767: de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa la thugs dang
NK044(phi)001:8768: mthun pa'i rim gro pa byas te chos zhus shing
NK044(phi)001:8769: bzung ba dang / sems can gyi khams sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:8770: la phan bde'i ched du rgyal rigs dang bram ze
NK044(phi)001:8771: dang gar mkhan dang glu mkhan la sogs pa rnam
NK044(phi)001:8772: pa sna tshogs pa'i skye ba dpag tu med pa
NK044(phi)001:8773: bzhes te sems can rnams smin par mdzad pa'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:8774: ni brjod kyis mi lang zhing /
NK044(phi)001:8775: de dag las 'ga' tsam ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo
NK044(phi)001:8776: la sogs par gsungs pa las 'dir rags rim 'ga'
NK044(phi)001:8778: sngon gyi dus na bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:8779: kun nas mdzes pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
NK044(phi)001:8780: po la gnas pa gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi
NK044(phi)001:8781: dbang phyug tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:8782: sngon gyi 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi sgrub pa
NK044(phi)001:8783: ci 'dra ba bzhin bdag gis kyang chos dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:8785: bdag chos min du zhugs na rgyal po'i ming don med do snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:8786: blon po rnams la sngon gyi rgyal po rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:8787: rgyal srid sgrub pa rjes su bstan pa gang gis
NK044(phi)001:8788: rgyal sridami nyams zhing 'phel ba de ston cig ces
NK044(phi)001:8789: dris pa la / de dag na re /
NK044(phi)001:8790: lha bdag cag gis de'i don mi 'tshal te /
NK044(phi)001:8791: nyen kor na drang srong mngon shes lnga ldan chos
NK044(phi)001:8792: dang bstan bcos la mkhas pa dag yod pas de
NK044(phi)001:8793: dag bsdur gsol dang de dag gis 'khor los sgyur
NK044(phi)001:8794: ba'i sngon gyi rabs smra bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:8795: rgyal pos de dag gi ltar mnyan nas /
NK044(phi)001:8796: khyim nas byung ba'i drang srong rnams bkur sti chen
NK044(phi)001:8797: pos rgyal po'i pho brang rgya mtsho can du bsdu
NK044(phi)001:8798: bar byas shing drang srong khri khrag brgyad cu po
NK044(phi)001:8799: de dag la phal cher mngon shes dang ldan zhing
NK044(phi)001:8800: dge rtsa yun ring du spyad pa skye dgu la
NK044(phi)001:8802: rgyal po 'khor gyi tshogs dang bcas pas gus pa
NK044(phi)001:8803: chen pos dpag tshad du bsu zhing ston pa'i 'du
NK044(phi)001:8804: shes bskyed de / phyag 'tshal zhing drang srong de
NK044(phi)001:8805: dag dang yang dag par smra ba la zhugs so
NK044(phi)001:8806: shes bskyed de / // de'i tshe 'khor los sgyur
NK044(phi)001:8807: ba grub pa'i don du sngon gyi rabs 'don pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8808: mi stong phrag brgyad cu tsam 'dus so //
NK044(phi)001:8809: de thams cad la rgyal po des zhes byed do //
NK044(phi)001:8810: drang srong dang mi de dag gis 'khor los sgyur
NK044(phi)001:8811: ba'i sngon gyi rabs kyi ngo bo rgyal po'i lugs
NK044(phi)001:8812: kyi bstan bcos smra bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:8813: 'khor los sgyur ba rnams kyi sngon rabs gang gis rgyal srid byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8815: rjes su bstan pa smras so //
NK044(phi)001:8816: rgyal po des kyang drang srong dang mi de dag gis smras pa ltar mnyan te /
NK044(phi)001:8817: 'khor los sgyur ba'i lugs bzhin rgyal srid byed cing
NK044(phi)001:8818: sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed nas
NK044(phi)001:8819: chos kyi rgyal srid rjes su bstan cing tshangs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8820: gnas bzhi skyed la skye bo thams cad kyang tshangs
NK044(phi)001:8821: pa'i gnas bzhi bkod pas thams cad tshangs pa'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:8822: rten du skyes shing rim gyis byang chub chen po
NK044(phi)001:8824: yang sngon gyi tshe ston pa 'di nyid drang srong gser ldan zhes bya bar gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:8825: de sngon gyi gnas shes pa thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:8826: des bdag sngon 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:8827: drang srong mngon shes lnga ldan gzi brjid drag pa
NK044(phi)001:8828: las srog gcod pa spong bas mtho ris kyi lam
NK044(phi)001:8829: 'dzin pa dang / gang nyon mongs zad pa'i lam
NK044(phi)001:8830: 'dzin pa de thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'dzin to
NK044(phi)001:8831: 'dzin pa dang / zhes thos so // thos nas
NK044(phi)001:8832: bdag gis thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes pa
NK044(phi)001:8833: de ni legs shing rab bo snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:8834: thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam sgrub pa'i rgyu ni las dang las kyi rgyu ni nyon mongs pa /
NK044(phi)001:8835: de'i rgyu ni tshul min yid byed la rag las shing /
NK044(phi)001:8836: de ltar las kyis rnam smin gyi dbang po 'grub cing /
NK044(phi)001:8837: tshul bzhin du so sor rig ste nyon mongs med
NK044(phi)001:8838: na las dang rnam smin gyi phung po ldog pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8840: skye bo mang po lam de la btsud do //
NK044(phi)001:8841: de dge rtsa des chos thams cad kyi rig pa rab tu shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:8843: de nas sman dpyad tshe'i rig byed dang /
NK044(phi)001:8844: sems can rnams nad med par bya ba'i bsam pas
NK044(phi)001:8845: yo byad bsag pa'o don du tha snyad kyi chos
NK044(phi)001:8846: lugs dang / bdag nyid kyi yo byad bsag par bya ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:8847: yang dag par bsrung ba'i phyir 'phong gi dpyad bstan to /
NK044(phi)001:8848: de'i rjes su brtsam pa grub par bya ba'i phyir skar ma'i dpyad bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:8849: de nas sdug bsngal ldog cing bde ba thob pa'i phyir thar pa'i shes pa bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:8850: gzhan yang sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir bzo'i gnas dang /
NK044(phi)001:8851: las kyi gnas rnam pa du ma dag dang /
NK044(phi)001:8855: brtag pa sna tshogs dag kyang bstan par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8856: yang rgyal po drang srong srid pa shes pa rtogs pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:8857: de tshor ba po dang 'du byed sogs bye brag thams cad shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:8858: dge ba dang sdig pa shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:8860: 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas thams
NK044(phi)001:8861: cad la bslab shing mkhas par gyur pa de 'di
NK044(phi)001:8862: snyam du / bzo gang la bslabs pas skye 'jig
NK044(phi)001:8863: 'chi ba dang mi dga' ba med pa gzhan yod
NK044(phi)001:8864: snyam du / dam snyam mo // de de ltar
NK044(phi)001:8865: rtog pa na bzo cung zad kyang ma dmigs te
NK044(phi)001:8866: snyam du / dam snyam mo // / bya ba
NK044(phi)001:8867: 'di dag rdza mkhan gyi snod dang 'dra ste sems
NK044(phi)001:8868: can yang med la 'chi ba med pa yang shes
NK044(phi)001:8869: snyam du / dam snyam mo // / so //
NK044(phi)001:8870: gal te sems can mngon par 'du mi byed na
NK044(phi)001:8871: 'chi ba dang skye ba med do snyam nas de
NK044(phi)001:8872: de lta bu'i ting 'dzin thob ste mnyam par bzhag
NK044(phi)001:8873: pas sems can rnams kyi lus tha dad pa rjes
NK044(phi)001:8874: su dran te zhing gi rdul phra mo snyed kyi
NK044(phi)001:8875: sems can re re'i bdag gi ngo bo tha dad
NK044(phi)001:8877: rgyu rkyen gang gis de ltar grub pa'ang dran nas /
NK044(phi)001:8878: gang bdag gi ngo bo mngon par 'grub par mi
NK044(phi)001:8879: 'gyur ba'i shes pa de gang las 'thob snyam pas
NK044(phi)001:8880: / mngon par 'du mi byed pa las gzhan med
NK044(phi)001:8881: par shes nas ma rig pa dang sred pas mngon
NK044(phi)001:8882: par 'du byed pas de ltar 'grub cing /
NK044(phi)001:8883: de med na srid pa mi 'grub par rtogs pas
NK044(phi)001:8884: mkhas pa rnams de ltar ye shes kyi snang ba
NK044(phi)001:8885: skyes nas phyir mi ldog par gyur pa mthong bar
NK044(phi)001:8886: gyur to // yang gar mkhan gyi bu mo 'gro
NK044(phi)001:8887: ba'i dpa' mo zhes bya ba gzugs mchog tu bzang
NK044(phi)001:8888: zhing bro gar la mkhas par gyur pa zhig tu
NK044(phi)001:8889: gyur to // skyes pa'i tshe / skye bo mang
NK044(phi)001:8890: po dag de la 'dus shing lta bas mig 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:8891: pa des tshogs kyi dbus su /
NK044(phi)001:8892: lang tsho 'di dag ri bo'i chu ltar 'gro /
NK044(phi)001:8893: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis chos bstan
NK044(phi)001:8894: pas tshul des skye bo mang po phan bde la
NK044(phi)001:8896: yang sgyu ma mkhan bzo sna tshogs zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:8897: gyur pas skye bo mang po'i mdun du sgyu ma'i
NK044(phi)001:8898: bzo rnam pa sna tshogs bstan cing chos thams cad
NK044(phi)001:8899: sgyu ma lta bur bstan pas sems can mang po'i
NK044(phi)001:8900: don byas so // yang dri za skye bo kun
NK044(phi)001:8901: gyis rtogs pa zhes bya ba pi wam gi rgyud
NK044(phi)001:8902: gcig la rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag 'byung ba'i
NK044(phi)001:8903: rnam pa des skye bo'i tshogs dga' bar byed pa
NK044(phi)001:8904: de gcig pu dben par song nas /
NK044(phi)001:8905: skye bo 'di dag ni pi wam gi sgra 'dis bslus te /
NK044(phi)001:8906: sgra 'di 'gags pa'i chos so zhes ni mi shes so snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:8907: de la tshul bzhin brtags pas snang ba shes shing
NK044(phi)001:8908: mthong bas rtogs pa'i bzod pa thob ste de ltar
NK044(phi)001:8909: chos bstan pas skye bo mang po phyir mi ldog
NK044(phi)001:8910: pa la btsud par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8911: yang sngon gyi tshe ri brag zhig na lcags mgar
NK044(phi)001:8912: zhig 'dug pa la bu mo gzugs bzang ba zhig
NK044(phi)001:8913: yod pa de / rigs gzugs nor gyi phyir mi sbyin gyi /
NK044(phi)001:8914: bdag dang bzo mnyam pa la ster zhes dam bcas
NK044(phi)001:8915: pa de'i khyim du bram ze'i khye'u zhig slong mor
NK044(phi)001:8916: phyin pas bu mo des zas khyer ba la khyod
NK044(phi)001:8917: gzhan la byin tam ma byin zhes dris so //
NK044(phi)001:8918: des bdag gi phas kho bo dang bzo mnyam pa'am
NK044(phi)001:8919: lhag pa la sbyin no zhes zer bas su la'ang
NK044(phi)001:8920: sbyin par daka'o // khyod kyi phas bzo ji ltar shes /
NK044(phi)001:8922: khab kyang chu'i steng du 'phyo ba de ltar shes so //
NK044(phi)001:8923: bram ze khye'u des bdag bu mo 'di don du
NK044(phi)001:8924: mi gnyer mod kyi 'di'i nga rgyal bcag par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:8925: snyam du / lcags mgar gyi mgar spyad g.yar nas
NK044(phi)001:8926: khab sbom po gcig gi mig tu phra mo bdun
NK044(phi)001:8927: bcug kyang chu'i steng na 'phyo ba de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:8928: byas shing lcags mgar de'i khyim du song ste khab
NK044(phi)001:8930: bu mo des khyod ni smyos pa'am sems med pa zhig ste /
NK044(phi)001:8931: gang gi phyir lcags mgar gyi khyim du khab btsong /
NK044(phi)001:8933: kho bo smyos pa sogs min kyang kho bo'i bzo dag sgrub pa'i rnam pa ston par 'dod do //
NK044(phi)001:8937: khab chu'i steng na 'phyo ba shes so //
NK044(phi)001:8938: de nang du bos nas chu bzhag pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8939: khab gcig nas bdun gyi bar du bzhag na 'phyo ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:8940: khab sbom po de bzhag na yang 'phyo ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:8941: de'i mig tu khab bdun bar du bcug na yang chu'i steng na 'phyo bar gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:8942: lcags mgar des 'di ni bdag bas bzo ches lhag
NK044(phi)001:8943: go snyam du bu mo de rgyan thams cad kyis
NK044(phi)001:8945: bram ze'i khye'u des kho bos 'di don du mi
NK044(phi)001:8946: gnyer gyis khyod nga rgyal bcag pa'i phyir bzo nye
NK044(phi)001:8947: bar bstan to zhes smras te bu mo ma blangs
NK044(phi)001:8948: so // de dus kyi lcags mgar ni bcom ldan 'das dang /
NK044(phi)001:8949: lcags mgar cig shos ni kun tu rgyu ma ngu yin la /
NK044(phi)001:8950: bu mo de ni dpe med ma 'di yin te /
NK044(phi)001:8951: da ltar yang 'di phul ba ma bzhes so zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:8952: yang mgar ba legs rtogs zhes bya ba mgar dang
NK044(phi)001:8953: bzo la mkhas pa'i grags pa phyogs bcur rgyas par
NK044(phi)001:8954: gyur pa zhig tu skye ba bzhes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:8955: yang mtshon mgar rgyal sde zhes pa /
NK044(phi)001:8956: bzo la mkhas pa'i phul du byung bar skye ba
NK044(phi)001:8957: bzhes pa'i tshe lhas tshigs su bcad pas bskul nas
NK044(phi)001:8958: / de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas gzigs pa las /
NK044(phi)001:8959: chos thams cad ma skyes par shes pa ni bzo
NK044(phi)001:8960: rnams kyi mchog go zhes pa'i chos thos pas sa'i
NK044(phi)001:8961: phyogs de nyid du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
NK044(phi)001:8963: yang rgyal po drang srong blo gros rgya mtsho zhes
NK044(phi)001:8964: bya ba phyi rol pa'i lam gyis chags bral 'jig
NK044(phi)001:8965: rten la snying brtse ba can zhig tu gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8966: tshe des nags tshal du rlung sogs la phan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:8967: phyir ro drug po gang yin snyam du btsal ba
NK044(phi)001:8968: la / nags tshal gyi lha dag gis thal mo
NK044(phi)001:8969: sbyar nas shing rnams so so'i ro ni 'di dang
NK044(phi)001:8971: de nas nad kun nas ldang ba rlung mkhris bad kan 'dus pa la brtags nas /
NK044(phi)001:8972: de'i gnyen po sbyar ba'i sman dpyad la mkhas par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:8975: gsos na 'tshol ma gsos na 'chi ba gsum du phyes te /
NK044(phi)001:8976: nges par 'chi yang sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bsal ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:8977: ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir chos kyi sman gyis gso bar bya ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:8978: gsos nas 'tsho ba la srog la phan btags pa'i phyir gso bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8979: 'tsho ba la'ang nad kyi tshor ba bsal ba'i phyir gso ba byed de /
NK044(phi)001:8980: de ltar gzhan gyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba bsal bas dus 'da' bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:8981: yang rgyal po med byin zhes bya ba 'byung po
NK044(phi)001:8982: thams cad kyi sgra shes pa la mkhas shing don
NK044(phi)001:8983: sems pa zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:8984: des sgra gang dang gang thos pa de'i don shes de /
NK044(phi)001:8985: thos pa 'di byung na de ci'i phyir don brjod /
NK044(phi)001:8986: ci'i phyiiir dus kyi don brjod /
NK044(phi)001:8987: yang na kha cig brjod kha cig mi brjod snyam
NK044(phi)001:8988: du de ltar shes pa thams cad la stobs dang
NK044(phi)001:8989: stobs ma yin pa rjes su 'gro ste /
NK044(phi)001:8990: bya ba thams cad la sgra yi shes pa 'dis bya ba byas nas ci 'gags sam /
NK044(phi)001:8991: 'on te ma byas 'on te cung zad cig byas nas 'gags sam /
NK044(phi)001:8993: gang zag 'di tsam na shes pa'i snod du 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:8994: ji tsam na nyon mongs pa'i zhi bar nus /
NK044(phi)001:8995: de ltar shes pa de lta bu nges par byung bas /
NK044(phi)001:8996: 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:8997: yang gtso bo blo gros drang po zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:8998: sems can rnams kyi rtsod pa gcod pa la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:8999: pa / so so'i rtog pa tshig tu smras pa
NK044(phi)001:9000: tsam zhig gis rgyal ba dang pham pa shes pa
NK044(phi)001:9002: de lus dang sems kyi spyod lam mdzes pas mthong bas tsam gyis mig 'dzin par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:9003: des chos dang chos min gyi phyogs la bsten pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9004: rtsod pa thams cad rigs pa'i tshul gyis gcod cing
NK044(phi)001:9005: zhi bar byed pa'i blo gros chen po thob bo
NK044(phi)001:9006: // de shes rab kyi stobs kyis dben par nang du yang dag 'jog pa la zhugs pas /
NK044(phi)001:9007: lha'i mig gis sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:9008: 'di ltar 'jig rten pha rol tu 'gro ba de
NK044(phi)001:9009: ji lta bu yin zhes shes rab kyis brtags pas
NK044(phi)001:9010: 'gro 'ong med pa chu zla lta bu'i don mthong
NK044(phi)001:9011: nas tshul de nyid sems can gzhan mang po la
NK044(phi)001:9012: bstan pas dngos po'i de nyid rtogs par byas so
NK044(phi)001:9013: // yang drang srong chos rnam par ston pa zhes
NK044(phi)001:9014: bya ba shes rab gsal zhing brgal brtags la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:9015: pa sems can gyi don la rtog pa zhig tu
NK044(phi)001:9016: gyur pa des nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs
NK044(phi)001:9017: // nas / lung ma bstan pa bcu bzhi po dag gi gnas dang /
NK044(phi)001:9018: bsam gtan dang rtog ge'i sgo nas sngon dang phyi
NK044(phi)001:9019: mthar brten pa'i lta ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi
NK044(phi)001:9020: lugs lta bu so so'i zhe 'dod kyi lta ba
NK044(phi)001:9021: de dag 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i gzhi la brten
NK044(phi)001:9022: par mthong zhing / gzhi bdag ces bya ba de
NK044(phi)001:9023: nyid med par rigs nas lta bar gyur pa de
NK044(phi)001:9024: thams cad bshig pa'i rigs pa yang dag gi lam
NK044(phi)001:9025: nas chos bstan pas sems can dpag tu med pa
NK044(phi)001:9026: phyir mi ldog pa'i lam la bkod do //
NK044(phi)001:9027: yang drang srong shes rab rnyogs pa med pa zhes
NK044(phi)001:9028: bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba phyi rol pa'i lam
NK044(phi)001:9029: gyis chags bral zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9030: gang yod na lta bar gyur pa 'byung la /
NK044(phi)001:9031: med na mi 'byung ba gang yin brtags pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9032: mun pa'i tshogs gsum yod na lta bar gyur pa kun 'byung mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:9034: ci 'das pa'i dus su bdag byung ngam ma byung /
NK044(phi)001:9035: de bzhin da ltar dang ma 'ongs la bsams nas
NK044(phi)001:9036: dpyod cing the tshom za bas don ma rtogs pas
NK044(phi)001:9037: mtha' gnyis la dpyod pa'i lta ba sna tshogs byung
NK044(phi)001:9038: bar rigs nas / de la tshul bzhin dpyad pas shes rab kyi mig skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:9039: 'di la bdag gam sems can med kyang nyon mongs pa las las dang /
NK044(phi)001:9040: de las rnam smin gyi phung po 'grub pa'i rten 'brel gyi chos zab mo mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:9041: rkyen las ma gtogs par chos gang yang skye ba'am 'gag pa med par shes shing /
NK044(phi)001:9042: mi skye ba'i chod la bzod pa thob nas srog
NK044(phi)001:9043: chags grangs med pa ngo bo nyid med pa la
NK044(phi)001:9044: btsud do // yang drang srong shes rab mkhas pa
NK044(phi)001:9045: zhes bya ba chags bral rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:9046: btsud do // pa'i tshe / nang du yang dag
NK044(phi)001:9047: bzhag pa dang 'di snyam du rtog pa skyes te
NK044(phi)001:9048: btsud do // pa'i tshe / / kye ma 'jig rten 'di ni nyon mongs pa yin la /
NK044(phi)001:9049: sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba rab tu mi shes so snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9051: sdug bsngal las nges par 'byung ba'i lam de gang yin snyam pas /
NK044(phi)001:9052: rtog pa las sdug bsngal 'byung zhing rtog pa med na mi 'byung ngo snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9053: de lta bu rtog pa dang 'dod chags thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9054: zad pa'i 'gog pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa
NK044(phi)001:9055: ste zhi zhing gya nom pa'o snyam du bsam mo
NK044(phi)001:9056: // yang mya ngal ma 'das pa'i sems can kha
NK044(phi)001:9057: cig mya ngan las 'das pa yod dam snyam mo
NK044(phi)001:9058: // // de dag tshul bzhin yid la byed pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9059: gal te sems can gang zhig yod na mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba zhig na /
NK044(phi)001:9060: sems can med pas mya ngan las 'das pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:9061: 'on kyang sems can gyi 'du shes rang las byung ba'i sdug bsngal gyi gnod de /
NK044(phi)001:9062: 'gro ba dag myang 'das tshol ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:9063: myang 'das gzhan dang phung po gzhan min te phung po nyid mya ngan las 'das pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:9065: sems can mi dmigs pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa yin snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9066: de ting nge 'dzin las langs nas sgra dbyangs rjes su bsgrags pa /
NK044(phi)001:9067: rang gi kun tu rtog pa ni //
NK044(phi)001:9068: sdug bsngal phung po rab tu 'jug /
NK044(phi)001:9069: kun tu rtog pa med pa ni //
NK044(phi)001:9071: sems can gang yang skye ba med //
NK044(phi)001:9072: chos ni gang yang 'gag pa med //
NK044(phi)001:9073: rnam par rtog las chos gzhan med //
NK044(phi)001:9074: de ni mya ngan 'das zhes bya /
NK044(phi)001:9075: zhes bya ba'i sgra de thos nas sems can dpag
NK044(phi)001:9076: tu med pa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
NK044(phi)001:9077: thob cing bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir
NK044(phi)001:9079: yang bram ze'i khye'u mchog gi blo gros zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9080: bar gyur pa'i tshe drang srong grags 'phags zhes pa
NK044(phi)001:9081: rdzu 'phrul che zhing chags bral zhig byung ba de
NK044(phi)001:9082: las / bram ze'i khye'u 'dun stong dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:9083: 'byung ba chen po bzhi 'byung ba tha mi dad
NK044(phi)001:9084: pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa'i gsang
NK044(phi)001:9085: las / tshig 'don te / de'i tshe bram ze'i
NK044(phi)001:9086: khye'u mchog gi blo gros ni 'khor de dag thams
NK044(phi)001:9087: cad kyi gtso bo byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:9088: bram ze'i khye'u bdun stong po des gsang tshig bzung
NK044(phi)001:9089: ba thams cad de gcig pus dran cing mi ring
NK044(phi)001:9090: bar rig byed thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK044(phi)001:9091: par gyur to // khye'u mchog gi blo gros des
NK044(phi)001:9092: 'di snyam du don gang yin mi shes pa'i gsang
NK044(phi)001:9093: tshig 'dzin pa don med pa 'dis ci bya /
NK044(phi)001:9094: 'di'i don btsal bar bya'o snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:9095: der dgon par 'dug cing nang du mnyam par bzhag ste gsang tshig 'di gang yin /
NK044(phi)001:9096: ci rlung gi dkyil 'khor yin na ni gzhi med cing gnas med pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:9097: rlung dkyil gyis bslangs pa de ni shar la sogs pa'i phyogs su gdags pa med cing /
NK044(phi)001:9098: de la zhi ba dang 'dul ba dang btul ba mi dmigs te /
NK044(phi)001:9099: ci'i phyir sems can med pa'i phyir ro snyam du de ltar brtags nas /
NK044(phi)001:9100: bram ze'i khye'u mkhan po dang bcas pa lam gol bar gnas pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:9101: 'di las nyon mongs 'byung ngo snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9102: de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha dag lus mngon sum bar snang las bstan nas /
NK044(phi)001:9103: de la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
NK044(phi)001:9104: rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9105: kyi rjes su bslabs shing lam khong du chud pa
NK044(phi)001:9106: legs so // lam 'di sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul
NK044(phi)001:9107: las kyang mang ba'i sangs rgyas rnams sangs rgyas nas
NK044(phi)001:9108: sems can dpag tu med pa'i don mdzad de mya
NK044(phi)001:9109: ngan las 'das so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:9110: de ting nge 'dzin las langs nas bram ze'i khye'u
NK044(phi)001:9111: bdun stong mkhan po dang bcas pa la gtam de
NK044(phi)001:9112: smras pas bla med rdzogs byang las phyir mi ldog
NK044(phi)001:9113: par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don mdzad de
NK044(phi)001:9115: byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi blo gros des de
NK044(phi)001:9116: bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos yongs su bzung bar
NK044(phi)001:9117: byas so // yang sngon gyi tshe na ston pa
NK044(phi)001:9118: dben par sbyod ces bya bas sems can rnams 'dod
NK044(phi)001:9119: pa rnams las dben pa thob na /
NK044(phi)001:9120: re zhig 'di las yongs su mya ngan las 'ada'o zhes skye bo mang po de la btsud do //
NK044(phi)001:9121: de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad tshul de la btsud do //
NK044(phi)001:9122: de dag 'dod pa las dben pa mthar phyin to
NK044(phi)001:9123: snyam du 'du shes pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus
NK044(phi)001:9124: byas nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye ba mthong
NK044(phi)001:9125: ba na de dag 'di snyam du /
