NK044(phi)001:9126: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'di ni
NK044(phi)001:9127: chos log pa dang lam log pa'i zhes zer ro
NK044(phi)001:9128: // de dag log par lta ba des der skyes
NK044(phi)001:9129: ma thag tu tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang mi snang
NK044(phi)001:9130: bar sems can dmyal ba chen por ltung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:9131: de bzhin du drang srong rigs mchog ma yin pa zhes bya bas /
NK044(phi)001:9132: bsam gtan gnyis pa thob nas 'di ni phung po
NK044(phi)001:9133: lhag ma med pa'i myang 'das su byed pa yin
NK044(phi)001:9134: no snyam du srog chags 'bum bzod pa de lta
NK044(phi)001:9136: de dag 'od gsal gyi gzhal med khang du skye
NK044(phi)001:9137: bar mthong nas mya ngan las 'das pa med do
NK044(phi)001:9138: snyam du sems pas sems can dmyal ba chen por
NK044(phi)001:9139: lhung ngo // de ltar na dge sbyong dang bram
NK044(phi)001:9140: ze kha cig bsam gtan gyi bde bas thar par
NK044(phi)001:9141: 'dod pa de ni de ltar nges par 'byung ba
NK044(phi)001:9142: lhung ngo // min no // de'i tshe na ston
NK044(phi)001:9143: pa 'di nyid mngon shes lnga dang ldan pa'i bram
NK044(phi)001:9144: ze rnam par lta bas shes pa sna tshogs yod
NK044(phi)001:9145: pa zhes bya bar gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:9146: des sems can rnams de ltar log par bzung bas
NK044(phi)001:9147: sems can dmyal ba chen por lhung ba shes nas
NK044(phi)001:9148: rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs bskyed pas sems can de dag
NK044(phi)001:9149: bsil bar byas nas sgra byung ba /
NK044(phi)001:9150: kye sems can dag mya ngan las 'das pa yod de /
NK044(phi)001:9151: khyod kyis sngon mya ngan las 'das pa ma thos shing /
NK044(phi)001:9152: khyod myang 'das min pa la myang 'das su 'du shes pas des khyed cag dmyal bar skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:9153: khyed cag lta ba 'di thongs dang mya ngan las 'das pa thob bo zhes smras pa thos nas /
NK044(phi)001:9154: de dag sdar gyi lta ba de btang ste /
NK044(phi)001:9155: mya ngan las 'das pa yod pa'i 'du shes skyes
NK044(phi)001:9156: ma thag tu dmyal ba nas 'phos shing ston pa
NK044(phi)001:9157: shes pa sna tshogs yod pa de'i drung du lhags
NK044(phi)001:9158: te / der des chos bstan pas dgra bcom pa thob pa'i bar du byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9159: yang rgyal po'i bu snying rje can zhes bya ba gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9160: 'di ltar 'jig rten na snang ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs dang /
NK044(phi)001:9161: skad dang rigs dang rus dang ming sna tshogs nyid du snang ba'i rgyu ci yin snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9162: da ltar byung ba de shes pa'i dge sbyong dang /
NK044(phi)001:9163: bram ze slob dpon sogs don 'di shes shing the
NK044(phi)001:9164: tshom khrol ba su yod ces phyogs bcur pho nya
NK044(phi)001:9165: bakye'o // de nas gzhon nu de'i pha rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:9166: shin tu gnas pa des gzhon nu bsam gyis mi
NK044(phi)001:9167: khyab pa la sems 'tshol gyis mi khyab pa 'tshol
NK044(phi)001:9168: ba 'dis khyod nyon mongs pa dang 'khrugs par 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:9170: dri ba de'i lan ldon pa med pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:9171: gzhon nu rgyal srid dang 'dod pa'i yon tan la dga' bar byos shig /
NK044(phi)001:9172: don btang ste don med pa sems pa ni nyon
NK044(phi)001:9173: mongs shing ngal ba'i skal bar 'gyur ro zhes smras
NK044(phi)001:9174: pa dang / gzhon nus rgyal po la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:9175: rgyal po chen po mun pa mi snang ba la snang bar ma mdzad cig /
NK044(phi)001:9176: khyod kyi yul na gzugs dang rigs dang blo gros sogs bzang ba dang ngan pa /
NK044(phi)001:9178: de bzhin du bzo dag slob pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9179: dbul ba dag 'bad na longs spyod rnyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9180: nad pa dag bgyi ba dag gis nad las ldang ba dag mchis te /
NK044(phi)001:9181: rnam grangs 'dis na chos de dag gi rgyu ni mchis na de bdag gis mi shes la /
NK044(phi)001:9182: bdag gis mi shes pa de med pa yang ma yin te /
NK044(phi)001:9183: bdag bzo mang po yang mi shes shing /
NK044(phi)001:9184: gang shes pa de bzo gzhan dag mchis pas kyang mi 'tshal to /
NK044(phi)001:9185: rgyal po chen po de shes pa de ni mchis te /
NK044(phi)001:9186: bdag gis shes pa de ma 'tshal to //
NK044(phi)001:9187: de bas na dge sbyong dang bram ze mdzangs pa shes rab can /
NK044(phi)001:9188: kun gyis bkur ba de la zhu bar bagyi'o zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9189: rgyal pos gzhon nu la de bzhin zhus shig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:9190: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:9191: gzhon nu snying rje can nyal ba na bar snang
NK044(phi)001:9192: nas de bazhinana gshegs pa skar 'od ces bya ba
NK044(phi)001:9193: 'jig rten du bzhugs te des zhu ba 'di lung
NK044(phi)001:9194: ston par 'gyur ro zhes sgra thos so //
NK044(phi)001:9196: yab rgyal po la de ltar smras so //
NK044(phi)001:9198: gzhon nu de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od de gang na bzhugs /
NK044(phi)001:9199: der de bzhin gshegs pa des rgyal po shin tu
NK044(phi)001:9200: gnas pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas rdzu 'phrul gyis de
NK044(phi)001:9201: bzhin gshegs pa de nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9202: 'khor dang bzhugs pa'i phyogs snang bar gyur pa de
NK044(phi)001:9203: mthong zhing sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'od kyis zhing thams
NK044(phi)001:9204: cad ldan par snang bar mdzad pa yang mthong nas
NK044(phi)001:9206: gzhon nu de dang rgyal po shin tu gnas pa
NK044(phi)001:9207: sogs srog chags khri phrag drug cu lhan cig tu
NK044(phi)001:9208: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song ste zhu ba
NK044(phi)001:9209: thams cad dris shing khong du chud la bstan bcos
NK044(phi)001:9210: thams cad la mkhas par gyur pa de thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9211: de bzhin gshegs pas byang chub tu lung bstan par
NK044(phi)001:9212: mdzad do // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:9213: mo'u 'gal gyi bu de lta bas na byang chub
NK044(phi)001:9214: sems dpa' bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:9215: zhes dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi rtsom pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK044(phi)001:9216: bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:9218: sems can gyi gnas dang rigs sna tshogs pa ni las kyis byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9219: lan ni nyon mongs dang sems pas bkod pa'i don du blta'o //
NK044(phi)001:9221: yang byang chub sems dpa' 'od yang dag 'phags zhes par gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9222: de nyal ba'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:9223: dang lhan cig gtam yang dag par brjod pa las
NK044(phi)001:9225: des de bzhin gshegs pa thogs med ston zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9226: ba la 'jig rten shes pa dang kun 'byung ba
NK044(phi)001:9228: sangs rgyas des byang chub sems dpa' bla med rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:9229: byang 'dod pas bstan bcos thams cad shes par bya
NK044(phi)001:9231: shes pa khong du chud pa'i phyir rtogs pa la yang brtson par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:9234: gang zag gi tha snyad dang /
NK044(phi)001:9237: gang dag gang du 'gro ba de'i tha snyad dang /
NK044(phi)001:9238: ji tsam du 'jig rten gyi shes pa gang dag
NK044(phi)001:9239: shes pa thams cad la mkhas par bya'o zhes gsungs
NK044(phi)001:9240: pa bzhin du don de dag kun chub par byas
NK044(phi)001:9241: so // yang drang srong phyi ma'i mtha' sgrub pa
NK044(phi)001:9242: la mkhas pa zhes bya ba phyir rol pa'i lam
NK044(phi)001:9243: gyis chags bral du gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9244: des sems can rnam pa sna tshogs 'di ltar las
NK044(phi)001:9245: kyi rgyu las tha dad du snang ba 'di la
NK044(phi)001:9246: 'gro ba tha dad du mi skye bar byed pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9247: rgyu zhig yod dam snyam du sems par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:9248: // des bdag tu rtog pa la gnas nas nyon
NK044(phi)001:9249: mongs pas las 'du byed pas sems can gyi ris
NK044(phi)001:9250: tha dad par skye ba yin na /
NK044(phi)001:9251: bdag gang yin yongs su btsal bar bya'o snyam du dpyad pas /
NK044(phi)001:9252: gzugs bdag yin nam zhes sogs phung po lnga la
NK044(phi)001:9253: rigs pas brtags pas bdag med par khod du chud
NK044(phi)001:9254: do // des de lta bdag dang bdag gi ba med par shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:9256: sems can rnams la bdag dang bdag gi ba med
NK044(phi)001:9257: pa brten nas byung ba'i don bstan pas sems can
NK044(phi)001:9258: dpag tu med pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod
NK044(phi)001:9259: pa thob bo // yang drang srong 'chi ba shes
NK044(phi)001:9260: pa 'gog pa shes pa la mkhas pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9261: ba phyi rol pa'i lam gyis chags bral mngon shes
NK044(phi)001:9262: dang ldan par gyur pa des /
NK044(phi)001:9263: 'dus byas thams cad 'jig par mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:9264: gang mi skye ba dang mi 'gag pa'i chos yod dam snyam du brtags pas /
NK044(phi)001:9265: gang mngon par 'du byed pa de dag 'gag la /
NK044(phi)001:9266: 'du mi byed pa de dag mi 'gag go snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9267: de de ltar so sor rtog pa na mngon par
NK044(phi)001:9268: 'du mi byed pa'i chos thams cad la mngon par
NK044(phi)001:9269: dga' ba zhes bya ba rdo rje lta bu'i ting
NK044(phi)001:9271: sems kyi dbang gis chos thams cad skye zhing 'gag la /
NK044(phi)001:9272: sems ni chos thams cad skyed par byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9274: sems de la brtags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9275: gzugs med cing bstan du med la ngo bo mthong
NK044(phi)001:9276: ba dang bral ba sems kyis sems mthong bar byar
NK044(phi)001:9278: sems 'gog pa rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa de lta bu byung zhing /
NK044(phi)001:9279: sems chags sogs kyi rnam par byung ba de 'gag
NK044(phi)001:9280: pa na yang de'i rgyud 'dra bar 'byung bar shes
NK044(phi)001:9281: nas / sems kyi rgyud thams cad rab tu shes so //
NK044(phi)001:9282: de ltar shes pas nyon mongs pa med cing /
NK044(phi)001:9283: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin du chos
NK044(phi)001:9284: thams cad byang chub las gzhan min par rtogs nas
NK044(phi)001:9285: sems can rnams la de lta bu'i chos bstan pas
NK044(phi)001:9286: sems can dpag tu med pas mi skye ba'i chos
NK044(phi)001:9288: yang rgyal po sngon gyi mtha' shes pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9289: bar gyur pa'i tshe da lta'i bde sdug sogs sngon
NK044(phi)001:9290: gyi las las byung bar shes shing de bskal pa
NK044(phi)001:9291: grangs med par nam yang kun nas dkris pa'i sems
NK044(phi)001:9293: yang sngon bskal pa dpag tu med pa'i pha rol
NK044(phi)001:9294: na de bzhin gshegs pa khrid mdzad ces bya ba
NK044(phi)001:9296: 'dzam bu'i gling gi rgyal po rgyal ba'i sde zhes
NK044(phi)001:9297: bya ba chos dang ldan par gyur pa de la
NK044(phi)001:9298: bu stong yod pa'i thu bo zhi ba'i blo gros
NK044(phi)001:9299: zhes bya bar bcom ldan 'das nyid gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:9300: na chos rgya chen po la mos pa blo gros
NK044(phi)001:9301: shin tu zhib pa de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:9302: pa'i phyir yab rgyal pos gang 'jig rten na dge
NK044(phi)001:9303: sbyong dang bram ze blo gros can thams cad bsdus
NK044(phi)001:9304: te gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:9305: chos kyi gtam bgro ba na /
NK044(phi)001:9306: gzhon nu des 'phags pa dag 'jig rten na gnod pa ci yin zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:9307: de dag kha cig gis dbul ba ni gnod pa'o zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:9308: de bzhin du brnyas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9309: ngag dang mi ldan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9310: blo dang mi ldan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9311: don yongs su nyams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9312: mdza' bshes dang bral ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:9315: rgyal blon la brnyas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9316: chung ma ma gus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9318: byas pa mi bzo ba dag gnod pa'o zhes zer ba la /
NK044(phi)001:9319: gzhon nu zhi ba'i blo gros kyis de dag la
NK044(phi)001:9320: khyed cag gis sdug bsngal dang gnod pa sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:9321: bshad pa rjes su yi rang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:9322: gzhan yang bdag gis 'jig rten na gnod pa gsum
NK044(phi)001:9323: mthong ste rga ba dang na ba dang 'chi ba
NK044(phi)001:9324: gsum po 'dis bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:9326: de las nges par 'byung ba yang mi shes pas /
NK044(phi)001:9327: de bzhin gshegs pa khrid mdzad ni gnod pa gsum
NK044(phi)001:9328: po de las 'da' ba'i chos ston no zhes thos
NK044(phi)001:9330: bdag cag lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung
NK044(phi)001:9331: du 'jig rten na gnod pa du mchis zhu bar
NK044(phi)001:9333: srog chags bye ba phrag drug dang lhan tu sangs
NK044(phi)001:9334: rgyas de'i drung du song ba la 'jig rten gyi
NK044(phi)001:9335: gnod pa rnams dang nges par 'byung ba'i lam dag
NK044(phi)001:9336: bcas par bka' stsal pas lam thams cad la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:9337: par gyur to // yang bram ze zla ba'i smin
NK044(phi)001:9338: ma zhes bya ba bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:9339: pa zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9340: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma
NK044(phi)001:9341: zhes pa'i mtshan so gnyis po mthong bas sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:9342: su the tshom chod pas dad pa'i sems kyis bla
NK044(phi)001:9343: med byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9344: yang rgyal po dge ba'i mig ces bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:9345: pas de bzhin gshegs pa thogs pa med pa'i spyan
NK044(phi)001:9346: las stobs bcu'i basngagasa pa thos nas de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:9347: pa de dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK044(phi)001:9348: bskyed cing / de phyin chad sems can yongs su
NK044(phi)001:9349: smin par bya ba la ngoms pa med cing sems
NK044(phi)001:9350: can grangs gdags par mi nus pa bla med rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:9351: byang la smin par byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9352: yang gtso bo'i bu mya ngan sel zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9353: dge sbyong dang bram ze gang 'jig rten shes pa
NK044(phi)001:9354: kun 'byung shes pa su yod pa de la 'adri'o
NK044(phi)001:9355: snyam pa la lhas bskul nas /
NK044(phi)001:9356: de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i dbyangs sgrogs la zhu
NK044(phi)001:9357: ba zhus shing bla med byang chub tu thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:9358: pa dang / yang drang srong gro bzhin skyes zhes
NK044(phi)001:9359: par gyur pa'i tshe na gang srog chags dang srog
NK044(phi)001:9360: chags ma yin pa de dag ci ltar 'byung zhing
NK044(phi)001:9361: gang du mchi snyam du gzhan la dri snyam pa
NK044(phi)001:9362: pa dang / la / bar snang las de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:9363: gshegs pa 'jig rten sgron ma mi mkhyen pa dang
NK044(phi)001:9364: mi gzigs pa med pa des don 'di 'chad do
NK044(phi)001:9365: zhes thos pas de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus
NK044(phi)001:9366: shing phung po lnga brten nas skye ba 'gro 'ong
NK044(phi)001:9367: med pa'i don bstan pa la dad cing ma 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:9368: pa na 'di lta bu'i ye shes zab mo thob
NK044(phi)001:9369: nas chos ston par smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9370: yang rgyal po 'od byed ces bya ba chos kyi
NK044(phi)001:9371: rgyal po rin chen bdun dang bu stong dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:9372: par gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa
NK044(phi)001:9373: zhi ba la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam dris
NK044(phi)001:9374: shing mchod pa byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9375: yang byang chub sems dpa' bdud rtsi'i dbyangs zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9376: bar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa sgra thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9377: kyi dbyangs la / sems can thams cad sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:9378: las yongs su thar pa'i lam zhus shing sems can
NK044(phi)001:9379: rnams sdug bsngal bton pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9380: yang de bzhin gshegs pa dri med tog gi rim
NK044(phi)001:9381: gro ba dge slong dpal 'byung zhes bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:9382: pa'i tshe na / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du
NK044(phi)001:9383: 'dod pa'i blos smon pa la sangs rgyas de'i 'od
NK044(phi)001:9384: kyis reg pas snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:9385: pa'i tshe na / thob pa dang / yang byang
NK044(phi)001:9386: chub sems dpa' blo gros zab mo zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:9387: gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'grol
NK044(phi)001:9388: bas snyoms par 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos bstan
NK044(phi)001:9389: pa la bsil yab kyis g.yob cing sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:9390: ye shes de lta bu 'dod pas smon lam btab
NK044(phi)001:9391: pa'i tshe na / thob pa dang / ba dang
NK044(phi)001:9392: // yang byang chub sems dpa' dri med gtong zhes
NK044(phi)001:9394: de bzhin gshegs pa rdul dang dri ma dang mun
NK044(phi)001:9395: pa 'joms pa'i ring bsrel la mchod pa lo sngar
NK044(phi)001:9396: byas shing bdag gi ba'i dngos po thams cad gtong
NK044(phi)001:9397: ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa yongs su bzung bar byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:9398: yang byang chub sems dpa' zla ba las lhag pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9399: thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa mi shes pa ston pa la /
NK044(phi)001:9400: tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis nyon mongs pa kun
NK044(phi)001:9401: 'byung ba'i shes pa ji ltar 'thob pa'i tshul zhugs
NK044(phi)001:9402: shing khong du chud par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9403: yang rgyal po chad pa thog tu pheb pa zhes
NK044(phi)001:9404: bya ba la mu stegs kun tu rgyu rnams kyis
NK044(phi)001:9405: da ltar byung ba'i shes pa mngon par grub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9407: rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dri med spyan
NK044(phi)001:9408: la zhu ba yongs su zhus te shes par byas
NK044(phi)001:9409: so // yang bram ze shin tu brtag spyod ces
NK044(phi)001:9410: bya bar gyur pa'i tshe bar snang las kun 'byung
NK044(phi)001:9411: gi chos thams cad 'gog pa'o zhes sgra thos pas
NK044(phi)001:9412: so // / 'dus byas kyi spyod yul thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9413: la mi dga' bar gang mi 'gag pa'i chos de
NK044(phi)001:9415: nye bar mi len pa dang mngon par mi zhen
NK044(phi)001:9416: pa dang yongs su 'dzin pa med par mos shing
NK044(phi)001:9417: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos yongs
NK044(phi)001:9418: su 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa thob
NK044(phi)001:9419: bo // yang de bzhin gshegs pa dri med spyan
NK044(phi)001:9420: tog gi rgyal po'i rim gro ba byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:9421: dpa' seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9422: bo // tshe / de bzhin gshegs pa de la
NK044(phi)001:9423: lo bye ba khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa drug
NK044(phi)001:9424: tu thugs dang mthun pa'i rim gro byas te /
NK044(phi)001:9425: da ltar byung ba shes pa 'gog par 'gyur ba'i zhu ba zhus so //
NK044(phi)001:9426: yang rgyal po 'jigs byed bla ma zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9427: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob cing thams
NK044(phi)001:9428: cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam tshol ba'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:9429: legs bsam blo gros zhes bya ba la de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:9430: gshegs pa'i basngagasa pa brjod nas sems bskyed cing lung
NK044(phi)001:9431: bstan thob par byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9432: yang rgyal po grags 'phags zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9433: 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba'i lam tshol bas
NK044(phi)001:9434: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin mngon par 'phags
NK044(phi)001:9435: pa'i dbyangs la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis bstod
NK044(phi)001:9436: pa dang zhu ba zhus shing don khong du chud
NK044(phi)001:9438: yang blon po rtog pa zhi ba zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9439: rgyal po blo gros rnam dag gis bya ba thams cad de la bcol zhing /
NK044(phi)001:9440: des thams cad la tshul bzhin 'jal 'dum dang 'thab mo zhi bar byed la /
NK044(phi)001:9441: tshig gang smras pa thams cad 'gog par shes nas
NK044(phi)001:9442: rgyal srid 'jigs pa'i skyon thams cad bsal zhing shin
NK044(phi)001:9443: tu 'phel bar byas la rang gzhan la phan bde
NK044(phi)001:9444: byas pa dang / yang rgyal po'i bu ljon pa
NK044(phi)001:9445: zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:9446: dri med tog la dge rtsa bskyed cing bla med
NK044(phi)001:9447: byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9448: yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas med pa'i sgra dbyangs
NK044(phi)001:9449: la lhag par mos pa yang dag par gnas pa
NK044(phi)001:9450: zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:9451: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin gyi char gyis
NK044(phi)001:9452: rgyal srid shin tu tshim pa zhes bya ba sku
NK044(phi)001:9453: tshe'i tshad lo bye bar gyur pa de'i rim gro
NK044(phi)001:9454: ba thugs dang 'thad par gyur nas chos bzung yang
NK044(phi)001:9455: bla med byang chub tu lung bstan ma thob ste
NK044(phi)001:9456: / de byang chub kyi sems la mngon par zhen
NK044(phi)001:9457: pa dang bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang
NK044(phi)001:9458: / / yang de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i bla
NK044(phi)001:9459: ma'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' rig pa dang
NK044(phi)001:9460: ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9461: tshe rabs thams cad 'dul ba'i don du tshor ba dag gi don rtogs te /
NK044(phi)001:9462: rdzu 'phrul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang
NK044(phi)001:9463: bar byas shing yun ring po brjod du med par
NK044(phi)001:9464: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sems can rnams byang chub
NK044(phi)001:9465: tu yongs su smin par byas te /
NK044(phi)001:9466: tshig gi sgo nas sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pas /
NK044(phi)001:9467: sems can 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug
NK044(phi)001:9468: dang cha mnyam par spyod pa rnams kyi nyon mongs
NK044(phi)001:9469: pa thams cad gdul bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9470: yang rgyal po zla sbyin gyi bu mo grangs las
NK044(phi)001:9471: 'das pa zhes bya ba gzugs mchog dang ldan pa
NK044(phi)001:9473: rgyal pos de la khyim thab 'tshol bar 'dod pa la /
NK044(phi)001:9474: de khyim thab mi 'dod par 'dzin pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9475: spang ba la dga' bas chags pa med pa'i chos
NK044(phi)001:9476: la gnas par gyur pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9477: yang rgyal po'i bu mo gzugs mchog tu mdzes pa zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9478: bram ze dka' thub can gzugs mi sdug pa zhig gis bslangs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:9479: rgyal pos bu mo 'dis bram ze 'di 'dod par
NK044(phi)001:9480: mi 'gyur snyam du bsams nas khas len ma nus
NK044(phi)001:9481: pa'i tshe / bu mo des pha'i sbyin pa rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:9482: shing bram ze'i re ba rdzogs pa'i phyir bram ze
NK044(phi)001:9483: de'i chung mar khas blangs te bu bskyed nas slar
NK044(phi)001:9485: yang yongs su rgyu ba 'char kha zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:9486: rtog pa nges par dpyod pa rtsa ba 'byin pa
NK044(phi)001:9487: zhes bya ba zhig 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyud
NK044(phi)001:9488: mngon par shes pa des grong dang grong khyer rnams
NK044(phi)001:9489: su rtsa ba shes pa ston to zhes thos pa
NK044(phi)001:9490: las / kun tu rgya 'char kha 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9491: 'jig rten gyi shes pa 'di lta bu bstan par mi bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:9492: bdag nyid kyis rig par bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9493: dgon par 'jig rten gyi shes pa gang las byung ba'i tshul la dpyad pas /
NK044(phi)001:9494: 'jig rten zhes bya ba phung po lnga 'di tsam la /
NK044(phi)001:9495: 'di dag skyes sogs sdug bsngal can du rigs nas sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed de /
NK044(phi)001:9496: de dag yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir brtson pas mngon par shes pa lnga thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:9497: sems can rnams kyang de lta bu'i chos la bkod par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9498: yang sngon ded dpon snying rje can zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:9499: thabs la mkhas pa zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe tshong
NK044(phi)001:9500: pa lnga brgya dang lhan cig rgya mtshor zhugs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9501: dus su tshong pa de dag la /
NK044(phi)001:9502: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa na
NK044(phi)001:9503: sems can bzang ngan gyi ris sna tshogs 'di lta
NK044(phi)001:9504: bu yod do zhes 'jig rten shes pa'i gtam bstan
NK044(phi)001:9505: pas de dag gi don byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9506: yang sngon gyi tshe ded dpon 'byung po kun la
NK044(phi)001:9507: brtse ba dang ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9508: tshe na tshong ba lnga brgya dang lhan cig rgya
NK044(phi)001:9509: mtshor zhugs pa / chu srin gyi khar gru mid par byed du cha ba'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9510: tshong pa de dag tshangs pa dang dbang phyug dang
NK044(phi)001:9511: skem byed dang chu lha dang dbang po sogs lha
NK044(phi)001:9512: gzhan kun la phyag 'tshol bar byed cing ngu ba
NK044(phi)001:9513: la / ded dpon des 'di dag skyabs ngan pa
NK044(phi)001:9514: la bsten pa ste mgon min pa la mgon du
NK044(phi)001:9515: la / 'dzin pa'o // ji ltar sngon gzugs kyis
NK044(phi)001:9516: 'tsho ba skye bo thams cad rjes su 'jug pa
NK044(phi)001:9517: zhes bya ba gzugs bzang po lta na sdug pa
NK044(phi)001:9518: zhig yod pa des skyes bu thams cad kyi bsam
NK044(phi)001:9519: pa'i rjes su 'jug pas dga' bar byed cing mi
NK044(phi)001:9520: gtsang ba la mi gtsang bar ston /
NK044(phi)001:9521: gtsang ba la gtsang bar ston pa sogs sna tshogs
NK044(phi)001:9522: kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bstan nas sems can smin
NK044(phi)001:9523: par byed kyang de dag de'i ngo bo nyid mi
NK044(phi)001:9525: sems can thams cad las kyi rjes su 'jug pa
NK044(phi)001:9526: la rgyu gzhan dang gzhan du sems par byed cing
NK044(phi)001:9527: 'du byed thams cad la nges pa med pa dang
NK044(phi)001:9529: gal te gtsang bar 'dzin na mi gtsang ba'i mtshan ma la brten par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:9530: de bzhin du mtshan ma spang zhing mtshan med la brten par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:9531: rtag par 'dzin pas 'ching la mi rtag par mthong na thar ro //
NK044(phi)001:9532: de bzhin du bdag bdag med mtshan ma mtshan med /
NK044(phi)001:9533: bde dang sdug bsngal sogs su lta bar sbyar te shes par bya'o snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9534: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mun pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:9535: 'joms pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ba'i
NK044(phi)001:9536: skabs yin pas / ded dpon des tshong pa de
NK044(phi)001:9537: thams cad la sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshol cig
NK044(phi)001:9538: ces smras pas de thams cad kyis de bzhin sangs
NK044(phi)001:9539: rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba lan gsum brjod pa'i sgra
NK044(phi)001:9540: chu srin des thos nas kha btsums te tshong pa
NK044(phi)001:9542: yang bram ze rgyal ba 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:9543: nyes pa dang yon tan gyi gzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:9544: nyon mongs pa dang dge chos las byung bar rang
NK044(phi)001:9545: gi dpyod pas gzhan la rag ma las par shes
NK044(phi)001:9546: nas / dge ba'i chos spel zhing mi dge ba bzlog pas ting nge 'dzin thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:9547: bskal pa 'bum phrag drug cur log par ma lhung zhing sems can gyi don byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9548: yang drang srong 'od bzang zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9549: ral pa'i thor tshugs lnga sogs brtul zhugs kyi bye brag mang po 'dzin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:9550: tsha grang sogs yid la mi byed par lus la
NK044(phi)001:9551: mi ltos pa'i dka' thub rnam pa mang po dpag
NK044(phi)001:9552: tu med pa dang ldan pa /
NK044(phi)001:9553: 'byung po thams cad la mi 'tshe ba /
NK044(phi)001:9554: gzhan gyi bud med la mi 'gro ba /
NK044(phi)001:9557: pha rol gyi sems srung zhing tshig rtsub mi smra ba sogs yon tan dpag med ldan pa /
NK044(phi)001:9558: mngon par shes pa lnga thob pa /
NK044(phi)001:9559: bzo dang las kyi gnas thams cad dang /
NK044(phi)001:9560: chos dang dus dang bdag dang thabs mkhas sogs shes
NK044(phi)001:9561: pa'i khyad par dpag tu med pa dang ldan par
NK044(phi)001:9563: bdag gis shes pa'i khyad par 'di dag shes mod
NK044(phi)001:9564: kyi 'di dag thams cad gang du 'gog par 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:9565: bar / yongs su shes pa'i shes pa de ni mi shes pas /
NK044(phi)001:9566: 'jig rten na dge sbyong dang bram ze gang dag
NK044(phi)001:9567: shes pa 'di la bslabs pa su yod snyam du
NK044(phi)001:9568: / de btsal ba'i phyir slob mos 'tsho ba'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:9569: du mu stegs thams cad kyi drung du song ba
NK044(phi)001:9570: / dang / de slong mo bar rigs nas gdol
NK044(phi)001:9571: ba yan chad dag gis mchod sbyin byed kyang gang
NK044(phi)001:9573: de ma blangs bas slang mo bas 'tsho ba'i sgra phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du grags so //
NK044(phi)001:9574: de'i tshe gangs kyi ri'i rgyal po la sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:9575: mar me mdzad byang chub sems dpa' gyur pa drang
NK044(phi)001:9576: srong kun rig ces bya ba mngon shes lnga dang
NK044(phi)001:9577: ldan pa de 'jig rten thams cad la rtog pa
NK044(phi)001:9578: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
NK044(phi)001:9579: pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sogs kyi spyod
NK044(phi)001:9580: pa thams cad shes pa des /
NK044(phi)001:9581: lha'i mig gis slong mos 'tsho ba 'od bzang mthong nas de'i bsam pa shes pas /
NK044(phi)001:9582: 'dis stobs dang stobs ma yin pa shes pa'i nges
NK044(phi)001:9583: par 'byung bar mi shes pas nyam thag go snyam
NK044(phi)001:9584: du / snying rje bskyed de skyes bu'i lag pa
NK044(phi)001:9585: brkyang bskum tsam gyis gangs ri'i rgyal po las bab
NK044(phi)001:9586: nas 'od bzang gi mdun du bsdad do //
NK044(phi)001:9587: des de la phyag byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:9588: gang gis sems can kun gyi spyod pa shes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9589: stobs dang stobs min shes pa sogs 'byung zhes dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:9590: des chos sbyin ser sna med par byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9591: shes pa dag kyang sdud pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9592: shes ldan rnams la dga' zhing sbyin pas sdud pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9594: shes pa'i ye shes tshol ba sogs las /
NK044(phi)001:9595: ye shes dam pa de 'thob par bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:9596: yang rgyal po 'gog pa mthong ba zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9597: chos gang yang skye bar mthong ba de thams cad 'gog par mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:9598: srog chags du ma la chos bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9599: yang rgyal po ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9600: chos thams cad kyi ro myang ba'i nyes dmigs shes kyang nges par 'byung ba ma shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:9601: nges par 'byung ba shes pa su yod snyam du nyal du song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:9602: sangs rgyas kyi sku mtshan so gnyis dang ldan pas
NK044(phi)001:9603: legs so zhes byin te mngon par byed pa med
NK044(phi)001:9604: pa ni nges par 'byung ba yin la /
NK044(phi)001:9605: 'du byed pa ni nges par mi 'byung ba'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:9606: gsungs pas byang chub kyi lam khong du chud pa
NK044(phi)001:9607: dang / yang sngon gyi dus na bram ze dbang
NK044(phi)001:9608: po'i lha zhes bya ba phyi rol pa'i lam gyis
NK044(phi)001:9609: chags pa dang bral ba rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid
NK044(phi)001:9610: che ba zhig tu gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9611: de la srog chags brgya stong mang po shes pa
NK044(phi)001:9612: sna tshogs la btsud par byas nas de bsam gtan
NK044(phi)001:9613: dang po la brtan nas mngon shes lnga grub bo
NK044(phi)001:9614: // des bsam gtan dang po 'di la ro myong ba yang yod /
NK044(phi)001:9615: ro myong ba la nyes dmigs kyang yod pas /
NK044(phi)001:9616: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa las ni phyi dang nang
NK044(phi)001:9617: gi skye mched thams cad la ro myong ba dang
NK044(phi)001:9619: de bas nges par 'byung ba'i lam ro myong dang
NK044(phi)001:9620: nyes dmigs med pa'ang yod do snyam du tshul bzhin
NK044(phi)001:9621: yid la byas pas mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob
NK044(phi)001:9622: nas / sems can dpag tu med pa mi skye ba'i bzod pa la bkod do //
NK044(phi)001:9623: yang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer mtha' yas kyi
NK044(phi)001:9624: dus su bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po grags bzang
NK044(phi)001:9625: zhes bya bar gyur pas byang chub kyi yan lag
NK044(phi)001:9626: bdun las brtsams te chos bstan pa thos pas mi
NK044(phi)001:9627: skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:9628: la / mo'u 'gal gyi bus gsol pa /
NK044(phi)001:9629: gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pas mar me mdzad
NK044(phi)001:9630: las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo
NK044(phi)001:9631: zhes bshad pa 'di ji ltar blta bar gyi /
NK044(phi)001:9632: bka' stsal pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu gang zag gi
NK044(phi)001:9633: dbang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos ston
NK044(phi)001:9634: pa go bar mdzad do zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:9635: yang rgyal po drang srong lha bzang zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:9636: phyi rol pa'i lam gyis chags bral du gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9637: tshe na / des dben par nang du yang dag 'jog la zhugs nas /
NK044(phi)001:9638: 'di ltar dmyal ba nas srid rtse'i bar gyi sems
NK044(phi)001:9639: can sna tshogs pa 'di dag las nyon gyi dbang
NK044(phi)001:9640: gis skye ba'i bye brag tha dad de nyon mongs
NK044(phi)001:9641: pa med na las 'du mi byed pa shes so
NK044(phi)001:9642: // des srid rtse'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas 'du
NK044(phi)001:9643: shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug thob pas
NK044(phi)001:9644: sdug bsngal 'di dag las dbugs dbyung ba'i lam yod
NK044(phi)001:9645: do snyam nas lam de gzhan la bstan pas bla
NK044(phi)001:9646: med byang chub las mi ldog par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:9647: yang sngon drang srong gdol pa yid 'ong zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9648: ba mngon shes lnga ldan du gyur pa'i tshe na
NK044(phi)001:9649: / chos 'di la ris dang rus su brtag pa med de /
NK044(phi)001:9650: chos nyid la chos su brtag pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9651: chos ma yin pa yang med do snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9652: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du mkhas pa rnams ni mi
NK044(phi)001:9653: skye ba'i chos la mi skrag cing byis pa rnams
NK044(phi)001:9656: chos kyi ngo bo gang yang dmigs su med pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9657: phyir ro zhes sogs chos bstan pas sems can dpag
NK044(phi)001:9658: tu med pa bdag mi skye ba'i chos la bkod
NK044(phi)001:9659: cig bla med byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
NK044(phi)001:9660: byas so // yang de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros dkar ba zhes bya ba byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9661: sangs rgyas de'i sku tshe'i tshad lo bye ba phrag dgu bcur gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:9662: de'i dus na rgyal po mkhas pa'i tshul gyi bu
NK044(phi)001:9663: gzhon nu byang chub sems dpa' ri bong tshig ces
NK044(phi)001:9664: bya ba zhig tu bcom ldan 'das nyid gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9665: tshe / sangs rgyas de'i cho 'phrul chen pos zhing der ngo mtshar ba du ma ston cing /
NK044(phi)001:9666: gzhon nu ri bong tshig gi rmi lam du de
NK044(phi)001:9667: bzhin gshegs pa de 'jig rten du byung bar mthong
NK044(phi)001:9668: bas gzhal du med pa'i dga' ba skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:9669: grong gi mi rnams bsdus nas /
NK044(phi)001:9670: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das blo gros dkar ba nyon
NK044(phi)001:9671: mongs pa rgyu dang bcas pa 'jig pa dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:9672: ston par mdzad pa der 'deng zhes bskul zhing /
NK044(phi)001:9673: bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du song nas phyag byas te /
NK044(phi)001:9674: gdugs tshod la spyan drangs shing sangs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa la bza' bca' dang /
NK044(phi)001:9675: ras bcos bu'i na bza' phul nas bla med byang
NK044(phi)001:9676: chub tu smon lam btab pa bzhin lung bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:9677: thob pa dang / yang drang srong rin po che'i
NK044(phi)001:9678: dpal kun nas 'phags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9679: thob pa dang / tshe / sems can lam gol ba rnams la chos ston cing /
NK044(phi)001:9680: mos pa du ma la zhen pa rnams kyi skyon bstan pa'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:9681: mos pa du ma shes pa 'gog pa yang dag
NK044(phi)001:9682: par rab tu ston cing chos de dang rang gi
NK044(phi)001:9683: mos la'ang lhag par chags par mi byed par slu
NK044(phi)001:9684: ba'i chos can du bstan pas /
NK044(phi)001:9685: sems can tshad med pa sdug bsngal las thar bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9686: yang byang chub sems dpa' sa 'dzin zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:9687: yon tan dpag med ldan zhing dbang po rno ba
NK044(phi)001:9688: / sems re re bskyed pas bskal pa grangs med pa'i dge rtsa 'du byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:9689: sems re re bskyed pas sems can grangs med pa theg gsum la 'god par gyur pa des /
NK044(phi)001:9690: de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sprin gyi char rab
NK044(phi)001:9691: tu 'bebs pa'i 'khor 'di dag lung bstan par mdzad
NK044(phi)001:9692: na snyam pa'i mod la sems can de dag rang
NK044(phi)001:9693: rang ji ltar smon pa ltar lung stan par mdzad
NK044(phi)001:9694: pa dang / yang byang chub sems dpa' nor bu
NK044(phi)001:9695: 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:9696: pa nye bar zhi 'phags zhes bya ba'i rim gro
NK044(phi)001:9697: bar gyur te thugs dang 'thad pa dang mngon shes
NK044(phi)001:9698: lnga bsgrubs pas pha rol gyi sems shes shing /
NK044(phi)001:9699: de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mos pa dang khams sna
NK044(phi)001:9700: tshogs mkhyen pa dang rjes su mthun pa thob pas
NK044(phi)001:9701: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang de'i spyod yul dang mthun
NK044(phi)001:9702: pa'i mdzad pa mdzad par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:9703: yang byang chub sems dpa' chu lha zhes pa khyim na gnas par gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9704: de bzhin gshegs pa spyan mdzes la mos pa sna
NK044(phi)001:9705: tshogs 'gog pa'i lam zhus pas de phyiin chad yul
NK044(phi)001:9706: de dag yongs su shes pas skyon gang yang ma
NK044(phi)001:9708: yang byang chub sems dpa' dri med zla ba zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9709: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub tu sgrol
NK044(phi)001:9710: ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba bskal pa grangs
NK044(phi)001:9711: med par bzhugs te theg pa chen po kho nas
NK044(phi)001:9712: sems can dpag tu med pa phyir mi ldog par
NK044(phi)001:9713: bkod nas mya ngan las 'das pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9714: der byang chub sems dpa' lha'i zla ba zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:9715: bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra mo snyed
NK044(phi)001:9716: kyi sems can bla med byang chub la bkod nas
NK044(phi)001:9718: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' dri med zla ba
NK044(phi)001:9719: de yang lha'i zla ba des yongs su smin par
NK044(phi)001:9720: byas pa la de 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9721: gang byang chub sems dpa' lha'i zla ba 'di sems
NK044(phi)001:9722: can tshad med pa bla med byang chub tu smin
NK044(phi)001:9723: par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi rgyud yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:9724: spel na bdag gis kyang de'i rjes su bslab bo
NK044(phi)001:9725: snyam du des phyogs bcur 'jig rten de'i sems can
NK044(phi)001:9726: thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta
NK044(phi)001:9727: bar lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9728: sprul pa mngon par sprul te /
NK044(phi)001:9729: zhing de'i sems can ji snyed pa yun mi ring bar theg pa gsum la smin par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9731: sems can thams cad kyi mos pa sna tshogs shes pa thob bo //
NK044(phi)001:9732: yang byang chub sems dpa' shugs mtshungs pa med pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9733: de bzhin gshegs pa sman gyi rgyal po'i rim gro ba /
NK044(phi)001:9734: don dang chos dang dus dang gang zag shes pa
NK044(phi)001:9735: sogs dang bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu
NK044(phi)001:9736: phyin par gyur pa des de bzhin gshegs pa de
NK044(phi)001:9737: la dbang po shes pa sogs zhus pa lung bstan
NK044(phi)001:9738: pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
NK044(phi)001:9739: gyur to // yang bram ze rgyal ba'i lha zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9740: des las bdag gir byas pa la gzhigs nas bdag
NK044(phi)001:9741: gis dge mi dge lung ma bstan pa'i las ci
NK044(phi)001:9742: zhig 'dus byas so snyam du brtags te /
NK044(phi)001:9743: dge ba'i las las 'du byed cing dbang po gang
NK044(phi)001:9744: gis las mngon par 'du byed pa yang shes la
NK044(phi)001:9745: / gal te 'dod chags sogs skyes pa na yang
NK044(phi)001:9746: dbang po che 'bring chung ngur phye nas nyon mongs
NK044(phi)001:9747: pa de dag bzlog par byas pas bskal pa brgyad
NK044(phi)001:9748: cur log par lhung bar ma gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:9749: yang rgyal po zla ba'i lha zhes pa'i bu mo
NK044(phi)001:9750: zla ba'i lha mo zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:9751: / de mkhas shing yid gzhungs pas /
NK044(phi)001:9752: rgyal po'i bya ba byed cing rgyal srid rjes su skyong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:9753: de nas rgyal po zla ba'i lha des bu mo la /
NK044(phi)001:9754: rgyu gang gis dbang po shes pa kun 'byung ba
NK044(phi)001:9755: shes pa yang dag 'thob ces dris pa la bu
NK044(phi)001:9757: dge sbyong dang bram ze tshul khrims ldan zhing mang
NK044(phi)001:9758: du thos pa rnams bsnyen bkur bgyis na 'grub ste
NK044(phi)001:9759: / shes pa de mngon par 'du bgyi zhing shes
NK044(phi)001:9760: pa de la slob par 'gyur ro zhes smras pas
NK044(phi)001:9761: / / rgyal po de slong mo pa rnams la
NK044(phi)001:9762: mgu zhing yi rangs te dad pa mi phyed pa
NK044(phi)001:9763: / / thob bo // yang drang srong kun 'byung
NK044(phi)001:9764: zhes pa mngon shes lnga ldan du gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:9765: / / thob bo // / de tshal gyi nang na dka' thub byed pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9766: shes pa gang gis dbang po 'gags shing yang mi skye bar 'gyur snyam bsams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9767: 'phags pa'i shes pa gang gis dbang po 'gag pa yongs su shes te /
NK044(phi)001:9768: dbang po shes pa'i 'gog pa gang mi skye ba ste /
NK044(phi)001:9769: dper na mi mgo bcad pa las mgo phyir mi
NK044(phi)001:9770: skye ba bzhin du dbang po 'gag pa las yang
NK044(phi)001:9771: dbang po mi skye de dbang po shes pa 'gog
NK044(phi)001:9772: pa yin no snyam nas de shes pa de lta
NK044(phi)001:9773: bus dbang po yongs su shes par 'dod na yang
NK044(phi)001:9774: dbang po shes pa de ma rnyed nas /
NK044(phi)001:9775: shes pa de lta bu btsal ba'i phyir dge sbyong
NK044(phi)001:9776: dang bram ze don dang bya ba nyung ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:9777: kyi thad du song nas dris kyang ma rnyed do
NK044(phi)001:9778: // des bdag nyid kyis shes pa bskyed de btsal bar bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9779: gtong bar dka' ba dpag tu med pa btang ste
NK044(phi)001:9780: mgo dang mig gi bar btang yang shes pa de
NK044(phi)001:9781: ma rnyed do // de ltar dka' bas btsal ba
NK044(phi)001:9782: de dag gdod 'phags pa'i lam las shes pa de
NK044(phi)001:9783: ma rnyed do // rnyed do // gzhan yang de
NK044(phi)001:9784: lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyir du bzhon ba'i glang
NK044(phi)001:9785: po che dang rta dang shing rta dang rkang thang
NK044(phi)001:9786: dpag tu med pa btang ba sogs dge ba'i rtsa
NK044(phi)001:9787: ba dpag tu med pa bskyed de /
NK044(phi)001:9788: dge rtsa de dag gzugs can du gyur na 'jig
NK044(phi)001:9789: rten gyi khams gang g+aa'i klung gi bye ma snyed
NK044(phi)001:9790: du yang mi shong ngo zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:9791: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na drang srong blo gros gtsang ma zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9792: nyon mongs pa gang skyes pa thams cad la mi
NK044(phi)001:9793: gtsang ba'i 'du shes su gyur nas myur du spong
NK044(phi)001:9794: zhing 'dor bar byed pas yun mi ring bar nyon
NK044(phi)001:9795: mongs pa thams cad la shin tu mi spyod par
NK044(phi)001:9796: gyur te / dag cing rnam par byang ba'i phyogs la gnas par gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:9797: lha la sogs pa thams cad kyang de la gzhol bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:9798: des skye bo thams cad las bdag gir bya ba'i
NK044(phi)001:9799: shes pas btsud cing shi nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:9800: du skyes so // yang drang srong lam byin zhes
NK044(phi)001:9801: bya bar gyur pa'i tshe sa'i mtha' rgya mtshor bcas
NK044(phi)001:9802: pa btang ste bas mthar rab tu byung nas /
NK044(phi)001:9803: shing ljon pa zhig la rtog cing 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:9804: shing ljon pa 'di yun mi ring bar sa la
NK044(phi)001:9805: lhung bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du bsags pa thams
NK044(phi)001:9807: mtho ba dag lhung ba yin na /
NK044(phi)001:9808: gang mtho ba las mi lhung ba'i thabs gang zhig yod snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9810: gang mi mtho ba de ni mi lhung ngo snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9811: yang gang nga rgyal gyis mtho bar 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:9812: nga rgyal med na mtho ba med do snyam nas nga rgyal spang pa'i phyir chos ston cing /
NK044(phi)001:9813: snying rje dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzhan la dge
NK044(phi)001:9814: bcu'i lam yang dag par bstan pas de dag tshangs
NK044(phi)001:9816: yang drang srong shin tu khrid byed ces pa phyi
NK044(phi)001:9817: rol pa'i lam gyis chags pa la mngon shes lnga
NK044(phi)001:9819: sems can 'di dag skye ba rigs rus tha dad pa'i rgyu gang yin brtags pas /
NK044(phi)001:9820: nyon mongs pa las las dang /
NK044(phi)001:9822: de'i rtsa ba bdag tu zhen pa la thub par shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:9823: bdag med pa'i bzod pa thob cing sems can grangs med pa lam de la btsud par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9824: yang drang srong gnas 'gog pa la mkhas pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9825: rang bzhin med pa'i chos ma shes pas sems can
NK044(phi)001:9826: rnams sdug bsngal ba'o snyam du shes shing sems can
NK044(phi)001:9827: grangs med de la btsud do //
NK044(phi)001:9828: yang rgyal po sa 'dzin zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9829: tshe sems can sdug bsngal can du ma mthong ba
NK044(phi)001:9830: sdig pa'i las kyis de ltar gyur par rtogs nas
NK044(phi)001:9831: / lus la mngon zhen med pa dang mi gtsang
NK044(phi)001:9832: ba'i 'du shes zhog ces chos bstan pas sems can
NK044(phi)001:9833: grangs med pa phyir mi ldog pa la btsud do
NK044(phi)001:9834: / // yang sngon byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi
NK044(phi)001:9835: stobs mi dman pa can zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9836: / // tshe na / de bzhin gshegs pa bdud
NK044(phi)001:9837: rtsi'i thigs pa'i rgyal po'i drung du song bas chos
NK044(phi)001:9838: thams cad skye 'gag med pa'i don la bzod pa
NK044(phi)001:9839: thob pa la de bzhin gshegs pas legs so gnang
NK044(phi)001:9840: / // tshe na / ba dang // yang drang
NK044(phi)001:9841: srong shes pa dpa' ba zhes bya bar gyur pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9843: bstan bcos thams cad khong du chud pa 'jigs pa
NK044(phi)001:9845: med pa des / zag pa thams cad ma skyes
NK044(phi)001:9847: phung khams skye mched dbang po bden pa rnams 'gog
NK044(phi)001:9848: par bya ba'i phyir zhugs pa ni gnad yin la
NK044(phi)001:9849: / gang gnad shes pas ni mkhas pa'i bya ba byas pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:9850: nyom mongs pa las las dang /
NK044(phi)001:9852: gnad bcom na nyon mongs pa mi 'jug pas srid
NK044(phi)001:9853: pa'i rgyun bcad par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams zhing
NK044(phi)001:9854: ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
NK044(phi)001:9855: kye ma gnad 'di bcom na bde'i zhes ched du
NK044(phi)001:9856: brjod pa lan gsum brjod pa'i sgra de phyogs bzhir
NK044(phi)001:9857: rlung gis thogs pa med par song bas srog chags
NK044(phi)001:9858: dpag tu med pas thos nas nyon mongs pa'i gnad
NK044(phi)001:9859: bcom pa'i phyir zhugs shing bla med rdzogs byang las
NK044(phi)001:9861: yang drang srong kun tu mig ces bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:9862: pa'i tshe de sgo gang dang gang nas lta ba
NK044(phi)001:9863: de dang de'i don nyid la lta ba de tsam
NK044(phi)001:9864: gyis lan mang du gnas nas sems can rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:9865: bzo yi gnas rtsom pa la rnam par dpyad de
NK044(phi)001:9866: sems can rnams bde ba'i phyir mi dge ba dang
NK044(phi)001:9867: / zag bcas kyi dge ba brtsams pas mtho ris dang ngan song du skyes la /
NK044(phi)001:9868: mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyir zag med kyi dge
NK044(phi)001:9869: ba byed pa ni srid pa'i rgyu ma yin no
NK044(phi)001:9870: snyam du / ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
NK044(phi)001:9871: chos thams cad la byed pa med pa ni bde
NK044(phi)001:9872: ba ste de'i rnam par med do zhes sgra dbyangs
NK044(phi)001:9873: rjes su bsgrags pa phyogs bzhi rlung gis khyer nas
NK044(phi)001:9874: thos pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob
NK044(phi)001:9875: ste bla med byang chub las phyir mi ldog par
NK044(phi)001:9876: gyur to // yang sngon rgyal po sems can thams
NK044(phi)001:9877: cad kyi rjes su 'jug pa zhes bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:9878: gyur to // pa'i tshe na / de sems can
NK044(phi)001:9879: rnams kyi dbang po la rtog mkhas par gyur te
NK044(phi)001:9880: gyur to // pa'i tshe na / / sems can
NK044(phi)001:9881: gang dag gzugs la chags pas gdungs shing ngan song
NK044(phi)001:9882: du gzhol ba rnams la mi gtsang ba'i phung po
NK044(phi)001:9883: chags nas 'khor bar rgyu ba mi shes pa'o snyam
NK044(phi)001:9884: gyur to // pa'i tshe na / / du / mi gtsang ba'i chos ston to //
NK044(phi)001:9885: mi gtsang bar blo zhugs nas chos rnams kyi ngo
NK044(phi)001:9886: bo nyid la blo sbyar bas sems can dpag tu
NK044(phi)001:9887: med pa 'dod chags dang bral te tshangs pa'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:9888: rten du skye bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:9889: yang sngon gyi tshe drang srong chos la nges pa
NK044(phi)001:9890: zhes bya ba phyi rol ba'i lam gyis chags bral
NK044(phi)001:9891: zhig tu gyur pa des 'dod pa'i zag pa shes
NK044(phi)001:9892: pas me long gi gzugs brnyan ltar dngos po rnams
NK044(phi)001:9893: yang dag pa ma yin par shes nas mngon shes
NK044(phi)001:9894: lnga mngon du byas shing bzod pa de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:9895: la sems can dpag tu med pa btsud par byas
NK044(phi)001:9896: so // yang drang srong ud dz+ya dang ta zhes
NK044(phi)001:9897: pa rdzu 'phrul dang mthu dang gzi brjid che bar
NK044(phi)001:9898: so // gyur pa des / bdag gis rtogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:9899: chos 'di dag las gong mar gyur cing ches gya
NK044(phi)001:9900: nom pa gang yod dam zhes brtags pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9901: bdag gis rtogs pa de dag ni 'gag pa'i chos so //
NK044(phi)001:9902: chos gang 'gag pa med pa de ni ches gya nom pa yin la /
NK044(phi)001:9903: gang skyes pa de ni 'gag pa'i chos yin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:9904: gang mi skye pa de ni 'gag pa med pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:9905: mi skye ba de gang yin snyam pa'i tshe //
NK044(phi)001:9906: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis ma skyes pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:9907: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o snyam du tshul bzhin
NK044(phi)001:9908: so sor brtags pas mi skye ba'i don la bzod
NK044(phi)001:9909: pa thob ste / sems can dpag tu med pa de la btsud do //
NK044(phi)001:9910: yang drang srong lhag mthong spyod pa zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:9911: phyi rol pa'i chags bral rdzu 'phrul che bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:9912: pa na / 'dod pa'i zag pa 'byung ba'i rgyu dang rang bzhin la brtags pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9913: bdag med par rig nas mngon shes lnga yang thob
NK044(phi)001:9914: la sems can dpag med bzod pa de la btsud
NK044(phi)001:9915: do // yang gtso bo'i bu tsan dan zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9916: de 'di snyam du 'di ltar lam mam mya ngan
NK044(phi)001:9917: las 'das pa la 'dzin pa'i dngos po cung zad
NK044(phi)001:9918: 'dzin kyang mngon par 'tshang rgya mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:9919: de bas na thams cad du 'gro ba'i lam shes
NK044(phi)001:9920: pa la mngon par zhen pa med par bya ste
NK044(phi)001:9921: / ji ltar gzings la brten te pha rol tu phyin nas gzings 'dor ltar /
NK044(phi)001:9922: rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam shes pa la'ang /
NK044(phi)001:9923: der blang ba'i 'du shes dor bar bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:9924: ji ltar 'dzad pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral bar lta bas /
NK044(phi)001:9925: chos thams cad gzings lta bur yongs su mthong bar
NK044(phi)001:9926: 'gyur ro snyam du rtogs nas tshul de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:9927: bstan pas sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byas
NK044(phi)001:9928: so // de bzhin du srid pa'i zag pa kun
NK044(phi)001:9929: 'byung bar shes par bya ba'i don du tshul bzhin
NK044(phi)001:9930: brtags pas yang dag pa'i lam skye pa drang srong
NK044(phi)001:9931: srid pa la dga' ba sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:9932: drang srong srid pa zhi byed la sogs pa du mar skye ba bzhes te /
NK044(phi)001:9933: yang dag pa'i lam shes rab kyis bskyed nas gzhan
NK044(phi)001:9934: dag phyir mi ldog par byas pa ye shes rgyas
NK044(phi)001:9935: pa'i mdo las gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:9936: yang sngon gyi tshe drang srong rig byed shes pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:9937: de bstan bcos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don thams cad rig pa /
NK044(phi)001:9938: rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid che ba /
NK044(phi)001:9939: phyi rol pa'i lam gyis chags bral du gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:9940: de'i tshe tshad lo stong phrag dgu bcur gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:9941: de lo stong phrag brgyad cur nam yang glo sa la ma phab cing /
NK044(phi)001:9942: nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid ma log ste /
NK044(phi)001:9943: gzhan du sdug ba sngal 'di dag gang las byung zhes sems pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9944: mi shes pa'i dbang las gzhan min te /
NK044(phi)001:9945: mi shes pa'i dbang gis 'khor ba rgyun chags par byung gis /
NK044(phi)001:9946: shes shing mthong na ni 'khor ba ldog go snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9947: de ltar tshul bzhin rtog pa na /
NK044(phi)001:9948: gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lta bye ba phrag brgyad
NK044(phi)001:9949: cu steng gi bar snang la 'khod nas ched du
NK044(phi)001:9950: brjod pa 'di lan gsum brjod de /
NK044(phi)001:9951: kye ma seng ge seng ge che //
NK044(phi)001:9952: sems can seng ge 'jigs pa med //
NK044(phi)001:9953: seng ge bsam pa rnam par sems //
NK044(phi)001:9956: lha ni bye ba brgyad cu dag /
NK044(phi)001:9957: 'jigs med seng ge sgra sgrogs la //
NK044(phi)001:9958: thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal byed //
NK044(phi)001:9959: phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas zhing //
NK044(phi)001:9960: dpag tu med pa thams cad du //
NK044(phi)001:9961: khyod kyi blo yi snang ba btang //
NK044(phi)001:9962: khyod kyis zhing kun sbyang ba yin //
NK044(phi)001:9963: glang po chen po cang shes pa //
NK044(phi)001:9964: thub par dkar zhing bsnyen par dka' //
NK044(phi)001:9965: sems can kun gyi 'dren pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:9966: rkang gnyis dam pa mchog tu 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:9967: ji ltar de dag sngon sangs rgyas //
NK044(phi)001:9968: 'dren mngon yang dag sangs rgyas pa //
NK044(phi)001:9969: 'dren pa khyod la yod pas na //
NK044(phi)001:9970: gang zag mchog ni sangs rgya 'thob //
NK044(phi)001:9971: de'i tshe sems mnyam par bzhag nas 'di snyam du 'dis ci tsam zhig snang bar gyur snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:9972: de la gnas gtsang ma'i lha de dag gis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:9973: grogs po dag khyod kyi snang ba 'dis phyogs bcu'i
NK044(phi)001:9974: 'jig rten sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa
NK044(phi)001:9976: de thos nas ji lta bu'i dge ba'i shugs thob
NK044(phi)001:9977: pas nam mkha' la ta la bdun srid du 'phags
NK044(phi)001:9978: nas / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kha cig sku btsas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:9979: de bzhin du kha cig gom pa 'dor ba /
NK044(phi)001:9984: phung po lhag med du mya ngan las 'das pa rnams mthong zhing /
NK044(phi)001:9985: sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos ston pa yang thos nas /
NK044(phi)001:9986: gnas gtsang ma'i lha de dag la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:9987: grogs po sngon gyi 'khor ba yi //
NK044(phi)001:9988: mu ni 'tshal bar ma gyur pas //
NK044(phi)001:9989: bdag cag rgyud 'di skyo ba yis //
NK044(phi)001:9990: byang chub zhi ba yongs su spang //
NK044(phi)001:9991: byang chub mchog gi don gyi phyir //
NK044(phi)001:9992: bdag cag go cha 'di yang bsgo //
NK044(phi)001:9993: zhes sogs tshigs su bcad pa brjod do //
NK044(phi)001:9994: de'i snang bas reg pas srog chags dpag tu med pa phyir mi ldog pa la bkod do //
NK044(phi)001:9995: yang sngon drang srong dkar po la gnas pa zhes bya bar gyur ba'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:9996: de dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:9997: byang chub sems dpas ci zhig bslabs na dge ba'i
NK044(phi)001:9998: chos dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges par
NK044(phi)001:9999: 'byung snyam mo // yang chos gang yang byed pa
NK044(phi)001:10000: med pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis nges
NK044(phi)001:10001: 'byung snyam mo // par 'gyur ro // de ci'i phyir na /
NK044(phi)001:10002: chos thams cad ni byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir byas pa ma yin no snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:10003: de ting nge 'dzin de las langs te 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:10004: du rgyu zhing byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir byas
NK044(phi)001:10005: pa min pa'i chos bstan pas srog chags dpag med
NK044(phi)001:10006: kyis thog nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
NK044(phi)001:10008: yang drang srong shes pa thogs pa med pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:10009: de ngo bo nyid kun mi dmigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan par gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:10010: yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral ba
NK044(phi)001:10011: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas bar gyi
NK044(phi)001:10012: bskal ba nyi shu rtsa bzhir /
NK044(phi)001:10013: rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dag kun tu bsten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas /
NK044(phi)001:10014: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa rdul phra mo rnyed du rgyu zhing /
NK044(phi)001:10015: ngo bo nyid thams cad mi dmigs pa'i ting nge
NK044(phi)001:10016: 'dzin bar gyi bskal pa nyi shur bstan pas sems
NK044(phi)001:10017: can dpag tu med pa mi skye ba'i chos kyis
NK044(phi)001:10019: yang drang srong sgrib pa med par shes pa mthong ba zhes bya ba /
NK044(phi)001:10020: phyi rol pa'i lam gyis chags bral rdzu 'phrul dang mthu che bar gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:10023: sgrib pa ni gang yin snyam du rtog pa na /
NK044(phi)001:10025: chos ni gang yang med pa /
NK044(phi)001:10026: chos kyi sgrib pa gang yang med do //
NK044(phi)001:10028: chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba yin te /
NK044(phi)001:10029: dper na nam mkha' la nam mkhas mi sgrib pa
NK044(phi)001:10030: bzhin te nam mkha' ni ngo bo med pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:10031: ro snyam nas / ting nge 'dzin de las langs te /
NK044(phi)001:10032: grogs po dag chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:10033: chos gang zhig chos gang la yang sgrib pa med do zhes bsgrags so //
NK044(phi)001:10034: de ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid dang
NK044(phi)001:10035: bral ba yin no zhes pa'i sgra de phyogs bzhir
NK044(phi)001:10036: rlung gis thogs pa med par khyer te /
NK044(phi)001:10037: sgra de sems can dpag tu me dpas thos nas
NK044(phi)001:10038: thams cad ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i ting nge
NK044(phi)001:10039: 'dzin thob par gyur te mi skye ba'i chos la
NK044(phi)001:10041: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po dgra nges par bcom
NK044(phi)001:10042: pa'i yul du de bzhin gshegs pa bde mdzad ces
NK044(phi)001:10044: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:10045: 'das nyid byang chub sems dpa' mos pa'i stobs dang
NK044(phi)001:10046: ldan pa zhes bya bar gyur ba des theg pa
NK044(phi)001:10047: chen po'i basngagasa pa brjod par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:10048: der 'khor bar yun tu gnas mi 'dod pas nyan
NK044(phi)001:10049: thos kyi theg pa can rnams sngon gyi mtha' mi
NK044(phi)001:10050: mngon par gyur pa'i 'khor ba 'di su zhig spro
NK044(phi)001:10051: zhes theg chen pa rnams dang chos dang mthun par
NK044(phi)001:10053: theg pa chen po bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa
NK044(phi)001:10054: khyed cag sngon gyi mtha' yun ring por sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:10056: de dag na re mi shes so //
NK044(phi)001:10057: smras pa khyed cag gang gi tshe yongs su bzung
NK044(phi)001:10058: ba dang bcas pa rnyed pa na de'i tshe 'jigs
NK044(phi)001:10059: sam / khyed cag spro ba chen po ma byas pa la rtog la /
NK044(phi)001:10060: byas pa la ni mi rtog /
NK044(phi)001:10061: tshe dang ldan pa dag byas pa btang nas ma
NK044(phi)001:10062: byas pa la rtog pa di ni 'jigs par 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:10063: / gang zhig byas pa la rtog cing ma byas
NK044(phi)001:10064: pa la ma yin pa de 'di snyam du sems
NK044(phi)001:10065: / te / bdag gis mang du byas so //
NK044(phi)001:10066: des byas pa rtog pa de ni 'jigs pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:10067: tshe dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'di ltar 'tshal te /
NK044(phi)001:10068: byas pa byas pa la yongs su brtag par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:10069: de ltar brtag pa de ni bdag gis mang du byas so zhes mi mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:10070: tshe dang ldan pa dag sngon byung ba'i dus zhig
NK044(phi)001:10071: na drang srong rta dmar zhes bya bas 'di snyam
NK044(phi)001:10072: du 'jig rten gyi mthar song nas 'chi ba'i dus
NK044(phi)001:10073: bya'o snyam du / gom pa re res ri rab kyi rtse mo'i 'dor te /
NK044(phi)001:10074: rdzu 'phrul gyis song yang 'jig rten gyi mthar ma phyin par 'chi ba'i dus byas so //
NK044(phi)001:10075: tshe dang ldan pa dag rkang pas 'jig rten gyi
NK044(phi)001:10076: mthar 'agro'o zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis mi gsung ste
NK044(phi)001:10077: / ye shes kyis 'jig rten gyi mthar 'agro'o //
NK044(phi)001:10078: gang khyed ma 'ongs pa'i sdug bsngal du 'du shes nas sdug bsngal bar sems kyi /
NK044(phi)001:10079: byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag sred pa
NK044(phi)001:10080: zad pa'i mthar 'gro bar byed kyi 'jig rten gyi
NK044(phi)001:10081: mtha' 'dogs par ni mi byed pas de dag la
NK044(phi)001:10082: sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes med do zhes smras kyang
NK044(phi)001:10083: / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i dge slong mang po de dag bzlog par ma nus te /
NK044(phi)001:10084: de ci'i phyir na dge slong de dag la mos
NK044(phi)001:10085: pa'i stobs med pas bla med rdzogs byang bsgrub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10087: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi
NK044(phi)001:10088: don byed par 'dod pas mos pa'i stobs la brtson
NK044(phi)001:10090: yang sngon rgyal po dngos po nges par 'dzin pa
NK044(phi)001:10091: zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa des dngos po
NK044(phi)001:10092: thams cad ni gang gis bya ba de de ltar
NK044(phi)001:10093: gyur te gzhan du ma yin pas nges pa can
NK044(phi)001:10095: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid rgyal po de'i blon
NK044(phi)001:10096: po chos la spyod pa zhes bya ba mdzangs shing
NK044(phi)001:10097: dpyod pa bya ba dang bya ba ma yin pa
NK044(phi)001:10098: la mkhas pa / rgyal srid yongs su skyong ba /
NK044(phi)001:10099: sangs rgyas dpag med la bsnyen bkur byas pa theg chen la gnas pa zhig tu gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:10100: des rgyal po de dngos po rnams mtha' gcig tu
NK044(phi)001:10101: nges par 'dzin pa de las bzlog pa'i phyir gser
NK044(phi)001:10102: gyi snod byed du bcug ste /
NK044(phi)001:10108: bca' ba sogs kyi snod so sor byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:10109: rgyal po chen po snod 'di gang gi snod lags zhes byas so //
NK044(phi)001:10110: rgyal pos grong gi gtso bo 'di dag gang gi
NK044(phi)001:10111: snod du rung ba khyod kyis shes par gyis shig
NK044(phi)001:10113: 'di ni til mar gyi snod do //
NK044(phi)001:10114: zhes sogs so sor nges par bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:10115: phyis til mar gyi snod du mar blug pa sogs snod phan tshun barjesa te blugs nas /
NK044(phi)001:10116: rgyal po gdugs tshong la spyan drangs pa'i tshe rim gro ba la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10117: bkru bshal bya ba'i chu snod nas chu khyer te shog ces byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10118: chus bkang ba'i snod de phul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10119: rgyal po de snod snga ma ma yin par mthong nas blon po la /
NK044(phi)001:10120: grong gi gtso bo snod byas pa 'di dag chud ma zos sam /
NK044(phi)001:10121: gang chu snod du mar blugs /
NK044(phi)001:10122: de bzhin du 'chol bar byas nas snod thams cad chud ma zos sam /
NK044(phi)001:10124: ji ltar snod kyi rnam pa 'di dag chab 'tshal
NK044(phi)001:10125: ba de bzhin du dngos po thams cad rnam par
NK044(phi)001:10127: dngos po gang yang nges pa ma mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:10128: dngos po thams cad ni yongs su 'gyur ba /
NK044(phi)001:10132: nges pa med pa yin pas /
NK044(phi)001:10133: rgyal po chen po mi rtag pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10134: nges pa med pa'i dngos po g.yo ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:10135: rgyal po chen po gzhan yang gzhon nu ni bar mar 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:10136: dar la bab pa ni rgas par 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:10137: rgas pa yang 'gum bar gda' lags te /
NK044(phi)001:10138: de bas na dngos po thams cad la nges pa ma mchis lags so //
NK044(phi)001:10139: rgyal po des grong gi gtso bo legs so shes
NK044(phi)001:10140: pa 'di rtogs pa'i phyir 'bad par bya'o zhes dngos
NK044(phi)001:10141: po nges par 'dzin pa de dor bar byas so
NK044(phi)001:10142: // yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:10143: nyid rgyal po drang srong skye ba tshol ba zhes
NK044(phi)001:10145: des rgyal srid spangs nas rab tu byung ba na /
NK044(phi)001:10146: dbang po yul rnams la rnam par g.yeng ba la 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:10147: kye hud bdag gis yul gang dag btang nas rab
NK044(phi)001:10148: tu byung na de dbang po rnam par g.yeng ba
NK044(phi)001:10149: ni legs shing rung ba ma yin te /
NK044(phi)001:10150: des dbang po rnam par 'khrul ba yul gyi gzeb
NK044(phi)001:10151: la bcug pa de dag nam mkha' lta bur mnyam
NK044(phi)001:10152: pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsten nas stobs chen pos
NK044(phi)001:10153: pha rol non pa yang dag par bskyed par bya
NK044(phi)001:10154: dgos na / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams
NK044(phi)001:10155: kyis nam mkha' ltar mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin de
NK044(phi)001:10157: yang 'di snyam du chos 'di dag ni nam mkha' dang mnyam pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:10158: nam mkha' la thogs pa med pa bzhin du yul
NK044(phi)001:10159: thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang 'dra ste yongs su
NK044(phi)001:10160: mi rtog pa ni thogs pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:10161: yongs su rtogs pa ni 'ching ba la /
NK044(phi)001:10162: yongs su mi rtog pa ni thar pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:10163: de'i phyir bdag gis yongs su rtog pa gtang bar
NK044(phi)001:10164: bya'o snyam du yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad gcod
NK044(phi)001:10165: par bya ba la zhugs pas des nam mkha' ltar
NK044(phi)001:10166: mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas mi skye ba'i
NK044(phi)001:10167: chos la bzod pa thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:10168: de'i tshe chos kyi dbyings kyi stobs bskyed pa thob
NK044(phi)001:10169: pas ta la bdun srid tsam du mngon par 'phags
NK044(phi)001:10170: te / mi gang thogs med chos ni rjes su rtogs //
NK044(phi)001:10171: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul shes //
NK044(phi)001:10172: sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul zhugs //
NK044(phi)001:10173: chos kyi rgyal po rnams kyi chos rnams shes //
NK044(phi)001:10174: chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' lta bu ste //
NK044(phi)001:10175: chos nyid shes par bya ba yod ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:10176: chos nyid la ni chos nyid gang med rtogs //
NK044(phi)001:10177: chos 'di thams cad 'gyur med gnyis su med //
NK044(phi)001:10178: ces sogs tshigs su bcad pa smras so //
NK044(phi)001:10179: de ltar rgyal po des gang pha rol las ma
NK044(phi)001:10180: thos par rang gi blos mi skye ba'i chos la
NK044(phi)001:10181: bzod pa thob par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:10182: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:10183: mo'u 'gal gyi bu de lta bas na /
NK044(phi)001:10184: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo bla na med
NK044(phi)001:10185: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang
NK044(phi)001:10186: rgya bar 'dod pas sangs rgyas byung ba dang phrad
NK044(phi)001:10187: kyang rung ma phrad kyang rung /
NK044(phi)001:10188: chos zab mo la rnam par shes shing rtogs par bya ba'i phyir rnal 'byor du bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:10190: yang sngon gyi tshe rgyal po dri med dbang bskur
NK044(phi)001:10191: zhes bya ba chos kyi rgyal po rin po che
NK044(phi)001:10192: sna bdun dang ldan par gyur pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:10193: des blon po dang dge sbyong bram ze rnams la chos 'dri zhing dpyad par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:10194: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dri med spyan zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10195: rgyal po de srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad dang /
NK044(phi)001:10197: bud med 'bum phrag brgyad dang lhan cig sangs rgyas de'i drung du song ba na /
NK044(phi)001:10198: de bzhin gshegs pa des srog chags dpag tu med
NK044(phi)001:10199: pa la chos ston kyang 'khor der sgra chung zhing
NK044(phi)001:10200: thams cad kyis rna ba blags te nyan par mthong
NK044(phi)001:10201: nas / rgyal po de sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba
NK044(phi)001:10202: bsags pa bud med de dag gi nang na 'dug
NK044(phi)001:10203: bzhin bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar la snyoms par zhugs
NK044(phi)001:10204: nas / so // rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:10205: pa mthong nas gzhal du med pa'i dga' ba dang
NK044(phi)001:10206: nas / so // / dad pa skyes te de
NK044(phi)001:10207: bzhin gshegs pa 'khor 'di snyed cig yod pa la
NK044(phi)001:10208: phyir brgal bar sus kyang mi nus la /
NK044(phi)001:10209: spyod lam kyang zhib 'di lta bu thun mong min
NK044(phi)001:10210: pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o snyam du bsam mo
NK044(phi)001:10211: // de bzhin gshegs pa des rgyal po la byon /
NK044(phi)001:10212: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong na don yod pa'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:10213: sogs gsungs shing rgyal po 'khor bcas kyis de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:10214: gshegs pa la phyag byas nas 'khod do //
NK044(phi)001:10215: der tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cu
NK044(phi)001:10216: steng gi bar snang la thal mo sbyar te 'khod
NK044(phi)001:10217: pa de dag 'dod pa'i lha rnams kyis mi mthong
NK044(phi)001:10218: na mi rnams kyis lta ci smos kyang sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:10219: de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dod gzugs kyi lha rnams mi
NK044(phi)001:10220: dag gis mthong bar mdzad pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10221: rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la sus kyang rgol bar mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:10222: 'dod gzugs kyi lha thams cad kyang thal mo sbyar te 'dug go snyam mo /
NK044(phi)001:10223: de nas rgyal po des thal mo sbyar bas btud cing tshigs su bcas pas bstod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10225: de bzhin gshegs pas lan stsal bas dga' bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:10226: mngon par bstod pa'i dge rtsa des bskal pa grangs
NK044(phi)001:10227: med pa dgu bcu rtsa drug tu log par ma
NK044(phi)001:10228: song zhing bsod nams kyang migs sogs mdzes shing shes
NK044(phi)001:10229: pa dang cho 'phrul can du gyur pa sogs kyi
NK044(phi)001:10231: yang sngon de bzhin gsegs pa nya gro d+ha'i rgyal
NK044(phi)001:10232: po zhes bya ba zhing shin tu rgya che zhing
NK044(phi)001:10233: dag pa / sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad lo
NK044(phi)001:10234: bye ba khrag khrig phrag brgyad cur gyur pa de'i
NK044(phi)001:10235: dag pa / dus na / bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK044(phi)001:10236: byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis las yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:10237: 'das pa zhes bya bar gyur pa des zhing der
NK044(phi)001:10239: de la 'khor gyi bud med 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang blon po stong yod do //
NK044(phi)001:10240: rgyal po des sems can nor med pa de dag
NK044(phi)001:10241: rgyal po'i bang mdzod nas nor dang ldan par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:10242: snyam pa dang / tshul khrims 'chal ba'i 'du shes
NK044(phi)001:10243: med par tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i 'du shes dang
NK044(phi)001:10244: snyam pa dang / / dus gsum med pa dang
NK044(phi)001:10245: nyal ba dang gnyid log pa sogs med par dran
NK044(phi)001:10246: shes bzhin bag yod kyis gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:10247: byams pa dang snying rje dang byang chub kyi sems
NK044(phi)001:10248: dang bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa dang tshad
NK044(phi)001:10249: med pa dang / gnas shes pa sogs dang thams
NK044(phi)001:10250: cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi bar la sems shing
NK044(phi)001:10251: med pa dang / 'dug pa la / sngon 'brel
NK044(phi)001:10252: ba'i lha zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du
NK044(phi)001:10254: 'khor bsdus shing de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song
NK044(phi)001:10255: ba sangs rgyas des gzigs nas rgyal po'i lam thams
NK044(phi)001:10256: cad rgyan gyi bkod pas brgyan cing lha rnams la
NK044(phi)001:10257: rgyal po la rim gro byed par bskul to //
NK044(phi)001:10258: rgyal bos de lta bu mthong nas de ci zhig ces blon po rnams la dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10259: sngon gyi gnyen du gyur pa'i lhas smras pa bzhin tu /
NK044(phi)001:10260: de dag gis 'di rnams ni 'jig rten mgon po'i
NK044(phi)001:10261: rim gro ba ste rgyal po khyod la thugs brtse
NK044(phi)001:10262: bas sangs rgyas des de ltar byed du gzhug pa
NK044(phi)001:10264: rgyal po shing rta las bab ste /
NK044(phi)001:10265: gus ba'i spyod lam gyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag
NK044(phi)001:10266: 'tshal bar byed pa sangs rgyas de gzigs nas sangs
NK044(phi)001:10267: rgyas kyi phyogs su gom pa bor ba'i basngagasa pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10269: de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha dag gis bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:10270: 'das de la mchod pa'i phyir gos dang gdugs 'bum
NK044(phi)001:10271: phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul pa de rgyal pos
NK044(phi)001:10272: mthong nas 'di ga la 'ongs snyam pa'i mod la
NK044(phi)001:10273: mi snang bar gyur pa de gar song snyam pa
NK044(phi)001:10274: la / lha de dag gis rgyal po la /
NK044(phi)001:10275: 'gro 'ong skye 'gag med pa'i tshigs bcad smras pas
NK044(phi)001:10276: don khong du chud de the tshom dang bral bar
NK044(phi)001:10277: gyur to // yang sngon gyi dus su bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:10278: 'das nyid rgyal po tog gi blo gros zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:10279: gyur to // bar gyur to // de'i tshe rgyal
NK044(phi)001:10280: po grags chen zhes bya ba phyi rol ba'i lam
NK044(phi)001:10281: gyis chags bral rdzu 'phrul dang gzi brjid che ba
NK044(phi)001:10282: de mi rnams kyis tshes bco lnga la sum cu
NK044(phi)001:10283: rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nang du 'dun khang
NK044(phi)001:10284: du 'gro zhing lha rnams dang chos kyi bgro ba
NK044(phi)001:10285: gyur to // bar gyur to // byed de /
NK044(phi)001:10286: grogs po dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:10287: du byung na chos ston par mdzad pa dang ldan
NK044(phi)001:10288: no zhes sogs rjod par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:10289: de'i tshe gzhan yang rgyal po tog gi blo gros dang /
NK044(phi)001:10291: skar 'od la sogs pa rgyal po khri phrag dgu
NK044(phi)001:10292: yang sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'dun khang du lha
NK044(phi)001:10293: rnams dang chos 'gro bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:10294: grogs po dag chos smra ba dag gi phyogs su bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:10295: chos min smra ba'i phyogs su mi bya /
NK044(phi)001:10296: de bzhin du yang dag par smra ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10299: stong pa nyid smra ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10300: bdag med par smra ba dag gi phyogs bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:10301: de'i 'gal zla'i phyogs su mi bya sangs rgyas rnams
NK044(phi)001:10302: ni stong pa nyid gsung ste gang zag mi gsung
NK044(phi)001:10303: ngo // grogs po dag bcom ldan kyis nang dang
NK044(phi)001:10304: phyi'i skye mched bcu gnyis dag ngo bo nyid dang
NK044(phi)001:10305: bral bar gsungs so zhes bgro ba las /
NK044(phi)001:10306: lha'i 'khor mang po dag gis sgra gsal pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10307: grogs po dag stong pa nyid yin na las mngon par 'du byed pa ji ltar yod /
NK044(phi)001:10308: gal te bdag dang bdag gi med na lha'i 'khor
NK044(phi)001:10309: 'di las mngon par 'du byed pa gang gis skye
NK044(phi)001:10311: lha'i 'khor gzhan dag gis smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10312: grogs po dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la skur pa ma 'deb cig /
NK044(phi)001:10313: ltas lnga byung nas lha'i bu 'pho zhing skye ba ni khyed kyi mngon sum yin la /
NK044(phi)001:10314: ci lha'i bu 'chi ba'i bdag po mthong ba de la bdag la gnod pa de gang yin zhes /
NK044(phi)001:10315: gang du bdag cag 'dus kyang lha'i bu de gnod pa las yongs su bsgral mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:10316: lhas dang po la yang bdag mi snang /
NK044(phi)001:10317: de bzhin gnyis pa nas lnga ba'i bar du de la bdag mi snang /
NK044(phi)001:10319: 'chi ba dang shi ba'i bdag mi snang /
NK044(phi)001:10320: 'di la bdag dang bdag gi ba med cing chos
NK044(phi)001:10321: thams cad ni bdag gam bdag gi bas stong ste
NK044(phi)001:10322: / de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag par gsung pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:10323: de nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros kyis rgyal po khri phrag dgu po de la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10325: kye ma lha'i 'khor 'di ni mi mthun te /
NK044(phi)001:10326: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa mi shes shing ma rtogs so //
NK044(phi)001:10327: bdag cag re zhig 'dzam bu'i gling nyid du chos 'gro bar bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:10328: gal te chos thams cad mi stong zhing bdag dang
NK044(phi)001:10329: bdag gi yod pa de tsam gyi phyir lha'i 'dun
NK044(phi)001:10330: khang du chos bgro bar 'dod pa byas na lha'i
NK044(phi)001:10331: 'khor 'di dag phyin ci log la zhugs te sangs
NK044(phi)001:10332: rgyas kyi bstan pa la the tshom du ma yod
NK044(phi)001:10333: do // tshur shog 'dzam bu'i gling du chos bgro bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:10334: de nas 'khor de dag phyogs gcig tu dong nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10335: khyod ni yul dbus su skyes pa lags te /
NK044(phi)001:10336: shar lho nub byang gi mtha' 'khob ba ma lags so //
NK044(phi)001:10337: khyod ni chos kyi tshul mngon par mkhyen pa lags so //
NK044(phi)001:10338: tog gi blo gros kyis mtha' khob kyi rgyal po rnams la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10339: khyed cag re zhig shar phyogs kyi rgyal po nyi shu rtsa lnga /
NK044(phi)001:10340: de bzhin lho dang nub dang byang gi nyi shu
NK044(phi)001:10341: rtsa lnga ste gang mdzangs la mkhas shing dpyod pa
NK044(phi)001:10342: can / rtab rtab po min pa /
NK044(phi)001:10343: ma brtags pa dang 'khrul pa med pa /
NK044(phi)001:10345: gang bdag gi rgyud 'byed par nus pa brgya zhig khro bas shig /
NK044(phi)001:10346: rgyal po de dag gi bka' bzhin 'tshal zhes rgyal po brgya bkrabs so //
NK044(phi)001:10347: de nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:10348: brgya dang lhan cig ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:10349: nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis 'phags nas gangs ri'i
NK044(phi)001:10350: rgyal po la song ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10351: de dag gi khyams lhas sprul zhing lha'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyang 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:10352: der dbus su rgyal po tog gi blo gros kyi
NK044(phi)001:10353: stan rin po che sna bdun las byas pa mngon
NK044(phi)001:10354: par sprul to // rgyal po tog gi blo gros
NK044(phi)001:10355: kyis phyogs bcur phyag byas nas stan de la 'dug
NK044(phi)001:10356: par sprul to // ste / rgyal po dgu bcu
NK044(phi)001:10357: rtsa dgu pos de'i rkang pa la phyag byas nas
NK044(phi)001:10359: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag dga' zhing
NK044(phi)001:10360: mgu la yi rangs par gyur cing 'dzam bu'i gling
NK044(phi)001:10361: gi mi rnams la ni dam pa'i chos mngon du
NK044(phi)001:10362: gyur bas re zhig chos nub par mi 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:10363: snyam nas lha'i me tog man d+aa ra ba'i char
NK044(phi)001:10364: phab cing chos nyan par 'khod do //
NK044(phi)001:10365: de nas rgyal po tog gi blo gros kyis rgyal po'i pho nya gzhan zhig la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10366: grogs po gangs ri'i rgyal po 'di'i rtse mo'i dbus
NK044(phi)001:10367: na drang srong dge ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:10368: gnas te de la rgyal po'i 'khor 'dug pa 'di
NK044(phi)001:10369: dag khyod mthong bar 'tshal lo zhes spyan drongs shig
NK044(phi)001:10370: ces smras pa de skad cig la rdzu 'phrul gyis
NK044(phi)001:10371: drang srong de'i gan du phyin cing phyag 'tshal nas
NK044(phi)001:10372: 'phrin smras so // drang srong des de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:10373: pa sa 'dzin yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:10374: sgra thos pas mchi ma 'byin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:10375: mchi ma'i rgyun dang mchi ma de dag gi drod kyis gangs ri'i rgyal po'i rtse mo zhu'o //
NK044(phi)001:10376: mchi ma phyis nas rgyal po pho nya de la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10377: grogs po gal te de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ba'am thos pa'i sems can 'ga' yod dam /
NK044(phi)001:10378: dam pa'i chos gnas te ma nub bam /
NK044(phi)001:10379: khyod song shig nga ni mi 'agro'o //
NK044(phi)001:10381: nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa zhi ba btang nas 'du 'dzir 'jug mi phod do //
NK044(phi)001:10383: grogs po 'di la bdag yod do //
NK044(phi)001:10384: bdag med do zhes lha rnams dang rtsod pa byung ba de'i byas pa 'di khyod las tshol lo //
NK044(phi)001:10387: mi rga mi 'chi min pa'i rigs te /
NK044(phi)001:10391: 'chi ba med cing de la sbyin pa la dga' bar yang mi 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:10392: de bas na bdag med do zhes de skad bstan pas /
NK044(phi)001:10393: pho nya de'i chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul
NK044(phi)001:10394: med cing dri ma dang bral bar rnam par dag
NK044(phi)001:10395: ste / de nas pho nya de mkha' la ngang
NK044(phi)001:10396: pa'i rgyal po ltar 'khor de dag tu song zhing
NK044(phi)001:10397: bar snang las 'ong bzhin du sgra byung ba /
NK044(phi)001:10398: grogs po dag dam pa'i chos gnas te /
NK044(phi)001:10399: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'bar ro //
NK044(phi)001:10400: gang dag mngon par brtson pas ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa las snying po len no //
NK044(phi)001:10401: mngon par brtson pa med pa la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba med /
NK044(phi)001:10403: dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:10404: gang mi brtson pa de dag phyir ldog par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:10405: gang mngon par brtson pa la dam pa'i chos gnas te /
NK044(phi)001:10406: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:10407: 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba'o //
NK044(phi)001:10408: chos thams cad bdag med pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:10409: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes shes so //
NK044(phi)001:10410: zhes smras pas de'i sgra de rlung gis te phyogs bcur grags shing /
NK044(phi)001:10411: sgra de thos pas gang bdag tu smra ba rnams ni bdag med pa la gnas /
NK044(phi)001:10412: gang bdag med par smra ba de dag ni bya ba byas par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:10413: tshul de dag thams cad ni rgyal po tog gi blo gros kyi mthu yin /
