NK044(phi)001:10414: de ltar rgyal po des de dag thams cad chos la btsud cing /
NK044(phi)001:10415: ji ltar 'dir sngon gyi spyod pas sangs rgyas khri dag la bsnyen bkur byas te /
NK044(phi)001:10416: sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed nas de
NK044(phi)001:10417: lta bu'i sgra btang bas stong gsum gyi stong chen
NK044(phi)001:10418: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu sgras go bar
NK044(phi)001:10419: byas te chos snang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:10420: de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:10421: chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan kyi bstan pa la
NK044(phi)001:10422: bag tsha ba med pa'i shes pas seng ge'i sgra
NK044(phi)001:10423: bsgrag par bya'o // zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:10424: yang sngon 'das pa'i dus na grong khyer r+ts+wa mchog
NK044(phi)001:10425: nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu dga' ba
NK044(phi)001:10426: bskyed pa zhes bya ba byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:10427: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang shin tu yangs shing bde la 'byor ba bde ba can bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:10428: sangs rgyas de sku tshe tshad med par bzhugs nas
NK044(phi)001:10429: shing s+aa la zung gi bar du mya ngan las
NK044(phi)001:10430: 'das / de'i dam pa'i chos lo khri phrag tshad
NK044(phi)001:10431: med pa bzhi cu lhag gi bar du gnas pa
NK044(phi)001:10432: de'i tshe dge slong tshul khrims shin tu srung ba
NK044(phi)001:10433: yon tan blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor mang zhing
NK044(phi)001:10435: mdo sde dgu rgyas par ston pa la mkhas pas
NK044(phi)001:10436: dge slong rnams la bran pho mo dang ba lang
NK044(phi)001:10437: dang lug sogs chos min gyi dngos po rnams gsor
NK044(phi)001:10438: mi gnang do zhes bsgo ba la /
NK044(phi)001:10439: der dge slong tshul khrims nyams pa shin tu mang
NK044(phi)001:10440: pos de la zhe sdang gis sems skyes te mtshon
NK044(phi)001:10441: cha thogs nas gsad par brtsams so //
NK044(phi)001:10442: de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid yul de'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:10443: yon tan can zhes bya bar gyur pas thos nas
NK044(phi)001:10444: de ma thag tu chos smra ba'i drung du song
NK044(phi)001:10445: ste dge slong tshul nyams rnams dang g.yul bshams nas
NK044(phi)001:10446: chos smra de legs par thar bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:10447: rgyal po de'i lus la ral gri dang mda' sogs
NK044(phi)001:10448: kyis yungs kar tsam yang ma nyams pa med par
NK044(phi)001:10449: rmas so // dge slong yon tan blo gros des rgyal po de la shin tu legs so //
NK044(phi)001:10450: khyod ni yang dag par dam pa'i chos srung ba te /
NK044(phi)001:10451: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na tshad med pa'i chos kyi snod du 'gyur ro zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:10452: rgyal po des der chos thos pas sems rab tu
NK044(phi)001:10453: dga' bar gyur bzhin tshe 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:10454: pa mi g.yo ba'i zhing du sangs rgyas de'i nye
NK044(phi)001:10455: gnas kyi mchog tu gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:10456: rgyal po de'i 'khor g.yul du zhugs te brgal ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10457: dga' ste rjes su yi rangs pa thams cad byang
NK044(phi)001:10458: chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par gyur te
NK044(phi)001:10459: / tshe 'phos nas mi g.yo ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:10460: dge slong yon tan blo gros kyang phyis tshe 'phos
NK044(phi)001:10461: nas mi g.yo ba'i zhing du nyan thos kyi dge
NK044(phi)001:10462: 'dun dag gi nang nas rab kyi 'og tu gyur
NK044(phi)001:10463: to // de nas na dam pa'i chos nub cing
NK044(phi)001:10464: zad du nye ba na de ltar bsrung zhing bskyab
NK044(phi)001:10466: chos smras pa de ni sangs rgyas 'od srung yin no //
NK044(phi)001:10467: yang sngon bskal pa grangs med tshad med 'das pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10468: dus na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla med rgyal
NK044(phi)001:10469: ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon nas yongs
NK044(phi)001:10470: su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo bstan pa na
NK044(phi)001:10471: / bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid de'i nyan thos su
NK044(phi)001:10472: gyur pas mdo sde 'di bzung la gzhan la yang
NK044(phi)001:10473: / bstan te / de tshun chad ngan song du lhung ba dang dam chos spong ba sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:10475: nad sogs gdung ba gang yang ma myong ste da
NK044(phi)001:10476: ltar yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni nad thams cad
NK044(phi)001:10477: dang bral ba 'jigs pa med pa'o zhes gsungs so
NK044(phi)001:10478: // yang sngon gyi tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid bram
NK044(phi)001:10479: ze'i khye'u skar ma zhes bya bar gyur pa na
NK044(phi)001:10480: des lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du tshangs
NK044(phi)001:10481: par spyod pa spyad nas rgyal po'i pho brang legs
NK044(phi)001:10482: 'byor zhes bya bar zhugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10483: tshong dpon gyi bu mo zhig gis khye'u de gzugs bzang zhing lta na sdug par mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:10484: de'i rkang pa la gtugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10485: khyod ci 'dod ces dris pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10488: kho bo ni 'dod pa don du gnyer ba ma yin te tshangs par spyod pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:10490: gal te khyod bdag dang lha cig mi 'grogs na bdag 'gum par 'gyur lags so //
NK044(phi)001:10491: khye'u des bdag lo bzhi khri nyis stong du tshangs
NK044(phi)001:10492: par spyad na 'di ni bdag gi tshul min no
NK044(phi)001:10493: snyam nas bu mo de mthus spangs te gom pa
NK044(phi)001:10495: de gom pa bdun pa la gnas pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:10496: snying rje skyes nas bdag gi brtul zhugs bshig ste bdag sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar gyur kyang /
NK044(phi)001:10497: de bzod par byas pa la bu mo 'di bde
NK044(phi)001:10498: ba dang 'chi ba'i dus mi byed pa da ltar
NK044(phi)001:10499: bya'o snyam nas phyir log ste /
NK044(phi)001:10500: bu mo de'i lag pa nas bzung zhing bu mo
NK044(phi)001:10501: longs shig kho bos khyod ci 'dod pa bya'o zhes
NK044(phi)001:10502: smras te / lo bcu gnyis su de'i khyim du gnas shing /
NK044(phi)001:10504: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bskyed nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:10505: de ltar des snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed pa
NK044(phi)001:10506: des bskal pa bzhi khri'i 'khor ba phyir bsnyil zhing
NK044(phi)001:10508: sems can gzhan dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ba'i las
NK044(phi)001:10509: de yang byang chub sems dpas thabs la mkhas pas
NK044(phi)001:10510: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba de
NK044(phi)001:10512: yang sngon sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi yang tshes
NK044(phi)001:10513: snga rol na tshong pa nor 'dod pa lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:10514: tsam zhig rgya mtshor zhugs te rgya mtsho'i don grub
NK044(phi)001:10516: de'i nang na mi nag po sdig pas 'tsho ba sgyur rtsal bslab pa /
NK044(phi)001:10517: chom rkun byed pa des tshong pa 'di thams cad bsad nas nor khyer te 'agro'o bsams so //
NK044(phi)001:10518: de'i nang na bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid ded dpon
NK044(phi)001:10519: snying rje chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa de
NK044(phi)001:10520: gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na rgya mtsho'i lhas lung
NK044(phi)001:10521: bstan pa / mgron po 'di rnams kyi nang na
NK044(phi)001:10522: mi 'di zhes bya ba dbyibs dang cha lugs 'di
NK044(phi)001:10523: lta bu zhig yod pa des tshong pa 'di thams
NK044(phi)001:10524: cad bsad de nor 'phrog par sems par byed do
NK044(phi)001:10525: bstan pa / // tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di
NK044(phi)001:10526: thams cad byang chub sems dpa' bla med rdzog byang
NK044(phi)001:10527: las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag yin pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:10528: bstan pa / // / 'di rnams bsad na mi
NK044(phi)001:10529: des byang chub sems dpa' re res kyang yun ring
NK044(phi)001:10530: po de srid kyis bla med rdzogs byang bsgrub par
NK044(phi)001:10531: byas pa'i yun ring po de srid du sems can
NK044(phi)001:10532: dmyal ba chen po rnams su sreg par 'gyur bas
NK044(phi)001:10533: bstan pa / // / / de la ded dpon
NK044(phi)001:10534: khyod kyis tshong pa lnga brgya po bsad par mi
NK044(phi)001:10536: mi 'di yang sems can dmyal ba chen por 'gro
NK044(phi)001:10537: bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas par gyis shig
NK044(phi)001:10539: ces bstan to // ded dpon des thabs de la
NK044(phi)001:10541: ces bstan to // bsams pa dang / mi 'di
NK044(phi)001:10542: srog dang bral ba las thabs gzhan med par shes
NK044(phi)001:10544: ces bstan to // bsams pa dang / nas /
NK044(phi)001:10545: gal te don de tshong pa rnams la smras na
NK044(phi)001:10546: ni 'di dag gis sdang ba'i sems kyis mi 'di
NK044(phi)001:10547: bsad na 'di thams cad kyang dmyal bar 'gro bar
NK044(phi)001:10548: 'gyur la mi 'di bdag gis bsad nas bdag sems
NK044(phi)001:10549: can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa 'bum du bsregs
NK044(phi)001:10550: par gyur kyang spro bar bya'i /
NK044(phi)001:10551: tshong pa lnga brgya po 'di srog dang bral na
NK044(phi)001:10552: mi 'di la sdig pa'i las de snyed cig 'phel
NK044(phi)001:10554: mi 'di bdag gis bsad par bya'o snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:10555: tshong pa lnga brgya dang mi de de ltar bsrung
NK044(phi)001:10556: ba'i phyir mi nag po kho rang gi mdung thung
NK044(phi)001:10557: phrog pas btab ste bsad do //
NK044(phi)001:10558: tshong pa lnga brgya po ni bskal bzang 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya po yin no //
NK044(phi)001:10559: snying rje chen po dang thabs mkhas des bskal pa bum gyi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:10560: mi nag po de yang shi nas mtho ris su skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:10561: phyis su sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na yang de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:10562: gshegs pa'i sku ni rdo rje ltar 'khregs pa yin
NK044(phi)001:10563: mod kyi / thabs la mkhas pa'i dgos pa'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:10564: gis seng lding gi tshal pa zug pa'i tshul bstan
NK044(phi)001:10565: mod kyi / te / srid pa tha ma par gyur pa'i mi nyi shu dang /
NK044(phi)001:10566: de dag gi dgra bor gyur pa'i mi nyi shu
NK044(phi)001:10567: yod pa de dag gis sgyur byas nas mdza' ba
NK044(phi)001:10568: ltar byas te de'i khyim du zhugs nas bsad do
NK044(phi)001:10569: snyam du yid la gnas pa de bzhin gshegs pas
NK044(phi)001:10570: mkhyen nas gdul ba'i dbang gis mo'u 'gal gyi bu
NK044(phi)001:10572: phyogs 'di nas seng lding gi tshal pa skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:10573: de de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs g.yas pa'i mthil du
NK044(phi)001:10574: zug par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs nas ring por ma
NK044(phi)001:10575: lon par seng lding gi tshal pa rnon po mtho
NK044(phi)001:10576: gang tsam gyi tshad byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:10577: der mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos seng ldeng gi
NK044(phi)001:10578: tshal pa de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du dor
NK044(phi)001:10579: bar bagyi'o zhes zhus pa na /
NK044(phi)001:10580: 'di phyogs 'di nas dor mi nus zhes gsungs na yang /
NK044(phi)001:10581: mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos stobs kyi shugs kyis seng ldeng gi tshal pa de bzung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10582: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
NK044(phi)001:10583: 'di kha gyen du bltas te rab tu g.yos par
NK044(phi)001:10584: gyur kyang seng ldeng gi tshal pa de tha na
NK044(phi)001:10585: skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas tsam yang mi 'gul lo
NK044(phi)001:10586: // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rdzu 'phrul gyi
NK044(phi)001:10587: stobs kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:10589: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de yang rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nang du 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:10590: de bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum dang /
NK044(phi)001:10594: gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su'ang gshegs /
NK044(phi)001:10595: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du gshegs kyang /
NK044(phi)001:10596: seng ldeng gi tshal pa de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du 'ongs so //
NK044(phi)001:10597: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas phab ste gdan la bzhugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10598: seng ldeng gi tshal ba de yang tshangs pa'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:10599: rten nas bab ste bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar
NK044(phi)001:10600: 'dug go // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phyag
NK044(phi)001:10601: g.yas pas zhabs g.yas pa bzung ste seng ldeng gi
NK044(phi)001:10602: tshal pa de'i rtse mo gcig sa la zug pa
NK044(phi)001:10603: 'dug go // / rtse mo gcig gyen du lta ba de'i steng du zhabs bzhag go //
NK044(phi)001:10604: de'i de ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen
NK044(phi)001:10605: po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab tu g.yos par gyur
NK044(phi)001:10606: to // de nas kun dga' bos btsun pa bcom
NK044(phi)001:10607: ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi las ci zhig mdzad na
NK044(phi)001:10608: de'i rnam par smin pa 'di lta bur gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:10610: ngas sngon rgya mtsho'i nang du tshong pa g.yon can
NK044(phi)001:10611: mdung thung gis btab ste srog dang phral ba'i las
NK044(phi)001:10612: de'i lhag ma yin par bsten pas /
NK044(phi)001:10613: mi nyi shu po de dag dang gsod par 'dod
NK044(phi)001:10614: pa'i mdzal bshes ltar bcos pa nyi shu po de
NK044(phi)001:10615: dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi bdag po
NK044(phi)001:10616: la yang las kyi rnam par smin par 'gyur na
NK044(phi)001:10617: bdag cag lta ci snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:10618: bdag cig gis srog chags 'gum par bgyi bar 'tshal te /
NK044(phi)001:10619: nongs pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'chags so zhes bshags pa byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10620: de bzhin gshegs pas las mi bya ba dang las
NK044(phi)001:10621: zad par 'gyur ba las brtsams te chos bstan pas
NK044(phi)001:10622: mi bzhi bcu po de dag gis ye shes mngon
NK044(phi)001:10624: srog chags gzhan bzhi khris ni chos mngon par rtogs par gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:10625: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la snyun mi
NK044(phi)001:10626: mnga' yang sman pa'i rgyal po 'tsho bya bkur nas
NK044(phi)001:10628: grong dang bsod snyoms la rgyus pa'i tshe bsod snyoms
NK044(phi)001:10629: ma rnyed par lhung bzed bkrus pa bzhin du phyir
NK044(phi)001:10630: byon pa dang / bram ze bu mo dregs ma tsa mis skur pa btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10631: kun tu rgyu mdzes ma kun tu rgyu dag gis
NK044(phi)001:10632: srog dang phral te rgyal byed kyi tshal gyi 'obs
NK044(phi)001:10633: kyi nang du bor ba btang snyoms su mdzad pa
NK044(phi)001:10634: dang / zla ba gsum du rta chas rul pa gsol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10635: ro brgyab bsnyungs pa'i tshul bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10636: sh+aakya rnams 'jigs pa na nga klad pa na'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10637: bram ze b+ha ra d+h+aa dzas spyo ba brgyas spyos pa na de dag dang du bzhes pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10638: skye ba thams cad du lhas sbyin rjes su 'brang
NK044(phi)001:10639: zhing des de bzhin gshegs pa dgrong pa'i phyir glang
NK044(phi)001:10640: po nor skyong rbad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10641: gshed ma'i mi rnams rbad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10642: skyogs rdo 'phangs pa ste de ltar las kyi rgyud
NK044(phi)001:10643: bcu po thams cad kyang dngos su bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:10644: nyid la las kyi sgrib pa de lta bu yod
NK044(phi)001:10645: pas ma yin te sems can shin tu mang po
NK044(phi)001:10646: gdul ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pas las 'di dang
NK044(phi)001:10647: 'di'i rnam par min pa skad du dgos pa'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:10648: gis bstan pa de las gdul bya 'dul ba'i don
NK044(phi)001:10649: chen po yod pa'i tshul gsang chen thabs la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:10650: pa'i mdo las gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:10651: yang sngon sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la
NK044(phi)001:10652: bcom ldan 'das nyid bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng
NK044(phi)001:10653: zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:10654: de la ne'u ldangs bram ze rigs shing swa la
NK044(phi)001:10655: chen po lta bu lnga yod pa de dag sngon
NK044(phi)001:10656: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:10658: sdig pa'i grogs po dang 'phrad pas byang chub kyi
NK044(phi)001:10659: sems brjed de mu stegs can gyi brtul zhugs spyod
NK044(phi)001:10660: cing sangs rgyas la ma dad pa de dag thabs
NK044(phi)001:10661: la mkhas pas gdul bar bya'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:10662: rdza mkhan bu ma byed ces bya ba bram ze
NK044(phi)001:10663: 'od zer phreng gi snying du sdug pa'i grogs po
NK044(phi)001:10664: / sangs rgyas la dad pa can des bram ze
NK044(phi)001:10665: 'od zer phreng bram ze lnga po dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:10666: gnas pa la sangs rgyas 'od srung gi basngagasa pa
NK044(phi)001:10667: / brjod cing / bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phred tshur shog /
NK044(phi)001:10668: de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du 'deng ngo zhes byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10669: bram ze 'od zer phreng des bdag gis sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:10670: kyi basngagasa brjod cing mu stegs can gyi sngags pa
NK044(phi)001:10671: ma yin pa brjod na 'di dag dogs pa skyes
NK044(phi)001:10672: nas sangs rgyas 'od srung gi spyan sngar 'gro bar
NK044(phi)001:10673: mi 'gyur bas de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha
NK044(phi)001:10674: rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i thabs mkhas kyis
NK044(phi)001:10675: / sangs rgyas dang byang chub kyang yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:10676: rjes su mthong ba med pa'i don la bsams nas
NK044(phi)001:10677: / / tshig 'di skad ces dge sbyong mgo reg mthong bas kho bo la ci zhig bya /
NK044(phi)001:10678: byang chub ni mchog tu rnyed par dka' ba yin pas /
NK044(phi)001:10679: dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga la yod /
NK044(phi)001:10681: yang dus nam zhig gi tshe na bram ze'i khye'u
NK044(phi)001:10682: 'od zer phreng ne'u ldangs lnga po dang lhan cig
NK044(phi)001:10683: chu 'gram na 'khod pa la sangs rgyas kyi mthus
NK044(phi)001:10684: / rigs kyi bu lnga po de dag gdul ba'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:10685: rdza mkhan bum byed chu 'gram der song ste /
NK044(phi)001:10686: sangs rgyas ni shin tu rnyed pa dka' bas de'i drung du 'deng zhes bskul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:10687: 'od zer phreng gis sngar ltar smras te 'gro mi 'dod pa'i tshul bzung ba la /
NK044(phi)001:10688: rdza mkhan bum byed kyis bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer
NK044(phi)001:10689: phreng gi thor to nas bzung ste sangs rgyas 'od
NK044(phi)001:10691: rdza mkhan bum byed 'dis 'di ltar gal gyis byed
NK044(phi)001:10692: pa'i sangs rgyas de dang de'i chos ci 'dra ba
NK044(phi)001:10694: bram ze'i khye'u lnga yang de'i phyi bzhin sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:10695: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung mthong
NK044(phi)001:10696: ma thag tu sngon gyi dge rtsas bskul bas dad
NK044(phi)001:10697: pa thob nas bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng la
NK044(phi)001:10698: smras pa / ston pa'i yon tan 'di lta bu
NK044(phi)001:10699: dag khyod kyis sngon chad kho bo la ma smras
NK044(phi)001:10700: smras pa / zhes spyos so // de nas bram
NK044(phi)001:10701: ze'i rigs lnga po des sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid
NK044(phi)001:10702: dang spobs pa dang tshangs pa'i dbyangs thos pas lhag
NK044(phi)001:10703: bsam gyis bla med rdzogs byang du sems bskyed do
NK044(phi)001:10704: smras pa / zhes spyos so // // sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:10705: 'od srung gis rigs kyi bu de dag gi lhag
NK044(phi)001:10706: bsam thugs su chud nas byang chub sems dpa'i sde
NK044(phi)001:10707: snod chos kyi rnam grangs phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor
NK044(phi)001:10708: lo'i gzungs rdo rje'i tshig chos thams cad skye ba
NK044(phi)001:10709: med pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan par
NK044(phi)001:10710: mdzad pas bram ze lnga po de dag mi skye
NK044(phi)001:10711: ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:10712: de'i tshe sangs rgyas 'od srung gis rigs kyi bu lnga la bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:10713: gal te bram ze'i khye'u 'od zer phreng gis dang
NK044(phi)001:10714: po nas sangs rgyas kyi basngagasa pa brjod cing mu
NK044(phi)001:10715: stegs can gyi basngagasa pa ma yin pa brjod na
NK044(phi)001:10716: khyed cag sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'gro ba'i gnas
NK044(phi)001:10717: skabs med na dad pa thob par 'gyur ba lta
NK044(phi)001:10719: de ltar phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po la /
NK044(phi)001:10720: sangs rgyas dang byang chub la som nyi cung zad med mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:10721: sems can gzhan smin pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i bkod pa yin te /
NK044(phi)001:10722: de ltar dge sbyong mgo reg la byang chub ga
NK044(phi)001:10723: la yod ces smras pa'i las kyi rnam par smin
NK044(phi)001:10724: pas lo drug tu dka' ba spyod par bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:10725: yang / sems can mi shes par spyod pa gzhan
NK044(phi)001:10726: dag tshul khrims dang ldan pa'i gang zag la lkog
NK044(phi)001:10727: nas tshig rtsub mo smras pas yun ring por gnod
NK044(phi)001:10728: pa dang log par lhung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi
NK044(phi)001:10729: tshul ston pa'i phyir thabs la mkhas pas ldem po'i
NK044(phi)001:10730: ngag tu bstan pa yin gyi dngos su byang chub
NK044(phi)001:10731: sems dpa' la ni las kyi sgrib pa cung zad
NK044(phi)001:10732: yang / kyang med do // gzhan yang yon tan
NK044(phi)001:10733: ldan pa la tshig rtsub mo smras pas yid 'gyod
NK044(phi)001:10734: cing zhum pa dag gi 'gyod pa bsal ba'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:10735: du yang de ltar gsungs te /
NK044(phi)001:10736: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pas
NK044(phi)001:10737: kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi gsung rab
NK044(phi)001:10738: la tshig rtsub po 'di skad smras kyang rnam par
NK044(phi)001:10739: grol ba'i skal ba yod par gyur na bdag cag
NK044(phi)001:10740: mi shes pa rnams lta ci smos snyam du bsams
NK044(phi)001:10741: nas sdig pa de yang 'chags shing phyis sdom pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10743: de ltar bram ze 'od zer phreng gi ne'u ldangs mu stegs lnga po smin par byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:10744: rang nyid de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gi bstan
NK044(phi)001:10745: pa la rab tu byung ste nga sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:10746: chos mdzod 'dzin par gyur pa bram ze'i khye'u ye
NK044(phi)001:10747: shes bla ma zhes bya bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:10748: sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bram ze'i khye'u ye shes
NK044(phi)001:10749: bla ma 'di nga 'das pa'i rjes su mi mjed
NK044(phi)001:10750: 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:10751: bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:10752: tshul 'dir smos pa rnams kyis mtshon nas sngon gyi
NK044(phi)001:10753: skye ba dpag tu med par ji lta ji snyed
NK044(phi)001:10754: kyis bsdus pa'i shes bya'i gnas rnams la blo gros
NK044(phi)001:10755: kyi snang ba dri ma med par gong nas gong
NK044(phi)001:10756: du sbyangs pa'i mthar sgrib gnyis kyi dri ma bag
NK044(phi)001:10757: chags dang bcas pa yongs su dag pa'i ye shes
NK044(phi)001:10758: chen pos shes bya'i chos thams cad mngon sum du
NK044(phi)001:10759: gzigs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK044(phi)001:10760: thob pa des / phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bsdus
NK044(phi)001:10761: pa'i shes bya srid do cog gi tha snyad dang
NK044(phi)001:10762: don dam pa ji ltar gnas pa ma lus skyu
NK044(phi)001:10763: ru ra rlon pa lag mthil du bzhag pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:10764: du mngon sum du gzigs pa'i bdag nyid stobs bcu'i
NK044(phi)001:10766: dbang bcu'i dbang gis phyug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:10767: 'das zhes bya ba 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10768: khongs na mtshungs pa med pa seng ge'i sgra sgrogs
NK044(phi)001:10769: pa / khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su zhal gyis bzhes pa /
NK044(phi)001:10771: 'gro ba mtha' dag gi skyabs dang mgon gyi dam pa /
NK044(phi)001:10772: ye shes kyi sku rtag pa khyab pa yon tan
NK044(phi)001:10773: kun gyi bdag nyid chen por gyur pa yin te
NK044(phi)001:10774: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:10775: bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du sangs rgyas kyi ye
NK044(phi)001:10776: shes zab cing rgya che ba ngo mtshar lags te
NK044(phi)001:10778: mo'u 'gal gyi bu yongs su brtag pa bzung ste /
NK044(phi)001:10779: yongs su brtag pa nye bar bzung bas phyogs bcu'i
NK044(phi)001:10780: 'jig rten na sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
NK044(phi)001:10781: pa'i rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed kyi zhing dag na
NK044(phi)001:10782: sems can du bsdus pa de dag snga phyi med
NK044(phi)001:10784: de bzhin gshegs pa so so'i dbu de snyed du gyur /
NK044(phi)001:10785: dbu re rer zhal de snyed /
NK044(phi)001:10786: zhal re rer ljags de snyed du gyur pas sangs
NK044(phi)001:10787: rgyas kyi ye shes kyi basngagasa pa brjod kyang mthar
NK044(phi)001:10790: mo'u 'gal gyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes ni /
NK044(phi)001:10791: dpag tu med pa dang ldan /
NK044(phi)001:10792: ye shes dpag gis mi lang ba dang ldan /
NK044(phi)001:10793: ye shes grangs med pa dang ldan /
NK044(phi)001:10794: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan /
NK044(phi)001:10795: ye shes gzhal du med pa dang ldan /
NK044(phi)001:10796: ye shes gzhal gyis mi lang ba dang ldan /
NK044(phi)001:10797: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni ye shes brjod du med pa dang ldan pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:10798: zhes gsungs pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:10800: bdag cag gi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:10801: nyid kyis thog mar byang chub chen por thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:10802: pa'i tshul la / ma skyes dgra'i 'gyod pa bsal ba'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:10803: sngon bskal pa tshad med grangs med bsam gyis mi
NK044(phi)001:10804: khyab pa 'das pa'i pha rol na de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:10805: pa mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'jig
NK044(phi)001:10807: de'i bstan pa la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:10808: chos smra ba ye shes rgyal po zhes bya bar
NK044(phi)001:10809: gyur pa rgyal po'i pho brang rgya chen pos sar
NK044(phi)001:10810: ldan par bsod snyoms su song nas lhung bzed bkang
NK044(phi)001:10812: bcom ldan 'das 'di tshong dpon gyi bu dri ma
NK044(phi)001:10813: med pa'i dpung pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na
NK044(phi)001:10814: khye'u de ma'i pang na 'dug pas dge slong de
NK044(phi)001:10815: mthong nas / de'i drung du song ste bza' ba bslangs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:10816: dge slong des mo da ka gcig byin pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10817: de'i rjes su 'brangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i drung du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:10818: der dge slong des lhung bzed khye'u la byin te de bzhin gshegs pa la 'bul du bcug pas /
NK044(phi)001:10819: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas la ci 'dod du bstabs kyang ma zad do //
NK044(phi)001:10820: dge slong des khye'u de skyabs 'gro dang khrims phog
NK044(phi)001:10821: pa dang byang chub tu sems bskyed du bcug go
NK044(phi)001:10822: // khye'u de'i pha mas khye'u tshol du song pa khye'u bskul nas /
NK044(phi)001:10823: khye'u dang de'i pha ma dang /
NK044(phi)001:10824: srog chags lnga brgya tsam rab tu byung zhing byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:10825: bcom ldan 'das kyis de ni byang chub kyi phyir thog mar sems bskyed pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:10827: de dang tshul mtshungs par tshul 'chal tshar gcod pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:10828: sngon de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu 'od ces byung ba'i dus na /
NK044(phi)001:10829: byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'khor los sgyur ba'i
NK044(phi)001:10830: rgyal por gyur pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa
NK044(phi)001:10831: de'i rjes su bskal pa bye ba phrag bzhi bcu
NK044(phi)001:10832: lon pa'i rjes su bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyis
NK044(phi)001:10833: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal
NK044(phi)001:10835: sangs rgyas de la lo stong du bde ba'i yo
NK044(phi)001:10836: byad thams cad kyis bstabs shing lha'i ras bcos su
NK044(phi)001:10837: 'bum phrag lnga ri ba dag gis bkab ste dge
NK044(phi)001:10838: rtsa bskyed do // sangs rgyas de mya ngan las
NK044(phi)001:10839: 'das pa'i mchod rten 'phang du dpag tshad gcig dang
NK044(phi)001:10840: rgyar dpag tshad phyed pa rin chen sna bdun las
NK044(phi)001:10841: byas te bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab
NK044(phi)001:10843: yang drin lan bas bas pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:10844: kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong dag
NK044(phi)001:10845: la thugs brtse zhing byams pa'i thugs bskyed nas yun
NK044(phi)001:10846: ji srid cig lon zhes zhus pa'i lan du bka'
NK044(phi)001:10847: stsal pa / sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa grangs med brjod du med pa'i pha rol na /
NK044(phi)001:10848: sdig pa byas pa'i mi gnyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:10849: dmyal ba'i srung mas shing rta 'dren du bcug ste /
NK044(phi)001:10850: phan tshun mi dal bar rgyug cing lcags thos brdegs pa na /
NK044(phi)001:10851: mi gcig stobs chung bas 'dren ma nus pa la
NK044(phi)001:10852: lcags thos brdegs pa dang tshe 'phos nas yang phyir
NK044(phi)001:10853: sos so // der mi gcig gis de la snying rje bskyed de /
NK044(phi)001:10854: bdag 'ba' zhig gis shing rta 'di drang gis mi 'di thongs zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:10856: lcags kyi tho bas brdegs pas tshe 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:10857: de ltar de'i dus na nga sems can dmyal ba na 'dug pa las /
NK044(phi)001:10858: byams shing brtse ba'i sems bskyed pa de ni nga yin te ngas der /
NK044(phi)001:10859: sems can dmyal ba pa de la thog mar snying brtse'i sems bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:10860: de nas sems can thams cad la yang de tsam
NK044(phi)001:10861: gyi bar du thugs brtse zhing byams pa'i sems bskyed
NK044(phi)001:10863: 'di ni dmyal ba'i shing rta 'dren pa gyad pak+shi
NK044(phi)001:10864: ta zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe thog mar byams
NK044(phi)001:10865: pa'i thugs bskyed pa nyid du gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:10867: 'khor gyi nyan thos rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid
NK044(phi)001:10868: kyi thog mar thugs gang du bskyed ces zhus pa'i
NK044(phi)001:10870: sngon byung ba rgyal po 'od ldan zhes bya ba'i
NK044(phi)001:10871: yul du glang po rin po che ku mud da'i
NK044(phi)001:10873: yan lag bdun pa shin tu gnas pa /
NK044(phi)001:10874: gzugs bzang ba lta na sdug pa zhig byung ba
NK044(phi)001:10875: de glang po 'dul mkhan mkhas par gtad nas des
NK044(phi)001:10876: kyang dul bar byas nas rgyal po la slar phul
NK044(phi)001:10877: ba dang / rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan de gnyis
NK044(phi)001:10878: de la zhon nas ri dwags gshor du song ba
NK044(phi)001:10879: dang ji tsam na glang po des nags kyi bal
NK044(phi)001:10880: glang mo'i dri tshor nas dri de'i rjes bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:10881: ba dang / rgyug pa na / glang po che
NK044(phi)001:10882: rlung ltar mgyogs pas khyer ba dang gnam sa 'gul
NK044(phi)001:10883: ba ltar mthong nas skrag ste 'dul mkhan la glang
NK044(phi)001:10886: drang srong gis smras pa'i gsang sngags bzla zhing lcags kyus gdab par bgyi mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:10887: lcags kyu'am zhags pa dang lcag sgrogs gis kyang 'dod chags kyi sems tshar gcad mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:10888: 'dod chags kyi zug rngu na ci zhig ltar na skye zhing /
NK044(phi)001:10889: tshul 'ga' zhig gis rgyas shing 'ga' zhig zhi bar 'gyur ro zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:10890: glang po de gnas thams cad du bzlog kyang bzlog
NK044(phi)001:10891: ma btub pa de'i tshe rgyal po la smras la
NK044(phi)001:10892: / lha glang po che 'di 'khrul gyis shing yal ga la 'jus mdzod cig /
NK044(phi)001:10893: de nas rgyal po dang 'dul mkhan gnyis shing gi yal ga la 'jus te 'dug go //
NK044(phi)001:10894: de nas de'u shi tsam las thar nas rgyal pos 'dul mkhan la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10895: khyod kyis glang po che ma dul ba nga la phul lo //
NK044(phi)001:10897: lha shin tu dul lags te /
NK044(phi)001:10898: nags kyi glang mo'i dri tshor nas nyan du ma btub bo //
NK044(phi)001:10899: de lta mod kyi dpyad nas ring por mi thogs par slar mchi bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:10900: de nas glang po che zhag bdun lon pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10901: myos pa dang bral nas dpyad dran nas rang nyid gnas su 'ongs te 'dug go //
NK044(phi)001:10902: de nas 'dul mkhan gyis rings par rgyal po la smras so //
NK044(phi)001:10907: cis mngon par lha'i spyan sngar bstar bar bagyi'o zhes /
NK044(phi)001:10908: lcags kyi tho lum sol mes bsregs pa zhig dpyad
NK044(phi)001:10909: kyi sar khyer te len du gzhug par brtsams pa
NK044(phi)001:10910: dang / des kyang bag tsha ba med par blang bar brtsams pa na /
NK044(phi)001:10912: lha len du btub na lon kyang 'gum par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:10914: kye mkhas pa de ltar shin tu dul ba 'dis
NK044(phi)001:10915: bdag cag g.yengs pa 'di la rgyu ci zhig yod
NK044(phi)001:10916: / lha bdag gis sngar lus thul gyis sems ni ma lags so zhes ma gsol tam /
NK044(phi)001:10917: bdag ni lus 'dul ba lags kyi sems 'dul ba ni ma lags so //
NK044(phi)001:10919: sems 'dul ba 'ga' yod par khyod kyis mthong ngam thos sam /
NK044(phi)001:10920: 'dul mkhan de lhas bskul nas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:10921: lha lus dang sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mchis so //
NK044(phi)001:10922: 'dod pa'i rgyus byung nyes gzhom phyir //
NK044(phi)001:10923: mang po brtson par byed mod kyi //
NK044(phi)001:10924: mi nus par ni shes pas kyang //
NK044(phi)001:10925: brtson 'grus nyams nas ldog par byed //
NK044(phi)001:10926: ces sogs tshigs su bcad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10927: bdag ni sna tshogs thabs kyis 'di lta bu //
NK044(phi)001:10928: gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs pa'i glang po 'dul //
NK044(phi)001:10929: rgyal po gzugs can ma lags phra sems ni //
NK044(phi)001:10930: drang srong chab klung 'tshal bas ma thul to //
NK044(phi)001:10932: rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas mthu bo che //
NK044(phi)001:10933: nyon mongs spangs pa dpa' bo stobs ldan pa //
NK044(phi)001:10934: de dang gang dang de 'drar rjes 'brang ba //
NK044(phi)001:10935: de'i dbang 'dir ni gzugs med sems 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:10936: de nas rgyal po 'od ldan gyis bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:10937: rnams kyi brtson 'grus dang stobs thos nas sbyin pa
NK044(phi)001:10938: dag byin / bsod nams dag byas te /
NK044(phi)001:10939: bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam btab pa /
NK044(phi)001:10940: sbyin pa rgya chen gyur pa 'di yis su //
NK044(phi)001:10941: 'gro bar rang byung sangs rgyas gyur nas ni //
NK044(phi)001:10942: sngon gyi rgyal dbang rnams kyis ma bsgral ba //
NK044(phi)001:10943: skye bo'i tshogs dag bdag gis bsgral bar bya //
NK044(phi)001:10945: der thog mar bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de smon lam btab par gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:10946: skyes rabs gzhan las rgyal po rab snang dang rab
NK044(phi)001:10947: gsal zhes gsungs pa ming gi rnam grangs yin par
NK044(phi)001:10948: mngon no // bla med rdzogs byang du thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:10949: nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la thog mar bsod
NK044(phi)001:10950: snyoms phul ba zhus pa'i lan du gsungs pa /
NK044(phi)001:10951: sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid yangs pa'i grong khyer du
NK044(phi)001:10952: rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od ces bya bar gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:10953: na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa zhes
NK044(phi)001:10954: bya ba 'jig rten du byon te /
NK044(phi)001:10955: de'i mchog zung dbang po zung ni sh+aa ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu zhes bya /
NK044(phi)001:10956: rim gro ba ni kun dga' bo zhes bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:10957: sangs rgyas de dge slong gi tshogs kyis bskor nas
NK044(phi)001:10958: ljongs rgyu zhing yangs pa'i grong khyer du byon pa
NK044(phi)001:10959: na / sangs rgyas de nyid rlung shas che ba'i
NK044(phi)001:10960: snyun gyis thebs nas kun dga' bo la bka' stsal
NK044(phi)001:10961: na / pa / rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od las /
NK044(phi)001:10962: mar dang til mar dang bu ram gyi chu khyer te shog ces bsgo ba bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:10963: kun dga' bos rdza mkhan la smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10964: rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od bu dang bcas pas mar
NK044(phi)001:10965: dang til mar dang bu ram gyi chu khyer te
NK044(phi)001:10966: / mar dang til mar gyis bcom ldan 'das kyis sku byugs te 'jam pos khrus byas /
NK044(phi)001:10967: bu ram chu'i btung ba gsol bas sangs rgyas de bzod cing 'tsho bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:10968: de nas rdza mkhan des zhabs la gtugs nas /
NK044(phi)001:10969: bdag kyang rab tu sbyin pa 'di yis sh+aakya'i rigs skyes pa //
NK044(phi)001:10970: yon tan rigs dang rus dag mnyan pa'i sangs rgyas nyid gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:10971: bdag gis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten bar gyi nyam thag 'chi ba yi //
NK044(phi)001:10972: pha rol zhi ba rgya chen 'jigs pa med par sgrol bar shog /
NK044(phi)001:10974: bus bdag kyang las 'dis gzugs yod pa'i chos rnams rtogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10975: bcom ldan 'das kyi rim gro ba byed par gyur cig ces smon lam btab bo //
NK044(phi)001:10976: de dus kyi bu ni da lta'i ku dga' bo nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:10977: de ltar dang por bla med byang chub kyi phyir smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:10978: de dang tshul mthun par mdo sde bskal pa bzang po las /
NK044(phi)001:10979: nga ni sngon tshe dman par gyur pa na //
NK044(phi)001:10980: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub de la //
NK044(phi)001:10981: 'jims gang zhig ni dbul bar byas nas kyang //
NK044(phi)001:10982: dang por byang chub tu ni sems bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:10984: phyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing mi mjed 'di'i sems can
NK044(phi)001:10985: gdul dka' ba rnams yongs su bzung nas thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:10986: pa'i dang po ni bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyi
NK044(phi)001:10987: smon lam gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:10988: gzhan yang sangs rgyas la dmigs nas dge rtsa bskyed
NK044(phi)001:10989: pa dang smon lam btab pa phra yang chud mi
NK044(phi)001:10991: sngon 'das pa'i dus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:10992: zil gis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du
NK044(phi)001:10993: byon pa'i tshe / de bzhin gshegs 'di mchog zung
NK044(phi)001:10994: gnyis dang byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa sogs kyi
NK044(phi)001:10995: gzugs sna tshogs par 'phrul pa rgyal po'i pho brang
NK044(phi)001:10996: du bsod snyoms la gshegs pa'i lam der byis pa
NK044(phi)001:10997: rgyan bzang ldan pa gsum gyis mthong nas dad de
NK044(phi)001:10998: khye'u gcig gis zhing gi mchog 'di la mchod par
NK044(phi)001:11000: khye'u gnyis pos 'dir me tog sogs med pas ci zhig mchod par bya zhes zer ba la /
NK044(phi)001:11001: khye'u gcig des mu tig gi se mo do brgya
NK044(phi)001:11002: stong ri ba mgul nas bkrol te phul ba dang
NK044(phi)001:11003: / khye'u gnyis pos kyang de'i rjes su slob pas
NK044(phi)001:11004: rang gi mgul nas mu tig gi se mo do
NK044(phi)001:11006: khye'u gcig des khyed gnyis sbyin pa 'dis cir smon zhes byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11007: khye'u gcig gis bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs na
NK044(phi)001:11008: gnas pa'i shes rab ldan pa'i mchog de ji lta
NK044(phi)001:11009: ba bzhin du gyur cig ces dang /
NK044(phi)001:11010: gnyis pas g.yon phyogs kyi rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11011: mchog de ji lta bar gyur cig ces smon lam
NK044(phi)001:11012: btab bo // khye'u bar ma gcig po des sangs
NK044(phi)001:11013: rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji 'dra bar smon lam btab
NK044(phi)001:11014: btab bo // bo // de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:11015: pa des khye'u bar ma 'dis bsam pa 'di 'dra
NK044(phi)001:11016: btab bo // bo // bas 'ong zhing / gom
NK044(phi)001:11017: pa 'dor 'jog thams cad la 'khor los sgyur ba
NK044(phi)001:11018: brgya stong gi dge rtsa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11019: brgya byin dang tshangs pa brgya stong dang /
NK044(phi)001:11020: sangs rgyas brgya stong mthong ba'i dge rtsa yongs su len to zhes bka' stsal to //
NK044(phi)001:11021: de'i tshe nyan thos kyi sems kyis mu tig dor
NK044(phi)001:11022: ba de sangs rgyas kyi phrag pa gnyis la 'dug
NK044(phi)001:11023: par gyur to // khye'u gcig gis thams cad mkhyen
NK044(phi)001:11024: pa'i sems kyis mu tig gi se mo do dor
NK044(phi)001:11025: ba de sangs rgyas kyi dbu gtsug na mu tig
NK044(phi)001:11026: gi khang brtsegs sna tshogs lta na sdug pa la
NK044(phi)001:11027: sangs rgyas kyi sku bzhugs par snang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11028: de bzhin gshegs pa des 'dzum pa mdzad cing khye'u
NK044(phi)001:11029: 'di sangs rgyas pa'i tshe khye'u gzhan gnyis sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11030: de'i mchog zung du 'gyur bar lung bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:11031: da ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid dang sh+aa ri'i bu dang mo'u 'gal gyi bu yin no //
NK044(phi)001:11033: de ltar thugs bskyed pa dag gi thog ma 'di
NK044(phi)001:11034: rnams yin zhes bka' stsal pa las gzhan du mdo
NK044(phi)001:11035: rnams nas sangs rgyas du ma'i drung du yang nas
NK044(phi)001:11036: yang du thugs bskyed pa ni shin tu mang por
NK044(phi)001:11038: thog ma'i thugs bskyed 'di dag kyang /
NK044(phi)001:11039: ji skad du mdo sde'i rgyan las /
NK044(phi)001:11040: rags pa brda las byung ba kun rdzob sems bskyed dang /
NK044(phi)001:11041: phra ba chos nyid kyis thob pa don dam pa'i sems bskyed pa gnyis las /
NK044(phi)001:11043: grogs stobs rgyu stobs rtsa ba'i stobs //
NK044(phi)001:11044: thos stobs dge ba goms pa las //
NK044(phi)001:11045: mi brtan pa dang brtan 'byung ba //
NK044(phi)001:11046: gzhan gyis bstan pa'i sems bskyed bshad //
NK044(phi)001:11048: de bzhin gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal
NK044(phi)001:11049: mtshan gyi drung du thugs bskyed pa ni grogs stobs
NK044(phi)001:11050: las skyes pa de byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal
NK044(phi)001:11051: gzhon nur gyur pa chos smra ba ye shes rgyal
NK044(phi)001:11052: po zhes bya bar gyur pa des thabs la mkhas
NK044(phi)001:11053: pas brid nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du
NK044(phi)001:11054: sems bskyed du bcug pa la de ltar thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:11055: cing dge rtsa bsags par byas pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:11056: yang khye'u zhig tu gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:11057: thams cad zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba mthong
NK044(phi)001:11058: nas mu tig gi se mo de phul zhing sangs
NK044(phi)001:11059: rgyas de ci 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i smon lam btab
NK044(phi)001:11060: pa dang / dmyal ba'i shing rta 'dren par gyur
NK044(phi)001:11061: chos grogs la snying rje dang byams pa'i sems rang
NK044(phi)001:11062: shugs kyis skyes pa ni rgyu rigs kyi stobs las
NK044(phi)001:11063: pa dang / yin te / khye'u gsum gyi nang
NK044(phi)001:11064: nas rgya chen po la mos pa sangs rgyas su
NK044(phi)001:11065: smon lam 'debs pa de bcom ldan 'das nyid dang
NK044(phi)001:11066: pa dang / yin te / / mchog zung du
NK044(phi)001:11067: smon lam 'debs pa de dag sh+aa ri'i bu dang
NK044(phi)001:11068: mo'u 'gal gyi bu yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:11069: grogs la snying rje skye ba de yang /
NK044(phi)001:11071: de yi rtsa ba snying rje 'dod //
NK044(phi)001:11072: rtag tu sems can phan par sems //
NK044(phi)001:11074: byang chub sems bskyed kyi rtsa ba sems can la
NK044(phi)001:11075: snying rje dang byams pa'i sems skye ba las yin
NK044(phi)001:11076: zhing / de'ang theg pa chen po'i rigs sad pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11077: dbang gis snying rje skye ba yin pa'i phyir ro
NK044(phi)001:11078: zhing / // rgyal po 'od ldan gyis bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:11079: thos pa'i stobs la brten nas yin te /
NK044(phi)001:11080: 'dul sbyong mkhan gyis bdag gis glang po che'i lus
NK044(phi)001:11081: 'dul bar byas kyi sems kyi nyon mongs 'dul mi
NK044(phi)001:11082: nus la / sems 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:11083: 'das yin zhes sangs rgyas kyi basngagasa pa brjod pa
NK044(phi)001:11084: thos pa las rgyal po des sbyin pa sogs byas
NK044(phi)001:11085: te sangs rgyas su smon lam btab pa yin no
NK044(phi)001:11086: nus la / // rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od kyis
NK044(phi)001:11087: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa la bsod snyoms
NK044(phi)001:11088: nus la / // phul nas / sangs rgyas de
NK044(phi)001:11089: ji 'dra bar 'gyur ba'i smon lam btab pa ni
NK044(phi)001:11090: nus la / // phul nas / / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang /
NK044(phi)001:11091: sngon dge rtsa bsags pa'i stobs kyis sangs rgyas 'jig
NK044(phi)001:11092: rten byon pa dang 'phrad nas tshogs bsags shing smon
NK044(phi)001:11094: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis smon lam lnga brgya btab ste thugs bskyed pa ni /
NK044(phi)001:11095: tshe de dang snga ma rnams su theg chen gyis
NK044(phi)001:11096: chos kyis bsdus pa'i dge ba cher goms pa las
NK044(phi)001:11097: / byang chub sems dpa' gzhan las kyang 'phags pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11098: snying rje chen pos ma dag snyigs ma'i zhing yongs
NK044(phi)001:11099: su bzung ba'i thugs bskyed pa thog ma yin no
NK044(phi)001:11100: / // spyir thugs bskyed pa la rgyu lnga char
NK044(phi)001:11101: tshang dgos pa'i nges pa med de gang rung zhig
NK044(phi)001:11102: las skyes kyang byang chub sems bskyed mtshan nyid par
NK044(phi)001:11103: / // 'gyur mod / rgyu lnga po de dag
NK044(phi)001:11104: gang rung gi sgo nas dang por bskyed du zin
NK044(phi)001:11105: kyang mos spyod kyi sar skye ba gzhan dang gzhan
NK044(phi)001:11106: du rgyu gang rung re'i sgo nas byang chub kyi
NK044(phi)001:11107: sems sla yang mngon du sad par byed pa yod
NK044(phi)001:11109: stobs rnyed nas je brtan du 'gro zhing sa thob
NK044(phi)001:11110: phan chad sems bskyed pa de tshe rabs thams cad
NK044(phi)001:11111: du nyams pa med par mngon du 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:11112: spyir theg pa chen po'i rigs dang ldan pa'i gang zag de rnams rgyu'i stobs can yin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:11113: rkyen dag la'ang ltos pas na 'di ltar thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:11114: pa 'di dag thog ma'i thugs bskyed du gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:11115: la / 'di rnams kyi snga phyi ni rim pa lta tshong dpon gyi bu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11120: bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul lta bur bzhag kyang 'gal ba med la /
NK044(phi)001:11121: 'on kyang gyad pak+shi tas byams pa'i sems bskyed pa tsam dang /
NK044(phi)001:11122: khye'u gsum gyi dbus mas sangs rgyas mthong bas dwang
NK044(phi)001:11123: ba'i dad pa tsam gyis mu tig gi do shal
NK044(phi)001:11124: phul nas sangs rgyas de 'drar 'gyur bar smon lam
NK044(phi)001:11126: rgyal po 'od ldan dang rdza mkhan yangs pa'i 'od
NK044(phi)001:11127: kyis snga ma gnyis las lhag par sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:11128: yon tan shes shing 'dod pa'i dad pa drag pos
NK044(phi)001:11129: sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar thugs bskyed cing smon lam
NK044(phi)001:11130: btab pa yin cing tshong dpon gyi bu yang de
NK044(phi)001:11131: dang 'dra'o // 'di dag smon 'jug sogs sems bskyed
NK044(phi)001:11132: pa'i gnas skabs so so la bzhed pa'ang yod mod
NK044(phi)001:11133: mdo rang gis ji ltar gsal ba las mtha' gcig
NK044(phi)001:11134: tu 'di dag gi snga phyi 'di zhes nges pa
NK044(phi)001:11135: dang 'dra'o // dka' mod / gang ltar kyang thog
NK044(phi)001:11136: mar thugs bskyed pa'i tshul 'di yang je bzang je
NK044(phi)001:11137: brtan du song nas bram ze rgya mtsho'i rdul gyis
NK044(phi)001:11138: thugs bskyed pa'i tshe theg pa chen po la yid
NK044(phi)001:11139: ches pa'i dad pa drag pos sems can gzhan mang
NK044(phi)001:11140: po theg chen la bkod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11141: bdag nyid kyis snying rje chen po zhing ma dag
NK044(phi)001:11142: pa ched du bzung ba'i thugs bskyed thog ma yin
NK044(phi)001:11143: par mngon no // des na thog mar 'jam dpal
NK044(phi)001:11144: gyis bla med byang chub tu thugs bskyed du gzhug
NK044(phi)001:11145: pa'i bon las theg pa chen po'i rigs sad de
NK044(phi)001:11146: phyi ma 'di rnams rim bzhin 'byung yang rung la
NK044(phi)001:11147: par mngon no // / khye'u sangs rgyas su smon lam btab pa'am /
NK044(phi)001:11148: gyad pak+shi tas byams pa'i sems bskyed dang por byas
NK044(phi)001:11149: nas tshong dpon gyi bu sogs rim bzhin yin kyang
NK044(phi)001:11150: 'gal ba med mod lung gis gsal ba med na
NK044(phi)001:11151: rigs pas mtha' gcig tu dpyad par daka'o //
NK044(phi)001:11152: des na snga ma de dag gi go rim ci
NK044(phi)001:11153: ltar kyang thugs bskyed pa thog mar gsungs pa'i don
NK044(phi)001:11154: la ni gnas skabs so so'i dbang gis 'gal ba
NK044(phi)001:11156: de la spyir sangs rgyas la dmigs nas de thob 'dod kyi bsam pas smon lam gcig btab kyang /
NK044(phi)001:11157: de'i 'bras bu bla med byang chub chen por smin nges pa chud mi za ba yin te /
NK044(phi)001:11158: bdud sdig can gyis g.yo byas nas byang chub tu
NK044(phi)001:11159: sems bskyed pa yang sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:11161: 'on kyang 'phags sa ma thob pa tshun chad dang /
NK044(phi)001:11162: lhag par las dang po pa'i sa na byang chub
NK044(phi)001:11163: tu sems bskyed pa'i sa bon tsam ma nyams kyang
NK044(phi)001:11164: / rkyen ngan pa dang 'phrad nas byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:11165: kyi rgyun skye ba kun tu rgyun chags par mi
NK044(phi)001:11166: 'byung bar tshe rabs la lar brjed pa sogs kyang
NK044(phi)001:11167: srid pas spyir mi brtan pa dang brtan par 'byung
NK044(phi)001:11169: bye brag tu rgyu lnga po las grogs stobs tsam
NK044(phi)001:11170: las byung ba rigs sogs rang stobs med na mi
NK044(phi)001:11171: brtan pa dang / gzhan bzhi las byung ba la brtan pa'i tha snyad kyang mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:11173: sems bskyed de ni sa rnams la //
NK044(phi)001:11174: mos dang lhag bsam dag pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:11175: rnam par smin pa gzhan du 'dod //
NK044(phi)001:11176: de bzhin sgrib pa spangs pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:11177: zhes mos spyod kyi sar mos pa spyod pa las byung ba'i sems bskyed /
NK044(phi)001:11178: ma dag sa bdun du bdag gzhan mnyam pa'i sems
NK044(phi)001:11179: 'byongs pas lhag bsam rnam par dag pa'i sems bskyed
NK044(phi)001:11180: / dag sa gsum du 'bad med lhun grub tu 'byung ba rnam par smin pa'i sems bskyed /
NK044(phi)001:11181: sangs rgyas kyi sar sgrib pa mtha' dag spangs pa'i sems bskyed mthar thug yin pas /
NK044(phi)001:11182: sa dang lam bgrod de gong nas gong du je
NK044(phi)001:11183: bzang du song ba'i khyad par gyis skye ba sna
NK044(phi)001:11184: tshogs su thugs bskyed pa yang nas yang du byas
NK044(phi)001:11185: pa'i tshul sna tshogs mdo rnams las gsungs pa bzhin
NK044(phi)001:11186: no // de bzhin du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa zhes pa 'di la yang /
NK044(phi)001:11187: bzod pa chung ngu chos la chos kyi rjes su
NK044(phi)001:11188: mthun pa'i bzod pa thob pa sbyor lam bzod pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11189: skabs dang / 'bring po yongs su grags pa chos
NK044(phi)001:11190: nyid kyi bden pa mngon sum dang por gzigs pa
NK044(phi)001:11192: bzod pa chen po ni sa brgyad pa thob pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11193: tshe mnyam rjes thams cad du mi rtog pa'i ye
NK044(phi)001:11194: shes yongs su smin pa la mi skye ba'i chos
NK044(phi)001:11195: la bzod pa thob pa zhes gsungs pa'i skabs so
NK044(phi)001:11196: so yod la / mdor na gong nas gong du
NK044(phi)001:11197: rtogs pa na 'phar te skye med kyi don la
NK044(phi)001:11198: bzod pa je bzang du gyur pa'i gnas skabs de
NK044(phi)001:11199: dang de la dgongs te mi skye ba'i bzod pa
NK044(phi)001:11200: thob pa'i tshul du mdo las gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11201: sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgos pa'i dbang gis lung bstan pa la'ang /
NK044(phi)001:11202: bla med byang chub kyi rgyu phra mo tsam zhig
NK044(phi)001:11203: byas pa yang mthar ring mo zhig na byang chub
NK044(phi)001:11204: chen por smin nges pa'i tshul gzigs te sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11206: sa dang po thob pa'i skabs su lung bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11207: sa brgyad pa thob tshe sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung
NK044(phi)001:11208: ston pa chos nyid yin pas bdag cag gi ston
NK044(phi)001:11209: pa yang bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang por gyur
NK044(phi)001:11210: pa'i tshe mar me mdzad mthong ma thag tu sa
NK044(phi)001:11211: brgyad pa thob pa la sangs rgyas su lung bstan
NK044(phi)001:11212: pa 'di nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11213: gtso bor grags che bas mar me mdzad 'das pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11214: sangs rgyas su gtso bor ngos 'dzin pa'ang de'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:11215: gis byung ngo // gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:11216: 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa yin kyang skabs der
NK044(phi)001:11217: lung ma bstan pa sogs sna tshogs pa'i tshul yod
NK044(phi)001:11218: gis byung ngo // de / ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:11219: mo'u 'gal gyi bu gang zag gi dbang gis sangs
NK044(phi)001:11220: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos ston pa go bar
NK044(phi)001:11221: mdzad do // zhes gsungs pa bzhin dang /
NK044(phi)001:11223: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:11224: byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par lung ston pa /
NK044(phi)001:11225: bskyed ma thag tu lung ston pa /
NK044(phi)001:11227: bzod pa thob nas mngon sum du lung ston pa
NK044(phi)001:11228: rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa lta bu yang shes par
NK044(phi)001:11229: bya'o // gong du bshad pa de ltar thugs bskyed
NK044(phi)001:11230: nas sangs rgyas tshad med pa las dge ba'i rtsa
NK044(phi)001:11231: ba bskyed pa'i tshul 'dul ba gzhi las gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:11233: bskal pa grangs med dang po la ni /
NK044(phi)001:11234: sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa nas //
NK044(phi)001:11236: de'i bar bdun khri lnga stong gi //
NK044(phi)001:11237: sangs rgyas rnams ni ngas mchod do //
NK044(phi)001:11238: grangs med gcig ni 'das pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:11239: rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te //
NK044(phi)001:11240: sangs rgyas nyid ni 'dod pa'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:11241: nga la skyo ba'i sems med do //
NK044(phi)001:11243: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nas te /
NK044(phi)001:11244: dbang po'i rgyal mtshan thub pa'i bar //
NK044(phi)001:11245: bdun khri drug stong dag gi ni //
NK044(phi)001:11246: sangs rgyas rnams ni nga yis mchod //
NK044(phi)001:11247: grangs med gnyis po tshang ba ni //
NK044(phi)001:11248: rgyal ba nga yis mchod byas te //
NK044(phi)001:11249: skye ba de dang de dag tu //
NK044(phi)001:11250: nga la skyo ba'i sems med do //
NK044(phi)001:11251: grangs med pa ni gsum pa la'ang //
NK044(phi)001:11252: sangs rgyas legs mdzad nas bzung ste //
NK044(phi)001:11253: sangs rgyas 'od srung bar dag tu //
NK044(phi)001:11254: bdun khri bdun stong nga yis mchod //
NK044(phi)001:11255: grangs med gsum po de la ni //
NK044(phi)001:11256: rgyal ba ngas ni mchod byas te //
NK044(phi)001:11257: byang chub phyir ni spyod pa na //
NK044(phi)001:11258: de tshe nga la skyo sems med //
NK044(phi)001:11259: nga ni byang chub sems dpa' na //
NK044(phi)001:11260: sangs rgyas mchog ni de dag mchod //
NK044(phi)001:11262: nga ni sangs rgyas nyid du bstan //
NK044(phi)001:11263: ngas ni sngon bsams gang yin pa //
NK044(phi)001:11264: nga ni smon lam thams cad rdzogs //
NK044(phi)001:11265: ngas ni sangs rgyas khur bor te //
NK044(phi)001:11266: sems can rnams ni rjes su bzung //
NK044(phi)001:11268: gzhan yang kun dga' bos zhus te /
NK044(phi)001:11269: sangs rgyas rnams mchod pa'i tshul rgyas par gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:11270: de dag ni sangs rgyas mchod pa'i tshul rags rim tsam gsungs pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:11271: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis sngon sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11272: grangs med tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa la
NK044(phi)001:11273: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun cing de lta bu'i sangs
NK044(phi)001:11274: rgyas re re la'ang mchod pa tshad med pas mchod
NK044(phi)001:11275: pa dang / chos tshad med pa bzung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:11276: tshad med pa'i smon lam gyi stobs yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11277: tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyongs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11278: sems can tshad med pa smin par byas pas rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:11279: smin sbyangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni brjod
NK044(phi)001:11280: pa'i mtha' las 'das pa yin kyang ci rigs pa
NK044(phi)001:11281: mtshon byed du gsungs pa mdo bzhin bkod pa la
NK044(phi)001:11282: / sngon bram ze sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11283: de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib med lung ston zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:11284: ba sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa
NK044(phi)001:11285: de la / thams cad dang ldan pa'i snang la nor bu'i bla re kun tu bres pa /
NK044(phi)001:11286: sa thams cad gser gyi glegs mas g.yogs pa /
NK044(phi)001:11287: gser gyi khang brtsegs 'phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam
NK044(phi)001:11288: pa stong phrag brgyad cus gnas bcur kun tu brgyan
NK044(phi)001:11289: te / khang brtsegs re re yang bu mo rgyan
NK044(phi)001:11290: thams cad kyis brgyan pa stong dag mngon par 'dug
NK044(phi)001:11291: te / cing / khang brtsegs re re'i sa la
NK044(phi)001:11292: sil snyan stong gi sgra dbyangs 'byung ba khang brtsegs
NK044(phi)001:11293: kyi sa thams cad me tog kha dog rnam pa
NK044(phi)001:11294: te / cing / lnga bkram pa / lha'i spos kyis byugs pa /
NK044(phi)001:11295: lha'i bdug spos kyis bdug pa'i sprin 'khrigs pa /
NK044(phi)001:11296: dga' zhing dregs par byed pa byas te /
NK044(phi)001:11297: sangs rgyas kyi mthus khang brtsegs dang de thams cad kyang ma bzung bar nam mkha' la 'gro ba /
NK044(phi)001:11298: khang brtsegs de dag las sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la bstod pa'i sgra dang /
NK044(phi)001:11300: rgyun zhugs sogs 'bras bu bzhi dang /
NK044(phi)001:11309: thar pa dang mthun pa'i sgra rnams 'byung zhing /
NK044(phi)001:11310: khang brtsegs de bar snang la 'gro ba'i mdun du
NK044(phi)001:11311: spos chu'i char dang lha'i me tog gi char 'bebs
NK044(phi)001:11312: shing me tog gis gtor bar byed pa de lta
NK044(phi)001:11313: bu phul nas bram ze sgra rnam par grags pas
NK044(phi)001:11314: sangs rgyas la bstod pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod
NK044(phi)001:11316: yang sngon gyi rgyal po dga' mthong zhes bya ba gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa /
NK044(phi)001:11317: de'i tshe grong khyer de mchog tu rgyas shing gling
NK044(phi)001:11318: re rer yang grong khyer sa ya phrag brgyad brgyad
NK044(phi)001:11319: byung ba / grong khyer re rer yang chu zhing du dpag tshad bcu re yod pa /
NK044(phi)001:11321: shin tu sprul pa mig mang ris su bris pa /
NK044(phi)001:11322: gser gyi skud pas sbrel ba /
NK044(phi)001:11323: rab rin po che thams cad dang lcog 'dzam bu'i chu gser las byas pa /
NK044(phi)001:11324: steng nor bu rin thang med pa'i d+r+wa bas g.yogs pa /
NK044(phi)001:11325: nor bu rin thang med pas sa gzhi bkram pa /
NK044(phi)001:11326: rin chen sna bdun gyi dril bu gser kha'i d+r+wa bas brgyan pa /
NK044(phi)001:11327: sems can dge rtsa dpag med bsags pa rnams kyi gnas /
NK044(phi)001:11328: rin chen sna bdun gyi shing ljon pas mdzes pa /
NK044(phi)001:11329: de'i phyi nang du longs spyod rgya chen po dang ldan te /
NK044(phi)001:11330: mi rnams rtse bar 'dod pa'i tshe pi wang dang sil snyan yan lag lnga pa'i sgra dang /
NK044(phi)001:11331: dri za'i rol mo 'dod na de'i sgra sogs gang
NK044(phi)001:11332: dang rtse bar 'dod pa de dang de 'byung ba
NK044(phi)001:11334: khrir rtse bar 'dod na yang de ltar rtse zhing rtag tu rtse bas dga' ba dang ldan no //
NK044(phi)001:11335: der de bzhin gshegs pa bdud rtsi'i 'od zer zhes bya ba byon pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11336: rgyal po dga' mthong gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:11337: gyi khams der dar gyi lnga ldi btags shing thams
NK044(phi)001:11339: sngon gyi mi dang bcas par de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:11340: de 'khor bcas kyi yongs su spyad pa'i don du
NK044(phi)001:11341: phul zhing / rang gi bu dang chung ma dang 'khor rnams kyang phul te /
NK044(phi)001:11342: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun 'bum phrag
NK044(phi)001:11343: brgyad dang thabs gcig tu lo sa ya phrag brgyad
NK044(phi)001:11344: du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pas yongs su
NK044(phi)001:11346: yang rgyal po seng ge'i blo gros zhes bya ba
NK044(phi)001:11347: sgra dang bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa zhig
NK044(phi)001:11348: tu gyur pa des yul de na 'khod pa'i dge
NK044(phi)001:11349: sbyong dang bram ze thams cad bsdus te kha zas
NK044(phi)001:11350: ro brgya pa'i ston mo byas shing ka sha'i ras
NK044(phi)001:11351: kyis bkab nas lo khri phrag brgyad kyi bar du
NK044(phi)001:11352: nyin mtshan rtag par rgyun du sbyin pa byin cing
NK044(phi)001:11353: dge sbyong dang bram ze dag la yang /
NK044(phi)001:11354: bstan bcos kyi don yongs su bris /
NK044(phi)001:11355: sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la yang blta'o //
NK044(phi)001:11356: shes rab kyi dbang po'i stobs dang stobs ma yin pa shes par bya ba'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:11357: de ltar brtson par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11358: yang sngon gyi tshe bram ze zla dga' zhes bya ba shing swa la chen po lta bu /
NK044(phi)001:11361: rig byed gsum yan lag dang bcas pa shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:11362: sngon byung ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa /
NK044(phi)001:11363: 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gzhi lung ston pa /
NK044(phi)001:11365: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan nyid shes pa /
NK044(phi)001:11366: rig pa gsum gyi tshig la bri ba med pa /
NK044(phi)001:11367: las kyi rnam par smin pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa zhig tu gyur pa na /
NK044(phi)001:11368: des slong mos 'tsho ba'i mu stegs dang gdol pa thams cad dang /
NK044(phi)001:11369: kun tu slong ba thams cad slong mos 'tsho ba'i
NK044(phi)001:11370: ched du lto 'gengs par byed cing nyi ma stong
NK044(phi)001:11371: dang nyis stong sum stong bzhi stong du yang ston
NK044(phi)001:11372: mo byed / thabs des lo 'bum phrag brgyad du zla bas mchod sbyin bsgrubs shing /
NK044(phi)001:11373: gang la sems rab tu zhen par byas pa de ni yon gnas su la'ang ma zhus so //
NK044(phi)001:11374: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan thams cad
NK044(phi)001:11375: dang bral ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byon
NK044(phi)001:11376: te / de'i nyan thos 'dus pa skar ma'i grangs dang mnyam pa byung /
NK044(phi)001:11377: byang chub sems dpa'i 'dus pa yang de ltar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:11378: de nas bram ze zla dga' des bdag gi mchod
NK044(phi)001:11379: sbyin gyi bkang sar ya mtshan can kun 'jug mod
NK044(phi)001:11380: kyi / de bzhin gshegs pa de dang nyan thos ni mi 'jug na /
NK044(phi)001:11381: mchod sbyin gyi gnas 'dir 'jug pa'i thabs ci yod snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:11382: bdag gis mchod sbyin gyi skyon gang gis de ltar mi 'jug snyam na /
NK044(phi)001:11383: sangs rgyas dge 'dun dang bcad pa dus su za ba yin la /
NK044(phi)001:11384: zas nam grub par 'grims pas 'dir mi 'jug gam snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:11385: de nas bram ze de snga bar langs nas bram
NK044(phi)001:11386: ze dang bram ze mo mang pos yongs su bskor
NK044(phi)001:11387: zhing rgod ma dkar mo'i shing rta la zhon te
NK044(phi)001:11388: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11389: de bzhin gshegs pa de shing ljon pa zhig gi
NK044(phi)001:11390: drung na bzhugs shing shin tu mdzes la dbang po
NK044(phi)001:11391: dul bar mthong nas 'di snyam du bdag gis de
NK044(phi)001:11393: dge slong gi tshod tsam du shes pa ni nongs te /
NK044(phi)001:11394: bcom ldan 'das 'di ni phul du byung ba'o //
NK044(phi)001:11395: 'di la phul du byung ba'i zhal zas dang na bza' sogs 'bul bar bya'o snyam zhing /
NK044(phi)001:11396: de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:11397: bdag gi ming nas lan gsum smras so //
NK044(phi)001:11398: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong tsam du bzung ba'i nongs pa 'chags so //
NK044(phi)001:11399: bcom ldan 'das dge 'dun dang bcas pa la ji
NK044(phi)001:11400: srid 'tsho'i bar du yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen
NK044(phi)001:11401: bkur bya'o zhes zhus pa la bcom ldan 'das kyis
NK044(phi)001:11402: bka' stsal pa / sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung
NK044(phi)001:11403: ba ni gang zag gcig gi phyir ma yin pas
NK044(phi)001:11404: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du mi bzhugs so //
NK044(phi)001:11406: 'o na dgung bdun du bsnyen bkur bya bar gnang
NK044(phi)001:11407: bar mdzad du gsol zhes zhus pa la cang mi
NK044(phi)001:11409: de nas bram ze zla dgas rang gi khyim du
NK044(phi)001:11410: gnyen bsdus te thams cad la khyed rnams mthu dang
NK044(phi)001:11411: nus pa ci yod pas 'bad par gyis shig ces
NK044(phi)001:11412: byas nas / 'khor gyi khyams chu zhing dpag tshad bcu gnyis la byas te /
NK044(phi)001:11413: klu'i rgyal po la bdag gis bcom ldan 'das 'khor
NK044(phi)001:11414: bcas spyan drangs kyis bshes par mdzod cig ces bskul
NK044(phi)001:11415: bas spod chus chag chag btab bo //
NK044(phi)001:11416: de bzhin du gnod sbyin rnams la gdan bshams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11417: dri za rnams la rol mo byed par bskul lo //
NK044(phi)001:11418: grul bum rnams la bla re bres par bskul lo //
NK044(phi)001:11419: de bzhin du klu rnams kyis rlung bsil ba ldang bas tsha ba med par dang /
NK044(phi)001:11420: nor bu dang mu tig gi rgyan kyang byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11421: der bcom ldan 'das 'khor bcas gdan la bzhugs nas
NK044(phi)001:11422: lha'i spos dang me tog gi char 'bebs shing dri
NK044(phi)001:11423: za rnams kyis rol mo byed do //
NK044(phi)001:11424: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rdzu 'phrul gyis
NK044(phi)001:11425: 'khor gyi khyams de dpag tshad brgya pa beed+aur+ya'i ra
NK044(phi)001:11426: bas bskor zhing shel gyi kha ran btags par gyur
NK044(phi)001:11427: to // der zhal zas sna tshogs bsod pa dag
NK044(phi)001:11428: gis bstabs shing dpag bsam gyi ras bcos bu zung
NK044(phi)001:11429: to // res g.yogs so // de'i tshe nyi ma
NK044(phi)001:11430: zla ba nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i lta'i bu dbang
NK044(phi)001:11431: dang gzi brjid che ba dag gis 'khor der gang
NK044(phi)001:11432: to // res g.yogs so // bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:11433: de nas zas kyi bya ba mdzad pa'i rjes su
NK044(phi)001:11434: bram ze zla dgas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba
NK044(phi)001:11435: to // res g.yogs so // bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:11436: / bdag gis sbyin pa 'di sems can thams cad
NK044(phi)001:11438: dge rtsa 'dis sems can thams cad bla med rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:11439: pa'i byang chub thob par gyur cig ces gsol ba
NK044(phi)001:11440: la / bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pas /
NK044(phi)001:11441: nyi ma dang zla ba nas dkyil 'khor gyi mtha'i
NK044(phi)001:11442: lha'i bar du dag pa gser gyi mdog gi 'od
NK044(phi)001:11443: kyis khyab bo // der bram ze zla dgas gsol pa /
NK044(phi)001:11444: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od btang ba'i ji tsam du
NK044(phi)001:11445: khyab pas sems can rnams la reg pa de thams
NK044(phi)001:11446: cad bcom ldan 'das la mi phyed pa'i dad pa
NK044(phi)001:11447: skyes lags so // bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa
NK044(phi)001:11448: ba 'dis rnam par smin pa gang lags pa de
NK044(phi)001:11449: sems can thams cad la stsal bar bagyi'o //
NK044(phi)001:11450: bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa de'i rgyu dang rkyen gang lags /
NK044(phi)001:11452: bram ze ji tsam du 'od 'dis khyab pa'i sems
NK044(phi)001:11453: can de dag thams cad bla med rdzogs pa'i byang
NK044(phi)001:11454: chub kyi lam las phyir mi ldog par de thams
NK044(phi)001:11455: cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par 'tshang
NK044(phi)001:11456: rgya zhing sems can gyi don byas nas yongs su
NK044(phi)001:11458: de dag thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sa bon bskyed pa yin no zhes gsungs te /
NK044(phi)001:11459: sangs rgyas 'khor bcas stan las bzhengs nas gshegs so //
NK044(phi)001:11460: de ltar bram ze des sems can de dag lung
NK044(phi)001:11461: bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas zhag bdun du
NK044(phi)001:11462: bkur sti dang bla mar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11463: de bzhin gshegs pa des bdag lung ma bstan kyang sems zhum pa med cing /
NK044(phi)001:11464: bdag bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'tshang mi rgya'o snyam du yang sems par ma gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:11465: yang sngon bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems dpa' gzhon nu spyod ces bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11466: de bzhin gshegs pa phung po chen pos byang chub
NK044(phi)001:11467: sems dpa'i sde snod byang chub kyi lam bshad cing
NK044(phi)001:11468: / sangs rgyas de nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang
NK044(phi)001:11469: bcas pa lo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug
NK044(phi)001:11470: tu yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur rgya chen
NK044(phi)001:11471: po byas nas bla med byang chub tu smon lam
NK044(phi)001:11472: btab kyang sangs rgyas su lung bstan pa mthob bo
NK044(phi)001:11473: / // yang de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog yan lag ces bya ba byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11474: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mdzes par snang ba'i yul der /
NK044(phi)001:11475: bcom ldan 'das nyid tshong dpon shes rab bzang po
NK044(phi)001:11476: zhes bya bar gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i sde
NK044(phi)001:11477: snod kyi lam bshad pa tshong dpon des sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11478: dkon mchog yan lag dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas
NK044(phi)001:11479: par lo stong du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad
NK044(phi)001:11481: bla med rdzogs byang du smon lam btab kyang lung bstan pa ma thob la /
NK044(phi)001:11482: de'i rjes su mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:11484: yang sngon gyi tshe bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab
NK044(phi)001:11485: pa'i snga rol du de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus
NK044(phi)001:11486: mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dus su /
NK044(phi)001:11487: bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid bram ze'i bu mo blo gros mtha' yas zhes bya bar gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11488: sangs rgyas des rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med pa dag yongs su 'chad pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11489: sangs rgyas de la bsnyen bkur byas shing /
NK044(phi)001:11490: rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bas kyang rgya
NK044(phi)001:11491: che ba de 'drar 'gyur ba'i smon lam btab cing
NK044(phi)001:11492: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams der yongs su bsngosa shing
NK044(phi)001:11493: brtson 'grus ma btang bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya
NK044(phi)001:11494: che ba yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir sangs
NK044(phi)001:11495: rgyas bye ba khrag khrig tshad med pa rnams la
NK044(phi)001:11496: bsnyen bkur byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgya cher
NK044(phi)001:11497: yongs su dag par sangs rgyas te /
NK044(phi)001:11498: da ltar bcom ldan 'das nyid la /
NK044(phi)001:11499: phyogs bcu'i zhing so sor sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gzhan dang gzhan gyi rnam par rtogs pa'i tshul dang /
NK044(phi)001:11500: de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11501: kyi zhing shin tu rgya che ba bsam gyis mi
NK044(phi)001:11502: khyab pa'i bkod pa las brtsams te /
NK044(phi)001:11503: de dag bstan pa rnams ni zhib par dkon mchog
NK044(phi)001:11504: 'byung gnas kyi mdo las gsungs pa gzhin du shes
NK044(phi)001:11505: par bya'o // gzhan yang sngon ded dpon du gyur
NK044(phi)001:11506: pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs shing rta skal ldan zhes
NK044(phi)001:11507: bya ba dgra bcom drug khri nyis stong gi zhabs
NK044(phi)001:11508: 'bring dang bcas par chu bo gang+g+aa las 'byor pa
NK044(phi)001:11509: chen po dang ldan pas gru zam byas nas bsgral
NK044(phi)001:11510: par bya'o // te / zhal zas bzang pos kyang
NK044(phi)001:11511: tshim par byas nas bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK044(phi)001:11512: tu smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11513: yang rgyal po chen po zhig tu gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11514: sangs rgyas tshangs pa dgra bcom pa drug khri nyis
NK044(phi)001:11515: stong bcas pa la tsan dan sa mchog gi khang
NK044(phi)001:11516: pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan cing me tog dang
NK044(phi)001:11518: zhal zas dang bde ba'i yod byad thams cad kyis zla ba gsum du bsnyen bkur byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11519: yang rgyal po gyur pa'i tshe sangs rgyas tsan dan 'khor bcas la spos chab dang /
NK044(phi)001:11520: rin po che'i bum pas khrus gsol zhing mchod pa phul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:11521: yang rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas zla ba la
NK044(phi)001:11522: zla ba gsum gyi bar du yo byad thams cad
NK044(phi)001:11524: yang rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe na sangs rgyas dbang
NK044(phi)001:11525: po 'dul ba la zla ba gsum gyi bar du
NK044(phi)001:11526: yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11527: yang rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas rin po che'i
NK044(phi)001:11528: ri bo nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
NK044(phi)001:11529: la lo lnga'i dga' ston byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11530: yang rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas rtogs mdzad la
NK044(phi)001:11531: sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrags pas mchod cing
NK044(phi)001:11532: / zhal zas bzang po gsol nas bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11533: yang bram zer gyur pas sangs rgyas dbang po'i rgyal
NK044(phi)001:11534: mtshan la tshigs su bcas pas bstod pa byas shing
NK044(phi)001:11535: / zhal zas bzang po yang gsol nas bla med byang chub tu smon lam btab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11536: yang rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas bde mdzad la
NK044(phi)001:11537: zhal zas dang 'bum ri ba'i na bza' phul te
NK044(phi)001:11538: / sku gdung gi mchod rten khor yug tu dpag tshad gcig dang /
NK044(phi)001:11539: 'phang du rgyang grags yod pa byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11540: yang rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas gang po 'khor
NK044(phi)001:11541: dang bcas pa la zla ba gsum gyi bar du
NK044(phi)001:11542: yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa dang
NK044(phi)001:11543: / yang khyim bdag thos spyod ces bya bar gyur
NK044(phi)001:11544: pa'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mi gnas par sbyor
NK044(phi)001:11545: ba la yo byad thams cad sbyar nas gnas ma
NK044(phi)001:11546: yin pa shes pa thob pa'i smon lam btab pa
NK044(phi)001:11547: / dang / yang bram ze'i dbang pos byin zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11548: de bzhin gshegs pa zug rngu 'byin pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11549: lo khri'i bar du yo byad thams cad bstabs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11550: yang rgyal po dpal gyi snying por gyur pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:11551: bram ze dka' thub pa gcig la rang gi bu
NK044(phi)001:11552: mo gzugs mchog tu bzang ba byin pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11553: yang dge slong yid 'ong zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11554: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs sgrogs bla ma sogs bskal pa gcig la /
NK044(phi)001:11555: sangs rgyas khri nyis stong byung ba thams cad kyi rim gro bar byas te /
NK044(phi)001:11556: thugs dang mthun par gyur pa sogs sangs rgyas mang po mchod pa'i tshul ni /
NK044(phi)001:11557: 'dul ba gzhi'i lung bam po nga gcig pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11559: gang po sogs kyi rtogs brjod brgya pa'i skabs skabs su gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11560: mdo sde sna tshogs las skabs su gsungs pa rnams shin tu mang zhing /
NK044(phi)001:11561: tshul 'chal tshar gcod pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:11562: bcom ldan 'das nyid 'khor los sgyur ba nga las
NK044(phi)001:11563: nu zhes bya ba mtshan mthun pa sha stag tu
NK044(phi)001:11564: skye ba bzhes pa bye ba phrag bcu gnyis dang
NK044(phi)001:11565: / rgyal po lha chen po zhes bya ba mtshan mthun pa bye ba phrag bzhi dang /
NK044(phi)001:11566: de bzhin du tshangs byin dang /
NK044(phi)001:11570: gzugs mdzes zhes pa la sogs pa 'khor los sgyur
NK044(phi)001:11571: ba ming mthun pa ches mang po zhig tu gyur
NK044(phi)001:11572: te sangs rgyas mchod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11573: gzhan yang sngon dmigs pa can gyi sa la gnas
NK044(phi)001:11574: nas bskal pa ches mang por sangs rgyas tshad med
NK044(phi)001:11575: mchod kyang lung bstan ma thob pa'i tshul gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:11576: dang / ye shes rgyas pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:11577: 'das pa'i dus na gzugs la mos pas bud med
NK044(phi)001:11578: gzugs lta na sdug pa mchog khri phrag dpag tu
NK044(phi)001:11579: med pa yongs su btang ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11580: sgra la mos pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten
NK044(phi)001:11581: la rol mo'i sgra sna tshogs dag gis mchod kyang
NK044(phi)001:11583: dri la mos pas dri mang po dag yongs su btang /
NK044(phi)001:11584: rol mos pas 'bras bu mang po sna tshogs dang
NK044(phi)001:11585: ro'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs dag yongs su
NK044(phi)001:11587: reg bya la mos pas gos 'jam po sna tshogs btang ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:11588: chos la mos pas shes pa sna tshogs dag bslabs kyang yongs su tshims pa med do //
NK044(phi)001:11589: gang mya ngan las 'das pa la mos pa de
NK044(phi)001:11590: ni mos pa de las yongs su nyams pa med
NK044(phi)001:11591: do // de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas
NK044(phi)001:11592: mos pa du ma shes pa la bslab par bya
NK044(phi)001:11593: do // ste / mos pa thams cad kyang 'gog pa'i chos can du blta'o //
NK044(phi)001:11596: sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi mdzod kyi yi ge sogs mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:11597: bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon 'khor los sgyur ba sogs
NK044(phi)001:11598: su gyur pas sangs rgyas mtshan mthun pa ches mang
NK044(phi)001:11599: po la mchod cing chos bzung ba'i tshul du ma
NK044(phi)001:11600: gsungs la / mtshan mi mthun pa de bas mang
NK044(phi)001:11601: zhing tshad med pa mchod pa lta ci smos te
NK044(phi)001:11602: gsungs la / / bcom ldan 'das nyid sngon 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pas /
NK044(phi)001:11603: sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa zhes bya ba mtshan mthun
NK044(phi)001:11604: pa sha stag du ma nyan thos kyi tshogs dang
NK044(phi)001:11605: bcas pa la / yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen
NK044(phi)001:11606: bkur sogs kyis bla med rdzogs byang bsgrubs pa dang
NK044(phi)001:11607: bcas pa la / / sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mtshan mthun pa brgyad stong dang /
NK044(phi)001:11608: sangs rgyas rab tu 'bar ba zhes pa mtshan mthun
NK044(phi)001:11609: pa bye ba phrag gsum la yang de ltar mchod
NK044(phi)001:11610: pa dang / sangs rgyas s+aa la'i rgyal po mtshan
NK044(phi)001:11611: mthun khri drug stong byung ba de dag las rab
NK044(phi)001:11613: yang sangs rgyas yan lag 'phags pa khri lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:11614: la 'khor los sgyur bar gyur pas yo byad thams
NK044(phi)001:11615: cad kyis rim gro byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11616: yang sangs rgyas rab tu 'bar bar mtshan mthun pa khri lnga stong dang /
NK044(phi)001:11617: koon+di nya'i rigs zhes bya ba phrag dgu bcu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11618: sangs rgyas 'od srung zhes bya ba stong phrag dgu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11619: gzhan yang sangs rgyas ma byon pa'i bskal pa la
NK044(phi)001:11620: rang sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag dgu bcu dag ste
NK044(phi)001:11621: 'di thams cad la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsod
NK044(phi)001:11623: bskal pa lnga brgyar rang sangs rgyas stong phrag bye
NK044(phi)001:11624: ba dang stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la bsnyen
NK044(phi)001:11625: bkur byas shing / de nas bskal pa lnga brgyar
NK044(phi)001:11626: tshangs chen du skyes nas slar 'dzam gling du rgyal
NK044(phi)001:11627: bkur byas shing / por skyes shing / de nas
NK044(phi)001:11628: lha'i dbang por gyur la slar bskal pa brgya stong
NK044(phi)001:11629: phrag dgur mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te /
NK044(phi)001:11630: de'i tshe rang sangs rgyas las sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma byon to //
NK044(phi)001:11631: bskal pa khri bo de 'das nas /
NK044(phi)001:11632: de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu sbas pa zhes bya ba byon pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11634: 'khor los sgyur ba legs mthong zhes bya bar skyes shing /
NK044(phi)001:11635: mi rnams kyis lo stong phrag dgu bcu thub pa'i dus so //
NK044(phi)001:11636: des sangs rgyas 'khor bcas la ji srid 'tsho'i bar bsnyen bkur byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11637: de ltar bskal pa de nas bskal pa grangs med
NK044(phi)001:11638: bdun brgya'i tshe sangs rgyas 'dzam bu mdud pa sogs
NK044(phi)001:11643: drug khri nyis stong dag bsnyen bkur byas kyang lung bstan pa ma thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:11644: de'i tshe dmigs pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing bdag
NK044(phi)001:11645: tu lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir ro
NK044(phi)001:11646: // nam mar me mdzad mthong ba'i tshe lung bstan pa thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:11647: sangs rgyas de mthong ma thag tu mi skye ba'i
NK044(phi)001:11648: chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs
NK044(phi)001:11649: / yang thar pa chen po'i mdo las kyang /
NK044(phi)001:11650: sngon 'das pa'i tshe bskal pa rnam par dag pa
NK044(phi)001:11651: la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa
NK044(phi)001:11652: gnyis sogs sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas
NK044(phi)001:11653: kyang lung bstan pa ma thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:11654: ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar
NK044(phi)001:11655: du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad na yang yang dag
NK044(phi)001:11656: par rdzogs par mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:11657: bskal pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:11658: gshegs pa 'od mi 'gyur gyi tshogs chen po las
NK044(phi)001:11659: / mdo sde thar pa chen po phyogs su rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11660: pa'i rnam grangs thos nas 'dzin pa sogs byas pas
NK044(phi)001:11661: gdod mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob cing
NK044(phi)001:11662: lung bstan to zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:11663: zung gi mdo'i chos kyi rnam grangs las /
NK044(phi)001:11664: sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa dgu bcu rtsa dgu na /
NK044(phi)001:11665: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog ces bya ba byung ba'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11666: nga sbyin pa la dpa' bar gyur nas mchod cing /
NK044(phi)001:11667: yang sangs rgyas zla ba zhes pa bye ba phrag
NK044(phi)001:11668: bcu gnyis la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis
NK044(phi)001:11670: sangs rgyas rin po che thams cad snang ba zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang /
NK044(phi)001:11671: sangs rgyas snying po'i sde zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bco brgyad dang /
NK044(phi)001:11672: sangs rgyas gtsug phud 'byung ba zhes bya ba phrag nyi shu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11673: 'od srung bye ba phrag nyi shu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11674: 'od dri ma med pa bye ba phrag bcu drug dang /
NK044(phi)001:11675: yang sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan
NK044(phi)001:11676: can sha stag pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa
NK044(phi)001:11677: lnga la de ltar mchod cing rim gro rgya chen
NK044(phi)001:11678: po byas so // yang 'khor ba 'jig bye ba phrag dgu bcu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11679: gser thub bye ba phrag bco brgyad /
NK044(phi)001:11680: snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bye ba phrag bcu gsum /
NK044(phi)001:11681: skal rgyal bye ba phrag nyer lnga /
NK044(phi)001:11682: yang sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs bye ba phrag bcu
NK044(phi)001:11683: gnyis kyi tha ma des zung gi chos kyi rnam
NK044(phi)001:11685: de thams cad kyis bla med byang chub tu lung
NK044(phi)001:11686: bstan par byas kyang de nas yang lung bstan pa'i
