NK044(phi)001:11688: zung gi chos thos nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rin po che sna bdun gyi char phab ste /
NK044(phi)001:11689: nga de nyid du rdzogs byang du lung bstan no //
NK044(phi)001:11690: des na ring mo zhig gi bar du nga lung ma bstan to //
NK044(phi)001:11691: de nas bskal pa grangs med pa zhig na mar me mdzad byon te /
NK044(phi)001:11692: nga bram ze'i khye'u sprin zhes bya bar gyur pa de'i dus su lung bstan no zhes sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:11693: de'i tshe ngas bzod pa thob nas /
NK044(phi)001:11694: sngon bskal pa grangs med rnams su phar phyin spyad
NK044(phi)001:11695: pa khar song bzhin dran zhing sems can mang po
NK044(phi)001:11696: dge chos la bkod ces gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:11697: de nas mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa'i tshul ni /
NK044(phi)001:11698: sngon bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyis byang chub kyi
NK044(phi)001:11699: spyod pa spyad nas bskal pa grangs med gnyis rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:11700: pa'i dus su bram ze khye'u blo gros bzang po
NK044(phi)001:11701: zhes bya ba zhig tu gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:11702: de'i tshe sangs rgyas mar me mdzad rgyal po'i pho
NK044(phi)001:11703: brang mar me ldan zhes bya bar rgyal po mar
NK044(phi)001:11704: me zhes bya bas spyan drang bar byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11705: rgyal po mar me'i 'dab na rgyal po nod can
NK044(phi)001:11706: gyi bu zhes bya bas lo bcu gnyis kyi bar
NK044(phi)001:11707: du mchod sbyin byas pa'i mjug tu gser gyi 'khar
NK044(phi)001:11710: rin po che sna bzhir spras pa'i mal khri dang /
NK044(phi)001:11712: bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ste rab tu sbyin pa chen po lnga bshams so //
NK044(phi)001:11713: de'i tshe ljongs gzhan na bram ze'i khye'u blo gros
NK044(phi)001:11714: bzang po dang blo gros bya ba gnyis shig gnas
NK044(phi)001:11715: pas mkhan po las rig byed 'don pa bslabs te
NK044(phi)001:11716: lobs pa dang / chos lugs kyis mkhan po dang
NK044(phi)001:11717: slob dpon gyi yon 'bul ba la sems shing 'dug
NK044(phi)001:11718: pa de gnyis kyis rgyal po nor can mchod sbyin
NK044(phi)001:11719: gyi mjug tu sbyin pa chen po lnga bshams te
NK044(phi)001:11720: lobs pa dang / / 'di bram ze kha ton
NK044(phi)001:11721: rdzogs pa lobs pa de la dbang ngo zer ba
NK044(phi)001:11722: lobs pa dang / / thos nas / de'i drung
NK044(phi)001:11723: du bdag gnyis kha ton lobs shing mang du thos
NK044(phi)001:11724: pa'i rabs yin pa go bar bya'o snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:11725: rgyal po nor can gyi bu la yang lhas sbran te /
NK044(phi)001:11726: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po dang blo gros gnyis 'dir 'ong gis /
NK044(phi)001:11727: de las blo gros bzang po zhes bya ba de
NK044(phi)001:11728: la sbyin pa chen po lnga po 'di phul cig
NK044(phi)001:11729: dang / rgyal po khyod kyis lo bcu gnyis kyi
NK044(phi)001:11730: bar du mchod sbyin byas pa bas 'bras bu ches
NK044(phi)001:11732: rgyal po des de gnyis kyi phyir lhas kyang sbran
NK044(phi)001:11733: pas na de gnyis bdag nyid che ba yin par
NK044(phi)001:11735: de nas rgyal po des thag ring po nas bram
NK044(phi)001:11736: ze'i khye'u byad bzhin bzang la mdzes pa gnyis 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:11737: pa mthong ste / de gnyis mchod sbyin byed pa'i sar bram ze'i gral du bsdad do //
NK044(phi)001:11738: der rgyal pos bdag la lhas sbran pa'i blo gros bzang po 'di yin no snyam ste /
NK044(phi)001:11739: bram ze gral dpon de'i mdun du song nas /
NK044(phi)001:11740: khyod blo gros bzang po yin nam zhes smras pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11741: des nga yin no zhes smras pa de nyid gral dpon du bzhag ste zas byin nas /
NK044(phi)001:11742: sbyin pa chen po lnga po de la byin pa las /
NK044(phi)001:11743: blo gros bzang pos gser gyi 'khar ba sogs bzhi blangs zhing /
NK044(phi)001:11744: bdag tshangs par spyod pa yin no zhes smras te bu mo ni ma blangs so //
NK044(phi)001:11745: bu mo des khye'u blo gros bzang po byad bzhin
NK044(phi)001:11746: bzang la mdzes pa snying du sdug pas khye'u bdag
NK044(phi)001:11747: bzhes shig / des bdag gis blang du mi rung ngo zhes smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:11748: bu mo de yang rgyal pos byin cing bram ze'i khye'usa ma blangs pas na /
NK044(phi)001:11749: rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11750: der rang gi lus las gser gyi rgyan rnams bkrol
NK044(phi)001:11751: nas me tog phreng brgyud pa la byin te 'di
NK044(phi)001:11752: rnams rin che ba yin gyi nga la nyin gcig
NK044(phi)001:11753: bzhin lha'i mchod par ud pa la sngon po byin
NK044(phi)001:11754: cig ces byas pa ltar des kyang byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11755: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos /
NK044(phi)001:11756: sbyin pa chen po bzhi de khyer nas mkhan po
NK044(phi)001:11757: la phul ba las kar+sh+aa pan lnga brgya po slar
NK044(phi)001:11758: blo gros bzang po la byin no //
NK044(phi)001:11759: blo gros bzang pos de'i nub mo rmi lam bcu rmis te /
NK044(phi)001:11760: rgya mtsho chen po btung ngo snyam pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11761: nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang nyi zla mthu che ba dag lag pas bzung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:11762: rgyal po rnams kyis shing rta khyer du gzhug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11764: glang chen dkar po rnams dang /
NK044(phi)001:11767: brag chen po la bzhon pa snyam du rmis so //
NK044(phi)001:11768: de sad nas rmi lam 'di lung ston pa su yod snyam pa las /
NK044(phi)001:11769: de dang thag mi ring ba na drang srong mngon
NK044(phi)001:11770: shes lnga ldan zhig yod pa de la dris pa
NK044(phi)001:11771: dang / des bdag gis lung ston mi nus kyi
NK044(phi)001:11772: rgyal po'i pho brang mar me ldan du songs shig
NK044(phi)001:11773: dang / dang / der sangs rgyas mar me mdzad
NK044(phi)001:11774: spyan drangs pas des lung ston par 'gyur ro zhes
NK044(phi)001:11775: byas pa la blo gros bzang po yang sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:11776: mar me mdzad rgyal po'i pho brang du byon pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11777: nyin der slebs par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11778: der rgyal pos sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir me tog
NK044(phi)001:11779: thams cad bsdu ba'i khrims bcas pas gzhan sus kyang
NK044(phi)001:11780: me tog mi rnyed pa'i tshe na /
NK044(phi)001:11781: bu mo des me tog phreng brgyud mkhan la ud pa la sngon po byin cig ces smras pas /
NK044(phi)001:11783: rgyal pos me tog thams cad bsdus so //
NK044(phi)001:11785: me tog gi rdzing der ltos dang bdag gi bsod
NK044(phi)001:11786: nams kyis ud pa la sngon po ma gtogs pa
NK044(phi)001:11788: der blo gros bzang po'i bsod nams kyi mthus ud
NK044(phi)001:11789: pa la sngon po bdun yod par mthong nas bu
NK044(phi)001:11790: mos de la 'di rnams thogs shig ces smras pa
NK044(phi)001:11791: la / me tog phreng brgyud pa na re /
NK044(phi)001:11792: rgyal pos bdag la gyod 'ong gis btog tu mi rung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11794: khyod kyis sngar me tog thams cad rgyal po la ma phul lam /
NK044(phi)001:11797: 'di ni bdag gi bsod nams kyis yin pas thogs la bdag la byin cig /
NK044(phi)001:11799: rgyal pos mtshor bar 'di ji ltar khyer bar bya /
NK044(phi)001:11801: bdag gi bsod nams las byung bas 'di thogs shig dang /
NK044(phi)001:11802: bdag gis chu'i bum pa'i nang du khyer bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:11803: de nas me tog phreng brgyud pas btogs te byin
NK044(phi)001:11804: pa bu mos blangs nas chu'i bum pa'i nang du
NK044(phi)001:11805: bcug ste khyer nas grong khyer du song ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11806: der blo gros bzang pos sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11807: phyir me tog phreng brgyud pa'i khyim dang kun dga'
NK044(phi)001:11808: ra ba rnams kun tu bskor nas me tog btsal
NK044(phi)001:11809: kyang me tog gcig ma rnyed do //
NK044(phi)001:11810: slar 'khor te skyed tshal du phyin pa na /
NK044(phi)001:11811: bu mo de skyed tshal de nas byung ba dang 'phrad do //
NK044(phi)001:11812: der blo gros bzang po'i bsod nams kyi mthus ud
NK044(phi)001:11813: pa la de dag chu'i bum pa'i nang nas gyen
NK044(phi)001:11815: bu mo de la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:11816: ngas khyod la kar+sh+aa pa na lnga brgya po 'di
NK044(phi)001:11817: sbyin gyis ud pa la 'di nga la byin cig
NK044(phi)001:11819: de'i tshe khyod kyis bdag bzhes su ma gnang na /
NK044(phi)001:11820: da ud pa la bzhed dam /
NK044(phi)001:11821: bdag mi dbul lo zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:11822: yang 'di rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:11823: blo gros bzang pos bdag gis sangs rgyas la mchod par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:11825: bdag kar+sh+aa pa na mi len gyi /
NK044(phi)001:11826: khyod la ud pa la 'di phul ba'i 'bras bus /
NK044(phi)001:11827: bdag tshe rabs thams cad du khyod kyi btsun mor 'gyur bar 'dod de /
NK044(phi)001:11828: khyod de ltar smon lam 'debs na dbul lo //
NK044(phi)001:11829: blo gros bzang pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:11830: nga ni sbyin pa la dga' bas /
NK044(phi)001:11831: bdag gi chung ma dang bu dang rang gi sha yang gtong bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:11833: ci smon lam de thob dang slad kyis khyod sbyin pa la bdag gis bar chad mi byed de /
NK044(phi)001:11834: ci 'dod pa la bdag kyang stsol cig ces smras nas /
NK044(phi)001:11835: ud pa la lnga byin cing /
NK044(phi)001:11836: gnyis ni bdag gis sangs rgyas la mchod de /
NK044(phi)001:11837: rtag tu khyod kyi byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod
NK044(phi)001:11838: pa'i tshe na bdag cig tu mthun par chos spyod
NK044(phi)001:11839: pa'i btsun mor gyur cig ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:11840: der rgyal po des grong khyer thams cad gtsang bar
NK044(phi)001:11841: byas te rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan nas rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:11842: nyid kyis gdugs rtsibs brgya pa thogs te blon po
NK044(phi)001:11843: rnams dang / rgyal po ni nor can gyi bu
NK044(phi)001:11844: blon po dang bcas pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas bsu
NK044(phi)001:11845: zhing phyag byas la grong khyer du gshegs par gsol
NK044(phi)001:11846: rnams dang / ba btab bo // bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:11847: dge slong dang dge mdun gyi mdun bstar te grong
NK044(phi)001:11848: khyer de'i phyogs su chas so //
NK044(phi)001:11849: der grong khyer gyi sgo'i them pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhabs bzhag pa'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:11850: sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yo zhing lha'i me tog dang spos kyi char 'bebs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11851: 'on long smyon pa sogs dbang po rnal du gnas pa thob pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:11853: btsa' ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba sogs sdug bsngal thams
NK044(phi)001:11854: cad las thar nas thams cad byams pa'i sems su
NK044(phi)001:11855: gyur pa dang / rta dang glang po bya sogs
NK044(phi)001:11856: thams cad dga' ba'i sgra 'byin pa sogs ngo mtshar
NK044(phi)001:11857: rmad du byung ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs sangs
NK044(phi)001:11858: rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid kyis byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:11861: bu mo de yang pad+ma dag khyer te /
NK044(phi)001:11862: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la bar dong ba la /
NK044(phi)001:11863: de dag skye bo phal mo ches mchod par bgyid
NK044(phi)001:11864: pas gtams nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ma
NK044(phi)001:11865: tshud do // der sangs rgyas des dgongs pa /
NK044(phi)001:11866: skye bo phal mo che 'di las bram ze'i khye'u
NK044(phi)001:11867: blo gros bzang po bsod nams ches 'phel lo snyam
NK044(phi)001:11868: du / rdzi char drag po sprul pas skye bo de dag gi go skabs phye nas /
NK044(phi)001:11869: blo gros bzang pos skabs thob ste bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:11870: lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong bas shin tu
NK044(phi)001:11872: ud pa la lnga pos gtor ma thag tu /
NK044(phi)001:11873: sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag shing rta'i
NK044(phi)001:11874: 'phang lo tsam du gyur pas bla rer chags shing
NK044(phi)001:11875: dbu'i steng du 'dug pa gshegs na 'gro zhing gzhes
NK044(phi)001:11877: bu mo des de mthong nas dga' ste ud pa
NK044(phi)001:11878: la gnyis sangs rgyas kyi sku la gtor ba de
NK044(phi)001:11879: yang snyan gyi gong du shing rta'i 'phang lo tsam
NK044(phi)001:11880: gyi bla re chags shing dbu'i steng du 'dug pa
NK044(phi)001:11881: gshegs na 'gro zhing gzhes na sdod par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:11882: // bu mo des de mthong nas dga' ste ud
NK044(phi)001:11883: pa la gnyis sangs rgyas kyi sku la gtor ba
NK044(phi)001:11884: de yang snyan gyi gong du shing rta'i 'phang lo
NK044(phi)001:11885: tsam gyi bla re chags shing 'dug par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:11886: // // sa phyogs de dag rdzi char drag pos 'dam rdzab tu gyur pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11887: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang pos rang gi ral
NK044(phi)001:11888: pa gser gyi mdog can bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
NK044(phi)001:11889: sngar bting nas / blo gros sad mdzad gal te bdag /
NK044(phi)001:11890: byang chub tu ni 'tshang rgya na //
NK044(phi)001:11891: skye dga' med mdzad zhabs gnyis kyis //
NK044(phi)001:11892: myur du bdag skra bardzi bar gsol //
NK044(phi)001:11894: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u blo
NK044(phi)001:11895: gros bzang po'i skra'i steng du zhabs gnyis bzhag go
NK044(phi)001:11896: // der blo gros bzang po'i phyi bzhin 'brang ba bram ze'i khye'u blo gros khros nas /
NK044(phi)001:11897: kye ltos dang sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram
NK044(phi)001:11898: ze'i khye'u blo gros bzang po'i skra phyugs la bya
NK044(phi)001:11899: ba bzhin bardzisa so zhes zer ro //
NK044(phi)001:11900: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhal phyir gzigs nas zhabs 'bring ba'i dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:11901: khyed rnams 'di'i skra la ma bardzi zhig /
NK044(phi)001:11902: 'di ni sangs rgyas tshad med pa la dge ba'i
NK044(phi)001:11903: rtsa ba bskyed pa'i gang zag yin no zhes gsungs
NK044(phi)001:11904: so // der de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad
NK044(phi)001:11905: des bram ze'i khye'u khyod ma 'ongs pa bskal pa
NK044(phi)001:11907: mi mjed kyi khams 'dir 'jig rten gsum gyi 'gro
NK044(phi)001:11908: ba'i sgron ma de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK044(phi)001:11909: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa
NK044(phi)001:11910: zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa'i mod
NK044(phi)001:11911: la / bram ze'i khye'u de nam mkha' la ta
NK044(phi)001:11912: la bdun srid tsam du 'phags shing skra byi nas
NK044(phi)001:11913: skra gsar pa khyad par du 'phags pa byung ngo
NK044(phi)001:11914: la / // de nam mkha' la 'dug pa /
NK044(phi)001:11915: skye bo'i tshogs phal mo ches mthong nas gang gi tshe 'di sangs rgyas pa na /
NK044(phi)001:11916: bdag de'i nyan thos su gyur cig ces byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11917: bu mo des kyang khyod gang du sangs rgyas brnyes pa de'i bar du bdag btsun mor gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:11918: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe nyan thos mar gyur cig ces byas so //
NK044(phi)001:11919: rgyal po mar mes bram ze blo gros bzang po'i skra snga ma de blangs pa la /
NK044(phi)001:11920: rgyal po nor can gyi bus skra 'di bdag la byin cig ces smras pas byin no //
NK044(phi)001:11921: des blangs nas bgrangs pas skra nyag ma brgyad khri byung ba /
NK044(phi)001:11922: de'i blon po rnams kyis bslangs pa la skra nyag
NK044(phi)001:11923: re re byin pas thams cad kyis rang rang gi
NK044(phi)001:11924: yul du mchod rten re re brtsigs so //
NK044(phi)001:11925: bram ze blo gros bzang po lung bstan thob pa de la rgyal po mar me dang /
NK044(phi)001:11926: rgyal po nor can gyi bu dang /
NK044(phi)001:11927: grong dang yul mi rnams kyis ma 'ongs pa'i dus
NK044(phi)001:11928: kyi yon tan la bltas te yo byad thams cad
NK044(phi)001:11929: bstabs so // de nas blo gros bzang pos bram ze'i khye'u blo gros la smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:11930: nga ni bla med byang chub tu lung bstan na /
NK044(phi)001:11931: khyod kyis gang du sems bskyed /
NK044(phi)001:11932: des smras pa bdag ni ma rungs te /
NK044(phi)001:11933: sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis khyod kyi skra bardzisa pa de'i tshe bdag khros te /
NK044(phi)001:11934: sangs rgyas 'dis 'di'i skra phyugs la bya ba bzhin rkang pas bardzisa so zhes smras so //
NK044(phi)001:11935: blo gros bzang pos smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:11936: tshur shog sangs rgyas kyi thad du rab tu 'byung bar bya'o zhes smras te /
NK044(phi)001:11937: de gnyis rab tu byung nas /
NK044(phi)001:11938: blo gros bzang pos sde snod gsum bslabs te chos bzhin du 'khor bsdus so //
NK044(phi)001:11939: de shi 'phos nas dga' ldan lha'i ris su skyes so //
NK044(phi)001:11940: bram ze'i khye'u blo gros ni sangs rgyas la mi
NK044(phi)001:11941: snyan pa brjod pas shi 'phos nas sems can dmyal
NK044(phi)001:11942: bar skyes so // der blo gros bzang pos sangs
NK044(phi)001:11943: rgyas la ud pa la sngon po dag gis mchod
NK044(phi)001:11944: pa byas pa'i las de'i rnam par smin pas /
NK044(phi)001:11945: sangs rgyas pa'i bar du 'khor ba na bde ba
NK044(phi)001:11946: chen po myong zhing sangs rgyas pa'i rgyu dang rkyen
NK044(phi)001:11948: sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na yang mdza' sde lnga brgya
NK044(phi)001:11949: po rnams kyi me tog sna tshogs dang rol mo'i
NK044(phi)001:11950: mchod pa 'di lta bu sogs mchod pa chen po
NK044(phi)001:11952: 'di dang mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:11953: bram ze'i khye'u sprin lung bstan pa ni khog mtshungs
NK044(phi)001:11954: kyang mi 'dra ba'i khyad par 'ga' yang snang la
NK044(phi)001:11955: thar lo'i 'gyur phran nang gi skyes rabs kyi gleng
NK044(phi)001:11956: gzhi'i mdo na bram ze blo gros bzang po lung
NK044(phi)001:11957: bstan pa la'ang 'di dag tshig don cung zad mi
NK044(phi)001:11959: 'dir mi bram ze blo gros bzang po lung bstan
NK044(phi)001:11960: pa bzhin bkod pa yin la des gzhan dag kyang
NK044(phi)001:11962: blo gros bzang po dang khye'u sprin ming gi rnam
NK044(phi)001:11963: grangs tsam las don 'dra bar sngon gyi bla ma
NK044(phi)001:11964: dag bzhed / de dus kyi bu mo bzang len
NK044(phi)001:11965: ldan zhes sogs kyi ming can ut+pala ster ba de
NK044(phi)001:11967: mdo la lar sa 'tsho ma zhes gsungs pa ni btsun mo spyi la sa dbang mo dang /
NK044(phi)001:11969: sa 'tsho ma zhes zer ba'i grags 'dzin ma'i ming yang yin la /
NK044(phi)001:11970: grags 'dzin ma ni sh+aakya lag na be con gyi bu mo dang /
NK044(phi)001:11971: khye'u sgra gcan 'dzin gyi mar gyur pa de yin no //
NK044(phi)001:11972: yang sh+aakya dril bu sgra'i bu mo sped ma zhes
NK044(phi)001:11973: pa rgyal bu don grub de la mi g.yengs nas
NK044(phi)001:11974: lcags mda' bye mar rlog pas btsun mor bzhes pa
NK044(phi)001:11975: de dang / sh+aakya dus legs kyi bu mo ri
NK044(phi)001:11976: dwags skyes zhes pas myang 'das kyi sgra brjod pas
NK044(phi)001:11977: rgyal bu mgu nas mu tig gi do shal 'phangs
NK044(phi)001:11978: pas btsun mor bzhes pa de gsum rgyal bu don
NK044(phi)001:11979: grub kyi btsun mo gtso mo yin la gzhan btsun
NK044(phi)001:11980: mo'i 'khor brgya khri yod cing kun gyi nang na
NK044(phi)001:11981: grags 'dzin ma ni mchog tu gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:11982: sped ma langs sa 'tsho ma zhes spyi ming bye
NK044(phi)001:11983: brag la btags nas grags pa mdo phal cher du
NK044(phi)001:11984: de ltar gsungs pa'ang yod pa shan 'byed par bya
NK044(phi)001:11985: zhes mkhas bdag gis bzhed pa don la gnas so
NK044(phi)001:11986: // de ltar mar me mdzad pas lung bstan thob
NK044(phi)001:11987: nas mi skye ba chen po'i bzod pa thob ste
NK044(phi)001:11988: chos kyi lus 'gyur ba med pa la gnas bzhin
NK044(phi)001:11989: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sprul ba'i
NK044(phi)001:11990: rol pa tshad med sna tshogs kyi rdzogs smin sbyangs
NK044(phi)001:11991: pa rgya mtsho skad cig re la bsgrubs ba'i tshul
NK044(phi)001:11992: ni bsam brjod kyi yul las 'das shing /
NK044(phi)001:11993: zhing 'dir sangs rgyas 'od srung gi dus su bram ze'i khye'u ye shes bla mar gyur pa de /
NK044(phi)001:11994: dga' ldan lha'i gnas su skye ba gcig gi thogs
NK044(phi)001:11995: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lha'i bu dam pa tog
NK044(phi)001:11996: dkar por skye ba bzhes nas dus la bab pa'i
NK044(phi)001:11997: tshe / 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gzigs pa lngas gzigs
NK044(phi)001:11998: te dga' ldan nas 'pho ba mdzad pa sogs rgya
NK044(phi)001:11999: cher rol pa dang 'du ba las gsungs pas khog
NK044(phi)001:12000: tshe / phub pa la / sangs rgyas pa'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:12001: na gnas tha dad par gdul bya sna tshogs la
NK044(phi)001:12002: zab pa dang rgya che ba'i brjod bya ston pa
NK044(phi)001:12003: chos kyi 'khor lo rim pa gsum gyi khongs su
NK044(phi)001:12004: gtogs pa'i chos bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12005: shes bya thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sems
NK044(phi)001:12006: can rnams la brtse ba thugs rje chen pos sems
NK044(phi)001:12007: can rnams kyi sngon gyi las kyi tshul sogs dus
NK044(phi)001:12008: gsum gyi shes bya gang dris pa thams cad thogs
NK044(phi)001:12009: pa med par lung bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12010: rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par 'du
NK044(phi)001:12011: mdzad pa sogs kyis sems can rnams sdug bsngal las
NK044(phi)001:12012: bskyabs shing gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi phan bde
NK044(phi)001:12013: la bkod pa'i tshul zhing 'di'i gdul bya thun mong
NK044(phi)001:12014: ba rnams kyi ngor bstan pa'i bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK044(phi)001:12015: sku tshe de'i mdzad pa rnams gzhan las shes par
NK044(phi)001:12016: bya'o // de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi
NK044(phi)001:12017: sku tshe snga ma'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
NK044(phi)001:12018: spyod pa'i mdzad pa che longs rnams mod las byung
NK044(phi)001:12019: ba 'dir bsdus te bstan pa yin la /
NK044(phi)001:12020: 'dir bshad pa dag dang cha 'dra zhing rigs mthun gzhan legs mthong chen po dang /
NK044(phi)001:12021: mi bdag grags pa mtha' yas /
NK044(phi)001:12022: gzhon nu nor bzang sogs kyi rabs dang /
NK044(phi)001:12023: gzhan yang skabs 'di'i phar phyin gyi brjod bya dang
NK044(phi)001:12024: mthun pas 'dir bsdu dgos nges cher med kyang spyir
NK044(phi)001:12025: gtam rgyud legs shing rkun chen la sogs skyes pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12026: rabs su gtogs pa 'ga' zhig bod 'dir ba zhugs
NK044(phi)001:12027: pa'i mdo sder gsungs pa de dag kyang 'di'i kha
NK044(phi)001:12028: skong du bsdus na legs shing /
NK044(phi)001:12029: ma bsdus kyang 'di tsam gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa mtshon par nus la /
NK044(phi)001:12030: skyes pa'i rabs mtha' dag 'di tsam du zad do
NK044(phi)001:12031: zhes skye bo phal pa sus kyang mtha' dpog par
NK044(phi)001:12032: mi nus so // de ltar skyes pa'i rabs 'di
NK044(phi)001:12033: dag gi le'u gcig gi don thos nas dad pa
NK044(phi)001:12035: rnam grol mchog gi sa bon rang rgyud la 'jog cing phan yon tshad med pa yod na /
NK044(phi)001:12036: thams cad mnyan zhing gus pa bskyed pa lta ci
NK044(phi)001:12037: smos tshul 'di dag gis byang chub chen po'i lam
NK044(phi)001:12038: gyi tshul shes shing de la mos pa skye ba
NK044(phi)001:12039: sogs kyi rang gzhan la don chen po yod par
NK044(phi)001:12040: 'gyur te / rmad du byung ba'i slob dpon chen po dpa' bo'i zhal snga nas /
NK044(phi)001:12041: grags par gyur pa'i mtshan ma bzang po'i 'di rnams kyis /
NK044(phi)001:12042: bde bar gshegs 'gyur lam rnams gang yin bstan par 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:12043: yid la dad pa med pa rnams kyang dad par 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:12044: chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis rab tu dga' bar 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:12046: dang por thugs bskyed tshul dang /
NK044(phi)001:12047: sangs rgyas mchod pa sogs kyi tshogs bsags ci rigs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12048: lung bstan pa thob pa'i skabs kyi tshoms brjod pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:12049: gong du ji skad smos pa 'di rnams kyis mtshon
NK044(phi)001:12050: nas skyes pa'i rabs rnams su bstan pa'i sbyin pa
NK044(phi)001:12051: sogs pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi spyod pa
NK044(phi)001:12052: bsam gyis mi khyab pa bskal pa chen po grangs
NK044(phi)001:12053: med pa gsum du brtson par mdzad pa'i rgyun phun
NK044(phi)001:12054: sum tshogs pa de lta bu la brten nas gang
NK044(phi)001:12055: zhig mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i tshe na
NK044(phi)001:12056: ni ye shes dang yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
NK044(phi)001:12058: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam
NK044(phi)001:12059: gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa'i mdo dang
NK044(phi)001:12060: / sangs rgyas kyi stobs bskyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa'i mdo dang /
NK044(phi)001:12061: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab par bstan
NK044(phi)001:12062: pa'i le'u la sogs pa'i don bzhin du shes par
NK044(phi)001:12063: bya la / de ltar sangs rgyas la dad pa
NK044(phi)001:12064: bskyed pa ni lam gyi dang por med du mi
NK044(phi)001:12067: dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad kyi //
NK044(phi)001:12068: rtsa ba mos par thub pas gsungs //
NK044(phi)001:12071: dad pa theg pa mchog yin te //
NK044(phi)001:12074: 'jig rten dag na dad pa mchog /
NK044(phi)001:12075: dad ldan rnam par nyams pa med //
NK044(phi)001:12077: dad pa med pa'i mi la ni //
NK044(phi)001:12078: dkar po'i chos rnams mi skye ste //
NK044(phi)001:12079: me yis tshig pa'i sa bon la //
NK044(phi)001:12080: myu gu sngon po ji bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:12082: dkon mchog t+aa la'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:12083: rgyal dang rgyal ba'i chos la dad gyur cing //
NK044(phi)001:12084: sangs rgyas sras kyi spyod la dad byed la //
NK044(phi)001:12085: byang chub bla na med la dad gyur nas //
NK044(phi)001:12086: skyes bu chen po rnams kyi sems skye'o //
NK044(phi)001:12087: dad pa'i stobs kyis mi bdag gyur pa rnams //
NK044(phi)001:12088: bsam yas rgya chen mchod pa mchod byas shing //
NK044(phi)001:12089: chos dang de bzhin mi phyed dge 'dun la //
NK044(phi)001:12090: bsam yas mchod pas mchod nas sems skye'o //
NK044(phi)001:12091: dad pa sngon 'dren ma ltar bskyed pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:12092: yon tan thams cad srung zhing 'phel bar byed //
NK044(phi)001:12093: dogs pa sel zhing chu bo rnams las sgrol //
NK044(phi)001:12094: dad pa bde ba'i grong khyer mtshon pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:12095: dad pa rnyogs pa med cing sems dwang byed //
NK044(phi)001:12096: nga rgyal spong zhing gus pa'i rtsa ba yin //
NK044(phi)001:12097: dad pa gter dang nor dang rkang pa'i mchog /
NK044(phi)001:12098: lag pa bzhin du dge sdud rtsa ba yin //
NK044(phi)001:12099: dad pa yongs su gtong la dga' bar byed //
NK044(phi)001:12100: dad pa rgyal ba'i chos la rab dga' skyed //
NK044(phi)001:12101: dad pa yon tan ye shes khyad par byed //
NK044(phi)001:12102: sangs rgyas go 'phang ston cing thob par byed //
NK044(phi)001:12103: dbang po rno zhing rab tu gsal bar byed //
NK044(phi)001:12104: dad pa'i stobs la gzhan gyis mi bardzi zhing //
NK044(phi)001:12105: nyon mongs rnam par sel ba'i gzhi rten yin //
NK044(phi)001:12106: dad pa rang 'byung yon tan rnams kyang tshol //
NK044(phi)001:12107: dad pa chags pa'i sgo la chags pa med //
NK044(phi)001:12108: mi dal spangs shing dal ba'i mchog gcig yin //
NK044(phi)001:12109: dad pa bdud kyi lam las 'da' byed cing //
NK044(phi)001:12110: thar pa'i lam mchog ston par byed pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:12111: yon tan zhing gi sa bon ma rul ba //
NK044(phi)001:12112: dad pa byang chub zhig ni rnam par skyed //
NK044(phi)001:12113: ye shes khyad par yon ta na 'phel bar byed //
NK044(phi)001:12114: dad pa rgyal ba thams cad ston pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:12116: de ltar sangs rgyas la dad pa rnyed na gnas
NK044(phi)001:12117: skabs su tshe rabs thams cad du yang lha mi'i
NK044(phi)001:12118: bde ba mi zad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12119: mthar gyis byang chub gsum po dag la rang gi mos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12121: smon lam gyi khyad par bzhin du 'bras bu thob cing /
NK044(phi)001:12122: gal te nyan rang gi theg pa'i 'bras bu thob pa rnams kyang /
NK044(phi)001:12123: mthar ni bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po nyan gcig tu 'tshang rgya ba yang yin te /
NK044(phi)001:12124: theg pa chen po dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:12125: gang phyir 'jig rten du ni chos mang bshad //
NK044(phi)001:12126: de dang de la chags pa rab grol zhing //
NK044(phi)001:12127: theg pa gsum dag nye bar bstan pa ni //
NK044(phi)001:12128: de dag nga yi thabs mkhas mchog yin no //
NK044(phi)001:12130: sh+aa ri'i bu ngas kyang theg pa gcig las brtsams te chos ston pa ni 'di lta ste /
NK044(phi)001:12131: sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:12132: theg pa gnyis sam gsum zhes bya ba gang yang med do //
NK044(phi)001:12133: sh+aa ri'i bu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad na yang chos nyid ni 'adi'o zhes dang /
NK044(phi)001:12134: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang mthar thug theg gcig ston par gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12135: theg pa tha dad par ni gang ston pa //
NK044(phi)001:12136: skyes mchog rnams kyi thabs mkhas ma gtogs par //
NK044(phi)001:12137: theg pa gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:12138: 'jig rten na ni nam yang gsum du med //
NK044(phi)001:12139: sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes bstan pa'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12140: 'jig rten du yang 'jig rten mgon po byung //
NK044(phi)001:12141: bya ba gcig ste gnyis su yod ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:12142: sangs rgyas theg pa dman pa mi 'dren to //
NK044(phi)001:12143: rang byung bdag nyid ci la gnas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12144: sangs rgyas ji lta bu dang ji 'dra ba //
NK044(phi)001:12145: stobs dang bsam gtan rnam thar dbang po rnams //
NK044(phi)001:12146: de dag nyid la sems can rab tu 'jog /
NK044(phi)001:12148: mos dang de bzhin bsam pa rnams mkhyen nas //
NK044(phi)001:12149: de bzhin gshegs pas lhar bcas 'jig rten du //
NK044(phi)001:12150: rgyal ba'i thabs gzhan rnam pa mang po dag /
NK044(phi)001:12151: gang gis chos mchog 'di ni rab bstan pa //
NK044(phi)001:12152: sems can gang gis de las mngon sum der //
NK044(phi)001:12153: chos nyan pa dang 'on te thos ldan pa //
NK044(phi)001:12154: sbyin pa sbyin zhing tshul khrims spyod pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12155: bzod pas spyod pa thams cad bsgrubs pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12156: brtson 'grus bsam gtan lhag par byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12157: shes rab kyis ni chos 'di rnams bsams te //
NK044(phi)001:12158: rnam pa tha dad bsod nams sus byas pa //
NK044(phi)001:12159: de dag thams cad byang chub thob bar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12160: mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyal ba de dag gi //
NK044(phi)001:12161: bstan pa de la sems can gang zhugs te //
NK044(phi)001:12162: de na bzod cing zhi la dul ba ni //
NK044(phi)001:12163: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12164: rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa de dag gi //
NK044(phi)001:12165: rgyal ba'i ring bsrel dag la sus mchod cing //
NK044(phi)001:12166: rin chen mchod rten stong phrag du ma dag /
NK044(phi)001:12167: gser dang dngul dang 'on te shel bagyi'am //
NK044(phi)001:12168: rdo yi snying po'i mchod rten gang gis byas //
NK044(phi)001:12169: beed+aur+ya mchod de bzhin an da snyil //
NK044(phi)001:12170: la las mu tig ke ke ru las byas //
NK044(phi)001:12171: de dag gis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12172: gang gis mchod rten rdo las byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12173: gang gis ya ga ru dang tsan dan nam //
NK044(phi)001:12174: gang gis thang shing mchod rten byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12175: la las shing mang gzhan las byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12176: sa dang so phag las ni brtsigs pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:12177: rgyal ba'i mchod rten dga' zhing byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12178: de phyir sa rdul phung po dag las kyang //
NK044(phi)001:12179: mya ngan dgon pa dag tu byas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12180: byis pa rtsed mor de dang de dag tu //
NK044(phi)001:12181: gang phyir rgyal ba de dag mchod rten dag /
NK044(phi)001:12182: bye ma las ni phung bor byas pa yang //
NK044(phi)001:12183: de rnams kyis kyang byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12184: la las de bzhin rin chen gzugs byas pa //
NK044(phi)001:12185: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan pa'i gzugs //
NK044(phi)001:12186: gang gis de phyir byas pa de dag kyang //
NK044(phi)001:12187: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12188: la las der ni rin chen sna bdun dang //
NK044(phi)001:12189: la las de bzhin zangs dang 'khar ba las //
NK044(phi)001:12190: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas pa //
NK044(phi)001:12191: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12192: ro nye dang ni lcags sam sa yang rung //
NK044(phi)001:12193: bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi gzugs byas te //
NK044(phi)001:12194: lta na sdug pa 'jim pa'i las byed bcug /
NK044(phi)001:12195: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12196: gang gis rtsig ngos gzugs kyi ri mo dag /
NK044(phi)001:12197: bsod nams brgya mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku //
NK044(phi)001:12198: bdag gis bris sam 'bri ru bcug kyang rung //
NK044(phi)001:12199: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12200: skyes bu dag gam 'on te gzhon nu'ang rung //
NK044(phi)001:12201: gang dag la la de ni slob pa'i tshe //
NK044(phi)001:12202: rtsed mo dga' dang bsang bar byed pa na //
NK044(phi)001:12203: rtsig ngos sen mo shing bus gzugs bris pa //
NK044(phi)001:12204: de dag thams cad byang chub thob 'gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:12205: de dag thams cad snying rje can du 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12206: thams cad kyang ni srog chags bye ba sgrol //
NK044(phi)001:12207: byang chub sems dpa' mang po yang dag 'dzud //
NK044(phi)001:12208: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ring bsrel dang //
NK044(phi)001:12209: 'jim pa'i gzugs dang mchod rten dag la'ang rung //
NK044(phi)001:12210: rtsig pas bris dang rdul phung mchod rten la //
NK044(phi)001:12211: de la me tog dang ni spos gsol te //
NK044(phi)001:12212: der ni gang gis rab snyan cang te'u dang //
NK044(phi)001:12213: dung dang rnga chen rol mo'i sgra byed bcug /
NK044(phi)001:12214: byang chub mchog rab mchod par bya ba'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12215: gang rnams rnga rnams rab tu rdung byed cing //
NK044(phi)001:12216: pi wam dang ni pheg dang khar ba'i rnga //
NK044(phi)001:12217: rdza rnga rgyud gcig gling bu yid 'ong dang //
NK044(phi)001:12218: e ko na dang rab tu snyan 'byin pa //
NK044(phi)001:12219: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12220: bde bar gshegs pa rnams la mchod pa'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12221: gang dag lcags kyi sil krol rdung bcug dang //
NK044(phi)001:12222: chu la brdabs dang thal mo brdabs pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12223: yid du 'ong zhing snyan pa'i glu blangs dang //
NK044(phi)001:12224: ring bsrel de dag rnam mang mchod byas la //
NK044(phi)001:12225: de dag thams cad 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12226: bde gshegs ring bsrel la ni cung zad dang //
NK044(phi)001:12227: sil snyan gcig brdungs pa yi sgra byung bam //
NK044(phi)001:12228: me tog gcig tsam gyis ni mchod pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12229: bde gshegs gzugs dag tsig ngos bris pa la //
NK044(phi)001:12230: 'khrug bzhin pa yi sems kyis mchod na yang //
NK044(phi)001:12231: de dge rim gyis sangs rgyas bye ba mthong //
NK044(phi)001:12232: mchod rten dag la gang gis thal mo sbyar //
NK044(phi)001:12233: yongs su tshang ba'am thal mo ya gcig gam //
NK044(phi)001:12234: yang na mgo bo skad cig btud pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12235: de bzhin lan gcig lus kyang btud pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12236: gang gis ring bsrel gnas pa de dag la //
NK044(phi)001:12237: g.yengs pa'i sems kyis phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas zhes //
NK044(phi)001:12238: tshig gcig lan 'ga' brjod par byas pa yang //
NK044(phi)001:12239: de dag kun gyis byang chub mchog 'di thob //
NK044(phi)001:12240: de tshe bde bar gshegs pa de dag ni //
NK044(phi)001:12241: mya ngan 'das sam yang na bzhugs kyang rung //
NK044(phi)001:12242: sems can gang gis chos 'di ming thos pa //
NK044(phi)001:12243: de dag thams cad byang chub thob par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12245: chos kyi tshul 'di rtag tu gnas pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12246: chos kyi rang bzhin rtag tu 'od gsal bar //
NK044(phi)001:12247: rkang gnyis dam pa sangs rgyas rnams mkhyen nas //
NK044(phi)001:12248: nga yi theg pa gcig ces ston par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12250: lha mi rnams kyis mchod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //
NK044(phi)001:12251: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa gang+g+aa'i bye ma snyed //
NK044(phi)001:12252: 'di na srog chags thams cad bde bya'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12253: de dag rnams kyang theg pa mchog 'di 'chad //
NK044(phi)001:12254: zhi ba'i sa mchog 'dir ni sangs rgyas nas //
NK044(phi)001:12255: thabs la mkhas pas rab tu ston mdzad cing //
NK044(phi)001:12256: theg pa rnam pa tha dad mngon par 'chad //
NK044(phi)001:12257: theg pa gcig po'ang yongs su ston mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:12258: lus can kun gyi spyod pa rig pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12259: de bzhin sngon chad ci bsgoms ci bsams pa //
NK044(phi)001:12260: de yi mthu dang brtson 'grus rnams kyang rig /
NK044(phi)001:12261: shin tu dad pa mkhyen nas rab tu ston //
NK044(phi)001:12262: 'dren pa'i ye shes stobs kyis rgyu mang dang //
NK044(phi)001:12263: dpe dang gzhi yang mang por rab bston to //
NK044(phi)001:12264: sems can mos pa sna tshogs rigs nas ni //
NK044(phi)001:12265: sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa nye bar ston //
NK044(phi)001:12267: 'di lta bu theg gcig tu ston pa'i chos 'di lta bu 'byung bar dka' ba yang /
NK044(phi)001:12269: reg 'ga' gang du ci yis 'jig rten du //
NK044(phi)001:12270: skyes bu khyu mchog dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12271: mtha' yas ming can 'jig rten byung na yang //
NK044(phi)001:12273: bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig nyid du yang //
NK044(phi)001:12274: 'di 'dra'i chos mchog rab tu rnyed par dka' //
NK044(phi)001:12275: gang dag chos mchog thos nas dad gyur pa //
NK044(phi)001:12276: de 'dra'i sems can shin tu rnyed par dka' //
NK044(phi)001:12277: u dum b+aa ri'i me tog rnyed dka' bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:12278: res 'ga' gang zhig ci yis snang gyur na //
NK044(phi)001:12279: gzugs de 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba ste //
NK044(phi)001:12280: lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams la ngo mtshar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12281: de bas legs bshad chos 'di sus thos nas //
NK044(phi)001:12282: rjes su yi rang tshig gcig brjod na yang //
NK044(phi)001:12283: shin tu ngo mtshar che bar 'di bstan te //
NK044(phi)001:12284: des ni sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12285: 'di la the tshom som nyi rnams par spongs //
NK044(phi)001:12286: chos kyi rgyal po ngas ni kun bstan te //
NK044(phi)001:12287: byang chub dam pa 'di la yang dag gzung //
NK044(phi)001:12288: 'di na nga la nyan thos gang yang med //
NK044(phi)001:12289: sh+aa ri'i bu khyod 'di ni gsang chen gyis //
NK044(phi)001:12290: nga yi nyan thos gang 'di thams cad dang //
NK044(phi)001:12291: byang chub sems dpa' gtso bo 'di dag gis //
NK044(phi)001:12292: nga yi gsang chen 'di ni thub par gyis //
NK044(phi)001:12293: ci phyir zhe na snyigs ma lnga yi tshe //
NK044(phi)001:12294: sems can ngan pa gtum po 'byung ba na //
NK044(phi)001:12295: byis pa'i blo can 'dod pas ldongs gyur pa //
NK044(phi)001:12296: de dag rnams kyang byang chub sems mi skye //
NK044(phi)001:12297: theg pa gcig po 'di ni rgyal ba des //
NK044(phi)001:12298: sngon rabs bshad pa yin zhes thos nas su //
NK044(phi)001:12299: ma 'ongs dus na sems can myos gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:12300: mdo sde spangs pas sems can dmyal bar 'gro /
NK044(phi)001:12301: sems can gang dag 'dzem zhing gcong ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:12302: gang dag byang chub dam pa mchog zhugs pa //
NK044(phi)001:12303: de dag la ni 'jigs pa med gyis la //
NK044(phi)001:12304: theg pa gcig gi basngagasa pa mtha' yas shod //
NK044(phi)001:12305: 'dren pa rnams kyis bshad pa de lta bu //
NK044(phi)001:12306: thabs la mkhas pa dam pa mchog 'di ni //
NK044(phi)001:12307: ldem po ngag rnams rab tu mang por bshad //
NK044(phi)001:12308: 'di ni ma bslabs rnams kyis rigs par dka' //
NK044(phi)001:12309: de bas 'jig rten slob dpon sangs rgyas kyi //
NK044(phi)001:12310: skyob pa'i ldem po gang ni shes rab kyis //
NK044(phi)001:12311: the tshom chod la som nyi rnams spangs te //
NK044(phi)001:12312: sangs rgyas 'gyur gyis dga' ba rab tu skyed //
NK044(phi)001:12314: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen pos 'di skad ces gsol to //
NK044(phi)001:12315: bcom ldan 'das gal te sems can mos pa tha
NK044(phi)001:12316: dad pa gang dag khams gsum nas byung ba de
NK044(phi)001:12317: dag gi mya ngan las 'das pa gcig gam gnyis
NK044(phi)001:12319: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:12320: 'od srung chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du khong
NK044(phi)001:12321: du chud pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'da' bas na
NK044(phi)001:12322: / de ni gcig ste gnyis su med cing gsum du yang med do //
NK044(phi)001:12324: chos kun stong zhing mnyam pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:12325: tha dad dbyer med bdag nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:12326: de dag la ni me tog ste //
NK044(phi)001:12327: chos ni gang yang mthong med na //
NK044(phi)001:12328: chos kyi sku ni ma lus par //
NK044(phi)001:12329: shes rab chen po des mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:12330: theg pa gsum du yong med de //
NK044(phi)001:12331: 'di na theg pa gcig pu yod //
NK044(phi)001:12332: chos kun mnyam ste thams cad kyang //
NK044(phi)001:12333: mnyam zhing snyoms te rtag tu mnyam //
NK044(phi)001:12334: de ltar rigs nas zhi ba yi //
NK044(phi)001:12337: mdo sde pad+ma dkar po 'di sngon de bzhin gshegs pa las mngon sum du thos te /
NK044(phi)001:12338: tha na tshigs bcad gcig thos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12339: mdo 'di la sems gcig bskyed pas rjes su yi
NK044(phi)001:12340: rangs pa de thams cad byang chub tu lung bstan
NK044(phi)001:12341: pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya
NK044(phi)001:12342: ngan 'das nas kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan
NK044(phi)001:12343: pa dang / pa dang / tha na tshigs su
NK044(phi)001:12344: bcad pa gcig thos nas sems bskyed pa gcig tsam
NK044(phi)001:12345: gyis rjes su yi rang bar 'gyur ba'i rigs kyi
NK044(phi)001:12346: bu dang bu mo de dag bla med byang chub
NK044(phi)001:12348: des sangs rgyas tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur byas pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:12350: mdo sde 'di las tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'bri ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:12351: 'dzin pa dang klog pa sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:12352: glegs bam la gus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12354: phyag 'tshal ba dang thal mo sbyor bar byed na
NK044(phi)001:12355: de thams cad ngas bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK044(phi)001:12357: ma 'ongs pa'i dus na kha cig 'di skad du /
NK044(phi)001:12358: sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag ji lta bu dag ces zer na /
NK044(phi)001:12359: mdo sde 'di'i tshigs bcad gcig tsam 'dzin pa sogs kyi sems can de bstan te /
NK044(phi)001:12360: 'di dag sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar ltos shig ces bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12362: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshigs bcad gcig tsam
NK044(phi)001:12363: bzung na yang de la lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:12364: rten gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bkur sti bya
NK044(phi)001:12366: mdo 'di mtha' dag chub par 'dzin pa sogs lta ci smos te /
NK044(phi)001:12367: de dag ni bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su grub par rigs par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12369: de 'jig rten phan zhing snying brtse bas de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:12370: gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas gang
NK044(phi)001:12371: gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i slad du
NK044(phi)001:12372: 'dzam bu'i gling du snyig brtse ba'i phyir zhing rgya
NK044(phi)001:12373: chen po gzhan nas mir skyes par rigs par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:12374: // chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad dam /
NK044(phi)001:12375: tha na gsang ste rkun bus sems can gcig la yang dag par bstan na /
NK044(phi)001:12376: rigs kyi bu'am bu mo de de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya yin par rigs par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12377: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba byed pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:12378: de bzhin gshegs pas mngags par rigs par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12380: thams cad mkhyen nyid gang 'dod de //
NK044(phi)001:12381: ji ltar myur du thob snyam pa //
NK044(phi)001:12382: des ni mdo sde 'di bzung ste //
NK044(phi)001:12383: 'dzin pa la yang bkur sti bya //
NK044(phi)001:12384: zhes sogs basngagasa pa rgya chen po nyid shes par 'dod pas mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12385: de la bdag cag gi ston pa 'di rtsod ldan
NK044(phi)001:12386: snyigs ma lnga bdo'i dus su sangs rgyas gyi mdzad
NK044(phi)001:12388: thog ma'i snying rje chen po'i smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yin la /
NK044(phi)001:12389: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba bsam gyis
NK044(phi)001:12390: mi khyab pa'i tshul so skye dang nyan rang gis
NK044(phi)001:12391: bsam par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir tshu rol mthong
NK044(phi)001:12392: ba tsam gyis mthong ba dang thos pa nyi tshe
NK044(phi)001:12393: ba'i yul du ston pa sh+aakya thub pa ni rtsod
NK044(phi)001:12395: sku tshe yang brgyad cu tsam zhig dang /
NK044(phi)001:12396: zhing yang ma dag go snyam du rgya chung ngur bsam par mi bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:12397: zhing dang sku tshe dus la sogs par gdul ba'i dbang gis ji ltar bstan kyang /
NK044(phi)001:12398: sangs rgyas thams cad ni mnyam pa nyid kyi ye
NK044(phi)001:12399: shes kyi sku yon tan gyi tshad gzhal du med
NK044(phi)001:12400: pa yin pas / de'i zhing yang yongs su dag cing rgya che ste /
NK044(phi)001:12401: sku tshe'i tshad kyang nam mkha' ji srid du bzhugs
NK044(phi)001:12402: pa yin pas bdag cag gi ston pa 'di'i zhing
NK044(phi)001:12403: ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gang chen
NK044(phi)001:12404: mtsho'i zhing yin pa'i phyir dang /
NK044(phi)001:12405: dus kyang rtsod dus 'ba' zhig tu sangs rgyas pa
NK044(phi)001:12406: dang yun thung dus mya ngan las 'das pa kho
NK044(phi)001:12409: bskal pa bye stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa //
NK044(phi)001:12410: de yi tshad ni nam yang med pa nas //
NK044(phi)001:12411: byang chub mchog rab 'di ni ngas thob ste //
NK044(phi)001:12412: nga ni rtag tu chos kyang rab 'chad do //
NK044(phi)001:12413: byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di yang dag gzung //
NK044(phi)001:12414: sangs rgyas ye shes la ni de dag dgod //
NK044(phi)001:12415: sems can bye ba khrag khrig mtha' yas pa //
NK044(phi)001:12416: bskal pa bye ba mang por smin par byas //
NK044(phi)001:12417: mya ngan 'das pa'i sa yang bstan byas te //
NK044(phi)001:12418: sems can rnam par 'dul phyir thabs brjod do //
NK044(phi)001:12419: de tshe nga ni mya ngan mi 'da' ste //
NK044(phi)001:12420: 'di nyid na ni chos rnams rab ston to //
NK044(phi)001:12421: de ni nga bdag nyid kyang byin gyis brlabs //
NK044(phi)001:12422: nga yis sems can kun kyang byin gyis brlabs //
NK044(phi)001:12423: log pa'i blo ldan blun po'i mi rnams kyis //
NK044(phi)001:12424: 'di na nga 'dug pa yang mi mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:12425: nga lus yongs su mya ngan 'das mthong nas //
NK044(phi)001:12426: ring bsrel rnams la mchod pa rnam mang byed //
NK044(phi)001:12427: nga ma mthong bas de dag sred pa skye //
NK044(phi)001:12428: de nas de dag sems kyang drong por 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12429: nam zhig de dag 'jam zhing mnyen drang ste //
NK044(phi)001:12430: sems can lus kyang btang bar gyur pa na //
NK044(phi)001:12431: de na nga yi nyan thos dge 'dun byas //
NK044(phi)001:12432: bya rgod phung por nga nyid der nyid de bstan te //
NK044(phi)001:12433: de la nga yis phyis ni 'di skad smras //
NK044(phi)001:12434: 'di nyid na ste mya ngan nga ma 'das //
NK044(phi)001:12435: dge slong gang dag de ni nga thabs mkhas //
NK044(phi)001:12436: yang yang nga 'byung 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten du //
NK044(phi)001:12437: sems can gzhan gyi nga ni mdun du byas //
NK044(phi)001:12438: de la byang chub mchog 'di rab tu bshad //
NK044(phi)001:12439: 'jig mgon mya ngan la 'das ma rtogs par //
NK044(phi)001:12440: khyod kyis nga yi sgra yang mi thos so //
NK044(phi)001:12441: sems can rnams par 'jig pa ngas mthong yang //
NK044(phi)001:12442: ngas ni bdag gi lus nyid ma bstan te //
NK044(phi)001:12443: re zhig nga mthong bar ni 'dod byos la //
NK044(phi)001:12444: skoms par gyur nas dam pa'i chos bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:12445: rtag tu nga yi byin rlabs de 'dra ste //
NK044(phi)001:12446: bskal pa bye ba bsam yas stong du ni //
NK044(phi)001:12447: bya rgod phung po 'di las mi 'pho yang //
NK044(phi)001:12448: gud na bye ba snyed kyi mal cha yod //
NK044(phi)001:12449: gang tshe 'jig rten khams 'di sems can gyis //
NK044(phi)001:12450: bskal pas sreg par mthong zhing rtog pa na //
NK044(phi)001:12451: de tshe nga yi sangs rgyas zhing 'di ni //
NK044(phi)001:12452: lha dang mi yis yongs su gang bar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12453: de dag rtse zhing dga' ba sna tshogs ldan //
NK044(phi)001:12454: skyed mas khang bzang gzhal med bye ba yod //
NK044(phi)001:12455: rin chen ri bo rnams dang de bzhin du //
NK044(phi)001:12456: me tog 'bras ldan shing ljon rnams kyis brgyan //
NK044(phi)001:12457: steng nas lha rnams rnga chen rab tu rdung //
NK044(phi)001:12458: man+d+aara ba'i char yang shin tu 'bab //
NK044(phi)001:12459: mkhas pa gzhan gang byang chub 'dir zhugs dang //
NK044(phi)001:12460: nga dang nyan thos rnams la mngon par 'thor //
NK044(phi)001:12461: nga yi zhing 'di de ltar rtag gnas kyang //
NK044(phi)001:12462: gzhan dag 'di la bskal pas sreg par rtog /
NK044(phi)001:12463: mya ngan brgya yis gang zhig gtses pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12464: 'jig rten khams ni shin tu 'jig par mthong //
NK044(phi)001:12465: lo mang bye bar de bzhin gshegs rnams dang //
NK044(phi)001:12466: chos dang nga yi dge 'dun tshogs rnams kyi //
NK044(phi)001:12467: ming ni nam yang thos par mi 'gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:12468: sdig pa'i las kyi 'bras bu de 'dra'o //
NK044(phi)001:12469: nam zhig sems can 'jam zhing mnyen pa rnams //
NK044(phi)001:12470: mi yi 'jig rten 'dir ni skyes gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:12471: dge ba'i las kyis de ltar skyes ma thag /
NK044(phi)001:12472: nga ni chos rnams rab tu 'chad par mthong //
NK044(phi)001:12473: de dag la ni nam yang nga mi 'chad //
NK044(phi)001:12474: bya ba 'di 'dra mtha' yas 'di dag ste //
NK044(phi)001:12475: de yis yun ring nas ni nga mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:12476: de la rgyal ba shin tu rnyed dkar bshad //
NK044(phi)001:12477: nga yi ye shes stobs ni 'di 'dra ste //
NK044(phi)001:12478: de ni shin tu 'od gsal mtha' yang med //
NK044(phi)001:12479: nga yi tshe ring bskal pa mtha' yas te //
NK044(phi)001:12480: de ni sngon gyi spyod pa spyad pas grub //
NK044(phi)001:12481: mkhas rnams 'di la som nyi ma byed par //
NK044(phi)001:12482: the tshom za ba rnams ni ma lus spongs //
NK044(phi)001:12483: ngas ni tshig de yang dag rab smras te //
NK044(phi)001:12484: rdzun gyi tshig ni nga las gzhar mi 'byung //
NK044(phi)001:12485: dper na thabs slob pa yi sman la des //
NK044(phi)001:12486: 'du shes log par gyur pa'i bu rnams phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12487: bdag nyid ma shi bzhin du shi zhes brjod //
NK044(phi)001:12488: de rdzun mi smra snyam du mkhas pas rigs //
NK044(phi)001:12489: de bzhin nga yang rang byung 'jig rten pha //
NK044(phi)001:12490: skye dgu kun gyi gso byed mgon po ste //
NK044(phi)001:12491: byin pa gti mug log par rnam rigs nas //
NK044(phi)001:12492: mya ngan ma 'das mya ngan 'da' bar bstan //
NK044(phi)001:12493: ci phyir zhe na rtag par nga mthong na //
NK044(phi)001:12494: mi shes ma rig pa rnams le lor 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12495: 'dod pa la yang bag med yid rton te //
NK044(phi)001:12496: bag med rgyu yis ngan 'gror rab tu ltung //
NK044(phi)001:12497: spyod dang spyod pa rigs nas rtag par yang //
NK044(phi)001:12498: ci nas byang chub la ni dgod pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:12499: ci nas sangs rgyas chos rnams thob bya'i phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12500: sems can rnams la nga ni de bzhin smra //
NK044(phi)001:12501: zhes gsungs pa ltar sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes kyi sku mthar thug pa brnyes nas /
NK044(phi)001:12502: chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa'i dus dang zhing thams
NK044(phi)001:12503: cad du rtag pa dang khyab pa'i ye shes rnam
NK044(phi)001:12504: pa rnams cad pa'i rol pa tshad med par ston
NK044(phi)001:12505: pa la nges pa mchog tu skye ba ni byang
NK044(phi)001:12506: chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi dad
NK044(phi)001:12507: pa mi ldog pa skye ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir
NK044(phi)001:12508: / de lta nges par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:12509: dkon brtsegs yab sras mjal ba'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:12510: sngon bskal pa dpag tu med par de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:12511: pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba de yang ston
NK044(phi)001:12512: pa 'di nyid yin par gsungs shing /
NK044(phi)001:12513: sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir //
NK044(phi)001:12514: dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul //
NK044(phi)001:12515: bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid //
NK044(phi)001:12516: sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang //
NK044(phi)001:12517: da dung chos kyi 'du shes bsal //
NK044(phi)001:12518: byang chub mchog tu thugs kyang 'jug /
NK044(phi)001:12519: stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi //
NK044(phi)001:12520: sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas //
NK044(phi)001:12521: ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa //
NK044(phi)001:12522: rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal //
NK044(phi)001:12523: da dung dang por thugs bskyed par //
NK044(phi)001:12524: de dang de yi yongs bstan te //
NK044(phi)001:12525: da dung du yang 'dren pa khyod //
NK044(phi)001:12526: sangs rgyas mang por ston par mdzad //
NK044(phi)001:12527: rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis //
NK044(phi)001:12528: gang zag mchog gi spyod pa mdzad //
NK044(phi)001:12530: 'phags pa dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:12531: sangs rgyas don yod grub pa'i zhing shin tu yongs
NK044(phi)001:12532: su dag cing rgya che ba tshad med pa bkod
NK044(phi)001:12533: pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12534: sangs rgyas de byang chub sems dpa'i dus kyi spyod
NK044(phi)001:12535: pa rmad du byung ba dag kyang ci rigs par
NK044(phi)001:12536: bstan nas / sangs rgyas de la sogs pa phyogs
NK044(phi)001:12537: gzhan gyi sangs rgyas du ma mtshan dang zhing tha
NK044(phi)001:12538: dad pa dag kyang ston pa 'di nyid yin par
NK044(phi)001:12539: bstan nas / gsungs pa dang / dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:12540: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po bgrod pa'i skabs su /
NK044(phi)001:12541: steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sgron ma
NK044(phi)001:12542: gcig pa zhes bya ba'i zhing de'i yon tan bskal
NK044(phi)001:12543: par brjod kyang mthar mi phyin par nyan rang gi
NK044(phi)001:12544: ming med pa de na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas de
NK044(phi)001:12545: la khyed kyi mtshan ci zhig ces zhus pa la
NK044(phi)001:12546: khyod song ste de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa
NK044(phi)001:12547: la zhus shig ces bka' stsal pa ltar ston pa
NK044(phi)001:12549: zhing de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan ni chos thams cad
NK044(phi)001:12550: ston pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:12551: ste de ni nga yin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:12552: zhing khams der ngas phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12553: yang shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams su ma
NK044(phi)001:12554: khri nyis stong 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
NK044(phi)001:12555: rnam par sdud pa zhes bya bar /
NK044(phi)001:12556: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer
NK044(phi)001:12557: gyis brgyan pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po zhes
NK044(phi)001:12558: bya ba de'i sku tshe'i tshad bskal pa grangs med
NK044(phi)001:12559: pa bdun brgyar bzhugs pa de yang bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:12561: seng+ga'i sgra bsgrags pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:12562: 'di nas byang gi phyogs su gang+g+aa'i klung drug cu'i
NK044(phi)001:12563: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul phra rab kyi bye
NK044(phi)001:12564: ma snyed 'das pa'i pha rol na /
NK044(phi)001:12565: 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:12566: bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'phags zhes pa bzhugs
NK044(phi)001:12567: pa de'i drung du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par
NK044(phi)001:12568: rgyal ba'i phung po mngags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12569: sangs rgyas des de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya thub pa de chos 'phags nga yin te /
NK044(phi)001:12570: mi mjed der sprul pa rnam par sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to //
NK044(phi)001:12572: sor mo'i phreng ba la phan pa'i mdo las kyang
NK044(phi)001:12573: zhing gzhan gyi sangs rgyas tshad med pa da ltar
NK044(phi)001:12574: bzhugs pa dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa 'di nyid
NK044(phi)001:12575: dang tha mi dad du gsungs pa ltar dang /
NK044(phi)001:12576: ma 'ongs pa na yang sems can gyi mtha' ji
NK044(phi)001:12577: srid du byang chub kyi tshul ston pa rgyun mi
NK044(phi)001:12579: sangs rgyas thams cad la yang yon tan gyi khyad
NK044(phi)001:12580: par de lta bu mnga' ba yin par shes par
NK044(phi)001:12581: bya zhing / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:12582: rnams la sems thog mar bskyed pa'i skabs su snying
NK044(phi)001:12583: rje'i stobs che chung gi khyad par yod kyang /
NK044(phi)001:12584: lhag bsam yongs su dag par thob nas zhing dag
NK044(phi)001:12585: pa bzung ba rnams kyis kyang ma dag pa'i zhing
NK044(phi)001:12586: du sangs rgyas yi mdzad pa mi ston pa yang
NK044(phi)001:12587: ma yin la / ma dag pa bzung ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:12588: kyis zhing dag pa ma sbyangs pa yang ma yin
NK044(phi)001:12589: ma yin la / no // so so'i lam gyi
NK044(phi)001:12590: gnas skabs kyi snod lam bzhin du zhing dang dus
NK044(phi)001:12591: la sogs pa tha dad pas sems can rnams 'dul
NK044(phi)001:12592: ba de lta bur snang ba yang yod mod kyi
NK044(phi)001:12593: ma yin la / no // / 'bras bu mthar
NK044(phi)001:12594: thug pa'i skabs na zhing chos kyi dbyings kyis klas
NK044(phi)001:12595: ma yin la / no // / par / dus
NK044(phi)001:12596: bskal pa ji srid du byang chub kyi tshul ston
NK044(phi)001:12597: pa rgyun mi 'chad par mnyam pa nyid yin par
NK044(phi)001:12598: ma yin la / no // / par / shes
NK044(phi)001:12599: dgos kyi / nyi tshe ba'i blo gros gyis ni
NK044(phi)001:12600: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa zab mo rnams nyams
NK044(phi)001:12601: 'og tu chud par mi nus la /
NK044(phi)001:12602: zab mo'i ye shes thob pa rnams kyis ni /
NK044(phi)001:12603: de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12604: ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la som
NK044(phi)001:12605: nyi thams cad spangs te mthong ba rnam par dag
NK044(phi)001:12606: par 'gyur ro // deltara de bzhen gshegs pa'i sku
NK044(phi)001:12607: tshe'i tshad bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' bye
NK044(phi)001:12608: ba khrag khrig gang+ga'i rlung drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi
NK044(phi)001:12609: bye ma snyed mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa
NK044(phi)001:12610: par 'gyur ro // thob pa dang / de stong
NK044(phi)001:12611: du bsgres pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po dag
NK044(phi)001:12613: byang chub sems dpa' chen po stong gi 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:12614: khams kyi rdul snyed dag gis thogs pa med pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12616: byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi khams
NK044(phi)001:12617: kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gis bye
NK044(phi)001:12618: ba brgya stong du yongs su bskyur ba'i gzungs thob
NK044(phi)001:12619: pa dang / de bzhin du byang sems stong gi
NK044(phi)001:12620: 'jig rten khams kyi rdul snyed kyis phyir mi ldog
NK044(phi)001:12622: stong bar ma'i 'jig rten khams kyi rdul snyed kyis
NK044(phi)001:12623: dri ma med pa'i snang ba zhes bya ba'i chos
NK044(phi)001:12625: stong chung ngu'i 'jig rten khams kyi rdul snyed kyis
NK044(phi)001:12626: bla med rdzogs byang skye ba brgyad kyis thogs par
NK044(phi)001:12627: gyur to // gling bzhi pa bzhi'i 'jig rten gyi rdul snyed kyis skye ba bzhis thogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12628: gling bzhi pa gsum gyi rdul snyed kyis skye ba gsum gyis thogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12629: gling bzhi pa gnyis kyi rdul snyed kyis skye ba gnyis kyis thogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12630: gling bzhi pa gcig gi rdul snyed kyi byang chub
NK044(phi)001:12631: sems dpas bla med rdzogs byang skye ba gcig gis
NK044(phi)001:12633: byang chub sems dpa' stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
NK044(phi)001:12634: 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi
NK044(phi)001:12635: rdul snyed dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
NK044(phi)001:12636: nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12637: byang chub tu sems bskyed do //
NK044(phi)001:12638: de'i tshe steng gi bar snang las lha'i me tog
NK044(phi)001:12639: dang spos dang rol mo dang gdugs la sogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12640: mchod pa'i sprin phung gi char gyis /
NK044(phi)001:12641: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'khor de dang sangs
NK044(phi)001:12642: rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du
NK044(phi)001:12643: mchod pa dang bstod pa'i sgra yang byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:12644: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:12645: ma pham pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshe'i tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na /
NK044(phi)001:12646: sems can gang gis sems bskyed pa gcig tsam zhig mos pa bskyed dam /
NK044(phi)001:12647: mngon par dad na rigs kyi bu'am bu mo de
NK044(phi)001:12648: dag bsod nams ci tsam zhig skye bar 'gyur ba
NK044(phi)001:12649: de legs par nyon la yid la zungs shig dang
NK044(phi)001:12650: / de dag bsod nams ci tsam skye bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:12651: ba de bshad do zhes rgyas par bka' stsal pa
NK044(phi)001:12652: rnams kyi don tshig sna bsdus te 'dir brjod na
NK044(phi)001:12653: / / bla med rdzogs byang 'dod pas bskal ba
NK044(phi)001:12654: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad du sbyin
NK044(phi)001:12655: pa nas bsam gtan gyi bar gyi phar phyin lnga
NK044(phi)001:12656: la spyad de shes rab kyi phar phyin dang bral
NK044(phi)001:12657: ba'i dge rtsa des de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i
NK044(phi)001:12658: tshad bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos
NK044(phi)001:12659: pa gcig tsam bskyed pa'i bsod nams de'i brgya'i char
NK044(phi)001:12660: mi nye ba nas dpe dang rgyur yang mi bzod
NK044(phi)001:12661: / / pa dang / gnas 'di la dad pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12662: gang zag de bla med rdzogs byang las phyir mi
NK044(phi)001:12663: ldog pa ni gnas med do //
NK044(phi)001:12664: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la 'bab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12666: khong du chud pa de ni de bas sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:12667: kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams ches dpag
NK044(phi)001:12669: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang sgrogs pa dang yi ger 'bri ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:12671: glegs bam la me tog sogs kyis mchod pa byed
NK044(phi)001:12672: pa dang byed du 'jug pa ni lta ci smos
NK044(phi)001:12673: te / sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i bsod nams ches mang du skyed do //
NK044(phi)001:12674: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa byed pa de'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:12675: lhag bsam de'i mtshan ma ni 'di ltar /
NK044(phi)001:12676: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bya rgod kyi phung po'i
NK044(phi)001:12677: rir nyan rang byang sems kyi dbus nas chos ston
NK044(phi)001:12679: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di bee d+aur+ya'i gzhi las grub cing /
NK044(phi)001:12680: khang pa brtsegs pa rgyan gyis brgyan pa na byang
NK044(phi)001:12681: chub sems dpa' dag gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:12682: // sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi
NK044(phi)001:12683: rnam grangs 'di thos nas mi spong ba'i steng du
NK044(phi)001:12684: yi rang pa de dag kyang /
NK044(phi)001:12685: lhag pa'i bsam pas mos pa'i rigs kyi bur bshad na /
NK044(phi)001:12686: gang 'dzin pa dang klog pa lta ci smos te /
NK044(phi)001:12687: des ni de bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:12688: de bzhin gshegs pa phrag pa la thogs pa'i mi des /
NK044(phi)001:12690: gtsug lag khang bya mi dgos /
NK044(phi)001:12691: dge slong gi dge 'dun la na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byad dag sbyin mi dgos so //
NK044(phi)001:12694: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo des nga'i sku
NK044(phi)001:12695: gdung la sku gdung gi mchod pa byas pa yin
NK044(phi)001:12696: / rin chen sna bdun gyi mchod rten tshangs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12697: 'jig rten la thug pa'i khor yug tu lha'i ba
NK044(phi)001:12698: dan dang gdugs dang dril bu la sogs pas brgyan
NK044(phi)001:12699: / pa dang / lha dang mi'i spos dang me
NK044(phi)001:12700: tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyis bkur
NK044(phi)001:12702: nga mya ngan las 'das nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang klog pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12704: rab tu ston pa des nga'i phyir tsan dan dmar
NK044(phi)001:12705: po'i gtsug lag khang rgya chen po yangs pa mthon
NK044(phi)001:12706: po / khang bzang sum cu rtsa gnyis pa brgyad brtsegs can /
NK044(phi)001:12707: dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gnas kun dga' ra ba me tog gis mdzes par byas pa /
NK044(phi)001:12708: 'chag pa'i nags tshal dang ldan pa /
NK044(phi)001:12710: bza' bca' dang zas skom na ba'i gsos sman gyis yongs su gang ba /
NK044(phi)001:12711: bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan
NK044(phi)001:12712: pa dang byas par gyur te de 'dra ba mang
NK044(phi)001:12713: zhing dpag tu med pa dag ste /
NK044(phi)001:12721: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag nga'i mdun
NK044(phi)001:12722: du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la
NK044(phi)001:12723: phul te / de dag kyang ngas yongs su spyad par rigs par bya'o /
NK044(phi)001:12724: rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu'am bu mo des
NK044(phi)001:12725: mchod rten dang dge 'dun la mchod pa bya mi
NK044(phi)001:12726: dgos so zhes de ltar bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:12728: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung nas sbyin sogs shes rab kyi bar bsgrubs pa lta ci smos te /
NK044(phi)001:12729: rigs kyi bu'am bu mo de dag chos kyi rnam
NK044(phi)001:12730: grangs 'di la mngon par dad pa'i bsod nams ni
NK044(phi)001:12731: nam mkha'i khams ni steng 'og phyogs bcur yang mu
NK044(phi)001:12732: med pa de bzhin du tshad med la des mchod
NK044(phi)001:12733: rten la bsti stang byas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12734: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dang byang sems rnams kyi basngagasa pa brjod pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12735: bzod pa dang tshul khrims sogs dge chos thams cad bsgrubs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12736: dul ba dang phrag dog med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12737: gnod sems med pa sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:12738: dran pa dang mthu dang brtson 'grus dang ldan pas sangs rgyas kyi chos tshol ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:12740: nang du yang dag 'jog pa lhur len cing /
NK044(phi)001:12741: 'dri ba dang rab tu dbye ba la mkhas shing /
NK044(phi)001:12742: 'dri ba bye ba khrag khrig gi lan ldon pa yang yin /
NK044(phi)001:12743: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin bde byang chub snying
NK044(phi)001:12744: por zhugs te byang chub shing drung du 'gro ba
NK044(phi)001:12745: yin pa de ltar rigs par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12746: de dag 'greng ngam 'dug gam 'chag pa der de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir mchod rten brtsig go //
NK044(phi)001:12747: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis kyang 'di de
NK044(phi)001:12748: bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten yin no zhes de la
NK044(phi)001:12749: brjod par bya'o // zhes gsungs shing /
NK044(phi)001:12750: byang chub sems dpa' byams pas /
NK044(phi)001:12751: pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa
NK044(phi)001:12752: thos nas rjes su yi rangs nas bsod nams ji
NK044(phi)001:12753: snyed cig skyed par 'gyur zhes zhus pa la /
NK044(phi)001:12756: de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das
NK044(phi)001:12757: nas gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa
NK044(phi)001:12758: nyan cing thos nas rjes su yi rang la /
NK044(phi)001:12760: des pha ma la sogs pa gzhan dang gzhan la
NK044(phi)001:12761: bstan nas de dag gis thos te rjes su yi
NK044(phi)001:12762: rang la / des kyang gzhan la de ltar smras
NK044(phi)001:12763: pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de mi lnga bcu'i
NK044(phi)001:12765: de ltar thos pa lnga bcu pa de'i bsod nams bshad na /
NK044(phi)001:12766: 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med brgya stong phrag bzhin
NK044(phi)001:12767: sems can gang dag 'gro ba drug dang skye gnas
NK044(phi)001:12768: bzhis bsdus pa gzugs can dang gzugs med ji snyed
NK044(phi)001:12769: sems can gyi khams su gtogs pa rnams /
NK044(phi)001:12770: mi bsod nams 'dod pa zhig byung ba /
NK044(phi)001:12771: sems can de thams cad la 'dod pa'i rtsed mo
NK044(phi)001:12772: dang dga' ba'i longs spyod sdug pa mdzes pa yid
NK044(phi)001:12774: gang 'dod pa'i dga' bar longs spyod pa'i phyir sems
NK044(phi)001:12775: can re re la yang 'dzam bu'i gling yongs su
NK044(phi)001:12777: 'gron bu dang gser dang dngul dang nor bu dang mu tig dang beed+aur+ya dang /
NK044(phi)001:12783: glang po che'i shing rta dang /
NK044(phi)001:12786: rnam grangs 'dis sbyin pa dag chen po de lo brgyad cu tshang bar sbyin pa byin la /
NK044(phi)001:12787: de nas sbyin bdag des 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:12788: sems can 'di thams cad bdag gis rtsen du bcug dga' bar byas /
NK044(phi)001:12790: sems can 'di dag ni na tshodabargyada cu lon pa
NK044(phi)001:12791: rgas te mgo skya zhing gnyer mas gang ba 'chi
NK044(phi)001:12792: ba'i dus byed par nye bar gyur na /
NK044(phi)001:12793: bdag gis 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12794: chos 'dul ba la btsud de rjes su bstan no
NK044(phi)001:12795: snyam nas chos bstan pas skad cig yud tsam la
NK044(phi)001:12796: rgyun zhugs nas dgra bcom pa'i bar du thob na
NK044(phi)001:12797: sbyin bdag des bsod nams mang du skyed pa yin
NK044(phi)001:12798: mod kyis / de'i bsod nams des /
NK044(phi)001:12799: gang yang gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de thos pa
NK044(phi)001:12800: lnga bcu par gyur pa'i mi des chos kyi rnam
NK044(phi)001:12801: grangs 'di las tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam tshig
NK044(phi)001:12802: gcig thos te rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams
NK044(phi)001:12803: de'i brgya yi char yang mi 'gro ba nas dpe
NK044(phi)001:12804: dang rgyur yang mi bzod pa'i bar du 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:12806: nga las mngon sum thos nas rjes su yi rang ba lta ci smos te /
NK044(phi)001:12807: de'i bsod nams ni ches dpag tu med cing ches grangs med ces ngas bshad do //
NK044(phi)001:12808: rigs kyi bu'am bu mo gang gis chos 'di mnyan
NK044(phi)001:12809: ba'i phyir khyim nas phyung ste chos smra ba'i drung
NK044(phi)001:12810: du phyin nas 'greng ngam 'dug ste chos 'di yud
NK044(phi)001:12811: tsam mnyan na bsod nams des lus phyi mar /
NK044(phi)001:12812: rta dang glang po che sogs kyi bzhon pa sna tshogs dang lha'i gzhal med khang thob pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12813: chos 'di nyan par yud tsam 'dug ste /
NK044(phi)001:12814: pha rol pa 'dug bcug gam sems can gzhan la stan bgos na /
NK044(phi)001:12815: bsod nams des brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'khor
NK044(phi)001:12816: los sgyur ba'i stan dang seng ge'i khri thob pa
NK044(phi)001:12817: dang / chos 'di nyan par bskul bas gzungs thob
NK044(phi)001:12818: pa'i byang sems rnams dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang
NK044(phi)001:12821: tshe rabs kun tu kha rul zhing mnam par mi 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:12822: lce nad dang kha nad mi 'byung /
NK044(phi)001:12823: so mdog ngan pa yo ba phyung ba sogs med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12824: mchu 'phyang ba sho re sogs kyi skyon med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12826: gdong yo ba sogs kyi skyon med par lta na
NK044(phi)001:12827: sdug pa'i gdong gi yon tan rnam pa mang po
NK044(phi)001:12828: 'thob ste / de ltar sems can gcig chos 'di
NK044(phi)001:12829: la spro bar byas pas kyang bsod nams de tsam
NK044(phi)001:12830: 'thob ste / skyed na / bsti stang du byas
NK044(phi)001:12831: te snyan pa dang klog pa dang ston pa sogs
NK044(phi)001:12832: smos ci dgos zhes gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:12833: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:12834: chen po rtag par rgyun du brtson pa la bka'
NK044(phi)001:12835: stsal pa / rigs kyi bu dam pa'i chos pad+ma
NK044(phi)001:12836: dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:12837: pa'am klog pa'am ston pa'am yi ger 'dri yang rung
NK044(phi)001:12838: stsal pa / ste / yon tan brgya brgya thob par 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:12839: rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya /
NK044(phi)001:12841: lce'i yon tan stong nyis brgya /
NK044(phi)001:12842: lus kyi yon tan brgyad brgya /
NK044(phi)001:12843: yid kyi yon tan stong nyis brgya thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:12844: yon tan brgya phrag mang pos dbang po drug gi grong yongs su dag cing /
NK044(phi)001:12845: shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:12846: de'i pha ma las byung ba'i sha'i mig tha mal
NK044(phi)001:12847: ba de ltar yongs su dag pa'i mig gi dbang
NK044(phi)001:12848: pos / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:12849: khams kyi phyi nang dang brag dang nags tshal stug
NK044(phi)001:12851: srid rtse dang mnar med la thug pa'i bar du
NK044(phi)001:12852: mthong nas sems can gang dag der skyes pa thams
NK044(phi)001:12854: de dag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa yang shes so //
NK044(phi)001:12855: de bzhin du rna ba'i yon tan stong nyis brgya
NK044(phi)001:12856: dang ldan pa'i rna ba des stong chen po'i 'jig
NK044(phi)001:12857: rten 'di na sgra yod do cog thos pa ste
NK044(phi)001:12858: / de ltar de'i rnam par smin pa las byung
NK044(phi)001:12859: ba'i mig dang rna ba'i yon tan de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:12860: / 'thob ste / lha'i mig dang rna ba ni ma yin no //
NK044(phi)001:12861: de bzhin du snas dri thams cad tshor kyang dri
NK044(phi)001:12862: sna tshogs kyis sna'i dbang po mi 'phrog pa dang
NK044(phi)001:12864: lha'i gnas rnams kyi gnas su lha'i bu dang bu
NK044(phi)001:12865: mo 'khod pa rnams kyang 'di na 'dug bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:12866: shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams
NK044(phi)001:12867: gang na bzhugs pa yang dris shes par 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:12868: shes pa dang / // des lce'i dbang pos ro
NK044(phi)001:12869: gang myangs pa thams cad lha'i ro bro ba dam
NK044(phi)001:12871: yid du mi 'ong ba'i ro mi myong bar 'gyur ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:12872: 'khor gyi nang du chos bshad na sems can de
NK044(phi)001:12873: dag gi dbang po tshim zhing rab tu mgu bar
NK044(phi)001:12874: byed la de'i sgra zab cing yid du 'ong ba
NK044(phi)001:12875: mnyen zhing snying la 'bab pa dang dga' bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:12876: ba des sems can dga' mgu rangs par byed pa
NK044(phi)001:12877: de lta bu thos nas brgya byin dang tshangs pa
NK044(phi)001:12878: tshangs ris kyi bu sogs lha thams cad blta zhing
NK044(phi)001:12879: phyag bya ba dang chos mnyan pa'i phyir drung du
NK044(phi)001:12881: de bzhin du mi dang mi ma yin pa thams
NK044(phi)001:12882: cad kyang de lta 'dod la chos nyan par byed
NK044(phi)001:12883: do // sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de la gzigs par bzhed cing /
NK044(phi)001:12884: de'i phyogs su gzigs te chos 'chad do //
NK044(phi)001:12885: nyan rang rnams kyang de ltar dong bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:12886: de'i lus yongs su dag pa bee d+aur+ya lta bu
NK044(phi)001:12887: dag cing mthong na dga' ba de la stong chen
NK044(phi)001:12888: po'i 'jig rten kun na yod pa'i sems can sna
NK044(phi)001:12889: tshogs gang dag yod pa thams cad snang bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:12890: ro // nyan rang byang sems de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:12891: rnams stong chen po'i 'jig rten na gang bzhugs pa
NK044(phi)001:12892: ro // dang / de la bsnyen bkur byed pa thams cad kyang rang gi lus la snang ste /
NK044(phi)001:12893: de'i lus yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:12894: de'i yi da kyi dbang po yongs su dag pa
NK044(phi)001:12895: des tha na tshigs bcad gcig thos kyang de'i don
NK044(phi)001:12898: bzhi'am lor yang chos ston te /
NK044(phi)001:12899: chos gang bstan pa de brjed ngas par mi 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:12900: 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad gang dag skad dang sngags
NK044(phi)001:12901: ci yod pa de thams cad chos kyi tshul dang
NK044(phi)001:12902: sbyor ro // stong chen po'i 'jig rten 'di'i 'gro
NK044(phi)001:12903: ba drug tu skyes shing 'khor ba'i sems can ji
NK044(phi)001:12904: snyed pa'i sems kyi g.yo ba dang bsam pa dang
NK044(phi)001:12905: spros pa rnams kyang rab tu rtogs so //
NK044(phi)001:12906: re zhig 'phags pa'i ye shes ma thob kyang yid
NK044(phi)001:12907: kyi dbang po 'di lta bu yongs su dag par
NK044(phi)001:12908: 'gyur ro // chos kyi nges tshig gang dang gang
NK044(phi)001:12909: rjes su bsams te gtam ston pa de thams cad
NK044(phi)001:12910: 'gyur ro // ston la / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12911: gsang ba thams cad dang sngon gyi rgyal bas mdo
NK044(phi)001:12912: sde'i rnam grangs bstan pa thams cad 'chad do //
NK044(phi)001:12915: glegs bam du bgyis pa'i phan yon sogs mdo de nyid du blta bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12917: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bshad pa'i mdo
NK044(phi)001:12918: sde thams cad kyi nang na dam pa'i chos pad+ma
NK044(phi)001:12919: dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mchog tu gyur
NK044(phi)001:12921: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu
NK044(phi)001:12922: bzang po 'khor byang chub sems dpa' bgrang ba las
NK044(phi)001:12923: 'das pa dag gis yongs su bskor te /
NK044(phi)001:12924: shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dkon mchog gzi
NK044(phi)001:12925: brjid mngon 'phags rgyal po'i drung nas rdzu 'phrul rnam
NK044(phi)001:12926: par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis
NK044(phi)001:12927: mi mjed 'dir bya rgod phung po'i ri la bcom
NK044(phi)001:12928: ldan 'das sh+aakya thub pa'i drung du dam pa'i chos
NK044(phi)001:12929: pad+ma dkar po'i rnam grangs mnyan pa'i phyir 'ongs pa
NK044(phi)001:12930: la / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
NK044(phi)001:12931: rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
NK044(phi)001:12932: 'di dag ni mgo smos pa tsam gyis khong du
NK044(phi)001:12934: dam pa'i chos pad+ma dkar po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'di lta ste /
NK044(phi)001:12935: de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings dang dbyer med pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:12937: byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis de lta lags so zhes gsol ba bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:12938: chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid shes na /
NK044(phi)001:12939: theg pa gcig tu nges pa yang shes la /
NK044(phi)001:12940: nyan rang gi theg pa rnams kyang dman pa la
NK044(phi)001:12941: mos pa rnams la re zhig sangs rgyas kyis thabs
NK044(phi)001:12942: mkhas pas de ltar bstan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:12943: nyan thos kyi 'bras bu thob pa rnams kyang ji
NK044(phi)001:12944: ltar mdo 'di las sh+aa ri'i bu sogs dgra bcom
NK044(phi)001:12945: pa rnams bla med byang chub tu lung bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:12946: ltar thams cad mthar thug byang chub chen po 'thob
NK044(phi)001:12948: de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing dang sku tshe'i tshad kyang
NK044(phi)001:12949: mthar med pa sogs mthar thug don gyi gnas zab
NK044(phi)001:12950: mo rnams la chos nyid la rton pa'i shes rab
NK044(phi)001:12951: dri ma med pas yid ches pa skye zhing /
NK044(phi)001:12952: de lta bu'i mdo 'di yang mdo gzhan las 'phags
NK044(phi)001:12953: te 'phags pa'i ye shes 'god pa'i dbang du byas
NK044(phi)001:12954: pas nges don mthar thug par rtogs par 'gyur ba
NK044(phi)001:12955: ltar / blo dang skal pa mchog gis brgyan pa'i
NK044(phi)001:12956: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis kyang de lta
NK044(phi)001:12957: bu'i rjes su bslabs par bya'o zhes shes pa'i ched
NK044(phi)001:12958: ltar / du / 'dir yang mdo las bkol te /
NK044(phi)001:12959: 'di ltar phan sems kyis snyigs ma'i skye bo mdo
NK044(phi)001:12960: rgyas par lta mi nus pa rnams la mdo'i don
NK044(phi)001:12961: snying po rnams brjod pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:12962: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po glang chen
NK044(phi)001:12963: thal dkar mche ba drug pa la 'tshal nas byang
NK044(phi)001:12964: chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis yongs su bskor te chos
NK044(phi)001:12965: kyi rnam grangs 'di smra ba'i drung du bsrung ba
NK044(phi)001:12967: tshig dang yi ge gcig nor kyang ngo bstan pa'i slad du mchi bar 'gyur zhing /
NK044(phi)001:12968: chos smra ba des kun tu bzang po'i lus mthong nas /
NK044(phi)001:12969: gzungs 'khyil pa la sogs pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro zhes sogs basngagasa pa rgya cher gsungs so //
NK044(phi)001:12970: de bzhin gshegs pas kyang 'khor de'i byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:12971: dpa' rnams bsdus te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gtad
NK044(phi)001:12972: nas gzhan la sgrogs par gyis dang /
NK044(phi)001:12973: de lta na de bzhin gshegs pa la lan lon par 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:12974: bdag cag rnams kyis kyang chos dang de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:12975: pa la gus pa'i sgo nas 'dzin cing gzhan dag
NK044(phi)001:12976: la ci nus su bstan par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:12977: de ltar yon tan tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas gang
NK044(phi)001:12978: zhing yid la byed pa dang mchod pa sogs byas
NK044(phi)001:12979: nas sangs rgyas thams cad la yang de ltar byas
NK044(phi)001:12980: par 'gyur te / sgyu ma mkhan bzang pos zhus pa las /
NK044(phi)001:12981: bzang po rgyal ba gcig la mchod byed na //
NK044(phi)001:12982: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas la ni mchod 'gyur te //
NK044(phi)001:12983: 'di ltar de dag nga yi chos dbyings dang //
NK044(phi)001:12984: tha dad bya ba nam yang yod ma yin //
NK044(phi)001:12985: de dag thams cad yon bzhes sbyong bar mdzad //
NK044(phi)001:12986: kun la phul ba'ang 'bras bu che bar 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12987: de kun chos nyid dag la mnyam pa brnyes //
NK044(phi)001:12988: sangs rgyas rnams la tha dad bya ba'ang med //
NK044(phi)001:12990: sangs rgyas phal po che las /
NK044(phi)001:12991: sangs rgyas mthong ba tsam gyis 'gro ba yi //
NK044(phi)001:12992: las kyi sgrib pa thams cad bzlog par 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:12993: bdud kyi las rnams kun kyang de bzhin spong //
