NK044(phi)001:12995: sems gcig rgyud la rgyal ba'i yon tan gyi //
NK044(phi)001:12996: bde gshegs shin tu rgya che sus dran pa //
NK044(phi)001:12997: de la ngan song kun gyi 'jigs pa med //
NK044(phi)001:12999: 'gro ba 'di na rtse dga' gang bde ba //
NK044(phi)001:13000: de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i mthu yis byung //
NK044(phi)001:13001: bsod nams mnyam med rgyal ba 'byung la ltos //
NK044(phi)001:13003: chos dbyings thug pa med par rgyal bas khyab //
NK044(phi)001:13004: 'gro dang mnyam par bsam yas sku bkye ste //
NK044(phi)001:13005: chos kyi tshul 'di sems can kun la ston //
NK044(phi)001:13007: nam mkha'i dngos ltar dngos med 'gro ba na //
NK044(phi)001:13008: gzugs brnyan mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas rnams snang ba //
NK044(phi)001:13009: 'gro ba kun la phan pa'i don du byung //
NK044(phi)001:13011: sangs rgyas ba spu re re'i yon tan yang //
NK044(phi)001:13012: 'jig rten kun gyis shes pa mi nus te //
NK044(phi)001:13013: mgon po rnams ni mi zad nam mkha' bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:13015: rgyu mtshan shes pa'i dad pas rgyu byas nas de
NK044(phi)001:13016: bzhin gshegs pa yid la byas te mtshan brjod cing
NK044(phi)001:13017: gzungs bzla ba sogs la rgyun du 'bad pa ci
NK044(phi)001:13019: de ltar min na yang zhag bdun la sogs par rtse gcig tu 'bad par byas don che ste /
NK044(phi)001:13020: 'phags pa dkon mchog sprin zhes bya ba'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:13021: sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK044(phi)001:13022: la dad pa drag pos zhag bdun du yid la
NK044(phi)001:13023: byed pa gzhan spangs te sangs rgyas 'ba' zhig yid
NK044(phi)001:13024: la byas nas / zhag bdun song ba'i nangs par
NK044(phi)001:13025: gos sogs gtsang bar byas te mchod pa'i cho ga
NK044(phi)001:13027: de'i nub mo sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13028: gal te cho ga ma tshang ba'am /
NK044(phi)001:13029: rtse gcig pa'i sems med na yang 'chi ba'i dus byas nas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13032: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13033: ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las gsungs pa'i don bsdus
NK044(phi)001:13034: te brjod na / byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa'am
NK044(phi)001:13035: rab tu byung ba de dag dben par 'dug ste
NK044(phi)001:13036: te brjod na / / de bzhin gshegs pa gang na bzhugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13038: de'i sku'i rnam pa thos pa'i rnam pa'i tshul du yang yang yid la byas te /
NK044(phi)001:13039: tshul khrims kyi phung po la skyon med cing dran
NK044(phi)001:13040: pa g.yeng ba med pas nyin zhag gcig nas bdun
NK044(phi)001:13041: gyi bar sangs rgyas yid la byas nas zhag bdun
NK044(phi)001:13042: du mi yengs par gyur na /
NK044(phi)001:13043: de'i nyin mo sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:13044: gal te mthong na nyal ba'i rmi lam du sangs rgyas kyi zhal ston par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13046: yang tshul 'di lta bus nub phyogs bde ba can
NK044(phi)001:13047: na sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa zhes bya
NK044(phi)001:13048: bzhugs yod do zhes thos pa'i rnam pa'i rjes su
NK044(phi)001:13049: song ba'i yid kyis yid la gong ltar byas nas
NK044(phi)001:13050: / ji ltar skyes bu chags ldan dag gis phyogs
NK044(phi)001:13051: gzhan che ge mo na smad 'tshong ma che ge
NK044(phi)001:13052: mo gzugs 'di lta bu yod do zhes thos pa
NK044(phi)001:13053: / de dag / smad 'tshong de dag mthong ma myong du zin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:13054: de la chags pa'i yid la byed pa yang yang byas te /
NK044(phi)001:13055: nyal ba'i rmi lam du smad 'tshong ma de dag
NK044(phi)001:13056: dang 'khrig pa'i chos bsten pa'i bde ma myong bar
NK044(phi)001:13058: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa de /
NK044(phi)001:13059: 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid na 'dug bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:13060: sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa la sogs pa
NK044(phi)001:13061: thos nas / mtshan dang gzungs dang yon tan tsam
NK044(phi)001:13062: zhig thos pas de bzhin du de rjes su dran
NK044(phi)001:13063: pa byed cing yang yang yid la byed pas de
NK044(phi)001:13064: bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag tu med pa la sogs
NK044(phi)001:13065: pa de dag mthong nas zhu ba dag kyang byed
NK044(phi)001:13066: thos nas / do // de ltar sangs rgyas yid la byas pas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang /
NK044(phi)001:13067: rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs bskyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13068: ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i phyir sangs rgyas mthong ba thob par 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:13069: dper na rang gi gdong me long dwangs ba sogs la snang na /
NK044(phi)001:13070: gzugs de me long sogs kyi nang du zhugs pa med mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:13071: rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i rten 'brel gyi snang ba 'gro
NK044(phi)001:13072: 'ong med pa'i tshul du de ltar btsan pa des
NK044(phi)001:13073: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong la zhu ba zhus pa
NK044(phi)001:13074: lung bstan pas yi rangs par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13075: der de bzhin gshegs pa de gzhan nas byon tam /
NK044(phi)001:13076: bdag de'i mdun du song ba med kyang rang gi
NK044(phi)001:13077: rnam par rtog pa de ltar snang bar 'gyur la
NK044(phi)001:13078: / de bzhin du khams gsum po 'di dag kyang sems tsam mo //
NK044(phi)001:13079: sems ni phyi dang nang kun tu btsal kyang mi rnyed de /
NK044(phi)001:13080: dmigs pa la brten nas skye ba rten cing 'brel
NK044(phi)001:13081: bar 'byung ba sgyu ma la sogs pa bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:13083: gang dngos po med pa de ni rang gi ngo
NK044(phi)001:13084: bor ma skyes pa la dmigs su med pa ste
NK044(phi)001:13085: gdags pa bral bar shes pa'i ye shes 'byung ngo
NK044(phi)001:13086: // byang chub sems dpa' da ltar gyi sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:13087: mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin de ni
NK044(phi)001:13088: chos bzhi dang ldan na 'thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:13091: phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
NK044(phi)001:13092: gzhan dring mi 'jog pa'i shes rab dang /
NK044(phi)001:13093: dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:13094: zhes sogs de 'thob byed kyi chos rnams kyang ji
NK044(phi)001:13095: ltar gsungs pa ltar nan tan gyis bsgrubs na ting
NK044(phi)001:13097: des tshegs chung ngus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa mig lam du snang zhing /
NK044(phi)001:13098: thos pa dang dran pa dang blo gros dang rtogs
NK044(phi)001:13099: pa dang phar phyin dang gzungs dang ting 'dzin dang
NK044(phi)001:13100: rdzu 'phrul la sogs pa yon tan gyi tshogs thams
NK044(phi)001:13101: cad rjes su thob pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13102: bla med rdzogs byang las mi nyams pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13103: mi khoms par mi skye ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13104: skye ba rnams su gzugs bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13105: rigs mtho zhing 'khor mang po dang /
NK044(phi)001:13106: rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi
NK044(phi)001:13107: 'bral ba la sogs pa'i phan yon bsam gyis mi
NK044(phi)001:13108: khyab pa yang 'thob par 'gyur ro zhes rgya cher
NK044(phi)001:13109: gsungs pa mdo de nyid du lta bar bya la
NK044(phi)001:13110: / gang zhig phyi dus 'jigs byed chen po'i tshe /
NK044(phi)001:13111: ting 'dzin 'di ni thos nas 'dzin byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:13112: de ni nga dang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas sam /
NK044(phi)001:13113: ma byon dag la'ang bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:13115: bzang skyong de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:13116: chen pos ting 'dzin 'di ji ltar bsgom par bya
NK044(phi)001:13117: zhe na / bzang skyong 'di lta ste nga da
NK044(phi)001:13118: ltar khyod kyi mdun na 'dug cing chos ston pa
NK044(phi)001:13119: zhe na / de bzhin du / bzang skyong byang
NK044(phi)001:13120: chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK044(phi)001:13121: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku skyes
NK044(phi)001:13122: bu chen po'i mtshan re re yang bsod nams brgyas
NK044(phi)001:13123: zhe na / de bzhin du / bskyed par blta'o // mtshan ma rnams kyang gzung bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13125: bzung nas kyang 'di ltar bslab par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13126: a la la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
NK044(phi)001:13127: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni de ltar
NK044(phi)001:13129: bdag kyang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na lus yongs su
NK044(phi)001:13130: grub pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:13131: zhes sogs su yid la byed tshul gsungs zhing de
NK044(phi)001:13132: ltar rnam pa mchog dang ldan par yid la byas
NK044(phi)001:13133: nas / yang nga zhes bya ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13134: byang chub de yang gang yin zhes brtags nas rang
NK044(phi)001:13135: bzhin med par nges pa bskyed pa'i tshul rnams kyang
NK044(phi)001:13136: gsungs so // phan yon gyi basngagasa pa sogs rgyas par mdo nyid du blta bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13137: sher phyin bdun brgya pa las /
NK044(phi)001:13138: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba'i ting
NK044(phi)001:13139: nge 'dzin yod de ting nge 'dzin de la spyad
NK044(phi)001:13140: na byang chub sems dpa' chen po myur du bla
NK044(phi)001:13141: na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
NK044(phi)001:13142: tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshangs rgya bar 'gyur ro
NK044(phi)001:13144: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni skye ba med pa'i tshig bla dgas so //
NK044(phi)001:13145: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par
NK044(phi)001:13146: 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mos thog
NK044(phi)001:13147: ma nyid du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK044(phi)001:13148: pa yongs su dri bar bya dgos te /
NK044(phi)001:13149: de'i 'og tu bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13151: 'jam dpal skye ba med pa ni mi 'khrugs pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:13153: dkrug par bya ba ma yin pa /
NK044(phi)001:13157: 'jam dpal bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin la
NK044(phi)001:13158: 'jug par 'dod pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu
NK044(phi)001:13159: mos dben pa'i mal stan rnams bsten par bya /
NK044(phi)001:13160: 'du 'dzi med pa la dga' bar byas pa la /
NK044(phi)001:13161: mtshan ma thams cad yid la mi bya bar skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug nas /
NK044(phi)001:13162: der mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig yid la bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13163: chos thams cad kyang yid la bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13164: de bzhin gshegs pa gang yid la byed pa de'i ming yang gzung bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13165: ming de yang thos te dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:13166: pa de phyogs ga la bar bzhugs pa'i phyogs der
NK044(phi)001:13167: mngon du bltas te 'dug par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13169: de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid yid la byas na /
NK044(phi)001:13170: de yid la byas pas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs
NK044(phi)001:13171: pa dang da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:13172: 'das rnams yid la byas par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13174: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:13175: 'jam dpal ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan tshad med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13176: spobs pa tshad pa de bzhin du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob nas /
NK044(phi)001:13177: skye ba med pa gcig gis chos kyi rnam grangs kyi bye brag tshad med pa shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13178: 'dir gang dag chud par 'gyur ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13179: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
NK044(phi)001:13180: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gang dag gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:13181: dang / kun dga' bos ji snyed yongs su bzung
NK044(phi)001:13182: ba de snyed kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir snang
NK044(phi)001:13183: dang / bar 'gyur ro // bkod pa gcig pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13184: ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgrubs pas de'i tshe'i tshad ji
NK044(phi)001:13185: tsam pa de tsam du gnas shing gling bzhi dang
NK044(phi)001:13186: bcas pa'i chos ston par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13187: 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa kha cig
NK044(phi)001:13188: 'di snyam du bkod pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin
NK044(phi)001:13189: 'di gang yin snyam du sems na /
NK044(phi)001:13190: de dag la 'di skad ces yon tan bsam gyis
NK044(phi)001:13191: mi khyab pa yongs su bsgrags pa 'di yang dag
NK044(phi)001:13193: ji lta ji ltar yang dag par blangs te gnas
NK044(phi)001:13194: pa de lta de ltar ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yon
NK044(phi)001:13196: ji skad bstan pa'i tshul gyis zhum pa med par gyis shig ces brjod par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13198: 'di ni dmigs pa'i lta ba can gyis bsgrub par mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:13199: dper na mi zhig la nor bu rin po che
NK044(phi)001:13200: byi dor ma bya sa pa zhig yod pa la
NK044(phi)001:13201: / gzhan gyis de'i rin thang dang yon tan 'dri na /
NK044(phi)001:13202: 'di'i yon tan tshad med par shes par gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:13203: 'di byi dor gyis dang de nas shes par 'gyur ro zhees smras te /
NK044(phi)001:13204: de de la byin nas phyi dor byas pa bzhin nor bu'i yon tan mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13205: de bzhin du nyi ma'i 'od kyis thams cad la khyab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13206: rgya mtsho chen po'i phyogs bzhi nas chu bcus pa
NK044(phi)001:13207: thams cad lan tsh+wa'i ror gcig pa bzhin du ting
NK044(phi)001:13208: nge 'dzin des chos thams cad skye med du gcig
NK044(phi)001:13210: 'phags pa dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13211: mdo'i bam po bcu bdun pa'i mjug tu yang bkod
NK044(phi)001:13212: pa gcig pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bstan par mdzad
NK044(phi)001:13213: do // byams pas seng ge'i sgra chen po bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:13214: sngon byung ba bskal pa ches grangs med dpag tu med pa 'das pa'i dus na /
NK044(phi)001:13215: de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od ces bya ba 'jig
NK044(phi)001:13216: rten du byung nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes
NK044(phi)001:13217: su / byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
NK044(phi)001:13218: zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba mdzes pa lta na
NK044(phi)001:13219: sdug pa zhig yul der rgyal por gyur pa bram
NK044(phi)001:13220: ze'i rigs shing s+aa la chen po lta bu zhig
NK044(phi)001:13221: gi bur skyes par gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:13222: de'i tshe na bstan pa la zhugs pa'i dge slong
NK044(phi)001:13223: de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs rnam
NK044(phi)001:13224: pa sna tshogs ri mor 'bri bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:13225: der dge slong zhig gis dar la de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:13226: pa'i sku gzugs legs par byas shing shin tu rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:13227: par bris pa zhig byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:13228: de byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i pha'i pho brang du khyer ro //
NK044(phi)001:13229: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des sku gzugs de mthong nas 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:13230: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di tsam
NK044(phi)001:13231: du lta na sdug pa yin na sangs rgyas de
NK044(phi)001:13232: lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
NK044(phi)001:13233: bdag kyang lus 'di lta bu dang ldan na ci
NK044(phi)001:13234: ma rung snyam du mchog tu dga' ba dang dad
NK044(phi)001:13236: khyim thams cad mi dga' bar gyur cing /
NK044(phi)001:13237: khyim na gnas bzhin lus 'di lta bu sgrub par mi nus te /
NK044(phi)001:13238: bdag khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar snyam mo //
NK044(phi)001:13239: de nas brtson 'grus chen po lo bcu drug lon
NK044(phi)001:13240: pa dbang po rnam par smin pa des rang gi
NK044(phi)001:13241: pha ma'i rkang pa la phyag 'tshal te /
NK044(phi)001:13242: bdag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan la rab tu byung bar ci gnang zhes smras pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13244: gzhon nu khyod de skad ma zer cig /
NK044(phi)001:13245: nged gnyis la bu sdug pa phangs pa yid du 'ong ba khyod gcig pu las med pas /
NK044(phi)001:13246: gal te khyod ma mthong na 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:13248: bdag gis ci nas kyang khyed gnyis nongs par mi
NK044(phi)001:13249: 'gyur la bdag mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba de
NK044(phi)001:13250: ltar bagyi'o // pha mas smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:13253: bdag deng slan chad ji srid mngon par 'byung bar ma gyur pa de srid du /
NK044(phi)001:13257: mar sar dang 'bru mar gyis kyang mi nyug /
NK044(phi)001:13258: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i tshig 'ga' yang mi smra lags so //
NK044(phi)001:13259: de nas khye'u des phyogs phyi dor ma byas pa
NK044(phi)001:13260: zhig tu 'dug nas cang mi smra bar gyur cing
NK044(phi)001:13261: nyin gcig zan yang ma zos so //
NK044(phi)001:13262: de nas pha ma gnyis kyis ro brgya dang ldan pa'i kha zas thogs te /
NK044(phi)001:13263: nyin mtshan thog thag tu tshig gzhan med par de
NK044(phi)001:13264: la zas za ba'i gsol ba 'ba' zhig btab kyang
NK044(phi)001:13265: de tshig tsam yang mi smra bar gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:13266: de bzhin du des zhag gnyis kyi bar du zan ma zos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13267: de'i ma'i nye du lnga brgya tsam gyis kha zas ro brgya pa thogs te /
NK044(phi)001:13268: nyin mtshan thog thag tu gsol ba btab kyang de'i
NK044(phi)001:13269: gdong du yang mi lta na tshig smra ba lta
NK044(phi)001:13270: ci smros / de ltar zhag gsum gyi bar du zan ma zos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13271: de'i pha'i nye du lnga brgya dag gis snga ma bzhin du gsol ba btab kyang sngar bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:13272: des zhag bzhir zan ma zos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13273: de'i ne'u ldangs lnga brgya dag gis gsol ba btab kyang gong bzhin no //
NK044(phi)001:13274: de zhag lngar zan ma zos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13275: de'i pha ma gnyis kyis rang gi pho brang rgyal thabs chen por gyur pa de na /
NK044(phi)001:13277: gser dang nor bu dang mu tig dang beed+aur+ya sogs rin po che dang /
NK044(phi)001:13278: gos dang rgyan sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa de thams cad phyogs gcig tu bzhag ste /
NK044(phi)001:13279: na chung lha'i bu mo 'dra ba rgyan thams cad
NK044(phi)001:13280: kyis brgyan pa brgyad khri bzhi stong yang bkug ste
NK044(phi)001:13282: mdor na rgyal po'i pho brang nye bar spyod pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13283: longs spyod ji snyed yod pa de'i mdun du bzhag
NK044(phi)001:13284: ste / de'i pha ma gnyis dang /
NK044(phi)001:13285: gong gi ma'i nye du lnga brgya po la sogs pa thams cad dang /
NK044(phi)001:13286: na chung brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /
NK044(phi)001:13287: skye bo phal mo che de thams cad kyis zas ro brgya pa thogs te /
NK044(phi)001:13288: nyin mtshan thog thag tu gzhon nu de la 'di skad ces gzhon nu longs la zan zo /
NK044(phi)001:13289: khyim 'dir 'dug la sbyin pa dag kyang byin cig /
NK044(phi)001:13290: bsod nams dag kyang gyis shig /
NK044(phi)001:13291: bud med 'di dag dang lan cig dga' ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13293: dga' mgur spyad pa dag kyang gyis la rgyal po'i
NK044(phi)001:13294: khyim 'di lta bu yongs su ma gtong zhig ces
NK044(phi)001:13295: kyang smras so // der byang chub sems dpa'i brtson
NK044(phi)001:13296: 'grus chen po des der 'dus pa rnams la mig
NK044(phi)001:13297: kyang mi lta phyir yang mi smra bar de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:13298: kyang smras so // du 'dug nas / zhag drug
NK044(phi)001:13299: gi bar du zan yang ma zos par des sangs
NK044(phi)001:13300: rgyas yid la byed pa ma gtogs par yid byed
NK044(phi)001:13301: gzhan thams cad spangs te kha zas kyi 'du shes
NK044(phi)001:13303: de'i pha ma dang nye du'i tshogs dang bud med
NK044(phi)001:13304: de dag dang skye bo'i tshogs de dag mchi ma'i
NK044(phi)001:13305: rgyun blags shing skad phyung ste ngud mos btab nas
NK044(phi)001:13306: byang chub sems dpa' de'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs
NK044(phi)001:13307: kyang de dag gi gdong du yang mi lta'o //
NK044(phi)001:13308: de'i tshe rgyal po'i pho brang de na lha zhig
NK044(phi)001:13309: gnas par gyur pa gang yin pa de steng gi
NK044(phi)001:13310: bar snang la cho 'phrul chen pos 'dug nas /
NK044(phi)001:13311: skye bo phal mo che de dag la tshigs su bcad de smras pa /
NK044(phi)001:13312: gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa //
NK044(phi)001:13313: de dag lhun po 'dra bar ni //
NK044(phi)001:13314: mthu brtan rab tu mi g.yo ste //
NK044(phi)001:13315: yi dam gtong bar mi byed do //
NK044(phi)001:13316: sa rnams thams cad g.yos yang srid //
NK044(phi)001:13317: me ni chur yang 'gyur kyang srid //
NK044(phi)001:13319: bskyod par nus pa ma yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13320: 'di la mi dga' phyis mi bya //
NK044(phi)001:13321: sdig pa'i las rnams ma byed cig /
NK044(phi)001:13322: phyin chad dmus long 'dra bar ni //
NK044(phi)001:13323: bskal pa bye bar 'khyams ta re /
NK044(phi)001:13324: 'di ni sems can thams cad la //
NK044(phi)001:13325: phan phyir byang chub bzhugs pa ste //
NK044(phi)001:13326: mngon par 'byung phyir brtson rnams ni /
NK044(phi)001:13327: byang chub dam pa rnyed mi dka' //
NK044(phi)001:13328: 'dod pa'i phyiir dang longs spyod phyir //
NK044(phi)001:13329: byang chub spyad pa mi spyod kyi //
NK044(phi)001:13330: sems can gang dag sangs rgyas kyi //
NK044(phi)001:13331: ye shes tshol rnams ji ltar bde //
NK044(phi)001:13332: stong gsum rin chen rnams dang ni //
NK044(phi)001:13333: gos dang yul gzhan lha rdzas kyis //
NK044(phi)001:13334: chal bar bkang bar gyur kyang ni //
NK044(phi)001:13335: de dag chags pa bya mi nus //
NK044(phi)001:13336: mi shes pas ni gang byas pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:13337: sdig pa'i las ni bshags par gyis //
NK044(phi)001:13338: mkhas pa nyes pa bshags nas ni //
NK044(phi)001:13339: las dang lan cig mi gnas so //
NK044(phi)001:13340: zhes de ltar lha des bskul ba na /
NK044(phi)001:13341: byangachuba sems dpa' de'i pha ma dang nye du sogs
NK044(phi)001:13342: skye bo'i tshogs de dag gis nyes pa bshags nas
NK044(phi)001:13344: gzhon nu khyod ji ltar bsams pa bzhin songs shig /
NK044(phi)001:13347: zas ma zos pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ta re /
NK044(phi)001:13349: der byang chub sems dpa' des zhag bdun gyi bar du zan bcad du zin kyang /
NK044(phi)001:13350: des sangs rgyas yid la byed pas zhag bdun gyi
NK044(phi)001:13351: bar du lha rnams kyis de'i lus la mdangs ba
NK044(phi)001:13352: cug nas dbang po rnams gzhan du ma gyur /
NK044(phi)001:13353: bzhin gyi mdangs yang nyams par ma gyur to //
NK044(phi)001:13354: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' des zhag bdun zan bcad de /
NK044(phi)001:13355: khyim gyi gnas la mi lta bar rgyal srid chen
NK044(phi)001:13356: po de mchil ma'i thal ba bzhin du bor nas
NK044(phi)001:13357: / bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang pha ma
NK044(phi)001:13358: dang nye du'i tshogs kyi gdong mchi mas gang ste
NK044(phi)001:13359: / ngu bzhin du / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de khyer te /
NK044(phi)001:13360: rang gi grong khyer chen po de nas byung nas
NK044(phi)001:13361: dgon pa mi med pa gcan gzan gdug pa gnas
NK044(phi)001:13362: pa'i nags zhig tu zhugs so //
NK044(phi)001:13363: der zhugs nas ras bcos bu'i gzhi la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs de bzhag nas /
NK044(phi)001:13364: de'i mdun du r+ts+wa'i gding ba bting ba'i steng du
NK044(phi)001:13365: skyil mo krung bcas te lus drang por bsrangs nas
NK044(phi)001:13366: 'dug cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la rtog par byed do //
NK044(phi)001:13367: de de la rtog par byed pa na 'di snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:13368: gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di yang 'di ltar tsam du mdzes pa yin na /
NK044(phi)001:13369: bcom ldan 'das de smos kyang ci dgos te /
NK044(phi)001:13370: sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de tsam du mdzes pa
NK044(phi)001:13371: ni ngo mtshar bas gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:13372: pa de mthong ba de dag ni dpal yon can
NK044(phi)001:13375: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta bar bya snyam du sems par yang gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13376: de nas nags khrod de na lha zhig gnas pa
NK044(phi)001:13377: gang yin pa des byang chub sems dpa' de'i sems
NK044(phi)001:13378: kyi rtog pa yongs su shes nas /
NK044(phi)001:13379: de la 'di skad ces smras so //
NK044(phi)001:13380: grogs po khyod ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa blta
NK044(phi)001:13381: bar bya snyam du rnam par rtog par byed pa
NK044(phi)001:13383: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du blta bar bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:13384: sku gzugs 'di ji ltar mthong ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang blta bar bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13385: de ltar mthong na de bzhin gshegs pa legs par mthong ba yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13386: de nas byang chub sems dpa' des 'di snyam du
NK044(phi)001:13387: ji ltar bltas na de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar
NK044(phi)001:13388: 'gyur bar / sku gzugs 'di la ji ltar lta bar bya snyam nas /
NK044(phi)001:13390: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di sems par mi byed /
NK044(phi)001:13391: rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang sems par mi byed /
NK044(phi)001:13392: rnam par shes par mi byed de /
NK044(phi)001:13393: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13394: ji ltar sku gzugs 'di ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:13395: chos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa la /
NK044(phi)001:13396: ming de yang ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13397: rang bzhin gyis g.yo ba med pa yin te /
NK044(phi)001:13398: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13399: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la /
NK044(phi)001:13401: mngon par rtogs pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13403: mngon sum du bya ba med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13405: 'bras bu rtogs pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13412: kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13413: rnam par byang ba med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13416: tshul ma yin pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13417: 'dod chags zad pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13418: zhe sdang zad pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13419: gti mug zad pa med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13420: phung po rnams med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13422: skye mched rnams med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13423: sngon gyi mtha' med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13424: phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13425: dbus med pa de bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:13426: chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK044(phi)001:13427: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13428: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di g.yo ba med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13429: spyod pa med pa de bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:13430: chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK044(phi)001:13431: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu kho na yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13432: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di lta bar mi byed /
NK044(phi)001:13442: rnam par shes par mi byed pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK044(phi)001:13443: chos thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du de
NK044(phi)001:13444: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:13445: yin no // ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
NK044(phi)001:13446: gzugs 'di 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma
NK044(phi)001:13447: yin no // yin / gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin /
NK044(phi)001:13448: gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa yang ma yin pa de bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:13449: chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK044(phi)001:13450: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13451: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs 'di la tshu rol yang med /
NK044(phi)001:13465: bden pa mngon par rtogs pa yang med /
NK044(phi)001:13466: kun tu 'dod chags pa yang med /
NK044(phi)001:13469: mya ngan las 'das pa yang med pa de bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:13470: chos thams cad kyang de dang 'dra ste /
NK044(phi)001:13471: chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:13472: gshegs pa'i sku yang mtshan nyid de lta bu yin
NK044(phi)001:13473: no snyam mo // de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
NK044(phi)001:13474: la 'jug pa de lta bu des rab tu rtog
NK044(phi)001:13475: par byed pa na nyin mtshan du skyil mo krung
NK044(phi)001:13477: des nyin mtshan de la mngon par shes pa lnga dang /
NK044(phi)001:13478: tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi dang /
NK044(phi)001:13479: spobs pa thogs pa med pa dag kyang bsgrub par 'gyur /
NK044(phi)001:13480: ting nge 'dzin kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba bsgrubs par gyur nas /
NK044(phi)001:13481: de la snang ba yang byung bar gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:13482: snang ba des lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi'i
NK044(phi)001:13483: las 'das pas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
NK044(phi)001:13484: dpag med grangs med pa dag kyang mthong ngo //
NK044(phi)001:13485: lha'i rna ba sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas bcom
NK044(phi)001:13486: ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan pa thams cad
NK044(phi)001:13487: thos te / de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gis chos
NK044(phi)001:13488: bstan pas gnyis pa la sgrib par mi 'gyur ba'i
NK044(phi)001:13489: tshul du thams cad kyang mnyes par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:13490: de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
NK044(phi)001:13491: de zla ba bdun gyi bar du 'chag cing 'dug
NK044(phi)001:13492: par gyur te / shes pa'i zas ma gtogs par
NK044(phi)001:13493: zas gzhan mi za zhing lha rnams kyis de'i lhag
NK044(phi)001:13494: pa'i bsam pa rigs nas de'i lus la mdangs bcug
NK044(phi)001:13495: par gyur te / par gyur to // de ltar
NK044(phi)001:13496: byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po des gos
NK044(phi)001:13497: ngur smrig kyang ma bgos de bzhin gshegs pa yang
NK044(phi)001:13499: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams kyang ma blangs mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:13500: 'on kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjes su
NK044(phi)001:13501: thob cing de ltar bslab pa 'dod par gyur pa
NK044(phi)001:13502: la ltos / zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od srung la bka' stsal te /
NK044(phi)001:13503: byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gyis kyang byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:13504: dpa' brtson 'grus chen po'i ji lta ba bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:13505: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la bsnyen bkur bya zhing
NK044(phi)001:13506: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci nas kyang 'phel ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13507: 'bri bar mi byed pa de ltar rab tu rnam par 'byed cing rab tu rtogs par byed na /
NK044(phi)001:13508: ye shes chen po'i rnam par 'di lta bu 'byung ste /
NK044(phi)001:13509: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas grangs med dpag tu med pa
NK044(phi)001:13510: mthong nas chos ston pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes
NK044(phi)001:13511: gsungs so // de nas byang chub sems dpa' brtson
NK044(phi)001:13512: 'grus chen po de nags khrod de nas phyir phyung
NK044(phi)001:13513: gsungs so // ste / grong dang grong khyer dang yul 'khor dang /
NK044(phi)001:13514: rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dag tu zhugs nas sems
NK044(phi)001:13515: can rnams la chos ston par byed cing srog chags
NK044(phi)001:13516: nyi khri ni bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi
NK044(phi)001:13518: sems can tshad med grangs med dag ni nyan rang
NK044(phi)001:13519: gi theg pa'i bsod nams la bkod par gyur to
NK044(phi)001:13522: 'khor gzhan thams cad ni bla med rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par byas so //
NK044(phi)001:13523: de ltar bdag cag gi ston pa sh+aakya'i rgyal po
NK044(phi)001:13524: nyid sngon byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus chen po
NK044(phi)001:13525: zhes bya bar gyur pa de dang /
NK044(phi)001:13526: de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lhag pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13527: bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyi rjes su
NK044(phi)001:13528: bslab par bya'o zhes gdams so //
NK044(phi)001:13530: phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la /
NK044(phi)001:13531: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu
NK044(phi)001:13532: dang bu mo thabs mi mkhas pa 'dod pa la
NK044(phi)001:13533: chags shing brkams pa rnams kyis /
NK044(phi)001:13534: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la mchod pa byas
NK044(phi)001:13535: pas dngos grub dang rdzu 'phrul thob par sems shing
NK044(phi)001:13536: / bdag cag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la mchod pa byed pa yin gyi /
NK044(phi)001:13537: gzhan ni de ltar ma yin no snyam du /
NK044(phi)001:13538: dge ba cung zad des bdag bstod la gzhan smod cing gzhi des 'tsho ba sems par 'gyur zhing /
NK044(phi)001:13539: de dag sku gzugs mchod pa'i las la 'jug pa de tsam ma gtogs par /
NK044(phi)001:13543: nang du yang dag par 'jog pa la gces par sems par mi 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:13544: de'i tshe na khyim pa dang rab byung dag gis
NK044(phi)001:13545: de lta bu'i las la brtson pa de dag la
NK044(phi)001:13546: / chos gos sogs yo byed kyi rnyed pa byed par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs shing /
NK044(phi)001:13547: 'od srung ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams kyi las su 'di lta ste /
NK044(phi)001:13548: tshul khrims kyi phung po la gnas te mang du thos pa yongs su btsal bar bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13550: de dag de'i tshe na tshul khrims 'chal ba kho
NK044(phi)001:13551: nar gnas shing chos yongs su btsal ba sbas nas
NK044(phi)001:13552: / de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten dag la mchod
NK044(phi)001:13553: pa'i las bya ba'i phyir brtson par 'gyur zhing gzhi
NK044(phi)001:13554: des 'tsho bar 'gyur bar sems pa la ltos /
NK044(phi)001:13556: 'od srung de bzhin gshegs pas gnas kyi rnam pa 'di lta bu gang ci ston pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13557: yang dag par ston par mdzad pa de dag thams
NK044(phi)001:13558: cad ni rigs kyi bu dang bu mo de dag
NK044(phi)001:13559: nyid kyi ched du yin te /
NK044(phi)001:13560: 'di ltar de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par 'gyur zhing /
NK044(phi)001:13561: thos nas kyang skyon de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa /
NK044(phi)001:13562: de dag rnams kyi don bsdus te nyams su len par 'dod pas /
NK044(phi)001:13563: sems can thams cad kyi don du sangs rgyas thob
NK044(phi)001:13564: 'dod kyi byang chub kyi sems rin po che zin
NK044(phi)001:13565: par byas la / 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13566: bdag ni dal 'byor gyi rten thob cing de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:13567: gshegs pa'i bstan pa dang mjal ba'i dus 'dir 'jig
NK044(phi)001:13568: rten gyi bya ba 'bras bu ngan pa rnam par
NK044(phi)001:13569: zhog / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mchod pa
NK044(phi)001:13570: byed pa sogs kyang bsod nams tshad med pa skyed
NK044(phi)001:13571: zhog / mod kyi / zang zing la brten pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13572: bsod nams bsags pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pas
NK044(phi)001:13573: gtso bor khyim pa rnams la bgyi bar gdams pa
NK044(phi)001:13574: zhog / mod kyi / ste / de bas ches
NK044(phi)001:13575: khyad par 'phags pa'i bgyi ba ni sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:13576: rjes su zhugs pa'i rab tu byung ba rnams la
NK044(phi)001:13577: zhog / mod kyi / ste / / tshul khrims
NK044(phi)001:13578: dang nang du yang dag par 'jog pa nyid basngagasa
NK044(phi)001:13579: zhog / mod kyi / ste / / pa yin
NK044(phi)001:13580: na / bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin
NK044(phi)001:13581: du de dag ci nus su sgrub pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13582: khyad par du yang bdag cag thog ma med pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13583: dus mtha' mi mngon pa zhig nas rnam par rtog
NK044(phi)001:13584: pa sna tshogs rlung dang sprin dang rgya mtsho'i rlabs
NK044(phi)001:13585: lta bu rnams kyis nyin mtshan bar med par dkrugs
NK044(phi)001:13586: shing nyams par byas pa'i dbang du gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:13587: yon tan rmad du byung ba ci yang ma thob
NK044(phi)001:13588: pa'i steng du sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis nyen par
NK044(phi)001:13590: da ni ci nas kyang nang dang phyir rgol ba
NK044(phi)001:13591: lta bu'i rnam rtog sna tshogs kyi gzeb de las
NK044(phi)001:13592: thar bar byas nas skad cig gcig tsam du yang
NK044(phi)001:13593: gang la dmigs na bsod nams che zhing don che
NK044(phi)001:13594: ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la dmigs nas /
NK044(phi)001:13595: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor tshul bzhin bskyed par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13596: de ltar bgyid nus par bla ma rgyal ba sras
NK044(phi)001:13597: dang bcas pas byin gyis brlab tu gsol snyam pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13598: 'dun pa rtse gcig pa'i dam bca' drag pos /
NK044(phi)001:13600: nyin mo skye bo'i rgyu 'grul dang /
NK044(phi)001:13601: mtshan mo sgra yi klags cor sogs bsam gtan gyi
NK044(phi)001:13602: tsher ma med pa'i gnas su bde ba'i stan la
NK044(phi)001:13603: bsam gtan gyi spyod lam dang ldan pas 'dug ste
NK044(phi)001:13604: / sngon 'gro'i chos rnams rgyud la legs par 'byor bar byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:13605: de bzhin gshegs pa sh+aakya'i rgyal po'i sku gzugs ri
NK044(phi)001:13606: mo mkhan mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du mdzes shing
NK044(phi)001:13607: lta na sdug par bris pa /
NK044(phi)001:13608: mtho gang gi tshad sogs mig lam du lta ba
NK044(phi)001:13609: de dang mthun pa'i tshad can mos pa'i stobs kyis
NK044(phi)001:13610: de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rlabs rjes su dran cing
NK044(phi)001:13611: rten 'brel snying po bzlas pas rab tu gnas par
NK044(phi)001:13612: byas pa de rang gi mdun ha cang mi nye
NK044(phi)001:13613: ha cang mi ring bar mig phab ste blta ba'i
NK044(phi)001:13614: spyod yul dang ji ltar 'tshams pa zhig tu bzhag
NK044(phi)001:13615: nas / de la lta zhing de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dngos su mos pa byas te /
NK044(phi)001:13617: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsod nams dang
NK044(phi)001:13618: ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab
NK044(phi)001:13619: pa'i rgyu las / 'jig rten na u dum w+aa
NK044(phi)001:13620: ra ltar brgya lam res 'ga' na 'byung bar 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:13621: pa'i rgyu las / la / de bzhin gshegs pa
NK044(phi)001:13622: de ni mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
NK044(phi)001:13623: pa'i rgyu las / la / / dpe byad bzang
NK044(phi)001:13624: po brgyad cus legs par spras pas mthong na mi
NK044(phi)001:13626: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na shin tu lhang
NK044(phi)001:13627: nge lhan ner 'phags pa'i gzugs kyi sku de dag
NK044(phi)001:13628: / de dus kyi zhing de'i sems can thams cad kyis thun mong du mthong zhing chos kyang ston /
NK044(phi)001:13629: rdzu 'phrul mngon par rol pa sna tshogs kyang mdzad /
NK044(phi)001:13630: gdul bya'i don du 'chags pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13633: gzims pa la sogs pa'i spyod lam sna tshogs kyang mdzad de /
NK044(phi)001:13634: de dag gis sems can tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang smin par mdzad do //
NK044(phi)001:13635: bdag cag gi ston pa sh+aakya thub pa sh+aakya seng
NK044(phi)001:13636: ge 'di yang sh+aakya'i rgyal rigs su 'khrungs shing mthar
NK044(phi)001:13637: gyis sangs rgyas nas bya rgod phung po'i ri la
NK044(phi)001:13638: sogs par byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang skye
NK044(phi)001:13639: bo'i tshogs phal mo che 'dus pa'i nang du chos
NK044(phi)001:13640: ston pa sogs kyi mtshan ma dang rnam pa yid
NK044(phi)001:13641: la byas te / de lta bu'i de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:13642: pa de'i sku'i dbyibs dang rnam pa ni 'di lta
NK044(phi)001:13643: la byas te / bu'o // de bzhin gshegs pa de ni tshul khrims kyi phung po dang /
NK044(phi)001:13644: ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dang /
NK044(phi)001:13646: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po
NK044(phi)001:13647: la sogs pa zag pa med pa'i chos nam mkha'i
NK044(phi)001:13648: mthas kyang mi mtshon pa'i bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13650: bdag cag rnams la thugs brtse ba chen pos nye bar bzung ste /
NK044(phi)001:13651: bdag cag gi don du dka' ba dpag tu med
NK044(phi)001:13652: pa spyad pa ni gong du bram ze rgya mtsho'i
NK044(phi)001:13653: rdul gyis ji ltar thugs bskyed pa sogs kyi tshul
NK044(phi)001:13654: las brtsams te shes par bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:13655: de lta bur bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du
NK044(phi)001:13656: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis bsod nams dang
NK044(phi)001:13657: ye shes kyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing brjod
NK044(phi)001:13658: du med pa dag nye bar bsags nas sgrib pa
NK044(phi)001:13659: thams cad dang bral zhing bdud bzhi bcom ste yon
NK044(phi)001:13660: tan gyi chos ma lus pa yongs su rdzogs nas
NK044(phi)001:13661: shes bya'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
NK044(phi)001:13662: chen po'i sku brnyes te phyi ma'i mu mthar thug
NK044(phi)001:13663: gi bar du sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang
NK044(phi)001:13664: mgon dang dpung gnyen du gyur pa bla na med
NK044(phi)001:13665: pa de lta bu'i bcom ldan 'das de dran pa
NK044(phi)001:13669: de la sems rtse gcig tu 'jog pa la sogs
NK044(phi)001:13670: pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni ji ltar chung yang
NK044(phi)001:13671: byang chub mchog gi rgyu 'gyur ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:13672: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang ye
NK044(phi)001:13673: shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs kyis yin pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13674: phyir na bdag cag ni skal ba bzang ngo snyam
NK044(phi)001:13675: du sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i dad pa rgya
NK044(phi)001:13676: cher bskyed la / de nas de lta bu'i de
NK044(phi)001:13677: bzhin gshegs pa de'i sku'i rnam pa la sems ha
NK044(phi)001:13678: cang mi sgrim ha cang mi lhod par dal bu'i
NK044(phi)001:13679: tshul gyis dran pa dang shes bzhin ma nyams pas
NK044(phi)001:13680: rgyun chags par sems gzung bar bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13681: gang du dmigs pa de ma yin pa'i rnam par
NK044(phi)001:13682: rtog pa thams cad las rang gi sems rgyang bsrings
NK044(phi)001:13683: nas de kho na la 'jog par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13684: de nas mthar gyis bar ma chad par rtse gcig tu 'jug pa ci nus su bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13685: mdor na sems gnas pa'i thabs dgus rim par 'dod
NK044(phi)001:13686: pa'i sems rtse gcig pa grub pa'i bar du bsgrub
NK044(phi)001:13687: par bya'o // de la sku spyi la lta zhing dmigs pa'am /
NK044(phi)001:13688: khyad par du 'phags pa'i chos thob pa dang bying
NK044(phi)001:13689: pa zhi ba'i phyir gtsug tor ltar mi mngon pa
NK044(phi)001:13690: la yang sems gzung bar bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:13691: ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang rgod pa zhi ba'i
NK044(phi)001:13692: phyir thugs dpal gyi be'u'i thad du sems 'dzin pa
NK044(phi)001:13693: dang / bsod nams chen po sgrub cing bde ba
NK044(phi)001:13694: la reg pa'i phyir smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu kha
NK044(phi)001:13695: ba dung ltar dkar zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba'i rnam
NK044(phi)001:13697: chos kyi sgra dbyangs chen pos 'jig rten kun tu
NK044(phi)001:13698: khyab par byed cing sems can rnams la chos 'chad
NK044(phi)001:13699: pas phan thogs pa'i phyir gsung dbyangs yan lag drug
NK044(phi)001:13700: cu 'byung ba'i gnas mgrin pa chos kyi dung ri
NK044(phi)001:13701: mo gsum dang ldan pa'i rnam pa sogs gang mos
NK044(phi)001:13702: pa'i gnas su sems mi g.yo bar gzung bar bya'o
NK044(phi)001:13703: // de ltar sems gzung ba na thog ma nyid du sbrul la bzung ba ltar /
NK044(phi)001:13704: shin tu mi srun zhing rgod pa'i rnam pa dang
NK044(phi)001:13705: bcas pa na nyams dang po ri gzar gyi chu
NK044(phi)001:13706: lta bu g.yo ba'i nyams zhes bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13707: de'i tshe na de dag 'di snyam du rang gi sems ni 'di ltar rtag tu g.yo ba ste /
NK044(phi)001:13708: dpung bzang gis zhus pa las /
NK044(phi)001:13709: sems ni glog dang rlung dang sprin dang 'dra /
NK044(phi)001:13710: rgya mtsho chen po yi ni rlabs dang mtshungs /
NK044(phi)001:13711: sgyu can 'dod dgur yul la mngon dga' ba /
NK044(phi)001:13712: g.yo zhing 'phyan pa nges par gdul bar bya /
NK044(phi)001:13713: zhes gsungs pa ltar sems can thams cad 'di lta
NK044(phi)001:13714: bur rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyi dbang du gyur
NK044(phi)001:13715: pas na / bdag gis ci nas kyang sgyid lug pa mi bya bar brtson par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13716: brtson na ni mthar gyis mi 'grub pa gang yang
NK044(phi)001:13717: med do snyam du sems bskyed nas yun ring por
NK044(phi)001:13718: dmigs pa la ji gnas su brtson par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13719: de ltar brtson pas je zhig na sngar gyi rnam
NK044(phi)001:13720: rtog che zhing rags pa rgod cing dpal tsha ba
NK044(phi)001:13722: rnam rtog sna tshogs kyi brel to mang po lang
NK044(phi)001:13723: long 'khrigs pa rgyun du yod pa'i skabs de la
NK044(phi)001:13724: gnyis pa rong khung dog mo'i chu lta bu thob
NK044(phi)001:13726: rong khung dog mo'i chu de brel ba dang sgra
NK044(phi)001:13727: che yang ri gzar gyi chu las cung dal ba
NK044(phi)001:13728: dper byas pa'o // de nas brtson pa ma btang
NK044(phi)001:13729: bar sngar gyi mu la gnas na sems kyi rtog
NK044(phi)001:13730: pa khong dal zhing dmigs pa la gnas pa lta
NK044(phi)001:13731: dper byas pa'o // bu 'byung yang / zhib tu
NK044(phi)001:13732: brtags na rnam rtog phra ba mang po rgyun chags
NK044(phi)001:13734: nyams gsum pa goms pa'i nyams zhes bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13735: de'i dpe ni chu klung dal gyis 'babs pa lta bur /
NK044(phi)001:13736: rgyang nas bltas na chu de lhun chags shing 'gro
NK044(phi)001:13737: ba mi mngon kyang drung du song na cung zad
NK044(phi)001:13738: mi sdod par 'gro zhing g.yo ba de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:13739: 'byung ngo // de phan chad brtson pa ma btang
NK044(phi)001:13740: bar 'bad na sngar tsam dka' tshegs dang sdug bsngal
NK044(phi)001:13741: mi che bas de nas shin tu yang brtson pa
NK044(phi)001:13743: de ltar byas pas rnam rtog phra mo rnams kyi
NK044(phi)001:13744: g.yo ba'ang zhi ste dmigs pa la 'du byed dang
NK044(phi)001:13745: bcas na ji srid du gnas nus kyang /
NK044(phi)001:13746: rkyen cis kyang g.yo mi nus pa ni ma yin
NK044(phi)001:13747: pa de ni nyams bzhi pa rgya mtsho rlabs dang
NK044(phi)001:13748: bral ba lta bu brtan pa'i nyams zhes bya ste
NK044(phi)001:13749: / sems gnas cing brtan pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:13750: de thob nas de'i ngang du dka' tshegs chen po
NK044(phi)001:13751: mi dgos par yun du goms par byas na nyams
NK044(phi)001:13752: lnga pa mthar phyin pa ri bo lta bu 'byung
NK044(phi)001:13753: ste / de ni rtsol ba med pa'i 'du byed dang don gnad gcig pa yin te /
NK044(phi)001:13754: dmigs pa gang la gtad pa de la sems ngang
NK044(phi)001:13755: gis 'dre zhing rtsol ba mi dgos par lhan ner
NK044(phi)001:13756: ji 'dod du gnas pa la rnam rtog gis g.yo
NK044(phi)001:13757: mi nus pa 'byung ste 'dod pa'i sems rtse gcig
NK044(phi)001:13758: pa zhes bya ba de grub pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:13759: de dus sems gnas pa las byung ba'i nyams sna tshogs kyang 'byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:13760: de'i ngang du goms pa byas na sems dang lus shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ba /
NK044(phi)001:13761: lus dang sems las su rung nas dmigs pa gang
NK044(phi)001:13762: dang gang du 'jog pa de la zhag du mar
NK044(phi)001:13764: lus kyis mi lcogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13765: sems kyis mi lcogs pa gang yang med pa'i lus shing bal ltar yang ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13766: sems mngon par dngas pa'i bde bas khyab pa zhig 'byung ste /
NK044(phi)001:13767: shin sbyangs de yang dang por rags pa lci zhing brtan pa'i tshul can dang /
NK044(phi)001:13768: de nas goms pas snga ma de zad de /
NK044(phi)001:13769: grib ma ltar shin tu srab cing dngas pa'i zhi
NK044(phi)001:13770: gnas mi g.yo ba bsam gtan gyi sems dngos gzhi
NK044(phi)001:13771: dang rjes su mthun pa 'byung la /
NK044(phi)001:13772: de lta bu'i sgom pa la ni zhi gnas zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob ste /
NK044(phi)001:13773: shin tu sbyangs pa dang ldan pa'i sems yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:13774: 'di ni bsam gtan dang po'i nyer bsdogs mi rtogs
NK044(phi)001:13775: med ces bya ba'i char yang gtogs pa yin no
NK044(phi)001:13776: // 'dis mtshan ma'i dmigs pa dang mtshan med stong
NK044(phi)001:13777: nyid sogs ci bsgoms kyang go mi chod pa med
NK044(phi)001:13778: // do // de la zhi gnas sgrub pa'i yan
NK044(phi)001:13779: lag yid byed bzhi dang stobs drug la sogs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13780: rnam grangs mang du yod kyang don du sems ci
NK044(phi)001:13781: gnas su dmigs pa la dran pa shes bzhin gyis
NK044(phi)001:13782: rab tu bzung ste goms par byas pa las nyams
NK044(phi)001:13784: de lta bu'i zhi gnas grub pa'i tshe na sems las su rung ba'i stobs kyis /
NK044(phi)001:13785: lus zo mdog bzang zhing bde la stobs dang ldan pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13786: sems gsal zhing dwangs pas spyod yul ci rigs la 'jug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13787: lus sems la dga' bde tshad med pa'i rlan gyis
NK044(phi)001:13788: khyad par yang 'gyur la nyon mongs chung zhing nang
NK044(phi)001:13789: gi dben pa'i dga' ba khyad par can rjes mthun
NK044(phi)001:13790: pa nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:13791: der zhi gnas de lta bu sangs rgyas kyi sku
NK044(phi)001:13792: la dmigs pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs dang sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:13793: kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis dngos sam /
NK044(phi)001:13795: rmi lam du yang sangs rgyas mthong zhing chos thob
NK044(phi)001:13796: pas sogs yon tan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs rang
NK044(phi)001:13797: gi rgyud la skye bar byed do //
NK044(phi)001:13798: de ltar zhi gnas grub pa na lhag mthong gi rnal 'byor la 'jug par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:13799: de ci lta bu zhe na /
NK044(phi)001:13800: de ltar dang por zhi gnas sgrub pa'i skabs su
NK044(phi)001:13801: sangs rgyas kyi sku ri mor bris pa de dmigs
NK044(phi)001:13802: rten du byas pa la sems bzhag pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:13803: dmigs rten med kyang yid yul du 'char ba la
NK044(phi)001:13804: sems bzhag pa sogs ci 'dod du byas pa'i mthar
NK044(phi)001:13805: zhi gnas grub pa'i dus su /
NK044(phi)001:13806: rten med par yang rang gi sems kyi yul du
NK044(phi)001:13807: sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs legs par gsal snang gi
NK044(phi)001:13808: tshul du ting nge 'dzin gyi mtshan ma'i gzugs snang
NK044(phi)001:13809: bar 'gyur te / de yang dang por yid yul
NK044(phi)001:13810: du me long la gzugs brnyan ltar lhang nge lhan
NK044(phi)001:13811: bar 'gyur te / ner gsal zhing / de la
NK044(phi)001:13812: cher goms pas rang gi dbang po'i yul du yang
NK044(phi)001:13813: mngon sum lta bur gsal bar 'gyur la /
NK044(phi)001:13814: da dung goms na gzhan pa dag gi dbang po'i
NK044(phi)001:13815: yul du yang ji ltar dmigs pa'i snang ba de
NK044(phi)001:13817: gsal ba dang po yid kyi yul dang /
NK044(phi)001:13818: gnyis pa dbang po'i yul dang /
NK044(phi)001:13819: gsum pa reg pa'i yul du snang zhes snga 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:13820: ba'i bsnyen sgrub kyi yig cha rnams su gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:13821: bzhin no // de'i nang gi gsal ba dang po
NK044(phi)001:13822: tsam zhig grub pa'i dus nas kyang lhag mthong bsgrub
NK044(phi)001:13823: bzhin no // par bya ste / de la 'di
NK044(phi)001:13824: ltar rang gi yid kyi yul du sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:13825: sku mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa mdzes shing yid
NK044(phi)001:13826: du 'ong ba lhang nge lhan ne mngon sum lta
NK044(phi)001:13827: bur gyur pa 'di yang rang gi sems la goms
NK044(phi)001:13828: pa'i bag chags kyi snang ba tsam ste /
NK044(phi)001:13829: gang nas kyang ma 'ongs gang du yang mi 'gro //
NK044(phi)001:13831: phyi dang nang gang du yang mi rnyed pa /
NK044(phi)001:13832: sems la rag las shing goms pa'i rten cing 'brel
NK044(phi)001:13833: bar 'byung ba tsam las rab tu snang ba ste
NK044(phi)001:13834: / 'di gang la snang ba'i sems de yang brtags
NK044(phi)001:13835: na phyi dang nang gang du'ang mi rnyed de gzhi
NK044(phi)001:13836: dang rtsa ba bral ba yin na de la snang
NK044(phi)001:13838: des na snang ba 'di la ngo bo nyid cung zad kyang med do //
NK044(phi)001:13839: snang ba 'di ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs
NK044(phi)001:13840: rgyas rnams 'jig rten du dngos su byung ba yang
NK044(phi)001:13841: / sems can rnams kyi rang sems dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13842: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam chen po phan tshun rten cing 'brel ba'i dbang gis /
NK044(phi)001:13843: ji ltar me long dag pa la skyes bu'i gzugs
NK044(phi)001:13844: brnyan snang ba ltar snang ba de ni 'jig rten
NK044(phi)001:13845: pa rnams kyi spyod yul du slu ba med par
NK044(phi)001:13846: snang mod kyi / de bzhin gshegs pa la ni
NK044(phi)001:13847: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyis rab tu
NK044(phi)001:13848: phye ba'i chos cung zad kyang mi mnga' ste /
NK044(phi)001:13849: chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi sku
NK044(phi)001:13850: shin tu dpag par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir te
NK044(phi)001:13851: / ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:13852: de bzhin gshegs pa zad med dge ba yis //
NK044(phi)001:13853: chos kyi gzugs brnyan yin te 'di la ni //
NK044(phi)001:13854: de bzhin nyid med de bzhin gshegs pa'ang med //
NK044(phi)001:13855: 'jig rten kun na gzugs brnyan kun tu snang //
NK044(phi)001:13857: da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin las /
NK044(phi)001:13858: sangs rgyas byang chub sems kyis brtags pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:13859: sems kyang rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing //
NK044(phi)001:13860: rnyogs med 'gro ba kun dang ma 'dres par //
NK044(phi)001:13861: gang gis shes pa byang chub mchog 'tshang rgya //
NK044(phi)001:13862: zhes gsungs pa ltar shes rab kyis brtag cing shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:13863: de ltar shes par byas nas /
NK044(phi)001:13864: de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba de bzhin du
NK044(phi)001:13865: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13866: snang zhing srid pa'i chos thams cad kyang rten cing
NK044(phi)001:13867: 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten na 'di
NK044(phi)001:13868: ltar snang zhing nyams su myong ba yod mod kyi
NK044(phi)001:13869: / de thams cad rang rang gi rgyu rkyen rten
NK044(phi)001:13870: cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i dbang gis snang ba tsam
NK044(phi)001:13871: ma gtogs par de la legs par brtags na chos
NK044(phi)001:13872: gang dang gang yang rang gi ngo bo nyid rdul
NK044(phi)001:13873: phra rab tsam rnyed par mi 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:13874: dper na sgyu ma'i snang ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:13875: rmi lam gyi snang ba la sogs pa'i spyod yul
NK044(phi)001:13876: bzhin du don la 'gro 'ong dang skye 'gag la
NK044(phi)001:13877: sogs pa ci yang med mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:13878: ji ltar snang ba la snang ba ltar du zhen
NK044(phi)001:13879: cing so sor brtag pa spangs pa'i byis pa so
NK044(phi)001:13880: so'i skye bo rnams kyis skye ba dang 'gag pa
NK044(phi)001:13881: la sogs par yod par 'dzin pa ni /
NK044(phi)001:13882: rab rib can gyis skra shad kyi snang ba la de bsal ba'i 'du shes byed pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:13883: thog ma med pa nas ma rigs pa'i rab rib
NK044(phi)001:13884: kyis sems bslad pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i gnas
NK044(phi)001:13885: lugs mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
NK044(phi)001:13886: yang dag pa'i gnas lugs rtogs pa rnams kyi ngor ni /
NK044(phi)001:13887: snang ba 'di rnams med dgos pa ma yin te /
NK044(phi)001:13888: snang ba 'di nyid snang bzhin du cir yang ma
NK044(phi)001:13889: grub par mthong nas chos de dag rang gi ngo
NK044(phi)001:13890: bos gdod nas ma skyes par rtogs pa yin te
NK044(phi)001:13891: / ma dros pas zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:13892: rkyen las skyes pa gang yin de ma skyes //
NK044(phi)001:13893: de la skye ba ngo bo nyid kyis med //
NK044(phi)001:13894: rkyen la rag las gang yin stong par gsungs //
NK044(phi)001:13895: stong nyid gang shes de ni bag yod pa'o //
NK044(phi)001:13898: chos thams cad ni sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bu /
NK044(phi)001:13899: mya ngan las 'das pa yang sgyu ma dang rmi lam lta bu /
NK044(phi)001:13900: gal te mya ngan las 'das pa las lhag pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13901: chos shig yod na de yang sgyu ma dang rmi
NK044(phi)001:13904: ji ltar smig rgyu dri za'i grong khyer dang //
NK044(phi)001:13905: sgyu ma ji bzhin rmi lam ji lta bur //
NK044(phi)001:13906: mtshan ma sgom pa ngo bo nyid kyi stong //
NK044(phi)001:13907: chos rnams thams cad de bzhin shes par gyis //
NK044(phi)001:13909: dbu ma rtsa ba shes rab las /
NK044(phi)001:13910: rmi lam ji bzhin sgyu ma bzhin //
NK044(phi)001:13911: dri za'i grong khyer ji bzhin du //
NK044(phi)001:13912: de bzhin skye dang de bzhin gnas //
NK044(phi)001:13913: de bzhin du ni 'jig pa gsungs //
NK044(phi)001:13915: de bas na ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi sku yi ngor de ltar snang yang /
NK044(phi)001:13916: de la de'i ngo bo nyid du dmigs par bya ba thams cad ye nas med pa ltar /
NK044(phi)001:13917: chos thams cad kyang de dag 'dra ba /
NK044(phi)001:13919: bdag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:13920: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de yang chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin te /
NK044(phi)001:13921: ye shes snang ba rgyan gyi mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:13922: rtag tu skye med chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
NK044(phi)001:13923: chos rnams thams cad bde bar gshegs dang 'dra //
NK044(phi)001:13924: byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams //
NK044(phi)001:13925: 'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod //
NK044(phi)001:13928: bdag ji 'dra ba de 'drar sems can thams cad shes //
NK044(phi)001:13929: sems can thams cad ji 'dra de 'drar chos kun shes //
NK044(phi)001:13930: skye ba med dang skye ba gnyis kar mi rtog pa //
NK044(phi)001:13931: 'di ni shes rab pha rol phyin mchog spyod pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:13934: gang dag sangs rgyas spros 'das shing //
NK044(phi)001:13935: zad pa med la spros byed pa //
NK044(phi)001:13936: spros pas nyams pa de kun gyis //
NK044(phi)001:13937: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong mi 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:13938: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gang //
NK044(phi)001:13940: de bzhin gshegs pa rang bzhin med //
NK044(phi)001:13942: ces gsungs pa ltar gnas lugs mthar thug gi don du /
NK044(phi)001:13943: chos thams cad ni skye ba dang mi skye ba
NK044(phi)001:13944: la sogs pa spros pa'i d+r+wa ba thams cad las
NK044(phi)001:13945: 'das pa'i chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid du
NK044(phi)001:13946: gyur pa ste / blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:13947: chos 'di dri med dag dge rang bzhin 'od gsal te //
NK044(phi)001:13948: nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam la gdod nas byung ba med //
NK044(phi)001:13949: ma skyes ma byung gnas pa med cing 'gag pa med //
NK044(phi)001:13950: 'di ni rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dri med g.yo ba med //
NK044(phi)001:13952: sangs rgyas phal po che las /
NK044(phi)001:13953: phra la shel dkar drang srong chen po'i lam //
NK044(phi)001:13954: mi rtog rtog yul ma yin lta bar dka' //
NK044(phi)001:13955: rang bzhin zhi zhing 'gag med 'byung ba med //
NK044(phi)001:13956: mkhas gsal shes pas khong du chud pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:13957: ngo bo nyid stong zhi zhing sdug bsngal zad //
NK044(phi)001:13958: rgyud las rnam grol mnyam par mya ngan 'das //
NK044(phi)001:13959: mtha' dang dbus med tshig gis brjod du med //
NK044(phi)001:13960: dus gsum grol ba nam mkha' 'dra zhing mtshungs //
NK044(phi)001:13962: 'phags pa sgra gcan 'dzin gyi zhal snga nas //
NK044(phi)001:13963: smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK044(phi)001:13964: ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid //
NK044(phi)001:13965: so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba //
NK044(phi)001:13966: dus gsum rgyal ba'i yum la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK044(phi)001:13969: gzhan las shes min zhi ba dang //
NK044(phi)001:13970: sbros pa rnams kyis ma spros pa //
NK044(phi)001:13971: rnam rtog med don tha dad med //
NK044(phi)001:13972: de ni de nyid mtshan nyid do //
NK044(phi)001:13974: de ltar brjod pa dang spros pa dang dmigs pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13975: spyod yul thams cad las 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid
NK044(phi)001:13976: gtan la phebs pa'i rnal 'byor pa des re zhig
NK044(phi)001:13977: dang por chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs
NK044(phi)001:13978: pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
NK044(phi)001:13979: sgyu ma lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste de
NK044(phi)001:13980: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta ba dang de las chos
NK044(phi)001:13981: nyan pa sogs sgyu ma'i spyod yul gyi rnam par
NK044(phi)001:13983: de nas brjod du med pa mnyam pa nyid so
NK044(phi)001:13984: so rang gis rigs par bya'i stong pa nyid la
NK044(phi)001:13985: mnyam par bzhag pa byas na tshul de lta bus
NK044(phi)001:13986: chos la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i bzod pa
NK044(phi)001:13987: thob par 'gyur la de la brten nas ring por
NK044(phi)001:13988: mi thogs par mthong ba'i lam gyi ye shes mngon
NK044(phi)001:13989: du 'thob pa la the tshom med do //
NK044(phi)001:13990: de dag ni da ltar gyis sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
NK044(phi)001:13991: bkod pa gcig pa'i ting the 'dzin gyi don nyams
NK044(phi)001:13992: su len pa'i man ngag tu gsal por bshad pa
NK044(phi)001:13993: yin no // de ltar tshul bzhin nyams su len
NK044(phi)001:13994: ma nus pa dag gis kyang dus dang rgyun du
NK044(phi)001:13995: ston pa thub pa'i dbang po rjes su dran pa'i
NK044(phi)001:13996: rnal 'byor du bya ba thub chog byin rlabs gter
NK044(phi)001:13997: mdzod ji lta ba bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:13998: sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs kyi mchog rnams la /
NK044(phi)001:13999: byang chub bar du bdag ni skyabs su mchi /
NK044(phi)001:14000: bdag gis sgom bzlas bgyis pa'i bsod nams 'dis /
NK044(phi)001:14001: 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'gyub par shog /
NK044(phi)001:14002: ces skyabs sems gyi dmigs rnam gsal btab cing nges
NK044(phi)001:14003: shes kyi dam bca' brtan pos tshar gsum brjod la
NK044(phi)001:14004: / tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi bsgom pa'i rjes su
NK044(phi)001:14005: stong dang rten 'byung gi snang ba zung 'jug sgyu
NK044(phi)001:14009: thub chog gi 'don cha ltar dmigs pa gsal btab
NK044(phi)001:14010: la sangs rgyas dngos su bzhugs yod snyam pa'i 'dun
NK044(phi)001:14011: pa dang dad pa brtan pos byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:14012: thabs la mkhas pa dag gis sems kyi skad cig
NK044(phi)001:14013: gcig la bskal pa mang po'i tshogs 'dums par byed
NK044(phi)001:14014: pa bsags sbyang spel gsum gyi gnad bsdus pa phyag
NK044(phi)001:14015: 'tshal ba sogs yan lag bdun pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14016: re 'bras chud mi za ba'i phyir sangs rgyas la
NK044(phi)001:14017: yid ches pa'i sgo nas gsol ba 'debs shing 'dod
NK044(phi)001:14018: pa'i don la smon lam gdab pa rnams gzhung ltar
NK044(phi)001:14019: byas la / de'i rjes su sangs rgyas bcom ldan
NK044(phi)001:14020: 'das de dag la dad pa rtse gcig gis lus
NK044(phi)001:14021: zhing gi rdul snyed kyis btud cing /
NK044(phi)001:14022: mchod pa'i dngos po thams cad kyis mchod la /
NK044(phi)001:14023: bla med byang chub ma thob pa'i bar du bdag
NK044(phi)001:14024: dang sems can thams cad skyabs su mchi'o snyam pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14026: bla ma ston pa bcom ldan 'das sogs mtshan ci nus su brjod /
NK044(phi)001:14027: de'i mthar de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rgyud bskul ba'i
NK044(phi)001:14028: tshul du gzungs bzlas pa'i rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs
NK044(phi)001:14029: pa'i sku las 'od zer gyi snang ba nam mkha'i
NK044(phi)001:14030: khams khyab par byung bas bdag dang sems can thams
NK044(phi)001:14031: cad la thim pas sgrib pa dang sdug bsngal thams
NK044(phi)001:14032: cad bsal nas / bde ba dang ldan par byas /
NK044(phi)001:14033: dad pa dang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang spobs
NK044(phi)001:14034: pa dang shes rab ye shes la sogs pa theg
NK044(phi)001:14035: pa chen po'i lam gyi yon tan tshul bzhin rgyud
NK044(phi)001:14036: la skyes te phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non nas
NK044(phi)001:14037: mthar gyis bla med byang chub chen por 'tshang rgya
NK044(phi)001:14038: ba'i skal ba can du byas par bsams la /
NK044(phi)001:14040: de la dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
NK044(phi)001:14041: kyi le'u bcu gcig pa 'od zer kun tu bkye
NK044(phi)001:14042: ba'i las / da ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:14043: dge ba'i las kyi rgyu rkyen gyis //
NK044(phi)001:14044: rmongs pa rnams ni rab spangs pas //
NK044(phi)001:14045: 'od zer sna tshogs grub pa yin //
NK044(phi)001:14047: de ltar byed med dbang gis na //
NK044(phi)001:14048: kha dog dpag med 'od bstan nas //
NK044(phi)001:14049: mos pa dag ni ji bzhin du //
NK044(phi)001:14050: re ba dag ni skong bar mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:14052: 'od zer gcig la kha dog rnam pa gnyis nas
NK044(phi)001:14053: brtsams te dpag tu med pa'i bar du 'gyed pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14054: 'od zer sna tshogs pa yod de /
NK044(phi)001:14058: rnam dag sems kyi bar dang /
NK044(phi)001:14059: de bzhin du rnam dag gzugs sogs chos kyi bar dang /
NK044(phi)001:14060: rnam dag sa sogs nam mkha'i bar dang /
NK044(phi)001:14061: rnam dag phung po sogs dang /
NK044(phi)001:14064: kha dog dkar dang ser sogs kyi ming can dang /
NK044(phi)001:14069: klu mchod rgyas la sogs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14074: yongs dag sngon gyi dge ba so sor bskyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14075: 'od zer chos nyid ces bya ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba g.yo bar byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:14076: bdud 'dul zhes bya ba bdud skrag par byed pa /
NK044(phi)001:14077: 'od zer bsod nams rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de'i ming 'dzin pas gnod pa spong ba /
NK044(phi)001:14078: stobs ldan rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de'i ming bzung bas dgra spong pa /
NK044(phi)001:14079: rab zhi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba de'i ming bzung
NK044(phi)001:14080: bas 'dod chags spong ba sogs gang gi ming bzung
NK044(phi)001:14081: ba tsam gyi log spyod dang tshul 'chal sogs nyes
NK044(phi)001:14082: pa thams cad spong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14083: 'od zer gang gi mig bzung ba tsam gyis kyang
NK044(phi)001:14084: tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin sogs rdzogs pa dang
NK044(phi)001:14085: / rmongs pa sogs nyon mongs pa rnams med par byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14086: de bzhin du bde ba thob pa /
NK044(phi)001:14088: spros pa thams cad las 'das pa /
NK044(phi)001:14089: dus gsum shes pa sogs yon tan skyed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14090: 'od zer mya ngan med pa sogs re rer yang
NK044(phi)001:14091: 'khor khrag khrig brgyad cu yod pa de lta bu
NK044(phi)001:14092: la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la 'od zer
NK044(phi)001:14093: tha dad pa'i rnam grangs sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
NK044(phi)001:14094: rdul gyi grangs las 'das pa sna tshogs mnga' bas
NK044(phi)001:14095: sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad cing rang
NK044(phi)001:14096: rang gi 'dod pa'i re ba rnams yongs su rdzogs
NK044(phi)001:14097: par mdzad par gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14098: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las kyang /
NK044(phi)001:14099: sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od mtha' yas //
NK044(phi)001:14100: 'od zer d+r+wa ba bsam mi khyab //
NK044(phi)001:14101: zhing rnams rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa //
NK044(phi)001:14102: thams cad kyi ni phyogs su khyab //
NK044(phi)001:14104: gzhan yang sangs rgyas phal po che dang dkon mchog
NK044(phi)001:14105: ta la'i mdo'i bzang po dpal gyi le'u sogs las
NK044(phi)001:14106: ji skad gsungs pa'i don rnams kyang dran par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:14107: // skabs 'dir yang gong du bstan pa'i zhi lhag
NK044(phi)001:14108: gi rnal 'byor la yang ci ltar rigs par nyams
NK044(phi)001:14109: len du byas pas zhi lhag rjes mthun pa tsam
NK044(phi)001:14110: // bsgrub par bya'o // thun 'jog pa'i tshe man+dala 'bul ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14111: bstod cing gsol ba gdab pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14112: dge ba bsngo zhing smon lam gyi khyad par ci ltar ra gas par gdab par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:14113: 'dir gshegs gsol dang nyer bsdu lta bu mi dgos te /
NK044(phi)001:14114: sangs rgyas kyi sku gang du dmigs pa der bzhugs pa yin mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:14115: nam mkha' lta bu mnyam pa nyid kyi sku la
NK044(phi)001:14116: gshegs byon skye 'bri med cing phyogs dus gang du
NK044(phi)001:14117: yang nam rung rung du dran par bya ba yin
NK044(phi)001:14118: pa'i phyir ro // thun mtshams rnams su mdo sna tshogs klog pa'am /
NK044(phi)001:14119: phyag dang mchod pa bskor ba sogs dge rtsa ci nus la 'bad pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14120: de ltar ma nus kyang sangs rgyas ci nus su dran par bya zhing /
NK044(phi)001:14121: mi rtag pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14122: stong zhing bdag med pa'i 'du shes dang /
NK044(phi)001:14123: mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba'i 'du shes rnams yang na yang du yid la bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:14124: nyal ba'i tshe na ji srid gnyid kyis ma non
NK044(phi)001:14125: pa de srid du dge sbyor byas la gnyid du
NK044(phi)001:14126: 'gro ba'i tshe na sangs rgyas kyi sku'i 'od kyi
NK044(phi)001:14127: snang bas khyab pa la dmigs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14128: snang ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:14129: don rnam par nges pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs las /
NK044(phi)001:14130: dge slong dag de la ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pa
NK044(phi)001:14131: kun tu bsgoms shing mang du byas na ye shes
NK044(phi)001:14132: mthong ba thob par 'gyur ba gang zhe na /
NK044(phi)001:14133: dge slong dag 'di la dge slong gis snang ba'i
NK044(phi)001:14134: 'du shes shin tu legs par bzung zhes sogs dang
NK044(phi)001:14136: dper na sos ka'i zla ba tha ma la nam mkha' la sprin med cing /
NK044(phi)001:14137: sprin dang bral ba'i nyin mo nyi ma'i gzugs la
NK044(phi)001:14138: snang ba yongs su dag cing yongs su dkar la
NK044(phi)001:14139: 'od gsal te mun pa ma yin no //
NK044(phi)001:14140: dge slong dag de bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:14141: dge slong gis snang ba'i 'du shes shin tu legs par bzung /
NK044(phi)001:14144: legs par rtogs par byas te /
NK044(phi)001:14145: nyin mo'i 'du shes la shin tu gnas nas /
NK044(phi)001:14146: de snang ba de sems la sgom ste /
NK044(phi)001:14147: nyin mo ji lta bar mtshan mo yang de bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:14148: mtshan mo ji lta bar nyin mo yang de bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:14149: sngar ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:14150: phyis ji lta bar sngar yang de bzhin /
NK044(phi)001:14151: 'og ji lta bar steng yang de bzhin steng du ji lta bar 'og tu yang de bzhin te /
NK044(phi)001:14152: de ltar phye zhing kun nas bskor ba med pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14153: sems kyis nyin mo'i 'du shes la shin tu gnas
NK044(phi)001:14154: nas snang ba de sems la bsgoms pa ste /
NK044(phi)001:14155: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin bsgom pa kun tu bsten te /
NK044(phi)001:14156: bsgoms shing mang du byas na ye shes mthong ba 'thob par 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:14158: de ltar thub dbang rjes su dran pa'i cho ga
NK044(phi)001:14159: bzhin dus dang rgyun du ci nus su brtson par
NK044(phi)001:14160: byas la / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla med
NK044(phi)001:14161: rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir bsam pa thag pas
NK044(phi)001:14162: byas la / bsngo bar bya'o // de ltar brtson pa na kun rdzob sgyu ma lta bu dang /
NK044(phi)001:14163: don dam spros bral gyi tshul la mnyam par bzhag
NK044(phi)001:14164: pas zhi lhag grub pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas mthong
NK044(phi)001:14165: zhing chos thos pa sogs lam gyi yon tan khyad
NK044(phi)001:14167: rjes mthun tsam du zhugs pa rnams la yang byin rlabs dang dngos grub ci rigs pa 'byung zhing /
NK044(phi)001:14168: rmi lam du yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba
NK044(phi)001:14169: sogs kyi mtshan ma bzang po 'byung bar 'gyur te
NK044(phi)001:14170: / gzhan yang rmi lam gyi mtshan ma bzang ngan
NK044(phi)001:14171: 'phags pa bzhi pa sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i mdo
NK044(phi)001:14172: / las / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lha'i
NK044(phi)001:14173: bu dpal bzang ldan la gsungs pa 'di lta ste
NK044(phi)001:14174: / las / / sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun gyi rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14175: khron pa rdul can gyi nang na zla dkyil mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14176: mtshe'i rdzing khron pa rnyog pa can gyi gting na zla dkyil mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14177: bar snang sprin chen pos yog cing de la zla dkyil mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14178: bar snang la rlung rdul du bas 'khrigs par mthong zhing de la zla dkyil mthong ba bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14179: yang las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14180: g.yang sa chen po nas g.yang la lhung ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14181: lam mtho dman can du zhugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14182: lam dog par zhugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14183: phyogs bslad cing 'jigs pa mang po mthong ba bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14184: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i rgyu mthun gyi rmi lam bzhi ni dug drag pos 'khrugs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14185: gcan gzan gtum po phal mo che'i sgra thos pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14186: rang g.yon can gyi nang na gnas pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14187: rang lus dri ma can dang gos dri ma can du mthong ba bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14188: gzungs 'thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14189: gter chen por rin chen sna tshogs kyis gang ba mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14190: rdzing bu me tog pad+ma rgyas pas yongs su gang ba mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14191: bdag gos dkar po'i phrugs rnyed par mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14192: lha zhig gis spyi bo'i gtsug na gdugs 'dzin par mthong ba bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14193: ting nge 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu mthun gyi rmi lam bzhi ste /
NK044(phi)001:14194: bu mo bzang mo rgyan bzang pos brgyan pas me tog sil ma 'bul bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14195: nam mkha' la bya ngang pa dkar po thal dkar
NK044(phi)001:14196: gyi khyu skad 'byin cing 'gro bar mthong ba dang
NK044(phi)001:14197: / de bzhin gshegs pa 'od mang pos brgyan pa'i phyag spyi bor 'jog pa mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14198: de bzhin gshegs pa me tog pad+ma la bzhugs shing bsam gtan mdzad par mthong ba bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14199: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i rgyu mthun gyi rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14200: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14201: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14202: me tog pad+ma kha 'bus par mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14203: tshangs pa'i dbang po rab tu zhi ba'i spyod lam can mthong ba dang bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14204: byang chub sems dpa'i rang gi mtshan nyid kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14205: shing s+aa la chen po 'dab ma me tog 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis gang bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14206: khar ba'i snod gser gyis gang bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14207: nam mkha'i ngos gdugs dang rgyal mtshan ba dan gyis gang bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14208: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po mthong ba dang bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14209: bdud 'dul ba'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14210: gyad chen pos gyad kun mnan nas ba dan thogs te 'gro ba mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14211: dpa' bo chen pos g.yul las rgyal te 'gro bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14212: rgyal por dbang bskur bar mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14213: bdag nyid byang chub snying po la 'dug cing bdud 'dul bar mthong ba dang bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14214: phyir mi ldog pa'i rtags kyi rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14215: mgo la thod dkar pos bcings pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14216: bdag gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byed pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14217: bdag chos kyi stan chen po la 'dug pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14218: de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs shing chos ston par mthong ba dang bzhi'o //
NK044(phi)001:14219: byang chub snying po 'thob pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rmi lam bzhi ni /
NK044(phi)001:14221: bya rtsa shas bskor ba mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14222: gang dang gang du 'gro ba der shing thams cad
NK044(phi)001:14223: ldang zhing 'dud la phyag 'tshal bar byed pa dang
NK044(phi)001:14224: / gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba chen
NK044(phi)001:14225: po mthong ba dang bzhi'o zhes gsungs pas mtshon nas
NK044(phi)001:14226: rmi lam gyi mtshan ma'i bzang ngan kyang shes par
NK044(phi)001:14227: byas nas skyon bsal ba dang yon tan sgrub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14231: sangs rgyas byon nas rang gi spyir bor byug ste 'od 'gyed pa mthong ba dang /
NK044(phi)001:14232: me tog mthong ba sogs gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14233: mdo gzhan na rmi lam du me tog pad+ma mthong na don grub par yang gsungs /
NK044(phi)001:14235: sdig pa byang ba'i rmi ltas ni chu klung chen
NK044(phi)001:14236: po brgal 'dod pas zam pa'i steng nas song ba
NK044(phi)001:14237: / gzhan gyis bdag la khrus byas pa /
NK044(phi)001:14238: lus la char babs pa rnams rnam par dag pa'i ltas dang /
NK044(phi)001:14239: dge 'dun mang po'i gral du zhugs te 'dug pa /
NK044(phi)001:14240: bdag mchod rten nam gtsug lag khang du zhugs te
NK044(phi)001:14241: sangs rgyas byang sems kyi gzugs rnyan mthong ba rnams
NK044(phi)001:14242: sangs rgyas dang chos kyi rjes su zhugs pa'i mtshan
NK044(phi)001:14243: ma dang / rang gis shing thog rnyed cing za
NK044(phi)001:14244: ba rmis na tshe 'dir yon tan gyi 'bras bu
NK044(phi)001:14246: rmi lam de 'dra gcig rmis nas mtshams med gcig byang ba nas /
NK044(phi)001:14247: lnga rmis na mtshams med lnga byang bar gsungs pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14248: gzhan yang dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i rmi lam gyi le'u la sogs pa bzhin du shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:14249: nam 'chi ba'i tshe na mdo las gsungs pa'i 'du
NK044(phi)001:14250: shes bcu gcig la sogs byang chub sems dpa' rnams
NK044(phi)001:14251: kyi 'chi ba'i nyams len sna tshogs kyang gnad kyi
NK044(phi)001:14252: don 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes las gsungs pa
NK044(phi)001:14253: der 'du ste / de la byang chub sems dpa'
NK044(phi)001:14254: nam 'chi ba'i tshe 'da' ka ye shes bsgom par
NK044(phi)001:14255: der 'du ste / bya ba ni / gang du bdag 'achi'o snyam du sems pa na /
NK044(phi)001:14256: bla ma thub pa'i dbang po spyi bo'i gtsug tu
NK044(phi)001:14257: bsgoms nas dad pa drag po bskyed par byas la
NK044(phi)001:14258: / de nas des 'di ltar bsam par bya ste /
NK044(phi)001:14259: nga gcig pur ma zad sems can thams cad 'chi ba'i chos nyid las ma 'das pa yin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:14260: 'khor ba 'dir bdag dang gzhan rnams skye 'chi grangs
NK044(phi)001:14261: med pa yang nas yang du myong bar gyur kyang
NK044(phi)001:14262: 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal myong ba 'ba' zhig lam don
NK044(phi)001:14264: da res kyi 'chi ba 'di la don yod par bya'o snyam du bsams nas /
NK044(phi)001:14265: 'di ltar phyi dang nang gis bsdus pa'i 'dus byas
NK044(phi)001:14266: kyi chos sngon dang da lta dang phyis 'byung ba
NK044(phi)001:14267: thams cad ni skad cig kyang mi rtag par skye
NK044(phi)001:14268: zhing 'gag pa'i chos can ma yin pa med la
NK044(phi)001:14270: yun thung ngus rgyun 'gags pa chu bur dang glog la sogs pa lta bu yang yod /
NK044(phi)001:14271: ring mo na rgyun 'gags pa 'jig rten gyi khams lta bu yang yod mod kyi /
NK044(phi)001:14272: yun ring yang rung thung yang rung 'dus byas thams
NK044(phi)001:14273: cad mthar 'gags par mi 'gyur ba ni yod pa
NK044(phi)001:14274: ma yin te / snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyang 'jig la /
NK044(phi)001:14275: de bzhin gshegs pa yang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i
NK044(phi)001:14276: tshul bstan na bdag lta bu lta ci smos te
NK044(phi)001:14277: / des na de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du
NK044(phi)001:14278: 'dus byas thams cad ni mi rtag pa'o zhes bka'
NK044(phi)001:14279: / stsal kyang / 'dus byas kyi rang bzhin 'di
NK044(phi)001:14280: lta bu ma shes pas 'bral ba dang 'chi ba
NK044(phi)001:14282: 'dus pa dang skye ba la dga' ba'i sems can
NK044(phi)001:14283: rnams 'khor bar chags shing yang nas yang du 'khor
NK044(phi)001:14285: bdag gis ni da res kyi 'chi ba rang thog
NK044(phi)001:14286: tu bab pa 'dis dge ba'i bshes gnyen byas nas
NK044(phi)001:14287: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du snying
NK044(phi)001:14288: thag pa nas shes par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:14290: 'chi khar nan tu bsams pa 'di bzhin byang chub
NK044(phi)001:14291: snying po'i bar gyi tshe rabs thams cad du yang
NK044(phi)001:14292: 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag par mthong nas 'dus
NK044(phi)001:14293: byas kyi spyod yul la mi chags par gyur cig
NK044(phi)001:14294: / de ltar 'gyur bar bla ma thub pa'i dbang
NK044(phi)001:14295: po dang rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas byin gyis
NK044(phi)001:14296: brlab tu gsol snyam du bsams la /
NK044(phi)001:14298: 'phags pa 'da' ka ye shes zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
NK044(phi)001:14299: chos rnams rang bzhin rnam dag pas //
NK044(phi)001:14300: dngos po med pa'i 'du shes sgom //
NK044(phi)001:14301: byang chub sems dang rab ldan pas //
NK044(phi)001:14302: snying rje chen po'i 'du shes bsgom //
NK044(phi)001:14303: rang bzhin mi dmigs 'od gsal bas //
NK044(phi)001:14304: dngos po ci la'ang ma chags bsgom //
NK044(phi)001:14305: sems ni ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyu //
NK044(phi)001:14306: sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig /
NK044(phi)001:14307: ces gsungs pa ltar dang por rang 'chi bas mtshon nas nam mkha'i mtha' klas pa na /
NK044(phi)001:14308: 'di ltar 'dus byas mi rtag pa la rtag pa
NK044(phi)001:14309: dang 'khor ba sdug bsngal ba la bde bar bzung
NK044(phi)001:14310: nas 'khor ba na 'chi 'pho zhing sdug bsngal sna
NK044(phi)001:14311: tshogs mtha' med par myong ba'i sems can thams cad
NK044(phi)001:14312: la dmigs te snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed par
NK044(phi)001:14313: bya zhing / de thams cad skye rga na 'chi'i
NK044(phi)001:14314: sdug bsngal las bsgral nas bla med rdzogs pa'i byang
NK044(phi)001:14315: chub la 'jog pa'i slad du bdag 'jig rten gsum
NK044(phi)001:14316: gyi mgon po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su gyur
NK044(phi)001:14317: nas sems can thams cad sdug bsngal mtha' dag las
NK044(phi)001:14318: sgrol bar gyur cig snyam du byang chub kyi sems
NK044(phi)001:14319: dang ldan pa'i snying rje'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o
NK044(phi)001:14320: bya zhing / // de bzhin du 'chi ba 'dis
NK044(phi)001:14321: mtshon pa'i chos thams cad ni brtags na dben pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14322: rang bzhin yin kyang rang gi rnam par rtog pas
NK044(phi)001:14323: sgro btags pa tsam gyi dbang gis bde sdug dang
NK044(phi)001:14325: yang dag par na 'chi ba dang sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba gang yang med do //
NK044(phi)001:14326: chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'o snyam du thag bcad cing bsam par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:14327: de bzhin du 'chi ba la sogs pa'i chos 'di
NK044(phi)001:14328: dag thams cad la ngo bo ci yang ma grub
NK044(phi)001:14329: kyang / rnam pa cir yang ma 'gags pa'i snang ba sgyu ma lta bu /
NK044(phi)001:14330: brtags na yod med kyi mtha' gang du'ang brjod du med pa /
