NK044(phi)001:14331: rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs shing 'od gsal ba yin
NK044(phi)001:14332: pas dngos po dang mi dmigs pa ci la yang
NK044(phi)001:14333: mi gnas pa'i rang gi sems gdod nas 'od gsal
NK044(phi)001:14334: ba da lta thad ka'i shes pa de'i ngang du
NK044(phi)001:14335: 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
NK044(phi)001:14336: gyur pas na ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i thugs
NK044(phi)001:14337: dang rang gi sems kyang sems nyid rang byung gi
NK044(phi)001:14338: ye shes de'i ngang du tha dad med par thag
NK044(phi)001:14339: bcad de / de las ma yengs par byas la /
NK044(phi)001:14340: der gding dang ldan cing nges shes skyes pa na /
NK044(phi)001:14341: rang gi sems kyi de kho na nyid rtogs pa yin zhing /
NK044(phi)001:14342: de las gzhan du sangs rgyas zhes bya ba ci yang med de /
NK044(phi)001:14343: de lta bu'i don la 'chi ba dang skye ba med mod /
NK044(phi)001:14344: 'chi ba sogs ni rnam rtog tsam yin la /
NK044(phi)001:14345: rnam rtog dang bral ba'i sems nyid gnyug ma'i don
NK044(phi)001:14346: la skye 'chi gang yang ma grub pa de'i ngang
NK044(phi)001:14347: du mnyam par bzhag ste 'phos par gyur na /
NK044(phi)001:14348: bar do'i 'khrul snang sogs mi 'byung bar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK044(phi)001:14349: gal te de lta bu'i gding tshad med na /
NK044(phi)001:14350: 'chi kha dang bar do kun tu bla ma thub
NK044(phi)001:14351: pa'i dbang po dran pa 'ba' zhig ma brjed na
NK044(phi)001:14352: de kho nas dag pa'i zhing du dbugs 'byin par
NK044(phi)001:14353: 'gyur ro // gzhan yang tshe 'dir 'jigs pa dang
NK044(phi)001:14354: sdug bsngal ci byung yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran
NK044(phi)001:14355: par byas na rgud pa de las nges par thar
NK044(phi)001:14356: 'gyur ro // bar 'gyur la / bde ba dang
NK044(phi)001:14357: legs pa ci byung yang sangs rgyas kyi thugs rjer
NK044(phi)001:14358: shes shing bde ba'i dngos po de dag kun tu
NK044(phi)001:14359: bzang po'i mchod pa'i sprin lta bur dmigs te sangs
NK044(phi)001:14361: rtag par yang ston pa'i bka' las byung ba'i rnam thar gsum dang /
NK044(phi)001:14362: phar phyin drug sogs kyi don bsam zhing /
NK044(phi)001:14363: sems can thams cad la snying rje chen pos byang
NK044(phi)001:14364: chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa'i
NK044(phi)001:14365: spyod pa la ci nus su bslab par bya'o //
NK044(phi)001:14366: de ltar ston pa rjes su dran pa 'di ni shin tu gal che ste /
NK044(phi)001:14367: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni byang chub sems
NK044(phi)001:14368: dpa'i lam thams cad kyi thog mar 'gro ba yin
NK044(phi)001:14369: zhing phan yon tshad med la /
NK044(phi)001:14370: lam gyi yon tan thams cad skyed pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:14371: deng sang ni grub mtha' so so'i lugs kyi 'don sgom gtso bor bzung nas /
NK044(phi)001:14372: ston pa thub pa'i dbang po la cher cher 'dzin pa nyung na yang /
NK044(phi)001:14373: bstan pa 'di la zhugs pa dag ston pa la
NK044(phi)001:14374: mchog tu dad pa'i 'du shes med pa rnams ni
NK044(phi)001:14375: blo gros can du mi 'gyur te /
NK044(phi)001:14377: ston pa 'di nyid kyis zhing dang dus 'dir bdag
NK044(phi)001:14378: cag snyigs ma'i 'gro ba rnams la sangs rgyas kyi
NK044(phi)001:14379: mdzad pa bstan pa'i thugs rje de kho na la
NK044(phi)001:14380: brten nas / bstan pa 'di la sde snod gsum dang /
NK044(phi)001:14381: de tsam du ma zad snyigs dus kyi tshe thung
NK044(phi)001:14382: gcig la mi slob pa'i zung 'jug mngon du byed
NK044(phi)001:14383: nus pa'i lam gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa'i bsten
NK044(phi)001:14384: pa'i bar du byung ba yin la /
NK044(phi)001:14385: mdo sngags kyi bstan pa de la zhugs pa'i bstan
NK044(phi)001:14386: 'dzin gyi skyes bu skye 'phags kyi dge 'dun kyang
NK044(phi)001:14387: ji snyed cig byung bar gyur pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:14388: gal te ston pa nyid kyis zhing dang dus 'dir bstan pa'i snang ba 'gyed par ma mdzad na /
NK044(phi)001:14389: bdag cag rnams kyis dkon mchog gsum gyi sgra tsam yang mi thos na /
NK044(phi)001:14390: mdo sngags kyi lam nyams su len pa lta ci smos /
NK044(phi)001:14391: des na gsar rnying so so'i lugs kyi nyams len
NK044(phi)001:14392: gang byed kyang ston pa nyid la lhag par ched
NK044(phi)001:14393: cher du 'dzin pa'i dad pa drag po nam yang
NK044(phi)001:14394: med du mi rung bas ston pa la lhag par
NK044(phi)001:14395: gus shing de'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya dgos
NK044(phi)001:14396: so // gal te gzhan dag 'di snyam du ston
NK044(phi)001:14397: pa thub pa'i dbang po min kyang sangs rgyas chags
NK044(phi)001:14398: bral rab byung gi rnam pa can dang /
NK044(phi)001:14399: yi dam khro bo dang zhi ba'i rnam pa can
NK044(phi)001:14400: sogs gang la gus kyang khyad ci yod snyam na
NK044(phi)001:14401: / ngo bo la khyad med de /
NK044(phi)001:14402: sangs rgyas thams cad ye shes kyi sku mnyam pa
NK044(phi)001:14403: nyid yin zhing spangs rtogs la mtho dman kyang med
NK044(phi)001:14404: mod / rnam pa tsam du tha snyad nye bar bzung ba'i dbang du byas na /
NK044(phi)001:14405: ston pa nyid kyi thugs rje la brten nas /
NK044(phi)001:14406: grub mtha' so so'i yi dam gyi lha zhi chags
NK044(phi)001:14407: khro bo'i tshul can rnams kyi bskyed bzlas dang lam
NK044(phi)001:14409: 'dzam bu'i gling gi chu thams cad kyi 'byung gnas ma dros pa yin pa bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:14410: mdo sngags lam gyi nyams len che phra bstan pa
NK044(phi)001:14411: 'di la byung ba thams cad ston pa 'di'i thugs
NK044(phi)001:14413: ji ltar rang gi rtsa ba'i bla ma la gsol ba btab na /
NK044(phi)001:14414: bla ma gzhan las byin rlabs lhag par 'jug pa bzhin du /
NK044(phi)001:14415: 'brel ba'i dbang gis sangs rgyas gzhan la gsol ba
NK044(phi)001:14416: btab pa las kyang ston pa thub pa'i dbang po
NK044(phi)001:14417: la gsol ba 'debs pa byin rlabs myur ba yin
NK044(phi)001:14418: no // 'o na thub pa'i dbang po 'ba' zhig
NK044(phi)001:14419: ma gtogs gzhan la de tsam gsol ba 'debs pa
NK044(phi)001:14422: rang gi yi dam gang la gsol ba 'debs kyang /
NK044(phi)001:14423: de ston pa thub pa'i dbang po dang don la
NK044(phi)001:14424: tha dad med de sangs rgyas thams cad chos kyi
NK044(phi)001:14425: sku nyid du mnyam par gsungs pa bzhin du shes
NK044(phi)001:14426: pa dang / ston pa mchog de sku'i rnam 'gyur
NK044(phi)001:14427: tha dad pa yi dam gyi lha 'di dang 'di
NK044(phi)001:14429: bdag cag snyigs ma'i 'gro ba rnams kyi skyabs dang
NK044(phi)001:14430: dpung gnyen du bstan pa yin no snyam du shes
NK044(phi)001:14431: dgos kyi / ston pa dang rang gi yi dam
NK044(phi)001:14432: don la tha dad du byed cing ston pa bor
NK044(phi)001:14433: nas yi dam gzhan 'dzin pa'i 'du shes su gyur
NK044(phi)001:14435: de bzhin du gsang sngags bla med kyi lugs la
NK044(phi)001:14436: rang gi rdo rje'i slob dpon du gyur pa'i bla
NK044(phi)001:14437: ma de ni / ngo bo dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang dbyer med pa /
NK044(phi)001:14438: rnam pa dus gsum sangs rgyas las kyang bka' drin che ste /
NK044(phi)001:14439: bla ma de med na dus gsum sangs rgyas bzhugs
NK044(phi)001:14440: su zin kyang rang la byin rlabs dang dngos grub
NK044(phi)001:14441: mi 'byung ba de'i phyir bla ma'i ba spu'i khung
NK044(phi)001:14442: bu gcig mchod na yang dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod
NK044(phi)001:14443: pa las ches khyad par du 'phags pa yin la
NK044(phi)001:14444: / bla mar mnyes pa sgrub pa kho nas dus
NK044(phi)001:14445: gsum sangs rgyas mnyes shing byin rlabs 'jug par rdo
NK044(phi)001:14446: rje'i rgyud kyi lung rnams las rgya cher basngagasa pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14447: phyir na bla ma ni dkon mchog kun 'dus sam
NK044(phi)001:14448: / / dkon mchog bzhi par yang grags te /
NK044(phi)001:14449: des na dus gsum sangs rgyas las /
NK044(phi)001:14450: bla ma gnyan par shes par bya //
NK044(phi)001:14452: bla ma'i rnal 'byor sogs las lhag pa gzhan ci yod snyam na /
NK044(phi)001:14453: de ni de ltar shin tu yin te /
NK044(phi)001:14454: gsang sngags kyi lugs la lam zab bla ma'i rnal
NK044(phi)001:14455: 'byor las lhag pa'i chos gzhan byin rlabs 'jug pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14456: sgor gyur pa bsgom du med kyang /
NK044(phi)001:14457: rang gi gsang sngags ston pa'i bla ma de yang
NK044(phi)001:14458: ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i rnam par 'phrul pa
NK044(phi)001:14461: mya ngan ma byed kun dga' bo //
NK044(phi)001:14462: smre sngags ma 'don kun dga' bo //
NK044(phi)001:14463: nga ni phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe //
NK044(phi)001:14464: dge ba'i bshes gnyen nyid sprul nas //
NK044(phi)001:14465: khyod la sogs pa'i don du 'gyur //
NK044(phi)001:14467: ston pa thub pa'i dbang po'i thugs rjes rjes su
NK044(phi)001:14468: bstan pa'i mdo sngags kyi lam nyams su blangs pas
NK044(phi)001:14469: bla ma de rnams thub pa'i gsungs las skyes pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14471: nyams rtogs dang ldan pa'i bla ma de ston pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14472: thugs rgyud kyi kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i byang
NK044(phi)001:14473: chub sems kyi byin rlabs 'phos pa'i thugs kyi sras
NK044(phi)001:14474: kyang yin la / de'i phyir na bla ma'i rnal
NK044(phi)001:14475: 'byor gang bsgoms kyang de yang ston pa thub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14476: dbang po dang tha mi dad du shes dgos pa
NK044(phi)001:14477: kyang yin la / / der ma zad bla ma dang yi dam ci bsgoms kyang /
NK044(phi)001:14478: de gnyis tha dad med pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14479: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang yang tha dad med par shes dgos kyi /
NK044(phi)001:14480: sangs rgyas la mchog dman dang blang dor gyi 'du shes can la dngos grub mi 'byung ngo //
NK044(phi)001:14481: gong du ston pa'i bka' drin shes shing de la mchog tu gus pa dang /
NK044(phi)001:14482: de dang tha mi dad par rtogs nas bla ma
NK044(phi)001:14483: dang yi dam gang yang rung ba'i dmigs bzlas kyi
NK044(phi)001:14484: rnal 'byor la zhugs kyang dngos grub rgya chen po
NK044(phi)001:14486: des na thub pa'i dbang po rjes su dran pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14487: chog la brten nas dmigs bzlas byed pa de'i tshe
NK044(phi)001:14488: na / so sor rang rang la mdo sngags kyi
NK044(phi)001:14489: chos ston pa'i bla ma dam pa de dag dang
NK044(phi)001:14490: na / / der ma zad dus gsum gyi dkon
NK044(phi)001:14491: mchog gsum po thams cad kyang de la don du
NK044(phi)001:14492: 'dus par shes pa'i mos pa de lta bus dmigs
NK044(phi)001:14493: bzlas byed dgos pa yin no //
NK044(phi)001:14494: 'on kyang 'dir ni mdo chog gi tshul du sangs
NK044(phi)001:14495: rgyas rjes su dran pa tsam gtso bor byas pa
NK044(phi)001:14496: yin mod kyi / bla ma dang dbyer med du sgom mi rung ba yang ma yin la /
NK044(phi)001:14497: cis kyang bsgom dgos pa'i nges pa yang med do
NK044(phi)001:14498: sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa de kho nas kyang
NK044(phi)001:14500: mtshan gyi skabs su bla ma ston pa zhes sbyar ba ni /
NK044(phi)001:14501: 'jig rten gsum gyi bla ma yin pas sangs rgyas kyi mtshan du'ang rung la /
NK044(phi)001:14502: rang nyid gang la dad pa'i bla ma de dang
NK044(phi)001:14503: dbyer med yin pa mtshon pa'i don du go na
NK044(phi)001:14504: yang rung ngo // 'on kyang gsang sngags bla med
NK044(phi)001:14505: kyi lugs kyi rtsa ba'i bla ma nyid thub pa'i
NK044(phi)001:14506: dbang po'i rnam par sgom pa'i bla ma'i rnal 'byor
NK044(phi)001:14507: gyi tshul 'don pa na yang de ltar bya ste
NK044(phi)001:14508: yang rung ngo // / bla ma nyid sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:14509: kun 'dus kyi ngo bo yin pas de sangs rgyas
NK044(phi)001:14510: gang dang ci lta bu'i rnam par bsgoms kyang 'gal
NK044(phi)001:14511: yang rung ngo // / ba med la / so
NK044(phi)001:14512: so'i mos pa de bzhin du byin rlabs kyang de
NK044(phi)001:14515: bdag ni 'ching ba kun dang ldan pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:14516: so so'i skye bo'i nang nas tha chad kyang //
NK044(phi)001:14517: bdag gis legs par bshad pa 'di dag rnams //
NK044(phi)001:14518: bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung la brten pa dang //
NK044(phi)001:14519: sh+aakya'i rgyal po'i mtshan tsam thos pa rnams //
NK044(phi)001:14520: byang chub dag las phyir mi ldog ces su //
NK044(phi)001:14521: bden par smra ba'i gsung gis basngagasa pas na //
NK044(phi)001:14522: 'di la 'jug rnams e ma skal pa bzang //
NK044(phi)001:14523: bsod nams chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:14524: 'byung gnas cho ga'i khyad par gang zhig la //
NK044(phi)001:14525: de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:14526: phrin las nyid du blo ldan rnams kyis 'tshal //
NK044(phi)001:14527: lhag bsam dag pas 'di bshad dge ba yis //
NK044(phi)001:14528: mtha' yas 'gro ba kun kyang yang dag par //
NK044(phi)001:14529: theg pa che po'i lam la zhugs nas kyang //
NK044(phi)001:14530: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang po thob par shog /
NK044(phi)001:14531: gnas skabs su yang 'jig rten khams kun tu //
NK044(phi)001:14532: 'jigs dang rgud pa ma lus rab zhi nas //
NK044(phi)001:14533: bstan 'dzin zhabs brtan bshad sgrub bstan pa dar //
NK044(phi)001:14534: 'gro kun bde skyid 'phel ba'i bkra shis shog //
NK044(phi)001:14535: ces pa 'di ni thub chog gi rgyab chos su //
NK044(phi)001:14536: mi pham 'jam dbyangs rgya mtshos spel ba dge legs mchog tu gyur cig //
NK044(phi)001:14538: kun khyab spros bral rang byung de bzhin nyid //
NK044(phi)001:14539: gang dang gnyis med ye shes 'dus ma byas //
NK044(phi)001:14540: mngon gyur sku bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag /
NK044(phi)001:14541: mkhyen brtses don gnyis mthar phyin ston par 'dud /
NK044(phi)001:14543: 1 / lam bden bdag med rtogs pa'i shes rab ni //
NK044(phi)001:14544: dag gsal sgrib gnyis spang ba'i gnyen po che //
NK044(phi)001:14545: chags bral brtags 'gog bsam blo gnyis 'dzin bral //
NK044(phi)001:14546: lung rtogs dge ba gsum ldan chos la dad /
NK044(phi)001:14548: 2 / yul kun bden par ma grub chos nyid rig /
NK044(phi)001:14549: tha snyad sa lam rnam bzhag ji snyed shes //
NK044(phi)001:14550: phra rag nyon shes dman pa'i 'ching ba las //
NK044(phi)001:14551: rnam grol theg chen dge 'dun tshogs la gus /
NK044(phi)001:14553: 3 / snyigs dus rgud pa'i she mun mthar byed pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:14554: bdag cag ston pa'i thugs bskyed rab dkar zla //
NK044(phi)001:14555: bskal bzang rnam 'dren rgyu skar stong phrag las //
NK044(phi)001:14556: dam baca'i 'jug pa nyid kyi khyad par 'phags /
NK044(phi)001:14558: 4 / de bzhin gshegs 'di sngon dus slob lam du //
NK044(phi)001:14559: chos spyan rdul bral brnyes pa'i sa nas bzung //
NK044(phi)001:14560: rang don ma yin gzhan don la dgyes phyir //
NK044(phi)001:14561: dpag yas rnam thar gtam 'di ngo mtshar che /
NK044(phi)001:14563: 5 / rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid ni //
NK044(phi)001:14564: mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo gzhal med kyang //
NK044(phi)001:14565: de sras byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 'dzin dus //
NK044(phi)001:14566: srid pa'i sdug bsngal re yang gzhom pa'i phyir /
NK044(phi)001:14568: 6 / rab tu bzod dka' dmyal me 'bar ba'i nang //
NK044(phi)001:14569: bskal par zhugs kyang sems dpa' mi zhum pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:14570: khyod chos 'di ni bdag med gnyis rtogs kyi //
NK044(phi)001:14571: dmigs med snying rje 'khrungs pa'i 'bras bu yin /
NK044(phi)001:14573: 7 / rgyal ba'i gsung rab chos sgo rgya mtsho'i 'jing //
NK044(phi)001:14574: yan lag bcu gnyis la sogs chu klung 'bum //
NK044(phi)001:14575: zhing 'dir 'bab las skyes rabs nor bu'i sde //
NK044(phi)001:14576: gang gis mgul rgyan phan bde'i 'dod pa 'byung /
NK044(phi)001:14578: 8 / de phyir thub dbang nyi ma'i gnyen de yi //
NK044(phi)001:14579: mchod chog skyes rabs pad dkar do shal bcas //
NK044(phi)001:14580: 'jam mgon mi pham rnam par rgyal ba yis //
NK044(phi)001:14581: chos mgul dpal gyi mdzod las legs par byung /
NK044(phi)001:14583: 9 / dus gsum rgyal ba'i sku dang ye shes mdzod //
NK044(phi)001:14584: dbang stobs mkhyen brtse nus pa'i rang gzugs che //
NK044(phi)001:14585: bstan pa yongs rdzogs mnga' bdag 'gro ba'i mgon //
NK044(phi)001:14586: mchog sprul chos kyi blo gros dgongs dbyings las /
NK044(phi)001:14588: 10 / phral yun phan bde ma lus 'byung ba'i gzhi //
NK044(phi)001:14589: snod bcud dus kyi rgud ba zhi ba'i gnyen //
NK044(phi)001:14590: bsod nams yid bzhin nor bu'i bang mdzod sgo /
NK044(phi)001:14591: gcig char mngon sum snang ba'i skabs phyes te /
NK044(phi)001:14593: 11 / brtse chen gzigs pas bskul ba'i rdo rje'i gsung //
NK044(phi)001:14594: skyes bzang rin chen phreng ba'i dbyig dang bcas //
NK044(phi)001:14595: phebs bzhin thugs bskyed dad pa'i rgyal mtshan rtser //
NK044(phi)001:14596: mngon par mchod mdzad bstan pa'i sbyin bdag gang /
NK044(phi)001:14598: 12 / kun mkhyen bla ma 'jam pa'i rdo rje des //
NK044(phi)001:14599: bstan 'gror dgongs bzhin dag chen sprul pa'i sku //
NK044(phi)001:14600: phan bde bye ba phrag brgya'i sbyi dpal ni //
NK044(phi)001:14601: sa spyod chos rgyal tshe dbang bdud 'dul nyid /
NK044(phi)001:14603: 13 / gang gi mkhyen stobs zla shel bdud rtsi yis //
NK044(phi)001:14604: chos sbyin mi 'dzad spar dngos kun+da'i tshal //
NK044(phi)001:14605: dge bshes 'od zer rgya mtsho'i mthun 'jug bcas //
NK044(phi)001:14606: gangs can skal bzang dgyes pa'i dpyid du bsgrubs /
NK044(phi)001:14608: 14 / de ltar legs byas bsod nams chu gter klong //
NK044(phi)001:14609: snyoms zhugs yongs bsngo nor bu'i phung po mchog /
NK044(phi)001:14610: zab bral dbyings dang ye shes ngang bstim pas //
NK044(phi)001:14612: rin chen gsum gyi snang chas mdzes pa yi //
NK044(phi)001:14613: rgyal bstan lung rtogs nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gnyen //
NK044(phi)001:14614: bshad sgrub pad+ma dkar po'i tshal rgyas nas //
NK044(phi)001:14615: phyogs dus kun tu rtag khyab lhun grub shog 16 /
NK044(phi)001:14616: de 'dzin skyes bu dge 'dun sde tshogs bcas //
NK044(phi)001:14617: rab 'phel bslab gsum nyams len phul phyin nas //
NK044(phi)001:14618: 'du 'dzi'i gnas las yid rab dbyung nas kyang //
NK044(phi)001:14619: 'jig rten 'das pa'i sa lam dbang 'byor shog 17 /
NK044(phi)001:14620: shin tu snying rje'i yul gyur ngan song gsum //
NK044(phi)001:14621: mi bzad sdug bsngal du mas mnar ba sogs //
NK044(phi)001:14622: srid pa'i rgyar chud 'gro khams ma lus kyis //
NK044(phi)001:14623: phan bde bla na med pa thob par shog 18 /
NK044(phi)001:14624: khyad par phun tshogs sde bzhi 'phel ba'i gnyen //
NK044(phi)001:14625: dge bcu ga yang du 'khyil ba'i rgyala khamas 'dir //
NK044(phi)001:14626: nad mug 'khrugs rtsod mi mthun nyer 'tshe zhi //
NK044(phi)001:14627: char 'bebs 'bru 'phel bde zhing skyid gyur cig 19 /
NK044(phi)001:14628: lha gcig yab sras btsun mo blon 'bangs bcas //
NK044(phi)001:14629: stobs rtsal gzi brjid mnga' thang longs spyod dar //
NK044(phi)001:14630: sku tshe bsod nams snyan grags dpal g.yang rgyas //
NK044(phi)001:14631: chos srid dbu 'phang 'phel zhing brtan gyur cig 20 /
NK044(phi)001:14632: rgyal srid sde rtag bsod nams 'khor los bsgyur //
NK044(phi)001:14633: pha rol mi mthun phyogs las rnam par rgyal //
NK044(phi)001:14634: skye rgu kun kyang mthun zhing bkra shis smon //
NK044(phi)001:14635: mchog gsum bden pas de bzhin 'grub gyur cig 21 /
NK044(phi)001:14636: mthar thugs 'gro khams nam mkha'i snyed kyi mtha' //
NK044(phi)001:14637: thogs med nas bsags sgrib gsum bag chags sprin //
NK044(phi)001:14638: kun gzhi'i khams su 'jug pa'i skabs bral nas //
NK044(phi)001:14639: byang chub sems kyi zla ba shar gyur cig 22 /
NK044(phi)001:14640: de yang tshad med snying rje'i sa bon las //
NK044(phi)001:14641: smon dang 'jug pa'i rtsa ba rab brtan zhing //
NK044(phi)001:14642: phar phyin rgya mtsho'i yal ga gyes pa'i rtser //
NK044(phi)001:14643: stong nyid bdag med mkhyen pa'i lo ma rgyas /
NK044(phi)001:14645: 23 / rtogs bya mthar thug phra ba chos kyi skur //
NK044(phi)001:14646: rang shar 'gags med longs sku'i chu skyes 'phel //
NK044(phi)001:14647: gang 'dul sprul pa'i ge sar rnam bkod pa'i //
NK044(phi)001:14648: sku gsum 'bras bu myur du thob par shog 24 /
NK044(phi)001:14649: mdor na bde gshegs sras bcas thugs bskyed dang //
NK044(phi)001:14650: mdzad pa smon lam mkhyen brtse nus mthu yis //
NK044(phi)001:14651: bla med ye shes sgyu 'phrul ji 'dra bar //
NK044(phi)001:14652: de 'dra kho nar bdag sogs 'gyur bar shog 25 /
NK044(phi)001:14653: ces spar byang smon tshigs shwa lo ka de bzhin
NK044(phi)001:14654: gshegs pa'i 'bras chos grangs ldan 'di ni khams gsum
NK044(phi)001:14655: chos kyi rgyal po bka' babs bdun gyi mnga' bdag
NK044(phi)001:14656: kun mkhyen bla ma rdo rje gzi brjid rtsal gyi
NK044(phi)001:14657: rtag khyab lhun gyis grub pa'i gang 'dul phrin las
NK044(phi)001:14658: rol gar chen po gang zhig /
NK044(phi)001:14659: dus gsum rgyal ba'i spyi gzugs lhar bcas 'gro ba'i
NK044(phi)001:14660: skyabs rje bstan 'dzin mkhas grub yongs kyi gtsug rgyan
NK044(phi)001:14661: rgyal bstan yongs rdzogs kyi mnga' bdag mchog sprul rin
NK044(phi)001:14662: po che 'jam dbyangs chos kyi blo gros kyis rnam
NK044(phi)001:14663: dkar 'dir bskul phyir bka' stsal skyes dang 'brel ba
NK044(phi)001:14665: 7 lha rigs sa skyong yid bzhin nor bu rin
NK044(phi)001:14666: po che tshe dbang bdud 'dul rgyal thabs phan bde'i
NK044(phi)001:14667: phrin las dbang bsgyur phyogs las rnam par rgyal ba'i
NK044(phi)001:14668: sdes / thub chog rin chen byin rlabs gter mdzod
NK044(phi)001:14669: dang rgyab chos 'di'i chos sbyin 'dzad med spar gyi
NK044(phi)001:14670: dngos po lcags 'brug lo bkrun nas chos mdzod chen
NK044(phi)001:14671: por bzhugs su gsol skabs rmugs sangs ban+de kun bzang
NK044(phi)001:14672: chos kyi nyi mas spel ba dge zhing bkra shis
NK044(phi)001:14673: sdes / par gyur cig / sarba d+aa ka l+y+aanam b+ha ban+tu /
NK044(phi)001:14674: bkra shis dpal 'bar 'dzam gling rgyan drug shog /
